A  partly submerged  glacier cave on Perito Moreno Glacier .
the बर्फ  facade is approximately 60 m high
Ice formations in the  titlis हिमानी  cave
A  हिमानी गुफा  is a cave formed within the ice of a glacier .
Glacier caves are often called ice caves , but this term is properly used to  describe bedrock  caves that contain year-round ice .
In physics , circular motion is a movement of an object along the circumference of a circle or  रोटेशन साथ  a circular path .
It can be  वर्दी , साथ निरंतर कोणीय रेट  of rotation ( and constant speed ) , or non-uniform with a changing rate of rotation .
The  रोटेशन around a  fixed axis of a three-dimensional body involves circular motion of its parts .
The equations of motion describe the movement of the  बीच of द्रव्यमान of a देह  .
उदाहरण of गोलाकार गति शामिल : an कृत्रिम उपग्रह orbiting the धरती at निरंतर  height , a stone which is tied to a rope and is being swung in circles , a car turning through a curve in a race track , an electron moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field , and a gear turning inside a mechanism .
Since the object 's velocity vector is constantly changing direction , the moving object is  undergoing त्वरण by a अभिकेन्द्रीय  force in the direction of the center of rotation .
Without this acceleration , the object  होता मूव in a सीधा लकीर  , according to Newton 's laws of motion .
अपोलो पंथ is a fictional अक्षर इससे the रॉकी films , initially portrayed as the undisputed हेवीवेट चैंपियन of the संसार .
He was played  by कार्ल  Weathers .
Creed had multiple nicknames , including The Master of  विपत्ति  , The King of Sting , The Dancing Destroyer , The Prince of Punch , The One and Only and The Count of Monte Fisto .
Urban legend states that Apollo  Creed  's name is a wordplay on the Apostles ' Creed , a statement of belief used in Christian churches .
All of Apollo 's championship  झगड़े यहूद अनुसूचित  for the 15 round distance .
Championship fights did not  बदलें  from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987 .
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red , white , and blue trunks ; Creed was the first man to wear them ( latterly worn by Rocky Balboa in the 3rd and 4th installments and finally by Tommy `` The Machine '' Gunn (  Tommy  Morrison ) in the 5th installment ) although normally he wore red and white , as seen in Rocky II .
Balboa 's signature colors were black  और gold—colors he  used in the latest movie .
In the  संयुक्त राज्य  , the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States , whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter , acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different  regions of the संयुक्त  States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge  नियुक्त to ऐसे a अदालत may be categorized  as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court , Circuit Judges of the courts of appeals , and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article  iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक  branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the Court of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Trade exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts , including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges , are also sometimes referred to as `` federal judges '' ; however , they are neither  नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष nor पुष्टि  by the Senate , and their power derives from Article I instead .
See  आलेख i और  Article III tribunals .
The Beretta 21A Bobcat is a small pocket-sized semi-automatic  पिस्टल designed  by Beretta in Italy .
Production began in late 1984 ,  solely in  the Beretta U.S.A. facility in Accokeek , Maryland .
It is a further development of  the beretta  Model 20 , whose production ended in 1985 .
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often  shortened  to VUL ) is a type of life insurance that builds a cash value .
In a VUL , the cash value can be invested  in a  wide variety of separate accounts , similar to mutual funds , and the choice of which of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner .
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to this ability to  invest in पृथक खाते जिनकी  values vary—they vary because they are invested in stock and/or bond markets .
The 'universal ' component in the name refers to the flexibility the owner has in making  प्रीमियम  payments .
The premiums can vary from nothing in a given month up to maximums defined by the Internal   Revenue Code for life insurance .
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed premium payments that typically can not be missed without  lapsing the नीति ( हालांकि एक may कसरत an स्वचालित प्रीमियम  Loan feature , or surrender dividends to pay a Whole Life premium ) .
Variable universal life is a type of permanent life insurance ,  क्युकी the मौत लाभ होगा be सशुल्क if the insured मरता कोई समय  as long as there is sufficient cash value to pay the costs of insurance in the policy .
With most if not all VULs , unlike whole life , there is no endowment age ( the age at which the cash value equals the death  लाभ राशि , जिससे लिये पूरे जीवन  is typically 100 ) .
This is yet another key advantage of VUL  over  Whole Life .
With a typical whole life policy , the death benefit is limited to the  फेस राशि  specified in the policy , and at endowment age , the face amount is all that is paid out .
Thus with either  मौत or endowment  , the insurance company keeps any cash value built up over the years .
However , some participating  पूरे जीवन नीतियों प्रस्ताव  riders which specify that any dividends paid on the policy be used to purchase `` paid up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over time .
If investments made in the separate accounts out-perform the general account  of the बीमे कम्पनी , a उच्चतर rate-of-return  can occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life .
The combination over the years of no endowment age , continually increasing death benefit , and if a high rate-of-return is earned in the separate accounts of a VUL policy , this could  परिणाम in उच्चतर मान to the मालिक  or beneficiary than that of a whole life policy with the same amounts of money paid in as premiums .
The outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the  क्लासिक  wood stove adapted for set-up outdoors while still transferring the heat to interior buildings .
A mound of  लड़की स्काउट  cookies .
This  mound  contains 74 boxes of cookies
Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by Girl Scouts of the USA ( GSUSA ) as one of its major  fundraisers लिये लोकल स्काउट इकाई  .
Members of the GSUSA have been  selling कुकीज़ चूंकि  1917 to raise funds .
Girls who participate can earn  पुरस्कार  for their efforts .
There are also unit incentives if the unit as a whole  करता खूब .
As of 2007 , sales were estimated at about 200  लाख  boxes per year .
विश्वविद्यालयों हॉल
Purdue University , located in West Lafayette , Indiana  , is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों  of the six-campus Purdue University system .
purdue थी  founded on May 6 , 1869 , as a land-grant university when the Indiana General Assembly , taking advantage of the Morrill Act , accepted a donation of land and money from Lafayette businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science , technology , and agriculture in his name .
The first classes were held on  सितंबर 16  , 1874 , with six instructors and 39 students .
Today , Purdue is a member of the Big Ten Conference , and is a well known  world-class शोध संस्था  .
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in Indiana as well as  the चौथी largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय  student population of any university in the United States .
Purdue offers both undergraduate and graduate  कार्यक्रम  in over 211 major areas of study , and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula .
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of aviation , having established the first  कॉलेज क्रेडिट offered  in flight training , the first four-year bachelor 's degree in aviation , and the first university airport ( Purdue University Airport ) .
Purdue 's aviation technology program remains one of the most  प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific  programs in the world .
In the mid-20th century , Purdue 's  aviation  program expanded to encompass advanced spaceflight technology giving rise to Purdue 's nickname , Cradle of Astronauts .
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts ,  सहित गस grissom ( एक of the असली पारा सात astronauts  ) , Neil Armstrong ( the first person to walk on the moon ) , and Eugene Cernan ( the most recent person to walk on the moon ) .
A sebaceous cyst ( ) is a term  कि loosely refers to either epidermoid  cysts ( also known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ) .
Because an epidermoid cyst originates in the  epidermis  and a pilar cyst originates from hair follicles , by definition , neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst .
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the fatty , white , semi-solid  सामग्री in दोनो of ये  cyst entities is not sebum , but keratin .
Furthermore , under the microscope neither  एंटिटी contains  sebaceous glands .
In practice ,  however ,  the terms are often used interchangeably .
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and are known as steatocystomas or  , if अनेक , as  steatocystoma multiplex .
Modern  pointe  shoes .
The edge of the  टो  pad , which is inserted between the foot and toe box for cushioning , can be seen on the right foot .
A pointe shoe is a type of shoe worn by ballet dancers  जब performing  pointe work .
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear  weightless और sylph  -like and have evolved to enable dancers to dance en pointe ( on the tips of their toes ) for extended periods of time .
They are normally worn by female dancers , though male dancers  may पहनें उन्हें लिये अपरंपरागत भूमिकाएँ ऐसे as the भद्दा stepsisters in सिंडरेला , नीचे  in A Midsummer Night 's Dream , or men performing as women in dance companies such as Les Ballets Trockadero and Grandiva .
They are manufactured in a variety of colors , most commonly in shades of  लाइट  pink .
This tablespoon has a  क्षमता  of about 15 mL .
Measuring  spoons
In  the us और भाग  of Canada , a tablespoon is the largest type of spoon used for eating from a bowl .
In the UK , Europe and most Commonwealth countries , a tablespoon is a type of  विशाल चमचा  usually used for serving .
In countries where a tablespoon is a serving spoon , the nearest equivalent to the US tablespoon  is either the मिठाई  spoon or the soup spoon .
A tablespoonful , nominally the capacity of one tablespoon ,  is commonly प्रयुक्त as a माप  of volume in cooking .
it is abbreviated  as T , tb , tbs , tbsp , tblsp , or tblspn .
The capacity of ordinary  tablespoons  is not regulated by law and is subject to considerable variation .
In the USA one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is  लगभग 15 ml  ; the capacity of an actual tablespoon ( dining utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL .
In  ऑस्ट्रेलिया  one tablespoon ( measurement unit ) is 20 mL .
Harry Potter is a series of  सात काल्पनिक novels  written by the British author J. K. Rowling .
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard , Harry Potter , and his friends Ronald Weasley  और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर , सब of जिसको  are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry .
The main story arc concerns Harry 's quest to overcome the Dark wizard Lord Voldemort , whose aims are to become immortal  , conquer the wizarding world ,  subjugate non-magical people , and destroy all those who stand in his way , especially Harry Potter .
Since the release of the first novel Harry Potter and the Philosopher  's स्टोन on 30 जून 1997 , the किताबे have  gained immense popularity , critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide .
The series has also had some share of criticism  , सहित चिंता लिये the increasingly  dark tone .
, the book  series has sold about  450 million copies , making it the best-selling book series in history , and has been translated into 67 languages .
The last four books consecutively set  रिकॉर्ड as the fastest-selling  books in history .
A series of many genres , including fantasy and coming of age ( with  तत्व  of mystery , thriller , adventure , and romance ) , it has many cultural meanings and references .
According to  रोलिंग  , the main theme is death .
There are also many other themes in the series , such as prejudice  और भ्रष्टाचार  .
The initial major  प्रकाशक of the किताबे  were Bloomsbury in the United Kingdom and Scholastic Press in the United States .
The books have since been  प्रकाशित by अनेक प्रकाशक  worldwide .
The books , with  the सातवाँ किताब विभाजित  into two parts , have been made into an eight-part film series by Warner Bros. Pictures , the highest-grossing film series of all time .
The series also originated much  tie-in merchandise , बनाना  the Harry Potter brand worth in excess of $ 15 billion .
Also due to the success of the books and films , Harry Potter has been used for a theme park ,  the wizarding संसार of हैरी  Potter in Universal Parks & Resorts 's Islands of Adventure .
RS-68 being tested at NASA 's Stennis  स्पेस बीच  .
The nearly transparent exhaust is due to this engine  's  exhaust being mostly superheated steam ( water vapor from its propellants , hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking 5C  प्रक्षेपास्त्र  engine
A rocket engine ,  or बस `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '' , is a जेट इंजन कि उपयोग तभी भंडारित propellant द्रव्यमान लिये forming इसके ऊँची गति propulsive जेट .
प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन हैं प्रतिक्रिया इंजन और obtain thrust in accordance साथ न्यूटन 's तीसरा  law .
Since they need no external material to form their jet , rocket  इंजन can be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft नोदन  as well as terrestrial uses , such as missiles .
Most rocket  इंजन हैं आतंरिक  combustion engines , although non-combusting forms also exist .
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities , are by far  the lightest  , but are the least propellant efficient of all types of jet engines .
`` ... Baby One More Time  '' is a सोंग by  American recording artist Britney Spears .
It served as Spears 's debut single and title track from her debut studio album ,  ... baby  One More Time ( 1999 ) .
Written by Max  मार्टिन और उत्पादित by मार्टिन और  Rami , `` ... Baby One More Time '' was released on September 30 , 1998 , by Jive Records .
After recording and sending a demo tape with an unused song from Toni Braxton , Spears signed a  multi-album सौदे साथ  Jive .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and  dance-pop सोंग कि refers to a लड़की  who regrets breaking up with her boyfriend .
The song received generally  अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ  from critics , who praised its composition .
``   ... Baby One More Time '' attained global success , reaching number one in every country it charted .
It also received numerous certifications around the  संसार ,  and is one of the best-selling singles of all time , with over 10 million copies sold .
An accompanying music video , directed by Nigel Dick  , portrays स्पीयर्स  as a student from a Catholic high school , who starts to daydream that she is singing and dancing around the school , while watching her love interest from afar .
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ) , where Spears 's fictional daughter is dressed with a  समान schoolgirl पहनावा जबकि wearing गुलाबी ribbons in  her hair .
In 2010 ,  the म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये `` ... baby एक अधिक समय  '' was voted the third most influential video in the history of pop music , in a poll held by Jam ! .
Spears has performed `` ... Baby One More Time '' in a number of live appearances and in all of her  कॉन्सर्ट टुर  .
It was the encore of the ... Baby One More Time Tour ( 1999 ) and Dream Within a Dream Tour ( 2001 )  ;  Spears also performed remixed versions of the song during the Oops ! ...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ) , The Onyx Hotel Tour ( 2004 ) , The M+M 's Tour ( 2007 ) , The Circus   Starring Britney Spears ( 2009 ) , and the Femme Fatale Tour ( 2011 ) .
`` ... Baby   One More Time '' was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance , and has been included in lists by Blender , Rolling Stone and VH1 .
It has been noted for redefining the sound of late   1990s music .
स्पीयर्स रै नामित ``  ... Baby One More Time '' as one of her favorite songs from her career .
It was also the final song  to be निभाई  on the BBC 's music programme Top of the Pops .
Cholera is an  संक्रमण in the छोटी आंत  caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae .
the  main symptoms are watery diarrhea and vomiting .
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water or eating food that has been contaminated by the feces ( waste product ) of an infected  व्यक्ति , सहित  one with no apparent symptoms .
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to rapid dehydration and electrolyte  असंतुलन , और मौत  in some cases .
The primary treatment is oral rehydration therapy  ,  typically with oral rehydration solution , to replace water and electrolytes .
If this is not tolerated  or करता नहीं  provide improvement fast enough , intravenous fluids can also be used .
जीवाणुरोधी  drugs are beneficial in those with severe disease to shorten its duration and severity .
Worldwide , it  affects 3–5  million people and causes 100,000–130,000 deaths a year .
Cholera was one of the  earliest infections  to be studied by epidemiological methods .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only published novel by Oscar Wilde , appearing as the lead story in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine  on 20 जून 1890 , मुद्रित as the जुलाई 1890  issue of this magazine .
The magazine 's editors feared the  स्टोरी थी अभद्र as सुपुर्द , so  they censored roughly 500 words , without Wilde 's knowledge , before publication .
But even with that , the story was still greeted  साथ आक्रोश by अंग्रेजों reviewers  , some of whom suggested that Wilde should be prosecuted on moral grounds , leading Wilde to defend the novel aggressively in letters to the British press .
Wilde later revised the story for book publication , making substantial alterations , deleting controversial passages ,  adding नई अध्याय और सहित an  aphoristic Preface which has since become famous in its own right .
The amended version was published  by  Ward , Lock and Company in April 1891 .
Some  विद्वानों मानना  that Wilde would today have wanted us to read the version he originally submitted to Lippincott 's .
The novel tells of a young man named Dorian Gray , the subject of a painting by artist Basil  hallward .
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's   beauty and becomes infatuated with him , believing his beauty is responsible for a new mode in his art .
Dorian meets Lord Henry Wotton , a friend of Basil 's , and  becomes enthralled by रब  Henry 's world view .
Espousing a new hedonism ,  रब हेनरी suggests  the only things worth pursuing in life are beauty and fulfilment of the senses .
realizing कि एक दिन उसके सौंदर्य होगा  fade , Dorian ( whimsically ) expresses a desire to sell his soul to ensure the portrait Basil has painted would age rather than he .
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled , and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery , the portrait serves as a reminder of the effect each  act  has upon his soul , with each sin displayed as a disfigurement of his form , or through a sign of aging .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is considered  a कार्य of  classic Gothic fiction with a strong Faustian theme .
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February  1917 ) , ज्ञात as ज़ा ज़ा गैबर (  ) , is a Hungarian -born American actress who acted in supporting roles in movies , on Broadway , and occasionally on television .
गैबर  was also a socialite .
She began her stage career in Vienna at age 15 , and was crowned Miss  हंगेरियाई  in 1936 .
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after actress with  `` यूरोपीय फ्लेयर  and style '' , with a personality that `` exuded charm and grace '' .
Her first movie role was as supporting actress  in प्यारे  to Look At .
She later acted in We 're  नहीं  Married !
and played one of her few leading roles in Moulin Rouge (  1952 ) , निर्देशित by जॉन हस्टन  , who described her as a `` creditable '' actress .
Besides her film and television appearances , she is best known for having  नौ पतियों  , including hotel magnate Conrad Hilton and actor George Sanders .
She once stated , `` Men have always liked me and  i have  always liked men .
But I like a mannish man , a  man जो knows  how to talk to and treat a woman – not just a man with muscles . ''
Bruce Lee ( traditional : 李小龍 ; born Lee Jun-fan ; 27 November 1940 – 20 July 1973 ) was a Chinese American martial artist , actor , martial arts  प्रशिक्षक , पारस , और  filmmaker .
The founder of Jeet Kune Do , Lee was the son of  cantonese ओपेरा स्टार ली  Hoi-Chuen .
He is widely considered by  टीकाकारों ,  critics , media and other martial artists to be one of the most influential martial artists of all time , and a pop culture icon of the 20th century .
He is often credited  साथ helping to बदलें  the way Asians were presented in American films .
Lee was born in Chinatown , San Francisco on 27 November 1940 to parents from Hong Kong and was raised in Kowloon  साथ उसके परिवार  until his late teens .
He was introduced  to the फिल्मी उद्योग  by his father and appeared in several films as a child actor .
Lee moved to the United States at the age of 18  to प्राप्त उसके उच्चतर शिक्षा , और it थी  during this time that he began teaching martial arts .
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the traditional Hong Kong martial arts  फिल्मी to a नई स्तर of लोकप्रियता और acclaim ,  sparking a surge of interest in Chinese martial arts in the West in the 1970s .
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced martial arts and martial arts films in Hong Kong and the  rest of  the world .
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ;  रास्ता of the ड्रैगन ( 1972 ) , निर्देशित और लिखा by ली  ; Warner Brothers ' Enter the Dragon ( 1973 ) and The Game of Death ( 1978 ) , both directed by Robert Clouse .
Lee became an iconic figure known throughout the world , particularly among the Chinese , as he portrayed Chinese  राष्ट्रवाद  in his films .
He initially trained in Wing Chun , but later rejected well-defined  martial आर्ट शैलियाँ , favouring बजाय the  use of techniques from various sources , in the spirit of his personal martial arts philosophy , which he dubbed Jeet Kune Do ( The Way of the Intercepting Fist ) .
Lee held dual citizenship of Hong  काँग और the संयुक्त  States .
He died in Kowloon Tong on 20 July  1973 at  age 32 .
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD )  , भी ज्ञात as दीर्घकालिक obstructive फेफड़ों बीमारी ( ठंडा ) , दीर्घकालिक obstructive  airway disease ( COAD ) , chronic airflow limitation ( CAL ) and chronic obstructive respiratory disease ( CORD ) , is the occurrence of chronic bronchitis or emphysema , a pair of commonly co-existing diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time .
This limits airflow to and from the lungs , causing  shortness of साँस (  dyspnea ) .
In clinical practice , COPD is defined by its  characteristically कम airflow  on lung function tests .
In contrast to asthma , this limitation is poorly reversible and  प्रायः gets progressively  worse over time .
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas , most commonly from tobacco smoking , which triggers an  असामान्य  inflammatory response in the lung .
the निदान  of COPD requires lung function tests .
Important management  रणनीति हैं  smoking cessation , vaccinations , rehabilitation , and drug therapy ( often using inhalers ) .
Some patients go on to require long-term oxygen  चिकित्सा or फेफड़ों  transplantation .
Worldwide , COPD ranked as the sixth leading  कारण of मौत  in 1990 .
It is  प्रक्षिप्त to become the चौथी अग्रणी  cause of death worldwide by 2030 , due to an increase in smoking rates and demographic changes in many countries .
copd is the तीसरा  leading cause of death in the U.S. , and the economic burden of COPD in the U.S. in 2007 was $ 42.6 billion in health care costs and lost productivity .
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank ( , ? , ; 12 June 1929early March 1945  ) is एक of the सबसे discussed  Jewish victims of the Holocaust .
उसके  diary has been the basis for several plays and films .
Born  in  the city of Frankfurt am Main in Weimar Germany , she lived most of her life in or near Amsterdam , in the Netherlands .
Born a  जर्मनी  national , Frank lost her citizenship in 1941 .
She gained  अंतरराष्ट्रीय कीर्ति  posthumously after her diary was published .
It documents her experiences hiding  दौरान the  German occupation of the Netherlands in World War II .
The Frank family moved from Germany to Amsterdam in 1933 , the year the Nazis  gained कंट्रोल over जर्मनी  .
By the beginning of 1940 , they were trapped in Amsterdam by the Nazi  occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स  .
As  persecutions of the यहूदी  population increased in July 1942 , the family went into hiding in the hidden rooms of Anne 's father , Otto Frank 's , office building .
After two years , the group was betrayed and  transported to विशेषज्ञता  camps .
Anne Frank and her sister , Margot , were eventually transferred to the Bergen-Belsen concentration  camp ,  where they died of typhus in March 1945 .
Otto Frank , the only  उत्तरजीवी of the परिवार , लौटे to एम्सटर्डम  after the war to find that Anne 's diary had been saved , and his efforts led to its publication in 1947 .
It was translated from its original Dutch and  पहला प्रकाशित in अंग्रेज़ी in  1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl .
It has since been translated into  अनेक  languages .
The diary , which was given to Anne on her 13th birthday ,  क्रॉनिकल्स उसके जीवन इससे 12 जून  1942 until 1 August 1944 .
कर्ट  's signature
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994 ) was an American musician and artist ,  बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the  lead singer , guitarist and primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the  सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी , having  its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the  बैंड मिला भेदन  success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ) .
Following the success of Nevermind , Nirvana  थी  labeled `` the flagship band '' of Generation X , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and frustrated , believing his message and artistic vision to have been misinterpreted by the public , with his personal  मुद्दे  often subject to media attention .
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final  स्टुडियो एल्बम  In Utero ( 1993 ) .
दौरान the  last years of his life , Cobain struggled with heroin addiction , illness and depression .
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image , and the professional and lifelong personal pressures surrounding himself and his wife , musician  कोर्टनी  Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was found dead at his home in Seattle , the victim of what was officially  शासित a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted shotgun घाव to  the head .
The circumstances of his death at age  27 have become a टॉपिक  of public fascination and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana , with Cobain as a songwriter , has sold over 25  लाख एल्बम  in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .
Radial  इंजन  timing and cam mechanism .
Click for full  रेज़ोल्यूशन  animation .
रेडियल इंजन  of a biplane
निपुण लाठी ( कतरा ) , स्लेव और balances इससे a two-row , fourteen-cylinder pratt & व्हिटनी जुड़वा बर्र
The radial engine is a reciprocating  प्रकार आतंरिक दहन  engine configuration in which the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel .
It resembles a stylized star when viewed from the front , and is called a `` star engine  '' ( जर्मनी sternmotor  ) in some languages .
The radial configuration was very commonly used in aircraft engines before turbine engines  became predominant  .
The Golden Girls is an American sitcom , created by Susan Harris , that originally aired on NBC from September 13 , 1985 , to May  9 , 1992 .
Starring  bea आर्थर , बेट्टी श्वेत  , Rue McClanahan and Estelle Getty , the show centers on four older women sharing a home in Miami , Florida .
It was produced by Witt/Thomas/Harris Productions , in association with Touchstone Television , and  पॉल junger witt , टोनी थामस  , and Harris served as the original executive producers .
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and won  अनेक पुरस्कार  , including the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series twice .
It also won three Golden Globe Awards for  बेहतरीन टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  – Musical or Comedy .
All four stars each received an Emmy Award  throughout the श्रेणी ' चलाएं और था अनेक nominations  .
The  श्रेणी  also ranked among the top ten highest-rated programs for six out of its seven seasons .
Deepwater drilling is the process of oil and gas  खोजी और उत्पादन  in depths of more than 500 feet .
By this definition , there are approximately  600 deepwater  wells in the Gulf of Mexico .
It has been economically infeasible for many years , but with  उठती आयल कीमतें  , more companies are investing in this area .
Major companies working in this sector include Diamond Offshore  , transocean ,  and Baker Hughes .
There are basically two kinds of mobile deepwater drilling rigs :  semi-submersible  drilling rigs and drillships .
Drilling can also be performed from a fixed-position installation such as a floating spar ( platform )  or tension-leg मंच  .
Recent industry analysis has estimated that the total expenditure in the global deepwater  अवसंरचना मार्केट होगा पहुँचें $ 145bn  in 2011 .
“Not all oil is accessible on  जमीन  or in shallow water .
You can find some oil deposits buried deep   under the ocean floor.” ... Using sonic equipment , oil companies determine the drilling sites most likely to produce oil .
Then they  उपयोग a मोबाईल offshore  drilling unit ( MODU ) to dig the initial well .
Some units are converted into production rigs , meaning they switch from  खुदाई  for oil to capturing oil once it 's found .
Most of the time , the oil company will replace the MODU with a more permanent oil production rig to capture  oil.” ... the मोदू 's जॉब  is to drill down into the ocean 's floor to find oil deposits .
The part of the drill that extends below the  डेक  and through the water is called the riser .
The riser allows for drilling fluids to  मूव between the मंजिल और  the rig .
Engineers lower a drill string -- a series of pipes designed to drill down to the oil deposit -- through   the riser.”
“The  विस्तार of deepwater  drilling is happening despite accidents in offshore fields ... ”
In 2010 a large explosion occurred killing 11 workers and spilling millions of gallons of oil  into the गल्फ of मैक्सिको जबकि a bp  oil rig was drilling in deep waters .
“ ... Despite the risks , the deepwater drilling trend is spreading in the Mediterranean and off  the coast of  East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of such  खुदाई  , analyst say , is continuing high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face the high risks that come with deepwater drilling in order for Americans to  continue to carry on उनके रोज जीवनदान  .
“The  उर्जा विभाग recently  projected that gulf oil production would expand from its 2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day , still nearly a quarter of total domestic production , to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
deepwater खुदाई affects the पर्यावरण  in both negative and positive ways .
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil spills it  is स्टिल a  hazardous possible outcome .
Oil spills result in oil sinking to the bottom of the ocean smothering plant  जीवन leaving मछली बगैर  food and shelter to survive .
On the  अन्य हाथ deepwater खुदाई प्रभाव the पर्यावरण in a धनात्मक तरीके too .
In time once the deepwater oil well is not in use anymore plants will grow on and  around the  well making a cave or cavern like shelter ideal for animals to thrive in .
Deepwater drilling also lets  us देखिए the गहराइयों of  the ocean floor that are hardly ever seen .
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record footage and take photos of  विरल मछली कि हैं  in there natural habitat , giving scientist a look at animals they rarely seen” ( Chevron Corporation ) . ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an  अमरीकी स्त्री साथ जिसको  United States President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its repercussions ( which included Clinton 's impeachment ) became known  as the lewinsky कांड  .
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra , , ( December 12 , 1915 – May 14 , 1998 ) was   an American singer and film actor .
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey , Sinatra found unprecedented  कामयाबी as  a solo artist from the early to mid-1940s after being signed to Columbia Records in 1943 .
Being the  आइडल of the  `` bobby soxers `` , he released his first album , The Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946 .
His professional career had stalled by the 1950s , but it was  पुनर्जन्म in 1953 बाद  he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity .
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded  एल्बम ( ऐसे as  In the Wee Small Hours , Songs for Swingin ' Lovers ! , Come Fly with Me , Only the Lonely and Nice 'n ' Easy ) .
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label , Reprise Records in 1961 ( finding success with albums such as Ring-a-Ding-Ding ! , Sinatra at the Sands and Francis Albert  सिनात्रा & अंतोनियो कार्लोस jobim  ) , toured internationally , was a founding member of the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen , including John F. Kennedy .
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965 , recorded the retrospective September of My Years , starred in the Emmy -winning television special Frank Sinatra : A Man and His Music , and scored hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and  ``  My Way `` .
With sales of his music dwindling and after appearing in several poorly received films , Sinatra retired for the first time in  1971  .
Two years later , however , he came out of  रिटायरमेंट और in 1973  recorded several albums , scoring a Top 40 hit with `` ( Theme From ) New York , New York `` in 1980 .
Using his Las Vegas shows as a home base , he toured both within the United States and internationally , until a short time before his death in 1998  .
Sinatra also forged a highly successful career as a film  कर्ता  .
After winning Best Supporting Actor in 1953 , he also garnered a nomination for Best Actor for The  man साथ the सुनहरी भुजा , और नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन  in The Manchurian Candidate .
He also starred in such musicals as High Society , Pal Joey ,  यारों  and Dolls and On the Town .
Sinatra was honored at the Kennedy Center Honors in 1983 and was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Ronald  reagan in 1985 और the congressional  Gold Medal in 1997 .
He was the recipient of eleven Grammy Awards , including the Grammy Trustees Award , Grammy Legend Award and  the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि  Award .
Sinatra is also one of world’s best-selling artists of all time , having sold more than 150  लाख  copies worldwide .
ठेठ  cornhole board
cornhole , भी ज्ञात as सेम थैला टॉस  , corn toss , baggo or bags , is a lawn game in which players take turns throwing corn hole bags at a raised platform with a hole in the far end .
A bag in  the छेद  scores 3 points , while one on the platform scores 1 point .
Play  continues जबतक a टोली  or player reaches the score of 21 .
The American Gold  त्रिभुज is  an official gold bullion coin of the United States .
Authorized under the  सुनहरा bullion  Coin Act of 1985 , it was first released by the United States Mint in 1986 .
Bikram Yoga is a system of yoga that Bikram Choudhury synthesized from traditional hatha yoga techniques and popularized beginning  in  the early 1970s .
All Bikram Yoga classes  चलाएं लिये 90 मिनट्स  and consist of the same series of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises .
Bikram Yoga  is ideally practiced  in a room heated to 105°F ( ≈ 40.6°C ) with a humidity of 40 % , .

A teaspoon is an item of cutlery  and/or a measuring  instrument , as well as a unit of measurement of volume in some countries and customs .
A fern is any one or more of a  समूह of परिचय 12,000  species of plants belonging to the botanical group known as Pteridophyta .
नापसंद mosses , वे  have xylem and phloem ( making them vascular plants ) .
They have stems , leaves , and  जड़ें जैसे  other vascular plants .
Ferns reproduce via spores and  have  neither seeds nor flowers .
By far the largest group of ferns is the  leptosporangiate ferns , लकिन ferns  as defined here ( also called monilophytes ) include horsetails , whisk ferns , marattioid ferns , and ophioglossoid ferns .
The  पद pteridophyte  also refers to ferns and a few other seedless vascular plants ( see classification section below ) .
Ferns first appear in the fossil record 360 million years ago in the Carboniferous but many of the current families and species did not  appear जबतक roughly 145 लाख सालो पहले in the जल्दी cretaceous ( बाद  flowering plants came to dominate many environments ) .
Ferns are not of major economic importance , but some are  grown or gathered लिये खाना , as शोभायमान  plants , for remediating contaminated soils , and have been the subject of research for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air .
Some are significant  weeds  .
They  भी  play a role in mythology , medicine , and art .
चपटा roofs  in Israel
Flat roof in Los  एंजिल्स
A flat   roof is a type of covering for a building .
In contrast to the more sloped form of roof , a flat roof is  आड़ा or nearly आड़ा  .
The slope of a roof is properly known as its pitch : Roofs which are nearly flat are known as low-pitch roofs ( as the angle  of ढलान increases , so the पिच  is said to increase ) .
Any sheet of material used to cover a flat or  low-pitched छत is प्रायः ज्ञात as a झिल्ली और the प्राथमिक  purpose of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area .
Materials that cover flat roofs typically allow the water to run off from a slight inclination or   camber into a gutter system .
Water from some flat roofs such as on garden sheds  sometimes बहती freely  off the edge of a roof , though gutter systems are of advantage in keeping both walls and foundations dry .
Gutters on smaller roofs often lead water  सीधे onto the  ground , or better , into a specially made soakaway .
Gutters on larger roofs usually lead water into the  rainwater  drainage system of any built up area .
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to collect  जल in a पूल , प्रायः  for aesthetic purposes , or for rainwater buffering .
Flat roofs exist all over the world and each  क्षेत्रफल रै इसके अपना परंपरा  or preference for materials used .
In warmer climes  जहाँ वर्षा  is less and freezing is unlikely to occur , many flat roofs are simply built of masonry or concrete and this is good at keeping out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to build where timber is not readily available .
In areas where the roof could become saturated by rain and leak , or where water soaked into the brickwork  could फ्रीज to बर्फ और यूँ सीसे to 'blowing  ' ( breaking up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the expansion of ice as it forms ) these roofs are not suitable .
Traditionally most  चपटा roofs in  the western world make use of tar or more usually tar paper applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight .
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to  keep  the sun 's heat , UV rays and weather off it and helps protect it from cracking or blistering and degradation .
Roof decking is usually of  प्लाईवुड ,  chipboard or OSB boards ( OSB = Oriented Strand Board , also known as Sterling board ) of around 18mm thickness .
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats as a hot liquid , heated in a tar kettle , or as  चादरें of तारकोल impregnated 'paper ' चिपके bas और  sealed together at joints by hot tar - once it has cooled , the gravel is spread evenly over it .
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is ignorance or lack of maintenance  जहाँ लोगों or कार्यक्रम कारण the  gravel to be moved or removed from the tar or tarpaper waterproofing , thus exposing it to weather and sun whereupon cracking and blistering occurs over time and eventually water gets in .
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or fibre material  soaked or  impregnated in tar .
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise vertically from the roof such as on parapet walls or upstands , tarpaper variants are produced with fine gravel applied to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a  स्थाई  layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection .
Tarpapers   vary in quality as does the workmanship and training of those applying it to produce more or less successful results .
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic '  tarpaper  roofs can last well in relation to the cost of materials purchase and cost of laying them , however the cost of modern membranes such as EPDM has come down over recent years to make them more and more affordable .
There are now more firms supplying modern alternatives and there is  generally  a growing awareness of their performance and availability .
If a leak does occur on a flat roof then damage often goes unnoticed for long periods of time during which water penetrates and soaks the  अलंकार और कोई  insulation and/or structure beneath it .
This can lead to expensive  क्षति इससे the दुर्गन्ध  which often develops and if left can weaken the roof structure .
There  हैं भी  various health risks to people and animals breathing the mould spores : the severity of this health risk remains a debated point .
One problem with maintaining flat roofs is that if water does penetrate the barrier covering ( be it traditional or a modern  झिल्ली  ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen .
Thus it is not easy to see  जहाँ it is टपकती  in order to repair it .
Once underlying roof decking is soaked it often sags  causing a further  collection or puddling of water in that area and the problem worsens .
A CD-ROM ( ) is a  pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क  which contains data .
The name is an   acronym which stands for `` Compact Disc Read-only memory `` .
Computers can read CD-ROMs ,  लकिन can  not write on them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software , including video games and multimedia applications , though  any data can  be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced CDs , hold both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being played on a CD player , while data ( such as software or digital video )  is तभी usable on a कंप्यूटर ( ऐसे as आईएसओ 9660 स्वरूप  PC CD-ROMs ) .
The  पीला किताब  is the technical standard that defines the format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the technical specifications for  सब cd स्वरुप , the पीला किताब , निर्मित  by Sony and Philips , was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It adapted the format to hold any form  of आंकड़ा .
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ) , ( born 31 July 1965 ) , pen name J. K. Rowling , is a British novelist ,  बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the  author of the Harry Potter fantasy series .
The Potter books have gained worldwide attention , won multiple awards , and sold more than 400  लाख  copies .
They have become the best-selling book series  in इतिहास , और महरूम the आधार लिये  a series of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history .
Rowling had  overall स्वीकृति on the स्क्रिप्ट  as well as maintaining creative control by serving as a producer on the final instalment .
Born in Yate , Gloucestershire , Rowling was working as a researcher and bilingual secretary for Amnesty  अंतरराष्ट्रीय जब वो conceived the विचार  for the Harry Potter series on a delayed train from Manchester to London in 1990 .
The seven-year period that followed entailed the death of her mother , divorce from her first husband and poverty until Rowling finished the first novel   in the series , Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ) .
Rowling subsequently published 6 sequels—the last , Harry Potter and the  deathly  Hallows ( 2007 ) —as well as 3 supplements to the series .
In 2012 , Rowling parted with her agency and resumed writing in the  रूप  of a tragicomedy novel aimed at adult readership , entitled The Casual Vacancy .
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for adults , the other for children younger than the Harry Potter  दर्शक , और वो expects the latter to be प्रकाशित  first .
Rowling has led a `` rags to  अमीरी `` जीवन स्टोरी  , in which she progressed from living on state benefits to multi-millionaire status within five years .
She  is the संयुक्त  Kingdom 's best-selling author since records began , with sales in excess of £238m .
The 2008 Sunday Times Rich List estimated Rowling 's fortune at £560  लाख ( $ 798 लाख ) ,  ranking her as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom .
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007 , and TIME magazine named her as a runner-up for its 2007  व्यक्ति of the साल , noting the सोशल , moral , और  political inspiration she has given her fans .
In October 2010 , Rowling was named the `` Most Influential Woman in  ब्रिटेन  '' by leading magazine editors .
She has become a notable philanthropist , supporting such charities as Comic  राहत  , One Parent Families , Multiple Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and Lumos ( formerly the Children 's High Level Group ) .
Auburndale is a city in Polk County ,  फ्लोरिडा ,  United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी  11,032 at the 2000 census .
According to the U.S Census estimates of 2005  , the नगर  had a population of 12,381 .
It is part of the Lakeland – Winter Haven Metropolitan Statistical   Area .
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from orbit during  expedition  7 of the International Space Station .
The eye , eyewall , and surrounding rainbands ,  विशेषताएँ of तीव्र cyclones  , are clearly visible in this view from space .
A tropical  चक्रवात is a तूफ़ान प्रणाली  characterized by a low-pressure center surrounded by a spiral arrangement of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain .
Tropical cyclones strengthen when water evaporated from the ocean is  released as the संतृप्त एयर उदय , resulting  in condensation of water vapor contained in the moist air .
They are fueled by a  अलग  heat mechanism than other cyclonic windstorms such as nor'easters , European windstorms , and polar lows .
The characteristic that separates tropical cyclones from other cyclonic systems is that at any height in the atmosphere , the center of a  तीव्र चक्रवात होगा be warmer than इसके परिवेश  ; a phenomenon called `` warm core `` storm systems .
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of these systems , which usually form in tropical regions of the globe , and to their formation   in maritime tropical air masses .
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such storms ' cyclonic nature , with counterclockwise wind flow in the Northern Hemisphere and  clockwise हवा प्रवाह in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध  .
The  विपरीत  direction of the wind flow is a result of the Coriolis force .
Depending on its location and strength , a tropical cyclone is referred to by names such as hurricane ( , ) , typhoon ( ) , tropical storm  , cyclonic तूफ़ान , तीव्र  depression , and simply cyclone .
While tropical cyclones can produce extremely powerful winds and torrential rain , they  हैं भी समर्थ to उपज ऊँची लहरें  , damaging storm surge , and tornadoes .
They develop over large bodies  of गरम जल , और खोना उनके शक्ति  if they move over land due to increased surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source .
This is why coastal regions can receive significant damage from a tropical cyclone , while  अंतर्देशीय regions हैं अपेक्षाकृत सुरक्षित इससे receiving दमदार हवाएँ  .
Heavy rains , however , can produce significant flooding inland , and storm surges can produce  extensive तटीय बाढ़ up to इससे the  coastline .
Although their effects on human populations can be devastating  , तीव्र cyclones  can relieve drought conditions .
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward temperate latitudes , which makes them an  महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the वैश्विक  atmospheric circulation mechanism .
As a result , tropical cyclones help to maintain  संतुलन  in the Earth 's troposphere , and to maintain a relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide .
Many tropical cyclones develop when the atmospheric conditions around a  कमजोर disturbance in the माहौल हैं अनुकूल  .
the पृष्ठभूमि पर्यावरण is modulated by climatological  cycles and patterns such as the Madden-Julian oscillation , El Niño-Southern Oscillation , and the Atlantic multidecadal oscillation .
Others form  जब अन्य प्रकार  of cyclones acquire tropical characteristics .
Tropical systems are then moved by steering winds in the troposphere  ; if the शर्तें  remain favorable , the tropical disturbance intensifies , and can even develop an eye .
On the other end of the spectrum , if the conditions around the system deteriorate or the  तीव्र चक्रवात makes landfall , the प्रणाली weakens और  eventually dissipates .
It is not possible to artificially induce the  dissipation of ये प्रणालियों  with current technology .
Kirk Douglas ( born Issur Danielovitch , ; December 9 , 1916 ) is an  अमरीकी स्टेज और फिल्मी  actor , film producer and author .
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947 ) , Champion ( 1949 ) , Ace in the Hole ( 1951 ) , The Bad and the Beautiful ( 1952 ) , 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea ( 1954 ) , Lust for Life ( 1956 ) , Paths of Glory ( 1957 ) , Gunfight at the O.K . Corral ( 1957 ) , The Vikings ( 1958 ) , Spartacus ( 1960 ) , Lonely Are the Brave ( 1962 ) , Seven Days in May ( 1964 ) , The  नायक of telemark ( 1965 ) और  Tough Guys ( 1986 ) .
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the greatest male American screen legends of all  समय , बनाना उसे the highest-ranked  living person on the list .
In 1996 , he received the Academy Honorary Award  `` लिये 50 सालो as a  creative and moral force in the motion picture community . ''
He is one of the last surviving actors from Hollywood 's `` golden age  ''  .
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born May 6 , 1945  ) is an अमरीकी  rock and roll singer-songwriter , guitarist and pianist .
As a locally successful Detroit-area artist , he performed and recorded as Bob Seger and the Last  सुना और bob seger प्रणाली  throughout the 1960s .
By  the  early 1970s , he had dropped the `` System '' from his recordings and continued to strive for broader success with other various bands .
In 1973 , he put together The Silver Bullet Band , a group of Detroit-area musicians , with whom he became most successful on the national level with the album Live Bullet ,  अंकित सजीव  with the Silver Bullet Band in 1975 at Cobo Hall in Detroit , Michigan .
In 1976 , he achieved a  नेशनल ब्रेकआउट  with the studio album Night Moves .
On his studio albums , he also  worked extensively साथ  the Alabama-based Muscle Shoals Rhythm Section , which appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums .
A roots rocker with a classic raspy ,  चिल्लाना  voice , Seger wrote and recorded songs that dealt with love , women , blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock .
Seger  रै अंकित अनेक हिट्स , सहित `` रात्रि  Moves , '' `` Turn the Page , '' `` We 've Got Tonight , '' `` Against the Wind , '' and Shakedown that was written for Beverly Hills Cop II and `` Like a Rock , '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight . ''
His iconic recording of  `` बूढ़ा समय चट्टान  and Roll `` was named one of the Songs of the Century in 2001 .
With a career spanning five decades , Seger continues to perform and record  आज  .
Seger was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame  in  2004 and the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012 .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was the 37th President of the   United States , serving from 1969 to 1974 , when he became the only president to resign the office .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and  सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया  and as the 36th Vice President of the United States from 1953 to 1961 .
Nixon was born in  yorba  Linda , California .
He graduated from Whittier  कॉलेज in 1934 और ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों  School of Law in 1937 , returning to California to practice law .
He and his wife , Pat Nixon , moved to Washington to work for  the संघीय सरकारी  in 1942 .
He subsequently served in the United States Navy  दौरान संसार युद्ध  II .
Nixon was elected in California to the House of  प्रतिनिधि  in 1946 and to the Senate in 1950 .
His pursuit of the Alger  hiss मामला स्थापित  his reputation as a leading anti-communist , and elevated him to national prominence .
He was the running mate  of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर  , the Republican Party presidential nominee in the 1952 election .
Nixon served for eight years as vice  अध्यक्ष  .
He waged an unsuccessful presidential  अभियान in 1960 , narrowly  losing to John F. Kennedy , and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he  भागा again लिये the  presidency and was elected .
Although Nixon  initially escalated  America 's involvement in the Vietnam War , he subsequently ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit to the People 's  गणतंत्र of चीन in  1972 opened diplomatic relations between the two nations , and he initiated détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his administration generally embraced policies that  transferred शक्ति  from Washington to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives to fight cancer and illegal drugs , imposed wage and price controls , enforced desegregation of some Southern schools , and established the  पर्यावरणीय सुरक्षा एजेंसी  .
हालांकि he presided over the चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो 11 , he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस खोजी  .
He was  re-elected by a भूस्खलन  in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo  , the इस्तीफा  of his vice president , Spiro Agnew , and a continuing series of revelations about the Watergate scandal and other misconduct by members of the administration .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much of his political support , and on  अगस्त 9 , 1974 , he resigned  in the face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office .
After his resignation , he controversially  प्राप्त a pardon  issued by his successor , Gerald Ford .
In retirement , Nixon 's work as an elder statesman , authoring several books and undertaking many foreign trips , helped  to rehabilitate उसके पब्लिक  image .
He suffered a debilitating stroke on  अप्रैल 18 , 1994  , and died four days later at the age of 81 .
{ {  infobox  Senator
The Dominican  गणतंत्र annexation सन्धि caused कड़वा  contention between President Grant and Sen. Sumner .
Brady  1869  ] ]
Sen. Sumner , opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would lead to the conquest of the neighboring black republic of Haiti , became convinced that corruption lay behind the treaty , and that men close to the president shared in  the भ्रष्टाचार  .
As  अध्यक्ष of the सीनेट विदेशी  Relations Committee , Sen. Sumner initially withheld his opinion on the treaty on January 18 , 1870 .
Sen. Sumner had been leaked information from Assistant Secretary of State , Bancroft Davis , that U.S .  नवल जहाजों यहूद होने प्रयुक्त  to protect President Báez .
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s suggestion and quite possibly to save the party from an ugly fight or the president from embarrassment , the Senate held its debate of the treaty behind closed  द्वार in कार्यपालिका सत्र  .
President Grant persisted and sent messages to  कॉंग्रेस in एहसान of annexation  on March 14 , 1870 , and May 31 , 1870 .
In closed session , Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there would be difficulty with the foreign nationals , noting the chronic rebellion that took place on the island , and the risk that the independence of  हैती , पहचाना by the संयुक्त राज्य in 1862  , would be lost .
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the  u.S. नेवी as a  protectorate was a violation of International law and unconstitutional .
Finally , on June 30 , 1870 the treaty was voted on  by the सीनेट और विफल to  gain the required 2/3 majority for treaty passage .
the following दिन  , President Grant , feeling betrayed by Sen. Sumner , retaliated by ordering the dismissal of Sumner’s close friend J. Lothrop Motley , Ambassador to Britain .
By autumn , Sumner 's personal hostility to  the  president was public knowledge , and he blamed the Secretary of State for failing to have resigned , rather than let Grant have his way .
The two men , friends  जबतक तब ,  cooled into bitter enemies .
In December , 1870 , still fearful that  ग्रान्ट meant to acquire सेंटो डोमिंगो  somehow , Sumner gave a fiercely critical speech accusing the president of usurpation and Babcock of unethical conduct .
Already , President Grant , supported by his Secretary of State Hamilton Fish , had  initiated a अभियान to depose sumner  from the chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee .
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '' , in addition to having stopped Grant 's Dominican  गणतंत्र सन्धि attempt , sumner था पराजित ग्रान्ट 's पूरा repeal of  the Tenure of Office Act , blocked Grant 's nomination of Alexander Stewart to U.S. Secretary of Treasury , and been a constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go .
Grant resented  sumner 's बड़प्पन  of manner , as well .
Told once that Sumner did not believe in the Bible  , the अध्यक्ष is supposed  to have said that he was not surprised : `` he did n't write it . ''
As the rift between Grant and Sumner increased ,  sumner’s स्वास्थ्य  began to decline .
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4 , 1871 , Senators affiliated with President Grant , known as  ‘’new radicals’’  voted to oust Sen. Sumner from the Senate Foreign Relations Committee chairmanship .
Business ethics ( also corporate ethics ) is a form of applied ethics or professional ethics that examines ethical principles and  moral or नैतिक  problems that arise in a business environment .
It applies to all  पहलुओं of कारोबार  conduct and is relevant to the conduct of individuals and entire organizations .
Business ethics has both normative and  वर्णनात्मक  dimensions .
As a corporate  अभ्यास और  a career specialization , the field is primarily normative .
Academics attempting to understand business  बर्ताव employ वर्णनात्मक  methods .
The range and quantity of business ethical issues reflects the  बातचीत  of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns .
Interest in business ethics accelerated dramatically during the 1980s and 1990s , both within major  corporations और भीतर academia  .
For  उदाहरण , आज सबसे प्रमुख  corporations promote their commitment to non-economic values under headings such as ethics codes and social responsibility charters .
आदम स्मिथ कहा , `` लोगों  of the same trade seldom meet together , even for merriment and diversion , but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public , or in some contrivance to raise prices . ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business behavior in  कया वे perceive  to be beneficial directions .
Ethics implicitly regulates areas and details of behavior that lie beyond governmental  कंट्रोल  .
The emergence of large corporations  साथ सीमित  relationships and sensitivity to the communities in which they operate accelerated the development of formal ethics regimes .
A burn is a type of injury to flesh or skin caused by heat , electricity , chemicals , friction , or  विकिरण  .
Most burns affect only the superficial skin ( known as superficial or  पहला उपाधि ) or  extend into the deeper skin but do not involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ) .
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper tissues , such as muscle or bone can be injured in which case  the बर्न is either पूरा  thickness ( third degree ) or fourth degree .
The  उपचार  required depends on the severity of the burn .
Superficial burns maybe managed with little more than simple pain killers while major burns may require prolonged  उपचार in  specialized burn centers .
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if exposure is  prolonged  it may result in low body temperature .
आंशिक मोटाई  burns may require cleaning with soap and water followed by dressings .
Blisters should typically  be बाएँ अखंड  .
Full thickness burns usually require  सर्जिकल उपचार ऐसे  as skin grafting and extensive burns often require large amount of intravenous fluids .
The most common complications of  burns  are related to infection .
While large burns can be fatal , modern treatments developed in the last 50 years have significantly improved the outcomes ,  विशेषकर in children  and young adults .
Globally about 11 million people seek medical treatment and 300,000 people  die  from burns .
In the  संयुक्त राज्य , of those  admitted to a burn center , approximately 4 % die from their injuries .
The long term outcome is primarily related to the size of burn and  the आयु of the व्यक्ति effected  .
The  अटलांटिक  Ocean , not including Arctic and Antarctic regions
This video was taken by  the  crew of Expedition 29 on board the ISS .
The pass  starts इससे बस north-east of the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  over the North Atlantic Ocean to central Africa , over South Sudan .
The Atlantic Ocean is the second-largest of the  संसार 's oceanic विभाजन  .
With a total area of about , it covers approximately 20 percent  of the धरती 's सतह  and about 29 percent of its water surface area .
The first part of its name refers to Atlas of Greek mythology , making  the अटलांटिक the ``  Sea of Atlas '' .
The oldest known  जिक्र of ``  Atlantic '' is in The Histories of Herodotus around 450 BC ( Hdt . 1.202.4 ) : Atlantis thalassa ( Greek : Ἀτλαντὶς θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ) .
The term Ethiopic Ocean , derived from Ethiopia , was  लागू to  the southern Atlantic as late as the mid-19th century .
Before Europeans discovered other oceans , the term `` ocean '' itself was synonymous with the waters beyond the Strait of  जिब्राल्टर कि we अभी जान  as the Atlantic .
The early Greeks believed this ocean to be  a gigantic नदी encircling the  world .
The Atlantic Ocean occupies  an elongated  , S-shaped basin extending longitudinally between Eurasia and Africa to the east , and the Americas to the west .
As one component of the interconnected global ocean , it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes considered a sea of  the अटलांटिक ) , to the  Pacific Ocean in the southwest , the Indian Ocean in the southeast , and the Southern Ocean in the south .
(  अन्य  definitions describe the Atlantic as extending southward to Antarctica . )
The equator subdivides it into  the उत्तर अटलांटिक  Ocean and South Atlantic Ocean .
Due to their long-term persistence , and the need for a unique identifier in issuing forecasts and warnings , tropical  cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones हैं दिए names according to  policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ) .
The following are lists from which these  तीव्र  and subtropical cyclone names are derived .
श्वेत लाइट is dispersed  by a prism into the colors of the optical spectrum .
The visible spectrum is the portion  of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम  that is visible to ( can be detected by ) the human eye .
Electromagnetic radiation in this range of wavelengths is called visible  लाइट or  simply light .
A typical human eye will respond to wavelengths from about  390 to 700  nm .
In  शर्तें  of frequency , this corresponds to a band in the vicinity of 430–790 THz .
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ) , in  the ग्रीन प्रदेश of the ऑप्टिकल वर्णक्रम  ( see : luminosity function ) .
The spectrum does not , however , contain all the colors that the  इंसान आँखें  and brain can distinguish .
Unsaturated colors such as pink , or purple variations  such  as magenta , are absent , for example , because they can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths .
Colors containing only one wavelength are also  पुकारा pure  colors .
Visible wavelengths pass through  the `` ऑप्टिकल खिड़की `` , the प्रदेश  of the electromagnetic spectrum which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere .
an उदाहरण of इस घटना is कि साफ  air scatters blue light more than red wavelengths , and so the midday sky appears blue .
The  ऑप्टिकल खिड़की  is also called the visible window because it overlaps the human visible response spectrum .
The  निकट इन्फ्रारेड ( nir ) खिड़की झूठ बस आउट of the इंसान  vision , as well as the Medium Wavelength IR ( MWIR ) window and the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them .
Many species can  देखिए लाइट साथ बारंबारता  outside the `` visible spectrum , '' which is defined in terms of human vision .
Bees and many  अन्य कीट  can detect ultraviolet light , which helps them find nectar in flowers .
Plant species that depend on insect pollination may owe reproductive success to  उनके रूप in  ultraviolet light , rather than how colorful they appear to humans .
Birds , too , can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ) , and some have  sex-dependent markings on उनके  plumage that are visible only in the ultraviolet range .
Many animals that can see into the ultraviolet range ,  however , can नहीं देखिए रेड लाइट  or any other reddish wavelengths .
Bees ' visible spectrum ends at about 590nm , just before   the orange wavelengths start .
Birds , however , can see some red wavelengths , but  नहीं  as many as humans .
Zebras ( or ) are several species of African equids ( horse family ) united by their distinctive black   and white stripes .
Their stripes come in different patterns , unique to  प्रत्येक  individual .
They are generally social animals that live in small  harems to  large herds .
Unlike their closest relatives , horses and asses , zebras have never been  truly domesticated  .
There are  तीन प्रजाति  of zebras : the plains zebra , the Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra .
The plains  जेब्रा और the पहाड़ जेब्रा  belong to the subgenus Hippotigris , but Grévy 's zebra is the sole species of subgenus Dolichohippus .
The latter resembles an ass , to which it is  closely सम्बन्धित  , while the former two are more horse-like .
All three belong to the genus Equus , along with other  जीना equids  .
The  अद्वितीय धारियाँ of zebras मेक  them one of the animals most familiar to people .
They occur in a variety of habitats , such as grasslands  , savannas , वुडलैंड्स ,  thorny scrublands , mountains , and coastal hills .
however ,  various anthropogenic factors have had a severe impact on zebra populations , in particular hunting for skins and habitat destruction .
Grévy 's zebra and the mountain zebra are  endangered  .
While plains zebras are much more plentiful ,  एक subspecies , the quagga , became विलुप्त in the  late 19th century – though there is currently a plan , called the Quagga Project , that aims to breed zebras that are phenotypically similar to the quagga in a process called breeding back .
Barry  श्वेत  , born Barry Eugene Carter ( – ) , was an American composer and singer-songwriter .
A two-time  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winner ज्ञात लिये उसके distinctive बास आवाज़ और रोमांटिक चित्र , श्वेत 's महानतम कामयाबी आए in the 1970s as a सोलो सिंगर और साथ the प्रेम असीमित ऑर्केस्ट्रा , crafting अनेक enduring आत्मा , दुर्गंध , और डिस्को गीतों ऐसे as उसके दो biggest हिट्स , `` तुम 're the पहला , the पिछला , my सबकुछ `` और `` ca n't मिलेंगी पर्याप्त of अपना प्रेम , बेब . ''
Along with Isaac Hayes ,  श्वेत is  considered by Allmusic.com as a pioneer of disco music in the early 1970s .
During the  कोर्स of उसके करियर in the म्यूज़िक कारोबार  , White achieved 106 gold albums worldwide , 41 of which also attained platinum status .
White had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles , with worldwide sales in excess of 100 million , according to  आलोचकों ed होगन और वेड  Kergan .
His influences included  Rev  . James Cleveland , Ray Charles , Aretha Franklin plus Motown artists The Supremes , The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye .
Angelina Jolie  ( , born एंजेलीना  Jolie Voight ; June 4 , 1975 ) is an American actress , film director , and screenwriter .
She has received an Academy Award , two Screen Actors Guild Awards , and three Golden Globe Awards , and was named  हॉलीवुड  's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011 .
Jolie promotes  humanitarian कल्याणकारी , और  is noted for her work with refugees as a Special Envoy and former Goodwill Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ) .
वो रै प्रायः महरूम cited as the संसार 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत '' स्त्री , a शीर्षक लिये जिससे वो रै प्राप्त substantial  media attention .
Jolie  बना उसके स्क्रीन डेब्यू  as a child alongside her father Jon Voight in Lookin ' to Get Out ( 1982 ) , but her film career began in earnest a decade later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ) .
Her first  अग्रणी  role in a major film was in the cyber-thriller Hackers ( 1995 ) .
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films George Wallace (  1997 ) और gia ( 1998 ) , और जीती an अकादमी  Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl , Interrupted ( 1999 ) .
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft : Tomb Raider ( 2001 ) , and established herself among the  highest-paid  actresses in Hollywood with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ) .
She continued her action star career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith ( 2005 ) and Wanted ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated commercial successes to date—and received further critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ) , which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award  for Best  Actress .
जोली बना उसके  directorial debut with the wartime drama In the Land of Blood and Honey ( 2011 ) .
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee  मिलर और बिली  Bob Thornton , Jolie now lives with actor Brad Pitt , in a relationship notable for fervent media attention .
जोली और pitt have  three biological children and three adopted children .
A natural arch produced by the  अपरदन of differentially  weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz , Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and rock are removed from the Earth 's surface by exogenetic processes such as wind or  जल प्रवाह , और तब transported और  deposited in other locations .
जबकि अपरदन is a प्राकृतिक  process , human activities have increased by 10-40 times the rate at which erosion is occurring globally .
Excessive erosion causes problems such as desertification , decreases in agricultural productivity due to  जमीन degradation  , sedimentation of waterways , and ecological collapse due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers .
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation  ; combined , they  are responsible for 84 % of degraded acreage , making excessive erosion one of the most significant global environmental problems .
Industrial agriculture ,  वनों , सड़कें , anthropogenic जलवायु  change and urban sprawl are amongst the most significant human activities in regard to their effect on stimulating erosion .
However , there are many available alternative land use practices that can curtail or limit erosion , such as terrace  -building , no-till  agriculture , and revegetation of denuded soils .
Jersey Shore is an American reality television series which ran on MTV  इससे दिसम्बर 3 , 2009 to दिसम्बर 20 , 2012  in the United States .
The series follows  the जीवनदान of आठ  housemates spending their summer at the Jersey Shore in the U.S. state of New Jersey .
Season 2 followed the cast escaping the cold northeast winter to Miami Beach , with Season 3 returning to the  जर्सी shore  .
The fourth season ,  फिल्माया  in Italy , premiered on August 4 , 2011 .
The show returned for a fifth  ऋतु , at  Seaside Heights on January 5 , 2012 .
The fifth season finale aired on  कूच  15 , 2012 .
On March 19 , 2012  , एमटीवी पुष्टि  that the series would return for their sixth season .
on अगस्त 30  , 2012 , MTV announced that the series will end after the sixth season , which premiered on October 4 .
The series finale aired  on दिसम्बर  20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy regarding the use of the words ``  guido  / Guidette , '' portrayals of Italian-American stereotypes , and scrutiny from locals because the cast members were not residents of the area .
The series garnered  रिकार्ड दरजा लिये एमटीवी , बनाना  it the network 's most viewed series telecast ever .
The series '  डाल  have also been credited with introducing unique lexicon and phrases into American popular culture .
The University of Chicago and the  विश्वविद्यालयों of ओक्लाहोमा हैं among the शैक्षणिक  institutions that have had classes or conferences about the show .
In 2010 , the cast of Jersey  shore थी नामित on बारबरा  Walters ' 10 Most Fascinating People list , and the series has since been exported to dozens of countries worldwide .
There are several remakes of the show in other  देशों , साथ  two set in the United Kingdom ; the well known Geordie Shore , set in Newcastle upon Tyne , England .
The other is The   Valleys , the Welsh equivalent , which is filmed and set in Cardiff .
The only other official remake of  the दिखाएँ is  Gandía Shore , set in Gandía , Spain .
