United States territory is any extent of region under the jurisdiction of the federal government of the United States , including all waters ( around islands or  महाद्वीपीय  tracts ) and all U.S . Naval vessels .
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the sovereign rights for exploring ,  exploiting , conserving  , and managing its territory .
This extent of territory is all the area belonging to , and under the dominion of  , the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी ( जिससे  includes tracts lying at a distance from the country ) for administrative and other purposes .
The  संयुक्त राज्य  total territory includes a subset of political divisions .
The U.S. government is a government  साथ  delegated powers under the United States Constitution .
`` The powers not delegated to the United  राज्य by the  Constitution , nor prohibited by it to the States , are reserved to the States respectively , or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment .
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly abbreviated as T3 ) is a 2003 science  fiction कार्रवाई फिल्मी  directed by Jonathan Mostow and starring Arnold Schwarzenegger , Nick Stahl , Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken .
It is the second sequel to The  टर्मिनेटर  ( 1984 ) .
After Skynet fails to kill Sarah Connor before her son is born and to kill John himself as a child , it sends back another Terminator , the T-X , in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance  अधिकारियों as संभावित  .
This includes John 's  भविष्य बीवी , लकिन  not John himself as his whereabouts are unknown to Skynet .
John 's life is placed  in  danger when the T-X accidentally finds him .
A cord  of  wood
The cord is a unit of measure of dry volume used in Canada and the United   States to measure firewood and pulpwood .
A cord is the amount of wood that , when `` ranked and  खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े हैं  aligned , parallel , touching and compact ) , occupies a volume of .
This corresponds to a well  stacked woodpile ऊँची , long  , and deep ; or any other arrangement of linear measurements that yields the same volume .
The name cord probably comes from the use of a  cord or स्ट्रिंग  to measure it .
The , is an 8-bit handheld video game device developed  और manufactured  by Nintendo .
It was released in  जापानी on , in  North America in , and in Europe on .
It is the first handheld console in  the खेल लड़के लकीर , और  was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1 —the same staff who had designed the Game & Watch series as well as several popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
Redesigned versions were released in 1996 and 1998 , in the  रूप of खेल लड़के  Pocket , and Game Boy Light ( Japan only ) , respectively .
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the Game & Watch series introduced in , and it combined features  इससे दोनो the निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली  and Game & Watch .
It was  originally  bundled with the puzzle game Tetris .
As part of the fourth generation of gaming , the Game  लड़के competed साथ the sega  Game Gear , Atari Lynx , and the TurboExpress .
Despite these other technologically superior  हैंडहेल्ड  consoles , the Game Boy was a tremendous success .
The Game Boy and its successor ,  the खेल लड़के रंग  , have both combined sold 118.69 million units worldwide .
Upon its release in the United States , it sold its entire shipment of one million units   within weeks .
The World Trade Center is a complex of buildings under construction in Lower Manhattan , New York City , United States , replacing an earlier  जटिल of सात  buildings with the same name on the same site .
The original World Trade Center featured landmark twin towers , which opened on April 4 , 1973 and were  नष्ट in the सितंबर 11 हमले  of 2001 , along with 7 World Trade Center .
The other  buildings  in the complex were damaged in the attacks , and their ruins were eventually demolished .
The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers  और a मेमोरियल to  those killed in the attacks .
, only one skyscraper has been completed ; the other four are expected  to be समाप्त पहले  2020 .
One  संसार व्यापार बीच होगा be the  lead building for the new complex , reaching more than 100 stories at its completion .
It became the tallest building in New York City on April 30 , 2012 , and is expected to be  समाप्त by  2013 .
A  छठे  tower is awaiting confirmation .
At the time of their completion , the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2 World Trade Center ( the South Tower ) , known collectively  as the `` जुड़वा  Towers '' , were the tallest buildings in the world .
The other buildings included 3 WTC ( the  मैरियट संसार व्यापार  Center ) , 4 WTC , 5 WTC , 6 WTC , and 7 WTC .
All of these  इमारतें  were built between 1975 and 1985 .
The cost for the construction was   $ 400 million ( $ in dollars ) .
The complex was located in the heart of New  यॉर्क नगर 's शहर  financial district and contained 13.4 million square feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space .
The  संसार व्यापार बीच  experienced a fire on , 1975 , a bombing on , 1993 and a robbery on , 1998 .
In 1998 , the Port Authority decided to privatize the World Trade Center , leasing  the इमारतें to a निजी  company to manage , and awarded the lease to Silverstein Properties in .
On the morning of September 11 , 2001  , Al-Qaeda  -affiliated hijackers flew two Boeing 767 jets into the complex , one into each tower , in a coordinated terrorist attack .
After burning for 56 minutes , the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed , followed a half-hour later by the North Tower (  1 ) , with the attacks on  the World Trade Center resulting in 2,753 deaths .
Falling debris from the towers , combined  साथ फ़ायर कि the मलबा initiated in अनेक surrounding इमारतें , led to the आंशिक or पूरा पतन  of all the other buildings in the complex and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area .
The process of cleanup and recovery at  the संसार  Trade Center site took eight months .
Over the  following सालो  , plans for a rebuilt World Trade Center took form .
The first  new  building at the site was 7 World Trade Center , which opened in .
The Lower Manhattan Development Corporation ( LMDC ) , established in to oversee the rebuilding process ,  व्यवस्थित  competitions to select a site plan and memorial design .
Memory Foundations , designed by Daniel Libeskind , was selected as the master  योजना , लकिन इस गई through substantial  changes in design .
The new  संसार  Trade Center complex will include One World Trade Center , three other high-rise office towers , and the National September 11 Memorial & Museum .
San  जिबरील  Mountains
San Bernardino Mountains , with Mt . San Gorgonio  in the अग्रभूमि  and Big Bear Lake in the background .
The  अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ हैं a  group of mountain ranges of southern California , in the Pacific Coast Ranges physiographic region in North America .
The  अनुप्रस्थ सीमाएँ शुरू  at the southern end of the California Coast Ranges and lie between Santa Barbara and San Diego counties .
They derive the name  अनुप्रस्थ  Ranges due to their East-West orientation , making them transverse to the general North-South orientation of most of California 's coastal mountains .
Periodic table with electron  शेल
An electron shell may be thought of as an orbit followed by  electrons around an  atom 's nucleus .
The closest shell to the nucleus is called the `` 1 shell '' ( also called `` K shell '' ) , followed by the `` 2 shell '' ( or `` L shell '' ) , then the `` 3 shell '' ( or `` M shell '' )  , और so on दूर और  farther from the nucleus .
The shell letters  k , l , m , ...  , used in the X-ray notation , are alphabetical .
Each shell can contain  तभी a फिक्स्ड क्रमांक of electrons  : The 1st shell can hold up to two electrons , the 2nd shell can hold up to eight electrons , the 3rd shell can hold up to 18 , and 4th shell can hold up to 32 and so on .
Since electrons are electrically  आकर्षित to the केंद्रक ,  an atom 's electrons will generally occupy outer shells only if the more inner shells have already been completely filled by other electrons .
However , this is not a strict requirement : Atoms may have  दो or  even three incomplete outer shells .
( See Madelung rule for more  विवरण .  )
For an explanation  of क्यों electrons मौजूद in  these shells see electron configuration .
The electrons in  the outermost occupied शेल  ( or shells ) determine the chemical properties of the atom ; it is called the valence shell .
Each shell consists of one or  अधिक subshells , और  each subshell consists of one or more atomic orbitals .
Vickie Lynn Marshall ( née Hogan ;  नवम्बर 28 ,  1967 – February 8 , 2007 ) , known by her moniker Anna Nicole Smith , was an American model , actress , and television personality .
Smith first gained popularity in Playboy , becoming the  1993 संगिनी of  the Year .
She modeled for clothing companies , including Guess jeans  और  Lane Bryant .
Smith  dropped आउट  of high school and was married in 1985 .
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business  mogul , J. हावर्ड मार्शल , 62 सालो उसके  senior , resulted in speculation that she married the octogenarian for his money , which she denied .
Following Marshall 's  मौत , स्मिथ  began a lengthy legal battle over a share of his estate .
उसके मामला , मार्शल v. मार्शल , पहुँचे the u.S. परम् अदालत on a सवाल of संघीय क्षेत्राधिकार , और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन अदालत प्राधिकार ( अभी पुकारा stern v. मार्शल ) .
स्मिथ died on फ़रवरी 8 , 2007 in  a Hollywood , Florida hotel room as a result of an overdose of prescription drugs .
Within the final six months of her life , Smith was the focus of a renewed press coverage surrounding the death of her son , Daniel , and the paternity  और कस्टडी  battle over her newborn daughter , Dannielynn .
The is  एक denomination  of Japanese yen .
The current design was first minted   in 1959 using Japanese characters known as the `` new script `` , and were also minted from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters .
Five-yen coins date to 1870 ( when , due  to the  much higher value of the yen , they were minted in gold ) .
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing out of the water , with `` five yen '' written in kanji ; the back is  stamped साथ `` जापानी '' और the साल of समस्या , भी in कांजी , अलग by sprouts  of a tree .
The three graphic elements  of  the coin represent agriculture and fisheries , the key elements of the Japanese first-sector economy .
Around a hole , there is a gear that  represents उद्योग  .
It is the only Japanese coin in circulation to lack  अरबी numerals  on either face .
TLC is an American girl group whose repertoire spanned R  & b , हिप हॉप , आत्मा  , funk , and new jack swing .
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins , rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes  और सिंगर  Rozonda `` Chilli '' Thomas , the group found unprecedented success in the 1990s while also enduring a series of spats with the law , each other , and the group 's record label .
Initially , TLC achieved  वाणिज्यिक  success following the release of their debut album Ooooooohhh ...
On the TLC Tip , which sold 6 million  नक़ल विश्वव्यापी .
However ,  it थी उनके  second album , CrazySexyCool , that catapulted the group to superstar status .
CrazySexyCool went on to be certified diamond by the RIAA — a first for a female group  , और  eventually sold 23 million copies worldwide .
Five years later , the group released their third album FanMail , which became the group 's first album to debut at number one and sold  अधिक than 11 लाख  copies worldwide .
The subsequent tour following FanMails release became the highest grossing tour of all time by  a मादा  band .
In 2002 , Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes died in a car accident in  होंडुरास  .
Seven months later , T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth album 3D , which sold 2  लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी  , it featured unreleased vocals from Left Eye .
बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका  ranked TLC as one of the greatest musical trios .
Between 1992 and 2003 , the band accumulated ten top ten singles , four number one singles ,  चार multi-platinum एल्बम , और चार  Grammy Awards .
At the end of 1999 , TLC was ranked as  the सातवाँ सबसे कामयाब  act of the 1990s by Billboard .
In 2008 ,  the समूह थी inducted  into the All Time Hot 100 Artist Hall of Fame by the same magazine , at 56th place .
That year it  थी भी सूचीबद्ध  as the # 25 R & B/hip-hop artist of the preceding 25 years .
TLC has sold more than 65 million  रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी और वे हैं क्रमित  as the second best selling female group of all time , and the best selling female R & B group of all time .
In 2012 , TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's 100 Greatest Women in Music , being ranked the number one all girl  समूह  on that list .
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and distributed by  वॉल्ट  Disney Pictures .
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated Classics , it is based on the story Tarzan of the Apes by Edgar Rice Burroughs , and is the only major motion picture  संस्करण of the स्टोरी  Tarzan property to be animated .
Directed by Chris  buck और केविन लीमा साथ a पटकथा by tab  Murphy , Bob Tzudiker , and Noni White , Tarzan features the voices of Tony Goldwyn , Minnie Driver , Glenn Close , and Rosie O'Donnell with Brian Blessed , Lance Henriksen , Wayne Knight , and Nigel Hawthorne .
It was the last bona fide hit  पहले the  Disney slump of the early 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically and $ 448,191,819 worldwide , outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the time of its release , its production budget of $ 130 million made  it the सबसे महंगी  animated film ever made , until topped by Disney 's own $ 140 million Treasure Planet in 2002 .
It was also the first Disney animated feature to  खोलें at # 1 चूंकि  Pocahontas .
This was the last major box office  कामयाबी of the  Disney Renaissance .
Oil Platform P-51 off the  ब्राज़ीलियाई  coast is a semi-submersible platform .
आयल मंच  Mittelplate in the North sea
An oil platform , ( offshore platform or colloquially oil rig ) is a large structure with facilities to drill  कुएं  , to extract and process oil and natural gas , and to temporarily store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing .
in अनेक  cases , the platform contains facilities to house the workforce as well .
Depending  on the  circumstances , the platform may be fixed to the ocean floor , may consist of an artificial island , or may float .
Remote subsea  कुएं  may also be connected to a platform by flow lines and by umbilical connections .
These subsea solutions may consist of one or more subsea wells , or of one or  अधिक manifold केंद्रों लिये अनेक  wells .
Slaughter is the killing of animals ,  प्रायः कि of घरेलू  livestock for food .
The animals most commonly slaughtered for food are cattle , water buffalo ( for beef and veal ) , sheep , goats ( for lamb and mutton ) , pigs ( for pork ) , horses ( for horse meat ) , and fowl , largely  मुर्गियों , turkeys , और बतखों और increasingly मछली इससे the aquaculture उद्योग ( मछली  farming ) .
The White House , the president 's official residence and center of the  प्रशासन
Under the United States Constitution ,  the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  is the head of state and head of government of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal  सरकारी as a पूरे  , the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition .
The president is also the  commander-in-chief  of the United States Armed Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives should the Electoral  कॉलेज  fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ) .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United  राज्य संविधान in 1951 , no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice ,  and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death , resignation , or removal from  दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष  , the Vice President assumes the office .
The President must be at least 35 years of age and a ``  प्राकृतिक born '' नागरिक  of the United States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as  अध्यक्ष following the अनुसमर्थन of  the United States Constitution , which took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For  अमरीकी  leaders before this ratification , see President of the Continental Congress .
The  सूची करता नहीं शामिल कोई  Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as Grover Cleveland served two non-consecutive terms and is counted  क्रमबद्धता as दोनो the 22nd  and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four were  assassinated (  Abraham Lincoln , James A. Garfield , William McKinley , and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first president , was inaugurated in  1789 बाद  a unanimous vote of the Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time  in  office with 32 days in 1841 , and Franklin D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two  शर्तें , और a संवैधानिक amendment  , affecting presidents after Harry Truman , was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president ,  थी the पहला to be  elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the first elected after  महिलाओं gained  voting rights in 1920 .
History records four  राष्ट्रपतियों – जॉन q  Adams , Rutherford B. Hayes , Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush – who lost the popular vote but assumed office .
जॉन  F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman Catholic faith , and the current president , Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent .
Several firearms with detachable suppressors , from top to bottom : An Uzi , An AR-15 , A Heckler & Koch USP  रणनीतिक , a beretta 92fs , और a  SIG Mosquito .
bolt कार्रवाई  rimfire rifle with suppressor
awm-f स्निपर  rifle with attached suppressor .
A suppressor , sound suppressor , or sound moderator , is a device attached to or part of the barrel of a firearm which reduces the amount of noise , and usually the amount of muzzle  फ्लैश , उत्पन्न  by firing the weapon .
A suppressor can be used both  साथ a firearm  and with compressed air gun .
Though it is sometimes referred to  as a silencer , इस पद is a misnomer popularized by  cinematic fiction : the sound of a projectile , especially one moving faster than the speed of sound , through the air can not be eliminated .
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e . greater than 300 meters ) can lessen , or retard , the report at the moment of impact , and create the impression of silence near  the  target .
The noise heard near the muzzle as a projectile leaves the barrel , though subdued , is not  मूक at  all .
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce the sound of firing by  slowing the escaping propellant  gas and sometimes by reducing the velocity of the bullet .
Early  suppressors यहूद  created around the beginning of the 20th century by several inventors .
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim , Hiram Percy 's father , and the inventor  of the कहावत  Machine Gun ) , is credited with inventing and selling the first commercially successful models circa 1902 ( patented 30 March 1909 ) .
कहावत दिया  his device the trademarked name Maxim Silencer .
The  मफलर लिये आतंरिक दहन इंजन थी  developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by Maxim in the early 20th century , using many of the same techniques to provide quieter-running engines ( in many European countries automobile mufflers are still called silencers ) .
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use , although it has since fallen out of favor with some , especially among the  firearms उद्योग  , being replaced with the more literally accurate term sound suppressor or just suppressor , because a `` sound suppressor '' does not `` silence '' any weapon , rather it eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging .
Common usage and U.S. legislative  भाषा एहसान the  historically earlier term , silencer .
In U.S. law , the terms `` firearm muffler '' and `` firearm silencer '' are  synonymous  .
Suppressors were regularly  प्रयुक्त by  agents of the United States Office of Strategic Services , who favored the newly designed High Standard HDM .22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II .
OSS Director William Joseph `` Wild Bill '' Donovan  demonstrated the पिस्टल लिये अध्यक्ष  Franklin D. Roosevelt at the White House .
According to OSS research chief Stanley Lovell , Donovan ( an old and trusted friend of the President ) was waved into the Oval Office , where Roosevelt   was dictating a letter .
While Roosevelt finished his message , Donovan turned his   back and fired ten shots into a sandbag he had brought with him , announced what he had done and handed the smoking gun to the astonished president .
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive )  welrod  assassination pistol with an integral suppressor was also used by the American OSS on clandestine operations in Nazi occupied Europe during the Second World War .
Beatrice `` Bea '' Arthur ( May 13 ,  1922 – अप्रैल 25 , 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी  actress , comedienne , and singer whose career spanned seven decades .
आर्थर हासिल कीर्ति as  the character Maude Findlay on the 1970s sitcoms All in the Family and Maude , and as Dorothy Zbornak on the 1980s sitcom The Golden Girls , winning Emmy Awards for both roles .
A stage actress both before and after her television success , she won the Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical for her performance  as वीरा चार्ल्स  in the original cast of Mame ( 1966 ) .
is a 2011 Japanese 3D computer-animated film based on the Tekken video game series , produced by Digital Frontier and distributed by Asmik Ace Entertainment  in association with  Bandai Entertainment .
The film  premiered in उत्तर अमेरिका by  Bandai Entertainment on July 26 , 2011 , and in Australia on July 27 , 2011 in a special exclusive one-off screening .
It was released on September 3 , 2011 in  जापानी .
The film was released on Blu-ray Disc on  नवम्बर  22 , 2011 for USA , and December 1 , 2011 for Japan .
This film was also   released on DVD on November 22 , 2011 ( 2D Version only ) .
The  फिल्मी थी additionally शामिल साथ the प्लेस्टेशन  3 game , Tekken Hybrid , and the Nintendo 3DS title , Tekken 3D : Prime Edition .
For a discussion of  nonprofit  , voluntary neighborhood advocacy groups , see neighborhood association .
In the United States , a homeowner association is a corporation formed by a real estate developer for the purpose of marketing , managing , and selling of homes and lots in a  आवासीय subdivision  .
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the association , while allowing the developer to exit financial and legal responsibility of the organization ,  typically by transferring स्वामित्व of the संघ  to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined number of lots .
Membership in the homeowners  संघ by a आवासीय खरीदार is typically a कंडीशन  of purchase ; a buyer is n't given an option to reject it .
Most homeowner associations are incorporated , and are subject to state  statutes  that govern non-profit corporations and homeowner associations .
State oversight of homeowner associations is minimal , and mainly takes the form of laws which are inconsistent from state to state  .
Some states , such as Florida and California , have a large body of   homeowner association law , and some states , such as Massachusetts , have virtually no homeowner association law .
The fastest growing form of housing in the United States today is common-interest developments ( CIDs ) , a category that  शामिल planned-unit developments of single-family  homes , condominiums , and cooperative apartments .
Since 1964 , homeowner associations have become increasingly common   in the USA .
The Community Associations Institute trade association estimated that HOAs governed 24.8 million  अमरीकी घरों और  62 million residents in 2010 .
A prize-winning lilac-and-white  silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig which have been developed since its domestication ca . 5000  bc  .
Breeds vary widely in appearance  और purpose ,  ranging from show breeds with long , flowing hair to those in use as model organisms by science .
From ca . 1200 AD  to  the Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire in 1532 , selective breeding by indigenous South American peoples resulted in many varieties of domestic Guinea pigs , which form the basis for some of the modern domestic breeds .
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock for food , and  प्रयत्न at improving the गिनी सुअर as a खाना  source continue to the modern era .
With the export of Guinea pigs to Europe in the  15th सदी , the  goal in breeding shifted to focus on the development of appealing pets .
To this  समाप्त , विभिन्न  competitive breeding organizations were founded by fanciers .
The American Cavy Breeders Association , an adjunct to the American Rabbit Breeders Association , is the governing body in  the  United States and Canada .
The British Cavy  परिषद governs  cavy clubs in the United Kingdom .
Similar organizations  exist in  Australia ( Australian National Cavy Council ) and New Zealand ( New Zealand Cavy Club ) .
Each club publishes its own Standard of Perfection and determines which breeds are  योग्य लिये प्रर्दशित  .
New breeds continue to  emerge in  the 21st century .
Though there are many breeds of Guinea pig , only a few breeds are commonly  मिला on the दिखाएँ तालिका as  pets .
Most Guinea pigs found as pets were either found undesirable by breeders or were bred to be  सुखद पालतु regardless of कैसा  well they meet the breed standard of perfection .
The short hair , Abyssinian , Peruvian and Sheltie ( aka  silkie ) breeds हैं  those most frequently seen as pets , and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs .
In addition  to  their standard form , nearly all breeds come in a Satin variant .
Satins , due to their hollow hair shafts ,  possess coats  of a special gloss and shine .
However , there is growing evidence that the genes   responsible for the Satin coat also can cause severe bone problems , including Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease .
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by some cavy breeders ' associations because of animal welfare  कारण  .
All  cavy breeds have कुछ साझा  general standards : the head profile should be rounded , with large eyes and large , smooth ears .
The body should be strong and of compact  निर्माण  .
Coat colour should in all  विसंगतियाँ be  clearly defined and thorough from root to tip .
These  मानकों  are best met by long established , commonly bred breeds , as their breeders have had enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities .
The coat colour ideal of good definition and thoroughness is rarely met by other than the smooth coated breeds , which have had well established ,  पृथक प्रजनन लाइनों लिये अलग  colours .
State schools ( also known as public schools or government schools ) generally refer to primary or secondary schools  mandated लिये or offered to  all children without charge paid for , in whole or in part , by taxation .
The  पद may  also refer to institutions of post-secondary education funded , in whole or in part , and overseen by government .
The ribosome assembles polymeric protein molecules whose  अनुक्रम is  controlled by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules .
This  is जरूरी  by all living cells and associated viruses .
the राइबोसोम ( इससे ribonucleic एसिड और the यूनानी सोम , अर्थ `` देह  '' ) is a large and complex molecular machine , found within all living cells , that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ) .
Ribosomes link amino  acids साथ in  the order specified by messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules .
Ribosomes  consist  of two major subunits—the small ribosomal subunit reads the mRNA , while the large subunit joins amino acids to form a polypeptide chain .
Each subunit   is composed of one or more ribosomal RNA ( rRNA ) molecules and a variety of proteins .
The sequence of DNA encoding for a protein may be copied many times into messenger RNA ( mRNA  ) जंजीरों  of a similar sequence .
Ribosomes can bind to an mRNA chain and use it as a  टेम्पलेट लिये  determining the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein .
Amino acids are selected , collected and carried to the ribosome by transfer RNA ( tRNA molecules ) , which  डालें एक  part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain .
The attached amino  acids हैं तब  linked together by another part of the ribosome .
Once the protein is produced , it can then 'fold ' to produce a specific functional  three-dimensional ढांचा  .
A ribosome is made from complexes of RNAs and proteins and is therefore a   ribonucleoprotein .
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller subunit binds to the mRNA pattern  , while the larger  subunit binds to the tRNA and the amino acids .
When a ribosome finishes reading an  mrna अणु ,  these two subunits split apart .
Ribosomes are ribozymes , because the catalytic peptidyl transferase activity that links  अमीनो  acids together is performed by the ribosomal RNA .
Ribosomes from bacteria , archaea and eukaryotes ( the three domains of life on Earth ) differ in their size , sequence , structure ,  और the अनुपात  of protein to RNA .
The differences in structure allow  कुछ  antibiotics to kill bacteria by inhibiting their ribosomes , while leaving human ribosomes unaffected .
In bacteria and archaea , more than one ribosome may move along a single mRNA chain at one time , each `` reading '' its sequence and producing a  सम्बन्धित प्रोटीन अणु  .
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of  eukaryotic कोशिकाएं functionally  resemble many features of those in bacteria , reflecting the likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria .
Albert Claude , Christian de Duve , and George Emil Palade were jointly awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine , in  1974 , लिये the डिस्कवरी of the  ribosomes .
The Nobel Prize in Chemistry 2009 was  awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन  , Thomas A. Steitz and Ada E. Yonath for determining the detailed structure and mechanism of the ribosome .
The  सरलीकृत आतंरिक  structure of a chloroplast
Overview  of the calvin साईकिल  and carbon fixation
the light-independent  reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose .
These reactions occur in the stroma , the  fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक  outside of the thylakoid membranes .
These reactions take  the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ  and perform further chemical processes on them .
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions , collectively called the Calvin cycle  : कार्बन fixation , कटौती  reactions , and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name ,  इस प्रक्रम  occurs only when light is available .
Plants do not  carry आउट the  Calvin cycle by night .
They , instead , release  sucrose into the फ्लोएम इससे  their starch reserves .
This process happens when light is  उपलब्धियाँ स्वतंत्र  of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in their vacuoles every night and release it by day in order to make this process work .
In mathematics , a square number or perfect square is an integer that is the  वर्गाकार of an पूर्णांक ;  in other words , it is the product of some integer with itself .
For example , 9 is a square number , since it  can be लिखा as  .
The usual notation for the formula for the square of  a क्रमांक is नहीं  the product , but the equivalent exponentiation , usually pronounced as `` squared '' .
The name  वर्गाकार क्रमांक  comes from the name of the shape ; see below .
Square numbers are  non-negative  .
Another way of saying that a (  non-negative ) क्रमांक  is a square number , is that its square roots are again integers .
For example , = ±3  , so 9 is  a square number .
A positive integer that  रै no  perfect square divisors except 1 is called square-free .
For a non-negative integer , the th  वर्गाकार क्रमांक is , साथ  being the zeroth square .
The concept of square can be extended to some  अन्य  number systems .
If rational numbers are included , then a square is the ratio of  दो वर्गाकार integers , और , conversely , the अनुपात of दो  square integers is a square ( e.g. , 4/9 = ( 2/3 ) 2 ) .
Starting with 1 , there are square numbers up to and including ,  जहाँ the अभिव्यक्ति represents  the floor of the number .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political history of the United States that reflected a sense of national  purpose और a ख्वाहिश लिये एकता among अमेरिकी  in the aftermath of the Napoleonic Wars .
The era saw the collapse of the Federalist Party and an end to the bitter partisan disputes between it  और the प्रबल  Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System .
President  जेम्स मुनरो endeavored to downplay  partisan affiliation in making his nominations , with the ultimate goal of national unity and eliminating parties altogether from national politics .
The period is so closely associated with Monroe 's presidency ( 1817–1825 ) and his administrative goals  कि उसके नाम  and the era are virtually synonymous .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in American politics with the end of  the federalist पार्टी as अमेरिका began  to develop after the War of 1812 .
While America was experiencing   growth and prosperity after the war with Britain , this era also marks the first instance of economic troubles in the growing United States .
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay , protective tariffs and the  chartering of the दूसरी बैंको  of the United States complicated the tension between the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis .
While the  पद “era of शुभ feelings” is प्रायः viewed साथ  irony because of the political turmoil , economic factors caused animosity between the North and South .
The designation of the period by historians as one of “good feelings” is often conveyed with irony or skepticism , as the history  of the era थी एक  in which the political atmosphere was strained and divisive , especially among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party .
The phrase “Era of Good Feelings” was coined by Benjamin Russell , in the Boston Federalist newspaper , Columbian Centinel , on July 12 , 1817 , following Monroe 's visit to  बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स as भाग of  his good will tour of America .
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' Hamm ( born March 17 , 1972 ) is a retired American professional  सॉकर खिलाड़ी .
Hamm played many years as a forward for the United States women 's national soccer team and was a  founding सदस्य  of the Washington Freedom .
Hamm scored 158 international goals , more than any other player , male or female , in the history of soccer and is the third most capped female player in soccer history behind  kristine लिली और क्रिस्टी rampone , appearing in 275 अंतरराष्ट्रीय  matches .
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World Player of the Year the first two times that award was given ( in  2001 and 2002 ) , and  is listed as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ) .
She was inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame as well as the Alabama Sports Hall of  कीर्ति और टेक्सास खेल हॉल of कीर्ति  .
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's Guide to Winning in Soccer and Life and  appeared in the एचबीओ वृत्तचित्र हिम्मत  to Dream : The Story of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team .
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon called Hamm , `` Perhaps the  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण खिलाड़ी  of the last 15 years . ''
Hamm takes  a  corner kick .
The New York Red Bulls is an American professional soccer team based in  हैरिसन  , New Jersey , representing the New York metropolitan area .
The  टोली competes  in the Eastern Conference of Major League Soccer ( MLS ) .
It is one  of the टेन चार्टर  clubs of MLS , having competed in the league since its inception .
The team was a founding  सदस्य  of MLS ( 1996 ) , but has gone through several name changes .
The team was originally known as the New  york/new जर्सी  MetroStars through 1997 .
From the 1998 season through the 2005 season , the team was known as the  metrostars  .
On March 9 , 2006 , the team was sold to Red Bull GmbH  , अग्रणी to the  team 's current name .
They are the only original MLS franchise not to  have जीती कोई  significant trophy ( including regular season , playoffs , and knockout competition ) since inception .
The team 's best result in the MLS was the  mls  Cup final in 2008 .
In the US Open  कप , the metrostars  reached three semifinals ( 1997 , 1998 , 2000 ) , before reaching their first final in 2003 , losing 1–0 to the Chicago Fire .
On August 26 ,  2000 , the metros ' क्लिंट mathis  set an MLS record by scoring five goals in a game against the Dallas Burn .
Some well-known players that have played for the team include Giovanni Savarese , Tim Howard , Tony Meola , Tab Ramos , Alexi Lalas , Clint Mathis , Jozy Altidore , Michael Bradley , Claudio Reyna , Eddie Pope , Roberto Donadoni , Lothar Matthäus , Adolfo Valencia , Youri Djorkaeff , Amado Guevara , Juan Pablo Ángel , Thierry Henry , Juninho Pernambucano ,  जन गुन्नार solli  , Rafael Márquez , and Tim Cahill .
The team has also had well-known coaches , including  कार्लोस queiroz  , Carlos Alberto Parreira , Bora Milutinović , Bob Bradley , Mo Johnston , Bruce Arena and Hans Backe .
Confucianism , Taoism , and Buddhism are one , a painting in the litang style portraying three men laughing by  a नदी स्ट्रीम ,  12th century , Song Dynasty .
Estimating the number of Buddhists in the world , or in many countries , is difficult due to definitional issues as well as practical problems  of  enumeration .
To begin with , the religious beliefs , practices , and identities of East Asians ( who comprise the  बहुमत of the संसार 's बौद्धों by कोई माप ) प्रायः मिश्रण buddhism साथ अन्य परंपराओं  including Confucianism , the Chinese folk religion , Daoism , Shinto , and Korean shamanism .
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations , or observe a definite  अनुष्ठान of adherence ऐसे as लेने  Refuge , making it difficult to accurately estimate the number of practitioners .
An additional challenge is the  दुश्मनी  of several national governments ( often Communist ones such as China or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically .
Government policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of  धार्मिक adherence , resulting  in official totals that may drastically underestimate the number of religious practitioners in these countries .
Estimate of the  विश्वव्यापी बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी  range from 350 million to over one billion , but cluster nearer to the first figure .
adherents.com  ( as of 2012 ) suggests a figure of 397 million .
By major  शाखाओं  , the numbers are as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana Buddhism , including East Asian Buddhism , with no fewer than 185 million adherents , and possibly several  टाइम्स कि  many ( again , depending on definitional issues ) .
This is the  predominant रूप of buddhism  practiced in China , South Korea , Japan , Taiwan , Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism ,  साथ no कम  than 125 million adherents .
This is the predominant form of Buddhism practiced in Cambodia , Thailand  , Laos , Sri  Lanka , and Burma .
( 3 )  वज्रयान buddhism , साथ  approximately 20 million adherents .
इस रूप predominates  in the greater Tibetan and Mongolian regions , as well as in the Himalayas .
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan , and various  territories भीतर कया is अभी पश्चिमी चीन , वज्रयान is परंपरागत to निश्चित  regions of Russia ( e.g . Kalmykia , Buryatia ) , India ( e.g . Ladakh , Sikkim ) , and Nepal ( e.g . Khumbu ) .
Vajrayana , also known as Tibetan Buddhism , is often conflated with Tantric Buddhism , but this is imprecise , as Shingon and  अन्य फ़ॉर्म of ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism भी  practice tantra .
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka , Thailand , Cambodia , Laos , Burma , Bhutan , and Mongolia )  have unambiguous बौद्ध  majorities .
Depending on how one calculates Chinese and other East  एशियाई adherents , इस फिगर  might expand to include several more countries .
In addition , Buddhism is the  राज्य धर्म of कंबोडिया और भूटान ,  and receives prominent mention in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka .
In  उत्तरी इण्डिया और नेपाल , the जमीन  where Buddhism was born , the religion severely declined during the first millennium .
Whether this decline was due to the Islamic conquest of  उत्तरी इण्डिया , or to  other factors , remains controversial .
देखिए the आलेख  Decline of Buddhism in India .
James Butler Hickok ( May 27   , 1837 – August 2 , 1876 ) , better known as Wild Bill Hickok , was a folk hero of the American Old West .
His skills as a gunfighter and scout , along with his  प्रतिष्ठा as a  lawman , provided the basis for his fame , although some of his reported exploits are fictionalized .
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois , Hickok went west at age  18 as a भगोड़े इससे इंसाफ ,  first working as a stagecoach driver , before he became a lawman in the frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska .
He fought for the Union Army during the American Civil War , and gained publicity after the war as a scout , marksman ,  कर्ता ,  and professional gambler .
Between his law-enforcement duties and gambling , which easily overlapped  ,  Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts .
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the Nuttal & Mann 's  सैलून in deadwood , डकोटा  Territory ( now South Dakota ) .
Artist 's conception of the Curiosity rover  vaporizing चट्टान on मंगल  .
The rover landed on Mars in  अगस्त  2012 .
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which propels itself  आरपार the  surface of the planet Mars after landing .
Rovers have several advantages over stationary landers : they examine more territory , they can be directed to interesting features , they can place themselves in sunny positions  to मौसम शीत महीने और वे can अग्रिम the ज्ञान  of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control .
There   have been four successful robotically operated Mars rovers .
The Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed the Mars  pathfinder मिशन और इसके  now inactive Sojourner rover .
It currently  manages the  Mars Exploration Rover mission 's active Opportunity rover and inactive Spirit , and , as part of the Mars Science Laboratory mission , the Curiosity rover .
A financial audit , or  अधिक accurately  , an audit of financial statements , is the verification of the financial statements of a legal entity , with a view to express an audit opinion .
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance , but not absolute assurance , that the financial statements are presented fairly , in all material respects , and/or give a true and  मेला दृश्य in accordance  with the financial reporting framework .
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent  परिक्षा of the वित्तीय कथन , जिससे increases the मान और विश्वसनीयता  of the financial statements produced by management , thus increase user confidence in the financial statement , reduce investor risk and consequently reduce the cost of capital of the preparer of the financial statements .
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of  practicing लेखपाल जो हैं विशेषज्ञ  in financial reporting .
The financial audit is one of many assurance  कृत्यों provided  by accounting firms .
Many organizations separately employ or hire internal auditors ,  जो do नहीं attest to  financial reports but focus mainly on the internal controls of the organization .
External auditors may choose  to  place limited reliance on the work of internal auditors .
Auditing promotes transparency and accuracy in the financial disclosures made by an organization , therefore would likely to reduce of such  corporations  to conceal unscrupulous dealings .
Internationally , the International Standards on Auditing ( ISA ) issued by the International Auditing and Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the  बेंचमार्क लिये ऑडिट  process .
Almost all jurisdictions require auditors to  follow the isa or a लोकल विभिन्नता  of the ISA .
Dollar coins have been minted in the United States in  gold  , silver , and base metal versions .
The term silver dollar is often used for any large white metal coin issued by the United  राज्य साथ a फेस मान of एक डालर , हालांकि  purists insist that a dollar is not silver unless it contains some of that metal .
Silver dollars , the first dollar coin issue , were minted  शुरूआत in 1794  .
सुनहरा डॉलर और gold-colored  dollars have also been produced by the United States .
The Sacagawea and Presidential  डॉलर हैं प्रायः  referred to as `` golden dollars '' .
In  आधुनिक टाइम्स , डालर सिक्के  have not been very popular in the United States .
Despite efforts by the government to promote their use  , सबसे अमेरिकी  currently use the one dollar bill rather than dollar coins .
In straight and  स्तर उड़ान  lift ( L ) equals weight ( W ) .
In a banked turn of 60° , lift equals double the weight (  l=2w ) .
The pilot experiences 2g and a doubled  वज़न  .
the steeper  the bank , the greater the g-forces .
This top-fuel dragster can accelerate from  शून्य  to in 0.86 seconds .
This  is a आड़ा त्वरण of  5.3 g. Combined with the vertical g-force in the stationary case the Pythagorean theorem yields a g force of 5.4 g .
g-force ( with g from gravitational ) is a term for accelerations felt as weight and measurable by accelerometers   .
It is not a force , per se , but a force per unit mass  .
Since such a force is perceived as a weight , any g-force can be described as  a `` वज़न प्रति ईकाई द्रव्यमान '' (  see the synonym specific weight ) .
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an object 's mass , and ( save for certain   electromagnetic force influences ) is the cause of an object 's acceleration in relation to free-fall .
This acceleration  अनुभवी by an ऑब्जेक्ट is  due to the vector sum of non-gravitational forces acting on an object free to move .
The accelerations that are not produced by gravity  हैं termed  proper accelerations , and it is only these that are measured in g-force units .
They cause  तनावों  and strains on objects .
Because  of  these strains , large g-forces may be destructive .
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force ,  भी हालांकि g-forces हैं  expressed in multiples of the acceleration of a standard gravity .
Thus , the standard gravitational acceleration at the Earth 's surface produces g-force only  indirectly , as a  result of resistance to it by mechanical forces .
The 1 g-force on an object sitting on the Earth 's surface is caused by  mechanical फ़ोर्स exerted in the upward दिशा  by the ground , keeping the object from going into free-fall .
The upward force from the ground ensures that an object at rest on the Earth 's surface is accelerating relative to the free-fall condition ,  जिससे is the पाथ कि the ऑब्जेक्ट होता follow  when falling freely toward the Earth 's center .
Objects  अनुमत to  free-fall in an inertial trajectory under the influence of gravitation-only , feel no g-force .
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling  लिफ्ट  falling toward the Earth 's center ( in vacuum ) , or ( to good approximation ) conditions inside a spacecraft in Earth orbit .
These are  उदाहरण of निर्देशांक त्वरण (  a change in velocity ) without a sensation of weight .
The  अनुभव of no g-force  ( zero-g ) , however it is produced , is synonymous with weightlessness .
In the absence of gravitational fields , or in directions at right angles to them ,  उचित  and coordinate accelerations are the same , and any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration .
An example  यहाँ is a प्रक्षेपास्त्र in फ़्री स्पेस  , in which simple changes in velocity are produced by the engines , and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers .
An augur holding a  lituus , the curved  wand often used as a symbol of augury on Roman coins
The augur was a priest and official in  the शास्त्रीय संसार  , especially ancient Rome and Etruria .
His main role was to interpret the will of the gods by studying the flight of birds : whether they are flying in groups or alone , what noises they make as they fly ,  दिशा of उड़ान  and what kind of birds they are .
This was known as `` taking the  auspices .  ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was  सेंट्रल to कोई  major undertaking in Roman society—public or private—including matters of war , commerce , and religion .
The Roman historian Livy stresses  the महत्व  of the augurs : `` Who does not know that this city was founded only after taking the auspices , that everything in war and in peace , at home and abroad , was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
farmington पहाड़ियाँ is  an affluent community in southeastern Michigan .
It is the second  largest  city in Oakland County in the U.S. state of Michigan .
Its population was 79,740 at   the 2010 census .
It is part  of the upscale  northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan Detroit and is also northeast of downtown Ann Arbor .
Farmington Hills consistently ranks as one of the safest cities in the United States , as well  as in the  state of Michigan .
In 2010  , the क्षेत्रफल  ranked as the 30th safest city in America .
Although the two cities have separate  सेवाएं  and addresses , Farmington and Farmington Hills are often thought of as the same community .
Features of the community include a recently  संवर शहर  , boutiques , a vintage cinema , numerous restaurants , exotic car dealerships , art galleries , and public parks including Heritage Park .
There are several historical sites including the  longacre हाउस और the राज्यपाल  Warner Mansion .
Both  शहरों हैं  served by Farmington Public Schools .
Farmington Hills serves as a major  कारोबार बीच  for the greater Detroit area .
present-day  impression of a Late Bronze Age seal
Town seal (  मेट्रिक्स  ) of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a device for making an impression in wax , clay , paper , or some other medium , including an embossment on paper , and is also  the छाप यूँ  made .
The original  purpose  was to authenticate a document , a wrapper for one such as a modern envelope , or the cover of a container or package holding valuables or other objects .
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould , with the final image represented on the device for making the impression by a mirror-image  डिज़ाइन , incised in  sunken- ( or counter- ) relief or intaglio .
The seal-making device is also referred to as the seal matrix or die ; the imprint it  creates as the मुहर छाप ( or  , more rarely , the sealing ) .
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the  ऊँची भाग of the मेट्रिक्स टच , the मुहर is ज्ञात as a शुष्क मुहर  ; in all other cases a liquid or liquified medium ( such as ink or wax ) is used , usually in another color than the paper .
For legal purposes , the definition of  a मुहर may be विस्तारित  to include rubber stamps , or writing specified words ( `` seal '' or `` L.S . `` ) .
In the  संयुक्त राज्य , the शब्द `` मुहर '' is sometimes आबंटित  to a facsimile of the seal design ( in monochrome or color ) , which may be used in a variety of contexts including architectural settings , on flags , or on official letterheads .
Thus , for  उदाहरण , the ग्रेट मुहर  of the United States , among other uses , appears on the reverse of the one-dollar bill ; and several of the seals of the U.S. states appear on their respective state flags .
In Europe , although coats of arms and heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as well as on seals , the seal design in its  entirety rarely  appears as an emblem .
The study of seals is known as  sigillography or sphragistics  .
Groundhog Day (  पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी : grundsaudaag  , Murmeltiertag ) is a day celebrated on February 2 .
According to folklore , if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day , then spring will come early ; if it is sunny , the groundhog will supposedly see its shadow and retreat back into   its burrow , and the winter weather will continue for six more weeks .
Modern customs of the holiday involve celebrations where early morning festivals are held to  देखें the groundhog उभरते इससे इसके  burrow .
In southeastern Pennsylvania , Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday with  fersommlinge , सोशल कार्यक्रम in जिससे खाना is परोसा , भाषणों  are made , and one or more g'spiel ( plays or skits ) are performed for entertainment .
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only language spoken at  the इवेंट , और those जो बोलो अंग्रेज़ी अदा a दंड , प्रायः in the  form of a nickel , dime , or quarter per word spoken , with the money put into a bowl in the center of the table .
The largest  groundhog दिन जश्न  is held in Punxsutawney , Pennsylvania .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized and  लोकप्रिय परंपरा , प्राप्त फैली ध्यान as  a result of the 1993 film Groundhog Day , which was set in Punxsutawney , PA ( though filmed primarily in Woodstock , IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil .
High resolution image of Tampa Bay  प्रदेश
The Tampa Bay area has a humid subtropical climate ( Koppen Cfa ) , with warm and humid summers with frequent thunderstorms and drier  सर्दियों साथ जमने temperatures occurring प्रत्येक  2–3 years .
The area experiences a significant summer wet season , as nearly  two-thirds  of the annual precipitation falls in the months of June through September .
The area is listed by the United  राज्य विभाग of कृषि  ( USDA ) as being in hardiness zone 10 , which is about the northern limit of where coconut palms and royal palms can be grown .
Highs usually range between 65 and 95 °F ( 18 and  35 °c ) साल  round .
Though known for hot summers , Tampa 's official high has  never  reached 100 °F ( 38 °C ) – the city 's all-time record temperature is 99 °F ( 37 °C ) .
st. पीटर्सबर्ग  's all-time record high is exactly 100 °F ( 38 °C ) .
Pinellas County lies on  a प्रायद्वीप  between Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico , and much of the city of Tampa lies on a smaller peninsula jutting out into Tampa Bay .
This proximity to  विशाल लाशें of जल  both moderates temperatures and introduces large amounts of humidity into the atmosphere .
In general , the local communities farthest from   the coast have larger temperature ranges , both during a single day and throughout the seasons of the year .
A diagram of  the  electromagnetic spectrum , showing various properties across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is  the range of all possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different  अर्थ , और is बजाय the characteristic  distribution of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low  बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये आधुनिक रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण  at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself ,  जबकि it is  thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length , although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for spectroscopic and other probing interactions ,   as ways to study and characterize matter .
In addition , radiation  इससे विभिन्न भाग of the वर्णक्रम  has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his initials , FDR , was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century ,  अग्रणी the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान a समय of विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक अवसाद और कुल  war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only  अमरीकी अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित  to more than two terms , he built a New Deal Coalition that realigned American politics after 1932 , as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme , FDR defeated  लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट हूवर in  November 1932 , at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over  पोलियो  , FDR 's unfailing optimism and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General Secretary Joseph Stalin in  अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार  War II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first  सौ दिनों in दफ्तर , जिससे began कूच 4 , 1933 , रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और  issued a profusion of executive orders that instituted the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved rapidly from 1933 to 1937 , but then relapsed into a deep  मंदी  .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his packing the Supreme Court  or गुजर कोई considerable विधान  ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World War II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended  परिचय  1975–85 , except for the regulation of Wall Street by the Securities and Exchange Commission , which still exists .
Along with several smaller programs , major surviving programs include the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation  ,  which was created in 1933 , and Social Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of  चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी  , FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His goal was to  मेक अमेरिका the ``  Arsenal of Democracy `` which would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with Congressional  स्वीकृति  , provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7 , 1941 ,  कॉलिंग it a  `` date which will live in infamy `` .
He  पर्यवेक्षित  the mobilization of the U.S. economy to support the Allied war effort .
As an active military leader , Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy on two fronts that ended in the defeat of  the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the संसार 's  first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese  अमरीकी  civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2  % , राहत कार्यक्रम largely ended , और the औद्योगिक  economy grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in war centers , and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the  बारह सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी  , but also for decades afterward .
He  orchestrated the  realignment of voters that created the Fifth Party System .
FDR 's New Deal Coalition united labor unions , big city machines , white ethnics , African Americans  और ग्रामीण श्वेत southerners  .
He also   influenced the later creation of the United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by  विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  , along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A liberal Democrat , Roosevelt  पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक  position as `` a little left of center . ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is used to refer to a committee made up of  सदस्यों of दोनो कक्षों of  a bicameral legislature .
In other  contexts  , it refers to a committee with members from more than one organization .
The regulation  of वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त राज्य is नहीं among the enumerated शक्तियां of  the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution , it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to permit , prohibit , or otherwise regulate commercial sex , except insofar as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states , prostitution is considered a  misdemeanor  in the category of public order crime , a crime that disrupts the order of a community .
It was at one time  माना to be  a vagrancy crime .
फिलहाल , नेवाडा is the तभी राज्य to allow वेश्यालय  prostitution , the terms of which are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes .
तभी 8  counties currently contain active brothels .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area ) , Washoe County ( which contains Reno ) , Carson  नगर , डगलस काउंटी ,  and Lincoln County .
The other counties theoretically allow brothel prostitution , but  कुछ  of these counties currently have no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and living off of  the proceeds of a वेश्या  remain illegal under Nevada law , as elsewhere in the country .
As with other countries , prostitution in the United States can be divided into three broad categories : street  वेश्यावृति , वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति ,  and escort prostitution .
The national flag of the United States of America , often simply referred to as the American flag , consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom ) alternating  with white , with a  blue rectangle in the canton ( referred to specifically as the `` union '' ) bearing fifty small , white , five-pointed stars arranged in nine offset horizontal rows of six stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the thirteen British colonies that declared independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain   and became the first states in the Union .
Nicknames for the flag include the `` Stars and Stripes '' ,  `` बूढ़ा महिमा  `` , and `` The Star-Spangled Banner . ''
India is a federal union of states  comprising twenty-eight  states and seven union territories .
the राज्य और territories  are further subdivided into districts and so on .

Change in apportionment of congressional districts ,  starting in 2013 , as  a result of the 2010 census .

This   is a complete list of congressional districts for representation in the United States House of Representatives .
the मात्रा ( apportionment ) और सीमाएँ ( redistricting ) of जिले हैं संकल्पित बाद प्रत्येक जनसांख्यिकी , हालांकि in कुछ मामले राज्य have बदला the सीमाएँ अधिक than एकबार प्रति जनसांख्यिकी .
This list includes the 435  वर्तमान और over  200 obsolete districts .
For example  , चूंकि the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी , नेब्रास्का  has had three districts , but it used to have as many as six .
In  the  first decade of the twenty-first century , Texas had 32 districts , but has since added four due to reapportionment as a result of the 2010 census .
Other states have lost  जिले चूंकि the  number of congressional seats has been set at 435 by statute .
Also included here are  non-voting delegations : छह  current and four obsolete .
The boundaries of districts   often shift with each redistricting .
Over time , the region and demographics represented in a district can change   substantially .
Furthermore ,  जिले sometimes  retain the same boundaries while changing their district numbers .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an American singer , songwriter , record producer  , अभिनेत्री , और लोकसेवक  .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola , Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on  the u.s . बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट  .
Following  उसके विवाह to mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव  ( 1991 ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) , and Merry Christmas ( 1994 ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music  इतिहास जब इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन `` ,  a duet with Boyz II Men , spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album , Carey  began to deviate  from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became  evident साथ the रिलीज of तितली  ( 1997 ) , at which time Carey had separated from Mottola .
कैरी बाएँ कोलंबिया in 2000 , और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking $ 100 लाख रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ वर्जिन रिकॉर्ड  .
Before the release of her  पहला विशेषता फिल्मी glitter  ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was bought out of her recording contract for $ 50 million ,  जिससे led to a मनाही  in her career .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002 , and after an  unsuccessful काल , लौटे  to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most successful single of the 2000s , and was later  नामित ``  Song of the Decade '' by Billboard .
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the ``  भेदन प्रदर्शन पुरस्कार '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों  International Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career spanning over two decades , Carey has sold more than 200 million records worldwide   , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
In 1998  , वो  was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World Music Awards .
Carey was also named the  best-selling मादा कलाकार  of the millennium in 2000 .
According to the Recording Industry Association of America , she is the third best-selling female artist in the United  राज्य , साथ 63.5 लाख certified  albums .
साथ the रिलीज of `` टच my देह `` ( 2008 ) , कैरी gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य , अधिक than कोई अन्य सोलो कलाकार  .
In 2012 , Carey was  क्रमित दूसरी  on VH1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music '' .
Aside from her commercial accomplishments , Carey has won five Grammy Awards , 17 World Music Awards , 11  अमरीकी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार  , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as the ``  songbird परम् '' by the  Guinness World Records , she is famed for her five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
Stratocumulus  stratiformis  cumulogenitus
In meteorology  , a बादल is a दृश्य  mass of liquid droplets or frozen crystals made of water or various chemicals suspended in the atmosphere above the surface of a planetary body .
These  निलंबित अणु  are also known as aerosols .
बादल in धरती 's माहौल  are studied in the cloud physics branch of meteorology .
Two processes , possibly acting together , can  सीसे to एयर  becoming saturated ; cooling the air or adding water vapor to the air .
In general , precipitation will fall to the  सतह ; an एक्सेप्शन  is virga , which evaporates before reaching the surface .
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact clouds in their most basic forms can show free-convective upward growth like cumulus , appear in non-convective  परतदार चादरें  such as stratus , or take the form of thin fibrous wisps , as in the case of cirrus .
Prefixes are used in connection with clouds to express variations or complexities in these  मौलिक फ़ॉर्म or to बताएँ मध्य  or high altitude ranges .
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers ,  cumulo- लिये जटिल highly-convective तूफ़ान  clouds , nimbo- for thick layered clouds of some complexity that can produce moderate to heavy precipitation , alto- for middle clouds , and cirro- for high clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure .
Whether or not a cloud is  कम ,  middle , or high level depends on how far above the ground its base forms .
Cloud types with significant vertical extent  can  form in the low or middle altitude ranges depending on the moisture content of the air .
Clouds in the troposphere have Latin names due to the popular adaptation of Luke Howard 's cloud categorization system  ,  which began to spread in popularity during December 1802 .
Synoptic surface weather observations use code numbers to record and report the types of tropospheric cloud visible at each scheduled observation time based on the  ऊँचाई और शारीरिक  appearance of the clouds .
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's troposphere , there are occasions  जब बादल  in the stratosphere and mesosphere can be observed .
These three main layers of the atmosphere where clouds may be seen are  collectively  known as the homosphere .
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere , which  साथ मेक up the heterosphere  that marks the transition to outer space .
Clouds have been  observed  on other planets and moons within the Solar System , but , due to their different temperature characteristics , they are composed of other substances such as methane , ammonia , and sulfuric acid .
Galveston County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas within the  houston–sugar land–baytown  metropolitan area .
As of the 2010  census  , the population was 291,309 .
Its county  सीट is  Galveston .
League City is the largest city in Galveston County in terms of population ; URL_http between 2000 and 2005 it  surpassed galveston  as the county 's largest city .
galveston काउंटी  was founded in 1838 .

freeport  , Bahamas
