Tonneau cover ( or ) describes a hard or soft cover  प्रयुक्त to protect  unoccupied passenger seats in a convertible or roadster , or the cargo bed in a pickup truck .
Hard  tonneau कवर खोलें by a hinging  or folding mechanism while soft covers open by rolling up .
The tonneau cover  is प्रयुक्त to  conceal cargo .
When the cover is pulled out , it keeps items out of the sun and provides extra security by keeping personal items   out of sight , as well as shielding the driver from view .
Twitter is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send and  पढ़ा text-based संदेश of up to 140  characters , known as `` tweets '' .
Twitter was  निर्मित in कूच 2006 by जोकर dorsey  and by July , the social networking site was launched .
The service rapidly  gained विश्वव्यापी लोकप्रियता , साथ over 500 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता as of 2012  , generating over 340 million tweets daily and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day .
Since its launch , Twitter has become one of the ten most visited websites on the Internet ,  और रै महरूम वर्णित  as `` the SMS of the Internet . ''
Unregistered  users  can read tweets , while registered users can post tweets through the website interface , SMS , or a range of apps for mobile devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San Francisco , with additional servers and offices in New York City ,  बोस्टन ,  and San Antonio .
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film , co-produced and  निर्देशित by टॉड phillips और लिखा by jon  Lucas and Scott Moore .
It is the first film of The Hangover franchise .The film stars Bradley Cooper , Ed Helms , Zach Galifianakis , Heather Graham ,  जस्टिन bartha  , and Jeffrey Tambor .
The Hangover tells the story of Phil  wenneck , stu दाम और  Alan Garner , who travel to Las Vegas for a bachelor party to celebrate their friend Doug Billings ' impending marriage .
however ,  Phil , Stu and Alan have no memory of the previous night 's events and must find Doug before the wedding can take place .
Lucas and Moore wrote the script after executive  निर्माता क्रिस bender 's dost  disappeared and had a large bill after being sent to a strip club .
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 million , Philips and Jeremy Garelick rewrote the script to include a tiger as well as a subplot involving a baby and  a पुलिस क्रूजर , और भी सहित  boxer Mike Tyson .
Filming took place in  नेवाडा लिये  15 days , and during filming , the three main actors ( Cooper , Helms and Galifianakis ) formed a friendship .
The Hangover was released on June 5 , 2009 , becoming a  नाजुक और  commercial success .
It became the tenth-highest-grossing film   of 2009 , with a worldwide gross of over US $ 467 million .
Critics praised the film 's comedic  दृष्टिकोण लकिन criticized it लिये इसके  vulgarity .
The film won the Golden Globe  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति  Picture – Musical or Comedy , and received multiple other accolades .
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the world , as well as the second highest-grossing R-rated comedy ever in the United  राज्य , surpassing  a record previously held by Beverly Hills Cop for almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012 .
Out of all R-rated films , it is the third  highest-grossing  ever in the U.S. , behind only The Passion of the Christ and The Matrix Reloaded .
A sequel , The Hangover Part  ii , थी  released in 2011 , and a third and final film , The Hangover Part III , is set for release in 2013 .
Events  involving  meiosis , showing chromosomal crossover
Meiosis ( ) is a special type of cell  प्रभाग जरुरी  for sexual reproduction in eukaryotes .
the कोशिकाएं उत्पादित by meiosis  are gametes or spores .
In many organisms , including all animals and land plants ( but not some other groups such as fungi  ) , गैमीट हैं पुकारा शुक्राणु और अंडा कोशिकाएं  .
Whilst the process of  meiosis bears a क्रमांक of  similarities with the 'life-cycle ' cell division process of mitosis , it differs in two important respects:
the   chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which shuffles the genes producing a different genetic combination in each gamete , compared with the co-existence of each of the two separate pairs of each chromosome ( one received from each parent ) in each cell which results from mitosis .
the outcome of meiosis is potentially four ( genetically unique ) haploid cells , compared with the two ( genetically identical ) diploid cells  उत्पादित इससे  mitosis .
Meiosis begins with one diploid cell containing two  नक़ल of प्रत्येक chromosome —one इससे  the organism 's mother and one from its father .
The cell divides twice ,  potentially  producing up to four haploid cells containing one copy of each chromosome .
( `` Potentially '' because in some cases , such as the formation of  oocytes in स्तनधारियों , तभी एक of the संभावित चार  haploid cells survives . )
In animals the haploid cell  resulting  from meiosis is a male or female gamete .
Each of the resulting chromosomes  in the gamete  cells is a unique mixture of maternal and paternal DNA , resulting in offspring that are genetically distinct from either parent .
This gives rise to genetic  विविधता in  sexually reproducing populations .
This genetic diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon which natural selection can act , but , as  वर्णित नीचे  in Section 6 , Origin and function of meiosis , the genetic diversity may be largely a by-product of the homologous recombination that is primarily employed for its DNA repair function during meiosis .
It is also noteworthy that  दौरान meiosis , विशिष्ट जीनों  are more highly transcribed , and these are called the meiome , the term used in functional genomics for the meiotic transcriptome .
Meiosis  is  a key feature for all sexually reproducing eukaryotes in which homologous chromosome pairing , synapse and recombination occur .
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mRNA ( the meiome ) ,  however , वहीँ हैं भी pervasive translational नियंत्रण ( e.g  . selective usage of preformed mRNA ) , regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes during meiosis .
Thus , both the meiome and translational controls determine the broad restructuring of meiotic  कोशिकाएं  needed to carry out meiosis .
Prior to the meiosis process the cell  's गुणसूत्रों हैं duplicated  by a round of DNA replication , creating from the maternal and paternal versions of each chromosome ( homologs ) two exact copies , sister chromatids , attached at the centromere region .
In the beginning of meiosis the maternal  और पैतृक  homologs pair to each other .
Then they typically exchange parts by homologous recombination leading to crossovers of DNA between  the मातृ और  paternal versions of the chromosome .
Spindle fibers bind to  the centromeres of प्रत्येक  pair of homologs and arrange the pairs at the spindle equator .
Then the fibers pull the recombined homologs  to  opposite poles of the cell .
As the chromosomes move away from the center the cell divides into two  बेटी कोशिकाएं , प्रत्येक containing a अगुणित क्रमांक  of chromosomes composed of two chromatids .
After the recombined  मातृ और पैतृक homologs have  separated into the two daughter cells , a second round of cell division occurs .
There meiosis ends as the two sister chromatids making up each homolog are  अलग  and move into one of the four resulting gamete cells .
Upon fertilization , for example when a sperm enters  an अंडा कोशिका  , two gamete cells produced by meiosis fuse .
The gamete from the mother and the  gamete इससे  the father each contribute one half of the set of chromosomes that make up the new offspring 's genome .
Meiosis uses many of the same mechanisms as mitosis , a type of cell division used  by eukaryotes जैसे पौधे और पशु  to split one cell into two identical daughter cells .
In all   plants and in many protists meiosis results in the formation of spores : haploid cells that can divide vegetatively without undergoing fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize fighting , the sweet science or in  यूनानी pygmachia ) is a martial आर्ट  and combat sport in which two people engage in a contest of strength , speed , reflexes , endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands .
Amateur boxing is an Olympic and Commonwealth sport and is a common fixture in most of the  प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय खेल  - it also has its own World Championships .
मुक्केबाज़ी  is supervised by a referee over a series of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds .
The result is decided when an opponent is deemed incapable to continue by a referee , is disqualified for breaking a rule , resigns by throwing in a towel , or is pronounced the winner or loser based on  the न्यायाधीशों  ' scorecards at the end of the contest .
The birth hour of boxing as  a खेल may be इसके  acceptance by the ancient Greeks as an Olympic game as early as 688 BC .
Boxing evolved from 16th- and 18th-century prizefights , largely in Great Britain , to the forerunner of modern boxing in the  mid-19th सदी , again initially  in Great Britain and later in the United States .
In 2004 ,  ईएसपीएन  ranked boxing as the most difficult sport in the world .
Agreement or concord happens  जब a शब्द परिवर्तन रूप  depending on the other words to which it relates .
it is an उदाहरण of inflection , और प्रायः involves बनाना the मान of कुछ व्याकरणिक श्रेणी ( ऐसे as लिंग or व्यक्ति ) `` सहमत '' between अलग शब्द or भाग  of the sentence .
लिये उदाहरण , in मानक  English , one may say I am or he is , but not `` I is '' or `` he am '' .
This is because the grammar of the language requires that the verb and its  विषय  agree in person .
The pronouns I and he are first and third person  क्रमशः , as हैं  the verb forms am and is .
The  क्रिया रूप  must be selected so that it has the same person as the subject .
The agreement based on overt grammatical  श्रेणी as ऊपर  is formal agreement , in contrast to notional agreement , which is based on meaning .
For instance , the phrase The United States is treated as singular for purposes of agreement ,  भी हालांकि it  is formally plural .
This is a  सूची  of places below mean sea level that are on land .
Places in tunnels , mines , basements , dug holes ( also with open sky ) , under water , under ice , or  मौजूदा temporarily as a परिणाम of ebbing  of sea tide etc . are not included .
All figures are in meters  नीचे समुद्र  level:
Debbie Macomber ( born  अक्तूबर 22 , 1948 in yakima , वॉशिंगटन ) is  a best-selling American author of over 150 romance novels and contemporary women 's fiction .
Over 140  लाख नक़ल of  her books are in print throughout the world , and four have become made-for-TV-movies .
Macomber was the inaugural winner of  the fan-voted quill पुरस्कार लिये रोमांस  in 2005 and has been awarded both a Romance Writers of America RITA and a lifetime achievement award by the Romance Writers of America .
Catonsville is a census-designated place ( CDP ) in  बाल्टीमोर काउंटी , मेरीलैंड  , United States .
The population was 41,567 at the  2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
The community lies to the west of Baltimore  साथ  the city 's border .
catonsville  is the home of the University of Maryland , Baltimore County ( UMBC ) , a public research university with over 12,000 students .
A lawyer , according to Black 's Law  शब्दकोष , is `` a व्यक्ति  learned in the law ; as an attorney , counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing law . ''
Law is the system of rules of conduct established by the sovereign government of a  समाज to सही wrongs , maintain the स्थिरता  of political and social authority , and deliver justice .
Working as a lawyer involves the practical application of  अमूर्त विधिक theories और  knowledge to solve specific individualized problems , or to advance the interests of those who retain ( i.e. , hire ) lawyers to perform legal services .
The role of the lawyer varies  significantly  across legal jurisdictions , and so it can be treated here in only the most general terms .
Vector Marketing is the domestic sales arm of Cutco  निगम  , an Olean , New York based cutlery manufacturer .
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA ) is a United States federal law requiring covered employers to provide employees  job-protected  and unpaid leave for qualified medical and family reasons .
Qualified medical and family reasons include : personal or family illness , family military leave , pregnancy , adoption , or the foster care  अवस्थिति  of a child .
The FMLA is administered by  the मजदूरी  and Hour Division of the United States Department of Labor .
The bill was a major part of President Bill Clinton 's agenda in  उसके पहला  term .
President Clinton signed the bill into law on February 5 , 1993 ( ;  29  U.S.C . sec . 2601 ; 29 CFR 825 ) and it took effect on August 5 , 1993 , six months later .
The  fmla थी intended  `` to balance the demands of the workplace with the needs of families . ''
The Act allows eligible employees to take up to 12 work weeks of unpaid leave during any 12-month period to attend to the serious health condition of the employee , parent , spouse or child , or for  गर्भावस्था or परवाह  of a newborn child , or for adoption or foster care of a child .
In order to be eligible for FMLA leave , an employee must have been at the business at least 12 months , and worked at least 1,250 hours  over the पास्ट 12 महीने , और कार्य at a स्थान जहाँ the  company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles .
The FMLA covers both public- and private-sector employees ,  लकिन  certain categories of employees are excluded , including elected officials and their personal staff members .
The Vietnam War ( ) was a Cold War -era  सैन्य  conflict that occurred in Vietnam , Laos , and Cambodia from 1 November 1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975 .
This war followed the First Indochina War and was fought between North Vietnam , supported by its  कम्युनिस्ट allies  , and the government of South Vietnam , supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries .
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National Liberation Front , or NLF ) , a lightly armed South Vietnamese communist  आम सामने निर्देशित  by the North , largely fought a guerrilla war against anti-communist forces in the region .
The Vietnam People 's Army ( North Vietnamese  फौज ) सगाई  in a more conventional war , at times committing large units into battle .
U.S. and South Vietnamese forces relied on air superiority and overwhelming firepower to conduct search and destroy operations , involving ground forces ,  तोपखाने , और airstrikes  .
The U.S. government viewed involvement in the war as a way to prevent a  कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा of दक्षिण वियतनाम as भाग of उनके wider  strategy of containment .
The North  वियतनामी  government and Viet Cong were fighting to reunify Vietnam under communist rule .
They viewed the conflict as a colonial war , fought initially  विरूद्ध फ़्रांस , समर्थित  by the U.S. , and later against South Vietnam , which it regarded as a U.S. puppet state .
American military advisors arrived in what was then French Indochina  शुरूआत in  1950 .
U.S. involvement escalated in the early 1960s , with troop levels   tripling in 1961 and tripling again in 1962 .
U.S. combat units were deployed   beginning in 1965 .
परिचालन spanned अंतरराष्ट्रीय  borders , with Laos and Cambodia heavily bombed .
अमरीकी भागीदारी  in the war peaked in 1968 , at the time of the Tet Offensive .
After  इस , u.S. मैदान शक्तियां  were gradually withdrawn as part of a policy known as Vietnamization .
Despite the Paris Peace Accords ,  हस्ताक्षरित by सब पार्टियों in जनवरी  1973 , fighting continued .
U.S. military involvement ended on 15 August 1973 as a result of the Case–Church Amendment  passed by the u.S. कॉंग्रेस .
The capture of Saigon by the Vietnam People 's  फौज in अप्रैल 1975 चिह्नित  the end of the war , and North and South Vietnam were reunified the following year .
The war exacted a huge human  लागत in शर्तें of fatalities  ( see Vietnam War casualties ) .
Estimates of the  क्रमांक of वियतनामी सैनिको  and civilians killed vary from 800,000 to 3.1 million .
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians , 20,000–200,000 Laotians , and 58,220 U.S.  सेवा सदस्यों भी died in the विरोध  .
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian Islands of Alaska photographed from the International Space  स्टेशन , may 2006  .
Ash plumes reached a  ऊँचाई of 19 km दौरान  the climactic eruption at Mount Pinatubo , Philippines in 1991 .
A  ज्वालामुखी is  an opening , or rupture , in a planet 's surface or crust , which allows hot magma , volcanic ash and gases to escape from the magma chamber below the surface .
Volcanoes are generally found where  tectonic  plates are diverging or converging .
A mid-oceanic ridge , for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge , has examples of volcanoes caused by divergent tectonic plates pulling apart ; the Pacific Ring of Fire has examples of  ज्वालामुखी caused by अभिसारी tectonic प्लेटों coming  together .
By contrast , volcanoes are usually not  निर्मित जहाँ  two tectonic plates slide past one another .
Volcanoes can also form where there is stretching and thinning of the Earth 's crust in the interiors of plates , e.g. ,  in the ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी दरार , the  Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the Rio Grande Rift in North America .
This type of volcanism falls under the  छतरियाँ of `` थाली  hypothesis '' volcanism .
Volcanism away from plate  सीमाएँ रै भी  been explained as mantle plumes .
These so-called `` hotspots `` , for example Hawaii , are postulated to arise from upwelling diapirs  साथ मैग्मा इससे the core–mantle  boundary , 3,000 km deep in the Earth .
Erupting volcanoes can pose many  जोखिमों , नहीं तभी in the  immediate vicinity of the eruption .
Volcanic ash can be a threat to aircraft , in particular those with jet engines where  राख अणु  can be melted by the high operating temperature .
Large eruptions can affect temperature as ash and droplets of sulfuric acid obscure the sun and  कूल the धरती 's निम्नतर माहौल  or troposphere ; however , they also absorb heat radiated up from the Earth , thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically , so-called  volcanic  winters have caused catastrophic famines .
A  गहन pothole  on New York City 's Second Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a kettle  और ज्ञात in भाग of the पश्चिमी  United States as a chuckhole ) is a type of disruption in the surface of a roadway where a portion of the road material has broken away , leaving a hole .
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC , also known as hypernephroma ) is a kidney cancer that originates  in the अस्तर of  the proximal convoluted tubule , the very small tubes in the kidney that transport GF ( glomerular filtrate ) from the glomerulus to the descending limb of the nephron .
RCC is the most common type of kidney cancer in  वयस्कों , जिम्मेदार  for approximately 80 % of cases .
It is also  ज्ञात to be the सबसे lethal  of all the genitourinary tumors .
Initial treatment is most commonly a radical or  आंशिक nephrectomy और  remains the mainstay of curative treatment .
Where the tumor is confined to the  renal parenchyma , the  5-year survival rate is 60-70 % , but this is lowered considerably where metastases have spread .
It is relatively  resistant to विकिरण चिकित्सा  and chemotherapy , although some cases respond to immunotherapy .
Targeted cancer  therapies ऐसे as sunitinib , temsirolimus  , bevacizumab , interferon-alpha , and sorafenib have improved the outlook for RCC .
Estée Lauder Companies , Inc. is  a निर्माता  and marketer of prestige skincare , makeup , fragrance and hair care products .
The company has its headquarters in  midtown  Manhattan , New York City .
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous membrane that forms the lining of the abdominal cavity or the  coelom —it कवर सबसे of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in  amniotes and some invertebrates ( annelids , for instance ) .
It is composed of a layer of mesothelium  समर्थित  by a thin layer of connective tissue .
The peritoneum both  supports the abdominal  organs and serves as a conduit for their blood and lymph vessels and nerves .
The abdominal cavity ( the  स्पेस bounded by the vertebrae , abdominal  muscles , diaphragm and pelvic floor ) should not be confused with the intraperitoneal space ( located within the abdominal cavity , but wrapped in peritoneum ) .
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the stomach ) , the structures in the abdominal cavity that are located behind the intraperitoneal space are called `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g . the kidneys ) , and those structures below  the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal  '' ( e.g . the bladder ) .
Modern 2.5 '' SSD used in consumer laptops and  डेस्कटॉप  computers .
DDR SDRAM  आधारित ssd  .
Max  और  .
PCI attached IO  त्वरक  SSD
PCI-E , DRAM , and  नन्द आधारित  SSD .
It uses an external  शक्ति सप्लाई  to make the DRAM non-volatile .
A solid-state drive ( SSD ) ( also known as a  solid-state डिस्क or  electronic disk , though it contains no actual `` disk '' of any kind ) is a data storage device using integrated circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently .
SSD technology uses electronic interfaces  संगत साथ परंपरागत ब्लाक input/output  ( I/O ) hard disk drives .
SSDs have no moving mechanical components , which distinguish them from traditional electromechanical magnetic disks such as hard disk drives (  hdds ) or फ्लॉपी डिस्क  , which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads .
Compared with electromechanical disks , SSDs  हैं typically  less susceptible to physical shock , much quieter , have lower access time , and less latency .
However , while the price of SSDs has continued to decline in 2012 , SSDs are  स्टिल परिचय 7 to 8 टाइम्स अधिक महंगी प्रति ईकाई of  storage than HDDs .
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces developed for hard disk drives , thus permitting simple replacement in  आम अनुप्रयोग  .
, most SSDs use  nand-based फ्लैश  memory , which retains data without power .
For applications requiring fast access , but not necessarily data  हठ बाद शक्ति घाटा , ssds  may be constructed from random-access memory ( RAM ) .
Such devices may employ separate power sources , such as batteries , to maintain data after power  घाटा  .
Hybrid drives or solid state hybrid drives ( SSHD ) combine the features of SSDs and HDDs in the same  ईकाई , containing  a large hard disk drive and an SSD cache to improve performance of frequently accessed data .
These devices may  प्रस्ताव  near-SSD performance for many applications .
Salmon roe ( left ) and sturgeon caviar ( right ) served with mother of pearl caviar  spoons  to avoid tainting the taste of the caviar .
Ossetra caviar , salmon creme fraiche ,  आलू shallot croquette  , basil oil , egg whites and yolks
Caviar , according to the Food and Agriculture  संगठन , is a उत्पाद  made from salt-cured fish-eggs of the Acipenseridae family .
The roe can be `` fresh '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized , with  pasteurization reducing  its culinary and economic value .
Traditionally the term caviar refers only  to roe इससे  wild sturgeon in the Caspian and Black Seas ( Beluga , Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ) .
Depending on the country , caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other fish such as salmon ,  steelhead , ट्राउट , lumpfish , whitefish  , and other species of sturgeon .
Caviar is considered a luxury delicacy  और is खाया as  a garnish or a spread .
In 2012 , caviar sold for $ 2,500 per pound , or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500  प्रति किलो .
The SEC Network is a television syndication network  featuring सजीव प्रसारण of कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल  and basketball events from the Southeastern Conference .
It is owned and operated by ESPN  प्लस और is दिखाया in अधिक  than 50 percent of households in the United States , mostly Southeastern United States markets .
The SEC Network typically airs in the noon eastern slot that was  पूर्व घर to the raycom खेल  SEC game of the week .
Games are shown locally on broadcast stations  , क्षेत्रीय खेल संजाल , as खूब  as on ESPN GamePlan , ESPN Full Court , and ESPN3.com .
the सेक संजाल is भी उपलब्धियाँ in कनाडा via अटलांटा 's wpch-tv .
The SEC Network uses the  वही on-screen  graphics currently used by ESPN on ABC , a version of ESPN 's graphics package .
SEC Network 's football programming still uses a title safe area because most of its affiliates do not Letterbox their Standard Definition  फ़ीड्स , जबकि ईएसपीएन 's  television networks have allowed their graphics to abandon the title safe , but letterbox for SD viewers .
Starting with the SEC 2012 Basketball season , SEC Network 's graphics have been converted  to  a 16:9 Widescreen-only format .
This is also being used for the 2013 Basketball season , but had still adapted the former 4:3-safe  ग्राफिक्स स्वरूप  for the 2012 SEC football season .
The 1990s , pronounced  और भी  known as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as `` the Nineties '' or `` the '90s '' , was a decade that began on January 1 , 1990 , and ended on December 31 , 1999 .
It  थी the 10th और पिछला  decade of the 20th century and the 100th and last decade of the 2nd millennium .
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold War at the beginning of the decade and the  विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण  of the Internet during the second half of the decade .
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of unprecedented peace and  समृद्धि , हालांकि अनेक भाग of the so-called  Third World faced various problems including genocide , AIDS and new or continuing ethnic tensions and civil wars .
Culturally  बोलना  the decade was characterized by the rise of multiculturalism and alternative media .
Movements such as grunge , the rave scene and hip hop spread around the world to young people during the  दशक , aided  by then-new technology such as cable television and the Internet .
A combination of factors , including the mass mobilization of capital markets through neoliberalism , the beginning of the widespread proliferation of new media such as the Internet , and the dissolution of the  सोवियत संघ led to a realignment और reconsolidation  of economic and political power across the world , and within countries .
Income inequality among  देशों in the संसार रोज़  sharply between the 1980s and the mid-1990s , before levelling off and then falling after 2000 .
New ethnic conflicts emerged in Africa , the Balkans and the   Caucasus , the former two which led to the Rwandan genocide and Bosnian genocide , respectively .
The United States began its current  सैन्य occupation of the  Middle East during the summer of 1990 with Desert Shield after it cut off a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply .
Signs of any resolution of tensions between Israel and the Arab  संसार remained elusive , हालांकि the आयरिश परेशानियों आए to  a standstill in 1998 with the Good Friday Agreement after 30 years of violence .
The gray wolf or grey  भेड़िया ( canis lupus ) is a प्रजाति of canid  native to the wilderness and remote areas of North America , Eurasia , and North Africa .
It is the largest member of  इसके परिवार  , with males averaging , and females .
It is similar in general appearance and proportions to a German shepherd , or sled dog  , लकिन रै a larger सिर  , narrower chest , longer legs , straighter tail and bigger paws .
Its winter fur is long and bushy , and predominantly a mottled gray in  रंग  , although nearly pure white , red , or brown to black also occur .
Within the genus Canis , the gray wolf represents a more specialised and progressive form than its smaller cousins ( the coyote and golden jackal ) , as demonstrated by its  morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार , इसके  more gregarious nature and its highly advanced expressive behavior .
It is a social animal , travelling in nuclear families consisting of a  पन्द्रहवें जोड़ी , accompanied  by the pair 's adult offspring .
The gray wolf is typically an apex  परभक्षी throughout इसके दायरा  , with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it .
It feeds  primarily on विशाल  ungulates , though it also eats smaller animals , livestock , carrion , and garbage .
The gray wolf is one of the world 's most well researched animals , with probably more books written about it than  कोई अन्य  wildlife species .
It has a long history of association with humans , having been despised and hunted in most agricultural communities due to its attacks on livestock ,  जबकि  conversely being respected by some Native American tribes .
It is the sole ancestor of the dog   , which was first domesticated in the Middle East .
Although the fear of  wolves is  prevalent in many human societies , the majority of recorded attacks on people have been attributed to animals suffering from rabies .
Non-rabid wolves have  attacked और मारे लोगों , मुख्यतः  children , but this is unusual , as wolves are relatively few , live away from people , and have been taught to fear humans by hunters and shepherds .
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to , though its still relatively widespread range and stable population means that the species is not threatened at a global level , and is therefore classified by the IUCN as  तनिक चिंता  .
The Roman  साम्राज्य ( ) थी the post- रिपब्लिकन काल of the प्राचीन  Roman civilization , characterised by an autocratic form of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The  500-year-old  Roman Republic , which preceded it , had been destabilized through a series of civil wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by  the Roman  Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two  सदियां of the साम्राज्य यहूद a  period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest  expanse  during the reign of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ) .
In the 3rd century , the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its existence , but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors  aurelian  and Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century , during which time a system of dual rule was developed   in the Latin West and Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century  , the पूर्वी  half continued as what would later be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and lasting influence on the  विकास of भाषा , धर्म , वास्तुकला , दर्शनशास्त्र ,  law , and forms of government in the territory it governed , particularly Europe , and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world .
Education in the United States is mainly provided by the public sector , with control and funding coming from three levels :  लोकल  , state , and federal , in that order .
Child education is compulsory , and there are also a large number and wide variety of higher education  संस्थानों throughout the देश कि  one can choose to attend , both publicly and privately administered .
Public education is  universally  available .
School curricula , funding , teaching , employment , and other policies are set  through locally निर्वाचित स्कूल फलक  with jurisdiction over school districts with many directives from state legislatures .
School districts are usually separate  इससे अन्य लोकल jurisdictions  , with independent officials and budgets .
Educational standards and standardized testing decisions are usually made by  राज्य सरकारें  .
the आयु  for compulsory education vary by state .
It begins from ages five to eight and ends from ages  चौदह to  eighteen .
Compulsory education requirements can generally be satisfied by educating children in public schools , state-certified  निजी  schools , or an approved home school program .
In most public and private schools , education is divided into three levels : elementary school , middle school ( sometimes called junior high school ) , and  ऊँची स्कूल ( sometimes referred to  as secondary education ) .
In  लगभग सब स्कूलों at ये स्तर , children हैं  divided by age groups into grades , ranging from kindergarten ( followed by first grade ) for the youngest children in elementary school , up to twelfth grade , the final year of high school .
The exact age range of students in these grade  स्तर varies थोड़ा  from area to area .
Post-secondary education , better known as `` college `` in the United States  ,  is generally governed separately from the elementary and high school system , and is described in a separate section below .
Government supported , free public schools for all started being established after the revolution , and expanded in the 19th century , as the results of efforts of men like Horace Mann and Booker  T.  Washington .
By 1870 , all states had free  elementary  schools , albeit only in urban centers .
As the 20th century drew nearer , states started  गुजर कानून to मेक  schooling compulsory , and by 1910 , 72 percent of children attended school .
Private schools continued to spread during this time , as  खूब as कॉलेजों and—in the ग्रामीण centers—  land grant colleges .
the साल of 1910 भी देखी the पहला सच्चा ऊँची स्कूलों .
During the rest of the 20th century  , शैक्षणिक  efforts centered on reducing the inequality of the schooling system .
The landmark Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of Education made the desegregation of  elementary और ऊँची स्कूलों a नेशनल  priority , while the Pell Grant program helped poor minorities gain access to college .
Special education was made into federal  विधि in 1975  .
the elementary और  Secondary Education Act of 1965 made standardized testing a requirement , and in 1983 , a commission was established to evaluate their results and propose a course of action .
The resulting No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 was  विवादास्पद  and its goals proved to be unrealistic .
A commission established in 2006 evaluated higher education , but its recommendations have yet to  be fully  implemented .
Paul Bragg ( February 6 , 1895 – December 7 , 1976 ) , nutritionist , was a pioneer in  america’s  wellness movement .
Health spending per capita , in $ US PPP-adjusted , with the US and Canada  compared amongst अन्य पहला संसार  nations .
Comparison of the health care systems in Canada and the United States are often made by government , public  स्वास्थ्य और पब्लिक  policy analysts .
The two countries had similar health care systems before Canada reformed its  प्रणाली in  the 1960s and 1970s .
The  संयुक्त राज्य  spends much more money on health care than Canada , on both a per-capita basis and as a percentage of GDP .
In 2006 , per-capita spending for health care in Canada was US $ 3,678 ;  in  the U.S. , US $ 6,714 .
The U.S. spent  15.3 % of जीडीपी on स्वास्थ्य परवाह in  that year ; Canada spent 10.0 % .
In 2006 ,  70 % of स्वास्थ्य परवाह  spending in Canada was financed by government , versus 46 % in the United States .
Total government spending per capita in the U.S. on health care was 23 % higher than Canadian government spending , and U.S. government expenditure on health care was just under 83 % of total Canadian  बिता ( पब्लिक  and private ) though these statistics do n't take into account population differences .
Studies have come to different conclusions about the result of this  disparity  in spending .
A 2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes may be superior in patients cared for in  कनाडा बनाम the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन मतभेद  are not consistent . ''
जीवन प्रत्याशा  is longer in Canada , and its infant mortality rate is lower than that of the U.S. , but there is debate about the underlying causes of these differences .
One commonly cited comparison , the 2000 World Health Organization 's ratings of `` overall health service performance '' , which used a `` composite measure of achievement in the level of health , the distribution of health , the level of  responsiveness और निष्पक्षता of वित्तीय  contribution '' , ranked Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations .
This study rated the  us `` responsiveness '' ,  or quality of service for individuals receiving treatment , as 1st , compared with 7th for Canada .
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6 years for residents of the US , simply comparing the life expectancy of two groups with different racial makeup and different obesity rates is likely not an  प्रभावी  way of determining which healthcare system is superior .
The WHO 's study methods were  criticized  by some analyses .
Although there is a measure of consensus  that life-expectancy  and infant mortality mark the most reliable ways to compare nation-wide health care , assuming the population makeup is similar , a recent report by the Congressional Research Service carefully summarizes some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons .
The sound source has now broken through the sound speed barrier , and is traveling at  1.4 टाइम्स the  speed of sound , ( Mach 1.4 ) .
Since the source is moving  तेज़ ( साथ a गति ) than the  sound waves it creates , it actually leads the advancing wavefront .
The sound source  होगा pass by a stationary  observer ( with a speed ) before the observer actually hears the sound it creates .
As a result , an  निरीक्षक in सामने of the सोर्स  will detect
and an observer  पीछे the  source .
A sonic  बूम उत्पादित  by an aircraft moving at M=2.92 , calculated from the cone angle of 20 degrees .
An observer hears the boom when the shock  वेव , on the किनारे  of the cone , crosses his or her location .
mach कोन  angle
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock  लहरें निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट  traveling through the air faster than the speed of sound .
Sonic booms generate enormous amounts of sound energy ,  sounding much जैसे an विस्फोट  .
The crack of a supersonic bullet  गुजर ओवरहेड is an उदाहरण  of a sonic boom in miniature .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is an American late-night talk show  hosted by  Jay Leno that initially aired from May 25 , 1992 to May 29 , 2009 , and resumed production on March 1 , 2010 .
The fourth incarnation of the Tonight Show franchise  बना इसके डेब्यू on may 25 , 1992  , three days following Johnny Carson 's retirement as host of the program .
The program originates from NBC Studios in Burbank , California , and is broadcast Monday through Friday at 11:35 PM in the  पूर्वी और प्रशांत  time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ) .
Unlike Carson or his predecessor Jack Paar , Leno  तभी एकबार utilized  a guest host , preferring to host the series by himself .
On April 26 , 1999 , the show began broadcasting in 1080i HDTV , becoming the first American nightly talk  दिखाएँ to be शॉट in ऊँची परिभाषा .
The show is shot in 16:9  पहलू  ratio .
The series , which followed the same basic format as that of his predecessors ( an opening monologue followed by comedy routines , interviews and performances ) , ran  until  May 29 , 2009 , after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien .
NBC signed Leno to a  नई  deal for a nightly talk show in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot .
The primetime series , titled The Jay Leno Show ,  debuted on  September 14 , 2009 , following a similar format to the Leno incarnation of Tonight .
Neither O'Brien 's version of the program , which premiered June 1 , 2009 , nor   The Jay Leno Show generated the ratings that NBC had expected .
The  संजाल decided to मूव a सघन 30-minute संस्करण of लीनो 's दिखाएँ to o'brien 's समय स्लॉट , और o'brien 's tonight दिखाएँ a half-hour बाद .
This decision met with opposition from O'Brien  ,  whose stint on The Tonight Show ended January 22 , 2010 , after which he began his own talk show on TBS .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began its second and current incarnation , the sixth of the  मताधिकार , on कूच  1 , 2010 .
RFID  चिप अगला  to a grain of rice .
This chip contains a radio-frequency electromagnetic field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to  ट्रांसफ़र a coded पहचान क्रमांक जब queried by a रीडर  device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer products , and implanted in pets ,  लिये पहचान  purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा  , for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
the टैग contain  electronically stored information .
कुछ टैग हैं  powered and read at short ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else have no battery but collect energy  इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड , और तब  act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery powered tags may operate at  सैंकड़ों of मीटर  .
Unlike a bar code , the tag does not necessarily need to be within  लकीर of sight of the रीडर  , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are   used in many industries .
An RFID tag attached to an  ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान  production can be used to track its progress through the assembly line .
Pharmaceuticals can be tracked through  warehouses  .
Livestock and pets may have tags injected , allowing positive identification of the  एनिमल  .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing , possessions , or even implanted within people , the possibility of  पढना personally-linked सूचना बगैर  consent has raised privacy concerns .
Id , ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic apparatus defined in Sigmund Freud 's  संरचनात्मक मॉडल of the psyche ; वे हैं the  three theoretical constructs in terms of whose activity and interaction mental life is described .
According to this model of the psyche , the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the critical and  moralizing भूमिका ; और the अहंकार is  the organized , realistic part that mediates between the desires of the id and the super-ego .
the  super-ego can stop you from doing certain things that your id may want you to do .
Even though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus , the id  , अहंकार और super-ego हैं कृत्यों of the दिमाग बल्कि than  parts of the brain and do not correspond one-to-one with actual somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience .
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic model '' and  `` topographical  model '' ) was first discussed in his 1920 essay `` Beyond the Pleasure Principle `` and was formalized and elaborated upon three years later in his `` The Ego and the Id `` .
Freud 's proposal was influenced by the ambiguity of the term ``  बेहोश `` और  its many conflicting uses .
Air Force  rotc  emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer Training Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the United States Air Force , the other  दो होने the  United States Air Force Academy ( USAFA ) and Air Force Officer Training School ( OTS ) .
A  अधीनस्थ कमांड of the एयर विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the एयर शिक्षा और प्रशिक्षण  Command ( AETC ) , AFROTC is aligned under the Jeanne M. Holm Center for Officer Accessions and Citizen Development at Maxwell AFB , Alabama .
The Holm Center , formerly known as the Air Force Officer Accession and Training Schools ( AFOATS ) , retains direct  जिम्मेदारी लिये दोनो afrotc  and OTS .
AFROTC is the largest and oldest source of  commissioned अधिकारियों लिये  the U.S. Air Force .
afrotc 's  stated mission is to produce quality leaders for the U.S. Air Force .
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and  विश्वविद्यालयों campuses  with 984 additional institutions of higher learning participating in cross-town agreements that allow their students to attend AFROTC classes at a nearby `` host '' college or university .
According to AFOATS HQ , in 2006 , AFROTC  commissioned 2,083 यूएसएएफ दूसरी lieutenants , साथ afrotc  enrollment ranging from 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in 1993 , and around 13,000 enrolled today .
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called `` detachments , '' and are typically headed by an active duty USAF officer in  the रैंक of कर्नल or लेफ्टिनेंट  colonel who functions as both the Detachment Commander for USAF purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community .
Most colleges and universities will designate the AFROTC detachment as the Department  of  Aerospace Studies .
The PAS is assisted by three to four Assistant Professors of Aerospace Studies  ( apas ) , सब क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ  officers in the ranks of major or captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned officer will typically provide  सैन्य प्रशासनिक  support and are often augmented by one to two civilian staff support employees of the academic institution .
Within AFROTC detachments , the students ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) are organized into wings , groups ,  squadrons , और फ़्लाइट , mirroring  the USAF functional wing structure .
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC )  consisting of the पहला दो सालो of प्रशिक्षण ,  and the Professional Officer Course ( POC ) consisting of the last two years of training .
The AFROTC program is also divided into two  प्रशिक्षण कृत्यों : the  Academic Classroom Program ( Aerospace Studies classes ) and Cadet Activities ( i.e. , Leadership Laboratory , Physical Training , and other training ) .
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term used in the pulp and paper  उद्योग और भी लिये कपड़ा उद्योग  to denote a measure of mass of the product per unit of area for a type of fabric , paper or paperboard .
The term `` density '' is not used in its traditional  भाव of द्रव्यमान प्रति ईकाई  volume .
`` Paper density ''   , rather , is a measure of the area density .
Paper products that let little or no light pass through ( e.g . poster board ) are considered  घना  or heavy .
Paper products that  allow कुछ लाइट to pass through (  e.g . tissue paper ) are considered lightweight .
In the pulp and paper industry , it is common to set a commercial  पेपर यंत्र to उपज पेपर  to a target paper density .
Paper density can also be used to distinguish paper from paperboard as the latter  प्रायः रै  a grammage greater than 134 g/m2 .
Two ways  of  expressing paper density are commonly used:
Expressed  in गामा प्रति वर्गाकार मीटर  ( g/m2 ) , paper density is also known as grammage .
This  is the माप प्रयुक्त  in most parts of the world .
Expressed in terms of the mass ( expressed as weight ) per number   of sheets , it is known as basis weight .
The convention used in the United States and a few other countries using US paper sizes is pounds of a ream of  500 ( or in कुछ मामले 1000 ) चादरें of a  given ( raw , still uncut ) basis size .
Japanese paper is expressed as the  वज़न in kg of  1000 sheets .
Candace Nicole Parker ( born  अप्रैल 19 , 1986 ) is an अमरीकी  basketball player for the WNBA 's Los Angeles Sparks and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia .
She is the younger sister of NBA player  एंथोनी  Parker .
She attended the University  of टेनेसी और थी  drafted by the Sparks in 2008 .
She may  be बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये होने the पहला स्त्री  to dunk in an NCAA tournament game and the first woman to dunk twice in a college game—she set both milestones as a redshirt freshman on March 19 , 2006 .
She also became only the second player  to डंक  in a WNBA game on June 22 , 2008 .
A versatile player , she is  मुख्यतः a आगे ,  but was listed on Tennessee 's roster as a forward , center , and guard .
She was a starter on the Lady Vols  बास्केट  team , winners of the 2007 and 2008 NCAA championships .
Parker won the 2009  निकलोडियन बच्चे  ' Choice award as the favorite female athlete in the sports category .
And she was a guest  स्टार on  Figure It Out .
A food  मार्गदर्शिका पिरामिड is a पिरामिड  shaped guide of healthy foods divided into sections to show the recommended intake for each food group .
the पहला  food pyramid was published in Sweden in 1974 .
The most widely  ज्ञात खाना पिरामिड थी introduced  by the United States Department of Agriculture in the year 1992 , was updated in 2005 , and then replaced in 2011 .
Over 25 other countries and organisations  have भी प्रकाशित  food pyramids .
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in Scandinavia as H. C. Andersen ; April 2 , 1805August 4  , 1875 ) थी a डैनिश  author and poet .
Although a prolific writer of plays , travelogues , novels , and poems , Andersen is best remembered for his fairy  किस्से , a साहित्यिक  genre he so mastered that he himself has become as mythical as the tales he wrote .
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ; his stories—called , or `` fantastic tales '' —express  विषयवस्तु कि transcend आयु और  nationality .
During his lifetime he was acclaimed for having delighted children worldwide and was feted  by  royalty .
Andersen 's fairy tales , which have been translated into more than 125 languages , have become culturally embedded in the West 's collective consciousness , readily  accessible to children , लकिन पेश lessons of पुण्य और  resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well .
They have inspired motion pictures , plays  , नाटिकाओं  , and animated films .

In human beings , eye contact is a form of nonverbal communication and is thought to have a large influence on social  बर्ताव  .
Coined in the early to mid-1960s , the  पद रै आइये in the वेस्ट to  often define the act as a meaningful and important sign of confidence and social communication .
The  कस्टम और significance  of eye contact vary widely between cultures , with religious and social differences often altering its meaning greatly .
The study of eye contact is  sometimes  known as oculesics .
Bed bugs are  parasitic  insects of the cimicid family that feed exclusively on blood .
The term most commonly refers to members of the genus Cimex  of जिससे cimex lectularius , the आम bed कीड़ा , is the बेहतरीन ज्ञात as it prefers to फीड on  human blood although other Cimex species are specialized to other animals , e.g. , bat bugs , C. pipistrelli ( Europe ) , C. pilosellus ( western US ) , and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ) .
The name of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the preferred habitat of Cimex lectularius : warm houses and   especially nearby or inside of beds and bedding or other sleep areas .
Bed bugs are  मुख्यतः  active at night , but are not exclusively nocturnal .
They  प्रायः फीड on उनके  hosts without being noticed .
A number   of adverse health effects may result from bed bug bites , including skin rashes , psychological effects , and allergic symptoms .
Diagnosis involves both finding bed bugs and the  occurrence of संगत लक्षण  .
Bed bugs have been  ज्ञात as इंसान परजीवी  for thousands of years .
At a point in the early 1940s , they were  ज़्यादातर eradicated  in the developed world , but have increased in prevalence since 1995 .
Because  infestation  of human habitats has been on the increase , bed bug bites and related conditions have been on the rise as well .
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of  the latter नबियों  in the Hebrew Bible , preceding Ezekiel , Jeremiah and the Book of the Twelve .
( The order of the  subsequent किताबे  differs somewhat in the Christian Old Testament ) .
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a sinful Judah and for all the nations of the world that oppose God , while the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel and a new creation in God 's glorious future kingdom ; this section  शामिल the गीतों of the कष्ट नौकर , चार पृथक passages referring to  the nation of Israel , interpreted by Christians as prefiguring the coming of Jesus Christ .
Tradition ascribes authorship of the book to Isaiah  बेटे of amoz , लकिन अभी  scholars widely agree that the book is the work of three different authors - few scholars deny this view , and those that do , do so for theological reasons .
The first , termed Proto-Isaiah ( chapters  1–39 ) , contains the शब्द of  the 8th-century BCE prophet with 7th-century BCE expansions ; the second , Deutero-Isaiah ( chapters 40–55 ) , is the work of a 6th-century BCE author writing near the end of the Babylonian captivity ; and the third , the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ) , was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from exile , probably by multiple authors .
ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों ( osu  ) is a coeducational , public research university located in Corvallis , Oregon , United States .
The university offers undergraduate , graduate and doctoral degrees and a multitude of  शोध अवसर  .
There are more than 200 academic degree programs offered through the  विश्वविद्यालयों  .
OSU 's programs in microbiology , nuclear engineering  , पारिस्थितिकी  , forestry , public health , biochemistry , zoology , oceanography , food science and pharmacy are recognized nationally as top tier programs .
The OSU 's liberal arts programs have also grown significantly and the department is  माना a `` cornerstone ''  of the institution .
More than  200,000 लोगों have  attended OSU since its founding .
The Carnegie Foundation classifies Oregon State University  as भाग of इसके शीर्ष टियर  of research institutions .
As of  2008 , osu  is one of only seventy-three land-grant universities .
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant , space-grant and sun-grant  institution ,  making it one of only two US institutions to retain all four designations and the only public university to do so ( Cornell is the only other with similar designations ) .
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon University System , OSU receives more funding for research , annually , than all other public higher  शिक्षा संस्थानों  in Oregon combined .
Female ejaculation is  the expulsion of द्रव  by human females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm .
it is भी ज्ञात colloquially  as gushing or squirting , although these are considered to be different phenomena in some research publications .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical professionals , which is also related to doubts over  the अस्तित्व of the g-spot  .
The Kanab ambersnail , scientific name Oxyloma haydeni  kanabensis  or Oxyloma kanabense , is a critically endangered subspecies or species of small , air-breathing land snail , a terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Succineidae , the amber snails .
The common name of the amber snails is based on the shell , which is translucent and when empty  प्रायः resembles एम्बर  in color .
This species is endemic to the United States , specifically the state of Arizona and Utah , where it was first collected in the early  20th सदी  .
It has been listed as endangered on the United States Fish and Wildlife Service list  of endangered  species since 8 August 1991 .
This snail lives in wetlands , springs , and seeps , and only two of its natural habitats are known to exist : Three Lakes , a meadow near Kanab , Utah , and Vasey 's  स्वर्ग , a वसन्त साथ the कोलोराडो नदी भीतर  Grand Canyon National Park .
In its natural habitat it is rather polyphagous , feeding  मुख्यतः on जीवाणु , पौधे  and fungi , and reproduces during the summer .
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species due to a series of factors ( including influence ) , the Kanab ambersnail has been reintroduced to three   springs above the historic high water level along the Colorado River .
the स्पेनी  language is the second most used language in the United States .
There are more Spanish speakers in the United  राज्य  than there are speakers of Chinese , French , German , Italian , Hawaiian , and the Native American languages combined .
According to the 2010 American Community Survey conducted by the U.S. Census Bureau , Spanish is the primary language  बोला at घर by लगभग 37 लाख  people aged five or older , a figure more than double that of 1990 .
There are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language , as well as six million Spanish language students , composing the largest national Spanish-speaking community outside of  मैक्सिको और बनाना स्पेनी the रोमांस भाषा  and the Indo-European language with largest number of native speakers in the world .
Roughly   half of all U.S. Spanish speakers also speak English `` very well , '' based on the self-assessment Census question respondents .
The language came to the country  since  the 16th and 17th centuries with the arrival of Spanish colonists in areas that would later become the states of Florida , Texas , Colorado , New Mexico , Arizona , Nevada , Utah , and California and of the Spanish explorers - who explored areas of 42 states- .
Also west of Louisiana Territory was   Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the French recovery of territory ) , after the French and Indian War .

The  टोकियो mew mew manga  and anime series features a cast of characters designed by Mia Ikumi .
The series takes place in Tokyo , Japan , where five adolescent girls , called Mew Mews , are infused with the DNA of endangered species to  कॉम्बैट एलियंस attempting to लो  over the Earth .
The manga series is followed by a short sequel series ,  टोकियो  Mew Mew a la Mode , which introduces a new Mew Mew and a new threat .
The Mew Mews are led by the main character , Ichigo  momomiya , जिनकी पहला कार्य is to एकत्रित  the other four Mew Mews : Mint Aizawa , Lettuce Midorikawa , Pudding Fong , and Zakuro Fujiwara .
As the series progresses , Ichigo goes from having a crush on Masaya Aoyama to becoming his girlfriend while trying to hide her  रहस्य  double life from him .
The  श्रेणी  antagonists include three aliens , Kish , Pie , and Tart , and their leader , Deep Blue .
Originally  इससे धरती , the एलियंस  were forced to leave long ago due to deadly environmental changes .
They have returned to kill the humans , who they feel are destroying their planet  , और reclaim  the planet .
In a  la विधि , मध्य स्कूल  student Berry Shirayuki is introduced as the sixth Mew Mew and , in the absence of Ichigo , the temporary leader of the Mew Mews .
A la Mode also introduces new set of antagonists , the Saint Rose Crusaders , a group of human  teenagers साथ  various psychic abilities with a desire to create their own utopia .
Led by  ड्यूक , वे मेक अनेक  attempts to kill Berry , eventually turning the local populace against the Mew Mews .
Ikumi 's initial vision for Tokyo Mew Mew  थी a स्टोरी पुकारा टोकियो ब्लैक  Cat Girl that featured a cat-girl battling alien invaders .
After the story was transitioned to a more upbeat story of five female superheroes  , the  character designs were redone to have a lighter , more colorful feel .
The main series characters were praised for being  a पूर्ण  fit for the overall story , as well as for their cute appearances .
The characters introduced in a la Mode were also praised for their visual appearances ,  लकिन criticized as होने दोहराव of the असली  series .
The character Duke was also criticized for having  a डिज़ाइन reminiscent  of the white supremacy group , the Ku Klux Klan .

Sedimentary rocks are types of rock that  हैं  formed by the deposition of material at the Earth 's surface and within bodies of water .
sedimentation is the सामूहिक नाम  for processes that cause mineral and/or organic particles ( detritus ) to settle and accumulate or minerals to precipitate from a solution .
Particles that form  a sedimentary  rock by accumulating are called sediment .
Before being deposited , sediment was formed by weathering and erosion in a source area , and then transported  to the प्लेस of deposition by जल , हवा , बर्फ  , mass movement or glaciers which are called agents of denudation .
The sedimentary rock cover of the continents of the Earth 's crust is extensive , but the total contribution of sedimentary rocks is estimated to be  तभी 8  % of the total volume of the crust .
Sedimentary rocks are only a thin veneer over a crust consisting mainly  of igneous  and metamorphic rocks .
sedimentary  rocks are deposited in layers as strata , forming a structure called bedding .
The study of sedimentary rocks and rock strata provides information about the  subsurface कि is उपयोगी लिये सिविल  engineering , for example in the construction of roads , houses , tunnels , canals or other constructions .
Sedimentary rocks are also important sources of natural resources like coal ,  चट्टान fuels  , drinking water or ores .
The study of the sequence of sedimentary rock strata is the main source for scientific knowledge about the Earth 's history , including palaeogeography , paleoclimatology  और the इतिहास  of life .
The  वैज्ञानिक  discipline that studies the properties and origin of sedimentary rocks is called sedimentology .
Sedimentology is both part of geology and physical geography and overlaps partly with other disciplines in the Earth sciences , such as pedology , geomorphology ,  भूरसायन  or structural geology .
