to  दृश्य  labels .
The  डायन 's  Finger in the Carlsbad Caverns
A stalagmite ( or ; from the Greek σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês , from σταλαγμίας - stalagmias , `` dropping , trickling '' ) is a type of speleothem that rises from the floor of a limestone cave due to the  टपकता of mineralized समाधान और  the deposition of calcium carbonate .
This stalagmite formation occurs only  अंतर्गत निश्चित ph शर्तें  within the underground cavern .
The corresponding formation on the  छत of  a cave is known as a stalactite .
If these  formations  grow together , the result is known as a column .
The Hall of  दिग्गज in  the Carlsbad Caverns
Stalagmites should normally not be touched , since the rock buildup is formed by minerals precipitating out of the water solution onto the old surface ; skin oils can alter the surface   where the mineral water will cling , thus affecting the growth of the formation .
Oils and dirt from human contact can also stain the formation and  बदलें इसके  color permanently .
Similar structures can also form in lava  tubes , संबद्ध साथ  some types of lavacicles , although the mechanism of formation is very different .
Stalactites and stalagmites can also form on   concrete ceilings and floors , although they form much more rapidly there than in the natural cave environment .
The largest  stalagmite in the  world is high and is located in the cave of Cueva Martin Infierno , Cuba .
In the Zagros Mountains of south Iran , approximately from the ancient city of Bishapur , in  the shapur गुफा on the चौथी of पाँच बरामदा  stands the 3rd century CE statue of Shapur I , second ruler of the Sassanid Empire .
The statue , carved from one  stalagmite , is nearly  high .
How I Met Your Mother is an American sitcom that premiered  on सीबीएस on सितंबर 19 , 2005  .
The  दिखाएँ थी  created by Craig Thomas and Carter Bays .
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year 2030 , when Ted Mosby ( voiced by Bob Saget ) gathers his daughter ( Lyndsy  fonseca ) और बेटे ( दाउद henrie ) to बताना उन्हें the स्टोरी of कैसा  he met their mother .
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single , 27-year-old architect living with his two best friends from Wesleyan University , Marshall Eriksen ( Jason Segel ) , a law student ,  और लिली एल्ड्रिन ( alyson हनिंगन ) , a  kindergarten teacher , who have been dating for almost nine years when Marshall proposes .
Their engagement causes Ted to think about finding his own soul mate , much to the disgust of his friend Barney Stinson ( Neil Patrick Harris ) , a womanizer with an unnamed  corporate  job .
And thus , Ted begins his search for his  पूर्ण mate , और meets रोबिन  Scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders ) , whom he also befriends .
The 100th episode of How I Met Your Mother aired on January  11  , 2010 .
On December 21 ,  2012 , the श्रेणी थी  renewed for a ninth season .
On January 30 , 2013 , it was  घोषित कि  Season 9 will be its final season .
Gringo ( , , ) is a slang Spanish  और पुर्तगाली शब्द प्रयुक्त in ibero-america  , to denote foreigners , often from the United States .
The term can be applied to someone who is  दरअसल a foreigner , or it can denote a दमदार संघ  or assimilation into foreign ( particularly US ) society and culture .
In Spanish it  करता  not have a negative connotation .
Roger Axtell , a travel etiquette expert , notes that `` [  t ]  he word gringo is not necessarily a bad word .
It is slang but is derogatory only  in इसके  use and context . ''
The word was used in Spain long before it crossed the Atlantic to  denote विदेशी  , non-native speakers of Spanish .
The great white shark , Carcharodon carcharias , also known as the great white , white pointer , white shark , or white death , is a species of large lamniform shark which can be found in the coastal surface waters of  सब the  major oceans .
The great white shark is mainly known for its size , with the largest individuals known   to have approached or exceeded in length , and in weight .
This shark reaches its maturity around 15 years of age and can have a life span  of  over 30 years .
The great white shark is  arguably the  world 's largest known extant macropredatory fish , and is one of the primary predators of marine mammals .
It is also known to prey upon a variety of other  समुद्री पशु , सहित  fish and seabirds .
It is the only known surviving species of its genus Carcharodon , and is  क्रमित पहला in having the सबसे हमले  on humans .
The IUCN list the  ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क  as a vulnerable species , while it is included in Appendix II of CITES .
The bestselling novel Jaws by Peter Benchley and the subsequent blockbuster film by Steven Spielberg  चित्रित the ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क  as a `` ferocious man eater `` .
In reality ,  इंसानो हैं नहीं  the preferred prey of the great white shark .
The United States  हथियारबंद शक्तियां  are the military forces of the United States of America .
They consist of the Army , Navy , Marine Corps , Air  फ़ोर्स , और coast  Guard .
The U.S. has a strong tradition  of civilian  control of the military .
The President is the military 's overall head , and helps form military policy with the U.S. Department of Defense ( DoD ) , a federal executive department , acting as the principal organ by which  सैन्य नीति  is carried out .
The DoD is headed by the Secretary of Defense , who  is a  civilian and Cabinet member .
The Defense Secretary is second in the military 's chain of command ,  बस नीचे the अध्यक्ष  , and serves as the principal assistant to the President in all DoD-related matters .
To coordinate military action with  कूटनीति , the  President has an advisory National Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor .
Both the President and Secretary   of Defense are advised by a seven-member Joint Chiefs of Staff , which includes the head of each of the Defense Department 's service branches as well as the chief of the National Guard Bureau .
Leadership is provided by the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of  स्टाफ और  the Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff .
The Commandant  of the coast गार्ड  is not a member of the Joint Chiefs of Staff .
All of the branches work  साथ दौरान परिचालन  and joint missions , under the Unified Combatant Commands , under the authority of the Secretary of Defense with the exception of the Coast Guard .
The Coast Guard falls under the administration of  the विभाग  of Homeland Security and receives its operational orders from the Secretary of Homeland Security .
The Coast Guard may be transferred to  the विभाग  of the Navy by the President or Congress during a time of war .
All five armed services are  among  the seven uniformed services of the United States ; the others are the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Corps .
From the time of its inception , the military played a decisive role in  the इतिहास  of the United States .
A sense of national unity and identity  थी forged as a  result of victory in the First Barbary War and the Second Barbary War .
Even so , the Founders were suspicious of a permanent military force and not until the  outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii किया a विशाल  standing army become officially established .
The National Security Act of 1947 , adopted  following संसार युद्ध ii और दौरान the ठंडा युद्ध 's onset , निर्मित the आधुनिक u.S. सैन्य फ्रेमवर्क ; the अधिनियम मिलाया previously cabinet-level विभाग of युद्ध और the  Department of the Navy into the National Military Establishment ( renamed the Department of Defense in 1949 ) , headed by the Secretary of Defense ; and created the Department of the Air Force and National Security Council .
The U.S. military is one of the  largest militaries  in terms of number of personnel .
It draws its  जनशक्ति इससे a  large pool of paid volunteers ; although conscription has been used in the past in various times of both war and peace , it has not been used since 1972 .
As of 2013 , the U.S. spends about $ 554.2  अरब annually  to fund its military forces , and appropriates approximately $ 88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations .
Put together , the U.S. constitutes roughly 43  प्रतिशत of the संसार  's military expenditures .
The U.S. Armed Forces as a  पूरे possess  large quantities of advanced and powerful equipment , along with widespread placement of forces around the world , giving them significant capabilities in both defense and power projection .
Freedom of speech is the political right  to communicate एक  's opinions and ideas using one 's body and property to anyone who is willing to receive them .
The term freedom of  अभिव्यक्ति is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously  , but includes any act of seeking , receiving and imparting information or ideas , regardless of the medium used .
In practice , the right to freedom of  वाक is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश  and the right is commonly subject to limitations , as with libel , slander , obscenity , sedition ( including , for example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation , revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to  freedom  of expression is recognized as a human right under Article 19 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and recognized in international human rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the right to hold opinions without interference '' and `` everyone shall have the right to freedom of expression ; this right shall include freedom to seek , receive and   impart information and ideas of all kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in writing or in print , in the form of art , or through any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on to say that the exercise of these rights carries `` special duties and responsibilities `` and may `` therefore be subject to certain restrictions '' when necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or  प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य '' or  `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of speech may be legally curtailed in some religious legal systems and in secular jurisdictions where it is found to cause religious offense , such  as the अंग्रेजों जातिगत  and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त लोगो  .
The Big Bang Theory is an American comedy television series created and executive  उत्पादित by चक lorre और  Bill Prady .
Like the name of the series itself , with the exception of the first episode— '' Pilot '' —episode titles of The Big Bang Theory always start with `` The '' and resemble the name of a scientific principle , theory or experiment ,   whimsically referencing a plot point or quirk .
, 133  एपीसोड  have aired .
The Big Bang Theory has been renewed for a seventh  ऋतु  .
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced , ;  अक्तूबर 14 , 1890 – कूच 28 , 1969 ) थी the 34th  President of the United States from 1953 until 1961 .
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States Army during World War II and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Forces in Europe ; he had responsibility for planning and supervising the invasion of North Africa in Operation Torch  in 1942–43 और the कामयाब आक्रमण of फ़्रांस और जर्मनी in 1944–45 इससे the पश्चिमी सामने  .
In 1951 , he became the first  परम्  commander of NATO .
Eisenhower was of Pennsylvania Dutch  ancestry  and was reared in a large family in Kansas by parents with a robust work ethic and religious background .
As one of six sons , he was conditioned by a competitive atmosphere which  instilled  self-reliance .
He attended  और ग्रैजुएट  from West Point and later married and had two sons .
After World War II , Eisenhower served as Army Chief of Staff under President Harry S. Truman  , तब assumed the पोस्ट of अध्यक्ष at कोलंबिया  University .
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican to counter the  non-interventionism of सीनेटर रॉबर्ट A. taft और to crusade  against `` Communism , Korea and corruption '' .
he जीती by  a landslide , defeating Democrat Adlai Stevenson and ending two decades of the New Deal Coalition .
In the first year of his presidency , Eisenhower deposed  the नेता  of Iran in the 1953 Iranian coup d'état and used nuclear threats to conclude the Korean War with China .
His New Look policy  of नाभिकीय deterrence  gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while reducing the funding for conventional military forces ; the goal was to keep pressure on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits .
in 1954 , आइज़नहावर  first articulated the domino theory in his description of the threat presented by the spread of communism .
The Congress agreed to his request in 1955 for the Formosa Resolution , which enabled   him to prevent Chinese communist aggression against Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending Taiwan .
When the Soviets launched Sputnik in  1957 , he था to खेल  catch-up in the space race .
Eisenhower forced Israel , the UK  , और फ़्रांस to  end their invasion of Egypt during the Suez Crisis of 1956 .
In 1958 , he sent 15,000  us सैनिकों to  Lebanon to prevent the pro-Western government from falling to a Nasser -inspired revolution .
Near the end of his term , his efforts to set  up a समिट  meeting with the Soviets collapsed because of the U-2 incident .
On the domestic front , he covertly  opposed जोसेफ मैकार्थी  and contributed to the end of McCarthyism by openly invoking the modern expanded version of executive privilege .
He otherwise left most   political activity to his Vice President , Richard Nixon .
He was a moderate conservative who continued New  सौदे एजेंसियों और  expanded Social Security .
Among his enduring innovations , he launched the Interstate  राजमार्ग प्रणाली ; the रक्षा उन्नत  Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ) , which led to the internet , among many invaluable outputs ; the National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA ) , driving peaceful discovery in space ; the establishment of strong science education via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act .
In social  नीति , he भेजा संघीय सैनिकों  to Little Rock , Arkansas , for the first time since Reconstruction to enforce federal court orders to desegregate public schools .
He also signed civil rights legislation in 1957 and   1960 to protect the right to vote .
He implemented desegregation of the armed forces in two  सालो और बना  five appointments to the Supreme Court .
He was the first  term-limited अध्यक्ष  in accordance with the 22nd Amendment .
Eisenhower 's  दो शर्तें यहूद शांतिपूर्ण ones लिये  the most part and saw considerable economic prosperity except for a sharp recession in 1958–59 .
Eisenhower is often  क्रमित अत्यधिक among  the U.S. Presidents .
Air Force One is the official air traffic control call sign of a United States Air Force aircraft carrying the President of the  संयुक्त  States .
In common parlance the term refers to  those एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान  specifically designed , built , and used for the purpose of transporting the president .
The Presidential  वायुयान  is a prominent symbol of the American presidency and its power .
The idea of designating specific military aircraft to transport the President arose in 1943  , जब officials of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज  Air Forces – the predecessor to the U.S. Air Force – became concerned with relying on commercial airlines to transport the President .
A C-87 Liberator Express was reconfigured for use as a  अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण  ; however , it was rejected by the Secret Service amid concerns over the aircraft 's safety record .
A C-54 Skymaster was then converted for presidential use ; this aircraft , dubbed the Sacred Cow , transported President Franklin D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference  in फ़रवरी 1945 , और थी subsequently  used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman .
The `` Air Force One '' call sign was created after a 1953 incident  दौरान जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D.  Eisenhower entered the same airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign .
Several aircraft have been used  as एयर फ़ोर्स एक चूंकि  the creation of the presidential fleet , including two Boeing 707s introduced in the 1960s and 1970s , respectively ; since 1990 , the presidential fleet has consisted of two Boeing VC-25As – specifically configured , highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft .
The Air Force is looking into replacing the two VC-25  वायुयान साथ तीन  replacement aircraft beginning in 2017 .
A wedding anniversary is  the वर्षगांठ  of the date a wedding took place .
Traditional names exist for most of them : for instance , 50 years of marriage is called a `` golden wedding  anniversary '' or simply a ``  golden anniversary '' .
A scanner with  duplexing स्वचालित  Document Feeder .
In multifunction or all-in-one printers , fax machines , photocopiers  और scanners , an स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or adf is a  feature which takes several pages and feeds the paper one page at a time into a scanner or copier , allowing the user to scan , and thereby copy , print , or fax , multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page .
Most copiers allow scanning on the flatbed or platen ( the ``  कांच '' )  or through a document feeder .
The vast  बहुमत of फैक्स मशीने have an adf , allowing  the unattended sending of multi-page faxes .
Due to the ubiquity of ADF in fax  मशीने , कुछ  fax machine owners use the fax machine as a scanner , faxing multi-page documents to themselves .
दस्तावेज़ feeders हैं  described by speed , in pages per minute or ppm , and capacity , usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200 .
There are two kinds of document feeders capable of two-sided (  duplex ) स्कैनिंग :  a reversing automatic document feeder or RADF scans one side of a page , then flips it and scans the other side .
A duplexing automatic document feeder or DADF scans both  पहलू  in one pass .
The advantage of the DADF is  तेज़ गति लिये  two-sided originals .
RADFs and DADFs are rated in images  प्रति मिनट ( ipm )  , the number of sides they can scan each minute .
Fair Park is a recreational and  शैक्षणिक जटिल स्तिथ  in Dallas , Texas ( USA ) .
The complex is registered as a Dallas Landmark , National Historic Landmark and is home to nine museums , six  प्रदर्शन सुविधाएं  , a lagoon , and the largest Ferris wheel in North America .
अनेक of the इमारतें on the जटिल यहूद constructed लिये the टेक्सास centennial exposition in 1936 जिससे खींचा over छह लाख विज़िटर  .
Most of the buildings built for  the exposition  still survive and it is recognized as a significant example of Art Deco architecture .
Fair Park has been designated a Great Place  in अमेरिका  by the American Planning Association .
The American Planning Association ( APA ) “is an independent , not-for-profit educational organization that provides  नेतृत्व in the विकास  of vital communities.”
The Great Places in American program helps to celebrate areas with “exemplary   character , quality , and planning.”
Being designated as a Great Place in  अमेरिका , मेला पार्क थी एक of तभी  ten cities chosen in 2011 .
San Jose ( ; Spanish :  st. जोसेफ  ) is the third-largest city in California , the tenth-largest in the U.S. , and the county seat of Santa Clara County which is located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay .
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley , which is a major component of the greater San Francisco  खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , a प्रदेश of 8.4 लाख लोगों  and the fifth largest metropolitan area ( CSA ) in the United States .
It is  the  largest city in Northern California .
San Jose was founded on November 29 , 1777 , as El Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe , the first civilian town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California ,  जिससे बाद  became Alta California .
The city served as a farming community to support Spanish military  संस्थापना at सैन फ्रांसिस्को और monterey  .
When California gained  statehood in 1850  , San Jose served as its first capital .
After more than  150 सालो as a छोटी खेती  city , San Jose and the surrounding Santa Clara Valley became the last ( and largest ) contiguous area of undeveloped land surrounding the San Francisco Bay .
San Jose experienced increased demand for housing from soldiers and veterans returning from  World  War II .
San Jose then continued its aggressive  विस्तार दौरान the 1950s  and 1960s by annexing more land area .
The rapid growth of the high-technology and electronics industries further  त्वरित the परिवर्तन  from an agricultural center , to an urbanized metropolitan area .
By the 1990s , San Jose 's location  भीतर the booming  local technology industry earned the city its nickname , Capital of Silicon Valley .
San Jose now maintains global city status and is the largest city in the San  फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in शर्तें  of population , land area , and industrial development .
The U.S. Census Bureau reported the population of the city to be 945,942 as of the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
As of April 2013 , the  अनुमानित  population of San Jose was 984,000 .
San Jose , along with the  सांता क्लारा  Valley , experienced about half a century of spectacular suburban sprawl , with characteristics of intense urbanization similar to the Los Angeles area of Southern California .
The city has taken  definite कदम to  avoid becoming `` L.A. North '' .
However , the sprawl in San Jose is worse than in Los Angeles by  उपायों ऐसे as जनसांख्यिकी  density and public transit safety , investment , and ridership .
Europe depicted by Antwerp cartographer Abraham  ortelius in 1595
the इतिहास of यूरोपीय कवर  the people inhabiting the European continent since it was first populated in prehistoric times to present , with the first Homo sapiens arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC .
The earliest settlers  to प्रागैतिहासिक  Europe came during the paleolithic era .
The arrival  of कृषि  around 7000 BC ushered in the neolithic age .
Neolithic Europe  lasted लिये 4000  years , overlapping with metal-using cultures that gradually spread throughout the continent .
Technological advances during the prehistoric age tended to arrive from  the मध्य  East , spreading gradually to the northwest .
Some of the  best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक  Europe were Minoan and Mycenaean , which flourished during the Bronze Age until they collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC .
The period known as classical antiquity began with  the वृद्धि of the  city-states of Ancient Greece .
Greek influence reached its zenith under the expansive empire of Alexander the Great ,  spreading  throughout Asia .
उत्तरी और पश्चिमी  Europe were dominated by the La Tène culture , a precursor to the Celts .
Rome , a small city-state traditionally founded in 753 BC , would grow to  become the रोमन गणतंत्र in 509 bc और होता सफल  Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization .
The events of the rule  of जूलियस सीज़र led  to reorganization of the Republic into the Roman Empire .
The empire was later divided by  the सम्राट diocletian into  the Western and Eastern empires .
During the later years of the Roman Empire , the Germanic peoples of northern Europe grew in strength and repeated attacks led to the Fall of the Western Roman Empire in AD 476 , a date which  traditionally marks the समाप्त of the शास्त्रीय  period and the start of the Middle Ages .
During the Middle Ages , the Eastern Roman Empire survived , though  आधुनिक इतिहासकारों  refer to this state as the Byzantine Empire .
In Western Europe , Germanic peoples moved into positions of power in  the  remnants of the former Western Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own .
Of all of the Germanic peoples , the Franks would rise to a position of Hegemony over western  यूरोपीय , the frankish साम्राज्य reaching इसके शिखर अंतर्गत शारलेमेन around  AD 800 .
Francia was  विभाजित into अनेक भाग ; वेस्ट francia  would evolve into the Kingdom of France , while East Francia would evolve into the Holy Roman Empire , a precursor to modern Germany .
The British Isles were the site of  अनेक large-scale  migrations .
Native Celtic peoples had been marginalized during  the काल of रोमन ब्रिटेन , और जब the romans abandoned the  British Isles during the 400s , waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927 .
During this  काल  , the Kingdom of Poland and Kingdom of Hungary ( 1000–1945 ) were organized as well .
The Viking Age , a period of migrations of Scandinavian peoples , dominated the  काल इससे the लेट  700s to the middle 1000s .
Chief  among the viking राज्य थी the साम्राज्य  of Cnut the Great , a Danish leader who would become king of England , Denmark , and Norway .
The Normans , a Viking people who settled in Northern France and founded the Duchy of Normandy , would have a significant impact on many parts of Europe , from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and  सिसिली  .
Another Scandinavian people , the Rus '  लोगों , होता go on to मिला  Kievan Rus ' , an early state which was a precursor for the modern country of Russia .
As the Viking Age drew to a close , the period known as the Crusades , a series of religiously-motivated military expeditions originally  intended to लाओ  the Levant back into Christian rule , began .
Several Crusader states were founded in the  पूर्वी भूमध्यसागरीय  .
ये यहूद  all short-lived .
The Crusaders would have a profound impact on many parts of  यूरोपीय  .
Their Sack of  कुस्तुंतुनिया in 1204 brought  an abrupt end to the Byzantine Empire .
Extinct dog breeds is a  संकलन of श्वान  breeds that have become extinct .
Wii Speak is a microphone accessory for Nintendo 's Wii  वीडियो खेल कंसोल  .
Connected to the console via USB , the  यंत्र can be  placed near the video display , allowing voice chat to be conducted with the entire room .
The  यंत्र  features an LED to indicate when the microphone is active .
वी बोलो  was announced at Nintendo 's 2008 E3 media briefing .
It was released  separately और bundled साथ एनिमल क्रासिंग  : City Folk on November 16 , 2008 , in North America , and was released on December 5 , 2008 , in Europe .
The Wii Speak accessory is succeeded   by the embedded microphone on the Wii U 's GamePad controller .
Nissan Intelligent  key®
A smart key is an electronic access and authorization system  जिससे is उपलब्धियाँ  as an option or standard in several cars .
It was first developed by Siemens in the mid-1990s  और introduced by mercedes-benz अंतर्गत the नाम `` keyless  Go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17 , 1997 .
Univisión ( ) is a  spanish-language टेलीविज़न संजाल  in the United States .
The network is primarily  समर्पित लिये लैटिन  American families who reside in the United States .
It  रै the largest  audience of Spanish-language television viewers in the world according to Nielsen ratings .
Randy Falco , ( CEO as of June 29 , 2011 ) COO , has been in charge of the company since the departure of Univision  संचार अध्यक्ष और  CEO Joe Uva in April 2010 .
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major English-language television networks , and is often a strong fifth , outranking The CW , with some fourth-place weekly placings , and as of 2012 , even first place rankings for individual programs over  सब पाँच अंग्रेज़ी संजाल due to the संजाल 's सतत  schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year .
Univisión is headquartered in New York , and has its major  studios , उत्पादन सुविधाएं  , and operations in Doral , Florida , a suburb of Miami .
In 2009 , another television studio was announced , Univision Studios , to  be निर्मित in  Doral .
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country , with local stations in over 50 markets with large Hispanic and Latino populations and a national  केबल  network feed distributed in markets without either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station .
Most of these stations air full local news and other local programming in addition to network shows , and in major markets such as Los Angeles , New York , and Miami the local newscasts carried by the network 's owned-and-operated station ( O & O ) stations are equally competitive with their  english-language counterparts ratings-wise  .
Univisión was acquired on March 29 , 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's Saban Capital Group ( who had previously owned the entity Saban  entertainment ) , tpg पूंजी , l.P. , विधाता  Equity Partners , Madison Dearborn Partners , and Thomas H. Lee Partners for $ 13.7 billion or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt .
the buyout बाएँ the कम्पनी साथ a कर्ज़ स्तर  of twelve times its annual cash flow , which was twice the norm in buyouts done over the previous two years .
कलाकार 's धारणा  of a protoplanetary disk
The formation and of the Solar System is estimated to have begun 4.6 billion years ago with the gravitational collapse of a small  भाग  of a giant molecular cloud .
Most of the collapsing mass collected in the centre , forming the Sun , while the rest flattened into a protoplanetary disk out of which the planets , moons ,  क्षुद्रग्रह , और अन्य  small Solar System bodies formed .
This widely accepted model , known as the nebular hypothesis , was first developed in the 18th century by Emanuel  swedenborg , immanuel kant , और  Pierre-Simon Laplace .
Its subsequent development  रै interwoven  a variety of scientific disciplines including astronomy , physics , geology , and planetary science .
Since the dawn of the space age in the 1950s and the discovery of extrasolar planets in the 1990s , the model has been both challenged and refined to  खाता  for new observations .
The  सौर प्रणाली  has evolved considerably since its initial formation .
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas and dust around  उनके जनक ग्रह , जबकि अन्य moons हैं  thought to have formed independently and later been captured by their planets .
Still others , as the Earth 's Moon , may be the result  of दानव टक्करों .
Collisions  between लाशें have occurred continually  up to the present day and have been central to the evolution of the Solar System .
The positions of the  ग्रह  often shifted , and planets have switched places .
This planetary migration is now thought to have been responsible for much of the  सौर प्रणाली 's जल्दी  evolution .
In roughly 5 billion years , the Sun will cool and expand outward many times its current diameter ( becoming a red giant ) , before casting off its outer layers as a  ग्रहीय नीहारिका और leaving पीछे a तारकीय  remnant known as a white dwarf .
In the far distant  भविष्य  , the gravity of passing stars will gradually reduce the Sun 's retinue of planets .
कुछ ग्रह  will be destroyed , others ejected into interstellar space .
Ultimately , over the course of tens  of अरबों  of years , it is likely that the Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it .
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German title : ,  बाद as , और ) is a अनोखा  written by Franz Kafka in 1914 and 1915 but not published until 1925 .
One of Kafka 's best-known works , it tells the story of a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote , inaccessible authority , with the nature of his crime revealed to  neither उसे nor the रीडर  .
Like Kafka 's other novels , The Trial was never  समाप्त , हालांकि it  does include a chapter which brings the story to an end .
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies which exist within the novel , such as disparities in timing in addition to other discontinuities in narration   .
After Kafka 's  मौत in 1924  his friend and literary executor Max Brod edited the text for publication by Verlag Die Schmiede .
The original manuscript is held at the  संग्रहालय of आधुनिक साहित्य  , Marbach am Neckar , Germany .
In 1999 , the  किताब थी सूचीबद्ध in le mondes  100 Books of the Century and as No . 2 of the Best German Novels of the Twentieth Century .
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born March 11 , 1968 ) is an American  singer-songwriter और अभिनेत्री  .
She launched  उसके करियर in 1994 साथ the  song , `` Stay ( I Missed You ) `` , which was included in the film Reality Bites .
She was the first artist to have a number one single in the United States while not signed to a  रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध  .
Her five studio CDs include her major label debut , the gold-selling Tails and  its  follow-up , the Grammy-nominated , gold-selling Firecracker .
Loeb has also worked in  फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न  , voice-over work and children’s recordings .
Loeb has appeared in two television series ,  dweezil & लिसा , a साप्ताहिक  culinary adventure for the Food Network and Number 1 Single , a reality show on the E !
Network in 2006 focused on her  क्वेस्ट लिये प्रेम , कामयाबी  , career , and family .
Her children 's music includes  the  albums Catch the Moon ( 2003 ) , and Camp Lisa ( 2008 ) .
Her first joint children 's book and album Lisa Loeb 's Silly Sing-Along : The Disappointing Pancake and Other Zany Songs was  प्रकाशित  in 2011 .
In 2010 she founded the Lisa Loeb Eyewear Collection , which  is आधारित on उसके अपना डिजाइन  .
The Coat of arms of the State of New Jersey  शामिलs:
A shield with three plows emblazoned , representative of New Jersey 's agricultural  परंपरा  .
A   forward-facing knight 's helmet .
A  घोड़ा 's सिर  as the crest of the helmet .
The female figures Liberty and Ceres   , representative of the state 's motto ( see next item ) .
Liberty is holding a staff supporting a  `` स्वतंत्रता कैप `` ; ceres  is holding an overflowing cornucopia .
The streamer at the foot of the emblem contains the State Motto of  नई जर्सी , `` स्वतंत्रता और समृद्धि  '' , and the year of statehood , 1776 .
It was originally designed by Pierre Eugene du Simitiere  in 1777 और थी  modified slightly in 1928 .
The seal is the central motif in the  ध्वज of  New Jersey and the Great Seal of the State of New Jersey .
the कोट of बाहें contains a घोड़ा 's सिर .
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs itself accordingly and three plows on a shield referring to  the राज्य 's कृषि  tradition , giving it the nickname `` Garden State '' .
The two  देवियाँ  represent the State motto , `` Liberty and Prosperity '' .
Liberty is on  the बाएँ  .
She is holding a staff with a liberty  कैप on it , और the  word liberty underneath her .
The  देवी  on the right is Ceres , goddess of agriculture .
She is holding a cornucopia with  समृद्धि  written below her .
According to the minutes of the New Jersey General Assembly for March 11 , 1896 , the date in which the Assembly officially approved the flag as the state emblem , the buff color is due indirectly to George Washington , who had ordered on October 2 , 1779 , that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark  ( जर्सी ) ब्लू , साथ buff  facings .
Buff-colored facings had until then been reserved only for his own uniform  और those of अन्य  Continental generals and their aides .
Then , on February 28 , 1780 , the Continental War Officers in Philadelphia directed that the uniform coat facings of all regiments were to be the same as the background color of the  regiments  ' state flag .
The seal is  वर्णित in  New Jersey statute Title 52 , §2-1:
`` We Can Work It Out '' is a song by the Beatles , written by Paul  mccartney  and John Lennon .
It was released as a `` double  a-sided `` सिंगल साथ ``  Day Tripper `` , the first time both sides of a single were so designated in an initial release .
Both songs were recorded  दौरान  the Rubber Soul sessions .
The song is an example of Lennon–McCartney collaboration at a depth that happened only rarely after they wrote the hit singles  of 1963  .
This song , `` A Day in the Life `` , `` Baby , You 're a Rich Man `` and `` I  've मिला  a Feeling `` , are among the notable exceptions .
As a medical diagnosis , pedophilia or paedophilia is a psychiatric disorder in persons 16 years of age or older typically characterized by a primary or exclusive sexual interest toward prepubescent children ( generally age 11 years or younger , though specific diagnosis criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for  prepubescence to आयु  13 ) .
An adolescent who is 16 years of age or older must be at least five  सालो पुरानी than  the prepubescent child before the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia .
The term has a range of definitions , as found in psychiatry ,  मनोविज्ञान , the देशी , और  law enforcement .
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD )  defines  pedophilia as a `` disorder of adult personality and behaviour '' in which there is a sexual preference for children of prepubertal or early pubertal age .
According to  the निदान और सांख्यिकीय हस्तचालित of दिमागी विकार ( dsm ) , it is a paraphilia in जिससे वयस्कों or adolescents 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी have तीव्र और तूल यौन प्रेरणाएं towards और कल्पनाओं परिचय prepubescent children कि वे have either acted on or जिससे कारण उन्हें तकलीफ or interpersonal परेशानी .
In popular usage ,  pedophilia अर्थात् कोई यौन  interest in children or the act of child sexual abuse , often termed `` pedophilic behavior '' .
For example , The American Heritage Stedman 's Medical Dictionary states , `` Pedophilia  is the अधिनियम or काल्पनिक on the भाग of an वयस्क  of engaging in sexual activity with a child or children . ''
This common use application also extends to the sexual interest in and sexual contact with  रोमिल  or post-pubescent minors .
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although  लोगों जो कमिट चाइल्ड यौन गाली commonly प्रदर्शनी the विकार  , some offenders do not meet the clinical diagnosis standards for pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents .
Additionally , not all  pedophiles  actually commit such abuse .
Pedophilia was first formally recognized and  नामित  in the late 19th century .
A significant amount of  शोध in the  area has taken place since the 1980s .
Although mostly documented in men , there are also women who exhibit the disorder , and  शोधकर्ताओं assume उपलब्धियाँ  estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles .
No cure  लिये pedophilia रै  been developed , but there are therapies that can reduce the incidence of a person committing child sexual abuse .
In the United States , following Kansas v. Hendricks , sex offenders who are diagnosed with certain mental disorders , particularly pedophilia , can be subject to indefinite civil commitment , under various state laws ( generically  पुकारा svp कानून ) और the  federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 .
at उपस्थित  , the exact causes of pedophilia have not been conclusively established .
Research suggests that pedophilia may be correlated with several different neurological abnormalities , and often co-exists with other personality disorders and  मनोवैज्ञानिक pathologies  .
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement , a variety of typologies have been  सुझाया to categorize pedophiles  according to behavior and motivations .
Julio César  chávez ( born जूलियो césar chávez gonzález on जुलाई 12 , 1962  ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer .
Chávez is considered by many  लोगों लिये  their sport statistics the greatest fighter ever to come out of Mexico .
He is a six-time world  champion  in three weight divisions , and for several years he was considered one of the best pound-for-pound boxer in the world .
In a career that spanned over 25 years , Chávez won five world titles in three weight divisions  : wbc सुपर featherweight in 1984 , wba lightweight  in 1987 , WBC Lightweight in 1988 , WBC Light Welterweight in 1989 , IBF Light Welterweight in 1990 , and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994 .
He holds records for most  कामयाब लगातार defenses  of world titles ( 27 ) , most title fights ( 37 ) , most title-fight victories ( 31 ) and he is after Joe Louis with ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ) .
Chávez also has the longest undefeated streak in boxing history , 13  सालो  .
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss to Frankie  रान्डेल और था an 87 लड़ो  win streak until his `` draw '' with Whitaker .
Julio César  chávez थी ज्ञात  for his outstanding punching power , devastating body attack , remarkably strong chin and the relentless stalking of his opponents .
He ranks # 24 on ESPN 's 50 Greatest  मुक्केबाज of  All Time .
On December 7 , 2010 , he was  inducted in the  prestigious International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011 .
He is the father of prospect Omar Chávez  और पूर्व  WBC Middleweight Champion Julio César Chávez , Jr .
`` Selektion `` on the Judenrampe , Auschwitz ,  may/june  1944 .
To be sent to the right meant slave labor ; to the  बाएँ ,  the gas chamber .

The Holocaust ( from the Greek ' : hólos , `` whole '' and kaustós , `` burnt '' )  भी ज्ञात as the shoah ( यहूदी : , hashoah , `` प्रलय '' ; यहूदी  : , Churben or Hurban , from the Hebrew for `` destruction '' ) , was the mass murder or genocide of approximately six million Jews during World War II , a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany , led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party , throughout German-occupied territory .
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in Europe before  the holocaust , लगभग two-thirds  were killed .
Over one million Jewish children were killed in the Holocaust , as were approximately two million Jewish  महिलाओं और तीन  million Jewish men .
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany  और german-occupied territory यहूद  used to concentrate , hold , and kill Jews and other victims .
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included in the definition , and some use the common noun `` holocaust '' to describe other Nazi mass murders , including those of Soviet prisoners of war , Polish and Soviet  नागरिकों , और homosexuals  .
Recent estimates based on figures obtained since the fall of the Soviet Union indicates some ten to eleven million civilians and prisoners of war were  intentionally murdered by the नाजी शासन .
The  persecution और नरसंहार  were carried out in stages .
Various laws to remove the Jews from civil society , most prominently the Nuremberg Laws , were   enacted in Germany years before the outbreak of World War II .
विशेषज्ञता शिविरों यहूद स्थापित  in which inmates were subjected to slave labor until they died of exhaustion or disease .
Where Germany conquered new territory in eastern Europe , specialized units called Einsatzgruppen murdered Jews and  राजनैतिक प्रतिद्वंद्वियों in द्रव्यमान  shootings .
The occupiers required Jews and Romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos before being transported by freight train to extermination camps where , if they survived the journey , most  यहूद systematically मारे  in gas chambers .
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was  शामिल  in the logistics that led to the genocides , turning the Third Reich into what one Holocaust scholar has called `` a genocidal state '' .
4-H in the United States is a youth organization administered by the National Institute of Food and Agriculture  of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए  ) , with the mission of `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development . ''
the नाम represents चार निजी  development areas of focus for the organization : head , heart , hands , and health .
The organization has over 6.5 million members in the United States , from  आयु पाँच to twenty-one  , in approximately 90,000 clubs .
The goal of 4-H is to develop citizenship , leadership , responsibility and life skills of youth through experiential learning programs and  a धनात्मक युवावस्था विकास  approach .
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally focused organization as a result of its history , 4-H today  focuses on नागरिकता , स्वस्थ जीना  , science , engineering , and technology programs .
Today , 4-H and related programs  मौजूद in over अस्सी देशों  around the world ; the organization and administration varies from country to country .
Each of these programs operates independently , but cooperatively through international exchanges , global education programs , and communications   .
The  4-h motto is `` to मेक the बेहतरीन  better '' , while its slogan is `` Learn by doing '' ( sometimes written as `` Learn to do by doing '' ) .
The national flag of Chile , consists of two unequal horizontal bands of white and red and a blue  वर्गाकार the वही ऊँचाई as the श्वेत बैंड in the कैण्टन  , which bears a white five-pointed star in the center .
It was adopted  on 18 अक्तूबर  1817 .
The Chilean flag is also  ज्ञात in स्पेनी as  La Estrella Solitaria ( The Lone Star ) .
The star represents a guide to progress and honor ; blue symbolizes the sky and the Pacific Ocean , white is for the snow-covered Andes , and red stands  लिये the  blood spilled to achieve independence .
According to the epic poem  la araucana  , the colors were derived from those from the flag flown by the Mapuche during the Arauco War .
`` Flag Day ''  is आयोजित  each year on the ninth of July to commemorate the 77 soldiers who died in the 1882 Battle of La Concepción .
पीढी y , भी  known as the Millennial Generation , is the demographic cohort following Generation X .
There are no  precise तिथियाँ लिये जब  Generation Y starts and ends .
Commentators use beginning birth dates from the latter 1970s , or from  the जल्दी 1980s  to the early 2000s .

According to  tacitus  , Nero targeted Christians as those responsible for the fire .
The Great Fire of Rome ( ) was an urban fire that occurred  शुरूआत  19 July AD 64 .
Virginia ( ) , officially the Commonwealth of Virginia , is a U.S. state located in the South Atlantic   region of the United States .
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the `` Mother of  राष्ट्रपतियों  '' after the eight U.S. presidents born there .
The geography and climate of  the राष्ट्रमंडल हैं तराशा by the ब्लू  Ridge Mountains and the Chesapeake Bay , which provide habitat for much of its flora and fauna .
The capital of the  राष्ट्रमंडल is रिचमंड  ; and Virginia Beach is the most populous city .
Fairfax County is the most  populous  political subdivision .
The wealthiest is Loudoun  काउंटी  .
The Commonwealth 's population is  over  eight million .
The area 's history begins with several   indigenous groups , including the Powhatan .
In 1607 the London Company established  the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया  as the first permanent New World English colony .
Slave labor and the land acquired  from  displaced Native American tribes each played a significant role in the colony 's early politics and plantation economy .
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in the American  Revolution and joined  the Confederacy in the American Civil War , during which Richmond was made the Confederate capital and Virginia 's northwestern counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia .
Although the Commonwealth was under conservative single-party rule for nearly a century following Reconstruction , both major  नेशनल पार्टियों हैं प्रतिस्पर्धी in आधुनिक वर्जिनिया  .
The Virginia General Assembly is the oldest legislature in the Western  गोलार्ध .
The state government has been repeatedly  क्रमित  most effective by the Pew Center on the States .
it is अद्वितीय in कैसा it ट्रीट शहरों  and counties equally , manages local roads , and prohibits its governors from serving consecutive terms .
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal agencies in Northern  वर्जिनिया , सहित the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of रक्षा  and CIA ; and military facilities in Hampton Roads , the site of the region 's main seaport .
Virginia 's public schools and many colleges and universities have contributed to  growing  media and technology sectors .
As a result ,  कंप्यूटर चिप्स have  become the state 's leading export .
Windows Movie Maker ( formerly known  as खिड़कियाँ सजीव फिल्म मेकर  , codenamed Sundance ) is a freeware video editing software by Microsoft .
It is a part of Windows Essentials  तन्त्र  suite and offers the ability to create and edit videos as well as to publish them on SkyDrive , Facebook , YouTube , and Flickr .
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single  by तुपाक shakur , और दसवाँ track  from his debut album , 2Pacalypse Now .
The song , which  सुविधाएँ r & b सिंगर डेव hollister , is  about a twelve year-old girl named Brenda who lives in a ghetto , has a baby , and is incapable of supporting it .
The song explores the issue  of टीन गर्भावस्था  and its effect on the young mothers and their families .
Like many of Shakur 's songs , ``  ब्रेंडा 's मिला a baby '' draws  from the plight of the impoverished .
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in general , Shakur criticises the low level of support from the baby 's father , the government , and  society in  general .
Shakur wrote the song when he read a newspaper article about a twelve-year-old girl who got pregnant from her cousin and , because she did  नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to जान परिचय the baby ,  threw it in a trash can .
the आधिकारिक लोगो  of Pokémon for its international release ; `` Pokémon '' is short for the original Japanese title of `` Pocket Monsters '' .
is a media  मताधिकार प्रकाशित  and owned by Japanese video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996 .
Originally released as a pair of interlinkable Game Boy role-playing video games developed by Game Freak , Pokémon has since become the second-most successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world , behind only  Nintendo  's own Mario franchise .
Pokémon properties have since been merchandised into  दुश्मनी , manga , व्यापार  cards , toys , books , and other media .
The  मताधिकार मनाये in 2006 , और , संचयी  sales of the video games ( including home console versions , such as the `` Pikachu '' Nintendo 64 ) have reached more than 200 million copies .
In November 2005 , 4Kids Entertainment ,  जिससे था प्रबंधित the non-game सम्बन्धित लाइसेंसिंग  of Pokémon , announced that it had agreed not to renew the Pokémon representation agreement .
Pokémon USA Inc. ( now The Pokémon Company International ) , a subsidiary of Japan 's  पोकीमॉन co. , अभी  oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia .
The  नाम पोकीमॉन is  the romanized contraction of the Japanese brand .
The term Pokémon , in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself , also collectively refers to the 649 fictional species that have made appearances in Pokémon media as of the release of the fifth generation titles Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 ; with the upcoming releases of Pokémon X and Y , 6 new Pokémon have  been featured in promotions for  the games .
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and plural , as is each individual species name ; it is grammatically correct to say `` one Pokémon '' and `` many Pokémon '' , as well as  `` एक pikachu `` और `` अनेक pikachu  '' .
Cover of the first edition of the publication Dada  by  Tristan Tzara ; Zurich , 1917
Dada ( ) or Dadaism was an art movement of the European avant-garde in the early 20th  century  .
अनेक अर्जी दादा began in  Zurich , Switzerland in 1916 , spreading to Berlin shortly thereafter but the height of New York Dada was the year before in 1915 .
To quote Dona Budd 's The Language of Art  ज्ञान , दादा थी born आउट of  negative reaction to the horrors of World War I .
This international movement was begun by a group of artist and poets  संबद्ध  with the Cabaret Voltaire in Zurich .
Dada  अस्वीकृत कारण  and logic , prizing nonsense , irrationality and intuition .
The origin of the name Dada is unclear ; some believe  कि it is a nonsensical शब्द .
Others maintain that it originates from the Romanian artists Tristan Tzara and Marcel Janco 's frequent use of  the शब्द da , da ,  meaning yes , yes in the Romanian language .
Another theory says that the name `` Dada '' came during a  बैठक of the समूह जब a पेपर चाकू stuck  into a French-German dictionary happened to point to 'dada ' , a French word for 'hobbyhorse ' .
The movement primarily involved visual arts , literature , poetry , art manifestoes , art theory , theatre , and graphic design , and concentrated its anti-war politics through  a अस्वीकृति of the प्रचलित मानकों in आर्ट  through anti-art cultural works .
In addition to being anti-war , Dada was also  anti- बुर्जुआ और था राजनैतिक  affinities with the radical left .
Dada activities included public gatherings , demonstrations , and publication  of art/literary  journals ; passionate coverage of art , politics , and culture were topics often discussed in a variety of media .
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball , Emmy Hennings , Hans Arp , Raoul Hausmann , Hannah Höch , Johannes Baader , Tristan Tzara , Francis Picabia , Richard Huelsenbeck , Georg Grosz ,  जॉन heartfield , मार्सल duchamp , beatrice लकडी  , Kurt Schwitters , and Hans Richter , among others .
The movement  बहकावे बाद शैलियाँ  like the avant-garde and downtown music movements , and groups including surrealism , Nouveau réalisme , pop art and Fluxus .
Dada is the groundwork to abstract art and sound poetry , a starting point for  प्रदर्शन आर्ट , a prelude to postmodernism , an  influence on pop art , a celebration of antiart to be later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism .
पहला  trophic level .
The plants in this image ,  और  the algae and phytoplankton in the lake , are primary producers .
They take nutrients from the soil or the water , and manufacture their own food by photosynthesis ,  using उर्जा इससे the सूर्य  .
The trophic level of an organism  is the  position it occupies in a food chain .
The word trophic derives from the  यूनानी τροφή ( trophē ) referring  to food or feeding .
A food chain represents a succession of organisms that eat another  सजीव और  are , in turn , eaten themselves .
The number of steps an organism is from the start of the chain is a  माप  of its trophic level .
Food chains start at trophic  स्तर 1 साथ प्राथमिक  producers such as plants , move to herbivores at level 2 , predators at level 3 and typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5 .
The path along the chain can form either a one-way flow , or a  खाना `` वेब  . ''
Ecological  समुदायों  with higher biodiversity form more complex trophic paths .
Four of  the  most important domesticated silk moths .
Top to bottom : Bombyx mori ,  hyalophora  cecropia , Antheraea pernyi , Samia cynthia .
From Meyers  konversations-lexikon  ( 1885-1892 )
A silk-producing  raspy  cricket .
Silk is a natural protein  fibre , कुछ  forms of which can be woven into textiles .
The protein fibre of silk is composed mainly of fibroin and  उत्पादित by  certain insect larvae to form cocoons .
The best-known type of silk is obtained from the cocoons of  the लार्वे of the शहतूत silkworm  Bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture ) .
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to the triangular prism -like structure of the silk fibre , which allows silk cloth to refract incoming light at different angles , thus   producing different colors .
Silks are produced by several other insects , but generally only the silk of moth caterpillars has been used for textile  निर्माण  .
There has been some research  into अन्य silks , जिससे  differ at the molecular level .
Many silks are mainly produced by the larvae of  कीट  undergoing complete metamorphosis , but some adult insects such as webspinners produce silk , and some insects such as raspy crickets produce silk throughout their lives .
Silk production also occurs in Hymenoptera ( bees , wasps , and ants ) , silverfish , mayflies ,  thrips , leafhoppers , भृंग , lacewings  , fleas , flies and midges .
Other types of arthropod produce silk , most notably various arachnids such as spiders ( see   spider silk ) .
लेट दिखाएँ साथ दाउद लेटरमैन is an अमरीकी late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by दाउद लेटरमैन on सीबीएस .
The show debuted  on August  30 , 1993 , and is produced by Letterman 's production company , Worldwide Pants Incorporated .
The show 's music director and band-leader of the house band ,  the सीबीएस ऑर्केस्ट्रा , is  Paul Shaffer .
The head  लेखक is मैट  Roberts and the announcer is Alan Kalter .
Of the  प्रमुख u.S. late-night  programs , Late Show ranks second in cumulative average viewers over time and third in number of episodes over time .
The  दिखाएँ लीड अन्य लेट  night shows in ad revenue with $ 271 million in 2009 .
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time , but is recorded Monday through   Wednesday at 4:30 p.m. , and Thursdays at 3:30 p.m and 6:00 p.m .
The second  गुरुवार  episode usually airs on Friday of that week .
In 2002 , Late Show with David  लेटरमैन  was ranked No . 7 on TV Guide 's 50 Greatest TV Shows of All Time .
CBS has a contract  साथ विश्वव्यापी पैंट to continue the  show through 2014 ; by then , Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host .
The Real Housewives of Orange County is an  अमरीकी वास्तविकता वृत्तचित्र  television program on Bravo , set in Orange County , California .
It was  the पहला  The Real Housewives program in the series .
The series is a voyeuristic look into the wealthy lives of these  housewives , as वे  shop , get plastic surgery , gossip , fight and live lavishly .
The financial crisis , the beginning of which coincided almost exactly with the first  ऋतु 's  broadcast , has since trimmed the housewives ' lifestyles with job losses , evictions , mortgage defaults , foreclosures , and marital stress—all recorded in progressive seasons of the show .
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or other electronic means to  stalk or  harass an individual , a group of individuals , or an organization .
It may include the  बनाना of गलत आरोपों  or statements of fact ( as in defamation ) , monitoring , making threats , identity theft , damage to data or equipment , the solicitation of minors for sex , or gathering information that may be used to harass .
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a reasonable person , in  कब्ज़ा of the वही सूचना , होता  regard it as sufficient to cause another reasonable person distress .
Cyberstalking is different from spatial or offline  stalking in  that it occurs through the use of electronic communications technology such as the internet .
However , it  sometimes  leads to it , or is accompanied by it .
Both are criminal  offenses  .
Cyberstalking shares important  विशेषताएँ  with offline stalking .
Many stalkers – online or  बंद – हैं  motivated by a desire to control their victims .
A cyberstalker may be an online stranger or a person whom the target  knows  .
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit involvement of other people online who do not even  जान the निशाना  .
Cyberstalking is  a दण्ड ठोकर  that comes into play under state anti-stalking laws , slander laws , and harassment laws .
A  cyberstalking conviction can परिणाम  in a restraining order , probation , or even criminal penalties against the assailant , including jail .
A business letter is usually used when writing from   one company to another , or for correspondence between such organizations and their customers , clients and other external parties .
The overall style of letter will depend on the  संबंध  between the parties concerned .
There  हैं अनेक कारण  to write a business letter .
It could be to request direct information or action from another party , to order supplies  इससे a प्रदायक , to पहचानो a  mistake that was committed , to reply directly to a request , to apologize for a wrong or simply to convey goodwill .
Even today , the business letter is still very useful because it produces a permanent record  , is गोपनीय , औपचारिक  and delivers persuasive , well-considered messages .
Tilapia ( ) is the common name for nearly a hundred species  of cichlid मछली इससे the tilapiine cichlid जनजाति  .
tilapia हैं मुख्यतः freshwater  fish , inhabiting shallow streams , ponds , rivers and lakes , and less commonly found living in brackish water .
Historically , they have been of  प्रमुख महत्व in कारीगर  fishing in Africa and the Levant , and are of increasing importance in aquaculture .
Tilapia can become  समस्यापूर्ण हृदयरोग प्रजाति in  new warm-water habitats , whether deliberately or accidentally introduced , but generally not in temperate climates due to their inability to survive in cooler waters below about .
Turner & Hooch is a 1989 comedy drama crime film starring Tom Hanks and Beasley the Dog as the eponymous characters , Turner and  hooch  respectively .
The film also stars Mare Winningham ,  क्रेग T. नेल्सन  , and Reginald VelJohnson .
It was directed by Roger Spottiswoode ; the film was originally slated to be directed by  हेनरी  Winkler , but he was terminated due to `` creative differences '' .
It was  co-written by माइकल blodgett  from Beyond the Valley of the Dolls fame .
Although K-9 ( with James Belushi ) was released prior to this film ( exactly three months earlier ) , Turner & Hooch became more popular and seemingly overshadowed its  वृहद कामयाबी , भी हालांकि k-9 था a बहुत  similar plot .
A pilot for a Turner &  hooch tv श्रेणी थी बना  and ran as a part of The Magical World of Disney .
