Adolf Hitler ( ; 20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945 ) was an Austrian -born German  राजनेता और the नेता of the नाजी पार्टी (  ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ) .
He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator  of  Nazi Germany ( as Führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945 .
Hitler was at the centre of Nazi Germany ,  संसार युद्ध ii  in Europe , and the Holocaust .
Hitler was a decorated  दिग्गज  of World War I .
He joined the German Workers ' Party ( precursor of the NSDAP )  in 1919 , और became नेता of  the NSDAP in 1921 .
In 1923 , he  attempted a तख्तापलट  d'état in Munich , known as the Beer Hall Putsch .
The failed coup resulted  in हिटलर 's कारावास , दौरान  which time he wrote his memoir , Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ) .
After his release in 1924 , Hitler gained popular support by attacking the Treaty  of Versailles  and promoting Pan-Germanism , antisemitism , and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda .
After his appointment as chancellor in 1933 , he transformed the Weimar Republic into the Third Reich  , a single-party  dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism .
Hitler 's aim was to establish a New Order of absolute Nazi German  आधिपत्य  in continental Europe .
To this end , his foreign and domestic policies had the aim of seizing Lebensraum ( `` living space '' ) for  the germanic  people .
He directed the   rearmament of Germany and the invasion of Poland by the Wehrmacht in September 1939 , resulting in the outbreak of World War II in Europe .
Under Hitler 's rule , in 1941 German  शक्तियां और उनके यूरोपीय allies occupied  most of Europe and North Africa .
In 1943 , Germany had been forced onto the defensive and suffered a series  of escalating defeats .
In the final days of the war , during the Battle of Berlin in 1945 , Hitler married his  long-time संगी , एवा  Braun .
On 30 April 1945 , less than two days later ,   the two committed suicide to avoid capture by the Red Army , and their corpses were burned .
Hitler 's aggressive foreign policy  is माना the प्रमुख कारण of  the outbreak of World War II in Europe .
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated ideology resulted in the deaths of at least 5.5 million Jews , and millions of other people  deemed racially  inferior .
अंगूठा
A domain name is an  पहचान स्ट्रिंग कि  defines a realm of administrative autonomy , authority , or control on the Internet .
Domain names are formed by  the  rules and procedures of the Domain Name System ( DNS ) .
Technically  , कोई नाम पंजीकृत  in the DNS is a domain name .
डोमेन names  are used in various networking contexts and application-specific naming and addressing purposes .
In general , a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource , such as a personal computer used to access the Internet , a server computer hosting  a वेब साईट  , or the web site itself or any other service communicated via the Internet .
Domain names are organized in subordinate  स्तर ( subdomains  ) of the DNS root domain , which is nameless .
The first-level set of domain names are the top-level domains ( TLDs ) , including the generic top-level  डोमेन ( gtlds  ) , such as the prominent domains com , info , net and org , and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ) .
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for reservation by end-users who wish to connect local area networks  to the अंतरजाल ,  create other publicly accessible Internet resources or run web sites .
The registration of these domain names is usually administered by domain  नाम registrars जो बेचें उनके  services to the public .
A fully qualified domain name ( FQDN ) is a domain name  कि is completely निर्दिष्ट  in the hierarchy of the DNS , having no omitted parts .
Domain names are usually written in lowercase , although labels  in the  Domain Name System are case-insensitive .
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with the molecular formula NO3− and a molecular mass of  62.0049 g/mol . nitrates  also describe the organic functional group RONO2 .
These nitrate esters  हैं a  specialized class of explosives .
A wheat  कटाई  in Idaho
इस फ़ोटो  from a 1921 encyclopedia shows a tractor ploughing a crop field .
Agriculture is a major industry in the  संयुक्त राज्य और the देश is  a net exporter of food .
As of the last census of agriculture in 2007 , there were 2.2   million farms , covering an area of , an average of per farm .
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states ,  it is विशेषकर  concentrated in the vast expanse of flat , arable land known as the Great Plains , which encompasses the central region of the nation .
The Mpemba effect , named after Tanzanian student Erasto Mpemba , is the assertion that warmer water  can  freeze faster than colder water .
Although there is anecdotal  support लिये the  effect , there is no agreement on exactly what the effect is and under what circumstances it occurs .
There have been reports of similar phenomena since  प्राचीन  times , although with insufficient detail for the claims to be replicated .
The phenomenon seems contrary to  ऊष्मागतिकी  , but a number of possible explanations for the effect have been proposed .
Further investigations will need to decide on a  precise परिभाषा of  `` freezing '' and control a vast number of starting parameters in order to confirm or explain the effect .
The Siamese ( , ) is one of the first  distinctly पहचाना  breeds of Oriental cat .
The breed  originated in थाईलैंड ( formerly  known as Siam ) , where they are one of several native breeds and are called Wichian Mat ( วิเชียรมาศ , a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ) .
In the 20th century the Siamese cat  became एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय  breeds in Europe and North America .
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue , Washington , with 64 stores in the Puget Sound region of Washington state and in the  पोर्टलैंड , ऑरेगॉन महानगर  area .
In economics , the money supply or money stock , is the total amount of  मौद्रिक एसेट उपलब्धियाँ in an  economy at a specific time .
There are several ways to define `` money , '' but standard measures usually  शामिल करेंसी in परिसंचरण और माँग  deposits ( depositors ' easily accessed assets on the books of financial institutions ) .
Money  सप्लाई  data are recorded and published , usually by the government or the central bank of the country .
Public and private sector  विश्लेषकों have long monitored परिवर्तन  in money supply because of its effects on the price level , inflation , the exchange rate and the business cycle .
That relation between money and prices is  historically  associated with the quantity theory of money .
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct relation between  money-supply  growth and long-term price inflation , at least for rapid increases in the amount of money in the economy .
That is , a country such as Zimbabwe which saw rapid increases in its money supply also saw rapid increases in  कीमतें ( hyperinflation  ) .
This  is एक कारण लिये the रिलायंस on मौद्रिक नीति as a अर्थात् of controlling महंगाई .
The nature of  इस causal  chain is the subject of contention .
Some heterodox economists argue that the money supply is endogenous ( determined by the workings of the  अर्थव्यवस्था , नहीं by the सेंट्रल बैंको ) और कि the स्त्रोत  of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the economy .
In addition , those economists seeing the central bank 's control over the money supply as feeble say that  वहीँ हैं दो कमजोर  links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate .
First , in the aftermath of a recession , when many resources are underutilized , an increase in the money supply can cause a sustained increase in real production instead of   inflation .
Second , if the velocity of  धन , i.e.  , the ratio between nominal GDP and money supply , changes , an increase in the money supply could have either no effect , an exaggerated effect , or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP .
लोगो लिये  IMAX .
Warren Theatre IMAX cinema , Wichita ,  कान्सास  , USA , 601 seats .
A comparison between 35 mm and 15/70  mm ऋणात्मक  areas .
IMAX  ( an संक्षिप्त  for Image Maximum ) is a motion picture film format and a set of cinema projection standards created by the Canadian company IMAX Corporation .
IMAX has the capacity to record and display images of far  वृहद आकार और रेज़ोल्यूशन  than conventional film systems .
चूंकि 2002 , कुछ विशेषता  films have been converted ( or upgraded ) into IMAX format for display in IMAX theatres and some have also been partially shot in IMAX .
IMAX is the most  widely प्रयुक्त प्रणाली लिये special-venue  film presentations .
, there are 697  imax थिएटर  in 52 countries .
Today 's Special is a Canadian children 's  टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ उत्पादित by क्लाइव vanderburgh  at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987 .
It  भी भागा on निकलोडियन  and the Faith and Values Channel/Odyssey ( now the Hallmark Channel ) as well as many PBS stations throughout the United States .
It was set in a department store , based on the flagship location of the now  defunct  Simpson 's in Toronto .
Many sequences for it were shot at the Queen Street West  और yonge गली  store after hours .
Constitutionalism , in its most general meaning , is `` a complex of ideas , attitudes , and patterns of behavior elaborating the principle that the authority of government derives  from and is limited by a  body of fundamental law '' .
A political organization is constitutional to the extent that it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of power  कंट्रोल लिये the सुरक्षा of the रूचि  and liberties of the citizenry , including those that may be in the minority `` .
As described by   political scientist and constitutional scholar David Fellman :
An ice-cream headache , also known as brain freeze ,  cold-stimulus सिरदर्द ,  or its given scientific name sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( meaning `` nerve pain of the sphenopalatine ganglion `` ) , is a form of brief cranial pain or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops .
It is caused by having something cold touch the roof of the mouth ( palate ) , and is believed to result from a  तंत्रिका जवाब causing रैपिड constriction  and swelling of blood vessels or a `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the head .
The rate of intake for cold foods has  महरूम पढ़ाई  as a contributing factor .
There are people who can not experience `` brain freeze '' or  समान लक्षण  .
The term ice-cream headache has  महरूम in उपयोग चूंकि  at least 31 January 1937 , contained in a journal entry by Rebecca Timbres published in the 1939 book We did n't ask Utopia : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia .
The first published  उपयोग of the पद दिमाग  freeze , as it pertains to cold-induced headaches , was on 27 May 1991 .
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s   '' rather than `` z '' ) is a Scots poem written by Robert Burns in 1788 and set to the tune of a traditional folk song ( Roud # 6294 ) .
It is well known in many countries , especially in the English-speaking world ; its traditional use being to celebrate the start of the New Year  at the  stroke of midnight .
By extension , it  is भी सुंग at अंत्येष्टि  , graduations and as a farewell or ending to other occasions .
The international Boy Scout youth movement  ,  in many countries , uses it as a close to jamborees and other functions .
The song 's Scots title  may be अनूदित into अंग्रेज़ी वस्तुतः as `` बूढ़ा  long since '' , or more idiomatically , `` long long ago '' , `` days gone by '' or `` old times '' .
Consequently `` For  auld लैंग syne '' ,  as it appears in the first line of the chorus , might be loosely translated as `` for ( the sake of ) old times '' .
The phrase  `` auld लैंग  Syne '' is also used in similar poems by Robert Ayton ( 1570–1638 ) , Allan Ramsay ( 1686–1757 ) , and James Watson ( 1711 ) as well as older folk songs predating Burns .
Matthew  fitt उपयोग  the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne '' as the equivalent of `` Once upon a time ...
`` in his retelling of fairy tales in the   Scots language .
Ben Schulz , player of Leeroy Jenkins at BlizzCon  2007
Leeroy Jenkins , sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins and   often elongated with numerous additional letters , is an Internet meme named for a player character created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG , World of Warcraft .
The character  became लोकप्रिय  due to a video of the game that circulated around the Internet .
The phenomenon has since spread beyond the boundaries of the gaming  जातियाँ into अन्य  online and mainstream media .
Oscar Grant was fatally shot by BART police officer Johannes Mehserle in Oakland , California  , संयुक्त राज्य , in the जल्दी morning घंटों of नई  Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to  रिपोर्ट्स of a लड़ो on a भीड़ खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल रैपिड पारगमन ट्रैन  returning from San Francisco , BART Police officers detained Oscar Grant and several other passengers on the platform at the Fruitvale BART Station .
अधिकारी योहानेस  Mehserle and another officer were restraining Grant , who was prostrate and allegedly resisting arrest .
Officer  mehserle  stood and , according to witnesses , said : `` Get back , I 'm gon na tase him . ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant once in the back ; Mehserle appeared stunned , put his hands to his  सिर और exclaimed  , `` Oh , my God ! ''
During his court testimony , Mehserle said that Grant then  exclaimed  , `` You shot me ! ''
Grant turned out to be unarmed ; he was  सुनाया मुर्दे the अगला morning at highland हॉस्पिटल  in Oakland .
The events were captured on  अनेक  digital video and cell phone cameras .
the फुटेज थी disseminated to  media outlets and to various websites , where it was watched millions of times .
the following दिनों देखी दोनो शांतिपूर्ण और हिंसक विरोध  .
The shooting has been variously labeled an involuntary  manslaughter  and a summary execution .
On January 13 , Alameda County prosecutors charged Mehserle with murder for the  शूटिंग  .
He resigned   his position and pleaded not guilty .
The trial began   on June 10 , 2010 .
Michael Rains ,  mehserle 's दण्ड रक्षा attorney , argued कि mehserle  mistakenly shot Grant with his pistol , intending to use his Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband .
Pretrial filings argue that his client did not commit first-degree murder and asked a Los Angeles judge to instruct the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder or  acquittal  .
Oakland civil rights attorney John  burris दायर a $ 25 लाख  wrongful death claim against BART on behalf of Grant 's family .
On July 8 , 2010 , the jury returned its verdict : Mehserle was found guilty of involuntary   manslaughter and not guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter .
Initial protests against the  सत्ताधारी यहूद शांतिपूर्वक व्यवस्थित  ; looting , arson , destruction of property , and small riots broke out after dark .
nearly  80 people were eventually arrested .
On Friday , July 9 , 2010 , the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil rights case against Mehserle ;  the संघीय सरकारी can prosecute उसे independently  for the same act under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy .
The  विभाग of इंसाफ होगा be working साथ the u.S.  Attorney 's office in San Francisco and the FBI .
On November 5 , 2010 , Mehserle was sentenced to two  सालो , ऋण  time served .
He served his  समय in the लॉस एंजिल्स  County Jail , occupying a private cell away from other prisoners .
He  थी released  on June 13 , 2011 and is now on parole .
Major  प्रतिनिधि  of the Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem Renaissance was a cultural  गति  that spanned the 1920s .
at the समय , it थी ज्ञात as the `` नई नीग्रो गति '' , नामित बाद the 1925 anthology by alain locke  .
Though it was centered in the Harlem neighborhood of New York City , many  french-speaking ब्लैक लेखक  from African and Caribbean colonies who lived in Paris were also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance .
The Harlem Renaissance is unofficially recognized to  have spanned इससे परिचय 1919  until the early or mid-1930s .
Many of  इसके विचार  lived on much longer .
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '' , as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem Renaissance , was placed between 1924 ( the year that  अवसर : a जर्नल of नीग्रो जीवन hosted a पार्टी लिये ब्लैक लेखक जहाँ  many white publishers were in attendance ) and 1929 ( the year of the stock market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ) .
African States between 500  bce और  1500 CE
Obelisk at temple of  लक्सर , मिश्र  .
c. 1200  BCE .
African  नाईट  of Baguirmi in full padded armour suit .
The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of Africa and the emergence of Homo sapiens in East Africa , continuing into the present as a patchwork of diverse and  नीतियां  developing nation states .
Some  जल्दी प्रमाण  of agriculture in Africa dates from 16,000 BCE , and metallurgy from about 4000 BCE .
The recorded history of early civilization  arose in मिश्र , और बाद  in Nubia , the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa .
During the Middle Ages , Islam  स्प्रेड through  the regions .
क्रासिंग  the Maghreb and the Sahel , a major center of Muslim culture was Timbuktu .
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture , Mali Empire , Ashanti Empire , Kingdom of  mapungubwe , किंगडम of ज्या , किंगडम of saloum , किंगडम of baol  , Kingdom of Zimbabwe , Kingdom of Kongo , Ancient Carthage , Numidia , Mauretania , the Aksumite Empire , the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate .
From  the लेट 15th सदी , europeans  and Arabs took slaves from West , Central and Southeast Africa overseas in the African slave trade .
European colonization of Africa developed rapidly in the Scramble for Africa of the  लेट 19th और जल्दी 20th  centuries .
Following struggles for independence in many parts of the continent , as  खूब as a weakened यूरोपीय बाद the दूसरी  World War ; decolonization took place .
Africa 's history has been challenging for  शोधकर्ताओं in the फ़ील्ड of  African studies because of the scarcity of written sources in large parts of sub-Saharan Africa .
Scholarly techniques such as the recording of oral history , historical linguistics , archaeology and genetics  have  been crucial .
Curry Foley was the first player in  प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल  history to hit for the cycle .
In baseball , hitting for the cycle is the accomplishment of one  बैटर hitting a सिंगल  , a double , a triple , and a home run in the same game .
Collecting the  हिट्स in  that order is known as a `` natural cycle '' .
Cycles are uncommon in  प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल  ( MLB ) , and have occurred 294 times since the first by Curry Foley in 1882 .
The cycle is   roughly as common as a no-hitter ( 279 occurrences in MLB history ) ; it has been called `` one of the rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball .
Based on 2009 offensive levels , the probability of an average MLB player hitting for a  साईकिल विरूद्ध an औसत टोली  in a game is approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams .
In other  बेसबॉल  leagues , the cycle is achieved less frequently .
Through September 4 , 2008 , 62 players in Nippon Professional Baseball ( NPB ) , the top-level baseball organization in  जापानी , have hit लिये  the cycle , the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara .
Two players have hit for the cycle on the same day once in NPB history ; this has  occurred twice in एमएलबी  history .
One NPB player has also hit  लिये the  cycle in an NPB All-Star game .
No player has ever hit for the cycle in the MLB  all-star खेल or the postseason  .
The main slave  रूट in  medieval Africa .
This article discusses systems , history , and  प्रभाव  of slavery within Africa .
See  अरब  slave trade , Atlantic slave trade , Maafa , and Slavery in contemporary Africa for other discussions .
`` Slave transport in  अफ़्रीकी '' .
Europeans usually did not enter the interior  regions .
Slavery in Africa has existed throughout the continent for  अनेक सदियां  , and continues in the current day .
Systems of  servitude और गुलामी यहूद आम in अनेक भाग  of the continent , as they were in much of the ancient world .
In most African societies where slavery was prevalent  , the enslaved people were  largely treated as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves .
When the Arab slave trade and Atlantic slave trade began , many of the local slave systems  बदला और began supplying  captives for slave markets outside of Africa .
Slavery in historical Africa was practiced in many different forms and some of these do not clearly fit the definitions of slavery  elsewhere in the संसार  .
Debt slavery , enslavement of war captives , military  गुलामी  , and criminal slavery were all practiced in various parts of Africa .
Although there had been some trans-Saharan trade from the interior of Sub-Saharan Africa to other regions , slavery was a small part of the economic life of many societies in Africa until the  परिचय of transcontinental स्लेव ट्रेड ( अरब  and Atlantic ) .
Slave practices were again transformed   with European colonization of Africa and the formal abolition of slavery in the early 1900s .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications , processes and CPU usage , commit charge and memory information , network activity and statistics , logged-in users , and system services ( and as often is the case with software tools provided by Microsoft for Windows , 3rd party software is available which  भरता the आवश्यकताएँ  more thoroughly , e.g , `` Process Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to  नियत प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं  , processor affinity , forcibly terminate processes , and shut down , restart , hibernate or log off from Windows .
Windows Task Manager was introduced with  खिड़कियाँ nt 4.0  .
Previous versions of Windows NT included the Task List application  ,  which had far fewer features .
The task list was capable of listing currently running  प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें ,  or creating a new process .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also present that  allows अभिगम to standby ,  Hibernate , Turn off , Restart , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows ( Microsoft Windows 3.x , Windows 95 ,  खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य  to display the programs currently running .
This file was executed by  कार्यशील the taskman.exe  file from the C : \Windows directory .
The Troop is an  american-canadian live-action , सिंगल कैमरा कॉमेडी -adventure  television series about a trio of teenagers who fight and capture monsters and other supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional town of Lakewood .
Created and executive produced by Max  burnett , ग्रेग  Coolidge and Chris Morgan , the series premiered on Nickelodeon on September 18 , 2009 .
The second season premiered on June 25 , 2011 and Nickelodeon cancelled the  श्रेणी मिडवे through  it 's second season .
The remaining episodes of season 2 were aired on Nicktoons  मगर the पिछला  3..
Sparsely populated in relation to its  क्षेत्रफल , the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of the कांगो ( drc ) is घर  to a vast potential of natural resources and mineral wealth , its untapped deposits of raw minerals are estimated to be worth in excess of US $ 24 trillion , yet the economy of the DRC has declined drastically since the mid-1980s .
At the time of its independence in 1960 , DRC was the second most industrialized country in Africa after South Africa ; it boasted a thriving mining sector and its agriculture  सेक्टर थी अपेक्षाकृत  productive .
If the viewer stares at this image for 20–60 seconds and  stares at a  white object , a negative afterimage will appear ( in this case , it will be cyan on magenta ) .
This can also be  हासिल by the दर्शक  closing his/her eyes and tilting their head up .
An  afterimage or भुत चित्र or चित्र burn-in  is an optical illusion that refers to an image continuing to appear in one 's vision after the exposure to the original image has ceased .
One of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems  to float  before one 's eyes after looking into a light source for a few seconds .
Closing the eye can help  achieve a बेहतर भाव  of the color in its own aspect .
Afterimages come in two forms  , ऋणात्मक ( उलट  ) and positive ( retaining original color ) .
The process behind positive afterimages is unknown , though thought to be related  to neural  adaptation .
On the other hand , negative afterimages are a retinal phenomenon and are   well understood .
Lost is an  अमरीकी सीरियल  drama television series that premiered on September 22 , 2004 on the American Broadcasting Company ( ABC ) .
The series was created by J. J. Abrams  और डैमन lindelof  , based upon an original pilot script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber .
Six seasons of the show  aired , in जोड to  numerous clip shows to recap previous episodes .
एबीसी घोषित कि खोया  would end after six seasons , having produced a total of 121 episodes .
The series follows the past , present , and future experience (  s ) of the survivors  of a plane crash on a passenger jet , Oceanic Flight 815 , flying from Sydney to Los Angeles after it crashes on a tropical island in the South Pacific .
The series also includes stories of the lives of people already living on the island — they include the `` Others `` , who initially antagonize the   survivors , as well as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana .
Each episode typically features action on the island as well as a secondary  कथानक इससे another  point in a character 's life .
Season 6 features a detailing of the lives of  the survivors in a  different reality , as if the flight had never crashed .
In the following list , the term `` featured character ( s ) '' refers to the character or characters who are  प्रदर्शित in  the secondary storyline of each episode .
``  no  .
in series '' refers to the episode 's number in the  overall  series , whereas `` No .
in  ऋतु '' refers  to the episode 's number in each particular season .
`` U.S. viewers ( million ) '' refers to the number  of अमेरिकी in  millions who watched the episode live .
A total of 121 episodes of Lost were produced , the last of which aired  on may 23 ,  2010 .
All seasons are available on DVD in Regions 1–4 and  on blu-ray in regions  A and B .
Flat feet ( also called pes planus or fallen arches ) is a formal reference to a medical condition in which the arch of the foot collapses  , साथ the संपूर्ण एकमात्र of  the foot coming into complete or near-complete contact with the ground .
In some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general population ) the arch simply never develops in one foot (  unilaterally ) or दोनो फीट ( bilaterally  ) .
Three studies ( see citations below in military section ) of military recruits have shown  no प्रमाण  of later increased injury , or foot problems , due to flat feet , in a population of people who reach military service age without prior foot problems .
However  ,  these studies can not be used to judge possible future damage from this condition when diagnosed at younger ages .
They also can not be  लागू to व्यक्तियों जिनकी चपटा  feet are associated with foot symptoms , or certain symptoms in other parts of the body ( such as the leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot .
Generation X , commonly abbreviated to Gen X , is the generation born after the  पश्चिमी post-world युद्ध ii baby  boom .
Demographers , historians and commentators use beginning birth dates from the  जल्दी 1960s to the जल्दी 1980s  .
The term was  popularized  by Douglas Coupland 's 1991 novel Generation X : Tales for an Accelerated Culture .
Before that , it had  महरूम  used for various subcultures or countercultures after the 1950s .
Pressure ulcers , also known as decubitus  छाले or bedsores , हैं स्थानीयकृत  injuries to the skin and/or underlying tissue usually over a bony prominence , as a result of pressure , or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction .
Most commonly this will be the sacrum , coccyx , heels or the hips , but other  साइट ऐसे as the elbows , अदब , ankles  or the back of the cranium can be affected .
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure  लागू to नरम ऊतक  so that blood flow to the soft tissue is completely or partially obstructed .
Shear is also a cause ; shear pulls on blood vessels  कि फीड  the skin .
Pressure ulcers most commonly develop in persons who are  नहीं  moving about or are confined to wheelchairs .
It is widely believed that other factors can influence the tolerance of skin for  दबाव और shear thereby  increasing the risk of pressure ulcer development .
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition , microclimate ( skin wetness caused by sweating or incontinence ) , diseases that reduce blood flow to the skin , such as arteriosclerosis or diseases that reduce the feeling in the skin , such as paralysis or  न्यूरोपैथी  .
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by the age of  the व्यक्ति , चिकित्सा शर्तें  ( such as arteriosclerosis , diabetes or infection ) , smoking or medications such as antiinflammatory drugs .
Although often prevented and treatable if found early , pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in  critically  ill patients , frail elders , wheelchair users ( especially where spinal injury is involved ) and terminally ill patients .
Primary prevention is to redistribute   pressure by turning the patient regularly .
The benefit of turning to avoid further sores is well  प्रलेखित  since at least the 19th century .
In addition to turning and re-positioning the patient in bed or  व्हीलचेयर  , eating a balanced diet with adequate protein and keeping the skin free from exposure to urine and stool is very important .
The prevalence of  दबाव छाले  in hospital settings is high , but improvements are being made .
According  to  the 2010 IPUP ( International Pressure Ulcer Prevalence Survey ) conducted in Canada , there was a significant decrease in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers were most commonly  पहचाना at the sacral/coccyx अल्सर स्थान ; however  , heel ulcers were the most common facility-acquired location in the survey .
Overboard is a 1987 American romantic comedy film  अभिनीत goldie  Hawn and Kurt Russell .
It was directed by Garry Marshall , produced by Roddy McDowell ,  और loosely प्रेरित by the 1974 इतालवी फिल्मी  Swept Away .
In  फेरे , overboard  was adapted into the 2006 South Korean television series , Couple or Trouble .
Green Bay  is a city  in and the county seat of Brown County in the U.S. state of Wisconsin , located at the head of Green Bay , a sub-basin of Lake Michigan , at the mouth of the Fox River .
It has an elevation  of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर  and is located north of Milwaukee .
The population was 104,057 at  the 2010  census .
It is the third-largest city in the state of Wisconsin , after Milwaukee and  मैडिसन  .
It is also the third-largest city on the west  shore of झील मिशिगन  , after Chicago and Milwaukee .
Green Bay is home to the Green Bay Packers of the National  फ़ुटबॉल  League , making it by far the smallest metropolitan area in the USA to host a major professional sports franchise .
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area , which covers Brown , Kewaunee , and Oconto Counties  और था a संयुक्त जनसांख्यिकी  of 282,599 at the 2000 census .
Green Bay is  an औद्योगिक नगर साथ अनेक meatpacking  and paper plants , and a port on Green Bay , an arm of Lake Michigan that locals call the Bay of Green Bay , to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city .
It is home to the National Railroad Museum ; the Neville Public Museum , with  प्रदर्शनियों  of art , history , and science ; and the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay .
Luteinizing hormone ( LH , also known as lutropin and sometimes lutrophin )  is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by gonadotroph  cells in the anterior pituitary gland .
In females , an acute rise of LH ( `` LH surge '' ) triggers  ovulation और विकास  of the corpus luteum .
in males , जहाँ lh था भी महरूम पुकारा अंतरालीय cell-stimulating हार्मोन ( icsh ) , it stimulates leydig कोशिका उत्पादन of टेस्टोस्टेरोन  .
It acts  synergistically  with FSH .
Selena  quintanilla-pérez (  April 16 , 1971 – March 31 , 1995 ) , known simply as Selena , was an American singer-songwriter .
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best selling Latin artist  of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड लिये उसके  fourteen top-ten singles in the Top Latin Songs chart , including seven number-one hits .
सेलिना था the सबसे  successful singles of 1994 and 1995 , `` Amor Prohibido `` and `` No Me Queda Más `` .
She was called `` The Queen of Tejano music `` and the Mexican equivalent of  मैडोना  .
Selena  released उसके  first album , Selena y Los Dinos , at the age of twelve .
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987 Tejano Music Awards and landed a recording  अनुबंध साथ emi a few  years later .
Her fame grew throughout the early 1990s , especially in  spanish-speaking देशों , और वो  had begun recording in English as well .
Selena was murdered at the age of 23 on March 31 , 1995 by Yolanda  saldívar , the पूर्व अध्यक्ष  of her fan club .
On April 12 , 1995 , two weeks after her death , George W. Bush , governor of Texas at the time , declared her birthday ``  सेलिना दिन ''  in Texas .
Warner Bros. produced Selena , a film  आधारित  on her life starring Jennifer Lopez , in 1997 .
Selena 's  जीवन थी भी  the basis of the musical Selena Forever starring Veronica Vazquez as Selena .
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated with a life-sized bronze statue ( Mirador  de la flor in कॉर्पस  Christi , Texas ) and a Selena museum opened there .
She has sold over 60 million albums worldwide , making her one of the best-selling  कलाकारों of  all time .
She is also the only female artist to have five albums in U.S .  बिलबोर्ड  200 at the same time .
जर्मनी stahlhelm  from World War II
Insignia of the Bolivian Army Colorados regiment , showing a  stahlhelm और दो crossed bayonets
stahlhelm ( बहुवचन ,  Stahlhelme ) is German for `` steel helmet '' .
The Imperial German Army began to replace the traditional boiled-leather Pickelhaube ( spiked combat helmet ) with  the stahlhelm  during World War I in 1916 .
The term Stahlhelm refers both to a generic steel helmet , and more specifically to the distinctive  ( और iconic ) जर्मनी  design .
The Stahlhelm , with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape , was an instantly recognizable icon for military imagery and became a common element of  सैन्य प्रचार on दोनो  sides , just like the Pickelhaube before it .
Its name was also used by the Stahlhelm , a paramilitary  राष्ट्रवादी  organization established at the end of 1918 .
glow-in-the-dark  may refer to:
जीवदीप्ति  , the production and emission of light by a living organism
Chemiluminescence , is the emission of light (  संदीप्ति  ) without emission of heat
Phosphorescence , a  विशिष्ट प्रकार of photoluminescence  related to fluorescence
Radioluminescence , production of  संदीप्ति  in a material by the bombardment of ionizing radiation
Glow in the Dark Tour , a 2008  कॉन्सर्ट  tour by Kanye West
Frankfurt  विमानक्षेत्र serves  as a hub city for Lufthansa and receives flights from Star Alliance carriers .
Airline  hubs हैं एयरपोर्ट क्रमित as विशाल  , medium , small , and non-hubs as one of the FAA airport categories which are re-evaluated every year based on number of commercial passengers .
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline  हब is an विमानक्षेत्र  that an airline uses as a transfer point to get passengers to their intended destination .
It is part of a hub and spoke model , where travelers moving between airports not  परोसा  by direct flights change planes en route to their destinations .
This is as opposed to the  पाइंट to  Point model .
Many hubs of the airlines are also situated  at एयरपोर्ट  in the cities of the respective head offices .
Some  एयरलाइंस  may use only a single hub , while other airlines use multiple hubs .
Hubs are used  लिये दोनो यात्री फ़्लाइट  as well as cargo flights .
Many airlines also  उपयोग फ़ोकस शहरों  , which function much the same as hubs .
Airlines may also use  द्वितीयक  hubs , a non-technical term for large focus cities .
A hub in the middle of a route is more effective than at either end as connecting  traffic  more easily fills the plane - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route .
Hollow  lacedaemon  .
Site of the Menelaion , the shrine to Helen and Menelaus constructed anciently in the Bronze Age city that stood on the hill of Therapne on the left bank of  the eurotas नदी निहार the भविष्य साईट of  Dorian Sparta .
Across the valley the successive ridges  of माउंट  Taygetus are in evidence .
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ) , or Lacedaemon , was a prominent city-state in ancient  यूनानियों , situated on the बैंको of the eurotas नदी  in Laconia , in south-eastern Peloponnese .
It emerged as a political entity around the 10th century BC , when the invading Dorians  subjugated the लोकल  , non-Dorian population .
Around 650 BC , it rose to become the dominant military land-power in  प्राचीन  Greece .
Given  इसके सैन्य pre-eminence  , Sparta was recognized as the overall leader of the combined Greek forces during the Greco-Persian Wars .
Between 431 and 404 BC , Sparta was  the प्रिंसिपल दुश्मन  of Athens during the Peloponnesian War , from which it emerged victorious , though at great cost .
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of Leuctra in 371  bc ended स्पार्टा  's prominent role in Greece .
However , it maintained its  राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता  until the Roman conquest of Greece in 146 BC .
It  तब underwent a long काल  of decline , especially in the Middle Ages , when many Spartans moved to live in Mystras .
Modern Sparta is the capital of the Greek regional unit of Laconia and a center for the  प्रसंस्करण of goods  such as citrus and olives .
Sparta was unique in ancient Greece for its social system and constitution , which completely focused  on सैन्य प्रशिक्षण  and excellence .
Its inhabitants were classified as Spartiates ( Spartan  नागरिकों , जो enjoyed पूरा अधिकारों ) , mothakes ( non-spartan  free men raised as Spartans ) , Perioikoi ( freedmen ) , and Helots ( state-owned serfs , enslaved non-Spartan local population ) .
Spartiates underwent  the कठोर  agoge training and education regimen , and Spartan phalanges were widely considered to be among the best in battle .
Spartan women enjoyed considerably more rights  और समता  to men than elsewhere in the classical world .
Sparta was the subject of  fascination in इसके अपना दिन , as खूब as in  the West following the revival of classical learning .
इस प्रेम or admiration of  Sparta is known as Laconism or Laconophilia .
Fantasy football is an  इंटरैक्टिव प्रतियोगिता in जिससे  users compete against each other as general managers of virtual teams .
The   players that an individual is able to manage are professional American football players in the National Football League .
The different  क्रियाएँ लोगों हैं  able to make are drafting , trading , adding or dropping players , and changing rosters .
Due to the growth of the Internet , Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity , particularly because Fantasy football providers such as ESPN , Yahoo , CBS , and the NFL itself are  समर्थ to रखना track of आंकडे entirely ऑनलाइन , eliminating the  need to check box scores and newspapers regularly to keep track of players .
Most leagues have a single week championship in Week 16 of the NFL season   .
World population estimates from 1800 to  2100 , आधारित on un 2010 projections  ( red , orange , green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ) .
वास्तविक अंकित जनसांख्यिकी  figures are in blue .
According to the highest estimate , the  संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16  billion by 2100 ; according to the lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is the total number of living humans  on धरती  .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion by  the  United States Census Bureau ( USCB ) .
the uscb estimates  that the world population exceeded 7 billion on March 12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United Nations Population Fund , it reached  इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर 31 , 2011  .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine and the Black Death in 1350 , when it  stood at around 370 लाख  .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases  ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान  the 1950s , and for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth  रेट peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138  लाख , और हैं अभी अपेक्षित  to remain essentially constant at their 2011 level of 134 million , while deaths number 56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in population in the near future ( but  a स्थिर मनाही  in the population growth rate ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict  further विकास , stagnation  , or even overall decline in the global population by 2150 .
कुछ विश्लेषकों have questioned the स्थिरता  of further world population growth , citing the growing pressures on the environment , global food supplies , and energy resources .
skeletal  muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles  of the इंसान anatomy  .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle constitutes one part of a pair of identical bilateral muscles  , मिला on दोनो पहलू , resulting in लगभग 320 pairs  of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles differently , e.g . regarding what is defined as  अलग  parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
Examples range from 640 to  850  .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into a number of  समूह जिससे शामिल  muscles relating to the head and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers to the action of each muscle  इससे the मानक  anatomical position .
In other positions ,  अन्य क्रियाएँ  may be performed .
A gold bar is a  मात्रा of परिष्कृत  metallic gold of any shape that is made by a bar producer meeting standard conditions of manufacture , labeling , and record keeping .
Larger gold bars that are  उत्पादित  by pouring the molten metal into molds are called ingots .
Smaller bars may be  manufactured by minting or  stamping from appropriately rolled gold sheets .
The standard gold bar held as gold reserves by central banks and traded  among bullion डीलर  is the 400-troy-ounce ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold bar .
The kilobar , which is to say 1000 grams in mass , is the  बार कि is अधिक  manageable and is used extensively for trading and investment .
The premium on these  bars  when traded is very low over the spot value of the gold making it ideal for small transfers between banks and traders .
Most kilobars are flat ,  हालांकि कुछ निवेशकों , विशेषकर  in Europe , prefer the brick shape .
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19 , 1949 ) is a former American football quarterback in the National Football League , playing for the New Orleans Saints from 1971 to 1982 ,  तब  for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings .
He is the father of current Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton  मैनिंग , वर्तमान  New York Giants starting quarterback Eli Manning , and former Ole Miss receiver Cooper Manning .
वकालत  is a political process by an individual or group which aims to influence public-policy and resource allocation decisions within political , economic , and social systems and institutions .
वकालत can शामिल अनेक क्रियाएँ कि a व्यक्ति or संगठन undertakes सहित मीडिया अभियान , पब्लिक बोलना , commissioning और प्रकाशन शोध or पोल or the दाखिल of an amicus ब्रैड .
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy where a direct approach is made to legislators on an issue which  plays a significant भूमिका  in modern politics .
Research is beginning to explore how advocacy groups in  the u.S. और कनाडा  are using social media to facilitate civic engagement and collective action .
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de México ) is a vertical tricolor of  ग्रीन , श्वेत , और रेड साथ the नेशनल कोट  of arms charged in the center of the white stripe .
While the meaning of the colors has changed over time , these three colors were adopted by Mexico  following स्वतंत्रता इससे स्पेन दौरान  the country 's War of Independence , and subsequent First Mexican Empire .
The current flag was adopted in 1968 , but the overall design has been used since  1821 , when  the First National Flag was created .
The current law of national symbols , Law on the National  बाहें  , Flag , and Anthem , that governs the use of the national flag has been in place since 1984 .
रेड , श्वेत  , and green are the colors of the national liberation army in Mexico .
The central emblem is the Aztec pictogram for  tenochtitlan ( अभी मैक्सिको नगर  ) , the center of their empire .
It recalls  the लेजेंड  that inspired the Aztecs to settle on what was originally a lake-island .
The form of the coat  of बाहें थी सबसे  recently revised in 1968 .
A ribbon in the national colors is at  the नीचे of the  coat of arms .
Throughout history , the flag has changed four times , as the design of the coat of arms and the length-width ratios of  the ध्वज have महरूम परिवर्धित  .
However , the coat of arms has had the same features throughout : an eagle , holding a  serpent in इसके talon , is perched on शीर्ष of  a prickly pear cactus ; the cactus is situated on a rock that rises above a lake .
The coat of arms is derived from an Aztec legend that their gods told them to build a city where  वे स्पॉट an त्रिभुज on a nopal खाने  a serpent , which is now Mexico City .
The current national flag , the Fourth National Flag , is also used as  the मैक्सिकन नवल ensign by जहाजों  registered in Mexico .
A destination  विपणन संगठन or सम्मेलन  and visitor bureau promotes a town , city , region , or country in order to increase the number of visitors .
it promotes the विकास  and marketing of a destination , focusing on convention sales , tourism marketing , and services .
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing visits  इससे पर्यटकों और कारोबार travelers , जिससे generates overnight आवास लिये  a destination , visits to restaurants , and shopping revenues .
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most important tourism marketing organizations in  उनके  respective tourist destinations , as they are directly responsible for marketing the destination brand through travel and tourism `` product awareness '' to visitors .
DMOs produce billions of dollars in direct and  अप्रत्यक्ष  revenue and taxes for their destinations ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise .
Destination marketing organizations are often called travel , convention , visitors , or tourism bureaux , welcome  centers , सूचना centers और  more .
Regardless of the name ,  ये संगठन  offer many services to the traveling public .
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is one of the largest species of deer in the world , and one of the largest  जमीन स्तनधारियों in उत्तर अमेरिका और पूर्वी  Asia .
It was long believed to be a subspecies of the European red deer ( Cervus elaphus ) , but evidence  इससे a 2004 पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial  DNA indicates that the two are distinct species .
This animal should not be confused with the larger moose ( Alces alces ) , to which the name `` elk  '' applies  in Eurasia .
Apart from the  मूस , the तभी  other member of the deer family to rival the elk in size is the south Asian sambar ( Rusa unicolor ) .
नीलगाय  range in forest and forest-edge habitat , feeding on grasses , plants , leaves , and bark .
Although  देशी  to North America and eastern Asia , they have adapted well to countries where they have been introduced , including Argentina , Australia , and New Zealand .
Their great  adaptability may threaten  endemic species and ecosystems into which they have been introduced .
Male elk have large antlers which are  शेड प्रत्येक  year .
Males also engage in ritualized mating behaviors during the rut , including posturing , antler wrestling ( sparring ) , and bugling , a loud series of vocalizations which establishes dominance over other males and attracts  महिलाओं  .
नीलगाय हैं susceptible  to a number of infectious diseases , some of which can be transmitted to livestock .
Efforts to eliminate infectious diseases from elk  populations , largely through टीकाकरण ,  have had mixed success .
Some cultures revere the  नीलगाय as a  spiritual force .
In parts of Asia , antlers and   their velvet are used in traditional medicines .
Elk are hunted as a game species ; the meat is leaner and higher in protein than  बीफ  or chicken .
the जार्ज वॉशिंगटन विश्वविद्यालयों ( gw , gwu , or जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक निजी , coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. .
It awards certificates , Bachelor degrees , Masters degrees , and PhDs across several dozen  disciplines  .
The university was  चार्टर्ड  by an Act of Congress on February 9 , 1821 as The Columbian College in the District of Columbia .
The lion ( Panthera  leo ) is एक of the चार  big cats in the genus Panthera and a member of the family Felidae .
साथ कुछ males exceeding  in weight , it is the second-largest living cat after the tiger .
Wild lions currently exist in sub-Saharan Africa and in Asia ( where an endangered remnant population resides in Gir Forest National Park in India ) while other types of  शेर have disappeared इससे उत्तर अफ़्रीकी और दक्षिणपश्चिम एशिया  in historic times .
Until the late Pleistocene  , परिचय 10,000  years ago , the lion was the most widespread large land mammal after humans .
They were found in most of Africa , across Eurasia from western Europe to India   , and in the Americas from the Yukon to Peru .
The lion is a vulnerable species , having seen a major population decline of 30–50 % over the  पास्ट दो दशकों  in its African range .
Lion populations are untenable outside  designated  reserves and national parks .
Although the cause of the decline is not fully understood , habitat loss and conflicts with humans are  फिलहाल the  greatest causes of concern .
Within Africa  , the वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी शेर  population is particularly endangered .
Lions live for 10–14 years in the wild , while in captivity they can  सजीव  longer than 20 years .
In the wild , males seldom live longer than 10 years , as  चोटों sustained  from continual fighting with rival males greatly reduce their longevity .
They typically inhabit savanna and grassland ,  हालांकि  they may take to bush and forest .
Lions are unusually social  compared  to other cats .
A pride of lions consists of related females and offspring and a small  क्रमांक of वयस्क males  .
Groups of  मादा शेर  typically hunt together , preying mostly on large ungulates .
Lions are apex and keystone predators , although they scavenge  as अवसर allows  .
While lions do not typically hunt  इंसानो , कुछ  have been known to do so .
Sleeping mainly during  the दिन , शेर हैं primarily  nocturnal , although bordering on crepuscular in nature .
Highly distinctive , the male lion is easily recognised by its  माने , और इसके फेस is एक of the सबसे widely  recognised animal symbols in human culture .
Depictions have existed from the Upper Paleolithic period , with carvings and paintings from the Lascaux and Chauvet Caves , through  वस्तुतः सब प्राचीन और मध्यकालीन संस्कृतियों जहाँ  they once occurred .
It has been extensively depicted in sculptures , in paintings , on national  ध्वज ,  and in contemporary films and literature .
Lions have been kept in menageries since the time of the Roman Empire , and have been a key species sought for  प्रदर्शनी in zoos over the संसार  since the late 18th century .
Zoos are cooperating worldwide in  प्रजनन कार्यक्रम लिये the  endangered Asiatic subspecies .
In the history of video games ,  the  seventh generation of consoles is the previous generation , and includes consoles released since late by Nintendo , Microsoft , and Sony .
For home consoles , the seventh generation began on 22 November 2005 with the release of Xbox 360 and continued with the  रिलीज of प्लेस्टेशन 3 on  11 November 2006 , and Wii on 19 November 2006 .
Each new console  introduced a नई प्रकार  of breakthrough in technology .
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions , the PlayStation 3 offered  , in  addition to FHD gaming , HD movie playback via a built-in 3D Blu-ray Disc player , and the Wii focused on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks .
Joining Nintendo in the motion market , Sony released the PlayStation Move  in सितंबर 2010  .
The PlayStation Move features motion sensing  गेमिंग , समान to कि of the वी  .
Microsoft also joined Sony and  निन्टेंडो , साथ  its Kinect .
Unlike the other two systems ( PlayStation 3 and Wii ) , Kinect  करता नहीं उपयोग कोई परिरक्षक  of any sort and makes the users the `` controller . ''
Having sold 8 million units in its first 60 days  on  the market , Kinect has claimed the Guinness World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device '' .
While the Xbox 360 offers  तार परिरक्षक as a  standalone product , all PlayStation 3 controllers can be used in wired and wireless configurations .
Starting with handheld consoles , the seventh generation began on 21 November 2004 with the North American introduction of the  निन्टेंडो ds as a `` तीसरा  pillar '' , alongside Nintendo 's existing Game Boy Advance and GameCube consoles .
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch  स्क्रीन और built-in माइक्रोफोन  , and supports wireless IEEE 802.11 ( Wi-Fi ) standards .
Additionally , the revised version of the NDS , the DSi , features two built in cameras , the ability  to डाउनलोड खेल इससे the  DSi store , and a web browser .
The PlayStation Portable , or PSP , released  बाद the वही साल on 12 दिसम्बर  2004 , followed a different pattern .
It became the first handheld video game console to use an  ऑप्टिकल डिस्क स्वरूप , सार्वभौमिक  Media Disc ( UMD ) , as its primary storage media .
Sony also gave the PSP robust multi-media capability , connectivity with the PlayStation 3 and other  psps , और अंतरजाल  connectivity .
The Nintendo DS likewise has connectivity to the internet through the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection and Nintendo DS Browser , as well  as बेतार कनेक्टिविटी  to other DS systems and Wii consoles .
Despite high sales numbers for both consoles , PlayStation Portable sales have consistently  पिछड़ापन पीछे those of the निन्टेंडो ds ; nevertheless , the प्लेस्टेशन  Portable has the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system .
Sgt . Pepper 's  निर्जन दिल क्लबों बैंड ( प्रायः shortened to sgt  . Pepper ) is the eighth studio album by English rock band the Beatles .
Released in June 1967 , the album included songs such as `` With a Little Help from My Friends `` , `` Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds `` , and `` A  दिन in the  Life `` .
Continuing the artistic maturation seen on the band 's album Revolver ( 1966 ) , Sgt . Pepper further departed from the conventional pop rock idiom of the time and incorporated   balladry , psychedelic , music hall , and symphonic influences .
During  the sgt . pepper सत्र ,  the group improved upon the quality of their music 's production while exploring experimental recording techniques .
Producer George Martin 's innovative approach included  the उपयोग of an ऑर्केस्ट्रा  .
Widely acclaimed and imitated , the album cover , designed by English pop artists Peter Blake and Jann Haworth , was inspired by a sketch  by Paul  McCartney that depicted the band posing in front of a collage of some of their favourite celebrities .
Sgt . Pepper was a worldwide critical and commercial success , spending 27 weeks at the top of the UK Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on  the  US Billboard 200 .
A seminal work in the emerging psychedelic rock style , the album was critically acclaimed upon release   and won four Grammy Awards in 1968 .
With an  अनुमानित 32  million copies sold , it is one of the world 's best selling albums .
Sgt . Pepper is considered by many to be the most influential and famous rock album ever , and has been named  the महानतम एल्बम of सब समय by दोनो  All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone .
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that is   located beneath the lateral fissure on both cerebral hemispheres of the mammalian brain .
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories , processing sensory input , comprehending language , storing new memories  , जज्बात , और  deriving meaning .
The human lungs are the organs of  श्वसन  in humans .
Humans have two lungs , a right lung and a  बाएँ  lung .
The right lung  consists of तीन निर्मोक जबकि the बाएँ  lung is slightly smaller consisting of only two lobes ( the left lung has a `` cardiac notch '' allowing space for the heart within the chest ) .
Together , the lungs contain  लगभग of एयरवेज़  and 300 to 500 million alveoli , having a total surface area of about ( ) in adults — roughly the same area as one side of a tennis court .
Furthermore , if all of the capillaries that surround  the alveoli यहूद  unwound and laid end to end , they would extend for about .
Each lung  weighs , इसलिए  making the entire organ about .
इंसान  lungs
The trachea divides into two bronchi ( one  लिये प्रत्येक पक्ष )  at the level of T4 .
This junction  is भी ज्ञात  as the carina .
The conducting zone contains the trachea , the  bronchi , the bronchioles , और the टर्मिनल bronchioles  The respiratory zone contains the respiratory bronchioles , the alveolar ducts , and the alveoli .
The conducting zone and the respiratory stuffers ( but not the  alveoli )  are made up of airways .
The conducting zone has no gas exchange with the blood , and is reinforced with   cartilage in order to hold open the airways .
The conducting zone warms the air to and humidifies  the  air .
It also cleanses the air by removing particles via cilia located on the walls of all the  passageways .
The lungs are  घिरी by  the rib cage .
The respiratory zone is the site of gas exchange   with blood .
The sympathetic nervous system via noradrenaline acting on the beta receptors causes  bronchodilation  .
The parasympathetic  बेचैन प्रणाली via acetylcholine  , which acts on the M-3 muscarinic receptors , maintains the resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This action is related , although considered  पृथक इससे bronchoconstriction  .
Many other non-autonomic nervous and biochemical stimuli , including carbon dioxide and  ऑक्सीजन , हैं भी शामिल  in the regulation process .
The pleural cavity is the potential space  between the parietal pleura , अस्तर the भीतरी  wall of the thoracic cage , and the visceral pleura lining the lungs .
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer solely to  alveolar ऊतक  with respiratory bronchioles , alveolar ducts and terminal bronchioles .
However , it often includes any form of lung tissue , also including bronchioles , bronchi , blood  बरतन  and lung interstitium .
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila mixed with  Cointreau  or similar orange -flavoured liqueur and lime or lemon juice , often served with salt on the glass rim .
It is the most  आम tequila-based  cocktail in the United States .
The drink  is परोसा shaken  with ice ( on the rocks ) , blended with ice ( frozen margarita ) , or without ice ( straight up ) .

Burgundy is a dark red color associated with the Burgundy  वाइन of the  same name , which in turn is named after the Burgundy region of France .
the रंग बरगंडी is समान to अन्य शेड्स of अंधेरा रेड ऐसे as मैरून .
When referring to the color  , `` बरगंडी  '' is usually not capitalized .
The first recorded use of `` burgundy  '' as a रंग नाम  in English was in 1881 .

Missing in action ( MIA ) is a casualty Category  आबंटित अंतर्गत  the Status of Missing to armed services personnel who are reported missing during active service .
They may have been killed , wounded , become a prisoner  of युद्ध , or उजाड़  .
If deceased , neither their remains nor  संगीन  can be positively identified .
Becoming MIA has been an occupational risk for service personnel for as  long as वहीँ रै महरूम warfare  .
