First Baptist Church at 117 Cora Street in Center is  स्तिथ  next to the downtown section .
First Christian Church at 124 Cora Street in Center is  एक of  the oldest congregations in the community .
बीच is  a city in Shelby County , Texas , United States .
The population was  5,193 at the  2010 census .
It is the county  सीट of  Shelby County .
It is named for its  स्थान  near the center of Shelby County , not for its location in Texas as it is located near the Louisiana border .
Intense  red-eye प्रभाव in  blue eyes with dilated pupil
The red-eye effect in photography is the common appearance of red pupils in color photographs   of eyes .
It occurs when using a photographic flash very close to the camera lens ( as with most compact  कैमरे ) , in परिवेश  low light .
The effect appears in the eyes of humans and  पशु कि have tapetum  lucidum .
Theatrical followspot operators , positioned nearly  coincidentally  with a very bright light and somewhat distant from the actors , occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage .
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience because it is reliant on the very small angle   between the followspot operator and the light .
The University of California , Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC Santa Barbara or UCSB ) is a public research university and one of the ten general campuses of the  विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  system .
The main campus is located on a site in Goleta , California , United States , from Santa  बारबरा  and northwest of Los Angeles .
Tracing its roots back to 1891 as an independent teachers ' college , UCSB joined the University of California system in 1944  और is the  third-oldest general-education campus in the system .
UCSB is one of America  's पब्लिक आइवी विश्वविद्यालयों  , which recognizes top public research universities in the United States .
The university is a comprehensive doctoral university and is  व्यवस्थित into पाँच कॉलेजों और स्कूलों  offering 87 undergraduate degrees and 55 graduate degrees .
The campus is the  6th-largest in the uc प्रणाली  by enrollment with 18,977 undergraduate and 2,950 graduate students .
in 2012 , ucsb थी क्रमित 41st among `` नेशनल विश्वविद्यालयों '' और 10th among पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों by u.S. न्यूज & संसार रपट  .
The university was also ranked 35th worldwide by the Times Higher Education World University Rankings and 34th  विश्वव्यापी ( 6th विश्वव्यापी लिये अभियान्त्रिकी ) by the अकादमिक रैंकिंग  of World Universities in 2012. < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is  a `` very high activity '' research  university and spent $ 191.2 million on research expenditures in the 2007 fiscal year , 97th-largest in the United States .
ucsb घरों बारह नेशनल  research centers , including the renowned Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics .
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates , one Fields Medalist , 29 members of the National Academy of  sciences  , 27 members of the National Academy of Engineering , and 31 members of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences .
UCSB was the No . 3  मेजबान on the arpanet  and was elected to the Association of American Universities in 1995 .
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos compete in the NCAA Division I  बिग वेस्ट  Conference .
The Gauchos  have जीती  NCAA national championships in men 's soccer and men 's water polo .
Saint Joseph  साथ the  Infant Jesus by Guido Reni
Saint Joseph 's Day , March 19 , the Feast of St. Joseph is in  पश्चिमी  Christianity the principal feast day of Saint Joseph , Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary .
He is also  the  step-father of Jesus of Nazareth /Jesus Christ .
It has the rank of a solemnity  in the रोमन  Catholic Church ; Catholics who follow the Missal of 1962 celebrate it as a first class feast .
पिछला to  1962 it was celebrated as a feast of the rank of double of the first class .
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of  the anglican नियाज़  , and a feast or festival in the Lutheran Church .
संत जोसेफ 's दिन is the  Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as for Canada , persons named Joseph , Josephine , etc. , for religious institutes , schools and parishes bearing his name , and for carpenters .
It is also Father 's Day in  कुछ कैथोलिक देशों , मुख्यतः  Spain , Portugal , and Italy .
March 19 was  समर्पित to  Saint Joseph in several Western calendars by the tenth century , and this custom was established in Rome by 1479 .
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the entire Roman Rite by his  अपोस्टोलिक संविधान  Quo Primum ( July 14 , 1570 ) .
Since 1969 , Episcopal Conferences  may , if  they wish , transfer it to a date outside Lent .
Between 1870  और 1955 , a feast थी मनाये in सम्मान of  St. Joseph as Spouse of the Blessed Virgin Mary and Patron of the Universal Church , the latter title having been given to him by Pope Pius IX .
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday after Easter  साथ an अष्टक ,  after Divino Afflatu of St. Pius X ( see Reform of the Roman Breviary by Pope Pius X ) , it was moved to the preceding Wednesday .
The feast was also  retitled the solemnity  of Saint Joseph .
This celebration and its accompanying octave was abolished during the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope  पायस बारहवीं in 1955  .
It is still  कायम  by Catholics who follow the missal of 1962 or earlier missals .
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles Ss . Philip and James , May 1 , had faded  इससे the मेमोरी of सबसे catholics by the mid-twentieth सदी , कि of जोसेफ the कार्यकर्ता  was created in order to coincide with the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries .
The  feast of ss . फिलिप और जेम्स , जिससे  had been celebrated on that date since the sixth century , was moved from its traditional place .
In the new calendar published in 1969 , the feast , which at one time occupied the highest possible  रैंक in the गिरिजाघर  calendar , was reduced to an optional Memorial , the lowest rank for a saint 's day .
The Eastern  परंपरागत गिरिजाघर मनाता  Saint Joseph on the Sunday after Christmas .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an  अमरीकी  singer , songwriter , record producer , actress , and philanthropist .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola , Carey released her self-titled debut studio album Mariah Carey in 1990 ; it went multi-platinum and spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S .  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991 ) , Music Box ( 1993 ) , and  मैरी क्रिसमस ( 1994 ) , कैरी  was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when its second single `` One Sweet Day `` , a duet with Boyz  ii मेन ,  spent a record sixteen weeks on top of the Billboard Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग of the एल्बम  , Carey began to deviate from her R & B and pop beginnings and slowly traversed into hip hop .
This musical change became evident with the  रिलीज of तितली ( 1997 ) , at जिससे  time Carey had separated from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 , and signed a record-breaking $ 100 million  रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ वर्जिन  Records .
Before the release of her first feature film Glitter ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and  थी hospitalized  for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was bought out  of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध  for $ 50 million , which led to a decline in her career .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with  द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002  , and after an unsuccessful period , returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong Together `` became her most  कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s , और  was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard .
Carey  एकबार  again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career spanning over  दो दशकों , कैरी रै बेची अधिक than  200 million records worldwide , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as the world 's best-selling recording artist of the 1990s at the World  म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार  .
कैरी थी भी नामित the best-selling मादा कलाकार of the मिलेनियम in 2000 .
According to the Recording Industry Association of America , she is the third best-selling female artist in the United States , with 63.5  लाख certified  albums .
With the release  of ``  Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ) , Carey gained her eighteenth number one single in the United States , more than any other solo artist .
In 2012 , Carey  थी क्रमित  second on VH1 's list of the `` 100 Greatest Women in Music '' .
Aside from her commercial accomplishments , Carey has won five Grammy  पुरस्कार , 17 संसार म्यूज़िक  Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as  the `` songbird परम् '' by the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड  , she is famed for her five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
A bumblebee is any member of the bee genus Bombus , in the family  apidae .
There are over 250 known species , existing primarily in the  उत्तरी गोलार्ध हालांकि वे  also occur in South America .
They have been  introduced to नई जीलैंड  and the Australian state of Tasmania .
Bumblebees are social insects that are  characterised by ब्लैक और  yellow body hairs , often in bands .
However , some  प्रजाति have  orange or red on their bodies , or may be entirely black .
Another obvious ( but not unique ) characteristic is the soft nature of the hair ( long , branched setae ) , called pile , that covers their entire body , making them appear  and feel  fuzzy .
They are best distinguished from similarly large , fuzzy bees by the form of the female hind leg , which is modified to form a corbicula : a shiny concave surface that is bare , but surrounded by a fringe of hairs used to transport pollen ( in similar bees , the hind  लेग is completely बालदार , और पराग  grains are wedged into the hairs for transport ) .
Like their  रिश्तेदारों  the honey bees , bumblebees feed on nectar and gather pollen to feed their young .
A man openly carrying a  handgun in a बर्गर किंग  in Eagle , Colorado .
In the United States , open carry is shorthand terminology for `` openly carrying a firearm  in  public '' , as distinguished from concealed carry , where firearms can not be seen by the casual observer .
The practice of open carry , where gun owners openly carry firearms while they go about their daily business , has seen an increase in  the u.S. in हाल सालो  .
This has been  चिह्नित by a क्रमांक  of organized events intended to increase the visibility of open carry and public awareness about the practice .
Proponents of open carry point to history and statistics ,  noting  that criminals usually conceal their weapons .
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org , GeorgiaCarry.org and some participants of the Free State Project , open carry has seen a  पुनरुद्धार in हाल सालो , लकिन it is नहीं yet साफ if इस represents  just a short-term trend .
The gun  अधिकारों  community has been mixed in its response .
Alan Gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious in expressing support , while special-interest groups such as the aforementioned OpenCarry.org and GeorgiaCarry.org , and certain national groups such as the Gun Owners of America ( GOA  ) have been more  outspoken in favor of the practice .
Open  carry is strongly  opposed by gun control groups such as the Brady Campaign and the Coalition to Stop Gun Violence .
The Cattenom Nuclear  शक्ति संयंत्र  in France .
France produces around three  quarters  of its electricity by nuclear power .
The Grafenrheinfeld Nuclear  शक्ति संयंत्र  in Germany .
Chancellor Angela Merkel  's गठबन्धन घोषित on may 30 , 2011 , कि  Germany’s 17 nuclear power stations will be shut down by 2022 , in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors are under construction in  15  countries .
Nuclear  शक्ति स्टेशन  operate in thirty countries .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported that an average of about 10 nuclear reactors were expected to become operational per year , although according to the World Nuclear  Association , of the  17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As of June 2011 , Germany  और स्विट्ज़रलैंड  are phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark ,  यूनानियों , आयरलैंड ,  Italy , Latvia , Liechtenstein , Luxembourg , Malaysia , Malta , New Zealand , Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power .
Color motion picture film  refers दोनो to unexposed रंग फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  film in a format suitable for use in a motion picture camera , and to finished motion picture film , ready for use in a projector , which bears images in color .
The first color cinematography was by means of additive color systems such as the one patented in England by Edward Raymond Turner  in  1899 and tested in 1902 .
A simplified additive system was developed by George  अल्बर्ट स्मिथ और सफलतापूर्वक commercialized  in 1909 as Kinemacolor .
ये  early systems used black-and-white film to photograph and project two or more component images through different color filters .
स्टिल इससे  footage recorded by Edward Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology , there are two distinct processes : Eastman Color Negative 2 chemistry ( camera negative stocks , duplicating interpositive and internegative stocks ) and Eastman Color Positive 2 chemistry ( positive  prints लिये सीधा प्रक्षेप ) , प्रायः abbreviated as  ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
Fuji 's products are compatible with ECN-2 and  ecp-2  .
Ashanti  shequoiya डगलस ( born अक्तूबर  13 , 1980 ) is an American singer-songwriter , record producer , and actress .
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous  डेब्यू एल्बम , जिससे  featured the hit song `` Foolish `` , and sold over 503,000 copies in its first week of release throughout the U.S. in April 2002 .
The album set a Soundscan record as the biggest opening week  बिक्री  for a new female artist , outselling debuts by Alicia Keys and Lauryn Hill .
In the same week , she became the first female  यजमान to simultaneously थाम the शीर्ष दो स्थान on the बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 singles chart with `` Foolish '' , and `` What 's Luv ? ``
( with Fat Joe  ) .
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs , `` Foolish ,  '' `` कया 's luv  ? '' and `` Always on Time `` , on the Billboard Hot 100 charts in the same week , being the first woman to accomplish this feat and being second only to the Beatles .
in 2003 , the self-titled  debut album won Ashanti her first Grammy Award for Best Contemporary R & B album .
As of  अप्रैल  1st 2013 , Ashanti has sold over 27.7 million records worldwide .
Ashanti ended the decade (  2000–09 ) as the तीसरा  top new R & B artist behind Alicia Keys and Beyoncé .
She also ended the decade at  क्रमांक 38 on the  Top Artist of the Decade list .
She is currently on the list of The Twenty Best Selling Music Singles Since 1990 for her single Foolish  लिये selling 7.2 लाख नक़ल to-date  .
Ashanti has an estimated net worth of $ 40 million dollars  [ usd ]  .
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It Funny ( Murder Remix ) `` , which reached number one on Billboard Hot 100 , which was also in the top 10 chart at the same time as `` Foolish '' , ``  सदा on समय '' ( साथ ja नियम ) , और `` कया 's luv '' ( साथ मोटे जो  ) .
Later that year , she was acclaimed as the `` Princess Of Hip-Hop & R & B  '' by उसके लेबल और capped बंद उसके  successful debut by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards .
Within seven years of Ashanti 's career , she has  scored 16 शीर्ष 40 हिट्स  on the Hot 100 .
Ashanti has  endorsed  numerous products including Gap , Herbal Essences and Mudd Jeans .
Ashanti cites Whitney Houston , Janet Jackson , Prince , Madonna , Tupac Shakur , Mary  J. Blige  , Ella Fitzgerald , Smokey Robinson , Donna Summer , and Blue Magic as her musical influences .
Praised as a gifted songwriter by her peers and  आलोचकों  alike , Ashanti has written/co-written the bulk of all her music .
She is  फिलहाल  working on her own publishing company entitled Written Entertainment .
She released her fourth studio album entitled The Declaration on  जून 3 , 2008 और  is currently in the studio working on her fifth .
She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other female singers for the `` Stand Up to Cancer '' live television  खास जिससे  helped raise $ 100 million dollars for cancer research .
The United States Army Air Forces ( USAAF or AAF ) was the military aviation arm of the United States of America during and immediately after World War II , and the  सीधा पूर्ववर्ती of  the United States Air Force .
The AAF was a component of the United States Army , which in 1942  थी विभाजित functionally  by executive order into three autonomous forces : the Army Ground Forces , the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ) , and the AAF .
Each of these forces had a commanding  सामान्य जो reported सीधे  to the Chief of Staff of the United States Army .
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation formerly distributed among the Army Air Corps , General Headquarters Air Force , and ground forces corps area commanders , and thus became the first air organization of the U.S. Army to control  its own  installations and support personnel .
In practice , the AAF was virtually  autonomous  inside the Army .
The peak size of the AAF was over 2.4 million men and women in service and nearly 80,000 aircraft in 1944 ,  और 783 घरेलू  bases in December 1943 .
By VE Day it had 1.25  लाख  men stationed overseas and operated from more than 1,600 airfields worldwide .
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in June 1941 to provide the air arm a greater autonomy in which  to  expand more efficiently , and to provide a structure for the additional command echelons required by a vastly increased force .
Although other nations already had separate air forces independent of the army or navy ( such as the British  royal एयर फ़ोर्स  and the German Luftwaffe ) , the AAF remained a part of the United States Army until the United States Air Force came into being in September 1947 .
However , in its expansion and conduct of  the  war , the AAF became more than just an arm of the greater organization .
By the end of World War II the AAF had become  वस्तुतः an स्वतंत्र  service .
By regulation and executive order , the AAF was a subordinate agency of the War Department tasked  तभी साथ आयोजन , प्रशिक्षण ,  and equipping combat units , limited in responsibility to the continental United States , as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces .
In reality , Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air war in every part of the world , determining air policy and issuing orders without transmitting them   through the Chief of Staff .
This `` contrast between theory and fact  is ...  fundamental to an understanding of the AAF . ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a federal freedom of information law that allows for the full or  आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना  and documents controlled by the United States government .
The Act defines agency records subject to disclosure , outlines  अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण प्रक्रियाओं और  grants nine exemptions to the statute .
It was originally signed into   law by President Lyndon B. Johnson , despite his misgivings , on July 4 , 1966 as and went into effect the following year .
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act should not be confused  साथ the अलग और varying स्वतंत्रता of सूचना  Acts passed by the individual states .
Many  of those राज्य  acts may be similar but not identical to the federal act .
The European Union ( EU ) is an economic and political union of 27 member  राज्य कि हैं स्तिथ primarily  in Europe .
The EU  operates through a प्रणाली  of supranational independent institutions and intergovernmental negotiated decisions by the member states .
Institutions of the EU include the European Commission , the Council of the European Union , the European Council , the Court of Justice of the European Union , the European Central Bank , the Court  of auditors , और the  European Parliament .
The European Parliament  is  elected every five years by EU citizens .
The EU 's de facto capital is  ब्रसेल्स  .
The EU traces its  origins इससे the यूरोपीय कोयले और स्टील  Community ( ECSC ) and the European Economic Community ( EEC ) , formed by the Inner Six countries in 1951 and 1958 respectively .
In the intervening years the community and its successors have grown in size by the accession of new member states  और in शक्ति  by the addition of policy areas to its remit .
The  maastricht सन्धि  established the European Union under its current name in 1993 .
The latest major amendment to the constitutional basis of the EU , the Treaty of  लिस्बन , आए into फ़ोर्स in 2009  .
The EU has developed a single market through a standardised system  of  laws that apply in all member states .
Within the Schengen Area ( which includes 22 EU and 4  non-eu राज्य ) पासपोर्ट  controls have been abolished .
EU policies aim to ensure the free movement of people , goods , services , and capital , enact legislation in  इंसाफ और घर अफेयर्स  , and maintain common policies on trade , agriculture , fisheries and regional development .
A monetary union , the eurozone , was established in 1999 and is  रचित of  17 member states .
Through the Common Foreign and Security Policy the EU has developed a role in  बाह्य संबंध और  defence .
Permanent diplomatic missions have  महरूम  established around the world .
The EU is represented at  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , the  WTO , the G8 and the G-20 .
With a combined population of over 500 million  निवासियों , or 7.3 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी , the eu , in 2012 , उत्पन्न  a nominal gross domestic product ( GDP ) of 16.584 trillion US dollars , representing approximately 20 % of the global GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity , and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world .
The EU was the recipient of  the 2012  Nobel Peace Prize .
The Wales  नेशनल रग्बी लीग टोली  represent Wales in international rugby league football matches .
Currently the team  is सातवाँ  in the RLIF World Rankings .
The team were run under the auspices  of  the Rugby Football League , but an independent body , Wales Rugby League , now runs the team from Cardiff .
a कुल of तीन वेल्श  players have been entered into the Rugby League Hall Of Fame .
Similar to many other Welsh national sporting teams , Wales  स्ट्रिप रै महरूम primarily  red for many years , including now .
however in  their last World Cup campaign in 2000 they did wear a shirt featuring the Welsh flag , adding a touch of green and white .
The team is known as `` The  ड्रेगन '' और so the टीमों  logo on the shirt is a red dragon .
The team date back to 1907 , making them the third oldest  नेशनल पक्ष  after England and New Zealand .
And it was a touring New Zealand side that  वेल्स पहला  played against in 1908 , winning 9-8 at Aberdare .
Since then Wales have  regularly निभाई इंग्लैण्ड , चूंकि  1935 France , as well as welcomed the touring Australia and New Zealand teams , although they rarely toured themselves , not playing a match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975 .
For twenty-six years Wales competed against their two biggest rivals , England and France , in the European  राष्ट्र कप , जीतना the  trophy four times .
वेल्स have भी competed  in the World Cup on three occasions , the first time being in 1975 .
In 1995 and 2000 they had their most successful tournaments to date , surprisingly  बनाना the semi-finals on दोनो अवसरों  before being beaten by England and Australia respectively .
Wales failed to qualify for the 2008 World Cup , being the second highest ranked  पक्ष नहीं to do so , having खोया to  Scotland on points difference over two matches .
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new head coach and appointed Lee Briers as  कप्तान  , having played for Wales since 1998 .
In recent seasons Wales  have  taken massive strides under former player Iestyn Harris who has coached Wales to back to back European Cup successes , which culminated in a Four Nations appearance in 2011 .
Cardiomyopathy (  वस्तुतः `` दिल मांसपेशी  disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the heart muscle ) for any reason , usually leading to heart failure ; common symptoms are dyspnea ( breathlessness ) and peripheral edema ( swelling of the legs ) .
People with cardiomyopathy are often at risk of dangerous forms of irregular heart  ताल और अचानक हृदय  death .
The most common form of cardiomyopathy is  dilated cardiomyopathy  .
Fuck in its literal meaning  refers to the  act of sexual intercourse .
It is an English word that is often  प्रयुक्त as a profanity  , either to denote disdain or as an intensifier .
The origin of the word is obscure  .
It is  प्रायः माना  to be first attested to around 1475 , but it may be considerably older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can  be  used in the position of a noun , a verb , an adjective or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the word , as well as a number  of यौगिकों incorporating  it , such as motherfucker .
Note : this article adopts the  u.S. विभाग of परिवहन 's परिभाषा of a यात्री  vehicle , to mean a car or truck , used for passengers , excluding buses and trains .
The  संयुक्त राज्य  is home to the largest passenger vehicle market of any country in the world .
Overall , there were an  अनुमानित  254.4 million registered passenger vehicles in the United States according to a 2007 DOT study .
This number , along with the average age of vehicles , has increased steadily  चूंकि 1960 , indicating a growing क्रमांक of वाहनों  per capita .
The Chinese car market , however , is poised to soon exceed the United States ; by the end of 2012 , there  यहूद over 240 लाख  cars on the road in China .
The United States is also home to three large vehicle manufacturers : General Motors , Ford Motor Company and Chrysler , which  have historically महरूम referred  to as the `` Big Three . ''
Chrysler however is no longer among the top three ; but is number five , behind  टोयोटा और  Honda .
The motor car has clearly become an integral part of American life ,  साथ  vehicles outnumbering licensed drivers .
Clinical laboratory in a Hospital setting showing  अनेक  automated analysers .
A medical laboratory or clinical laboratory is a laboratory where tests are done on clinical specimens in order to get information about the health of a  रोगी as pertaining to the निदान  , treatment , and prevention of disease .
In poker , players construct  हैंड्स of पाँच ताश according  to predetermined rules , which vary according to which variant of poker is being played .
These hands are compared using a hand ranking system that is standard across  सब विसंगतियाँ of पोकर  , the player with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker .
In some variants , the lowest-ranking hand can win  or टाई .
These hand rankings are also  प्रयुक्त in  some other card games , and in poker dice .
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by  सहित अनेक ताश of the वही  card rank , by all five cards being from the same suit , or by all five cards being of consecutive rank .
The relative ranking  of the विभिन्न हाथ श्रेणी  is based on the probability of being randomly dealt such a hand from a well- shuffled deck .
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23 , 1954 ) is an American  virtuoso ; a सिंगर , pianist , सिंथेसाइज़र , accordion  , and dulcimer player , and songwriter .
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances , Hornsby draws frequently from classical , jazz , bluegrass , folk , Motown ,  इन्जील , चट्टान , ब्लूज़ , और jam बैंड musical परंपराओं साथ उसके songwriting  and the seamless improvisations contained within .
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a number of occasions with industry awards , including the Best New Artist Grammy in 1987 with Bruce Hornsby and the Range , the Best Bluegrass Recording Grammy in 1990 ,  and the  Best Pop Instrumental Grammy in 1993 .
Hornsby has also achieved recognition for his solo albums and performances , his touring band Bruce Hornsby and the Noisemakers , his bluegrass  प्रोजेक्ट साथ रिकी skaggs और उसके दिखावे as a session-  and guest-musician .
He also collaborated with Grateful Dead and was a member of the band from September 1990 to March 1992 , playing at over one hundred shows  दौरान कि  period .
गन्ना  plantation in rural Cuba
Agriculture in Cuba has played an important part in the economy for several  सौ सालो  .
कृषि contributes  less than 10 percent to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , but it employs roughly 20 percent of the working population .
About 30 percent of the country 's land is used for crop  cultivation  .
The inefficient  agricultural उद्योग in क्यूबा  has led to the need to import large amounts of foods .
Cuba  अभी imports  about 80 % of the food it rations to the public .
The rationing program accounts for about a third of the  खाना उर्जा the औसत क्यूबन consumes  .
overall , however , क्यूबा is निर्भर on imports लिये तभी 16 % of इसके खाना  .

Mega Millions ( initially called The Big Game  आचमन लाखो as the successor  of The Big Game ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game .
The first ( The Big Game  ) आचमन लाखो  drawing was in 2002 ( see below ) .
The  न्यूनतम आचमन लाखो advertised जैकपॉट  is $ 12,000,000 , paid in 26 equal yearly installments ( unless the cash option is chosen ) ; usually , the jackpot increases when there is no top-prize winner .
However , despite no jackpot winner for the $ 12,000,000 December 18 , 2012 drawing , the jackpot remained at $ 12,000,000 for  the आरेखण to be  held on December 21 .
( See below for information on  कैसा the खेल  's jackpot is funded . )
reflecting आम अभ्यास  among American lotteries , the jackpot is advertised as a nominal value of annual installments .
A cash value option ( the usual choice ) , when chosen by a jackpot winner ( see below ) , pays the approximate present value  of the किश्तों  .
Mega  लाखो फिलहाल  uses a 5/56 ( white balls ) plus 1/46 ( the Mega Ball ) double matrix to select its winning numbers .
Each game  लागत  $ 1 .
In 43 of the 44 Mega  लाखो  jurisdictions ( California is the exception ) , there is an option , called Megaplier ( such games are $ 2 each ) where non-jackpot prizes are multiplied by 2 , 3 , or 4 .
The Megaplier was  बना उपलब्धियाँ  to all Mega Millions jurisdictions in January 2011 ; it began as a Texas -only option .
Mega  लाखो  is drawn at 10:59 p.m. Eastern time Tuesdays and Fridays , including holidays .
Mega Millions is administered by  a  consortium of its 12 original lotteries and the drawings are held at WSB-TV in Atlanta , Georgia .
supervised by  the  Georgia Lottery .
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions , as well as in American lottery history , was $ 656,000,000 annuitized ( with a cash option of $ 474,000,000 )  लिये the कूच 30 , 2012 आरेखण in जिससे  there were three jackpot-winning tickets ; one each in Illinois , Kansas , and Maryland .
All three  टिकटें था महरूम claimed as  of April 18 , with each set of winners choosing the cash option .
is a Japanese  manga श्रेणी निर्मित by लेखक  Tsugumi Ohba and manga artist Takeshi Obata .
The main  अक्षर is लाइट yagami , a ऊँची  school student who discovers a supernatural notebook , the `` Death Note '' , dropped on Earth by a shinigami ( a god of death ) named Ryuk .
The Death Note grants its user the ability to kill anyone whose name and face they know , by writing the name in the  कोपी जबकि picturing  their face .
The series centers around Light 's attempt to create and rule a world `` cleansed of evil  '' as `` परमेश्वर ''  using the notebook , and the efforts of a detective known as L to stop him .
Death Note was first serialized  in 108 अध्याय by shueisha  in the Japanese manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump from December 2003 to May 2006 .
The series was also published in tankōbon format in Japan starting in May 2004 and  समाप्ति in अक्तूबर 2006 साथ a कुल of तेरह आयतन  .
The anime  श्रेणी aired  in Japan from October 3 , 2006 , to June 26 , 2007 .
रचित of 37 एपीसोड  , the anime was developed by Madhouse and directed by Tetsuro Araki .
A light novel based on the   series , written by Nisio Isin , was released in Japan .
Additionally , various video games  have महरूम  published by Konami for Nintendo DS .
The series was adapted into live-action films released in Japan on June 17 , 2006 , November 3 , 2006 , and   February 2 , 2008 .
Viz Media licensed the Death Note manga in North America and has  प्रकाशित सब the बारह आयतन  from the series , a 13th volume which serves as a `` reader 's guide '' , as well as the light novels .
The episodes from the anime  पहला appeared  in North America as downloadable by IGN .
Viz later licensed the  दुश्मनी श्रेणी और it  aired on Bionix in Canada and on Cartoon Network in the United States .
The live-action films briefly played in  निश्चित उत्तर  American theaters since 2008 .
However , none of the video games  have यूँ दूर  been published in North America or Europe .
Death Note is one of Weekly Shōnen Jumps  best-selling manga श्रेणी of  all time , with sales over 26.5 million copies .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ) , also known as All Hallows ' Eve , is a yearly celebration observed in a number of countries on October 31 , the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints )  और the दिन initiating the triduum  of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars , All Hallows ' Eve is a Christianised feast originally influenced by western European harvest festivals , and festivals of the dead   with possible pagan roots , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
अन्य  scholars maintain that it originated independently of Samhain and has solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties , carving pumpkins into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , apple bobbing , visiting  haunted आकर्षण , playing pranks , telling डरावने कहानियां  , and watching horror films .
New York City taxicabs during  midtown फटाफट घंटा  in Manhattan
The taxicabs of New York City , with their distinctive yellow  पेंट , हैं a widely पहचाना प्रतीक of  the city .
Taxicabs are operated by private companies and licensed by the New York City Taxi and  लिमोज़ीन आयोग ( tlc )  .
It also oversees over 40,000 other for-hire vehicles , including `` black cars '' ,  commuter वैन और ambulettes  .
`` Medallion taxis , '' the familiar  पीला  cabs , are the only vehicles in the city permitted to pick up passengers in response to a street hail .

Xylem is one of the two types of  हस्तांतरण ऊतक  in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ) , meaning  `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम  tissue is wood , though it is found throughout the plant .
Its basic function is to  हस्तांतरण जल , लकिन it भी  transports some nutrients through the plant .
U.S. women  suffragists demonstrating  for the right to vote , February 1913 .
Women 's suffrage also known as woman suffrage is the right of women to vote and to  चलाएं  for office .
Limited voting rights were gained by women in  स्वीडन , फिनलैंड और कुछ पश्चिमी  U.S. states in the late 19th century .
International organizations were formed to coordinate efforts , especially the International Council of Women ( 1888 ) and the International  Woman  Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ) .
In 1893 , New Zealand , then a self-governing British colony , granted adult women the right to vote and the self-governing British colony of South Australia did the  वही in 1895 , लकिन भी permitted महिलाओं to चलाएं लिये  office .
Australia   federated in 1901 , and women acquired the right to vote and stand in federal elections from 1902 , though uneven restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in national elections were not completely removed until 1962 .
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of Finland , then part of the Russian Empire , which also produced  the संसार 's पहला मादा सदस्यों  of parliament in the 1907 parliamentary elections .
Norway followed ,  granting पूरा  women 's suffrage in 1913 .
In most  पश्चिमी देशों , महिलाओं 's  suffrage came after World I War I I , with some important late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971 .
Women 's suffrage has generally been recognized after political  अभियान to obtain it  were waged .
In many countries it was  granted पहले सार्वभौमिक  suffrage .
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under the  सम्मेलन on the विलोपन  of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women , adopted by the United Nations in 1979 .
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by Diane Setterfield is a gothic suspense novel , the author 's  पहला प्रकाशित किताब  .
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian  restorationist ईसाई denomination साथ nontrinitarian मान्यताओं  distinct from mainstream Christianity .Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : • Denomination : The organization reports worldwide membership of over 7.78 million adherents involved in evangelism , convention attendance of over 12 million , and annual Memorial attendance of over 19 million .
They are directed by the  Governing  Body of Jehovah 's Witnesses , a group of elders in Brooklyn , New York , that establishes all doctrines .
Jehovah 's Witnesses  '  beliefs are based on their interpretations of the Bible and they prefer to use their own translation , the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures .
They believe that the  विनाश of the उपस्थित संसार प्रणाली  at Armageddon is imminent , and that the establishment of God 's kingdom on earth is the only solution for all problems faced by mankind .
The group emerged from the Bible Student movement  —founded in the लेट 1870s by चार्ल्स taze रसेल  with the formation of Zion 's Watch Tower Tract Society —with significant organizational and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford .
The name Jehovah 's witnesses , based on Isaiah 43:10–12 , was adopted in 1931 to distinguish themselves from  अन्य बाइबल छात्र  groups and symbolize a break with the legacy of Russell 's traditions .
Jehovah 's  गवाह हैं बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये  their door-to-door preaching , distributing literature such as The Watchtower and Awake !
, and refusing military  सेवा और रक्त transfusions  .
They   consider use of the name Jehovah vital for proper worship .
They reject Trinitarianism , inherent immortality  of the आत्मा , और hellfire , जिससे  they consider to be unscriptural doctrines .
They do  नहीं observe क्रिसमस  , Easter , birthdays , or other holidays and customs they consider to have pagan origins incompatible with Christianity .
Adherents commonly refer to  उनके देह of मान्यताओं as ``  the truth '' and consider themselves to be `` in the truth '' .
They consider secular society to  be morally  corrupt and under the influence of Satan , and most limit their social interaction with non-Witnesses .
Congregational disciplinary actions include  disfellowshipping , उनके  term for formal expulsion and shunning .
Baptized individuals who formally leave are considered disassociated  और हैं भी  shunned .
Disfellowshipped and disassociated individuals may eventually be reinstated if  deemed repentant  .
The religion 's position regarding conscientious objection to military service and refusal to salute  नेशनल ध्वज रै brought it into विरोध साथ  some governments .
Consequently , Jehovah 's Witnesses have been persecuted and their activities are  banned  or restricted in some countries .
Persistent legal challenges by Jehovah 's Witnesses have influenced legislation related to civil rights in several  देशों  .
Last Tango in  पेरिस  ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian romantic Drama film directed by Bernardo Bertolucci which portrays a recent American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young , betrothed Parisian woman .
It stars Marlon Brando , Maria Schneider ,  और jean-pierre léaud  .
the फिल्मी 's कच्चा portrayal of यौन हिंसा और emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय विवाद और खींचा विभिन्न स्तर of सरकारी सेंसरशिप .
The MPAA gave the film an X rating upon  रिलीज in the संयुक्त  States .
After revisions were made to the MPAA ratings code , it was classified as an NC-17 in   1997 .
MGM released a censored R-rated cut in 1981   .
The film has its NC-17 rating for `` some  सुस्पष्ट  sexual content . ''
Windows XP is an operating system produced  by microsoft  for use on personal computers , including home and business desktops , laptops and media centers .
First released to computer manufacturers on August 24 , 2001 , it is the second most popular version of  खिड़कियाँ , आधारित on संस्थापित  user base .
The name `` XP '' is short for ``  अनुभव '' , highlighting  the enhanced user experience .
Windows XP , the successor to  खिड़कियाँ 2000 और खिड़कियाँ me , थी the पहला consumer-oriented  operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel .
Windows XP was released worldwide for retail sale on October 25   , 2001 , and over 400 million copies were in use in January 2006 .
It was succeeded by Windows Vista  in जनवरी 2007  .
Direct  oem और  retail sales of Windows XP ceased on June 30 , 2008 .
Microsoft  जारी to  sell Windows XP through their System Builders ( smaller OEMs who sell assembled computers ) program until January 31 , 2009 .
On April 10 , 2012 , Microsoft reaffirmed that extended support for Windows XP and Office 2003 would end on April 8 , 2014 and  सुझाया कि  administrators begin preparing to migrate to a newer OS .
The NT -based versions of Windows , which are programmed in C , C++ , and assembly , are known for their improved stability and efficiency over the  9x संस्करण of microsoft  Windows .
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned graphical user  इंटरफ़ेस , a बदलें microsoft प्रचारित  as more user-friendly than previous versions of Windows .
In an attempt to further  ameliorate the `` dll नरक `` कि plagued the पास्ट संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ , improved  side-by-side assembly technology in Windows XP allows side-by-side installation , registration and servicing of multiple versions of globally shared software components in full isolation .
It is also the first version  of  Windows to use product activation to combat illegal copying .
During Windows XP 's development , the project was codenamed `` Whistler '' , after Whistler , British Columbia , as many Microsoft employees  skied at the whistler-blackcomb  ski resort .
According to web analytics data generated by Net Applications , Windows XP was the most widely used operating system until August 2012  , when  Windows 7 overtook it .
, Windows XP market share is at 38.99 % ,  having decreased लगभग प्रत्येक  month since at least November 2007 , the first month for which statistics are publicly available from Net Applications .
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an Argentine tango with music  और गीत लिखा  in 1935 by Carlos Gardel and Alfredo Le Pera respectively .
The name is a Spanish horse-racing  phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर  '' , which refers to a horse winning a race by the length of one head .
The lyrics  बोलो of a बाध्यता  horse-track gambler who compares his addiction for horses with his attraction to women .
Alfredo Le Pera was a Brazilian from São Paulo , a much Italian-influenced area in Brazil , and also the birthplace of  zequinha de abreu , composer of tico-tico  no Fubá .
Le Pera and Gardel died in an airplane crash in Medellín , ( Colombia ) , on June 24  , 1935  .
पोर ऊना  Cabeza
The tango has since been performed by  numerous  tango orchestras .
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ) , Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , Schindler 's List ( 1993 ) , True Lies ( 1994 ) , Titanic ( 1996 ) , Bad Santa ( Uncut  संस्करण , 2003 ) , सब the किंग 's मेन ( 2006 ) , ग्रह  51 ( 2009 ) , episode 37 of Nip/Tuck ( 2003–2010 ) , episode 9 of South Korean drama series Sweet Spy ( 2005–08 ) , the beginning and ending credits of the South Korean drama broadcast I 'm Sorry , I Love You ( 2004 ) , and the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007 ) .
In the movie Frida ( Salma Hayek , 2002 ) , Gardel is heard  गायन  it on a radio .
It is also quoted in David Del  tredici 's `` शुभ  News !
Nilda is Back '' ( from the song cycle Miz  inez sez  ) .
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) , the tango is performed by the `` The Tango Project '' , who actually appear in the  नाचना झाँकी अभिनीत al पचिनो (  the recording used is available on one of their CD albums ) .
John  विलियम्स arranged  a version of the piece that appears on the album `` Cinema Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman .
Perlman  और विलियम्स  ( conducting ) have also performed the piece together in live concerts .
In 2012 a dance version was released by the group `` Da Carrera '' featuring  the  original vocal recording by Carlos Gardel .
The baroreflex or  baroreceptor reflex is  one of the body 's homeostatic mechanisms for maintaining blood pressure .
It provides a negative feedback loop in which an elevated blood pressure reflexively causes heart rate to decrease therefore causing  रक्त दबाव to घटी ; likewise , decreased रक्त दबाव  activates the baroreflex , causing heart rate to increase thus causing an increase in blood pressure .
The system relies on specialized neurons , known  as baroreceptors  , in the aortic arch , carotid sinuses , and elsewhere to monitor changes in blood pressure and relay them to the brainstem .
Subsequent changes in blood pressure are mediated by  the  autonomic nervous system .
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms a parallel negative feedback loop  in an endocrinological  contrast to the renin-angiotensin system .
The Loma Prieta earthquake , also known as the Quake of '89 and the World  श्रेणी भूकंप , थी  a major earthquake that struck the San Francisco Bay Area of California on October 17 , 1989 , at 5:04 pm local time .
Caused by a slip along the San Andreas Fault ,  the भूकंप lasted 10–15 सेकेंड  and measured 6.9 on both the moment magnitude scale ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale .
The quake killed 63 people throughout northern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , घायल 3,757 और बाएँ  some 3,000–12,000 people homeless .
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up  अभ्यास लिये the तीसरा खेल of the 1989  World Series , featuring both of the Bay Area 's Major League Baseball teams , the Oakland Athletics and the San Francisco Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage , this was the first major earthquake in the United States to have its initial jolt  ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव on टेलीविज़न  .
Pawn in the standard Staunton  पैटर्न
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest piece in  the खेल of शतरंज , historically  representing infantry or , more particularly , armed peasants or pikemen .
In chess , each player begins the game  साथ आठ प्यादे  , one on each square of the rank immediately in front of the other pieces .
( In algebraic notation , the white pawns start on  a2 , b2 , c2 , ... , h2 , जबकि  black pawns start on a7 , b7 , c7 , ... , h7 . )
Individual pawns are referred  to  by the file on which they stand .
For example , one speaks of `` White  's  f-pawn '' or `` Black 's b-pawn '' , or less commonly ( using descriptive notation ) , `` White 's king 's bishop pawn '' or `` Black 's queen 's knight pawn '' .
It is also common to refer to a rook pawn , meaning any pawn on the a- or h-file , a knight pawn ( on the b- or g-file  ) , a बिशप साहूकार ( on the c- or f-file ) ,  a queen pawn ( on the d-file ) , a king pawn ( on the e-file ) , and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ) .
The military forces of the world have differing approaches to the enlistment of homosexual ( gay and lesbian )  और द्विलिंगी individuals  .
The armed forces  of सबसे विकसित  countries have now removed policies excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( with strict policies on sexual harassment ) .
Nations that permit  gay  people to serve openly in the military include the 4 of the 5 members of the UN Security Council ( United States , United Kingdom , France , and Russia ) , the Republic of China ( Taiwan ) , Australia , Israel , South Africa , Argentina , and all NATO members excluding Turkey .
Hydrogen production is the family of  औद्योगिक  methods for generating hydrogen .
Currently the dominant  प्रौद्योगिकी  for direct production is steam reforming from hydrocarbons .
Many other  विधि हैं ज्ञात सहित  electrolysis and thermolysis .
In 2006 , the United States was estimated to have a  उत्पादन क्षमता  of 11 million tonnes of hydrogen .
5 million tonnes of hydrogen were consumed on-site in oil refining , and in the production of ammonia ( Haber process   ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ) .
0.4 million tonnes   were an incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali process .
हाइड्रोजन  production is an estimated $ 100 billion industry .
A basis point ( often denoted as bp , colloquially referred to in the plural as `` bips '' , also known as a `` beep '' ) is a unit equal to one hundredth of a percentage point ,  or एक भाग प्रति टेन हजार  , 1/10000 .
The same unit is also (  rarely ) पुकारा a permyriad , वस्तुतः  meaning 'for ( every ) myriad ( ten thousand ) ' , and in that context is written with which looks like a percent sign ( % ) with two extra zeroes at the end ( like a stylized form of the four zeros in the denominator , although it originates as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ) .
A  आधार  point is defined as:
1 basis point = 1  permyriad = एक  one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % =  0.1‰  = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1 %  = 100 bp = 100
Basis  अंक हैं प्रयुक्त as a सुविधाजनक  unit of measurement in contexts where percentage differences of less than 1 % are discussed .
The most common example is interest rates , where differences in interest rates of less than 1 % per year are usually  meaningful to talk  about .
For example , a  अंतर of 0.10 प्रतिशत अंक is  equivalent to a change of 10 basis points ( e.g . a 4.67 % rate increases by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ) .
Like percentage points , basis points avoid the ambiguity between relative and absolute discussions about interest rates by dealing only  साथ  the absolute change in numeric value of a rate .
For example , if a report says there  रै महरूम a `` 1 % बढ़ाएँ '' इससे a 10 % ब्याज  rate , this could refer to an increase either from 10 % to 10.1 % ( relative , 1 % of 10 % ) , or from 10 % to 11 % ( absolute , 1 % plus 10 % ) .
If , however , the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase '' from a 10 % interest rate , then we know that the interest rate of 10 % has increased by  0.10 % ( the निरपेक्ष  change ) to a 10.1 % rate .
it is आम  practice in the financial industry to use basis points to denote a rate change in a financial instrument , or the difference ( spread ) between two interest rates , including the yields of fixed-income securities .
Since certain loans and bonds may commonly be quoted in relation to some index or underlying  सुरक्षा , वे होगा प्रायः be कोटेड  as a spread over ( or under ) the index .
For example , a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) is said to be 50 basis  अंक over libor , जिससे is commonly expressed as `` l+50bps '' or बस `` l+50 ''  .
The term ``  आधार पाइंट  '' has its origins in trading the `` basis '' or the spread between two interest rates .
Since the basis is usually small , these are quoted multiplied up by 10000 , and hence a `` full point  '' गति in the `` आधार '' is  a basis point .
कंट्रास्ट साथ  pips in FX forward markets .
The relationship between percentage  परिवर्तन और आधार अंक  can be summarized as follows : 1 percentage point change = 100 basis points , and 0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point .
So , a bond whose yield increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by 50 basis points ; or interest rates that have risen 1 percentage point are  कहा to have increased by 100 आधार  points .
The British Royal Family is the  समूह of  close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom .
The term is also commonly applied to the same group of people who are the relations of  the monarch in उसके or उसके भूमिका as sovereign of कोई of the अन्य  Commonwealth realms , thus sometimes at variance with official national terms for the family .
Members of the Royal Family belong to , either by birth or marriage , the House of  विंडसर , चूंकि 1917 , जब जार्ज  V changed the name of the royal house from Saxe-Coburg and Gotha .
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at war with Germany and given the British Royal Family 's strong German ancestry ; it was felt that its public image could be improved by  चुनना a अधिक अंग्रेजों  house name .
the नई नाम चुनी , विंडसर , था बिल्कुल  no connection other than as the name of the castle which was and continues to be a royal residence .
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal Family , and different lists will include different people , those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ) , or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered  सदस्यों , जिससे प्रायः परिणाम in the अनुप्रयोग of the पद to the monarch , the consort  of the monarch , the widowed consorts of previous monarchs , the children of the monarch and previous monarchs , the male-line grandchildren of the monarch and previous monarchs , and the spouses and the widows of a monarch 's and previous monarch 's sons and male-line grandsons .
On 30 November 1917 , King George V issued Letters Patent defining who are members of the Royal Family ; the text of the notice  इससे the लंदन  Gazette is as follows:
In 1996 , Her Majesty The Queen modified these Letters Patent , as was evidenced  by इस सूचना  from the London Gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and a style borne by members of the Royal Family to additional persons to be born , evidenced  by इस सूचना इससे the लंदन gazette:
Members and  रिश्तेदारों of the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार historically  represented the monarch in various places throughout the British Empire , sometimes for extended periods as viceroys , or for specific ceremonies or events .
Today , they often perform ceremonial and  सोशल कर्तव्य throughout  the United Kingdom and abroad on behalf of the United Kingdom .
aside  from the monarch , their only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve , if eligible and when appointed by letters patent , as a Counsellor of State , two or more of whom exercise the authority of the Crown ( within stipulated limits ) in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch .
In the other realms of the Commonwealth   royalty do not serve as Counsellors of State .
However in each such realm the monarch 's family members may act on behalf of , are funded by , and represent the sovereign of that particular  राज्य , और नहीं the  United Kingdom .
The Queen , her consort , her children and grandchildren ,  as खूब as सब पूर्व अधिपति ' children  and grandchildren hold places in the first sections of the official orders of precedence in England and Wales , Scotland , and Northern Ireland .
Wives of the  कहा आनंद उनके पतियों  ' precedence , and husbands of princesses are unofficially but habitually placed with their wives as well .
However , the Queen changed the private order of precedence  in the royal परिवार in पक्ष of राजकुमारियों  Anne and Alexandra , who henceforth take private precedence over the Duchess of Cornwall , who is otherwise the realm 's highest ranking woman after the Queen herself .
She did not  alter  the relative precedence of other born-princesses , such as the daughters of her younger sons .
Haiti ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti ) ,  officially the गणतंत्र of हैती  ( ; ) , is a Caribbean country .
It occupies the western , smaller portion of  the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला  , in the Greater Antillean archipelago , which it shares with the Dominican Republic .
Ayiti ( land of high mountains ) was  the स्वदेशी  Taíno or Amerindian name for the island .
The country 's highest point is Pic la  selle , at  .
The total area  of हैती is  and its capital is Port-au-Prince .
Haitian Creole  और फ्रेंच  are the official languages .
Haiti 's regional , historical  ,  and ethno-linguistic position is unique for several reasons .
It was the first independent nation of Latin America and the  Caribbean , the  first black -led republic in the world , and the second republic in the Americas when it gained independence in 1804 as part of a successful slave revolution lasting nearly a decade .
In 2012 , Haiti announced its  इरादे to तलाश  associate membership status in the African Union .
Haiti is the most populous of  the predominantly  Francophone independent nations in the Americas .
It  is एक of तभी दो  independent nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to designate French as an official language ; the other French-speaking areas are all overseas départements , or collectivités , of France .
Haiti is the most  populous पूरा member-state  of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) .
It is the poorest country in the Americas as measured by the Human  विकास अनुक्रमणिका  .
Political violence has occurred regularly throughout its history , leading   to government instability .
Most recently , in February 2004 , a coup d'état originating in the north of the country  मजबूर  the resignation and exile of President Jean-Bertrand Aristide .
A provisional government took control with security  provided by the संयुक्त  Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti ( MINUSTAH ) .
Michel Martelly , the current  अध्यक्ष , थी निर्वाचित in the  Haitian general election , 2011 .
The island has had a history of destructive  भूकंप  .
A 7.0  परिमाण भूकंप struck हैती  on 12 January 2010 and devastated Port-au-Prince .
the उच्चतम विश्वसनीय  death count was estimated at 220,000 .
Haitian government  estimates यहूद उच्चतर  .
The Presidential palace , Parliament and many other important structures were destroyed , along with  अनगिनत घरों और व्यवसायों  , leaving hundreds of thousands of people homeless .
The country has yet to recover from the 2010 earthquake ( and subsequent incidents ) due to both the severity of the  क्षति  Haiti endured in 2010 , as well as a government that was ineffective well before the earthquake .
United States aid organizations have  दान  $ 2 billion .
Combined with other international donations , these funds are intended to  योगदान to the  rebuilding of the country .
The Bloody Beetroots is the pseudonym of Sir Bob Cornelius  rifo , the इतालवी इलेक्ट्रो  house and dance-punk music producer , DJ and photographer .
The Bloody Beetroots is well-known for  the ब्लैक venom मुखौटा  he wears during performances .
In fact , the only identifying public feature of Rifo is the year ``  1977 '' tattooed  across his chest , which is both the year that the producer and punk-rock was born .
`` The Bloody Beetroots DJ set '' contains  सर bob  Cornelius Rifo and Tommy Tea .
A Motorola Advisor  alphanumeric  pager used in Brazil in the 1990s , operated by Teletrim
A pager is a wireless  दूरसंचार  device that receives and displays numeric or text messages , or receives and announces voice messages .
One-way pagers can only receive messages , while response pagers and two-way pagers can also acknowledge , reply to ,  और originate संदेश  using an internal transmitter .
Pagers operate as part of a paging system which includes one or  अधिक फिक्स्ड ट्रांसमीटरों ( or in the मामला  of response pagers and two-way pagers , one or more base stations ) , as well as a number of pagers carried by mobile users .
These systems can range from a restaurant system with a single low-power transmitter , to a nationwide  प्रणाली साथ हज़ारों of high-power  base stations .
One of the first practical paging  सेवाएं  was launched in 1950 for physicians in the New York City area .
Physicians paid US $ 12 per month for the service and carried a ( 6 oz )  पेजर कि होता प्राप्त  phone messages within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower .
The system was   manufactured by the Reevesound Company and operated by Telanswerphone .
In 1960 , John Francis Mitchell combined elements   of Motorola 's Walkie Talkie and automobile radio technologies to create the first transistorized pager , and from this point , paging technology continued to advance , and pager adoption continued to expand , until the early 1990s .
However  , by the mid-1990s , as सेल्यूलर technologies  became cheaper and more widely available , advanced services began to displace paging as a commercial product .
Today , pagers exist largely as niche  उत्पाद , ढूंढना  preferential use in applications such as hospitals , public safety , and retail locations where their simplicity , high reliability , and low cost represent significant advantages .
Reevesville is a town in Dorchester County , South  कैरोलिना , संयुक्त  States .
The population was 196 at the   2010 census .
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget , and used by the U.S. Census Bureau for  सांख्यिकीय उद्देश्य तभी , reevesville is शामिल भीतर the charleston-north charleston-summerville  metropolitan area .
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y  calderón  ; July 6 , 1907 – July 13 , 1954 ) was a Mexican painter , born in Coyoacán , who is best known for her self-portraits .
Kahlo 's life  began और ended in मैक्सिको  City , in her home known as the Blue House .
She gave her birth date as July 7 , 1910 , but her  जनम प्रमाणपत्र  shows July 6 , 1907 .
Kahlo had allegedly wanted the year of her birth to coincide with the year of the beginning of the Mexican revolution so that her life would begin with  the जनम of  modern Mexico .
Her work has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of national and indigenous tradition , and by feminists for its  uncompromising चित्रण  of the female experience and form .
Mexican culture and Amerindian cultural tradition are important in  उसके कार्य  , which has been sometimes characterized as Naïve art or folk art .
Her work has also been described as `` surrealist '' , and  in 1938 आंद्रे ब्रेटन  , principal initiator of the surrealist movement , described Kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb '' .
Kahlo had  a volatile विवाह  with the famous Mexican artist Diego Rivera .
She suffered  lifelong  health problems .
Many of her health problems were the result of a traffic  दुर्घटना वो  survived as a teenager .
Recovering from her injuries isolated her from other people and this  अलगाव बहकावे उसके works , अनेक of जिससे हैं  self-portraits of one sort or another .
Kahlo suggested , `` I paint myself because I am so often alone and because I am  the विषय i जान  best . ''
She also  stated , ``  I was born a bitch .
I was born a painter  .  ''

Theresienwiese on the  दिन पहले  Oktoberfest 2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer held annually in  म्यूनिख , बायर्न  , Germany , running from late September to the first weekend in October .
It is one of the most famous events in Germany and  is the संसार 's largest मेला , साथ  more than 6 million people from around the world attending the event every year .
To the locals , it is not called Oktoberfest , but `` die Wiesn '' , after the colloquial name of the fairgrounds themselves   .
The Oktoberfest is an  महत्वपूर्ण भाग  of Bavarian culture , having been held since 1810 .
Other cities across the world also  थाम oktoberfest जश्न  , modeled after the original Munich event .
The Munich   Oktoberfest originally took place during the sixteen days up to , and including , the first Sunday in October .
In 1994 , the schedule was modified in response to German reunification so that if the first Sunday in October falls on the 1st   or 2nd , then the festival would go on until October 3 ( German Unity Day ) .
Thus , the festival is now 17 days when  the  first Sunday is October 2 and 18 days when it is October 1 .
In 2010 , the  पर्व lasted जबतक the  first Monday in October , to mark the anniversary of the event .
The festival is held in an area named the Theresienwiese ( field , or  मर्ग , of therese  ) , often called Wiesn for short , located near Munich 's center .
Large quantities of Oktoberfest Beer are consumed , with  लगभग 7  million liters served during the 16 day festival in 2007 .
Visitors may also enjoy a wide variety of traditional food such as Hendl (  मुर्गा ) , schweinebraten ( रोस्ट पोर्क ) , schweinshaxe ( ग्रील्ड हैम ओल ) , steckerlfisch ( ग्रील्ड मछली on a  stick ) , Würstl ( sausages ) along with Brezeln ( Pretzel ) , Knödel ( potato or bread dumplings ) , Käsespätzle ( cheese noodles ) , Reiberdatschi ( potato pancakes ) , Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ) .
