Wheels of  gouda
Cheese is a generic  पद  for a diverse group of milk-based food products .
Cheese is produced in wide-ranging flavors  , बनावट  , and forms .
Cheese consists of proteins  और  fat from milk , usually the milk of cows , buffalo , goats , or sheep .
It is produced by coagulation of the  मिल्क प्रोटीन  casein .
Typically , the milk is acidified and addition of the  एंजाइम rennet कल्याणकारी  coagulation .
The solids are  अलग और  pressed into final form .
Some  cheeses have  molds on the rind or throughout .
Most cheeses melt at  कुकिंग तापमान  .
Hundreds of types of cheese  इससे विभिन्न देशों  are produced .
Their styles , textures and flavors depend on the origin of the milk ( including the animal 's diet ) , whether they have been pasteurized , the   butterfat content , the bacteria and mold , the processing , and aging .
Herbs , spices , or wood smoke may be used  as flavoring  agents .
The  पीला to रेड रंग  of many cheeses , such as Red Leicester , is normally formed from adding annatto .
For a few cheeses , the milk is curdled by  adding acids ऐसे as  vinegar or lemon juice .
Most cheeses are acidified to a lesser degree  by जीवाणु , जिससे फेरे मिल्क sugars into  lactic acid , then the addition of rennet completes the curdling .
शाकाहारी विकल्प to rennet हैं उपलब्धियाँ ; सबसे  are produced by fermentation of the fungus Mucor miehei , but others have been extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family .
चीज is valued  for its portability , long life , and high content of fat , protein , calcium , and phosphorus .
Cheese is more compact and has a longer shelf life than milk , although how long a cheese will  रखना may निर्भर on the प्रकार of  cheese ; labels on packets of cheese often claim that a cheese should be consumed within three to five days of opening .
Generally speaking , hard cheeses last longer  than नरम  cheeses , such as Brie or goat 's milk cheese .
cheesemakers निकट a दुग्ध  region may benefit from fresher , lower-priced milk , and lower shipping costs .
The long storage life  of कुछ  cheese , especially if it is encased in a protective rind , allows selling when markets are favorable .
Additional ingredients may be  added to कुछ  cheeses , such as black peppers , garlic , chives or cranberries .
A specialist seller of cheese is  sometimes ज्ञात  as a cheesemonger .
To become an expert in this field ,  जैसे वाइन or  cooking , requires some formal education and years of tasting and hands-on experience .
This position is typically responsible for all aspects of the cheese inventory ; selecting the cheese menu , purchasing , receiving ,  भंडार , और ripening .
Legal citation signals are a set of brief abbreviated phrases or words used to clarify the authority or  significance of a विधिक citation as it relates  to a proposition .
Signals help a  रीडर जल्दी discern  meaning or usefulness of a particular reference when the reference itself does not provide adequate information .
Most  citation सिग्नल हैं  placed in front of the citation to which they apply .
For example , in the paragraph When  लिखने a विधिक तर्क  , it is important to refer to primary sources .
to assist  readers in locating these sources , it is desirable to use a standardized citation format .
See generally  हार्वर्ड  Law Review Association , The Bluebook : A Uniform System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) .
Note , however , that some courts may require any legal papers  कि हैं सुपुर्द  to them to conform to a different citation format .
the signal is the phrase `` see generally , '' which indicates that the  citation `` the bluebook : a वर्दी  System of Citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) '' provides general background information on the topic .
Neil Alden Armstrong ( August 5 , 1930 – August 25 , 2012 ) was an American astronaut and the first  व्यक्ति  to walk on the Moon .
He was also an aerospace engineer ,  नवल एविएटर , परीक्षण  pilot , and university professor .
Before becoming an astronaut , Armstrong was an officer in the U.S. Navy  और परोसा in the कोरियाई युद्ध  .
After the war , he earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue University and served as a test pilot at the National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics High-Speed Flight Station ,  अभी ज्ञात as the ड्राइडेन उड़ान  Research Center , where he logged over 900 flights .
He later  समाप्त ग्रैजुएट  studies at the University of Southern California .
A participant in the U.S. Air Force 's Man in Space Soonest and X-20 Dyna-Soar human spaceflight  कार्यक्रम  , Armstrong joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962 .
He made his first space flight , as command pilot of Gemini 8 , in 1966 ,  बनने नासा 's पहला  civilian astronaut to fly in space .
On this mission , he performed the first docking of two  spacecraft , साथ  pilot David Scott .
Armstrong 's second and last spaceflight was as mission commander  of the  Apollo 11 moon landing , in July 1969 .
On this  मिशन , आर्मस्ट्रांग  and Buzz Aldrin descended to the lunar surface and spent two and a half hours exploring , while Michael Collins remained in lunar orbit in the Command Module .
Along with Collins and  एल्ड्रिन , आर्मस्ट्रांग थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक  of Freedom by President Richard Nixon ; in 1978 , President Jimmy Carter presented Armstrong the Congressional Space Medal of Honor in 1978 ; he and his former crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009 .
Armstrong died in Cincinnati , Ohio , on August 25 , 2012 , at the age of 82  , बाद जटिलताओं इससे  coronary artery bypass surgery .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970  – अक्तूबर 4 , 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred  racehorse that in 1973 became the first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years .
He set race records in all three events in the Series — the Kentucky Derby ( 1:59.4 ) , the Preakness  stakes ( 1:53 ) , और the belmont stakes (  2:24 ) — records that still stand today .
He is considered to be one of  the महानतम  Thoroughbreds of all time .
In  1999 , ईएसपीएन क्रमित  Secretariat the 35th best athlete of the 20th century , the highest ranking racehorse on the list URL_http .
He ranked second behind Man o ' War in The Blood-Horse 's List of the Top  100 u.S. racehorses of the 20th सदी  .
सचिवालय  was sired by Bold Ruler out of Somethingroyal , by Princequillo .
He was  foaled  at The Meadow in Caroline County , Virginia .
Like his  प्रसिद्ध  predecessor Man o ' War , Secretariat was a large chestnut colt and was given the same nickname , `` Big Red . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire ,  nasrullah , is भी  the great-great-grandsire of 1977 Triple Crown winner Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery , he was  प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई jockey  Ron Turcotte , along with apprentice jockey Paul Feliciano ( first two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He raced in Chenery 's Meadow Stable 's blue and white  checkered रंगों  and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat stood approximately tall , and weighed , with a  75-inch girth , in उसके  racing prime .
Madrid ( , ) is the  पूंजी और  largest city of Spain .
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the  संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of  the Madrid metropolitan area is calculated to be around 6.5 million .
It is the  third-largest नगर in the यूरोपीय  Union , after London and Berlin , and its metropolitan area is the third-largest in the European Union after London and Paris .
The  नगर  spans a total of .
The city is located on the Manzanares river in the centre of both the country and the Community of Madrid ( which comprises the city of Madrid , its conurbation and extended suburbs and villages ) ; this community is bordered by  the autonomous  communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha .
as the पूंजी नगर of स्पेन , सीट of सरकारी  , and residence of the Spanish monarch , Madrid is also the political , economic and cultural centre of Spain .
The  वर्तमान महापौर is  Ana Botella from the People 's Party ( PP ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the European Union and  इसके प्रभाव in राजनीती , शिक्षा , entertainment , पर्यावरण , मीडिया , फ़ैशन  , science , culture , and the arts all contribute to its status as one of the world 's major global cities .
Due to its economic output , high standard of living , and market size , Madrid is considered the major  वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी  Europe and the Iberian Peninsula ; it hosts the head offices of the vast majority of the major Spanish companies , such as Telefónica , Iberia or Repsol .
Madrid is the most touristic city of Spain   , the fourth-most touristic of the continent , and the seventh most visited city in the world according to Forbes .
Is the 10th most livable city in the world  according to monocle  magazine , in its 2010 index .
Madrid also ranks among the 12  greenest यूरोपीय  cities in 2010. < ref name= '' http : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > Madrid is currently a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics .
Madrid houses the headquarters of the World Tourism Organization ( WTO ) , belonging to the United Nations Organization ( UN ) , the SEGIB , the Organization   of Ibero-American States ( OEI ) , and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ) .
It also hosts major international institutions regulators of Spanish : the Standing Committee of the Association of Spanish Language  अकादमियों , मुख्यालय of the  Royal Spanish Academy ( RAE ) , the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ) .
Madrid organizes fairs as FITUR , ARCO , SIMO TCI and the  cibeles मैड्रिड फ़ैशन  Week .
While Madrid possesses a modern infrastructure , it has  preserved the dekh और महसूस  of many of its historic neighbourhoods and streets .
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ; the Teatro Real ( Royal theatre ) with its restored 1850 Opera House ; the Buen Retiro Park , founded in 1631 ; the 19th-century National Library building ( founded in 1712 ) containing some of Spain 's historical archives ; a large number of National museums , and the Golden Triangle of Art , located along the Paseo del Prado and comprising three art museums : Prado Museum , the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía , a museum of modern art , and the  thyssen-bornemisza संग्रहालय , जिससे completes the त्रुटियां of the अन्य  two museums .
Cibeles Palace and Fountain have become the monument  प्रतीक of the नगर .
the पाथ of the via  Appia and of the Via Appia Traiana .
remains of  the Appian Way in Rome , near Quarto Miglio
Near  रोम  .
The Appian Way ( Latin and Italian : Via Appia ) was one of the earliest and strategically most important Roman roads of the  प्राचीन गणतंत्र  .
It connected Rome to Brindisi  , apulia  , in southeast Italy .
Its importance is indicated by its common name ,  अंकित  by Statius :
Appia teritur regina  longarum  viarum
`` the Appian way is the  महारानी of the  long roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus , the Roman censor who began and completed the first section as a military road to the south in 312 BC during  the Samnite Wars  .
The Draupner wave , a single giant  वेव measured on नई साल 's दिन  1995 , finally confirmed the existence of freak waves , which had previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak waves , monster waves , killer waves , extreme waves , and abnormal waves ) are relatively large and  spontaneous समंदर सतह लहरें कि  occur far out at sea , and are a threat even to large ships and ocean liners .
In oceanography , they are more precisely defined as  लहरें  whose height is more than twice the significant wave height ( SWH ) , which is itself defined as the mean of the largest third of waves in a wave record .
Therefore rogue waves are not necessarily the biggest waves found at  समुद्र ; वे हैं , बल्कि  , surprisingly large waves for a given sea state .
Rogue waves seem not to have a single distinct cause , but occur where physical factors  ऐसे as ऊँची हवाएँ और  strong currents cause waves to merge to create a single exceptionally large wave .
Electress Sophia of Hanover  (  1630–1714 )
The line of succession to the British throne is the ordered sequence of all those people eligible to  सफल to the सिंहासन of the संयुक्त किंगडम  and the other 15 Commonwealth realms .
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed  उत्तराधिकार on the electress sophia  of Hanover and her descendants while excluding Roman Catholics .
The British government does not publish an official list  of सब those in लकीर to सफल , लकिन the कार्य of  genealogical authors and amateur researchers suggests that there are several thousand people potentially in line .
At a summit in Perth , Western Australia in 2011 , the heads of government of  सब 16 राष्ट्रमंडल  realms agreed to take steps to adopt absolute primogeniture , end the exclusion of people married to Roman Catholics , and make other changes in the succession rules .
The line of succession is also used to select the Counsellors of State ( and a regent if the need  arises )  under the provisions of the Regency Act 1937 .
For earlier versions of the line of succession , see History of  the अंग्रेजों लकीर of  succession .
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17 , 1920July 23 , 1966 ) was an American film and stage actor The New  यॉर्क times’  obituary noted his portrayal of `` moody , sensitive young men '' .
He often  निभाई outsiders  and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber in George Stevens 's A Place in the Sun , the anguished Catholic priest in Hitchcock 's I Confess , the doomed regular soldier Robert E. Lee Prewitt in Fred Zinnemann 's From Here to Eternity , and the Jewish GI bullied by antisemites in Edward Dmytryk 's The Young Lions .
Later   , after a disfiguring car crash in 1956 , and alcohol and prescription drug abuse , he became erratic .
Nevertheless important roles were still his , including `` the reckless , alcoholic ,   mother-fixated rodeo performer '' in John Huston 's The Misfits , the title role in Huston 's , and the concentration camp victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg . ''
Clift received four Academy Award nominations during his career , three for Best Actor and one  लिये  Best Supporting Actor .
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a term commonly applied to an international military campaign which started as a  परिणाम of the 11 सितंबर  2001 terrorist attacks on the United States .
इस resulted  in an international military campaign to eliminate al-Qaeda and other militant organizations .
The United Kingdom and many other NATO and  non-nato राष्ट्र participate  in the conflict .
The phrase 'War on  आतंक ' थी पहला प्रयुक्त  by US President George W. Bush on 20 September 2001 .
The Bush administration and the Western media have since used the term   to signify a global military , political , lawful , and conceptual struggle—targeting both organizations designated as terrorist and regimes accused of supporting them .
It was typically used with a particular focus  on उग्रवादी islamists , al-qaeda  , and other jihadi groups .
Although the term is not officially used by the  प्रशासन of us अध्यक्ष  Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas Contingency Operation ) , it is still commonly used by politicians , in the media and by some aspects of government officially , such as the United States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal .
German battleship  schleswig-holstein  , Westerplatte , September 1 , 1939
Destroyer USS Shaw exploding after her forward magazine was detonated  दौरान the  Attack on Pearl Harbor
The main causes of World War II were nationalistic issues , unresolved issues , and resentments resulting from World  युद्ध i और the interwar  period in Europe , in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s .
The culmination of events that led to the outbreak of war are generally understood to be the 1939  आक्रमण  of Poland by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan .
These military aggressions were the result of decisions made by the  सत्तावादी सत्ताधारी नाजी  elite in Germany and by the leadership of the Kwantung Army in Japan .
World War II started after these aggressive actions were met with an  आधिकारिक घोषणा of युद्ध and/or हथियारबंद प्रतिरोध  .

The Mitsubishi Galant is an automobile manufactured by Mitsubishi Motors between 1969  और  2012 .
The name was  निकला  from the French word galant , meaning `` chivalrous '' .
There have been nine distinct generations  , और संचयी  sales now exceed five million .
It began as a compact sedan , but over the course of its life has evolved into a  larger  mid-size car .
Initial production was only based in Japan , but since 1994 the American market has been served by vehicles assembled at the former  diamond-star मोटर्स ( dsm ) सुविधा in सामान्य ,  Illinois .
Blood pressure ( BP ) , sometimes referred to as arterial blood pressure  , is the दबाव exerted by circulating रक्त  upon the walls of blood vessels , and is one of the principal vital signs .
जब प्रयुक्त बगैर further specification , `` रक्त दबाव '' प्रायः refers to the arterial दबाव of the प्रणालीगत परिसंचरण  .
During each heartbeat , blood pressure varies  between a अधिकतम (  systolic ) and a minimum ( diastolic ) pressure .
The blood pressure in the circulation is principally   due to the pumping action of the heart .
Differences in mean blood pressure are  जिम्मेदार लिये रक्त प्रवाह इससे एक  location to another in the circulation .
The rate of mean blood flow depends on the resistance to flow  प्रस्तुत by the  blood vessels .
Mean blood pressure decreases  as the  circulating blood moves away from the heart through arteries and capillaries due to viscous losses of energy .
Mean blood pressure  बूंदें over the  whole circulation , although most of the fall occurs along the small arteries and arterioles .
Gravity affects blood  दबाव via hydrostatic शक्तियां ( e.g. , दौरान खड़ा ) और valves in रगों , श्वास  , and pumping from contraction of skeletal muscles also influence blood pressure in veins .
Blood pressure without  further specification  usually refers to the systemic arterial pressure measured at a person 's upper arm and is a measure of the pressure in the brachial artery , the major artery in the upper arm .
A person’s blood pressure is usually expressed in terms of the systolic pressure over diastolic pressure and is measured in  millimetres of पारा ( mmhg  ) , for example 120/80 .
A veto – Latin for `` I  forbid '' – is the शक्ति ( प्रयुक्त  by an officer of the state , for example ) to unilaterally stop an official action , especially the enactment of legislation .
A veto can be absolute , as for instance in the United Nations Security Council , whose permanent  सदस्यों ( चीन  , France , Russia , United Kingdom , United States of America ) can block any resolution .
Or it can be  सीमित , as in the विधान प्रक्रम of the  United States , where a two-thirds vote in both the House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation .
A veto only gives power to stop changes , not to adopt them ( except  for  the rare `` amendatory veto '' ) .
Thus a veto allows   its holder to protect the status quo .
The concept of a veto  देह originated साथ the  Roman consuls and tribunes .
Either of the  दो consuls पकड़कर  office in a given year could block a military or civil decision by the other ; any tribune had the power to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate .
Sulfur dioxide ( also sulphur dioxide ) is the  रासायनिक यौगिक  with the formula .
It is a toxic  gas  with a pungent , irritating smell , that is released by volcanoes and in various industrial processes .
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds , their combustion generates sulfur dioxide unless the sulfur compounds are  removed  before burning the fuel .
further ऑक्सीकरण of so2 , प्रायः in the उपस्थिति  of a catalyst such as NO2 , forms H2SO4 , and thus acid rain .
Sulfur dioxide emissions are also a precursor to particulates in  the  atmosphere .
Both of these impacts are cause for concern over  the पर्यावरणीय  impact of these fuels .
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '' , `` weakness '' , and `` serious '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an autoimmune neuromuscular   disease leading to fluctuating muscle weakness and fatigability .
it is an असंक्राम्य विकार , in जिससे  weakness is caused by circulating antibodies that block acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic neuromuscular junction , inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions .
Myasthenia is treated medically with acetylcholinesterase  inhibitors or immunosuppressants  , and , in selected cases , thymectomy .
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases per million per year and rising as a result of increased  जागरूकता .
MG must be distinguished from congenital  myasthenic syndromes कि can उपस्थित  similar symptoms but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments .

Polarizing filter film with a vertical axis to  polarize  light as it enters .
Glass  substrate  with ITO electrodes .
The shapes of these electrodes   will determine the shapes that will appear when the LCD is turned ON .
Vertical ridges etched  on  the surface are smooth .
Twisted  nematic  liquid crystal .
Glass substrate  साथ आम एलेक्ट्रोड फिल्मी ( ito  ) with horizontal ridges to line up with the horizontal filter .
Polarizing filter film  साथ a आड़ा  axis to block/pass light .
Reflective surface to send light  वापस to दर्शक  .
( In a backlit LCD , this layer is replaced  साथ a लाइट सोर्स  . )
A liquid-crystal display ( LCD ) is a flat panel display , electronic  विज़ुअल प्रदर्शक  , or video display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals .
Liquid crystals do   not emit light directly .
LCDs are available to display  arbitrary images (  as in a general-purpose computer display ) or fixed images which can be displayed or hidden , such as preset words , digits , and 7-segment displays as in a digital clock .
They use the same basic technology , except that arbitrary images are made up of  a विशाल क्रमांक of छोटी  pixels , while other displays have larger elements .
LCDs are used in a wide range of applications including  कंप्यूटर  monitors , televisions , instrument panels , aircraft cockpit displays , and signage .
They are common in consumer devices such as video players , gaming devices , clocks , watches , calculators , and telephones , and have  replaced कैथोड रे ट्यूब (  CRT ) displays in most applications .
They are available in a wider range of  स्क्रीन  sizes than CRT and plasma displays , and since they do not use phosphors , they do not suffer image burn-in .
LCDs are , however , susceptible to image  हठ .
The LCD screen is more  उर्जा कुशल और  can be disposed of more safely than a CRT .
Its low electrical power consumption  enables it to be प्रयुक्त  in battery -powered electronic equipment .
It is an electronically modulated optical device made up of any number of segments filled with liquid crystals  और arrayed in सामने  of a light source ( backlight ) or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome .
Liquid crystals were first  खोजा in 1888  .
By 2008 , worldwide sales of televisions with LCD  screens exceeded सालाना  sales of CRT units ; the CRT became obsolete for most purposes .
The Borgata Hotel Casino and Spa is a luxury  होटल , कसीनो  , and spa in Atlantic City , New Jersey , United States .
It is owned by Marina District  विकास , a संयुक्त venture  between Boyd Gaming and a divesture trust established by MGM Resorts International .
The $ 1.1 billion casino hotel features 2,002 rooms and is  the largest  hotel in New Jersey .
The Borgata opened in July 2003 as a Las Vegas-style megaresort and is the  top-grossing कसीनो in अटलांटिक  City .
A bottle of high potency B-complex vitamin  संपूरक  pills .
A vitamin ( or ) is an organic compound required by an  सजीव as a vital nutrient  in limited amounts .
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is  पुकारा a विटामिन जब it  can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from the diet .
Thus , the term is conditional both on the  हालातों और on  the particular organism .
For example , ascorbic acid ( vitamin C ) is a vitamin for humans , but not for most other animals , and biotin and vitamin D are  जरूरी  in the human diet only in certain circumstances .
By convention , the term vitamin includes neither other essential nutrients , such as dietary minerals , essential fatty acids , or essential amino acids ( which are needed in larger amounts than vitamins ) nor the large number of other nutrients that promote  स्वास्थ्य  but are otherwise required less often .
तेरह विटामिन  are universally recognized at present .
Vitamins are classified by their  biological और रासायनिक  activity , not their structure .
Thus , each `` vitamin '' refers to a number  of  vitamer compounds that all show the biological activity associated with a particular vitamin .
Such a set of chemicals is grouped under an  alphabetized विटामिन  `` generic descriptor '' title , such as `` vitamin A `` , which includes the compounds retinal , retinol , and four known carotenoids .
Vitamers by definition are convertible to the active form of the vitamin in the body , and are  sometimes inter-convertible to एक another  , as well .
Vitamins have diverse  biochemical  functions .
Some have  hormone-like  functions as regulators of mineral metabolism ( such as vitamin D ) , or regulators of cell and tissue growth and differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ) .
Others function as antioxidants ( e.g. ,  विटामिन  E and sometimes vitamin C ) .
The largest number of vitamins ( such as B complex vitamins )  फलन as precursors  for enzyme cofactors , that help enzymes in their work as catalysts in metabolism .
In this role , vitamins may be tightly bound to enzymes as part of prosthetic groups : For example , biotin is part of  एंजाइमों शामिल in  making fatty acids .
विटामिन may भी be कम  tightly bound to enzyme catalysts as coenzymes , detachable molecules that function to carry chemical groups or electrons between molecules .
For example , folic acid may carry methyl , formyl , and  methylene समूह in  the cell .
Although these roles in assisting enzyme-substrate reactions are vitamins '  best-known फलन , the अन्य विटामिन  functions are equally important .
Until the mid-1930s , when the first commercial yeast-extract vitamin B complex and semi-synthetic vitamin C supplement tablets were sold , vitamins were obtained solely through food intake , and changes in diet ( which , for example , could occur during a particular growing season ) usually greatly  altered the प्रकार और amounts of  vitamins ingested .
However ,  विटामिन have महरूम उत्पादित as  commodity chemicals and made widely available as inexpensive semisynthetic and synthetic-source multivitamin dietary and food supplements and additives , since the middle of the 20th century .
World Muslim population by  प्रतिशत  ( Pew Research Center , 2009 )
संसार  Muslim population in millions
Islam is the world 's second largest religion  बाद  Christianity .
According to a 2010 study , Islam has 1.62 billion adherents , making up over  23  % of the world population .
Islam is the predominant religion in the Middle East , in Sahel , in the Horn of Africa and northern Africa , and in some  भाग of एशिया .
Large communities of Muslims are also found  in चीन , the balkans  , and Russia .
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe , for  उदाहरण , islam is the  second largest religion after Christianity , where it represents 6 % of the total population .
According to the Pew Research  बीच in 2010 वहीँ  were 49 Muslim-majority countries .
Around 62 % of the world  's  Muslims live in South and Southeast Asia , with over 1 billion adherents .
The largest Muslim  country is Indonesia  , home to 12.7 % of the world 's Muslims , followed by Pakistan ( 11.0 % ) , India ( 10.9 % ) , and Bangladesh ( 9.2 % ) .
About 20 % of Muslims live  in अरब  countries .
In the Middle East , the non-Arab countries of Turkey and Iran are the  largest muslim-majority  countries ; in Africa , Egypt and Nigeria have the most populous Muslim communities .
A study conducted by  the pew शोध बीच in 2010  and released January 2011 found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world .
The  पढ़ाई  found more Muslims in the United Kingdom than in Lebanon and more in China than in Syria .
Rhode Island ( or ) , officially  the राज्य of rhode द्वीप  and Providence Plantations , is a state in the New England region of the United States .
Rhode Island is the smallest in area , the eighth least populous , but the  दूसरी  most densely populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey .
Rhode Island is bordered by  कनेक्टिकट to the  west and Massachusetts to the north and east , and it shares a water boundary with New York 's Long Island to the southwest .
rhode द्वीप थी the पहला of the  13 original colonies to declare independence from British rule , declaring itself independent on May 4 , 1776 , two months before any other colony .
The State was also the last  of the  thirteen original colonies to ratify the United States Constitution .
Rhode Island 's official nickname is ``  the समंदर राज्य '' , a सन्दर्भ to the राज्य 's  geography , since Rhode Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to about 14 % of its total area .
Its land area  is ,  but its total area is significantly larger .
Dubai ( ; ' , ) is a city  in the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात  , located within the emirate of the same name .
The emirate of Dubai is located on the southeast coast of the Persian Gulf on the  arabian प्रायद्वीप और is एक of  the seven emirates that make up the country .
It has the largest population in the UAE ( 2,106,177 ) and the second-largest land territory by area (  4,114 km2 ) बाद abu धाबी  .
Dubai and Abu Dhabi , the national capital , are the only two emirates to have veto power over critical matters of national importance in the  देश 's विधानमंडल  .
The city of Dubai is located on  the अमीर  's northern coastline and heads up the Dubai-Sharjah-Ajman metropolitan area .
Dubai is nowadays often misperceived  as a देश or city-state  and , in some cases , the UAE as a whole has been described as 'Dubai ' .
The earliest mention of Dubai is in 1095 AD , and the earliest recorded  उपनिवेश in the प्रदेश तिथियाँ  from 1799 .
The Sheikhdom of Dubai was formally established in 1833 by Sheikh Maktoum bin Butti Al-Maktoum when he persuaded around 800  सदस्यों of उसके जनजाति  of the Bani Yas , living in what was then the Second Saudi State and now part of Saudi Arabia , to follow him to the Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani Yas .
It remained under the tribe 's control when the United Kingdom assumed protection of the Sheikhdom in 1892 and joined the nascent United Arab  अमीरात upon स्वतंत्रता  in 1971 as the country 's second emirate .
Its strategic geographic location made the town an important trading hub and by the beginning of the 20th century , Dubai was  already an  important regional port .
Today , Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis that has grown steadily to become a global city and a business and cultural  हब of the मध्य ईस्ट और the पारसी गल्फ  region .
हालांकि  Dubai 's economy was historically built on the oil industry , the emirate 's Western-style model of business drives its economy with the main revenues now coming from tourism , real estate , and financial services .
Dubai has recently attracted world  ध्यान through अनेक  innovative large construction projects and sports events .
The city has become symbolic for its skyscrapers and high-rise buildings , such as the world 's tallest  burj खलीफा , in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी  development projects including man-made islands , hotels , and some of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world .
This increased attention has also highlighted labor  and  human rights issues concerning the city 's largely South Asian paid workforce .
Dubai 's property market experienced a major deterioration in 2008–2009 as a  परिणाम  of the worldwide economic downturn following the financial crisis of 2007-2008 .
However , Dubai has made a  स्थिर और क्रमिक  recovery with help coming from neighboring emirates .
The handful of new projects that are in the pipeline have been able to help Dubai  रियल एस्टेट  make a comeback .
As of 2012 , Dubai is the 22nd  सबसे महंगी नगर  in the world , and the most expensive city in the Middle East , surpassing Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ) .
Dubai has also been rated as one  of the बेहतरीन स्थान to सजीव in the मध्य  East , including by US American global consulting firm Mercer who rated the city as the best place to live in the Middle East in 2011 .

This animation uses Earth science data from a variety of sensors on NASA Earth observing satellites to measure  शारीरिक oceanography पैरामीटर्स  such as ocean currents , ocean winds , sea surface height and sea surface temperature .
An ocean ( ; the World  समंदर  of classical antiquity ) is a body of saline water that composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere .
In the context of Earth , it refers  to एक or सब of the प्रमुख विभाजन  of the planet 's World Ocean – they are , in descending order of area , the Pacific , Atlantic , Indian , Southern ( Antarctic ) , and Arctic Oceans .
The word `` sea `` is often used interchangeably with `` ocean '' , but strictly speaking a sea is a body of  saline जल ( संभवतः a प्रभाग of the संसार समंदर  ) partly or fully enclosed by land .
Earth is the only planet known to have an ocean ( or any large  amounts of खोलें  liquid water ) .
Approximately 72  % of the ग्रह 's सतह ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is covered by saline  water that is customarily divided into several principal oceans and smaller seas , with the ocean covering approximately 71 % of the Earth 's surface .
in शर्तें of the  hydrosphere of the Earth , the ocean contains 97 % of the Earth 's water .
oceanographers  have stated that out of 97 % , only 5 % of the ocean as a whole on Earth has been explored .
Because it is the principal component of Earth 's hydrosphere , the world ocean is integral to all known life , forms part of the  carbon  cycle , and influences climate and weather patterns .
The total volume is approximately 1.3 billion  घन किलोमीटर  ( 310 million cu mi ) with an average depth of .
It is the habitat of 230,000 known species , although much of the ocean 's depths remain unexplored and it is estimated that over two  लाख समुद्री प्रजाति  exist .
The origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown , but oceans are believed to have formed in the Hadean period and may have been the impetus for the   emergence of life .
Extraterrestrial oceans may be composed  of a चौड़ी  range of elements and compounds .
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of   Titan , although there is evidence for the existence of oceans elsewhere in the Solar System .
Early in their geologic histories , Mars and Venus are theorized to have had large water  महासागर  .
The Mars  समंदर परिकल्पना suggests कि nearly a तीसरा  of the surface of Mars was once covered by water , though the water on Mars is no longer oceanic , and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus .
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its freezing point , so that water might exist in large quantities  in extraterrestrial  environments as brine or convecting ice .
Unconfirmed oceans are speculated beneath the surface of many dwarf  ग्रह और प्राकृतिक  satellites ; notably , the ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth .
The Solar System 's gas giant planets are also believed to possess  द्रव वायुमंडलीय परतों  of yet to be confirmed compositions .
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets and exomoons , including surface oceans of liquid water within a  परितारकीय ठहरने  zone .
Ocean planets are a hypothetical type of planet with  a  surface completely covered with liquid .
Elvis Aaron Presley ( January 8 , 1935 – August 16 ,  1977 ) थी  an American singer and actor .
A cultural icon , he is  commonly ज्ञात  by the single name Elvis .
One of the most popular musicians of the 20th century , he is often referred to as the `` King of  चट्टान और फेंकें '' or `` the किंग  '' .
Born in  tupelo , मिसिसिपी , प्रेस्ली  moved to Memphis , Tennessee , with his family at the age of 13 .
He began his career there in 1954 , working with Sun Records owner Sam Phillips , who wanted to bring the sound of African-American music to a  wider दर्शक  .
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and bassist Bill Black , Presley was the most important popularizer  of  rockabilly , an uptempo , backbeat -driven fusion of country and rhythm and blues .
RCA Victor acquired his contract in a deal  arranged by कर्नल tom पार्कर ,  who went on to manage the singer for over two decades .
Presley 's first RCA single , `` Heartbreak Hotel `` , released in  जनवरी  1956 , was a number-one hit .
He became the leading figure of the newly popular sound of  चट्टान और फेंकें साथ a श्रेणी  of network television appearances and chart-topping records .
His energized interpretations of songs , many from African-American  स्त्रोत , और उसके uninhibited प्रदर्शन  style made him enormously popular—and controversial .
in नवम्बर  1956 , he made his film debut in Love Me Tender .
Drafted into military service in 1958 , Presley relaunched his recording career two years later with some  of उसके सबसे  commercially successful work .
He staged few concerts however , and guided by Parker , proceeded to devote much of the 1960s to making Hollywood movies and  साउंडट्रैक एल्बम , सबसे of उन्हें critically derided  .
In 1968 ,  बाद सात सालो दूर इससे  the stage , he returned to live performance in a celebrated comeback television special that led to an extended Las Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours .
In 1973 Presley staged the first concert broadcast  globally via  satellite , Aloha from Hawaii .
नुस्खा ड्रग गाली  severely deteriorated his health , and he died suddenly in 1977 at the age of 42 .
प्रेस्ली is regarded  as one of the most important figures of 20th-century popular culture .
He had a versatile voice and unusually wide success encompassing  अनेक जाति , सहित  country , pop ballads , gospel , and blues .
He is the best-selling solo  कलाकार  in the history of popular music .
Nominated for 14 competitive Grammys , he won three , and received the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award at age  36  .
He has been  inducted into अनेक  music halls of fame .
A glass of root  बियर साथ  foam
Root beer is a carbonated , sweetened beverage  , originally  made using the root of a sassafras plant ( or the bark of a sassafras tree ) as the primary flavor .
Root beer ,  popularized  in North America , comes in two forms : alcoholic and soft drink .
The historical root beer was analogous to small beer in that the process  provided a पेय साथ  a very low alcohol content .
Although roots are used  as the सोर्स of अनेक नरम  drinks throughout the world , often different names are used .
Fluorescent minerals emit visible  लाइट  when exposed to ultraviolet light
Fluorescence is the emission   of light by a substance that has absorbed light or other electromagnetic radiation .
It  is  a form of luminescence .
In most cases , the emitted light has a longer wavelength , and  इसलिए  lower energy , than the absorbed radiation .
However , when the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense , it is possible for one electron to absorb two  photons  ; this two-photon absorption can lead to emission of radiation having a shorter wavelength than the absorbed radiation .
The emitted radiation may also be of the same wavelength as the absorbed  विकिरण , termed ``  resonance fluorescence '' .
The most striking examples of fluorescence occur when the absorbed radiation is in the ultraviolet  प्रदेश of the वर्णक्रम , और यूँ  invisible to the human eye , and the emitted light is in the visible region .
Fluorescence has many practical applications , including mineralogy , gemology , chemical sensors ( fluorescence spectroscopy ) , fluorescent labelling , dyes , biological detectors , and ,  सबसे commonly  , fluorescent lamps .
Informal logic , intuitively , refers to the principles of logic and logical thought outside   of a formal setting .
However ,  शायद क्युकी of the अनौपचारिक in the शीर्षक , the precise परिभाषा of अनौपचारिक लॉजिक is a पदार्थ of कुछ विवाद .
Ralph H.  जॉनसन और J. एंथोनी ब्लेयर define अनौपचारिक  logic as `` a branch of logic whose task is to develop non-formal standards , criteria , procedures for the analysis , interpretation , evaluation , criticism and construction of argumentation . ''
This definition reflects what had been implicit in their practice and what others  यहूद doing in उनके  informal logic texts .
Informal logic is associated with ( informal )  fallacies , नाजुक सोच , the सोच कौशल  Movement and the interdisciplinary inquiry known as argumentation theory .
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the label `` informal logic '' covers a `` collection of normative approaches to the study of reasoning in  ordinary  language that remain closer to the practice of argumentation than formal logic . ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60 , with the years of the Great  अवसाद ( 1929–1939  ) highlighted .
Unemployment rate in the US 1910–1960 , with the  सालो  of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression began in August of  1929 ,  when the United States economy first went into an economic recession .
Although the country spent two months with declining GDP , it was not until the Wall Street Crash of  अक्तूबर , 1929 कि the प्रभाव of a घटती  economy were felt , and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued .
The market crash marked the beginning of a decade of high unemployment , poverty , low profits , deflation , plunging farm incomes , and lost opportunities for economic  विकास और निजी उन्नति  .
Although its causes are still uncertain and controversial , the net effect was a sudden and general loss of  विश्वास  in the economic future .
The usual explanations include numerous factors , especially high consumer debt , ill-regulated markets that permitted overoptimistic loans by banks and investors , and the lack of high-growth new industries , all interacting to create a downward economic spiral of reduced  बिता , गिरना विश्वास , और lowered उत्पादन  .
Industries that suffered the most included construction , agriculture as  dust-bowl शर्तें  persisted in the agricultural heartland , shipping , mining , and logging as well as durable goods like automobiles and appliances that could be postponed .
The economy reached bottom in the winter of 1932–33 ; then came  चार सालो of बहुत रैपिड विकास जबतक 1937 ,  when the Recession of 1937 brought back 1934 levels of unemployment .
The Depression  caused प्रमुख  political changes in America .
Three years into the depression , Herbert Hoover lost the 1932 presidential election to Franklin  delano  Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide .
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan , the New Deal ,  instituted unprecedented कार्यक्रम  for relief , recovery and reform , and brought about a major realignment of American politics .
The Depression also resulted in an increase of emigration of people to other  देशों लिये the पहला  time in American history .
For example , some immigrants went back to their native countries ,  और कुछ देशी us  citizens went to Canada , Australia , and South Africa .
It also resulted in the mass migration of people from badly hit areas in the Great  मैदान और the दक्षिण to स्थान ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the उत्तर , क्रमशः  ( see Okies and the Great Migration of African Americans ) .
Racial tensions also increased  दौरान  this time .
By the 1940s  आव्रजन था  returned back to normal , and emigration declined .
A well-known example of an emigrant was  फ़्रैंक mccourt , जो गई to आयरलैंड , as recounted  in his book Angela 's Ashes .
The memory of the Depression also shaped modern theories of economics and resulted in many  परिवर्तन in कैसा the सरकारी dealt साथ  economic downturns , such as the use of stimulus packages , Keynesian economics , and Social Security .
It also  तराशा आधुनिक अमरीकी साहित्य  , resulting in famous novels such as John Steinbeck 's `` The Grapes of Wrath `` and `` Of Mice and Men `` .
The Great Depression of the 1930s started with the stock market crash  of अक्तूबर  1929 .
Turkey ( ) , officially the Republic of Turkey , is a transcontinental   country , located mostly on Anatolia in Western Asia and on East Thrace in Southeastern Europe .
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : Bulgaria to the northwest ; Greece to the west ; Georgia to  the पूर्वोत्तर ; अर्मेनिया , इरान और the अज़रबैजानी  exclave of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast .
The Mediterranean Sea is to the  south  ; the Aegean Sea is to the west ; and the Black Sea is to the north .
The Sea of Marmara , the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles ( which together form the Turkish Straits ) demarcate the boundary between Thrace and Anatolia ; they  भी पृथक यूरोपीय और एशिया .
Turkey 's location at the  क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय और एशिया makes it a देश  of significant geostrategic importance .
The country 's official language is Turkish , a Turkic language , which is spoken by approximately 85 % of the  जनसांख्यिकी as  mother tongue .
The most numerous ethnic group is the Turks , who constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the population  according to the संसार factbook  .
Kurds are the largest ethnic  अल्पसंख्यक और , according to  the same source , number around 18 % of the population while other ethnic minorities are estimated to be at 7–12 % .
the विशाल बहुमत  of the population is Muslim .
The area now called  तुर्कों रै महरूम inhabited  since the Paleolithic , including various Ancient Anatolian civilizations and Thracian peoples .
After Alexander the Great 's conquest , the area was Hellenized , which continued with  the रोमन नियम  and the transition into the Byzantine Empire .
The Seljuk Turks began migrating into the area in the 11th century , starting the process of Turkification , which was greatly  त्वरित  by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071 .
The Seljuk Sultanate of Rûm ruled Anatolia until the Mongol invasion  in 1243 , upon जिससे it disintegrated  into several small Turkish beyliks .
Starting from the late 13th century , the Ottoman beylik united Anatolia and created an empire encompassing   much of Southeastern Europe , Western Asia and North Africa .
After the Ottoman Empire collapsed following its defeat in World War I , parts of it were  occupied by  the victorious Allies .
A cadre of young military officers , led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his  सहयोगियों , व्यवस्थित a कामयाब  resistance to the Allies ; in 1923 they established the modern Republic of Turkey , with Atatürk as its first president .
Turkey is a democratic , secular , unitary , constitutional republic  साथ a विविध सांस्कृतिक  heritage .
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West through membership in organisations such  as  the Council of Europe , NATO , OECD , OSCE and the G-20 major economies .
Turkey began full membership negotiations with the European Union in 2005 , having been an associate member of the European Economic  जातियाँ चूंकि 1963 और having joined the eu कस्टम संघ  in 1995 .
Turkey has also fostered close cultural , political and economic relations with the Middle East , Caucasus , the Turkic states of Central Asia and the African countries through membership in organisations such as the Turkic Council , Joint Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture , Organisation of  इस्लामी सहयोग और the आर्थिक  Cooperation Organisation .
Turkey 's growing  अर्थव्यवस्था  and diplomatic initiatives have led to its recognition as a regional power .
Turkey is the world 's 17th largest economy by nominal GDP and the 16th largest by  खरीदना शक्ति  parity .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( , ( born  नवम्बर 13 , 1955 ) is an अमरीकी  comedienne , actress , singer-songwriter , political activist , author and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film debut in The Color Purple ( 1985 ) ,  playing  Celie , a mistreated black woman in the Deep South .
She received a nomination for the Academy Award  लिये  Best Actress and won her first Golden Globe Award for her role in the film .
in 1990 , वो  played Oda Mae Brown , a wacky psychic helping a slain man ( Patrick Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this made Goldberg only the  दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास  of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar—the first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 , The Player , Made in  अमेरिका , कैसा स्टेला मिला उसके नाली वापस  , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender Guinan in Star Trek : The Next Generation , as Terry Doolittle in Jumpin ' Jack Flash , and as Carmen  tibideaux in ग्ली , as खूब as the आवाज़  of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King .
गोल्डबर्ग रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये  13 Emmy Awards for her work in television .
She was co-producer of the popular game show  हॉलीवुड वर्गों  from 1998 to 2004 .
She has been the moderator of the daytime talk  दिखाएँ the दृश्य चूंकि  2007 .
Goldberg has a Grammy , two Daytime Emmys , two Golden Globes , a Tony ( for  उत्पादन ,  not acting ) , and an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award , four People 's Choice  पुरस्कार , और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ a स्टार  on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is one of the few entertainers who have  जीती an  Emmy , Grammy , Oscar , and Tony Award .
Augusta is a  संचित नगर in the u.S.  state of Georgia , located at the fall line of the Savannah River , at the head of its navigable portion .
As of the 2010 census , the Augusta– Richmond County population was 195,844  नहीं गिनती the unconsolidated  cities of Hephzibah and Blythe .
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta  –  Richmond County Metropolitan Statistical Area , which as of 2010 had an estimated population of 556,877 , making it both the second-largest city and the second-largest metro area in the state after Atlanta .
It is the 116th-largest city in the  संयुक्त  States .
Internationally , Augusta is best known for hosting The  मास्टर्स टूर्नामेंट  in golf each spring .
A CD-ROM ( )  is a pre-pressed  compact disc which contains data .
The name is an acronym which stands for ``  कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क  Read-only memory `` .
कंप्यूटर  can read CD-ROMs , but can not write on them .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute computer software , including video games and multimedia  अनुप्रयोग , हालांकि कोई आंकड़ा can  be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced CDs , hold both computer data and audio with the latter capable of being  निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी , जबकि  data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The Yellow Book is the technical standard that  defines  the format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound books that contain the   technical specifications for all CD formats , the Yellow Book , created by Sony and Philips , was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
it  adapted the format to hold any form of data .
The  शिकागो ब्लैकहॉक्स ( spelled as ब्लैक चीलों  before 1986 , and known colloquially as the Hawks ) are a professional ice hockey team based in Chicago , Illinois .
They are members of the Central Division of the Western Conference of  the नेशनल हॉकी लीग ( एनएचएल  ) .
They have won four Stanley Cup championships since their  founding  in 1926 , most recently in 2009–10 .
The Blackhawks are one of the Original Six NHL teams , along with the Detroit Red Wings , Montreal Canadiens , Toronto  मेपल leafs , बोस्टन bruins और नई  York Rangers .
Since the  ब्लैकहॉक्स have  played their home games at the United Center after having spent 65 years playing at Chicago Stadium .

The  बैंगनी  color is often associated with penance and detachment .
Similar Christian penitential practice is seen in other  कैथोलिक देशों , sometimes  associated with mortification of the flesh .

Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a  solemn observance in the liturgical  year of many Christian denominations , lasting for a period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday .
In the general Latin-rite and most Western denominations Lent is  लिया to चलाएं इससे राख बुधवार to  Maundy Thursday ( Holy Thursday ) morning or to Easter Eve .
In the Catholic Church , Lent lasts until Holy Thursday , while other  denominations चलाएं जबतक  Easter Eve .
The traditional purpose of Lent is the preparation  of the आस्तिक through  prayer , penance , repentance , almsgiving , and self-denial .
इसके संस्थागत purpose is heightened in the सालाना commemoration of पावन सप्ताह , अंकन the मौत , दफ़न और क़यामत of यीशु , जिससे recalls the कार्यक्रम of the बाइबल जब यीशु is crucified on शुभ शुक्रवार , जिससे तब culminates in the जश्न on ईस्टर संडे of the क़यामत of यीशु मसीह  .
During  lent , अनेक of the  faithful commit to fasting or giving up certain types of luxuries as a form of penitence .
The Stations of the Cross , a devotional commemoration  of मसीह  's carrying the Cross and of his execution , are often observed .
Many  रोमन कैथोलिक और कुछ प्रोटोस्टेंट चर्च हटाएँ  flowers from their altars , while crucifixes , religious statues , and other elaborate religious symbols are often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event .
In certain pious Catholic countries , some adherents mark the season with  the परंपरागत  abstention from the consumption of meat .
In some countries , grand religious processions and cultural customs are observed , and the faithful attempt to visit seven  चर्च दौरान पावन सप्ताह in सम्मान  of Jesus Christ heading to Mount Calvary .
Lent is traditionally described as lasting for forty days , in commemoration of the forty days which , according to the Gospels of Matthew , Mark and Luke , Jesus spent  उपवास in the मरुस्थल पहले the शुरूआत  of his public ministry , where he endured temptation by the Devil .
However , different Christian denominations calculate the forty days of Lent  differently  .
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of Lent ; thus the period from Ash Wednesday until Easter consists of 40  दिनों  when the Sundays are excluded .
However in the Roman Catholic Church Lent is now taken to end  on पावन गुरुवार बल्कि  than Easter Eve , and hence lasts 38 days excluding Sundays , or 44 days in total .
This event , along with its pious customs are observed by Catholics , Lutherans , Methodists ,  presbyterians , और anglicans  .
Location of Chernobyl  नाभिकीय शक्ति  plant
The abandoned city of Pripyat with Chernobyl plant in the  अलहदा
Abandoned  आवास ब्लॉक  in Pripyat
The Chernobyl  विपत्ति ( , chornobylska katastrofa – chornobyl प्रलय ) थी a अनर्थकारी नाभिकीय दुर्घटना  that occurred on 26 April 1986 at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine ( then officially the Ukrainian SSR ) , which was under the direct jurisdiction of the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An explosion and fire released  विशाल quantities  of radioactive particles into the atmosphere , which spread over much of the western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history , and is one of only two  वर्गीकृत as a स्तर  7 event on the International Nuclear Event Scale ( the other being the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the  संदूषण और avert  a greater catastrophe ultimately involved over 500,000 workers and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles .
The official Soviet casualty count of 31  मौतों रै महरूम  disputed , and long-term effects such as cancers and deformities are still being accounted for .
In grammar , a subject complement is  a predicative अभिव्यक्ति  that follows a linking verb ( copula ) and that complements ( completes ) the subject of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it .
In the former case , a renaming noun phrase  ऐसे as a संज्ञा or सर्वनाम  is called a predicative nominal .
An adjective following the copula and describing the subject is  पुकारा a predicative  adjective .
In either case  the  predicative complement in effect mirrors the subject .
Subject complements are used with a small class of verbs called linking verbs  or copula  , of which be is the most common .
Since copula are stative verbs , subject complements are  नहीं प्रभावित  by any action of the verb .
Subject complements are typically not clause arguments , nor are they  clause केंद्रीभूत  .
Throughout the fifty-five year history of the Grammy Awards , many significant records have been  नियत  .
This page only includes the  प्रतिस्पर्धी  awards won by various artists .
This does not include the various special awards that are  प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और  Sciences such as Lifetime Achievement Awards , Trustees Awards , Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however does include other non-performance related Grammys (  ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन  Fields ) that may have been presented to the artist ( s ) .
Marshall Bruce Mathers III ( born October 17 , 1972 ) , better known by his stage name Eminem ( stylized as EMINƎM ) and by his alter ego Slim Shady , is  an अमरीकी rapper , रिकार्ड निर्माता  , songwriter and actor .
Eminem , along with his  सोलो करियर , is a सदस्य of उसके  group D12 , and also one half of the hip hop duo Bad Meets Evil , with Royce da 5'9 '' .
Eminem is one of the best-selling artists in the  संसार और  is the best-selling artist of the 2000s .
He has been listed and ranked as one  of the महानतम  artists of all time by many magazines , including Rolling Stone magazine which ranked him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
The same magazine  घोषित  him The King of Hip Hop .
Including his work with D12 and Bad Meets Evil , Eminem has achieved ten  number-one एल्बम on the  Billboard 200 .
He has sold more than 100 million records worldwide ,  सहित 42 लाख  tracks and 49.1 million albums in the United States .
As an underground rapper Eminem released his debut solo album  , अनन्त  in 1996 .
The album was a  नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक  failure .
He gained mainstream  लोकप्रियता in 1999 बाद  the release of his major-label debut album The Slim Shady LP .
The LP also earned Eminem his first Grammy Award  लिये  Best Rap Album .
His next two records The Marshall Mathers LP , and The Eminem Show , also won Best Rap Album Grammy Awards , making Eminem the  पहला कलाकार to जीत बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम  for three consecutive LPs .
This was followed by another studio  रिलीज in 2004 titled  Encore .
Eminem then went on hiatus after touring  in 2005  .
He released his  पहला एल्बम  in five years titled Relapse , on May 15 , 2009 .
In 2010 , Eminem  released उसके सातवाँ  studio album Recovery .
Recovery  थी an अंतरराष्ट्रीय कामयाबी और थी  named the best selling album of 2010 worldwide , joining The Eminem Show , which was the best seller of 2002 .
Eminem won Grammy Awards for both Relapse and  रिकवरी , giving उसे  a total of 13 Grammys in his career .
Eminem has opened  अन्य ventures  , including his own record label Shady Records with his manager Paul Rosenberg .
He also has his own  रेडियो चैनल  , Shade 45 on Sirius XM Radio .
Eminem began an acting  करियर in 2002 , जब he स्ट्रक्चर  in the hip hop drama film 8 Mile .
He won the Academy  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन असली सोंग  , becoming the first rap artist ever to win the award .
He has also made cameo appearances in The Wash ( 2001 ) ,  मजेदार लोगों  ( 2009 ) and the television series Entourage .
The acre is a unit  of क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in  the imperial and U.S. customary systems .
An acre is about 40 % of a hectare –  थोड़ा छोटी than an अमरीकी  football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United States , Australia , Burma and the United  किंगडम ( as of 2010 , the एकड़ is no longer  officially used in the United Kingdom , though is still used in real estate descriptions ) .
It is  स्टिल प्रयुक्त , to  some extent , in Canada .
The international symbol of the acre is ac  ,  and is defined as 1/640 of a square mile .
The most commonly used acre  आज is  the international acre .
In the United  राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  acre and the slightly different US survey acre are in use .
The most common  उपयोग of the एकड़  is to measure tracts of land .
One  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  acre is defined as 4046.8564224 square metres .
During the Middle  आयु , an  acre was the amount of land that could be plowed in one day with a yoke of oxen .
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of the  विधि of संरक्षण  of Mass led to many new findings in the 19th century .
Joseph Proust 's law of definite proportions and John Dalton 's  परमाणु सिद्धान्त branched इससे  the discoveries of Antoine Lavoisier .
Lavoisier 's quantitative experiments revealed that combustion  शामिल ऑक्सीजन बल्कि than कया थी previously  thought to be phlogiston .
The law of conservation of mass , or principle of mass conservation , states that for any system closed to all transfers of matter and energy ( both of which have mass ) , the mass of the system must remain  निरंतर over समय , as प्रणाली द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if it is नहीं added or removed .
Hence , the  मात्रा of द्रव्यमान is  `` conserved '' over time .
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor destroyed , although it may be rearranged  in स्पेस , or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be  changed in form , as for example when light or physical work is transformed into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed .
The law implies ( requires  ) कि दौरान कोई रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया  , nuclear reaction , or radioactive decay in an isolated system , the mass of the reactants or starting material must equal the mass of the products .
The  अवधारणा of  mass conservation is widely used in many fields such as chemistry , mechanics , and fluid dynamics .
Historically , mass conservation was discovered in chemical reactions by Antoine Lavoisier in the  लेट 18th सदी , और  was of crucial importance in the progress from alchemy to the modern natural science of chemistry .
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good  in रसायन to ऐसे ऊँची सन्निकटन कि it  failed only for the high energies treated by the later refinements of relativity theory , but otherwise remains useful and sufficiently accurate for most chemical calculations , even in modern practice .
In special relativity , needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between systems is involved , the difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems becomes important , since conservation of mass is strictly and perfectly upheld only for so-called isolated systems , i.e . those  completely पृथक  from all exchanges with the environment .
In  इस परिस्थिति , the mass-energy equivalence  theorem states that mass conservation is equivalent to total energy conservation , which is the first law of thermodynamics .
By contrast , for a  thermodynamically बंद प्रणाली ( i.e. , एक जिससे  is closed to exchanges of matter , but open to exchanges of non-material energy , such as heat and work , with the surroundings ) mass is ( usually ) only approximately conserved .
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory , although the change is usually small , since relatively large amounts of such energy ( by comparison with  ordinary अनुभव ) carry  only a small amount of mass ( again by ordinary standards of measurement ) .
In special relativity , mass is not converted to energy , since energy in all of its forms always retains its equivalent amount of mass throughout any transformation or translocation  into , or आउट of , a  system .
However , certain types of matter ( a different concept ) may be converted to energy , so long as the mass of the system is unchanged in the  प्रक्रम  .
However , if such energy is removed from systems , they must lose the mass  कि is संबद्ध  with it .
In general relativity , mass ( and energy ) conservation in expanding volumes of space is a complex concept , subject to different definitions , and neither  द्रव्यमान nor उर्जा is as सख्ती और बस conserved as is the मामला in  special relativity and in Minkowski space .
For a discussion , see mass  in सामान्य  relativity .
A pig is any of the  पशु in the genus सस , भीतर  the Suidae family of even-toed ungulates .
Pigs include the domestic pig , its ancestor the wild boar , and  अनेक अन्य  wild relatives .
Young  और  small pigs are known as piglets .
Pigs are omnivores and are  अत्यधिक सोशल  and intelligent animals .
8-inch , -inch , and -inch floppy  डिस्क
8-inch , -inch ( full  ऊँचाई  ) , and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch diskette 's `` floppy '' magnetic material , removed from  इसके आवास
A floppy disk , or diskette , is a disk storage medium composed of a disk of thin and flexible  चुम्बकीय भंडार मीडियम , sealed in a  rectangular plastic carrier lined with fabric that removes dust particles .
They are read and  लिखा by  a floppy disk drive ( FDD ) .
Floppy disks , initially as media and later in and  3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) आकार , यहूद  a ubiquitous form of data storage and exchange from the mid-1970s well into the first decade of the 21st century .
By 2010 , computer motherboards were rarely manufactured with floppy drive support ; `` floppies could be used as an external USB drive , but `` , 8 `` ,  और non-standard  drives could only be handled by old equipment .
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses , especially with legacy industrial computer equipment , they have been superseded by data storage methods with much greater capacity , such as USB flash drives ,  पोर्टेबल बाह्य मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव  , optical discs , memory cards , and computer networks .
An animated  आरेख of a  cutter
In baseball , a cutter , or cut fastball , is a type of fastball which breaks  थोड़ा toward the पिचर  's glove side as it reaches home plate .
This pitch is somewhere between a slider and a fastball , as it is  प्रायः  thrown faster than a slider but with more motion than a typical fastball .
Some pitchers use a cutter as  a रास्ता to prevent hitters इससे expecting  their regular fastballs .
A common  तकनीक प्रयुक्त to throw  a cutter is to use a four-seam fastball grip with the baseball set slightly off center in the hand .
When a batter is able to hit a cutter pitch , it often results in soft contact and an easy out , due to the  पिच 's  movement keeping the ball away from the bat 's sweet spot .
The cutter is typically 2–5 mph slower  than a पिचर  's four-seam fastball .
In 2010 , the average pitch classified as a cutter by PITCHf/x thrown by a right-handed pitcher was 88.6 mph ;  the  average four-seamer was 92.1 mph .
`` What  it takes  '' is a power ballad by American hard rock band Aerosmith .
It was written by Steven Tyler , Joe Perry ,  और  Desmond Child .
It was released in 1990  as the तीसरा सिंगल इससे एरोस्मिथ  's critically and commercially successful 1989 album Pump .
In the video The  बनाना  of Pump , A & R man John Kalodner described the song as `` a masterpiece '' .
During live performances  , टायलर गाती  the first verse a cappella and belts out one of his signature screams right before the chorus .
the एल्बम संस्करण  of the song is followed by an untitled hidden track .
Head of Odysseus from a Greek 2nd century BC marble group representing  odysseus  blinding Polyphemus , found at the villa of Tiberius at Sperlonga
Detail of an  प्राचीन रोमन  mosaic of Ulysses in Tunisia
Odysseus ( or ; Greek : , ) , also known  by the Roman  name Ulysses ( ; ) , was a legendary Greek king of Ithaca and a hero of Homer 's epic poem the Odyssey .
Odysseus also  plays a कुंजी भूमिका  in Homer 's Iliad and other works in that same Epic Cycle .
Husband of Penelope , father of Telemachus , and son of Laërtes ( or Sisyphus ) and Anticlea , Odysseus is renowned for his brilliance , guile  , and versatility (  polytropos ) , and is hence known by the epithet Odysseus the Cunning ( mētis , or `` cunning intelligence `` ) .
He is most famous for the ten eventful years he took to return home after the decade-long  trojan युद्ध और उसके प्रसिद्ध  Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy .
Erie is a Statutory   Town in Boulder and Weld counties in the U.S. state of Colorado .
The population according  to the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी is 18,135  and was recorded as 6,291 at the 2000 census .
The Town of Erie is located just west of I-25 for easy access to I-70 , Denver International Airport and Colorado 's   entire Front Range .
erie 's नियोजन क्षेत्रफल spans 48 वर्गाकार मील , extending  from the north side of State Highway 52 south to State Highway 7 , and between US 287 on the west and Interstate 25 to the east .
Erie is approximately 35 minutes from  डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport , 25 minutes to Denver and 20 minutes from Boulder .
The Board of Trustees serves as the legislative and governing body of  the कस्बा of erie और is जिम्मेदार लिये establishing  Town policies and goals .
The Board has the authority to adopt laws , ordinances and resolutions as needed to  conduct  the business of the Town , and by ordinance may enter into contracts or intergovernmental agreements to furnish , receive services or to provide for cooperative service delivery .
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees , the Town Administrator is the chief operating and administrative  officer of the  Town and is responsible for providing professional leadership in the administration and execution of policies and objectives formulated by the Board .
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to communicate and work with the community to maintain a  safe  environment , prevent crime and enforce the law , while protecting the rights of all .
Erie  नगरपालिका  Airport ( EIK ) is owned and operated by the Town of Erie and is strategically located in the Denver-Boulder metropolitan area on Colorado Highway 7 , a little over three miles west of Interstate 25 .

The is a home video game  कंसोल  produced by Sony Computer Entertainment .
It is the successor to the PlayStation  2 , as भाग of the प्लेस्टेशन  series .
The PlayStation 3 competes with Microsoft  's एक्सबॉक्स 360 और निन्टेंडो  's Wii as part of the seventh generation of video game consoles .
It was first released on  नवम्बर 11 , 2006 , in जापानी , साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय  markets following shortly thereafter .
The  कंसोल  was first officially announced at E3 2005 .
Originally set for a spring 2006 release date , it was delayed several  टाइम्स जबतक आखिरकार  hitting stores at the end of the year .
It was the first and currently only console to  use  Blu-ray Disc as its primary storage medium .
Major features of the console include its unified online gaming service , the PlayStation Network , and its connectivity with the PlayStation  पोर्टेबल  and PlayStation Vita , In September 2009 the updated PlayStation 3 Slim , was released .
This Slim is lighter and thinner than the original version , although it lacks PlayStation 2 backwards compatibility ( removed on later original models ) , but notably  प्रदर्शित a re-designed लोगो और विपणन डिज़ाइन  .
As of November 4 , 2012 , 70 million  प्लेस्टेशन 3s  have been sold worldwide .
Its successor , PlayStation 4  , is नियत लिये  a Q4 2013 release .
Salvador Domingo Felipe   Jacinto Dalí i Domènech , 1st Marqués de Dalí de Pubol ( May 11 , 1904January 23 , 1989 ) , known as Salvador Dalí ( ) , was a prominent Spanish surrealist painter born in Figueres , Spain .
dalí थी a skilled  draftsman , best known for the striking and bizarre images in his surrealist work .
His  painterly कौशल  are often attributed to the influence of Renaissance masters .
His best-known work , The Persistence of Memory , was  समाप्त in 1931  .
Dalí 's expansive artistic repertoire included film , sculpture , and  छायाचित्र , in सहयोग  with a range of artists in a variety of media .
Dalí attributed his `` love of everything that is gilded and excessive , my passion for luxury  और my प्रेम  of oriental clothes '' to a self-styled `` Arab lineage '' , claiming that his ancestors were descended from the Moors .
Dalí was highly imaginative , and also enjoyed indulging in unusual and  वैभवशाली  behavior .
His eccentric manner and attention-grabbing public actions sometimes drew more attention than his artwork , to the dismay  of those who held his work in  high esteem , and to the irritation of his critics .
