It began on a  गुरुवार और ended बाद  30 days on a Friday The following events also occurred during the month:
Sociology is the  वैज्ञानिक  study of human society and its origins , development , organizations , and institutions .
It is a social science which uses various  विधि of अनुभवजन्य छानबीन और नाजुक  analysis to develop a body of knowledge about human social activity , structures , and functions .
A goal for many  sociologists is to conduct शोध  which may be applied directly to social policy and welfare , while others focus primarily on refining the theoretical understanding of social processes .
Subject matter ranges from the micro level of individual agency and interaction to the macro  स्तर of प्रणालियों और  the social structure .
The traditional  focuses of समाजशास्त्र  include social stratification , social class , culture , race and ethnicity , gender and sexuality , social mobility , religion , secularization , law , and deviance .
As all spheres of human activity are affected by the interplay between social structure and individual agency , sociology has gradually expanded its focus to further subjects ,  ऐसे as स्वास्थ्य , चिकित्सा , सैन्य और penal संस्थानों  , the Internet , environmental sociology , political economy and the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge .
The range of social scientific  विधि रै भी विस्तारित  .
Social researchers draw upon  a किस्में of  qualitative and quantitative techniques .
The linguistic and cultural turns of the mid-twentieth century led to increasingly interpretative , hermeneutic , and philosophic approaches to the  विश्लेषण of  society .
Conversely , recent decades have seen the rise of new  analytically , mathematically  and computationally rigorous techniques , such as agent-based modelling and social network analysis .
Sociology should not be confused with various general social studies courses which bear little  संबंध  to sociological theory or social science research methodology .
Thunder is the  ध्वनि  caused by lightning .
Depending on the nature of the lightning and distance of the  श्रोता , थंडर  can range from a sharp , loud crack to a long , low rumble ( brontide ) .
The sudden increase in pressure and temperature from lightning produces rapid expansion of the air surrounding and within a bolt of lightning   .
In turn , this expansion of air creates a sonic shock wave , similar to a sonic boom , which produces the sound of thunder , often referred to as a clap , crack , or peal of  थंडर  .
The distance of the lightning can be calculated by the listener based on the time interval from when the lightning is seen to  जब  the sound is heard .
Palma ( , , ) , in full Palma de Mallorca , is the major city and port on the island of Majorca ( Mallorca ) and capital city of the  autonomous जातियाँ of the balearic आइलैंड्स  in Spain .
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of Majorca ) and Ciutat ( City ) were used before the War of the Spanish Succession and are still used by people in  majorca .
However , the official name was  mallorca  , the same as the island .
It is situated on the south coast of  the द्वीप on the  Bay of Palma .
as of the 2009 जनसांख्यिकी , the जनसांख्यिकी  of the city of Palma proper was 401,270 , and the population of the entire urban area was 517,285 , ranking as the twelfth largest urban area of Spain .
Almost half of the total population of Majorca live   in Palma .
The Cabrera Archipelago , though widely separated from Palma proper , is  administratively माना भाग of  the municipality .
Its airport , Son Sant Joan , serves over 22  लाख यात्री  each year .
The Marivent Palace was offered by the city to  the तब  Prince Juan Carlos I of Spain .
The royals have since spent  उनके गर्मियाँ  holidays in Palma .

Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is a  fictional अक्षर , a supervillain  appearing in comic books published by DC Comics .
Luthor is the archenemy of Superman , and as a high-status  supervillain  , has also come into conflict with Batman and other superheroes in the DC Universe .
Created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster , the character first appeared in  कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स #  23 ( April 1940 ) .
luthor is वर्णित  as `` a power-mad , evil scientist '' of high intelligence and incredible technological prowess .
Luthor 's goals typically center on  हत्या सुपरमैन  , the foremost obstacle to achieving the villain 's megalomaniacal goals .
Despite periodically wearing a powered exoskeleton , Luthor has traditionally lacked  superpowers or a डुअल  identity .
The character was originally depicted as a mad scientist who , in the  रग of गूदा novels  , wreaks havoc on the world with his futuristic weaponry .
In his earliest  दिखावे , luthor  is shown with a full head of red hair .
despite इस  , the character later became hairless as the result of an artist 's mistake .
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations ,  revealing  him to be a childhood friend of Superman 's who lost his hair when a fire destroyed his laboratory ; Luthor vowed revenge .
Following  the 1985 सीमित श्रेणी संकट on अनन्त earths , the अक्षर  was re-imagined as a Machiavellian industrialist and white-collar criminal , even briefly serving as President of the United States .
In recent years , various writers have  revived luthor 's mad वैज्ञानिक persona  from the 1940s .
The character was ranked as the 8th  महानतम  Villain by Wizard on its 100 Greatest Villains of All Time list .
IGN 's list of the Top 100 Comic Book Villains of All  समय क्रमित luthor  as # 4 .
Luthor is also described as a `` megavillain '' by comic book critic Peter Sanderson , one of a few genre-crossing villains whose adventures take place `` in a world in which the ordinary laws of nature are slightly  निलंबित '' ; वर्ण ऐसे as  Professor Moriarty , Count Dracula , Hannibal Lecter , Doctor Doom , and Darth Vader , also fit this description .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day is a United States federal holiday marking the birthday of Rev . Dr. Martin Luther  किंग , jr  .
It is observed on the   third Monday of January each year , which is around the time of King 's birthday , January 15 .
The floating holiday is similar to holidays set under the Uniform Monday Holiday Act , though the act predated the   establishment of Martin Luther King , Jr. Day by 15 years .
King was the chief spokesman for nonviolent activism in the civil rights movement , which successfully protested  जातिगत पक्षपात  in federal and state law .
The campaign for a  संघीय  holiday in King 's honor began soon after his assassination in 1968 .
Ronald Reagan signed the holiday into law in 1983 , and it was  पहला observed  on January 20 , 1986 .
At first , some states resisted observing the holiday as such ,  giving it  alternative names or combining it with other holidays .
It was officially observed  in सब 50 राज्य  for the first time in 2000 .
The camera phone solution allows  तत्काल  sharing of pictures .
As it 's automatic and instant , the user does not have to use a cable or removable media to connect  to a personal  computer .
A camera phone is a mobile phone  जिससे is समर्थ  to capture still photographs ( and usually video ) .
Since early in  the  21st century the majority of mobile phones in use are camera phones .
Most camera phones  हैं simpler  than separate digital cameras .
Their usual fixed focus lenses and smaller  सेंसर सीमा उनके  performance in poor lighting .
lacking  a physical shutter , most have a long shutter lag .
फ्लैश , जहाँ  present , is usually weak .
Optical zoom and  तिपाई screws  are rare .
Some also lack a USB connection ,  removable  memory card , or other way of transferring their pictures more quickly than by the phone 's inherent communication feature .
Some of the more expensive camera phones have only a few of these technical disadvantages , which apply  सबसे acutely in कम लाइट  conditions and in any case have not inhibited their widespread use .
सबसे मॉडल लाइनों  improve in these regards every year or two .
कुछ  , such as the Droid Incredible only have a menu choice to start an application program to activate the camera .
Others , such as the BlackBerry  तूफ़ान 2 , droid  X , Motorola V980 and Nokia 5800 also have a separate camera button for quickness and convenience .
Windows Phones can be configured  to operate as a कैमरा  even if the phone is asleep .
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end digital compact cameras in appearance and to some extent in  सुविधाएँ और चित्र विशेषता , और  are branded as both mobile phones and cameras , including certain Sony phones .
The  प्रिंसिपल लाभ of कैमरा फोन हैं लागत और  compactness ; indeed for a user who carries a mobile phone anyway , the additional size and cost are negligible .
Smartphones that are  कैमरा  phones may run mobile applications to add capabilities such as geotagging and image stitching .
A few high end phones can use their touch screen to direct their camera to focus on a particular object  in the फ़ील्ड of दृश्य , giving भी an अनुभवहीन उपयोक्ता a उपाधि  of focus control exceeded only by seasoned photographers using manual focus .
`` Whatever  happened to the man of कल  ? '' is a 1986 comic book story featuring the DC Comics character of Superman .
Written by Alan Moore with help from long-time , and soon to be retiring , Superman editor , Julius Schwartz , the story was published in two parts , beginning in Superman # 423  और समाप्ति in कार्रवाई कॉमिक्स # 583 , दोनो प्रकाशित  in September 1986 .
The story was drawn by long-time artist Curt Swan , in his final major  योगदान to the सुपरमैन  titles , and was inked by George Pérez in the issue of Superman and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics .
The story was an imaginary tale which told the final story of the Silver Age Superman and his long history , which was being rebooted  following the कार्यक्रम of संकट  on Infinite Earths , before his modern introduction in the John Byrne series , The Man of Steel .
Moore wanted his plot to honor the long history of the character  और to  serve as a complete conclusion to his mythology .
The story is a frame story set ten years after Superman was last  देखी , जहाँ लोइस लेन  recounts the tale of the end of Superman 's career to a reporter from the Daily Planet .
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by his enemies ,  the पब्लिक  revelation of his secret identity of Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him .
The story has been  cited as एक of the बेहतरीन  stories of the character of Superman , and critics and audiences frequently choose it as one of the most memorable comics ever published .
It is used as an example of how to close  the long-time निरंतरता  of a comic book character .
The story 's legacy has endured with  समान कहानियां लिखा  as tributes to it .
The title is a reference to one of the nicknames of Superman as the Man of  कल , और थी प्रयुक्त in the  title of another Superman .
the bugatti  Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car , designed and developed by the Volkswagen Group and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super Sport  संस्करण of the veyron is the तीव्रतम  street-legal production car in the world , with a top speed of .
The original version  रै  a top speed of .
It was named Car of the Decade ( 2000–2009 ) by  the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न  programme Top Gear .
The standard Veyron won  शीर्ष गियर्स  Best Car Driven All Year award in 2005 .
on 6 अप्रैल 2013 , bugatti नियत the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse , reaching on औसत a शीर्ष गति of  .
The Veyron 's chief  पंक्तियां थी hartmut warkuss , और  the exterior was designed by Jozef Kabaň of Volkswagen , with much of the engineering work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A number of  खास विसंगतियाँ  have been produced .

The institution of the Eucharist has been a key theme in the  depictions of the पिछला  Supper in Christian art , as in this 16th-century Juan de Juanes painting .
`` At the Last Supper , on the night he was betrayed , our  रक्षक instituted the eucharistic  sacrifice of his Body and Blood . ''
( Catechism of the Catholic  गिरिजाघर 1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass , that is  , the eucharist liturgy , और the ब्रैड और  wine which after the consecration are transubstantiated ( changed in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ , Lord and God , a declaration formulated by the Council of Trent with an anathema against anyone who denied this .
Blessed Sacrament is a devotional term used in the Roman Catholic Church to refer to the Eucharistic  प्रजाति ( the देह और रक्त  of Christ ) .

A short story is a brief work of literature ,  प्रायः लिखा  in narrative prose .
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling traditions in the 17th century  , the छोटी स्टोरी रै grown  to encompass a body of work so diverse as to defy easy characterization .
At its most prototypical the short story features a small cast of named characters , and focuses on a  self-contained घटना साथ  the intent of evoking a `` single effect '' or mood .
In so doing , short stories  make use of  plot , resonance , and other dynamic components to a far greater degree than is typical of an anecdote , yet to a far lesser degree than a novel .
While the  छोटी स्टोरी is largely पृथक इससे the अनोखा  , authors of both generally draw from a common pool of literary techniques .
छोटी कहानियां  have no set length .
In terms of word count there is no official demarcation between an anecdote , a short  स्टोरी , और a अनोखा  .
Rather , the form 's parameters are given by the rhetorical and practical context in which a given story is produced and considered , so that what constitutes a short story may differ between genres , countries , eras ,  और टीकाकारों  .
Like the novel , the short story 's predominant shape reflects the demands of the available markets for  प्रकाशन , और the एवोल्यूशन of  the form seems closely tied to the evolution of the publishing industry and the submission guidelines of its constituent houses .
The short story has been considered both an apprenticeship form preceding more lengthy works , and a crafted form in its own right ,  एकत्रित साथ in  books of similar length , price , and distribution as novels .
Short story writers may define their  works as भाग of the  artistic and personal expression of the form .
They  may भी  attempt to resist categorization by genre and fixed form .
क्षेत्रफल  codes in Michigan
Area code 810 is the  टेलीफोन  area code serving eastern Michigan .
The raccoon ( ,  procyon lotor ) , sometimes spelled racoon , भी ज्ञात as the आम  raccoon , North American raccoon , northern raccoon and colloquially as coon , is a medium-sized mammal native to North America .
The raccoon is the largest of the procyonid family , having a  देह लंबाई of और a देह  weight of .
Its grayish coat mostly   consists of dense underfur which insulates against cold weather .
दो of the raccoon 's सबसे distinctive सुविधाएँ हैं इसके अत्यधिक dexterous सामने पंजे और इसके फेशियल मुखौटा , जिससे हैं विषयवस्तु in the mythology of अनेक देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों .
Raccoons are noted for their intelligence , with studies showing that they are able to remember the  समाधान to कार्य लिये up  to three years .
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon , which is usually nocturnal , consists of  परिचय 40 % invertebrates  , 33 % plant foods , and 27 % vertebrates .
the असली habitats of the  raccoon are deciduous and mixed forests , but due to their adaptability they have extended their range to mountainous areas , coastal marshes , and urban areas , where some homeowners consider them to be pests .
As a result of escapes and deliberate introductions  in the  mid-20th century , raccoons are now also distributed across the European mainland , the Caucasus region and Japan .
Though previously thought to be solitary ,  वहीँ is अभी प्रमाण  that raccoons engage in gender-specific social behavior .
Related females often share a common area , while unrelated males live together in groups of up to four animals to maintain their positions  विरूद्ध विदेशी males दौरान the समागम ऋतु , और अन्य संभावित  invaders .
Home range sizes vary anywhere from 3  हेक्टेयर ( 7 एकड़  ) for females in cities to 50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies .
After a gestation period of  परिचय 65 दिनों , दो to पाँच  young , known as `` kits '' , are born in spring .
the kits हैं subsequently  raised by their mother until dispersion in late fall .
Although captive raccoons have been known to live over 20 years , their average life expectancy in the wild is only 1.8 to  3.1 सालो  .
In many areas , hunting and vehicular injury are the two most common  कल्याणकारी of मौत .
The 2010 Haiti earthquake was a catastrophic  परिमाण 7.0 mw भूकंप  , with an epicenter near the town of Léogâne ( Ouest Department ) , approximately west of Port-au-Prince , Haiti 's capital .
The earthquake occurred at 16:53 local time ( 21:53 UTC ) on   Tuesday , 12 January 2010 .
By 24 January , at least 52 aftershocks measuring 4.5 or  वृहद था महरूम अंकित  .
An estimated three  लाख लोगों यहूद प्रभावित  by the quake .
The  उच्चतम  reliable death count was estimated at 220,000 .
Haitian  सरकारी  estimates were higher .
The government of Haiti estimated that 250,000 residences and 30,000  वाणिज्यिक इमारतें  had collapsed or were severely damaged .
The earthquake caused major damage in Port-au-Prince  , jacmel और अन्य  settlements in the region .
Many notable landmark buildings were significantly damaged or destroyed , including the Presidential Palace ,  the नेशनल सभा भवन ,  the Port-au-Prince Cathedral , and the main jail .
Among those killed were Archbishop of Port-au-Prince Joseph Serge Miot , and opposition  नेता  Micha Gaillard .
The headquarters of the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti (  minustah ) , स्तिथ in the पूंजी , collapsed  , killing many , including the Mission 's Chief , Hédi Annabi .
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian aid , pledging funds and dispatching rescue and  चिकित्सा टीमों , इंजीनियर्स  and support personnel .
Communication systems , air , land , and sea transport facilities , hospitals , and  विद्युत संजाल था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त by the भूकंप  , which hampered rescue and aid efforts ; confusion over who was in charge , air traffic congestion , and problems with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work .
Port-au-Prince 's morgues were  अभिभूत  with tens of thousands of bodies .
These had to be buried in mass  क़ब्रों .
As rescues tailed off , supplies , medical care and  स्वच्छता  became priorities .
Delays in aid  वितरण  led to angry appeals from aid workers and survivors , and looting and sporadic violence were observed .
On 22 January the United Nations noted that the emergency phase of the relief operation was drawing  to a बंद , और on  the following day the Haitian government officially called off the search for survivors .
Mister Ed is a fictional talking horse , originally appearing in short stories by Walter R. Brooks , and later in an American television situation comedy produced by  filmways  that first aired in syndication from January 5 to July 2 , 1961 , and then on CBS from October 1 , 1961 to February 6 , 1966 .
The stars of the show were Mister Ed , a palomino horse who could `` talk '' , played by gelding Bamboo Harvester and voiced by former Western star Allan Lane ( who went uncredited for the entire length of the series ) , and his owner , an eccentric and enormously klutzy , yet friendly , architect  named  Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ) .
Much of the program 's humor stemmed from the fact Mister Ed would speak only  to wilbur , as खूब  as Ed 's notoriety as a troublemaker .
Other running jokes centered on  Wilbur 's  character being a huge klutz and inadvertently causing harm to himself or others .
According to the show 's producer , Arthur Lubin , Young was chosen as the lead character because he `` just seemed like the sort  of guy a घोड़ा होता बात  to '' .
Lubin , a friend of Mae West , scored a coup by persuading  the स्क्रीन प्रतीक to  guest star in one episode .
In the United States , reruns aired on Nick at Nite from March 3  , 1986 , to फ़रवरी 1  , 1993 .
Sister station TV Land also reran the show from 1996–98 and  again  from 2003-06 .
The series is currently broadcast every  morning on इस tv , साथ  with Highway Patrol , and The Patty Duke Show .
It is  भी  currently broadcast on Hallmark Movie Channel .
As of January 1 , 2011 ,  the पहला दो सीज़न  of the show are available on Hulu .
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 Thessalonians 4:17 , when the  `` मुर्दे in मसीह '' और `` we जो हैं जिंदा और remain '' होगा be ``  caught up in the clouds '' to meet `` the Lord in the air '' .
The term `` Rapture '' is used in  at तनिक दो  senses .
In the pre-tribulation view , a group of people will be left  पीछे on  earth after another group literally leaves `` to meet the Lord in the air . ''
This is now the most common use of the term ,  विशेषकर among  fundamentalist Christians and in the United States .
The other , older use of the term `` Rapture '' is simply as a synonym for the final resurrection generally , without a belief that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events  of 1 thessalonians  4:17 .
This distinction is important as some types of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in religious education , but might use the older and more general sense of the word `` rapture  '' in referring to कया happens दौरान the फाइनल  resurrection .
There are many views among Christians regarding the timing of Christ 's return (  सहित whether it होगा occur in  one event or two ) , and various views regarding the destination of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4 .
Denominations such as Roman Catholics ,  परंपरागत ईसाइयों , लूथरन ईसाइयों , और reformed ईसाइयों  believe in a rapture only in the sense of a general final resurrection , when Christ returns a single time .
They do not believe that a group of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events  of 1 thessalonians  4:17 .
pre-tribulation rapture धर्मशास्त्र थी विकसित in the 1830s  by John Nelson Darby and the Plymouth Brethren , and popularized in the United States in the early 20th century by the wide circulation of the Scofield Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan Humphries ( born February 6 , 1985 ) is an American professional basketball  खिलाड़ी साथ the ब्रुकलीन  Nets .
The Philistine  शहरों  of Gaza , Ashdod , Ashkelon , Ekron , and Gath
The Philistines ( , , , or ; , Plištim ) , Pleshet or Peleset ,  यहूद a लोगों जो  as part of the Sea Peoples appeared in the southern coastal area of Canaan at the beginning of the Iron Age ( circa 1175 BC ) , most probably from the Aegean region .
According to the Bible , they ruled the five city-states ( the `` Philistine Pentapolis '' ) of Gaza , Ashkelon , Ashdod , Ekron and Gath , from Wadi Gaza in the  दक्षिण to the yarqon नदी in the  north , but with no fixed border to the east .
The Bible  paints उन्हें  as the Kingdom of Israel 's most dangerous enemy .
Originating somewhere in the Aegean , their population was around 25,000 in the 12th century BC , rising to a peak of 30,000 in the  11th सदी bc , of जिससे  the Aegean element was not more than half the total , and perhaps much less .
Nothing is known for certain about  the असली  language or languages of the Philistines , however they were not part of the Semitic Canaanite population .
There is some limited evidence in favour of the assumption that the Philistines were Indo-European-speakers either from  यूनानियों and/or luwian अध्यक्षों इससे  the coast of Asia Minor .
philistine-related  words found in the Bible are not Semitic , and can in some cases , with reservations , be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots .
By the  शुरूआत of the 1st मिलेनियम  BCE they had adopted the general Canaanite language of the region .
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a multiple choice test , administered by the United States Military Entrance Processing Command , used to  determine योग्यता लिये enlistment in the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद  forces .
It is often offered to American high  स्कूल विद्यार्थी जब वे  are in the 10th , 11th and 12th grade , though anyone eligible for enlistment may take it .
Although the test is administered by the  सैन्य , it is नहीं ( और  never has been ) a requirement that a test-taker with a qualifying score enlist in the armed forces .
In financial accounting , a balance sheet or statement of financial position is a summary of the financial  balances of a एकमात्र बंदोबस्त , a कारोबार साझेदारी , a निगम  or other business organization , such as an LLC or an LLP .
Assets  , देनदारी  and ownership equity are listed as of a specific date , such as the end of its financial year .
A balance sheet is often described as a ``  स्नैपशॉट of a कम्पनी  's financial condition '' .
Of the  चार मौलिक  financial statements , the balance sheet is the only statement which applies to a single point in time of a business ' calendar year .
A standard company balance sheet has three parts : assets ,  देनदारी और स्वामित्व  equity .
The main categories of assets are usually listed first , and  typically  in order of liquidity .
Assets are followed by the  देनदारी  .
The difference between the assets and the liabilities is known  as इक्विटी or the जाल एसेट  or the net worth or capital of the company and according to the accounting equation , net worth must equal assets minus liabilities .
Another way to look at the same equation is that  एसेट बराबरी देनदारी प्लस मालिक  's equity .
Looking at the  समीकरण in इस  way shows how assets were financed : either by borrowing money ( liability ) or by using the owner 's money ( owner 's equity ) .
Balance sheets are usually presented with assets in one section  और देनदारी और  net worth in the other section with the two sections `` balancing . ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing the entire bank balance at the end of the period ,  प्लस कोई नकदी  in hand .
However ,   many businesses are not paid immediately ; they build up inventories of goods and they acquire buildings and equipment .
In other words :  व्यवसायों  have assets and so they can not , even if they want to , immediately turn these into cash at the end of each period .
Often , these businesses owe money to suppliers and to  कर अधिकारियों  , and the proprietors do not withdraw all their original capital and profits at the end of each period .
In other words businesses  भी have  liabilities .
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire , commonly known as the .17 HMR , is a rimfire  राइफल कार्ट्रिज विकसित by the  ammunition company Hornady in 2002 .
It descended from the .22 Magnum by necking down the .22 Magnum case to take a .17 caliber ( 4.5 mm ) bullet , and it is more costly to shoot than traditional .22  कैलिबर  rimfire cartridges .
Commonly loaded with a 17 grain (  1.1 g ) गोली , it can उद्धार  muzzle velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ) .
The Schaumburg Flyers were a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in schaumburg  , Illinois , in the United States .
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the  North  American League , which is not affiliated with Major League Baseball , however , the team folded in March 2011 , before they began play in the NAL .
From the 1999 season to the 2010 season , the Flyers played their home games at  alexian फ़ील्ड , निकट  the Elgin O'Hare Expressway .
the टोली formerly  played in Thunder Bay , Ontario , where they were known as the Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks .
The team was originally  a सदस्य  of the Northern League from 1993 to 2010 .
On July 27 , 2009 , the Flyers played host to Battle of the Sexes II , which pitted the Flyers against the  नेशनल प्रो fastpitch  Softball Champions , the Chicago Bandits .
Played by official softball rules , the game was seen by an overflow record crowd of  8,918 , और थी जीती  by the Bandits 4-2 .
In 1999 , the Flyers hired their first manager ,  रॉन kittle  .
Kittle is best  ज्ञात लिये उसके  playing days with the Chicago White Sox , and former Chicago Cubs and White Sox player Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach .
During  the जल्दी सालो of  the franchise , Kittle did a series of TV commercials to promote the team , using the gimmick `` Ma Kittle . '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma . ''
The ads  यहूद कामयाब  at sparking some initial interest in the team as the Flyers hoped to steal away fans from the nearby Kane County Cougars .
The ad mimicked the highly successful  converse  ads where Larry Johnson starred as both himself and `` Gramama . ''
At the end of the 2001 season ,  however ,  Kittle resigned from his managerial position , and Jim Boynewicz was hired to replace him .
in 2004 ,  the Flyers made it to the Northern League Championship Series against the St. Paul Saints .
despite  leading the five-game series 2-1 , Schaumburg eventually lost the series .
In Game 5 , Flyers relief pitcher Lyle Prempas  अनुमत a खेल जीतना ग्रैंड स्लैम by st. पॉल  infielder Marc Mirizzi in the ninth inning .
The Flyers appeared in the  उत्तरी  League Playoffs four times ( 1999 , 2003 , 2004 , 2006 ) but never won the championship .
Some famous players who played for the Flyers were former Oakland A 's outfielder   Ozzie Canseco and former Chicago Cubs outfielder Dwight Smith .
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ; born 7 March 1970 ) is an English film and theatre actress  और पूर्व फ़ैशन मॉडल  .
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall , Cambridge in the  जल्दी 1990s , तब प्रारंभ working in टेलीविज़न  , appearing in Inspector Morse , the British mini-series Scarlet and Black , and the television film Advocates II .
She made her film début in the  फिल्मी मौत यंत्र ( 1994 ) , लकिन उसके  breakthrough role came in the film Chain Reaction ( 1996 ) , leading to a high-profile role as Evelyn Carnahan-O'Connell in the films The Mummy ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ) .
Other notable films  featuring वाइज़ हैं दुश्मन at the गेट्स , परिचय a लड़के , constantine ,  The Fountain and The Constant Gardener , for which she received an Academy Award , a Golden Globe and a Screen Actors ' Guild award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle .
She has been labelled an `` English rose '' since her minor  भूमिका in चोरी  Beauty ( 1996 ) .
Weisz also works  in थिएटर  .
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 revival of Noël Coward 's play Design for Living , which earned her the London Critics Circle Award  लिये the सबसे होनहार  newcomer .
Weisz 's performances  भी शामिल the 1999 donmar गोदाम उत्पादन of टेनेसी  Williams ' Suddenly , Last Summer , and their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire .
Her portrayal of Blanche DuBois in the latter play earned  उसके the आलोचकों ' वृत्त  Theatre Award for Best Actress .
She has recently played Evanora in Oz the Great and  शक्तिशाली .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the United States ( the `` Union '' or the `` North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and  formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका  ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of  गुलामी , विशेषकर  the extension of slavery into the western territories .
विदेशी शक्तियां  did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's  अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the  difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed  expanding गुलामी into  United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before  his  inauguration on March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and  the  incoming Republicans rejected secession as illegal .
lincoln  's inaugural address declared his administration would not initiate civil war .
आठ बाकी  slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
confederate  forces seized numerous federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise  , और दोनो पहलू  prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that   European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would intervene ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when Confederate forces  fired upon  Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to   retake the fort ; consequently , four more slave states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval  नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the  southern economy .
The Eastern Theater  थी  inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862  confederate अभियान into  Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation , which made ending  गुलामी  a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862  the संघ  destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate incursion  north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses S. Grant command of all Union  सेना in 1864  .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to  the समुद्र  , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all  दिशानिर्देश , और could afford  to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at  appomattox अदालत  House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of the earliest true  औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and   mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The  mobilization  of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history ,  resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको  and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John  huddleston estimates the मौत टोल  at ten percent of all Northern males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
आलू  bread is a form of bread in which potato replaces a portion of the regular wheat flour .
It  is पकाया in a किस्में  of methods , including by baking it on a hot griddle or pan , or in an oven .
It may be leavened or unleavened , and may have a variety of  अन्य संघटक  baked into it .
The  अनुपात of आलू to गेहूं आटा varies  significantly from recipe to recipe , with some recipes having a majority of potato , and others having a majority of wheat flour .
कुछ  recipes call for mashed potatoes , with others calling for dehydrated potato flakes .
It is available as a commercial product in many countries , with similar variations in  संघटक , कुकिंग विधि , और अन्य  variables .
The Pacific Time Zone observes standard time  by  subtracting eight hours from Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
The clock time in this zone is based on the mean solar time of the 120th  मध्याह्न वेस्ट of the ग्रीनविच  Observatory .
During daylight saving time , its time offset is  .
In the United States and  कनाडा , इस समय मण्डल  is generically called Pacific Time ( PT ) .
Specifically  , it is प्रशांत मानक समय ( pst ) जब observing  standard time ( winter ) , and Pacific Daylight Time ( PDT ) when observing daylight saving time ( summer ) .
Most of Canada uses  daylight छायांकन  time .
In Mexico the UTC−8 time  मण्डल is ज्ञात as the  Northwest Zone , which is synchronized with the U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule .
The largest city in the Pacific  समय मण्डल is लॉस एंजिल्स in  California from USA ; the city 's metropolitan area is the largest in the zone .
The zone is one hour ahead of the Alaska Time Zone , one hour behind the Mountain Time  मण्डल और तीन घंटों पीछे  the Eastern Time Zone .
स्टीरियो 8 , commonly ज्ञात  as the eight-track cartridge , eight-track tape , or simply eight-track , is a magnetic tape sound recording technology .
It was popular in the  संयुक्त राज्य इससे  the mid-1960s through to the early 1980s , but was relatively unknown in many European countries .
It was , however , very popular in the United  किंगडम दौरान  this period .
Stereo 8 was created in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill Lear of Lear Jet  निगम , साथ  with Ampex , Ford Motor Company , General Motors , Motorola , and RCA Victor Records ( RCA ) .
It was a further development of the similar Stereo-Pak four-track cartridge created by Earl ``  madman '' muntz  .
A later quadraphonic version of the  स्वरूप थी घोषित by आरसीए in  April 1970 and first known as Quad-8 , then later changed to just Q8 .
Ramesses   II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian : , alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or ) , referred to as Ramesses the Great , was the third Egyptian pharaoh ( reigned 1279 BC – 1213 BC ) of the Nineteenth dynasty .
He is often regarded as the greatest , most celebrated , and most  शक्तिशाली pharaoh of the  Egyptian Empire .
His successors and later Egyptians called him the `` Great  पूर्वज  . ''
Ramesses II led  अनेक सैन्य  expeditions into the Levant , re-asserting Egyptian control over Canaan .
He also led expeditions to the south ,  into  Nubia , commemorated in inscriptions at Beit el-Wali and Gerf Hussein .
At age fourteen , Ramesses was appointed  प्रिंस  Regent by his father Seti I .
He is believed to have taken the throne in his late teens and is known to have ruled Egypt from 1279 BC to 1213 BC for 66 years and 2 months , according to both Manetho and Egypt 's   contemporary historical records .
He was once said to have lived to be 99  सालो बूढ़ा  , but it is more likely that he died in his 90th or 91st year .
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 BC as most Egyptologists  आज मानना , he होता have assumed  the throne on May 31 , 1279 BC , based on his known accession date of III Shemu day 27 .
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed festivals ( the first held after thirty years of a pharaoh 's reign , and then every three years )  दौरान उसके reign—more than कोई अन्य  pharaoh .
On his death , he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings ; his body was later moved to a  royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा  in 1881 , and is now on display in the Cairo Museum .
The early part of his reign was focused on building cities , temples and  स्मारक  .
He established the city of Pi-Ramesses in the  nile डेल्टा as उसके नई पूंजी  and main base for his campaigns in Syria .
This city was built on the remains of the city of Avaris , the capital of the Hyksos when they took over  , और थी  the location of the main Temple of Set .
He is also known as Ozymandias in the Greek sources , from a  लिप्यन्तरण into यूनानी of a भाग of रामेसेस  's throne name , , `` Ra 's mighty truth , chosen of Ra '' .
The Texas Rangers are a professional baseball team located in the Dallas-Fort  लायक metroplex  , based in Arlington , Texas .
The Rangers  मताधिकार is फिलहाल  a member of the Western Division of Major League Baseball 's American League .
Since , the Rangers have  निभाई in रेंजरों ballpark  in Arlington in Arlington , Texas .
The team 's  नाम  is borrowed from the famous law enforcement agency of the same name .
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the Washington Senators , an expansion team awarded to Washington , D.C. , after the  नगर 's पहला ballclub , the असली वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों  , moved to Minnesota and became the Twins .
After the season  , the  new Senators moved to Arlington , Texas , and debuted as the Rangers the following spring .
The Texas Rangers Baseball Club has made six appearances in the MLB postseason , all following division championships , in 1996 , 1998 , 1999 , 2010  , 2011 और  2012 .
In 2010 , the Rangers advanced past the Division Series for the first  समय , defeating  the Tampa Bay Rays .
टेक्सास तब brought  home their first American League Pennant after beating the New York Yankees in six games .
In the 2010 World Series , the franchise 's first , the Rangers  गिरी to the सैन फ्रांसिस्को  Giants in five games .
उनके लोन विजय बना उन्हें the पहला टेक्सास टोली to जीत a संसार श्रेणी खेल , the ह्यूस्टन एस्टर्स having महरूम swept in उनके 2005 संसार श्रेणी रूप .
They repeated as  अमरीकी  League champions the following year , then lost the 2011 World Series to the St. Louis Cardinals in seven games .
Gaius Julius Caesar ( , July 100 BC – 15 March 44 BC ) was a Roman general , statesman , Consul  और notable  author of Latin prose .
He played a critical  भूमिका in the कार्यक्रम कि led to the  demise of the Roman Republic and the rise of the Roman Empire .
In 60 BC , Caesar , Crassus and Pompey formed a political alliance that was to dominate Roman  politics for  several years .
Their attempts to amass power through populist tactics were opposed by the conservative elite within the Roman  Senate  , among them Cato the Younger with the frequent support of Cicero .
Caesar 's conquest of Gaul , completed by 51 BC , extended Rome 's  territory to the अंग्रेज़ी चैनल  and the Rhine .
Caesar became the first Roman general to cross both when he built a bridge across the  राइन और conducted the पहला  invasion of Britain .
These achievements granted him unmatched military power and threatened to eclipse the standing of Pompey , who had realigned himself  साथ the सीनेट बाद the मौत  of Crassus in 53 BC .
With the Gallic Wars concluded , the Senate ordered Caesar to lay down his military command and return  to रोम  .
Caesar  refused , और चिह्नित उसके defiance in 49  BC by crossing the Rubicon with a legion , leaving his province and illegally entering Roman territory under arms .
Civil war resulted , from which he emerged as the unrivaled  नेता of  Rome .
After assuming control of  सरकारी , सीज़र began a कार्यक्रम of सोशल और सरकारी  reforms , including the creation of the Julian calendar .
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic  और थी आखिरकार  proclaimed `` dictator in perpetuity '' .
But the underlying  राजनैतिक विरोध था नहीं महरूम resolved , और on the ides of कूच ( 15 कूच ) 44 bc , सीज़र थी assassinated by a समूह of सीनेटरों led by मार्कस junius ब्रूटस .
A new series of civil wars broke out , and the constitutional government of the Republic  थी never लौटी  .
Caesar 's adopted heir Octavian , later known as Augustus , rose to sole power  , और the era of  the Roman Empire began .
Much of Caesar 's life is known from his own accounts of his military  अभियान  , and from other contemporary sources , mainly the letters and speeches of Cicero and the historical writings of Sallust .
The later biographies of  सीज़र by suetonius  and Plutarch are also major sources .
सीज़र is deemed to be  one of the greatest military commanders of history .
Linguistic map of Nigeria , Cameroon , and  बेनिन  .
चिह्न  in English , outside the University of Lagos
There are hundreds of  भाषाएं  spoken in Nigeria .
the प्रमुख भाषाएं  are Yoruba , Hausa , Igbo , Edo , Fulfulde , Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English , the former colonial language , was chosen to facilitate the cultural and linguistic  एकता of the देश  .
English , however , remains an  विशेष बचाना of the  country 's urban elite , and is not widely spoken in rural areas , which comprise three quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of Africa as a whole , encompassing three major African  भाषाएं परिवारों : afroasiatic ,  Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several as-yet unclassified languages , such as Cen Tuum , which may represent a relic of an even greater diversity prior  to the स्प्रेड of the वर्तमान भाषा  families .
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot , ( UK ) bird 's nest , bishop 's lace , and Queen  ऐनी 's फीता ( उत्तर अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering  plant in the family Apiaceae , native to temperate regions of Europe , southwest Asia and naturalised to North America and Australia .
Domesticated carrots are cultivars of a  subspecies , daucus  carota subsp . sativus .
In the United States , the title of federal judge usually means a judge appointed by the President of the United States and confirmed by the United States Senate pursuant to the Appointments Clause in  आलेख  II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States , whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the constitutional power of Congress to alter , acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States , and 94  संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला  courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as a federal judge ; such positions include the Chief Justice and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court , Circuit Judges of the  न्यायालयों of appeals , और ज़िला न्यायाधीशों of the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला  courts .
All of these judges described thus far are referred to sometimes as `` Article III judges '' because they exercise the judicial power vested in the judicial branch of the federal government  by Article  III of the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the Court of International Trade  कसरत न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant  to Article III .
Other judges serving in the federal courts , including magistrate judges and bankruptcy judges , are also sometimes referred to as `` federal  न्यायाधीशों '' ; however , वे हैं neither नियुक्त  by the President nor confirmed by the Senate , and their power derives from Article I instead .
See Article I and  आलेख  III tribunals .
Nelly Kim Furtado ( born December 2 , 1978 ) is  a कनाडाई सिंगर  , songwriter and actress .
She has sold 20 million albums worldwide and more 20 million singles , bringing her total sales to over  40 लाख रिकॉर्ड  around the world .
Furtado  पहला gained कीर्ति साथ  her debut album , Whoa , Nelly !
, जिससे शाखित दो कामयाब singles , `` i 'm जैसे a बर्ड `` और `` फेरे बंद the लाइट `` . ``
I 'm Like A Bird '' won a 2001 Juno  पुरस्कार लिये सिंगल of the साल और  a 2002 Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
In 2003 , Furtado released Folklore , which produced three international  singles— `` powerless ( कह कया  You Want ) `` , `` Try `` and `` Força `` .
Three years later she released  ढीला  , a worldwide commercial success .
The album spawned four number-one hits  :  `` Promiscuous `` , `` Maneater `` , `` Say It Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) `` .
After a three-year break , she released  उसके पहला full-length स्पेनी  album , Mi Plan , and Furtado received a Latin Grammy for Best Female Pop Vocal Album .
In 2012 , Furtado 's fourth English-language studio album , The Spirit  अविनाशी थी  released .
Furtado 's work has earned her numerous   awards and accolades , including 2 Grammy Awards , 10 Juno Awards , 3 MuchMusic Video Awards and a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame .
Creatures of the Night  is the दसवाँ  studio album by Kiss .
It is the band 's last album for Casablanca  रिकॉर्ड , the  only label the group had ever recorded for at that point .
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca  संस्थापक और जल्दी चुंबन समर्थक neil bogart  , who had died of cancer during the recording sessions .
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official member ( until 1998 's Psycho Circus ) , and its first album with Vinnie Vincent as the  initially uncredited सीसे guitarist  ( Vincent would later be credited , but not featured pictorially on the cover , of 1985 's reissue of the album ) .
टच is a  crucial means of receiving information .
This  फ़ोटो  shows tactile markings identifying stairs for visually impaired people .
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system comprising the receptors and processing centres to produce the sensory modalities  ऐसे as टच , तापमान , proprioception  ( body position ) , and nociception ( pain ) .
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia , skeletal  मांसपेशियां , हड्डियों  and joints , internal organs , and the cardiovascular system .
While touch is considered one of the five traditional senses , the impression of touch is  formed इससे अनेक  modalities .
In medicine , the  colloquial पद `` टच '' is प्रायः replaced साथ `` दैहिक  senses '' to better reflect the variety of mechanisms involved .
Somatic senses are sometimes referred to as somesthetic  होश  , with the understanding that somesthesis includes touch , proprioception and ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception .
The system reacts to diverse stimuli using different receptors  : thermoreceptors , nociceptors  , mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors .
Transmission of information from  the receptors गुजरता via संवेदी  nerves through tracts in the spinal cord and into the brain .
Processing primarily  occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory  area in the parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex .
The  cortical  homunculus was devised by Wilder Penfield .
At its simplest , the  प्रणाली works जब कार्यकलाप in a संवेदी  neuron is triggered by a specific stimulus such as heat ; this signal eventually passes to an area in the brain uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location .
The point-to-point mapping of the body surfaces in the brain is called a homunculus and is  अनिवार्य in the सृष्टि  of a body image .
This  brain-surface  ( `` cortical '' ) map is not immutable , however .
नाटकीय शिफ्ट can occur in जवाब to स्ट्रोक or चोट .
Magnolia is a  विशाल genus  of about 210 flowering plant species in the subfamily Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae .
It is  नामित  after French botanist Pierre Magnol .
Magnolia  is an  ancient genus .
Appearing   before bees did , the flowers evolved to encourage pollination by beetles .
To  avoid क्षति  from pollinating beetles , the carpels of Magnolia flowers are extremely tough .
Fossilised specimens of Magnolia acuminata have been found dating to 20 million years ago , and of plants  identifiably belonging to  the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years ago .
another पहलू of magnolias कि is माना to represent an ancestral राज्य is कि the पुष्प कली is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals ; the perianth भाग हैं undifferentiated और पुकारा tepals बल्कि than पृथक sepals  and petals .
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with  अनेक अन्य flowering पौधे निकट the आधार of the flowering संयंत्र  lineage such as Amborella and Nymphaea ( as well as with many more recently derived plants such as Lilium ) .
The natural range of Magnolia species is a disjunct distribution ,  साथ a प्रमुख केन्द्र  in east and southeast Asia and a secondary centre in eastern North America , Central America , the West Indies , and some species in South America .
अंगूठा
``  श्वेत क्रिसमस  '' is an Irving Berlin song reminiscing about an old-fashioned Christmas setting .
According to the Guinness Book of World Records , the version sung by Bing Crosby is the  best-selling सिंगल of सब समय , साथ अनुमानित  sales in excess of 50 million copies worldwide .
Accounts  vary as  to when and where Berlin wrote the song .
One story is that he wrote it in 1940 , in warm La Quinta , California ,  जबकि रहकर at the la quinta होटल , a बारंबार  Hollywood retreat also favored by writer-producer Frank Capra , although the Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there .
He often stayed up all night writing — he told his  सचिव  , `` Grab your pen and take down this song .
I just wrote the best song  i 've कभी  written — heck , I just wrote the best song that anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country skiing ( or XC skiing ) is a form of ski  touring in जिससे भागीदार propel  themselves across snow-covered terrain using skis and poles .
The activity is popular in many places with large snowfields ,  primarily उत्तरी यूरोपीय ,  Canada , and Alaska .
Cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing sport family ,  जिससे शामिल  ski jumping , Nordic combined ( cross-country skiing and ski jumping ) , Biathlon ( skiing and rifle marksmanship ) and ski-orienteering ( which includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ) .
Cross-country skiing is the modern style of skiing that  सबसे resembles प्रागैतिहासिक स्कीइंग , विशेषकर  when done in the backcountry .
It is also related  to telemark  skiing .
A use tax in United States is  पूरक to बिक्री कर जिससे अर्थात् , if तुम ख़रीदे a taxable  product/services without paying any Sales tax to vendor , you owe use tax .
You must  स्वः  assess use tax and pay it directly to the state where the products were consumed or services were rendered .
Use tax typically is a tax on consumption but if you buy an  मद ( बगैर  paying sales tax ) and store it in your warehouse initially , use tax applies to that location where goods were stored .
Later on when the final consumption takes place at some other location , you are required to pay the differential of tax  rate to the  jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption .
इस वाकई  means that you do n't have to pay both Sales Tax as well as Use Tax on one transaction .
It is only one or the other that you are required to pay on purchase of  taxable products/services  .
If vendor does n't charge any Sales tax on its invoice then it is the  दायित्व of  the buyer to self assess Use tax and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication .
Use Tax is generally charged at the same tax rate  of बिक्री कर लकिन  in some states the tax rate is different .
Use tax is  भी termed as `` खपत  Tax '' or `` Consumer Use Tax '' .
A use tax is a type of excise tax levied in the United  राज्य by numerous राज्य  governments .
it is assessed upon ठोस निजी प्रॉपर्टी खरीदा by a निवासी of the assessing राज्य लिये उपयोग , भंडार , or खपत in कि राज्य ( नहीं लिये पुनर्विक्रय ) , regardless of जहाँ the खरीदें took प्लेस  .
If a  निवासी of a राज्य makes a खरीदें भीतर उसके घर राज्य , पूरा बिक्री कर is सशुल्क at the समय of the लेनदेन .
The use tax  applies जब a निवासी  of the assessing state purchases an item that is not subject to his home state 's sales tax .
Usually , this is due to out-of-state purchases , as  खूब as ordering  items through the mail , by phone , or over the Internet from other states .
The use tax is typically assessed at the same rate as the sales tax that would have been owed ( if any ) had  the वही goods महरूम खरीदा in the राज्य of निवास  .
For example , a resident of Massachusetts , with a 6.25 % `` sales and use tax '' on certain goods and services , purchases non-exempt goods or services in New Hampshire for use ,  भंडार or अन्य खपत  in Massachusetts .
Under New Hampshire law , the New  Hampshire vendor  collects no sales taxes on the goods , but the Massachusetts purchaser/user must still pay 6.25 % of the sales price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax .
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect sales tax for such goods at time of purchase , whatever taxes were  सशुल्क by the क्रेता to कि राज्य can be deducted  ( as a tax credit ) from the 6.25 % owed for subsequent use , storage or consumption in Massachusetts .
With few exceptions , no state 's vendors will charge the native state 's sales tax on goods shipped out of state , meaning all  goods ordered इससे out-of-state हैं essentially  free of sales tax .
The purchaser is therefore required to declare and pay the use  कर to उसके  home state on these ordered goods .
The  assessing क्षेत्राधिकार  may make the use tax payable annually , but some states require a monthly payment .
For example , where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 % sales tax on  प्रॉपर्टी brought in लिये उपयोग in the राज्य , वर्मांट विधि  requires filing a tax return ( Form SU-452 and payment ) by the 20th day of the month following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 late fee , a 5 % penalty per month , to a maximum of 25 % , plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties .
Typical exemptions include purchases by charitable non-profit organizations or governmental agencies , purchases for resale in commerce , and  purchases via `` कैज़ुअल बिक्री  '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business .
Also note that there are thousands of tax jurisdictions in the U.S. and many  have ever-changing  lists of specific types of goods and services that are not taxable .
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment of tax on `` pre-written '' ( not custom ) software purchased and  डाउनलोड over the अंतरजाल लिये संस्थापना  and use in Massachusetts , regardless of where it originates .
However ,  the वास्तविक उपयोग of the वही तन्त्र डाउनलोड  by a Massachusetts resident to a server in another state remains a non-taxed `` service '' .
In contrast , Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered over the Internet ( such as downloaded software or music ) , except VoIP  जिससे is specifically पारिभाषित as taxable `` दूरसंचार  services '' .
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered thru a tangible medium '' ( i.e. , on disk ) in Arkansas is taxable even if ordered online , except `` custom software  लिये a particular ग्राहक  '' which is non-taxable `` programming services '' even if delivered on a disk .
In most cases , this complexity is part  of the underlying बिक्री कर कानून ; लकिन जबकि  a brick-and-mortar store has to deal with only the sales tax laws of its own location , remote sellers have to deal with the use tax laws of many jurisdictions—up to every US state and locality that assesses them , if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ) .
In medicine , pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an  बढ़ाएँ  of blood pressure in the pulmonary artery , pulmonary vein , or pulmonary capillaries , together known as the lung vasculature , leading to shortness of breath , dizziness , fainting , and other symptoms , all of which are exacerbated by exertion .
Pulmonary hypertension can be a severe disease with a markedly decreased exercise   tolerance and heart failure .
It was first identified by Dr. Ernst  वोन romberg  in 1891 .
According to  the सबसे हाल वर्गीकरण , it can be एक  of five different types : arterial , venous , hypoxic , thromboembolic or miscellaneous .

Sanuk , a division of Deckers  बाहरी निगम  , is a footwear brand based in Southern California .
Sanuk , the Thai word for fun , was founded by Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया देशी जेफ़ kelley जब  he started making sandals out of indoor-outdoor carpet .
The first product created was green carpeted and entitled the `` Fur Real '' after one shop owner asked  if the विलक्षणता चन्दन थी `` लिये रियल  . ''
The Fur Real first became a runaway hit through boutique stores and not the intended  लहरे दुकानें  .
The novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped in wire mesh , a  तेंदुआ  print version , and styles made out of a poncho material in a variety of colors .
Sanuk has grown to include style options for men , women  और  youth and is distributed across the United States and in over 50 countries throughout Europe , Asia , South America and Australia .
Sanuk centers itself around a positive  जीवनशैली वकालत  the slogan , `` Smile , Pass it on ! `` .
In computer science , array programming languages ( also known as  वेक्टर or multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize  operations on scalars to apply transparently to vectors , matrices , and higher dimensional arrays .
Array programming primitives concisely  एक्स्प्रेस व्यापक विचार परिचय  data manipulation .
The level of conciseness can be dramatic in certain cases : it is not uncommon to find array programming language one-liners that require more than  a युगल of पृष्ठों  of Java code .
APL , designed by Ken Iverson , was the first programming language to  provide  array programming capabilities .
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A Programming  भाषा '' और नहीं to arrays प्रति se . iverson 's योगदान to rigor और स्पष्टता  was probably more important than the simple extension of dimensions to functions .
In the United  राज्य an annuity अनुबंध is निर्मित जब  an insured party , usually an individual , pays a life insurance company a single premium that will later be distributed back to the insured party over time .
Annuity contracts traditionally provide a guaranteed distribution of income over time ,  ऐसे as via फिक्स्ड भुगतान  , until the death of the person or persons named in the contract or until a final date , whichever comes first .
However , the majority of modern annuity customers use annuities only to accumulate funds free of income and  पूंजी gains कर और to बाद लो lump-sum withdrawals बगैर using  the guaranteed-income-for-life feature .
President  बराक ओबामा  .
बराक ओबामा साथ  his first Supreme Court nominee , Sonia Sotomayor .
following is a सूची of सब  United States federal judges appointed by President Barack Obama during his presidency .
As of April 30 , 2013 , 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the United States Senate , namely two  justices to the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य , 35 न्यायाधीशों  to the United States courts of appeals and 150 judges to the United States district courts .
25 further nominations are  फिलहाल  awaiting Senate action .
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United  राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals , 67 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य  district courts and 22 additional federal judiciary vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the end of Obama 's second term .
Obama has not made any recess appointments to the  संघीय न्यायालयों  .
Obama has made two nominations to the United States  अदालत of  International Trade , an Article III tribunal .
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily C. Hewitt of the  संयुक्त राज्य अदालत  of Federal Claims , an Article I court , to be Chief Judge of that court .
This is a list of airports in Mexico ,  sorted  by location .
Mexico has about 1,834 airports , ranking 2nd in number of airports in North America ,  और 3rd in the संसार  .
Only major National and International Airports  हैं  shown .
Agency debt also known as an Agency bond is a security  , प्रायः a बंध , जारी  by a U.S. government-sponsored agency .
The offerings of these agencies are backed but not  गारंटी by the us सरकारी  since the agencies are private entities .
कुछ prominent issuers  of these securities are Student Loan Marketing Association ( Sallie Mae ) , Federal National Mortgage Association ( Fannie Mae ) and Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation ( Freddie Mac ) .
Agency securities are usually exempt from  राज्य और  local taxes , but not federal tax .
Agency debt is  भी पुकारा  an agency security .
The Susquehanna Steam Electric Station ,  a  boiling water reactor .
The reactors are located inside the rectangular containment buildings towards the front of the  कूलिंग मीनारें  .
Three nuclear-powered American warships , ( top to bottom ) nuclear cruisers  uss bainbridge और uss  Long Beach with USS Enterprise the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964 .
Crew members are spelling out Einstein 's  mass-energy equivalence सूत्र  E = mc2 on the flight deck .
The Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker NS Yamal on a 1994 joint  expedition साथ  the NSF .
Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear fission   to generate heat and electricity .
Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7 % of the  संसार  's energy and 13 % of the world 's electricity , in 2012 .
In 2013 , the  iaea रपट कि  there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors ( although not all are producing electricity ) , in 31 countries .
In addition , there are  लगभग 140 नवल  vessels using nuclear propulsion in operation , powered by some 180 reactors .
There is   an ongoing debate about the use of nuclear energy .
Proponents , such as the World Nuclear  संघ , the iaea और पर्यावरणविद लिये नाभिकीय  Energy contend that nuclear power is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions .
Opponents , such as Greenpeace International and NIRS , believe that nuclear power poses many threats to  लोगों और  the environment .
Nuclear power plant accidents include the Chernobyl disaster ( 1986 ) , Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster ( 2011 ) , and the Three  मील द्वीप दुर्घटना  ( 1979 ) .
वहीँ  have also been some nuclear-powered submarine mishaps .
Research into safety improvements is continuing  और नाभिकीय संलयन  , believed to be safer , may be used in the future .
As of 2012 , according to the IAEA ,  विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 सिविल नाभिकीय  power reactors under construction in 15 countries .
In the US the licenses of almost half its reactors have been extended to 60 years , and plans to build another dozen are under   serious consideration .
However , Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster prompted a rethink of  नाभिकीय उर्जा नीति in अनेक  countries .
Germany decided to close all its reactors by 2022 , and  इटली रै  banned nuclear power .
Following Fukushima , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Energy Agency halved its estimate of additional nuclear generating capacity to be built by 2035 .
फोटोग्राफ  of the Berlin Wall taken from the West side .
The Wall  थी निर्मित  in 1961 to prevent East Germans from fleeing from Communism .
It was an iconic symbol of the Cold War and its fall in 1989 marked   the end of the War .
The Cold War , often dated from 1947 to 1991 , was a sustained state of political and military tension between powers in the Western Bloc , dominated by the United States with NATO among  इसके allies , और शक्तियां  in the Eastern Bloc , dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact .
This began after the success of their temporary wartime alliance against Nazi Germany , leaving the USSR and the US as two  superpowers साथ  profound economic and political differences .
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned Movement founded by Egypt , India , and Yugoslavia ; this faction rejected  संघ साथ either the us-led  West or the Soviet-led East .
The Cold War was so named because the two major powers—each  possessing नाभिकीय हथियार  and thereby threatened with mutual assured destruction —never met in direct military combat .
Instead , in their struggle for global influence they engaged in  जारी मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare और  in regular indirect confrontations through proxy wars .
Cycles of relative calm would  be followed  by high tension , which could have led to world war .
The tensest times were during the Berlin Blockade ( 1948–1949 ) , the Korean War ( 1950–1953 ) , the Suez Crisis ( 1956 ) ,  the बर्लिन संकट of 1961 , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट ( 1962 ) , the वियतनाम युद्ध ( 1959–1975  ) , the Yom Kippur War ( 1973 ) , the Soviet war in Afghanistan ( 1979–1989 ) , the Soviet downing of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ) , and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ) .
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions , strategic  conventional फ़ोर्स deployments , extensive  aid to client states , espionage , massive propaganda campaigns , conventional and nuclear arms races , appeals to neutral nations , rivalry at sports events ( in particular the Olympics ) , and technological competitions such as the Space Race .
The US and USSR became involved in political and military conflicts in  the तीसरा संसार देशों of लैटिन अमेरिका  , Africa , the Middle East , and Southeast Asia .
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear war , both sides  sought राहत of  political tensions through détente in the 1970s .
In the 1980s , the United States increased diplomatic , military , and economic pressures on the  सोवियत  Union , at a time when the communist state was already suffering from economic stagnation .
In the mid-1980s , the new Soviet President Mikhail Gorbachev introduced the liberalizing reforms  of perestroika ( `` reorganization  '' , 1987 ) and glasnost ( `` openness '' , ca . 1985 ) .
Pressures for national  स्वतंत्रता grew  stronger in Eastern Europe , especially Poland .
They reached a breaking  पाइंट जब गोर्बाचेव refused to  use Soviet troops to support the faltering government of East Germany in late 1989 .
Within  सप्ताह सब  the satellite states broke free from Moscow in a peaceful wave of revolutions ( there was some violence in Romania ) .
The pressures escalated inside the Soviet Union , where Communism  गिरी और the ussr थी formally  dissolved in late 1991 .
The  संयुक्त राज्य  remained as the world 's only superpower .
The Cold War and its events have left a significant legacy , and it is often referred to in popular culture , especially in media featuring  विषयवस्तु of espionage और the threat  of nuclear warfare .
Pikes Peak State Park is a state park of  आयोवा , यूएसए , featuring a bluff  overlooking the Upper Mississippi River opposite the confluence of the Wisconsin River .
The park is operated by the Iowa Department of  प्राकृतिक संसाधन  .
It is nearly a thousand acres  (  4 km2 ) in extent .
The nearest city is McGregor ,  आयोवा  .
Iowa Highway 76  लगभग defines  its northern boundary .
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of Pikes Peak , a particularly high point overlooking the gorge of the Upper  मिसिसिपी , और जैसे pikes शिखर in  Colorado , is named for Zebulon Pike .
There are hiking trails , campgrounds and RV  सुविधाएं  .
Mountain bikes are  permitted  in certain portions of the park .
Aside from recreational development , the land in the park was never cleared and to a large extent  remains as  it was before the advent of white settlement .
It is part of a larger complex of parks , reserves and refuges which include Effigy Mounds National Monument , the various components of the Yellow River State Forest , the enormous Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller  ,  much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge .
The Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System is undergoing development ,  और होगा  connect elements of these sites .
Zac Brown Band is an American country/folk band based in Atlanta  , जॉर्जिया  .
The  लाइनअप consists of  Zac Brown ( lead vocals , guitar ) , Jimmy De Martini ( fiddle , vocals ) , John Driskell Hopkins ( bass guitar , vocals ) , Coy Bowles ( guitar , keyboards ) , Chris Fryar ( drums ) , Clay Cook ( guitar , keyboards , mandolin , steel guitar , vocals ) , and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ) .
The band has toured throughout the United States ,   including a slot on the 2009 and 2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival .
They have also recorded five studio albums , and charted nine Number One singles on the Billboard country charts : `` Chicken Fried `` , `` Toes `` , `` Highway 20 Ride `` , `` Free `` , `` As She 's Walking Away `` , `` Colder Weather `` , `` Knee Deep `` , `` Keep Me In Mind ``  , और `` अलविदा in उसके आँखें `` in जोड to the singles `` whatever it is `` और  `` No Hurry `` , which peaked at number 2 on the same chart .
Talk  रेडियो is a रेडियो  format containing discussion about topical issues .
Most   shows are regularly hosted by a single individual , and often feature interviews with a number of different guests .
Talk radio typically includes an element of listener  भागीदारी , प्रायः by  broadcasting live conversations between the host and listeners who `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show .
Listener contributions are usually screened by a show 's producer ( s ) in order to maximize audience  ब्याज और , in the मामला  of commercial talk radio , attract advertisers .
Generally , the shows are organized into segments , each separated by a  ठहराना लिये विज्ञापन ; however , in  public or non-commercial radio , music is sometimes played in place of commercials to separate the program segments .
Variations of talk radio  शामिल रूढ़िवादी  talk , hot talk , liberal talk and sports talk .
While talk radio has historically  महरूम संबद्ध साथ am/fm , starting around 2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी  for Internet-based talk-radio shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts .
Now , it is possible for an individual to use a variety of services to host an Internet-based talk-radio show  बगैर carriage by a परंपरागत रेडियो  station .
In addition  TV  programming from talk and news outlets such as BBC , CNN , Bloomberg and Fox are now often available expanding the world of talk radio further .
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios , but a wide variety of  अन्य डिवाइस और सेवाएं सहित  PCs using iTunes , station directories such as Tunein , show directory smartphones with apps such as Stitcher .

Hippa adactyla  fabricius , 1787

Hippa  alcimede  ( De Man , 1902 )
hippa australis  Hale , 1927
Hippa  carcineutes holthuis  & Manning , 1970
hippa celaeno  ( de Man , 1896 )
Hippa  granulatus (  Borradaile , 1904 )
Hippa hirtipes (  दाना ,  1852 )
Hippa indica Haig , Murugan & Balakrishnan  नायर , 1986
Hippa marmorata  (  Hombron & Jacquinot , 1846 )
Hippa ovalis (  A. milne-edwards  , 1862 )
Hippa picta ( Heller  , 1861  )
Hippa strigillata  (  Stimpson , 1860 )
hippa testudinaria  ( Herbst , 1791 )
Hippa  truncatifrons  ( Miers , 1878 )
It is closely  सम्बन्धित  to the genus Emerita , and species have often been transferred between the two genera .
Jakarta ( ) , officially known as the  खास पूंजी प्रदेश of  Jakarta ( ) , is the capital and largest city of Indonesia .
Located on the northwest coast of Java , Jakarta is the country 's economic , cultural and political  केन्द्र , और साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 10,187,595  as of November 2011 , it is the most populous city in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia , and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world .
The official metropolitan area , known as Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining  the आरंभिक syllables of जकार्ता , bogor , depok  , Tangerang and Bekasi ) , is the second largest in the world , yet the metropolis 's suburbs still continue beyond it .
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008 Globalization  और संसार शहरों पढ़ाई समूह और संजाल ( gawc  ) research .
and  रै  an area of .
This area has population of well over 28 million , making it one of the world 's largest conurbations in terms of  क्रमांक of  inhabitants .
In 2011 ,  जकार्ता क्रमित  17th among the world 's 200 largest cities , a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171 .
Jakarta has grown more  rapidly than kuala lumpur , बीजिंग  and Bangkok .
Established in  the चौथी सदी , the नगर became  an important trading port for the Kingdom of Sunda .
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known as Batavia  ) और रै जारी as the पूंजी  of Indonesia since the country 's independence was declared in 1945 .
The  नगर is the सीट  of the ASEAN Secretariat .
Jakarta is served by the Soekarno–Hatta International Airport , Halim Perdanakusuma International Airport , and Tanjung Priok Harbour ; it is connected by several intercity and commuter railways  , और परोसा by अनेक बस  lines running on reserved busways .
A typical home air  कंडीशनिंग  window unit .
Air  कंडीशनिंग is the  process of altering the properties of air ( primarily temperature and humidity ) to more favourable conditions .
More generally , air conditioning can refer to any form of technological cooling , heating , ventilation  ,  or disinfection that modifies the condition of air .
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con , AC or A/C ,  और नहीं to be उलझन साथ the संक्षिप्त लिये प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान ) is a प्रमुख or घर appliance , प्रणाली ,  or mechanism designed to change the air temperature and humidity within an area ( used for cooling and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ) .
The cooling is typically done using a simple refrigeration cycle , but sometimes evaporation is used , commonly for comfort cooling in  इमारतें  and motor vehicles .
In construction , a  पूरा प्रणाली of  heating , ventilation and air conditioning is referred to as `` HVAC `` .
`` 6 Foot 7 Foot '' ( also styled as  `` 6'7  '' ) is a song by American rapper Lil Wayne featuring label mate , Cory Gunz .
