The song samples ``  day-o ( the banana  Boat Song ) `` by Harry Belafonte .
DC Talk ( styled  as dc  Talk ) , is a Grammy -winning Christian rap trio .
The group was formed in Lynchburg , Virginia in 1987  by टोबी  McKeehan , Michael Tait , and Kevin Max Smith .
They have released five major studio albums together : DC Talk ( 1989 ) , Nu Thang ( 1990 ) , Free   at Last ( 1992 ) , Jesus Freak ( 1995 ) , and Supernatural ( 1998 ) .
In 2002 , the Encyclopedia of Contemporary Christian Music called DC Talk ``  the सबसे लोकप्रिय  overtly Christian act of all time . ''
In 2000 , the group released an EP titled Solo which  contained दो सोलो गीतों  from each member .
Since that time , DC Talk has been on an indefinite hiatus , and the three band members have  प्रत्येक led सोलो करियर  .
They have performed and recorded individual songs together several times during the 2000s , although  the समूह never  officially reunited or disbanded .
the  group 's musical style evolved significantly throughout their career .
Their first two releases  , dc बात और nu  Thang , were of the hip hop genre .
DC Talk 's third  एल्बम , फ़्री at पिछला , भी मुख्यतः  took influence from the hip hop style , although their music began taking on a rock sound .
The trio 's last two albums , Jesus Freak and Supernatural  ,  were predominantly pop rock .
The Bible is a compilation of many shorter books written at different times and later assembled  into the biblical  canon .
All but the shortest of these books have been  विभाजित into अध्याय , generally a पेज or so in लंबाई  , since the early 13th century .
Since the mid-16th century , each chapter has been further divided into `` verses ''  of a few छोटी लाइनों  or sentences .
Sometimes a sentence spans more than one verse , as in the case of ,  और sometimes वहीँ  is more than one sentence in a single verse , as in the case of .
As the chapter and verse divisions were not part of  the असली ग्रन्थ , वे रूप  part of the paratext of the Bible .
the यहूदी विभाजन  of the Hebrew text differ at various points from those used by Christians .
For instance , in Jewish  परंपरा , the ascriptions to अनेक ज़बूर हैं  regarded as independent verses , making 116 more verses , whereas the established Christian practice is to count and number each Psalm ascription together with the first verse following it .
Some chapter divisions also occur in different places , e.g . in Hebrew Bibles is numbered as in Christian  अनुवाद  .
An index   ( plural : indexes ) is a list of words or phrases ( 'headings ' ) and associated pointers ( 'locators ' ) to where useful material relating to that heading can be found in a document .
In a traditional back-of-the-book index the headings  होगा शामिल names of लोगों , स्थान और कार्यक्रम , और  concepts selected by a person as being relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book .
The pointers are typically page numbers , paragraph  संख्याएँ or खण्ड  numbers .
In  a पुस्तकालयों  catalog the words are authors , titles , subject headings , etc. , and the pointers are call numbers .
Internet search engines , such as Google , and full text searching help provide access to information but are not as selective as an index , as they provide non-relevant links , and may miss  प्रासंगिक सूचना if it is नहीं phrased in exactly the  way they expect .
In United States financial regulation , a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report  बना by a वित्तीय संस्था to the वित्तीय  Crimes Enforcement Network ( FinCEN ) , an agency of the United States Department of the Treasury , regarding suspicious or potentially suspicious activity .
फेसबुक  on the Ad-tech 2010
फेसबुक is an ऑनलाइन सोशल  networking service , whose name stems from the colloquial name for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other .
It  थी संस्थापित in फ़रवरी 2004 by चिह्नित zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज  roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to Harvard  विद्यार्थी , लकिन  was expanded to other colleges in the Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually added support for students at various other universities before opening to high school students ,  और आखिरकार to anyone  aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who  घोषित themselves to  be at least 13 years old to become registered users of the site .
Users must register before using the site , after which they may create a personal profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages , including automatic notifications when they update  उनके प्रोफ़ाइल  .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups , organized by workplace , school or college , or other characteristics  , and categorize  their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As of September 2012 , Facebook has over one  अरब  active users .
According  to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता  Reports survey , there are 7.5 million children under 13 with accounts and 5 million under 10 , violating the site 's terms of service .
In May 2005 , Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in Facebook , and Jim Breyer added $  1 लाख of उसके अपना  money to the pot .
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used social networking service by  विश्वव्यापी मासिक क्रियाशील  users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list , saying , `` How on earth did we stalk our exes , remember our co-workers ' birthdays , bug our friends , and play a rousing   game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics , such as Facebook Detox , state that Facebook has turned into a national obsession in the United  राज्य , resulting  in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast estimates  फेसबुक रै 138.9  million monthly unique U.S. visitors in May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today , in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million  ) of  the U.S. population had a Facebook account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some  regions , साथ  the site losing 7 million active users in the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering on February 1 , 2012  ,  and was headquartered in Menlo Park , California .
Facebook Inc.  began selling  stock to the public and trading on the NASDAQ on May 18 , 2012 .
सल्फोनेमाइड कार्यात्मक  group
Hydrochlorothiazide is a  सल्फोनेमाइड और  a thiazide .
Furosemide is a  सल्फोनेमाइड , लकिन  not a thiazide .
Sulfonamide or sulphonamide is the basis  of अनेक समूह  of drugs .
The original antibacterial sulfonamides ( sometimes called sulfa drugs or sulpha drugs ) are  सिंथेटिक रोगाणुरोधी  agents that contain the sulfonamide group .
Some sulfonamides are also devoid of  जीवाणुरोधी कार्यकलाप , e.g.  , the anticonvulsant sultiame .
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are newer  ड्रग समूह आधारित  on the antibacterial sulfonamides .
Sulfa allergies are common , hence  medications  containing sulfonamides are prescribed carefully .
It is important to make a distinction  between sulfa दवाएँ  and other sulfur-containing drugs and additives , such as sulfates and sulfites , which are chemically unrelated to the sulfonamide group , and do not cause the same hypersensitivity reactions seen in the sulfonamides .
This is a  सूची of वर्ण  from George Lopez .
Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are domesticated grey geese (  either ग्रेलैग geese or  Swan Geese ) kept as poultry for their meat , eggs , and down feathers since ancient times .
30 Seconds to Mars is an American rock band from Los  एंजिल्स , formed in 1998  .
Since 2007 , the band has consisted of actor Jared Leto ( lead vocals , rhythm guitar , songwriter )  , शैनन leto ( ड्रम , percussion  ) and Tomo Miličević ( lead guitar , keyboards ) .
Following the departure of  मैट wachter ( अभी of  Angels & Airwaves ) in 2007 , Tim Kelleher became the bassist for the group , performing live only with both Jared and Miličević recording bass for studio recordings , while Braxton Olita ( keyboards ) was added to the touring lineup in 2009 .
Previously , the group also featured guitarists Solon Bixler ( now of Great  उत्तरी ) और केविन ड्रेक  ( now of Polaroid Kiss ) .
To date , 30 Seconds to Mars have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ) , A Beautiful Lie ( 2005 ) , This Is War ( 2009 ) and three extended plays – AOL Sessions Undercover ( 2007 ) , To the Edge of the Earth ( 2008 ) , and MTV Unplugged : 30  सेकेंड to मंगल ( 2011  ) .
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated mostly with neo-prog , progressive metal and post-grunge  , लकिन वे have  also included emo , screamo , space rock and synthrock into their music .
They have been compared  to गुलाबी floyd ( जो यहूद an  influence on their work ) and Tool because of their use of philosophical and spiritual lyrics , concept albums and their use of experimental music .
A Christmas Story is a 1983  अमरीकी क्रिसमस कॉमेडी फिल्मी आधारित on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional  anecdotes of author and raconteur Jean Shepherd , based on his book In God We Trust , All Others Pay Cash , with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories .
it थी निर्देशित  by Bob Clark .
The film has since become a holiday classic  और is दिखाया  numerous times on television during the Christmas season on the network TBS , often in a 24-hour marathon .
in 2012 , the फिल्मी थी चयनित लिये संरक्षण  in the National Film Registry by the Library of Congress for being `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant '' .

New York City Cruise Liner Terminal in Hell 's Kitchen  at 52nd गली  .
The New York  Passenger Ship Terminal (  also known as the Luxury Liner Row or Manhattan Cruise Terminal or New York Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side .
The  टर्मिनल consists of उत्तर  River Piers 88 , 90 , 92 and 94 on the Hudson River between West 46th and West 54th Street .
( As a general rule , pier numbers in Manhattan can be  संकल्पित by adding 40 to the सम्बन्धित  cross-street . )
Ships now dock at  पियर 88  , 90 and 92 .
बांध 94 on the उत्तर पक्ष is अभी प्रयुक्त लिये प्रदर्शनी स्पेस .
Pier 86 , once used by United  राज्य लाइनों , is अभी घर  to the USS Intrepid .
In 2003 ,  the  terminal handled 900,000 passengers .
the नगर is forecasting  that 1.5 million will use the terminal by 2017 .
The piers are long  और  apart .
They were  पहला समाप्त in  1935 to replace the Chelsea Piers as the city 's luxury liner terminal .
the नई  terminal was built to handle bigger ships that had outgrown the Chelsea Piers .
The piers were renovated in 1970 and are  फिलहाल  undergoing another $ 150 million renovation .
The renovated plans call for  it  to handle three large ships at a time .
In doing renovations , the city is also considering  decommissioning बांध  92 .
लोगो of  the New York Cruise Terminal.For
decades the terminal was  the  only ocean-going passenger terminal in New York harbor .
With an upsurge in cruise ship traffic and the terminal 's ability to handle comfortably only three large ships at a time , two new terminals have opened in the harbor — the Cape Liberty Cruise Port opened in 2004 in Bayonne , New Jersey ( used by Royal Caribbean Cruise Line , Celebrity Cruises  और azamara क्रूज़ ) , और the ब्रुकलीन क्रूज टर्मिनल ( प्रयुक्त by the महारानी मरियम 2 और अन्य जहाजों  of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn , New York .
The West Side Highway takes a small jog east from the piers to below West 42nd Street because when the terminal  थी निर्मित जमीन था to be  taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers .
The US Army Corps of Engineers , who control the waterfront dimension , would not extend the pierhead line farther into the river , so  the नगर विस्तारित  the pier by cutting away at the land .
The city earlier  किया इस लिये  the Chelsea Piers ; however in Chelsea only landfill was taken away .
At the Passenger  टर्मिनल  actual Manhattan schist was taken away .
From downstream in the  नदी
Many major passenger ships have docked there , including the RMS Queen Mary 2 and Freedom of the Seas , before  the  Brooklyn and Bayonne terminals opened .
The SS Normandie  caught आग और  subsequently capsized at its Pier 88 berth during World War II .
The Normandie , renamed  uss lafayette  , lies capsized in the frozen mud at Pier 88 in the winter of 1942

The city will spend $ 4 million to renovate and upgrade the cruise  टर्मिनल  to accommodate the ship .

Christian right is a term used in the United States to describe right-wing  ईसाई राजनैतिक समूह कि हैं characterized  by their strong support of socially conservative policies .
Christian conservatives principally seek to apply their  समझना of the शिक्षाओं of christianity  to politics and public policy by proclaiming the value of those teachings and/or by seeking to use those teachings to influence law and public policy .
In  the u.S. , the ईसाई सही is an अनौपचारिक गठबन्धन formed around a कोर of धर्मान्तरण protestants कि draws `` support इससे नीतियां रूढ़िवादी catholics , यहूदियों , mormons , और occasionally secularists '' जो share उनके लक्ष्य .
The movement has its roots in American  राजनीती going  back as far the 1940s and has been especially influential since the 1970s .
Their influence draws , in part , from grassroots activism as  खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on सोशल मुद्दे और क्षमता  to motivate the electorate around those issues .
The Christian  सही  is notable today for advancing socially conservative positions on issues including school prayer , stem cell research , homosexuality , contraception , abortion , and pornography .
Although the Christian right is usually associated with the U.S. , the movement has been a key factor in the politics of Canada  , the नीदरलैंड्स , उत्तरी  Ireland and Australia , among others .
Far East Movement ( stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated FM  ) is an  American hip hop band quartet based in Los Angeles .
The group formed in 2003 and consists of Kev Nish ( Kevin Nishimura ) , Prohgress ( James Roh ) , J-Splif (  jae choung ) , और  DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ) .
दूर ईस्ट गति  's first claim to fame was their song `` Round Round '' featured in the Hollywood movie , The Fast and the Furious : Tokyo Drift , and its subsequent soundtrack , video game and DVD .
Since `` Round Round '' , the group  रै महरूम  featured on various network shows including , , Entourage , Gossip Girl , and Finishing the Game ( a featured film at Sundance 2007 ) .
Their single `` Like a G6 `` hit number one on the Billboard Hot 100 Chart and on  itunes as खूब in  late October 2010 .
Far East Movement also has the distinction of being the first Asian-American group to  earn  a # 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States .
LR44 is the IEC designation for an alkaline 1.5 volt button cell , commonly used in small LED flashlights , digital thermometers ,  calculators , calipers , घड़ियाँ , घड़ियाँ , खिलौने  and laser pointers .
LR44  क्षारीय  cell
The battery nomenclature is defined by  the  International Electrotechnical Commission ( IEC ) in its 60086-3 standard ( Primary batteries , part 3 Watch batteries ) .
The letter L indicates the electrochemical system used ; a zinc negative  एलेक्ट्रोड  , manganese dioxide depolarizer and positive electrode , and an alkaline electrolyte .
R44 indicates a  गोलाकार कोशिका 11.4±0.2 mm व्यास  and 5.2±0.2 mm height as defined by the IEC standard 60086 .
Manufacturers have their own part  संख्याएँ लिये आईईसी प्रकार lr44  batteries including:
LR44 , LR44G ,  lr44gd  , LR44H
LR1154 , L1154 , L1154C ,  l1154f , l1154g  , L1154H
6135-99-792-8475  ( NSN )
1166a
AG13 , A613 , AG14  ,  AG-14 , G13A , G13-A
157  ,  303 , 357
A76 , GDA76 , GP76A , GPA7 , GPA75  , gpa76  , GPS76A,
1128MP , 208-904 , A-76 , CA18 , CA19 , CR44 , D76A , KA , KA76  , ms76h , px76a , px675a  , RPX675 , RW82 , SB-F9 , V13GA
4.5-volt , d , c , aa , aaa  , AAAA , A23 , 9-volt , CR2032 and LR44 batteries
Other types of batteries are or were made  in the r44 आकार  .
Formerly , mercury batteries were made as button cells  ( प्रकार mr44  and NR44 ) .
Zinc-air batteries type PR44 require  एयर to कार्य  .
Silver-oxide batteries type SR44 may provide extra capacity compared to LR44 types  लकिन  have slightly different voltage characteristics .
Performance of a device meant to use a silver-oxide battery may be degraded with  प्रतिस्थापन  of LR44 types .
निर्माता 's संख्याएँ  for silver oxide R44 size cells include:
sr44/sr44w/sr44sw
6135-99-651-3240 (  NSN )
sr1154
1107so

sg13
s76
EPX76 (  energizer  )
303/357  ( D357H )
Hurricane Katrina was the deadliest and most  destructive अटलांटिक  hurricane of the 2005 Atlantic hurricane season .
It was the costliest  प्राकृतिक विपत्ति  , as well as one of the five deadliest hurricanes , in the history of the United States .
Among recorded Atlantic  hurricanes  , it was the sixth strongest overall .
At least 1,833 people died in  the hurricane और subsequent floods , बनाना it the  deadliest U.S. hurricane since the 1928 Okeechobee hurricane ; total property damage was estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ) , nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992 .
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on August 23 , 2005 and crossed southern Florida as a  मॉडरेट श्रेणी 1 hurricane , causing कुछ मौतों और बाढ़ वहीँ  before strengthening rapidly in the Gulf of Mexico .
the hurricane strengthened  to a Category 5 hurricane over the warm Gulf water , but weakened before making its second landfall as a Category 3 hurricane on the morning of Monday , August 29 in southeast Louisiana .
it caused कठोर विनाश  along the Gulf coast from central Florida to Texas , much of it due to the storm surge .
The most  significant क्रमांक of मौतों occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स , louisiana , जिससे flooded as the तटबन्ध प्रणाली catastrophically विफल , in अनेक मामले घंटों बाद the तूफ़ान था स्थानांतरित अंतर्देशीय .
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of  neighboring parishes became  flooded , and the floodwaters lingered for weeks .
However , the worst property damage occurred in coastal areas , such as all Mississippi beachfront towns , which were flooded  over  90 % in hours , as boats and casino barges rammed buildings , pushing cars and houses inland , with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach .
The hurricane surge protection failures in New Orleans are considered the worst civil engineering disaster in U.S.  इतिहास और prompted a मुकदमा विरूद्ध the u.S. फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स  ( USACE ) , the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965 .
Responsibility for the failures and flooding was laid squarely on the Army Corps in January 2008 by Judge Stanwood Duval , U.S. District Court , but the federal  एजेंसी could नहीं be आयोजित financially  liable due to sovereign immunity in the Flood Control Act of 1928 .
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal , state and local governments , resulting in the resignation of Federal Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ) director Michael D. Brown , and of New  Orleans Police  Department ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie Compass .
Several agencies including the United States Coast Guard ( USCG ) , National Hurricane Center (  nhc ) , और नेशनल  Weather Service ( NWS ) were commended for their actions .
They provided accurate hurricane weather tracking  forecasts  with sufficient lead time .
Even the most insistent appeals from national , state and local public officials to residents to evacuate before the storm  किया नहीं warn कि the levees could उल्लंघन  and fail .
U.S. debt from  1940 to  2011 .
Red lines indicate the `` debt held by the public '' and black  लाइनों indicate the कुल नेशनल कर्ज़ or सकल  public debt .
The difference is the ``  intragovernmental  debt , '' which includes obligations to government programs such as Social Security .
stated as a सूत्र  , National Debt = Debt held by the Public + Intragovernmental Debt .
The second panel shows the two debt  आंकड़े as a प्रतिशत  of U.S. GDP ( dollar value of U.S. economic production for that year ) .
The top panel is deflated so every year is in 2010  डॉलर .
The United States public debt is the money borrowed by the federal government of the United States through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other  संघीय सरकारी एजेंसियों  .
US public debt consists  of दो घटकs:
Debt held by the public includes  राजकोष प्रतिभूति आयोजित by निवेशकों  outside the federal government , including that held by individuals , corporations , the Federal Reserve System and foreign , state and local governments .
कर्ज़ आयोजित by  government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in accounts administered by the federal government that are owed to program beneficiaries , such as the Social Security Trust Fund .
कर्ज़ आयोजित by सरकारी  accounts represents the cumulative surpluses , including interest earnings , of these accounts that have been invested in Treasury securities .
Public debt  increases or decreases as a परिणाम  of the annual unified budget deficit or surplus .
the संघीय सरकारी बजट deficit or surplus is the अंतर between सरकारी रसीदें और बिता , ignoring intra-governmental हस्तांतरण  .
However , some spending that  is excluded  from the deficit ( supplemental appropriations ) also adds to the debt .
Historically , the US public debt as a share of GDP increased  दौरान युद्धों और  recessions , and subsequently declined .
For example , debt held by the public as a  share of जीडीपी peaked  just after World War II ( 113 % of GDP in 1945 ) , but then fell over the following 30 years .
In  हाल दशकों  , however , large budget deficits and the resulting increases in debt have led to concern about the long-term sustainability of the federal government 's fiscal policies .
On 2 April 2013 , debt held by the public was approximately $ 11.959  खरब or परिचय 75 %  of GDP .
Intragovernmental  holdings stood at $ 4.846 खरब  , giving a combined total public debt of $ 16.805 trillion .
As of January 2013 , $ 5.6 trillion or approximately 47 % of the debt held by the public was owned by foreign investors , the largest of which were the People 's Republic of  चीन और जापानी at  just over $ 1.1 trillion each .
In basketball , an assist is attributed to a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal , meaning that he or  वो थी `` assisting '' in the बास्केट  .
There is some judgment  शामिल in deciding whether  a passer should be credited with an assist .
An assist can be scored for the passer even if the player who  receives the pass makes a बास्केट  after dribbling the ball .
However , the original definition of an assist did not include such  परिस्थितियों ,  so the comparison of assist statistics across eras is a complex matter .
Only the pass directly before the  स्कोर may be गिने as an assist  , so no more than one assist can be recorded per field goal ( unlike in other sports , such as ice hockey ) .
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by free throws does not count as an  assist  in the NBA , but does in FIBA play ( only one assist is awarded per set of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ) .
Point guards tend to get the most assists per game ( apg ) , as their role is  primarily  that of a passer and ballhandler .
Centers tend to get fewer assists ,  लकिन  centers with good floor presence and court vision can dominate a team by assisting .
Being inside the key , the center often has the best angles and the best position for `` dishes '' and other short passes in  the स्कोरिंग  area .
Center Wilt Chamberlain led the NBA in assists  in 1968  .
A strong center with inside-scoring prowess , such as former NBA center Hakeem Olajuwon , can also be an  प्रभावी assistor क्युकी the  defense 's double-teaming tends to open up offense in the form of shooters .
The NBA single-game assist record is 30 , held by Scott Skiles of  the ऑरलैंडो  Magic against the Denver Nuggets , on December 30 , 1990 .
The NBA record for most career assists is held by  जॉन स्टॉकटन साथ  15,806 .
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK , when discussing property taxes in the United States , or previously in Cyprus and Malta ) is a  now-abstract ईकाई of करेंसी  used sometimes in accounting .
In the  संयुक्त  States , it is a notional unit equivalent to of a United States dollar ( a tenth of a cent ) .
In the United Kingdom it was proposed during the decades of discussion on the  decimalization of the  pound as a division of the pound sterling .
Several   other currencies used the mill , such as the Maltese lira .
The term comes  इससे  the Latin `` millesimum '' , meaning `` thousandth part '' .
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often called the Persian Wars ) were a series of conflicts  between the हख़ामनी साम्राज्य of फारस और city-states  of the Hellenic world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC .
The  टक्कर between the fractious  political world of the Greeks and the enormous empire of the Persians began when Cyrus the Great conquered Ionia in 547 BC .
Struggling to rule the independent-minded cities of Ionia , the Persians   appointed tyrants to rule each of them .
This would prove to be the source of much trouble for the  यूनानियों और  Persians alike .
In 499 BC , the then tyrant of Miletus , Aristagoras ,  embarked on an expedition to जीतें the द्वीप  of Naxos , with Persian support ; however , the expedition was a debacle and , pre-empting his dismissal , Aristagoras incited all of Hellenic Asia Minor into rebellion against the Persians .
This was the beginning of the Ionian Revolt , which would last until 493 BC , progressively drawing more regions of Asia Minor into the  विरोध  .
Aristagoras secured military support from Athens and Eretria , and in 498 BC these forces helped to capture and burn the Persian  क्षेत्रीय पूंजी of sardis  .
The Persian king Darius the Great vowed  to have बदला  on Athens and Eretria for this act .
The revolt continued  , साथ  the two sides effectively stalemated throughout 497–495 BC .
In 494 BC , the Persians regrouped , and attacked the epicentre of the revolt in Miletus   .
At the Battle of Lade , the Ionians suffered a decisive defeat , and the rebellion collapsed , with the final members being stamped out the  following साल  .
Seeking to secure his empire from further revolts and from the  हस्तक्षेप of the मेनलैंड यूनानियों , दारा embarked on a योजना to जीतें  Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis .
The first Persian invasion of Greece began in 492 BC , with the Persian general Mardonius conquering Thrace and  macedon पहले  several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign .
In 490 BC  a दूसरी फ़ोर्स थी  sent to Greece , this time across the Aegean Sea , under the command of Datis and Artaphernes .
This expedition subjugated the  cyclades  , before besieging , capturing and razing Eretria .
However , while en route to attack Athens , the Persian force was decisively defeated by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon ,  समाप्ति पारसी प्रयत्न लिये the समय होने .
Darius then began to plan to complete the conquest of Greece , but died in 486 BC and responsibility  लिये the conquest passed to उसके  son Xerxes I .
In 480 BC  , xerxes personally led the दूसरी पारसी आक्रमण of यूनानियों साथ एक of the largest प्राचीन सेना कभी समवेत .
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by Sparta and Athens ) at the Battle of  thermopylae अनुमत the फारसियों to  torch Athens and overrun most of Greece .
However , while seeking to destroy the combined Greek fleet , the Persians  suffered a कठोर  defeat at the Battle of Salamis .
The following year , the confederated Greeks went on the offensive , defeating the Persian army at the  बैटल of  Plataea , and ending the invasion of Greece .
The allied Greeks followed up their success by destroying the rest of the Persian fleet at the Battle of Mycale , before  expelling पारसी garrisons  from Sestos ( 479 BC ) and Byzantium ( 478 BC ) .
The actions of the general Pausanias  at the siege of  Byzantium alienated many of the Greek states from the Spartans , and the anti-Persian alliance was therefore reconstituted around Athenian leadership , as the so-called Delian League .
The Delian League continued to campaign against Persia for the next three decades , beginning with the expulsion of the remaining  पारसी garrisons  from Europe .
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466  bc , the लीग जीती  a double victory that finally secured freedom for the cities of Ionia .
However , the League 's involvement in an Egyptian revolt ( from 460–454 BC ) resulted  in  a disastrous defeat , and further campaigning was suspended .
A fleet was sent to Cyprus in 451 BC , but achieved little , and when it withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a  शांत  end .
Some historical sources suggest the end of hostilities was marked by a peace treaty between  एथेंस और फारस , the so-called  Peace of Callias .
Hooverville near  पोर्टलैंड ,  Oregon
A `` Hooverville '' is the popular name for  shanty  towns built by homeless people during the Great Depression .
वे यहूद नामित बाद  Herbert Hoover , who was President of the United States during the onset of the Depression and widely blamed for it .
The term was coined  by चार्ल्स माइकेल्सन  , publicity chief of the Democratic National Committee .
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck ( born September 25 , 1975 ) is an  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  quarterback for the Indianapolis Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was drafted in the sixth round of the 1998 NFL  ड्राफ्ट by the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स  .
After a season  on the अभ्यास स्क्वाड और  two seasons backing up Brett Favre , he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001 .
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003 , and led Seattle to six  playoff दिखावे और a सुपर  Bowl appearance ; he was selected to three Pro Bowls and an All-Pro selection .
Following ten seasons with the Seahawks , Hasselbeck  joined  the Tennessee Titans in 2011 .
Hasselbeck then signed a  अनुबंध साथ the  Indianapolis Colts in 2013 less than 24 hours after being released by the Tennessee Titans .
ICT is inevitably related   to the computer network .
Information and Communications Technology or ( ICT ) , is often used as an extended synonym for information technology ( IT ) , but is a more specific term that stresses the role of unified communications and the integration of telecommunications ( telephone lines and wireless signals ) , computers as well as necessary enterprise software , middleware , storage , and audio-visual systems , which enable users to access , store , transmit ,  और हेरफेर सूचना  .
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the  1980s , लकिन it became लोकप्रिय बाद  it was used in a report to the UK government by Dennis Stevenson in 1997 and in the revised National Curriculum for England , Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000 .
The term ICT is now also used to refer to the convergence  of audio-visual और टेलीफोन  networks with computer networks through a single cabling or link system .
There  हैं विशाल आर्थिक प्रोत्साहन  ( huge cost savings due to elimination of the telephone network ) to merge the audio-visual , building management and telephone network with the computer network system using a single unified system of cabling , signal distribution and management .
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as a shorter form of information and  संचार ( s ) प्रौद्योगिकी  .
In fact Infocommunications is the expansion of  दूरसंचार  with information processing and content handling functions on a common digital technology base .
For a  तुलना  of these and other terms , see .
For ICT  विकास अनुक्रमणिका  around the world , see .
This is a list of characters from  जार्ज लोपेज़  .
A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the atom ; in Thomson 's mathematical model the `` corpuscles '' ( or  आधुनिक electrons ) यहूद arranged  non-randomly , in rotating rings
The current model of the sub-atomic  ढांचा involves a घना केंद्रक घिरी  by a probabilistic `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J. Thomson , who discovered the electron in 1897 , was proposed in 1904 before the discovery of the atomic nucleus in order to add the electron  to  the atomic model .
in इस मॉडल , the अणु is रचित  of electrons ( which Thomson still called `` corpuscles '' , though G. J. Stoney had proposed that atoms of electricity be called electrons in 1894 ) surrounded by a soup of positive charge to balance the electrons ' negative charges , like negatively charged `` plums `` surrounded by positively charged `` pudding `` .
The electrons ( as we know them today ) were  विचार to be positioned throughout the अणु , लकिन  with many structures possible for positioning multiple electrons , particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ) .
Instead of a soup , the atom was also  sometimes कहा to have  had a `` cloud '' of positive charge .
With this model , Thomson abandoned his earlier `` nebular atom '' hypothesis in which the atom was  रचित of immaterial vortices  .
Now , at least part of the atom was to be composed of Thomson 's particulate negative corpuscles , although  the बाकी of the positively चार्ज  part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined .
The  1904 thomson  model was disproved by the 1909 gold foil experiment of Hans Geiger and Ernest Marsden .
This was  interpreted  by Ernest Rutherford in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the  अणु containing a बहुत ऊँची धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the  case of gold , enough to balance about 100 electrons ) , thus leading to the Rutherford model of the atom .
Although gold has an atomic number of 79 , immediately after Rutherford 's paper appeared in 1911 Antonius Van den Broek made the  सहज सुझाव कि परमाणु  number is nuclear charge .
The matter  जरूरी प्रयोग  to decide .
Henry Moseley 's work showed experimentally in 1913 ( see Moseley 's law ) that the effective nuclear charge was very close to the atomic number ( Moseley found only one unit difference )  , और moseley संदर्भित तभी the papers of  Van den Broek and Rutherford .
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the same year , in which a nucleus containing an  परमाणु क्रमांक of धनात्मक चार्ज is घिरी  by an equal number of electrons in orbital shells .
Bohr had also  प्रेरित  Moseley 's work .
thomson 's मॉडल  was compared ( though not by Thomson ) to a British dessert called plum pudding , hence the name .
Thomson 's paper was  प्रकाशित  in the March 1904 edition of the Philosophical Magazine , the leading British science journal of the day .
In Thomson 's view : ... the atoms of the elements  consist of a क्रमांक of negatively electrified  corpuscles enclosed in a sphere of uniform positive electrification , ...
In this model , the electrons were free to rotate within the blob or cloud of  धनात्मक  substance .
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the fact that when an electron moved farther from the center of the positive cloud , it felt a  larger जाल धनात्मक inward फ़ोर्स , क्युकी वहीँ थी अधिक सामग्री of विपरीत चार्ज , अंदर  its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ) .
In  thomson 's मॉडल , electrons  were free to rotate in rings which were further stabilized by interactions between the electrons , and spectra were to be accounted for by energy differences of different ring orbits .
Thomson attempted to make his model account for some of the major spectral  लाइनों ज्ञात लिये कुछ तत्व , लकिन थी  not notably successful at this .
Still , Thomson 's model ( along with a similar Saturnian ring model for atomic electrons , also put forward in 1904 by Nagaoka after James Clerk Maxwell 's model of Saturn 's rings  ) , यहूद पहले harbingers of the बाद और अधिक कामयाब  solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom .
Typical  स्ट्रिप of  bacon .
बेकन is a cured मांस prepared इससे a सुअर .
It is first cured using large quantities of salt  , either  in a brine or in a dry packing ; the result is fresh bacon ( also known as green bacon ) .
Fresh bacon may  तब be further सूखी  for weeks or months in cold air , or it may be boiled or smoked .
Fresh and dried bacon  is  typically cooked before eating .
Boiled  बेकन is तैयार to खा  , as is some smoked bacon , but may be cooked further before eating .
Bacon is prepared   from several different cuts of meat .
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork , except in the United States , where it is almost always prepared from pork belly ( typically referred to as `` streaky '' , ``  वसीय '' ,  or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ) .
The side cut has more  मांस और कम  fat than the belly .
Bacon may be prepared from either of two distinct back cuts : fatback , which is   almost pure fat , and pork loin , which is very lean .
bacon-cured  pork loin is known as back bacon .
Uncooked pork belly bacon  स्ट्रिप्स .
Bacon may be eaten smoked , boiled , fried , baked , or grilled , or used as a minor ingredient  to स्वाद  dishes .
Bacon is  भी  used for barding and larding roasts , especially game , e.g . venison , pheasant .
The word is derived from the Old High German bacho , meaning `` buttock '' , `` ham '' or `` side of bacon '' , and cognate with  the बूढ़ा फ्रेंच बेकन .
In continental Europe , this part of the  सुअर is प्रायः नहीं स्मोक्ड  like bacon is in the United States ; it is used primarily in cubes ( lardons ) as a cooking ingredient , valued both as a source of fat and for its flavor .
In Italy , this is called pancetta and is usually cooked in small cubes or served uncooked  और thinly sliced as भाग  of an antipasto .
Meat from other animals , such as beef , lamb , chicken , goat , or turkey , may also be cut , cured , or otherwise prepared to  resemble बेकन ,  and may even be referred to as `` bacon '' .
Such use is  आम in  areas with significant Jewish and Muslim populations .
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass '' ; other cuts and characteristics must be  separately योग्य ( e.g. , `` स्मोक्ड पोर्क  loin bacon '' ) .
लिये सुरक्षा , बेकन जरूर be treated to prevent trichinosis , caused by trichinella , a parasitic roundworm जिससे can be नष्ट by हीटिंग , जमने , drying ,  or smoking .
बेकन is विशिष्ट  from salt pork and ham by differences in the brine ( or dry packing ) .
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients , most notably sodium nitrite , and occasionally sodium nitrate or potassium nitrate ( saltpeter ) ; sodium ascorbate or  erythorbate  are added to accelerate curing and stabilize color .
Flavorings such as brown sugar or maple are used  लिये कुछ उत्पाद  .
If used , sodium polyphosphates are added to  improve sliceability  and reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried .
Today , a brine for ham , but not  बेकन , शामिल  a large amount of sugar .
Historically , `` ham '' and `` bacon '' referred to different cuts of meat that were brined or packed  identically , प्रायः साथ in the वही बैरल  .
The Employee  रिटायरमेंट आय सुरक्षा अधिनियम of 1974 ( erisa ) ( , संहिताबद्ध in भाग at ) is a संघीय  law which establishes minimum standards for pension plans in private industry and provides for extensive rules on the federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans .
ERISA was enacted to protect the interests of   employee benefit plan participants and their beneficiaries by:
Requiring the disclosure of financial and other  सूचना  concerning the plan to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of conduct for  योजना fiduciaries  ;
Providing for appropriate  remedies और अभिगम  to the federal courts .
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full body of laws regulating employee benefit plans , which are  मिला मुख्यतः in the आतंरिक आय  Code and ERISA itself .
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided among the Department of  मजदूर , the विभाग  of the Treasury ( particularly the Internal Revenue Service ) , and the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation .
Illegal immigration to the United States is the act of foreign nationals entering the United  राज्य , बगैर सरकारी  permission and in violation of United States nationality law , or staying beyond the termination date of a visa , also in violation of the law .
A warning sign at the international boundary between the United States and Canada in Point  रॉबर्ट्स , वॉशिंगटन  .
A much different approach at the U.S.-Mexico border  निकट el पासो , टेक्सास
The undocumented immigrant population of the United States in 2008 was estimated by the Center  लिये आव्रजन अध्ययन to be परिचय 11 लाख  people , down from 12.5 million people in 2007 .
Other estimates  दायरा  from 7 to 20 million .
according to a 2005 pew हिस्पैनिक बीच रपट , 56 % of undocumented आप्रवासियों यहूद इससे मैक्सिको ; 22 % यहूद इससे अन्य लैटिन अमरीकी देशों ; 13 % यहूद इससे एशिया ; 6 % यहूद इससे यूरोपीय और कनाडा ; और 3 % यहूद इससे अफ़्रीकी और the बाकी of the संसार .
Alvin Independent School District is a  स्कूल ज़िला  based in Alvin , Texas ( USA ) .
Alvin ISD is a large  suburban स्कूल  district south of Houston in the communities of Alvin , Manvel , Pearland , Hillcrest , Rosharon , Iowa Colony , Liverpool , and Amsterdam .
AISD serves Pearland city 's rapidly growing western portion of the city including the new large  master-planned समुदायों of छाया क्रीक  Ranch , South Fork , and Southern Trails .
Alvin ISD  कवर of जमीन  .
In human anatomy , the  ulnar तंत्रिका  is a nerve which runs near the ulna bone .
The ulnar  collateral स्नायु  of elbow joint is in relation with the ulnar nerve .
The nerve is the  largest  unprotected nerve in the human body ( meaning unprotected by muscle or bone ) , so injury is common .
इस तंत्रिका is सीधे कनेक्ट to the छोटी उंगली , और  the adjacent half of the ring finger , supplying the palmar side of these fingers , including both front and back of the tips , perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds .
One method of injuring the  तंत्रिका is to  strike the medial epicondyle of the humerus from posteriorly , or inferiorly with the elbow flexed .
The ulnar nerve is trapped between the bone and the overlying  स्किन  at this point .
This is commonly referred to  as bumping  one 's `` funny bone '' .
This name is thought to be a pun , based on the sound  प्रतिरूप between the नाम of  the bone of the upper arm , the `` humerus `` and the word `` humorous `` .
Alternatively ,  according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड  English Dictionary it may refer to `` the peculiar sensation experienced when it is struck '' .
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry , shortened Hogwarts , is a  fictional अंग्रेजों स्कूल of  magic for students aged eleven to eighteen , and is the primary setting for the first six books in J.K. Rowling 's Harry Potter series .
Rowling has suggested that she may have inadvertently taken the name from the hogwort plant ( Croton capitatus ) , which she had seen at Kew Gardens some time before  लिखने the श्रेणी , हालांकि the names `` the हॉग्वार्ट्स '' और `` hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 निगेल molesworth  book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans .
Hogwarts school was voted as the 36th best  स्कॉटिश शैक्षणिक स्थापना in a 2008  online ranking , outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School .
According to a  निदेशक of the स्वतंत्र  Schools Network Rankings , it was added to the schools listing `` for fun '' and was then voted on .
The U.S.  subprime बंधक संकट  was a set of events and conditions that led to a financial crisis and subsequent recession that began in 2008 .
It was characterized by a rise in subprime mortgage delinquencies and foreclosures , and the resulting decline  of प्रतिभूति समर्थित  by said mortgages .
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September 2008 , with significant disruption  in the प्रवाह of क्रेडिट  to businesses and consumers and the onset of a severe global recession .
There were many causes of the crisis , with commentators assigning different levels of blame to  वित्तीय संस्थानों  , regulators , credit agencies , government housing policies , and consumers , among others .
A proximate cause was  the वृद्धि  in subprime lending .
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated  दौरान  a given year rose from the historical 8 % or lower range to approximately 20 % from 2004 to 2006 , with much higher ratios in some parts of the U.S .
A high percentage of these subprime mortgages , over 90 % in 2006 for example ,  यहूद adjustable-rate  mortgages .
These two changes were part of a broader trend of  lowered lending  standards and higher-risk mortgage products .
Further , U.S. households had become increasingly  indebted , with  the ratio of debt to disposable personal income rising from 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the end of 2007 , much of this increase mortgage-related .
When U.S. home prices   declined steeply after peaking in mid-2006 , borrowers ' ability to refinance their loans became more difficult .
As  adjustable-rate  mortgages began to reset at higher interest rates ( causing higher monthly payments ) , mortgage delinquencies soared .
Securities backed  with  mortgages , including subprime mortgages , widely held by financial firms globally , lost most of their value .
Global investors also drastically reduced purchases of mortgage-backed debt  and  other securities as part of a decline in the capacity and willingness of the private financial system to support lending .
Concerns about the soundness of U.S. credit and financial markets led to  tightening क्रेडिट around the संसार  and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe .
The crisis had severe , long-lasting consequences for the  u.S. और यूरोपीय  economies .
The U.S. entered a deep recession , with nearly 9 million jobs lost during 2008 and 2009 , roughly  6 % of the  workforce .
U.S. housing prices fell nearly 30 % on average and the U.S. stock market fell  लगभग  50 % by early 2009 .
As of early 2013 , the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but housing prices remained near  उनके कम पाइंट और बेरोजगारी  remained elevated .
आर्थिक विकास  remained below pre-crisis levels .
Europe also  जारी  to struggle with its own economic crisis .
कार्ल जंग in 1910 .
Myers  और briggs  extrapolated their MBTI theory from Jung 's writings in his book Psychological Types .
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI ) assessment is a psychometric questionnaire  designed to माप  psychological preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions .
These preferences were extrapolated from the typological theories proposed by Carl Gustav Jung and first published in his  1921 किताब मनोवैज्ञानिक  Types ( English edition , 1923 ) .
Jung theorized that there are four principal psychological functions by which we  अनुभव the  world : sensation , intuition , feeling , and thinking .
One of  ये  four functions is dominant most of the time .
The original developers of the personality inventory were Katharine Cook Briggs and her daughter , Isabel Briggs Myers ; these two , having studied extensively the work of Jung , turned their  interest of human behavior  into a devotion of turning the theory of psychological types to practical use .
They began creating the indicator during World War II , believing that a knowledge of personality preferences would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of  war-time कार्य कि होता be ``  most comfortable and effective '' .
The initial questionnaire grew into the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator , which was  पहला प्रकाशित in 1962  .
The MBTI focuses on normal  populations और emphasizes  the value of naturally occurring differences .
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI is that we  सब have विशिष्ट वरीयताओं in the रास्ता we construe हमारी अनुभवों  , and these preferences underlie our interests , needs , values , and motivation '' ( p. 499 ) .
`` Judas '' is a song by American recording artist Lady Gaga , from her  दूसरी  studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was released  by interscope  Records on April 15 , 2011 , four days ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne , `` Judas '' is a dance and electro house song about a woman in love with a  man  who betrayed her .
It embodies  the incidents  that have haunted Gaga in the past , and its core meaning refers to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further explained that the song was also about honoring one 's inner darkness in order  to लाओ oneself into the लाइट  .
The artwork for  the सिंगल थी  designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the song was generally well  प्राप्त by आलोचकों ,  who likened the song to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single .
The song has a similar sound to Gaga 's previous RedOne-produced tracks , including `` Poker Face `` , `` LoveGame `` , ``  ख़राब रोमांस ''  , and `` Alejandro `` .
It contains three distinct hooks and a  हाउस -influenced  break down .
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the  विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे  redemption , regarding the traditional views of what a woman should be .
`` Judas  ''  initially had a strong sales opening , but was less successful commercially in comparison to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the charts in most major music markets , and also reached the top of the  चार्ट  in South Korea .
A music video for the song was filmed in  अप्रैल 2011  , co-directed by Gaga and Laurieann Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus .
It has a  biblical कथानक जहाँ  Reedus played Judas Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene .
The video  portrays उन्हें as  modern day missionaries going to Jerusalem .
It included the Biblical story of Judas betraying Jesus , and ended with Gaga  as magdalene getting  stoned to death .
Before its release , the  कैथोलिक लीग  condemned Gaga for the alleged use of religious imagery and her role in the video .
However , critics generally praised the video , not  ढूंढना कोई अप्रिय  content .
The video was nominated for two awards at the  2011 एमटीवी  Video Music Awards .
Gaga has  performed `` यहूदा '' on a क्रमांक of टेलीविज़न shows , सहित the ग्राहम नॉर्टन दिखाएँ , शनिवार रात्रि सजीव , शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '' , the फ्रेंच x फ़ैक्टर as खूब as on the एलेन degeneres दिखाएँ .
Marvin Gaye ( April 2 , 1939April 1  , 1984 ) , born  Marvin Pentz Gay , Jr. , was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary  कुएं और tammi terrell , बाद कमाई the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस  of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and became  among the पहला कलाकारों  in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company .
Gaye 's later recordings influenced several R & B subgenres such as quiet  तूफ़ान और neo-soul  .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the early 1980s , Gaye released the 1982 Grammy  award-winning hit `` यौन healing  `` and the Midnight Love album .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions , including the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award and the Rock  and  Roll Hall of Fame .
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the Academy of  गति चित्र कला और sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in  the motion picture industry and is the only category in which every member is eligible to nominate for .
Best Picture is considered the  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण  of the Academy Awards , as it represents all the directing , acting , music composing , writing , editing and other efforts put forth into a film .
नतीजतन , बेहतरीन  Picture is the final award and the conclusion of the annual Academy Awards ceremony .
The Grand Staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles , where the Academy Awards ceremonies have been held since 2002 ,  शोकेस प्रत्येक फिल्मी कि रै जीती the  Best Picture title since the award 's inception 85 years ago .
Heavy Rain is an interactive drama action-adventure video game created by French developer Quantic Dream exclusively for the  प्लेस्टेशन  3 .
The game is written and directed by Quantic  सपना 's  founder and CEO David Cage .
Heavy Rains story is a dramatic thriller modelled after film noir , featuring four protagonists involved with the mystery of the Origami Killer , a serial  कातिल जो उपयोग विस्तारित अवधि of वर्षा to  drown his victims .
Ethan Mars is trying to save his son from being the next victim , while investigative journalist   Madison Paige , FBI profiler Norman Jayden , and private detective Scott Shelby are each trying to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity .
The player interacts with the game by performing  क्रियाएँ highlighted on स्क्रीन सम्बन्धित  to motions on the controller , and in some cases , performing a series of quick time events during fast-paced action sequences .
The  खिलाड़ी 's  decisions and actions during the game will affect the narrative .
The main characters  can be मारे  , and certain actions may lead to different scenes and endings .
A playable demo was  released on 11 फ़रवरी  2010 .
The demo was released prior to this date for people who took part in a Four Day  चुनौती  on 5 February 2010 .
A patch to allow use of the PlayStation Move  नियंत्रक to खेल the  game was released in September 2010 .
Heavy Rain was critically acclaimed and has sold over  दो लाख नक़ल  .
It won 2010 's Game of the Year from CNN and Gaming Union ,  और बेहतरीन ps3 खेल of 2010  by GameSpy and IGN .
A modified version of the game was released titled  भारी बरसात संस्करण  Modifiée exclusively in France , aimed towards a younger audience .
In 2010 , the  खेल थी  included in the book 1001 Video Games You Must Play Before You Die .
Total superannuation industry liabilities :  सदस्यों निधि और reserves  ( A $ millions ) since 1988 .
Annual  कुल  superannuation industry asset growth 1996-2005 .
Superannuation in Australia refers to the arrangements  जिससे लोगों मेक  in Australia to have funds available for them in retirement .
In Australia , superannuation arrangements  are  government-supported and encouraged , and minimum provisions are compulsory for employees .
For example , employers are required to pay a proportion of an employee 's salaries and wages ( currently 9 % ) into a superannuation fund , but people are encouraged to put aside  अतिरिक्त निधि into superannuation  .
The  न्यूनतम  obligation required by employers is set to increase to 12 % gradually stepping annually from 2013 to 2020 .
An individual can withdraw funds out of a superannuation fund when the person meets one of the  शर्तें  of release contained in Schedule 1 of the Superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994 .

Electoral College map showing  the परिणाम  of the 2012 U.S. presidential election .
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the popular vote in 26 states and the  ज़िला of कोलंबिया  ( denoted in blue ) to capture 332 electoral votes .
Former Governor Mitt Romney  ( r - ma ) जीती the लोकप्रिय  vote in 24 states ( denoted in red ) to capture 206 electoral votes .
Cartogram representation of the Electoral College vote for the 2012   election , with each square representing one electoral vote .
The United States Electoral College is the institution that  officially  elects the President and Vice President of the United States every four years .
The President and Vice President are  नहीं निर्वाचित सीधे  by the voters .
Instead , they are elected by `` electors '' who are chosen by  लोकप्रिय  vote on a state-by-state basis .
Electors are apportioned to each state and the District of Columbia ,  लकिन नहीं to territorial  possessions of the United States , such as Puerto Rico and Guam .
The number  of  electors in each state is equal to the number of members of Congress to which the state is entitled .
The Twenty-third Amendment   has always resulted in the District of Columbia having three electors .
There are 538 electors , based on there being 435 representatives and  100 सीनेटरों , प्लस  the three electors from the District of Columbia .
Electors are pledged to  particular अध्यक्षीय और  vice presidential candidates , though unpledged electors are possible .
In all states , except Maine and Nebraska , electors are elected on a ``  winner-take-all '' आधार  .
कि is , सब निर्वाचक  pledged to the presidential candidate who wins the most votes in a state become electors for that state .
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method  '' , selecting एक elector भीतर  each congressional district by popular vote and selecting the remaining two electors by a statewide popular vote .
Although no elector is required by  संघीय विधि to सम्मान a प्रतिज्ञा ,  there have only been very few occasions when an elector voted contrary to a pledge .
The  बारहवीं amendment specifies कैसा a अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष  are elected and requires each elector to cast one vote for President and another vote for Vice President .
Critics argue that the Electoral College is inherently  undemocratic  and gives swing states disproportionate influence in electing the President and Vice President .
The Electoral College gives a numeric advantage in the election of the president to the smaller states , as the minimum number  of निर्वाचक  for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives .
On the other hand , the winner-take-all method   of voting favors the larger states .
A number of constitutional amendments  have महरूम प्रस्तावित  seeking to alter the Electoral College or replace it with a direct popular vote .
Barack Hussein  ओबामा ii ( ; born अगस्त 4 , 1961 ) is the  44th and current President of the United States , the first African American to hold the office .
Born in Honolulu , Hawaii , Obama is a graduate of Columbia University and Harvard Law School  , जहाँ he थी अध्यक्ष of the  Harvard Law Review .
He was a  जातियाँ आयोजक  in Chicago before earning his law degree .
He worked as a civil rights attorney in Chicago and taught constitutional law at the University of Chicago Law School from 1992   to 2004 .
he परोसा तीन शर्तें representing  the 13th District in the Illinois Senate from 1997 to 2004 , running unsuccessfully for the United States House of Representatives in 2000 .
In 2004 , Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the United States Senate with his victory in  the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक  , his keynote address at the Democratic National Convention in July , and his election to the Senate in November .
He began his presidential campaign in 2007 , and in 2008 , after a close primary campaign against  हिलेरी rodham क्लिंटन , he जीती sufficient  delegates in the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential nomination .
He  तब पराजित  Republican nominee John McCain in the general election , and was inaugurated as president on January 20 , 2009 .
Nine months later ,  ओबामा  was named the 2009 Nobel Peace Prize laureate .
He was re-elected president in November 2012 , defeating Republican nominee Mitt Romney , and  थी sworn in लिये  a second term on January 20 , 2013 .
Early in his first term in office , Obama signed into law economic stimulus legislation in response  to the ग्रेट मंदी in the रूप  of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 and the Tax Relief , Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization , and Job Creation Act of 2010 .
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act , often referred to as `` Obamacare '' ; the Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act ; the Do n't Ask , Do n't Tell Repeal Act of  2010 ; the बजट कंट्रोल अधिनियम of 2011 ; और the अमरीकी करदाताओं राहत अधिनियम of  2012 .
In May 2012 , he became the first sitting U.S. president to publicly  support same-sex विवाह और in 2013 उसके प्रशासन दायर  briefs which urged the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex couples in two high-profile cases .
In foreign policy , Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War , increased troop levels in Afghanistan , signed the New START  बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि  with Russia , ordered U.S. military involvement in Libya , and ordered the military operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden .
The Honda CBR1100XX Super  blackbird  was a Honda motorcycle made from 1996 to 2007 .
The bike was developed to challenge the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-11 as the world 's fastest production motorcycle , and Honda succeeded with a top  गति of  .
Two years later  the शीर्षक passed to  the Suzuki Hayabusa , which reached .
The Blackbird is named after the Lockheed SR-71 , also a speed  रिकार्ड  holder .
Sample view of an electronic  स्वास्थ्य  record based on images
नमूना  view of an electronic health record
An electronic  स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड (  EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations .
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically capable  of होने साझा आरपार अलग  health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and  अन्य सूचना  networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a range of data , including demographics , medical history , medication and allergies , immunization status , laboratory  test  results , radiology images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .

The Rime of the  प्राचीन मेरिनर ( originally the rime of the  Ancyent Marinere ) is the longest major poem by the English poet Samuel Taylor Coleridge , written in 1797–98 and published in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads .
Modern editions use a  बाद  revised version printed in 1817 that featured a gloss .
Along with other poems in Lyrical Ballads , it was a signal shift to  आधुनिक काव्य  and the beginning of British Romantic literature .
A proxy auto-config ( PAC ) file defines how web browsers and other user agents can automatically choose the appropriate proxy server  ( अभिगम विधि ) लिये fetching  a given URL .
A PAC file contains a JavaScript function  “findproxyforurl  ( url , host ) ” .
This  फलन  returns a string with one or more access method specifications .
These specifications cause the user agent to use a particular proxy server  or  to connect directly .
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back when a  प्रॉक्सी fails  to respond .
The browser fetches this PAC  संचिका पहले  requesting other URLs .
The URL of the PAC file is either configured manually or determined automatically by the  वेब प्रॉक्सी autodiscovery  Protocol .
Zendaya Coleman ( born September 1 , 1996 ) , known mononymously as Zendaya , is an American actress ,  सिंगर और  dancer .
she stars on the Disney Channel  sitcom  Shake It Up as Rocky Blue .
She has  स्ट्रक्चर in  two films and played one of the lead roles in the film Frenemies as Halley Brandon .
She voiced Fern in the Pixie  खोखला खेल  .

She appeared on PrankStars as herself in the episode  `` चलना the  Prank '' and on A.N.T . Farm as Sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative ConsultANT . ''
zendaya  is also a musician .
She signed a deal with Hollywood  रिकॉर्ड on अगस्त 8 , 2012  and started recording songs for her debut album on August 12 , 2012 .
She released a single from an independent label  पुकारा `` swag it आउट `` और  another single with Bella Thorne called `` Watch Me , '' which is featured on the Break It Down album .
On March 20 , 2012 , Zendaya and Bella Thorne released an album together called Shake It Up : Live 2 Dance , each have their own song on it , along with a mash-up  of both songs  together as one .

It  contains  all public-use and military airports in the state .

iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc . Originally released in 2007 for the iPhone and iPod Touch platforms , it has been  विस्तारित to support अन्य ठहराना डिवाइस ऐसे as the ipad और ठहराना  TV .
Unlike Microsoft 's Windows Phone and Google 's Android , Apple does  नहीं अनुज्ञा  iOS for installation on non-Apple hardware .
, Apple 's App Store contained more than 700,000 iOS applications , which have  collectively महरूम डाउनलोड अधिक  than 30 billion times .
It had a 21 % share of the  स्मार्टफोन मोबाईल ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली इकाई  shipped in the fourth quarter of 2012 , behind only Google 's Android .
In June 2012 , it accounted for 65 % of mobile web data consumption ( including use  on दोनो the ipod टच  and the iPad ) .
At the half of 2012  , वहीँ यहूद  410 million devices activated .
According to the special media event held by Apple on September 12 , 2012 , 400 million  डिवाइस  have been sold through June 2012 .
The  उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस of  iOS is based on the concept of direct manipulation , using multi-touch gestures .
Interface control  तत्व  consist of sliders , switches , and buttons .
Interaction with the OS includes gestures such as swipe , tap , pinch , and reverse pinch , all of which have specific definitions within the context of the iOS  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली  and its multi-touch interface .
Internal  accelerometers हैं प्रयुक्त by कुछ अनुप्रयोग to  respond to shaking the device ( one common result is the undo command ) or rotating it in three dimensions ( one common result is switching from portrait to landscape mode ) .
iOS is derived from OS X , with  जिससे  it shares the Darwin foundation .
iOS  is  Apple 's mobile version of the OS X operating system used on Apple computers .
In iOS , there are four abstraction layers : the Core OS layer , the Core Services layer , the Media layer , and  the cocoa टच परत  .
The current version of the operating system  (  iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the device 's flash memory for the system partition , using roughly 800 MB of that partition ( varying by model ) for iOS itself .
iOS currently runs on  iphone , ipad  , iPod touch and Apple TV .
