A modeling contract with Elite  मॉडल प्रबन्धन  .
A fashion spread and  कवर in  Seventeen .
A 100,000  अनुबंध  with CoverGirl cosmetics .
The first half of the cycle took place  in नई यॉर्क नगर , चलती the दिखाएँ  back from Los Angeles last season .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय  destination for this cycle is São Paulo , Brazil , the series first visit to South America .
The number of girls was reduced to 13 , the first time since Cycle  9 , बाद  being maintained at 14 in the last two cycles .
This was the last time Paulina Porizkova  participated as न्यायधीश .
The winner was 20-year-old Teyona Anderson from Woodstown , New  जर्सी  .
This season averaged 4.35 million viewers  प्रति एपीसोड  .
Exxon Mobil Corporation , or ExxonMobil , is an American multinational oil and gas  निगम headquartered  in Irving , Texas , United States .
It is a direct descendant of John D. Rockefeller 's Standard Oil  कम्पनी , और थी  formed on November 30 , 1999 , by the merger of Exxon and Mobil .
It  is संबद्ध  with Imperial Oil which operates in Canada .
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013 , became the largest publicly traded company by market  capitalization in the संसार  .
the कम्पनी is क्रमित # 5 globally in फोर्ब्स वैश्विक 2000 सूची in 2013 .
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72 billion oil-equivalent barrels at the end of 2007 and , at  तब ( 2007 ) दरों of उत्पादन ,  are expected to last over 14 years .
With 37 oil  refineries in 21 देशों constituting a संयुक्त  daily refining capacity of , Exxon Mobil is the largest refiner in the world , a title that was also associated with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870 .
ExxonMobil is the largest of the world 's  supermajors साथ रोज़  production of 3.921 million BOE ( barrels of oil equivalent ) .
In 2008 , this was approximately 3 % of world production  , जिससे is कम than अनेक  of the largest state-owned petroleum companies .
When ranked by  आयल और गैस reserves  it is 14th in the world with less than 1 % of the total .
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into one  of the planet’s सबसे hated corporations ,  able to determine American foreign policy and the fate of entire nations '' .
In terms of its environmental record  , exxonmobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to  them by dictatorships , such as those in Chad and Equatorial Guinea .
Lee  रेमंड , the corporation’s मुख्य कार्यपालिका  until 2005 , was `` notoriously sceptical about climate change and disliked government interference at any level '' .
The company was widely criticized for its slow response to  सफ़ाई इसके 1989 valdez आयल spill in  Alaska .
This article is about  the ग्लोब  Theatre of Shakespeare .
For the modern reconstruction in London , see  शेक्सपियर  's Globe .
For  अन्य उपयोग , देखिए ग्लोब  Theatre ( disambiguation ) .
The Globe  थिएटर  was a theatre in London associated with William Shakespeare .
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare 's playing company , the Lord Chamberlain 's Men , on  land  owned by Thomas Brend and inherited by his son , Nicholas Brend and grandson Sir Matthew Brend , and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613 .
A second Globe Theatre was built on the same site by June 1614  और बंद  in 1642 .
A modern reconstruction of the Globe , named `` Shakespeare 's Globe `` , opened in  1997 लगभग  from the site of the original theatre .
It 's a Wonderful  जीवन is a 1946 अमरीकी क्रिसमस नाटक फिल्मी उत्पादित  and directed by Frank Capra , based on the short story `` The Greatest Gift `` , which Philip Van Doren Stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945 .
The film is considered one of  the सबसे loved films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और रै become परंपरागत  viewing during the Christmas season , alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol .
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey , a man who has given up  उसके सपनो in अनुक्रम to सहायता अन्य और  whose imminent suicide on Christmas Eve brings about the intervention of his guardian angel , Clarence Odbody ( Henry Travers ) .
Clarence shows George all the lives he has touched and how different life in his community of  bedford  Falls would be had he never been born .
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff  प्रतियोगिता  at the time of its release , the film has come to be regarded as a classic and is a staple of Christmas television around the world .
Theatrically , the film 's break-even point was actually $ 6.3 million , approximately twice the  उत्पादन लागत , a फिगर  it never came close to achieving in its initial release .
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the complete box office failure that today everyone believes ... it was  initially a प्रमुख निराशा और पुष्टि , at तनिक to the studios , कि capra  was no longer capable of turning out the populist features that made his films the must-see , money-making events they once were . ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the American  Film Institute as one of the 100  best American films ever made , placing number 11 on its initial 1998 greatest movie list , and would also place number one on its list of the most inspirational American films of all time .
Data  गोदाम अवलोकन
In  कम्प्यूटिंग , a आंकड़ा गोदाम  or enterprise data warehouse ( DW , DWH , or EDW ) is a database used for reporting and data analysis .
It is a central repository of data which is  निर्मित by  integrating data from one or more disparate sources .
आंकड़ा warehouses स्टोर वर्तमान as खूब as ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना चर्चित रिपोर्ट्स लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन रिपोर्टिंग ऐसे as सालाना और त्रैमासिक comparisons  .
The data stored in the warehouse are uploaded from the operational systems ( such as marketing , sales  etc.  , shown in the figure to the right ) .
The data may pass through an operational data store for additional operations before they are used in  the dw लिये रिपोर्टिंग  .
The typical ETL  -आधारd आंकड़ा गोदाम  uses staging , data integration , and access layers to house its key functions .
The staging layer or staging database stores raw data extracted from each of the disparate source data systems   .
The integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming the data from the staging layer often storing this transformed data in an  operational आंकड़ा स्टोर ( ods ) डेटाबेस  .
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database , often called the data warehouse database , where the  आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical  groups often called dimensions and into facts and aggregate facts .
The combination of facts and dimensions is sometimes  पुकारा  a star schema .
The  अभिगम परत  helps users retrieve data .
A data warehouse  constructed इससे an एकीकृत आंकड़ा सोर्स  systems does not require ETL , staging databases , or operational data store databases .
The integrated data source systems may be considered   to be a part of a distributed operational data store layer .
Data federation methods or data  आभासीकरण  methods may be used to access the distributed integrated source data systems to consolidate and aggregate data directly into the data warehouse database tables .
Unlike the ETL-based data warehouse , the integrated source data systems and the data warehouse are all integrated since there is no  परिवर्तन  of dimensional or reference data .
This integrated data warehouse architecture supports the drill down from the aggregate data of the data warehouse to the  transactional आंकड़ा of  the integrated source data systems .
Data warehouses can be  subdivided into आंकड़ा  marts .
Data marts  स्टोर subsets  of data from a warehouse .
This definition of  the आंकड़ा  warehouse focuses on data storage .
The main source of the data  is cleaned , रूपांतरित , cataloged  and made available for use by managers and other business professionals for data mining , online analytical processing , market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ) .
However , the means to retrieve and analyze data , to extract , transform and load data , and to manage the data dictionary  हैं भी माना  essential components of a data warehousing system .
Many references  to आंकड़ा warehousing  use this broader context .
Thus , an expanded definition for data warehousing includes business intelligence tools ,  टूल्स to निकालें  , transform and load data into the repository , and tools to manage and retrieve metadata .
Portland stone quarry on the  आइल of  Portland , England
An abandoned construction aggregate quarry near Adelaide ,  दक्षिण ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A quarry is a type of open-pit mine from which rock or minerals are  निकाली  .
Quarries are generally used for extracting building materials , such as dimension stone  , निर्माण कुल , riprap , बालू , और  gravel .
They are often collocated with concrete and asphalt plants due to the  आवश्यकता लिये विशाल amounts of कुल in those सामग्री  .
खोलें खानों कि उपज  minerals are typically referred to as open pit mines .
the शब्द पाषाण can  include underground quarrying for stone , such as Bath stone .
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to  mormonism , the प्रिंसिपल शाखा of the latter  Day Saint movement of Restorationist Christianity , which began with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s .
After Smith 's death in 1844 the Mormons followed Brigham Young  to  what would become the Utah Territory .
Today  mormons हैं  understood to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) .
कुछ mormons  are also either independent or non-practicing .
The center of Mormon cultural influence is in Utah , and North America has more Mormons than any other  महाद्वीप  , though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States .
Mormons have developed a  दमदार भाव of communality  that stems from their doctrine and history .
During the 19th century Mormon converts tended to gather to a central geographic  स्थान , और between  1852 and 1890 a minority of Mormons openly practiced plural marriage , a form of religious polygamy .
Mormons  dedicate विशाल amounts of समय और संसाधन to सेवारत in  their church , and many young Mormons choose to serve a full-time proselytizing mission .
Mormons  have a स्वास्थ्य कोड  that eschews alcoholic beverages , tobacco , coffee , tea , and other addictive substances .
They tend to be very family-oriented , and have strong connections across generations and with  विस्तारित  family , reflective of their belief that families can be sealed together beyond death and throughout eternity .
Mormons also have a strict law of chastity , requiring abstention from sexual relations  बाहर of विवाह और सख्त वफ़ादारी  within marriage .
Mormons self-identify as  ईसाई , हालांकि कुछ  of their beliefs differ from mainstream Christianity .
Mormons believe in the Bible , as well as other books of scripture , such as the Book of  mormon  .
They have a unique view of cosmology , and believe that all  लोगों हैं spirit-children  of God .
Mormons  मानना कि returning to परमेश्वर requires  following the example of Jesus Christ , and accepting his atonement through ordinances such as baptism .
They believe that  मसीह 's गिरिजाघर  was restored through Joseph Smith , and is guided by living prophets and apostles .
Central to Mormon faith is the belief  कि परमेश्वर बोलती to उसके  children and answers their prayers .
In  वित्तीय हिसाब  , assets are economic resources .
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable of being  स्वामित्व  or controlled to produce value and that is held to have positive economic value is considered an asset .
Simply stated , assets represent value of ownership that can be converted into cash (  हालांकि नकदी itself is भी माना  an asset ) .
The balance sheet of a  कड़  records the monetaryJ .
G. Siegel ,  N. dauber  & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005.There are different methods of assessing the monetary value of the assets recorded on the Balance Sheet .
in कुछ मामले , the ऐतिहासिक लागत is प्रयुक्त ; ऐसे  that the value of the asset when it was bought in the past is used as the monetary value .
In other instances , the present fair  मार्केट मान of the  asset is used to determine the value shown on the balance sheet .
value of the assets owned by  the कड़ .
It is  धन और अन्य valuables  belonging to an individual or business .
Two major  एसेट वर्ग हैं ठोस  assets and intangible assets .
Tangible  एसेट contain विभिन्न subclasses  , including current assets and fixed assets.J .
Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 Current assets include inventory , while fixed assets include such items as buildings and equipment .J . Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 ; and J. G. Siegel , N.  dauber & J. K. shim , `` the बनियान जेब cpa '' ,  Wiley , 2005 .
Intangible assets are nonphysical  संसाधन और अधिकारों कि have  a value to the firm because they give the firm some kind of advantage in the market place .
Examples of intangible assets  हैं साख , copyrights , trademarks  , patents and computer programs , and financial assets , including such items as accounts receivable , bonds and stocks .
A neuron ( or ; also known as a neurone or nerve cell ) is an electrically excitable cell that  प्रक्रियाओं और transmits  information through electrical and chemical signals .
A chemical signal occurs via a  अन्तर्ग्रथन  , a specialized connection with other cells .
Neurons connect to each  अन्य to रूप neural  networks .
न्यूरॉन्स हैं the कोर components  of the nervous system , which includes the brain , spinal cord , and peripheral ganglia .
A number of specialized types of neurons exist : sensory neurons respond to touch , sound , light and numerous other  stimuli affecting कोशिकाएं of the संवेदी अंगों  that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain .
मोटर न्यूरॉन्स प्राप्त सिग्नल  from the brain and spinal cord , cause muscle contractions , and affect glands .
Interneurons connect neurons to other neurons within the same region  of the दिमाग or  spinal cord .
A typical neuron possesses a cell  देह ( प्रायः पुकारा  the soma ) , dendrites , and an axon .
dendrites हैं पतला structures कि उठता इससे the कोशिका देह , प्रायः extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres और branching अनेक टाइम्स , giving वृद्धि to a जटिल `` dendritic पेड़ '' .
An axon is a special cellular extension that arises from the cell  देह at a साईट पुकारा the axon  hillock and travels for a distance , as far as 1 meter in humans or even more in other species .
The cell body of a neuron frequently gives  वृद्धि to अनेक dendrites , लकिन never to अधिक than एक  axon , although the axon may branch hundreds of times before it terminates .
At the majority of synapses ,  सिग्नल  are sent from the axon of one neuron to a dendrite of another .
There are , however , many exceptions to these rules : neurons that  कमी  dendrites , neurons that have no axon , synapses that connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite , etc .
All neurons are  electrically excitable , maintaining वोल्टेज अनुपात  across their membranes by means of metabolically driven ion pumps , which combine with ion channels embedded in the membrane to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular concentration differences of ions such as sodium , potassium , chloride , and calcium .
Changes in the cross-membrane voltage can alter  the फलन of voltage-dependent  ion channels .
If the voltage   changes by a large enough amount , an all-or-none electrochemical pulse called an action potential is generated , which travels rapidly along the cell 's axon , and activates synaptic connections with other cells when it arrives .
Neurons do not undergo  कोशिका प्रभाग  .
In most cases , neurons are  उत्पन्न by खास  types of stem cells .
Astrocytes , a type of glial cell , have  भी महरूम observed to फेरे  into neurons by virtue of the stem cell characteristic pluripotency .
In humans , neurogenesis largely  ceases दौरान adulthood—but  in two brain areas , the hippocampus and olfactory bulb , there is strong evidence for generation of substantial numbers of new neurons .
Super Bowl XLIII was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Pittsburgh Steelers and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion  एरिज़ोना कार्डिनल्स to decide the नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season .
The  स्टीलर्स पराजित the  Cardinals by the score of 27–23 .
The game was played on February  1 , 2009 , at रेमंड  James Stadium in Tampa , Florida .
With this win , the Steelers became the first team to win six Super  प्याले  .
Pittsburgh , who finished the regular  ऋतु साथ a 12–4 रिकार्ड , भी जीती उनके  second Super Bowl in four years after winning Super Bowl XL at the end of the 2005 season .
The  कार्डिनल्स डाला the खेल  seeking their first NFL title since 1947 , the longest championship drought in the league .
The club became an unexpected winner during the regular season , compiling a 9–7 record , and the playoffs with the aid of head coach Ken Whisenhunt , who was the Steelers ' offensive coordinator in  सुपर कटोरी xl , और the re-emergence  of quarterback Kurt Warner , who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team , St. Louis Rams .
पिट्सबर्ग कूद to  a 17–7 halftime lead , aided by linebacker James Harrison 's Super Bowl record 100-yard interception return for a touchdown .
Trailing 20–7 at the start of the  चौथी क्वार्टर  , Arizona scored 16 unanswered points , including wide receiver Larry Fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown reception , to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game .
But the Steelers marched 78 yards to score on  चौड़ी receiver santonio  Holmes ' 6-yard game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left .
Holmes , who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown , including four  receptions लिये 73 गज on कि  final game-winning drive , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He became the sixth wide receiver to win the award , and also was the third Pittsburgh receiver to win  the पुरस्कार , following  Lynn Swann and Hines Ward .
Despite the global financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that are normally held before the game , the NBC television network broadcast   attracted an average U.S. audience of 98.7 million viewers , making it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point .
A diagram of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम , प्रर्दशित  various properties across the range of frequencies and wavelengths
The electromagnetic spectrum is the range of all possible  बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning ,  और is बजाय the characteristic वितरण  of electromagnetic radiation emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below the low frequencies used for modern  radio  communication to gamma radiation at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long  wavelengths is the आकार  of the universe itself , while it is thought that the short wavelength limit is in the vicinity of the Planck length , although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the electromagnetic spectrum are used in science for  spectroscopic और अन्य  probing interactions , as ways to study and characterize matter .
In addition , radiation from various parts of the spectrum has found many other uses for communications and manufacturing ( see electromagnetic radiation for more  अनुप्रयोग ) .
लेजेंड
marchantia  , a liverwort
Bryophyte is a  परंपरागत  name used to refer to all embryophytes ( land plants ) that do not have true vascular tissue and are therefore called ' non-vascular plants ' .
Some bryophytes do have specialized tissues for the transport of  जल ; however चूंकि ये do  not contain lignin , they are not considered to be true vascular tissue .
Currently bryophytes are thought not to be a natural or monophyletic group ; however the name is convenient and remains in use as a  सामूहिक पद लिये mosses , hornworts  , and liverworts .
Bryophytes produce enclosed reproductive  structures  ( gametangia and sporangia ) , but they produce neither flowers nor seeds , reproducing via spores .
The term bryophyte comes from Greek βρύον , bryon , ``  tree-moss  , oyster-green '' + φυτόν - phyton `` plant '' .
A bank is a financial institution and a financial  intermediary कि स्वीकृत जमा और  channels those deposits into lending activities , either directly by loaning or indirectly through capital markets .
A bank is the connection  between ग्राहक  that have capital deficits and customers with capital surpluses .
Due to their influence within a financial system  और an अर्थव्यवस्था , बैंको हैं generally  highly regulated in most countries .
सबसे बैंको operate अंतर्गत a प्रणाली ज्ञात  as fractional reserve banking where they hold only a small reserve of the funds deposited and lend out the rest for profit .
They are generally subject to  न्यूनतम पूंजी  requirements which are based on an international set of capital standards , known as the Basel Accords .
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena ,  headquartered in सियेना , इटली , जिससे रै महरूम  operating continuously since 1472 .
It is followed by Berenberg Bank of Hamburg ( 1590 )  और  Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ) .
Banking in its modern sense evolved in  समृद्ध शहरों of  Renaissance Italy , such as Florence , Venice and Genoa .
In the history of banking , a number of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici , Fugger ,  welser , berenberg  , Baring and Rothschild —have played a central role over many centuries .
The Xbox is a  वीडियो खेल  console manufactured by Microsoft .
It was released on November 15 , 2001 in North America , February 22 , 2002 in Japan , and March 14 , 2002  in ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and Europe .
it थी microsoft  's first foray into the gaming console market .
As part of the sixth-generation of gaming , the Xbox competed with Sony 's PlayStation 2 , Sega 's Dreamcast ( which stopped American sales  पहले the एक्सबॉक्स गई on बिक्री  ) , and Nintendo 's GameCube .
The Xbox was the first console offered by an American company  बाद the atari  Jaguar stopped sales in 1996 .
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in November 2002 allowed players to play games online with a broadband  कनेक्शन .
It first competed with Dreamcast 's online service but later  primarily  competed with PlayStation 2 's online service .
Although these two are free while Xbox Live required a subscription , as well as broadband-only connection which was not  completely अपनाया yet , एक्सबॉक्स  Live was a success due to better servers , features such as a buddy list , and milestone titles like Halo 2 released in November 2004 , which is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years .
Xbox 's successor , the Xbox 360 , was  शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर  2005 .
the  Xbox was discontinued in late 2005 in Japan where sales were poor .
It was discontinued in late 2006 in  यूरोपीय  and early 2007 in North America .
The last Xbox game in Europe was Tony Hawk 's Project 8 released in November 2006  ,  and the last game in North America was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008 .
Support for out-of-warranty  एक्सबॉक्स consoles थी discontinued  on March 2 , 2009 , stating that any in-warranty repair now needed will not be undertaken .
Xbox  अभिगम to एक्सबॉक्स सजीव  was stopped on April 15 , 2010 .
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ) , commonly referred to as the Gospel of John or simply John and often referred to in New Testament scholarship as the Fourth Gospel , is an account of the  पब्लिक मंत्रालय  of Jesus .
It begins with the witness and affirmation by John the Baptist and concludes with the death , burial , resurrection , and post-resurrection  दिखावे  of Jesus .
This account  is चौथी  of the canonical gospels , after the synoptics Matthew , Mark and Luke .
states that the book derives from the testimony of the ' disciple whom  यीशु loved  . '
Along with Peter , the unnamed disciple is  विशेषकर बंद to यीशु , और early-church  tradition identified him as John the Apostle , one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles .
The gospel is closely related in  स्टाइल और सामग्री to the तीन surviving  Epistles of John such that commentators treat the four books together , yet , according to most modern scholars , John was not the author of any of these books .
Recent Christian  scripture  scholarship more and more has placed John within a first-century Jewish context .
रेमंड E. भूरा किया pioneering  work to trace the development of the tradition from which the gospel arose .
The  प्रवचन seem to  be concerned with the actual issues of the church-and-synagogue debate at the time when the Gospel was written .
It is notable that , in the  इन्जील , the जातियाँ  still appears to define itself primarily against Judaism , rather than as part of a wider Christian church .
Though Christianity started as a movement within Judaism  , धीरे ईसाइयों और  Jews became bitterly opposed .
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics , meaning that  it describes यीशु as the अवतार of the दैवी  Logos through whom all things were made , as the object of veneration , and more explicitly as God incarnate .
Only in John does Jesus talk at  लंबाई परिचय खुद और उसके दैवी  role , often shared with the disciples only .
Against the  synoptics ,  John focuses largely on different miracles ( including resurrecting Lazarus ) , given as signs meant to engender faith .
synoptic  elements such as parables and exorcisms are not found in John .
it  presents a realized eschatology in which salvation is already present for the believer .
The Plagues of Egypt ( ) , also called the  टेन plagues ( ) or  the Biblical Plagues , were ten calamities that , according to the biblical Book of Exodus , Israel 's God , Yahweh , inflicted upon Egypt to persuade Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery .
Pharaoh capitulated after the  दसवाँ प्लेग , triggering  the Exodus of the Jewish people .
The plagues were designed to contrast the power of Yahweh with the impotence of Egypt 's  विभिन्न  gods .
Some commentators have associated several of the plagues with judgment on  विशिष्ट देवताओं  associated with the Nile , fertility and natural phenomena .
The plagues of Egypt are also mentioned in  the  Quran ( 7,133–136 ) .
According to the Book of Exodus , God proclaims that all the gods of Egypt  होगा  be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John Martin 's  पेंटिंग  of the plague of hail and fire ( 1823 ) .
A role-playing game ( RPG and  sometimes roleplaying खेल ) is  a game in which players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting .
खिलाड़ी लो जिम्मेदारी लिये एक्टिंग आउट ये भूमिकाएँ भीतर a कथा , either through शाब्दिक एक्टिंग or through a प्रक्रम of संरचित decision-making or अक्षर  development .
Actions taken within many games succeed or   fail according to a formal system of rules and guidelines .
There  हैं अनेक  forms of RPG .
The original form ,  sometimes  called the tabletop RPG , is conducted through discussion , whereas in live action role-playing games ( LARP ) players physically perform their characters ' actions .
In both of these forms , an arranger called a game master ( GM ) usually decides  on the नियम और सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त और  acts as referee , while each of the other players plays the role of a single character .
Several varieties of RPG also exist in electronic media , such as multi-player  text-based  MUDs and their graphics-based successors , massively multiplayer online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ) .
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing video games in which players control a  अक्षर or टोली जो undertake quests , और may  include capabilities that advance using statistical mechanics .
These games often  share जमावट और नियम साथ  tabletop RPGs , but emphasize character advancement more than collaborative storytelling .
despite इस किस्में of फ़ॉर्म , कुछ  game forms such as trading card games and wargames that are related to role-playing games may not be included .
Role-playing activity may sometimes be present in such games ,  लकिन it is नहीं  the primary focus .
The term is also sometimes  प्रयुक्त  to describe roleplay simulation games and exercises used in teaching , training , and academic research .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865 between the  संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the ``  North '' ) and several Southern slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war  था इसके उत्पत्ति in the  issue of slavery , especially the extension of slavery into the western territories .
विदेशी  powers did not intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy collapsed , slavery was abolished , and the  मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing  rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election ,  republicans ,  led by Abraham Lincoln , opposed expanding slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before  उसके उद्घाटन  on March 4 , 1861 , seven cotton-based slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic President James Buchanan and the incoming Republicans   rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's  inaugural पता घोषित  his administration would not initiate civil war .
Eight  बाकी  slave states continued to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces  जब्त numerous  federal forts within territory claimed by the Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a compromise  , और  both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King Cotton `` that they would  intervene ; none किया और  none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when  confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट  Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ; consequently , four  more slave  states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and established a naval blockade that crippled the  दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था  .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी  inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union state ) ended with Confederate retreat at the Battle of  antietam  , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा  , which made ending slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of their western  सेना , और the  Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee  's confederate  incursion north ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses  S. Grant command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western  थिएटर , विलियम  T. Sherman drove east to capture Atlanta and marched to the sea , destroying Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and  could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण  through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading to Lee 's surrender to Grant at  appomattox अदालत  House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was one of  the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships , and mass-produced  हथियार  were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks ,  परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in   American history , resulting in the deaths of an estimated 750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at  टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males  20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
The definition of the world 's busiest airport has been specified by the  एयरपोर्ट परिषद अंतरराष्ट्रीय in जेनेवा  , Switzerland .
The ACI  defines  and measures the following three types of airport traffic:
Passenger traffic : total passengers emplaned and deplaned ,  यात्री in  transit counted once
Cargo  ट्रैफ़िक  : loaded and unloaded freight and mail in metric tonnes
Traffic movements : landings and  take-offs  of aircraft
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war centred in Europe that began on 28  जुलाई 1914  and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from  इसके  occurrence until the start of World War II in 1939 , and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the  ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल  Alliance of Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances  यहूद दोनो reorganised और विस्तारित  as more nations entered the war : Italy , Japan and the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately  , अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों  , including 60 million Europeans , were mobilised in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed ,  largely क्युकी of technological  advancements that led to enormous increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world history , subsequently paving the way for various political changes , such as revolutions in  अनेक  of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of the war was the resurgence of  साम्राज्यवाद  in the foreign policies of the great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav nationalist Gavrilo Princip in Sarajevo triggered a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary  subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the  Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed over the previous  दशकों  were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers were at  युद्ध और , via उनके colonies  , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired the first shots of the war as preparation for the invasion of   Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans  invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the  way to France , providing a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought  to  a halt—the so-called Miracle of the Marne —the Western Front settled into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was successful against the Austro-Hungarians , but was   stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman  साम्राज्य  joined the war , opening up fronts in the Caucasus , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
Italy  और बुल्गारिया  went to war in 1915 and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March 1917 and a  subsequent क्रान्ति  in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front  , the allies  drove back the Germans in a series of successful offensives and American forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with revolutionaries ,  सहमत to an  armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war  ended in विजय  for the Allies .
Events on the home  fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the  battle fronts , as the participants tried to mobilize their manpower and economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial powers—the German , Russian  , austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former two lost a great amount of territory , while the latter two  were  dismantled entirely .
The map of central Europe was redrawn into several smaller  राज्य  .
The League of Nations was formed in the hope of  preventing another  such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the repercussions of  जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि  of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the BP oil spill , the BP oil disaster , the Gulf of Mexico oil spill , and the Macondo blowout ) was an oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico on the BP -operated Macondo Prospect , considered the largest accidental marine oil spill in the history of the  पेट्रोलियम उद्योग , अनुमानित  to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill .
Following the explosion and sinking of the Deepwater Horizon oil rig , which claimed 11 lives , a sea-floor oil  gusher flowed unabated  for 87 days , until it was capped on 15 July 2010 .
The total discharge is estimated  at  .
A massive response ensued to protect beaches , wetlands and estuaries from the spreading oil utilizing skimmer ships ,  फ्लोटिंग booms  , controlled burns and of Corexit oil dispersant .
After several failed efforts to contain the flow , the well was declared sealed on 19 September  2010  .
Some reports indicate the  खूब साईट  continues to leak .
Due to the months-long  spill , साथ साथ प्रतिकूल प्रभाव इससे the जवाब और क्लीनअप क्रियाएँ , extensive क्षति  to marine and wildlife habitats , fishing and tourism industries , and human health problems have continued through 2013.Three years after the spill , tar balls could still be found on the Mississippi coast .
Numerous investigations explored the causes of the explosion and record-setting  spill  .
Notably , the U.S. government  's  September 2011 report pointed to defective cement on the well , faulting mostly BP , but also well operator Transocean and contractor Halliburton .
Earlier in 2011 , a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of cost-cutting decisions and an  अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा प्रणाली , लकिन भी concluded कि the spill resulted इससे `` प्रणालीगत ''  root causes and `` absent significant reform in both industry practices and government policies , might well recur '' .
In November 2012 , BP and the United States Department of Justice settled federal criminal  आरोप  with BP pleading guilty to 11 counts of manslaughter , two misdemeanors , and a felony count of lying to Congress .
BP also agreed to four years of  सरकारी  monitoring of its safety practices and ethics , and the Environmental Protection Agency announced that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government .
BP and the  विभाग  of Justice agreed to a record-setting $ 4.525 billion in fines and other payments but further legal proceedings not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and fines under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment .
As of February 2013 , criminal and civil  settlements  and payments to a trust fund had cost the company $ 42.2 billion .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' is a song by rock band  u2  .
It is the opening track  इससे  their 1987 album The Joshua Tree and was released as the album 's third single in August 1987 .
The song 's hook is a  repeating  guitar arpeggio using a delay effect , played during the song 's introduction and again at the end .
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that it is possible to identify a person 's religion and income based on the street  on जिससे वे जिया , विशेषकर in  Belfast .
During the band 's difficulties recording the song , producer Brian Eno  माना erasing the सोंग  's tapes to have them start from scratch .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was praised by critics and became a commercial  कामयाबी , peaking at क्रमांक  thirteen in the US , number fourteen in Canada , number ten in the Netherlands , and number four in the United Kingdom .
The song has become one of the band  's सबसे लोकप्रिय गीतों और रै remained a स्टेपल of उनके  live act since the song debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour .
The song was notably performed on a Los Angeles rooftop for the filming of its music video , which won a Grammy Award for  बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन म्यूज़िक  Video .Recently the song has been used by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9 , 1956 ) is an American  कर्ता ,  producer , writer , and director .
हैंक्स is ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो 13 , बिग , कि बात तुम do !
, The Green Mile , You 've Got Mail , Sleepless in Seattle , Charlie Wilson 's War , Catch Me If You Can , Forrest  Gump ,  Cast Away , A League of Their Own , The Da Vinci Code , Angels & Demons , as well as animated films like the Toy Story film series , The Polar Express , and The Simpsons Movie .
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career , including winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Philadelphia and a Golden Globe , an Academy Award , a Screen Actors Guild Award , and a People 's  चुनाव पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका  in Forrest Gump , and earning the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004 .
Hanks is also known for his  सहयोग साथ फिल्मी निदेशक स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग  on Saving Private Ryan and the mini-series Band of Brothers , which launched Hanks also as a successful director , producer and writer .
As of 2012 , Hanks '  films  have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at the United States box office alone , and over $ 8.5 billion worldwide making him the highest all-time box office star .
The Cape is an American  सुपरहीरो  drama series .
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season replacement beginning with a two-hour pilot episode on  संडे , जनवरी 9 , 2011  at 9 pm Eastern and Pacific Time .
An encore played on Monday , January 10 , with follow-up episodes  continuing  on Monday evenings in the 9 pm timeslot beginning on January 17 .
NBC subsequently cut the total number of episodes to be aired from 13 to 10 as a  परिणाम of कम दरजा .
On March  2 ,  2011 , NBC announced that the series finale would only be aired on the network 's website .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or  ) , officially designated  1P/Halley , is the best-known of the short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is the only  short-period  comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye from Earth , and thus the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and more spectacular , but will appear only  एकबार in हज़ारों  of years .
हैली 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have महरूम observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि at तनिक 240 bce  .
Clear records of the  धूमकेतु 's दिखावे यहूद बना  by Chinese , Babylonian , and medieval European chroniclers , but were not recognized as reappearances of the same object at the time .
The comet 's periodicity was first determined  in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer  Edmond Halley , after whom it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last appeared in the inner Solar System  in 1986 और होगा  next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition , Halley became the first comet to be observed in detail by spacecraft , providing the  पहला observational  data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model , which  correctly पूर्वानुमानित  that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which  substantially  reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
The following is a list of the most populous  incorporated स्थान  of the United States of America .
As defined by the United States Census Bureau , an `` incorporated   place `` includes a variety of designations , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few exceptional Census Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the Census Bureau 's listing  of  incorporated places .
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of government that includes the  संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी of  a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित  city-counties , however , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion ( or ``  संतुलन  '' ) of such consolidated city-counties that are not a part of another incorporated place .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within their defined limits , which does not include   other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A different ranking is evident when considering  u.S. महानगर  area populations .
The Mayflower  थी the जलयान कि  in 1620 transported 102 English Pilgrims , including a core group of Separatists , to New England .
Their story  is एक of travail और  survival in a harsh New World environment .
A New Zealand forward ( in white ) takes a shot on goal  विरूद्ध कैमरून  in the 2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup .
आगे , भी ज्ञात as strikers , हैं the  players on a team in association football who play nearest to the opposing team 's goal , and are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals .
This very advanced  स्थिति और इसके सीमित रक्षात्मक  responsibilities mean forwards normally score more goals than other players .
This position requires intelligence ,  गति , और शक्ति , दोनो of निष्पादन  and of thought , to perform the role well .
Modern team formations usually include one to three  आगे ; दो  is the most common .
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an advanced position ( the centre forward ) , and another attacking forward  जो plays somewhat deeper और assists in बनाना लक्ष्य  as well as scoring ( the second striker ) .
It should be noted that inside forwards develop from attacking midfield  स्थितियाँ और hence हैं naturally  midfielders .
बार्सिलोना  FC star Lionel Messi is a typical Attacking Midfielder seen as a forward due to his shot accuracy .
A California domestic partnership is a legal relationship available to same-sex couples , and to certain opposite-sex couples  in जिससे at तनिक एक पार्टी  is at least 18 years of age .
It affords the couple `` the same rights , protections , and benefits , and ... the same  जिम्मेदारियों , दायित्वों , और कर्तव्य  under law ... '' as married spouses .
enacted in  1999 , the domestic partnership registry was the first of its kind in the United States created by a legislature without court intervention .
Initially , domestic partnerships enjoyed very few  privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation  rights and the right to be claimed as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner .
The legislature has since expanded the  पैमाना of कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू partnerships  to include all of the rights and responsibilities common to marriage .
As such , California domestic partnerships  हैं functionally समतुल्य to सिविल संघ  offered in several other states .
हालांकि the कार्यक्रम enjoys व्यापक support in कैलिफ़ोर्निया , it रै महरूम the सोर्स of कुछ  controversy .
Groups opposed to the recognition of same-sex families have challenged the expansion of  घरेलू  partnerships in court .
Conversely , advocates of same-sex marriage  contend कि anything  less than full marriage rights extended to same-sex partners is analogous to the `` separate but equal '' racial laws of the Jim Crow era .
Mark A. Jackson (  born अप्रैल 1 , 1965 ) is an अमरीकी  basketball coach , and former player who is the current head coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA .
A point guard from St. John 's University , he played for the New York Knicks , Indiana Pacers , Los Angeles  क्लिपर्स , डेनवर टेंडर्स  , Toronto Raptors , Utah Jazz and Houston Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004 .
Jackson has also worked as a commentator for ESPN and ABC alongside his former coach Jeff Van Gundy and play-by-play man Mike  breen  .
He was previously an NBA analyst for The YES  संजाल  's New Jersey Nets games .
South Africa has eleven official  भाषाएं : अफ्रीकी  , English , Ndebele , Northern Sotho , Sotho , Swazi , Tswana , Tsonga , Venda , Xhosa and Zulu .
Fewer than two percent of South Africans speak a  पहला भाषा अन्य  than an official one .
Most South Africans can speak more  than एक भाषा  .
Dutch and English were the first official languages of  दक्षिण  Africa from 1910 to 1925 .
Afrikaans was  added  as a part of Dutch in 1925 .
Dutch was  replaced by अफ्रीकी जब  South Africa became a republic in 1961 , and Dutch was dropped in 1983 , so between 1983 and 1994 , South Africa had two official languages : English and Afrikaans .
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by the names in those languages : isiZulu , isiXhosa , Afrikaans , Sepedi ( referring to Northern  sotho ) , setswana , अंग्रेज़ी , sesotho ( referring to दक्षिणी sotho ) , xitsonga  , Siswati , Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ) .
In South Africa , Southern Ndebele is known  बस  as Ndebele , as most speakers of Northern Ndebele live in Zimbabwe .
The 1993 version of the Constitution referred to Northern Sotho as Sesotho sa Leboa , but the 1996  संस्करण referred to the  language as Sepedi .
Different government departments and  आधिकारिक लाशें उपयोग  different terms to denote Northern Sotho .
The main language of government is English even if South Africans often take pride in using indigenous languages for any  purpose  .
Afrikaans also features prominently in commerce together with  अंग्रेज़ी as the भाषाएं  with the highest number of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English .
In terms of linguistic classification , the official languages include two  west-germanic भाषाएं  ( English and Afrikaans ) and nine Bantu languages .
Four of these are  nguni भाषाएं  ( Zulu , Xhosa , Swati and Ndebele ) and three are Sotho–Tswana languages ( Northern Sotho , Southern Sotho and Tswana ) .
Tsonga is a  tswa–ronga  language .
South African Sign Language is a distinct though incompletely emerged national standard language  जिससे भी subsumes a क्लस्टर of semi-standardised  dialects .
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and nitric  एसिड , मौजूदा सामान्यतः as a crystalline  hydrate , most commonly as aluminium nitrate nonahydrate , Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O .
The New York Jets are a professional  फ़ुटबॉल टोली headquartered  in Florham Park , New Jersey , representing the New York metropolitan area .
The team is a member of the  पूर्वी प्रभाग  of the American Football Conference ( AFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
In a unique  व्यवस्था लिये the लीग , the jets  share MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford , New Jersey with the New York Giants .
The franchise is legally and corporately  पंजीकृत as  New York Jets , LLC .
The team was founded in 1959 as the Titans of New York , an original member of the American Football League ; later ,  the मताधिकार joined the एनएफएल in the  AFL–NFL merger .
The team began to play in  1960  at the Polo Grounds .
Under new ownership , the  वर्तमान नाम थी अपनाया  in 1963 and the franchise was relocated to Shea Stadium in 1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984 .
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete in Super Bowl  iii जहाँ  they defeated the Baltimore Colts , becoming the first AFL team to defeat an NFL club in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game .
Since 1968 , the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen times  , और in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार  times , most recently losing to the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2010 .
However , the Jets have never returned to the Super Bowl , making them one of three NFL teams to win their lone Super Bowl appearance , along with the New Orleans Saints and Tampa Bay Buccaneers   .
The team 's training facility , Atlantic  स्वास्थ्य  Jets Training Center , which opened in 2008 , is located in Florham Park .
The team currently holds their annual training camp  सत्र on the कैम्पस of the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों  of New York at Cortland in Cortland , New York while holding occasional sessions at the Florham Park complex .
psilocybe  semilanceata
psilocybin  mushrooms , also known as psychedelic mushrooms , are fungi that contain psychoactive indole alkaloids .
There are multiple colloquial terms for psilocybin  मशरूम , the सबसे आम होने shrooms  and magic mushrooms .
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms  शामिल agrocybe , conocybe , copelandia , galerina , gerronema ,  Gymnopilus , Hypholoma , Inocybe , Mycena , Panaeolus , Pluteus , and Psilocybe .
There are approximately 190 species of psilocybin  मशरूम और सबसे  of them fall in the genus Psilocybe .
psilocybin मशरूम  have likely been used since prehistoric times and may have been depicted in rock art .
Many cultures have used these  मशरूम in धार्मिक  rites .
In modern Western society they are used  recreationally  for their psychedelic effects .
हाल अध्ययन किया at इम्पीरियल  College London and Johns Hopkins School of Medicine conclude that when used properly , psilocybin acts as an anti-depressant as suggested by fMRI brain scans .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity of the North  अमरीकी महाद्वीप  , with the international boundary with Canada to the east , the Arctic Ocean to the north , and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area , the 4th least  populous और the तनिक densely आबादी  of the 50 United States .
लगभग  half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents live within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil , natural gas , and fishing industries ; it  रै ये संसाधन  in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30 , 1867 , for $ 7.2 million ( $ adjusted for inflation  ) at लगभग दो  cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S.  on जनवरी 3  , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already  introduced in the रूसी  colonial period , when it was used only for the peninsula and is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq , meaning `` the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the `` great land '' , an Aleut word  निकला इससे  the same root .
The 101 French  विभाग हैं  divided into 342 arrondissements , which may be translated into English as districts .
The capital of an  arrondissement/district  is called a subprefecture .
When an arrondissement contains   the prefecture ( capital ) of the department , that prefecture is the capital of the arrondissement , acting both as a prefecture and as a subprefecture .
Arrondissements are  further विभाजित  into cantons and communes .
The vagina ( from Latin vāgīna , literally `` sheath ''  or ``  scabbard `` ) is a tubular tract which is a sex organ and has two main functions ; sexual intercourse and childbirth .
in इंसानो ,  this passage leads from the opening of the vulva to the uterus ( womb ) , but the vaginal tract ends at the cervix .
Unlike men , who have only one genital orifice , women have two , the urethra  और  the vagina .
The vaginal opening is much  larger than the  urethral opening , and both openings are protected by the labia .
The  भीतरी सांचे of the  vagina has a foldy texture which can create friction for the penis during intercourse .
During arousal ,  the  vagina gets moist to facilitate the entrance of the penis .
The Latinate plural ``  vaginae ''  is rarely used in English .
Colloquially , the word vagina is often used to refer to  the भग or to the  female genitals in general .
However , by its dictionary and anatomical definitions , vagina refers exclusively to  the विशिष्ट  internal structure .
The Cincinnati Reds are a Major League Baseball team based in Cincinnati ,  ओहियो  .
They are members of the National League  सेंट्रल  Division .
Established in 1881 as an independent club , the team  became a चार्टर सदस्य of the अमरीकी  Association in 1882 , and joined the National League in 1890 .
The club traditionally traces its origin to baseball  's  first openly professional team in 1869 .
The Reds have won  पाँच  World Series titles , one American Association pennant , nine National League pennants and ten division titles .
The Reds played in the National League  वेस्ट between 1969  and 1993 and have been in the National League Central since 1994 .
Since 2003 , the Reds have played at Great American Ball Park , built next to their home from 1970 to  2002 ,  Riverfront Stadium .
Bob  castellini  has owned the Cincinnati Reds since 2006 .
A prank stink  बमबारी  .
A stink bomb is a device  designed to बनाएँ  an unpleasant smell .
They range in effectiveness from simple pranks to military grade malodorants or  riot कंट्रोल रासायनिक  agents .
The  गिनीज किताब of  Records lists two smelliest substances .
One is `` US Government Standard Bathroom Malodor  '' ; a मिश्रण of आठ  chemicals with a stench resembling human feces , only much stronger , designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners .
Another one , `` Who me ? `` , is a mixture of five sulfur-containing chemicals and smells  जैसे rotting खाना और  carcasses .
The adage `` A  चित्र is  worth a thousand words '' refers to the notion that a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image .
It also  aptly characterizes  one of the main goals of visualization , namely making it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly .
The  अभिव्यक्ति  `` Use a picture .
It 's worth a thousand words . '' appears in a 1911 newspaper article  quoting समाचारपत्र एडिटर आर्थर  Brisbane discussing journalism and publicity .
1913 newspaper   advertisement
A similar phrase , `` One Look Is Worth A Thousand Words '' , appears in a 1913 newspaper  विज्ञापन लिये  the Piqua Auto Supply House of Piqua , Ohio .
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an 1918 newspaper  विज्ञापन  for the San Antonio Light which says : One of the Nation 's Greatest Editors Says : One Picture is Worth a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers .
It is believed by some that the modern use of the phrase stems from an article by  फ्रेड R. बर्नार्ड in the विज्ञापन व्यापार  journal Printers ' Ink , promoting the use of images in advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars .
The December 8 , 1921 issue carries an ad  हकदार , `` एक  Look is Worth A Thousand Words . ''
Another ad by Barnard appears in the March 10 , 1927 issue with the phrase `` One Picture Worth  टेन हजार  Words , '' where it is labeled a Chinese proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ) .
The Home Book of Proverbs , Maxims , and Familiar Phrases quotes Barnard as saying he called it `` a Chinese proverb , so that  लोगों होता लो it seriously  . ''
Soon after ,  the कहावत होता  become popularly attributed to Confucius .
The  चर्चा of `` एक चित्र लायक हजार शब्द ''  versus `` One Picture Worth Ten Thousand Words '' Wan yen I hua and 10.000 miles worth 10.000 books is cited in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures .
A picture is  लायक a हजार  words
Despite this modern origin of the  लोकप्रिय phrase  , the sentiment has been expressed by earlier writers .
For example the Russian writer Ivan Turgenev wrote ( in Fathers and Sons in 1862 ) , `` A picture shows me  at a glance  what it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound . ''
Computer programmer and author Fred Brooks makes an opposite statement regarding  प्रोग्रामिंग in the mythical man-month  : `` Show me your flowcharts and conceal your tables , and I shall continue to be mystified .
Show me your tables ,   and I won’t usually need your flowcharts ; they’ll be obvious . ''
The phrase has also been  spoofed by जॉन मैकार्थी , the प्रसिद्ध  computer scientist , to make the opposite point : `` As the Chinese say , 1001 words is worth more than a picture . ''
A season is a subdivision of the year , marked by changes in weather , ecology , and  घंटों of daylight .
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of the  धरती around the सूर्य  and the tilt of the Earth 's axis relative to the plane of revolution .
In temperate and polar regions , the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface , variations of which may cause animals to go into hibernation or to migrate , and plants to be dormant   .
During May , June  और जुलाई  , the northern hemisphere is exposed to more direct sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is true of the southern hemisphere in  नवम्बर , दिसम्बर  and January .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to be higher in the sky  दौरान  the summer months which increases the solar flux .
However , due to seasonal lag , June , July and August are the hottest months in the northern hemisphere and December , January and February are the hottest months in the southern  गोलार्ध  .
In temperate and subpolar regions , generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their  adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal  ) , summer ( estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate climate regions that includes pre-spring  ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ  ( serotinal ) as distinct seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet , or  मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु , और in  some tropical areas , a cool or mild season .
In some parts of the  संसार , खास `` सीज़न '' हैं  loosely defined based on important events such as a hurricane season , tornado season or a wildfire season .
The six ecological  सीज़न
The four calendar seasons ,  चित्रित in an प्राचीन रोमन  mosaic from Tunisia
Dutch exports  in 2006
At the time of writing the  नीदरलैंड्स is the 17th largest  economy of the world .
( see : List of countries by GDP  ( नाममात्र )  )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in the top 10 of  richest nations in the  world ( see : List of countries by GDP ( PPP ) per capita ) .
Between 1996 and 2000 annual economic growth ( GDP ) averaged  over 4 %  , well above the European average .
Growth slowed considerably in 2001-05 as part  of the वैश्विक आर्थिक slowdown  .
2006 and 2007 however showed economic growth of  3.4 %  and 3.9 % .
The Dutch economy was hit  considerably by the  ongoing global financial crisis and the ensuing European debt crisis .
Several banks went bankrupt , and a number of others had to receive  सरकारी सहायता  .
In 2009 the economy declined with 3.5 % ,  followed by  two years of mild growth .
The Dutch economy is currently  in a  recession again , with an economic decline of 0.5 % in 2012 .
महंगाई  is at 3.2 % in February 2013 .
Unemployment has been  अपेक्षाकृत  low compared to other EU nations for decades but after mid-2012 it has seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 % .
The  नीदरलैंड्स प्रबंधित  to maintain its AAA rating at least until March 2013 according to the three major credit rating agencies .
Historically , the Dutch introduced and invented the stock market by the merchandise trading through  डच वेस्ट इण्डिया कम्पनी .
The Netherlands is a founding member of the European Union , the OECD and  the संसार  Trade Organization .

It contains remixes of previously unreleased music recorded by Shakur before his death in  1996  .
Released in the United States on December 14 , 2004 ( December 12 in  the  United Kingdom ) , Loyal to the Game was produced by Eminem .
The original panel of The View ; Meredith Vieira , Star Jones , Debbie Matenopoulos and Barbara  walters  in 1997 .
The View is an American talk show  ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी कि debuted  in 1997 as part of the network 's daytime programming block .
Created by Barbara Walters and Bill Geddie , who both also serve as the show 's executive producers , the program  सुविधाएँ a फलक of महिलाओं as co-hosts  .
Along with Walters , the current panel includes Whoopi Goldberg , who serves as the  मॉडरेटर , आनन्द behar , एलिज़ाबेथ  Hasselbeck , and Sherri Shepherd .
International versions of the program  हैं aired in  several countries .
As of the 2012–13 season , its 16th , The View is the fourth-longest running national daytime talk show in history ,  पीछे the फिल donahue दिखाएँ ( 29 ) , the variously-named  Live !
कार्यक्रम  ( 25 ) , and The Oprah Winfrey Show ( 25 ) .
Prunus virginiana , commonly called bitter-berry , chokecherry , Virginia bird cherry and western chokecherry ( also black chokecherry for P. virginiana var . demissa ) , is a species of bird cherry ( Prunus subgenus Padus ) native to North America ; the natural  ऐतिहासिक दायरा of P. virginiana शामिल सबसे of the महाद्वीप , मगर  for the far north and far south .
Los Angeles International Airport is the primary airport serving the Greater Los Angeles Area ,  the second-most आबादी महानगर  area in the United States .
It is most  प्रायः referred to by  its IATA airport code LAX , with the letters pronounced individually .
lax is स्तिथ in southwestern  Los Angeles along the Pacific coast in the neighborhood of Westchester , from the downtown core and is the primary airport of Los Angeles World Airports ( LAWA ) , an agency of the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports .
In 2011 , LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world after Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport , Beijing  Capital  International Airport , London Heathrow Airport , Chicago O'Hare International Airport , and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers .
The  विमानक्षेत्र  holds the claim for `` the world 's busiest origin and destination ( O & D ) airport '' in 2011 that involves non-connecting passenger traffic .
It is also the only airport to rank among the top  पाँच u.S. एयरपोर्ट लिये  both passenger and cargo traffic .
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area , but other airports including  bob आशा विमानक्षेत्र , जॉन वेन विमानक्षेत्र  , Long Beach Airport , LA/Ontario International Airport , and Palm Springs International Airport also serve the region .
LAX is also the busiest airport in California and the West Coast of the United States in terms of flight operations , passenger traffic and  एयर कार्गो कार्यकलाप , अग्रणी it to be  referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim `` .
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24 , 1976 ) is an American football  क्वार्टरबैक लिये  the Denver Broncos of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He played for the Indianapolis Colts for 14  सीज़न इससे  1998 to 2011 .
He  is the बेटे of  former NFL quarterback Archie Manning and an elder brother of New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning .
Manning played college football for the University of Tennessee , leading the  स्वयंसेवक  to the 1997 SEC Championship in his senior season .
However , No . 3 Tennessee lost to the No . 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in the Orange Bowl giving Nebraska and Tom  ओसबोर्न उनके 3rd नेशनल  championship in 4 years .
He  थी चुनी  by the Indianapolis Colts with the first overall pick in the 1998 NFL Draft .
From 1998  to 2010 , he led the कोल्टस to आठ ( सात afc दक्षिण  and one AFC East ) division championships , two AFC championships , and to a Super Bowl championship ( Super Bowl XLI ) .
He has won a record four league most valuable player awards , was the most valuable  खिलाड़ी of सुपर कटोरी xli , रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो प्याले , रै बारह 4,000-yard गुजर  seasons , and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ) .
In 2009 , he was named the best player in the NFL and Fox  खेल साथ साथ  Sports Illustrated named him the NFL player of the decade of the 2000s .
In May 2011 , he underwent neck surgery to alleviate neck pain and arm weakness he dealt with during the previous few seasons before signing a five-year , $ 90 million contract extension with the Colts in July   2011 .
Manning had hoped to play in the  2011 ऋतु , लकिन in सितंबर  2011 , he underwent a much more serious second surgery : a level one cervical fusion procedure .
मैनिंग था never छूटी  an NFL game in his career , but was forced to miss the entire 2011 season .
He was released by the Colts on March 7 ,  2012 , और बाद an लगभग  two-week period where he visited with and worked out for several NFL teams , he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20 , 2012 .
Manning 's  pre-snap दिनचर्या रै अर्जित  him the nickname , `` The Sheriff '' and is one of the most recognizable and parodied in the NFL .
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the hurry-up offense led to Manning using an array of gestures and verbal commands to call  the  play at the line of scrimmage rather than in the huddle .
The America Tower of the  अमरीकी  General Center , the headquarters of Baker Hughes
बेकर ह्यूजेस  is one of the world 's largest oilfield services companies .
It operates in over 90 countries , providing the oil and gas industry with products  और सेवाएं लिये खुदाई ,  formation evaluation , completion , production and reservoir consulting .
Baker Hughes has its headquarters in the America Tower in the American General  बीच in neartown , ह्यूस्टन  .
बेकर ह्यूजेस incorporated थी  formed when Baker International and Hughes Tool Company merged in 1987 .
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major offices in Liverpool , United Kingdom ; Singapore ; Dubai ; a research and maintenance facility in Celle , Germany ; Lafayette , Louisiana ; Houston , Texas ; Pescara ,  इटली ; और kuala lumpur ,  Malaysia .
the कम्पनी is administered  broadly in two hemispheres : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( Europe , Africa , the Middle East , Asia Pacific and Russia/Caspian ) and the western hemisphere with four regions ( Canada , US Land , US Gulf , and Latin America ) .
Each of these regions  is subdivided  into markets .
The United States one- cent coin , commonly known as a penny , is a unit of currency equaling one  one-hundredth of a संयुक्त  States dollar .
The cent 's  प्रतीक  is ¢ .
Its obverse has featured the  प्रोफ़ाइल  of President Abraham Lincoln since 1909 , the centennial of his birth .
From 1959 ( the  sesquicentennial of lincoln  's birth ) to 2008 , the reverse featured the Lincoln Memorial .
Four different reverse designs in 2009 honored Lincoln 's 200th birthday and a new , permanent reverse – the  संघ शील्ड  – was introduced in 2010 .
The coin is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm ) in diameter and 0.061 inches  (  1.55 mm ) in thickness .
The  u.S. मिंट 's आधिकारिक  name for a penny is `` '' and the U.S. Treasury 's official name is `` one cent piece '' .
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin of the  वही  name , the pre-decimal version of which had a similar value .
In American English , pennies is the plural form , other plural forms pence and pee ( standard  उपयोग in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी  ) are not used .
As of 2012 , it costs the U.S. Mint 2.00 cents to make a cent because of the cost of  सामग्री और उत्पादन  .
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed components for distribution and fabrication ,  अनुमानित at $ 13 लाख in  FY 2011 .
it भी शामिल  Mint overhead allocated to the penny , which was $ 17.7 million for 2011 .
Fixed costs and overhead  होता have  to be absorbed by other circulating coins without the penny .
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent coin in the United States for the year of 2012 was $  58,000,000  .
This was a slight decrease from  2011 , the साल पहले , जिससे  had a production loss of $ 60,200,000 .
or more specifically , are ornamental varieties of domesticated common carp ( Cyprinus carpio ) that are  रखा लिये सजावटी उद्देश्य in बाहरी  koi ponds or water gardens .
Koi  किस्में हैं विशिष्ट  by coloration , patterning , and scalation .
Some of the major colors are white , black , red , yellow ,  ब्लू , और  cream .
The most popular category of koi is  the gosanke , जिससे is बना up of the kohaku  , Taisho Sanshoku , and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
The American Federation of  सरकारी कर्मचारी ( afge ) is an  American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the federal government , about 5,000 employees of the District of Columbia , and a few hundred private sector employees , mostly in and around federal facilities .
AFGE is the largest union for civilian , non- postal  संघीय कर्मचारी और the largest संघ  for District of Columbia employees who report directly to the mayor ( i.e. , outside of D.C. public schools ) .
It is affiliated with the  afl-cio  .

Blue : A  spore bearing a trilete  mark – the -shaped scar .

The evolution of plants has resulted in increasing levels of complexity , from the earliest algal mats , through bryophytes ,  lycopods , ferns to the जटिल gymnosperms  and angiosperms of today .
While many of the groups which appeared earlier continue to thrive  , especially in the  environments in which they evolved , for a time each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors .
In the Ordovician period ,  around , the  first land plants appeared .
These began to diversify in the late Silurian Period , around , and the results of their  diversification हैं प्रदर्शित in उल्लेखनीय विवरण in an जल्दी devonian  fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert .
This chert preserved early plants  in सेल्यूलर विवरण , petrified  in volcanic springs .
By the middle of the Devonian Period , most of the features   recognised in plants today are present , including roots , leaves and secondary wood ; and , by late Devonian times , seeds had evolved .
Late Devonian plants had thereby reached a degree of  परिष्कार कि अनुमत उन्हें to रूप  forests of tall trees .
Evolutionary innovation continued into the  carboniferous काल और is स्टिल  ongoing today .
सबसे संयंत्र समूह  were relatively unscathed by the Permo-Triassic extinction event , although the structures of communities changed .
This may have set the scene for the appearance of the  flowering पौधे in the triassic (  ~ ) , and their later diversification in the Cretaceous and Paleogene .
The latest major  समूह of पौधे to evolve  were the grasses , which became important in the mid-Paleogene , from around .
The grasses , as well as many  अन्य समूह , विकसित नई mechanisms  of metabolism to survive the low and warm , dry conditions of the tropics over the last .
The winning Super Bowl team receives the  विंस लोम्बार्डी  Trophy .
The Super Bowl is an annual American football game that determines the champion of the National  फ़ुटबॉल लीग  ( NFL ) .
The contest is held in an American  नगर  that is chosen three to four years beforehand , usually in warm-weather or domed sites .
Since 1971 , the winner of the American Football Conference ( AFC )  चैंपियनशिप खेल रै faced the विजेता of the नेशनल  Football Conference ( NFC ) Championship Game in the culmination of the NFL playoffs .
Before the 1970 merger between the American Football League ( AFL ) and the National Football  League ( NFL ) , the two  leagues met in four such contests .
The first two were  ज्ञात as the  `` AFL-NFL World Championship Game . ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first such game that carried the `` Super Bowl '' moniker , the names `` Super  कटोरी i `` और `` सुपर कटोरी  II `` were retroactively applied to the first two games .
The NFC /NFL leads in Super Bowl wins  साथ 25 , जबकि the  AFC /AFL has won 22 .
Eighteen different franchises , including teams that relocated to another  नगर , have जीती  the Super Bowl .
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the most Super Bowls with six championships ( record 6–2 ) , while both the Dallas Cowboys and San  फ्रांसिस्को 49ers have पाँच विन्स प्रत्येक ( cowboys 5–3 ;  49ers 5–1 ) .
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most Super Bowl  दिखावे साथ आठ  , while the Buffalo Bills have the most consecutive appearances with four losses in a row from 1990 to 1993 .
The New England Patriots , Denver Broncos and Minnesota Vikings  have भी खोया  a record four Super Bowls .
Buffalo and Minnesota are both 0–4 , Denver is 2–4 and New  इंग्लैण्ड is 3–4 .
The  रिकार्ड लिये लगातार विन्स is दो और is साझा by सात franchises  : the 1966-67 Green Bay Packers , the 1972-73 Miami Dolphins , the 1974-75 and 1978-79 Pittsburgh Steelers ( the only team to accomplish this feat twice ) , the 1988-89 San Francisco 49ers , the 1992-93 Dallas Cowboys , the 1997-98 Denver Broncos , and the 2003-04 New England Patriots .
The only team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the Baltimore Ravens , who in winning Super  कटोरी xlvii  unseated and replaced the 49ers in that position .
Four  वर्तमान एनएफएल टीमों have never appeared in a सुपर कटोरी , सहित  franchise relocations and renaming : the Cleveland Browns , Detroit Lions , Jacksonville Jaguars , and Houston Texans , though both the Browns and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl .
Martin County is a county located in the U.S. state of  टेक्सास  .
As of  the  2010 census , its population was 4,799 .
Its  सीट  is Stanton .
the काउंटी is नामित लिये wylie मार्टिन , an जल्दी settler .
