नई इंग्लैण्ड  is a region in the northeastern corner of the United States consisting of the six states of Maine , New Hampshire , Vermont , Massachusetts , Rhode Island , and Connecticut .
New England is bordered by New York state to the  दक्षिणपश्चिम , क्यूबेक to the उत्तरपश्चिम  , and New Brunswick and the Atlantic Ocean to the east .
in एक of the  earliest English settlements in North America , Pilgrims from England first settled in New England in 1620 , to form Plymouth Colony .
Ten years later , the Puritans settled north of Plymouth Colony in Boston , thus  forming मैसाचुसेट्स खाड़ी उपनिवेश  .
Over the next 130 years , New England fought in four French and Indian Wars , until the British defeated the  फ्रेंच और  their native allies in North America .
In the late 18th century , the New England Colonies initiated the resistance to the British Parliament 's  प्रयत्न to  impose new taxes without the consent of the colonists .
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which Great Britain responded with a series of punitive laws stripping  मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government , जिससे  were termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists .
The confrontation led to open warfare in 1775 , the expulsion of the British authorities from New England in spring 1776 , and  the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in जुलाई  1776 .
Some of the  पहला आंदोलनों  of American literature , philosophy , and education originated in New England .
The region played a prominent role in the movement to abolish  गुलामी , और थी the  first region of the United States to be transformed by the Industrial Revolution .
Today , New England  is a प्रमुख संसार  center of education , high technology , insurance , and medicine .
Boston is its cultural , financial , educational , medical and  परिवहन  center .
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated  municipalities ज्ञात as नई इंग्लैण्ड कस्बों  , which are often governed by town meeting .
The only  unincorporated territory in नई इंग्लैण्ड exists  in the sparse , northern regions of Vermont , New Hampshire , and Maine .
Since 1970 , voters have more often supported liberal candidates at the state and federal level than those of any other region in the United  राज्य  .
New England is the only one of the United States Census Bureau 's nine regional divisions whose name does not derive from its geography , and it is the only  multi-state  region with clear , consistent boundaries .
It  maintains a दमदार भाव of सांस्कृतिक पहचान नियत अलावा इससे the बाकी of the देश  , although the terms of this identity are often contested , combining Puritanism with liberalism , agrarian life with industry , and isolation with immigration .
आपात  !
is an American television series that  combines the  medical drama and action-adventure genres .
It was  उत्पादित by  Mark VII Limited and distributed by Universal Studios .
It debuted as a  midseason बदलना on जनवरी  15 , 1972 , on NBC , replacing the two short-lived series The Partners and The Good Life , and ran until September 3 , 1977 , with six additional two-hour television films during the following two years .
आपात  !
was created and produced by Jack Webb and Robert A. Cinader , both of whom  यहूद भी जिम्मेदार  for the police dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet .
The  पूर्वी समय मण्डल ( et ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in  the eastern part of the contiguous United States , parts of Canada and three countries in South America .
Places that use Eastern Standard Time ( EST ) when  observing मानक  time ( autumn/winter ) are 5 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ) , when  observing daylight छायांकन  time ( spring/summer ) is 4 hours behind Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
In the  उत्तरी भाग  of the time zone , during the second Sunday in March , at 2:00 a.m. EST , clocks are advanced to 3:00 a.m. EDT leaving a one hour `` gap . ''
During the first Sunday in November , at 2:00 a.m. EDT , clocks are moved back  to 1:00 a.m. est , यूँ `` duplicating  '' one hour .
Southern parts of the zone ( Panama and the Caribbean ) do not observe   daylight saving .
मानक  form of the periodic table .
The colors  represent अलग  categories of elements explained below .
The  आवधिक तालिका is a table प्रदर्शक  of the chemical elements , organized on the basis of their atomic numbers , electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties .
Elements are presented in order of increasing atomic number (  क्रमांक of protons )  .
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or  प्रमुख देह  of elements , positioned above a smaller double row of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed into  चार आयताकार ब्लॉक  : the s-block to the left , the p-block to the right , the d-block in the middle , and the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s- , d- , and p-blocks are called groups , with some of  these  having names such as the halogens or the noble gases .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be used to derive relationships between the properties of the elements and predict the properties of new , yet to be  खोजा or synthesized , तत्व  .
As a result , a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some  अन्य variant—provides  a useful framework for analyzing chemical behavior , and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
Although precursors exist , Dmitri Mendeleev is generally credited with the publication , in 1869 , of the first widely recognized  आवधिक तालिका .
He developed  उसके तालिका to  illustrate periodic trends in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that would be expected to fill gaps in  इस  table .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements in  सवाल यहूद  subsequently discovered .
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded and  परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई  elements and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior .
All elements from  परमाणु संख्याएँ  1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally , although some are found only in trace amounts and were initially  खोजा by संश्लेषण  in laboratories .
The elements after 98 have only been synthesized in laboratories  .
Production of  तत्व परे ununoctium  is being pursued , with the question of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring  तत्व have भी महरूम  produced in laboratories .
Minecraft is a sandbox indie game originally created by Swedish programmer Markus `` Notch '' Persson and later  विकसित और प्रकाशित  by Mojang .
It was publicly released for the PC on May 17 , 2009 , as a developmental alpha version and , after gradual updates , was published as a full release version  on नवम्बर 18 , 2011  .
A version for Android was released a month earlier  on अक्तूबर 7 , और an आईओएस  version was released on November 17 , 2011 .
On May 9 , 2012 , the game was released on Xbox 360 as an Xbox  सजीव आर्केड खेल  , co-developed by 4J Studios .
All versions of  minecraft प्राप्त  periodic updates .
The creative  and  building aspects of Minecraft allow players to build constructions out of textured cubes in a 3D procedurally generated world .
Other activities in the game include  खोजी  , gathering resources , crafting and combat .
Gameplay in its commercial release has two  प्रिंसिपल मोड्स : अस्तित्व , जिससे requires खिलाड़ी to acquire संसाधन और maintain  their health and hunger ; and creative , where players have an unlimited supply of resources , the ability to fly , and no health or hunger .
A  तीसरा gameplay विधि नामित हार्डकोर  is the same as survival , differing only in difficulty ; it is set to hardest setting and respawning is disabled , forcing players to delete their worlds upon death .
minecraft प्राप्त पाँच पुरस्कार इससे the 2011 खेल डेवलपर  Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award , Best Downloadable Game Award , and the Best Debut Game Award from the Game Developers Choice Awards ; and the Audience Award , as well as the Seumas McNally Grand Prize , from the Independent Games Festival in 2011 .
In 2012 , Minecraft was awarded a Golden Joystick  Award in the  category Best Downloadable Game .
As of April 8 , 2013 , the game has sold over 10 million copies on PC and as of January 22 ,  2013 , over 20 लाख  copies across all platforms .
The Dark Knight is a 2008 British-American superhero film directed , produced , and  co-written by क्रिस्टोफर  Nolan .
Based on the DC Comics character Batman , the film is the second part of Nolan 's  बैटमैन फिल्मी श्रेणी  and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins .
Christian Bale reprises the lead role of Bruce Wayne/Batman , with a returning cast of Michael Caine as Alfred Pennyworth , Gary Oldman as James Gordon and Morgan  फ्रीमैन as  Lucius Fox .
the फिल्मी introduces the अक्षर of घनघोर डेंट ( आरोन eckhart ) , गोथम 's newly निर्वाचित ज़िला attorney और the consort of ब्रूस वेन 's बाल्यकाल dost रेचल dawes ( मैगी जिलएनहॉल ) , जो joins बैटमैन और the पुलिस in combating the नई उठती threat of a दण्ड मास्टरमाइंड कॉलिंग खुद `` the जोकर `` ( झाड़ लेजर  ) .
Nolan 's inspiration for the film was the Joker 's comic book  डेब्यू in 1940 , the 1988 ग्राफिक  novel , and the 1996 series , which retold Two-Face 's origin .
The nickname `` the Dark  नाईट '' थी पहला लागू to  Batman in Batman No . 1 ( 1940 ) , in a story written by Bill Finger .
The Dark Knight was filmed primarily in Chicago , as  खूब as in अनेक अन्य स्थितियाँ  in the United States , the United Kingdom , and Hong Kong .
Nolan used an IMAX camera to  फिल्मी कुछ  sequences , including the Joker 's first appearance in the film .
On January 22 , 2008 , some months after he had completed filming on The Dark Knight and six months before the film 's   release , Heath Ledger died from a toxic combination of prescription drugs , leading to intense attention from the press and movie-going public .
Warner Bros. had initially created a viral marketing campaign for The Dark Knight , developing promotional websites and trailers highlighting screen shots of Ledger as the Joker , but after Ledger 's death , the studio refocused its promotional  अभियान  .
The Dark Knight was released on July 16 , 2008 in Australia , on July 18 , 2008 in North America , and on July 24 , 2008 in the  संयुक्त किंगडम  .
Considered one  of the बेहतरीन films of the 2000s और एक of the बेहतरीन  superhero films ever made , the film received highly positive reviews and set numerous records during its theatrical run .
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide , it  is the  14th-highest-grossing film of all time , unadjusted for inflation .
The film received eight Academy Award nominations ; it won the award for Best Sound Editing and Ledger was posthumously awarded Best  supporting कर्ता  .
The Dark Knight Rises , the  फाइनल भाग  of the trilogy , was released on July 20 , 2012 .
The timeline of radio lists within the history of radio , the technology and events that produced instruments that use radio waves  और क्रियाएँ  that people undertook .
Later , the history is dominated by programming and  सामग्री  , which is closer to general history .
The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts  केन्द्र in नई दक्षिण वेल्स  , Australia .
It was conceived and largely  निर्मित by डैनिश वास्तु  Jørn Utzon , opening in 1973 after a long gestation that began with his competition-winning design in 1957 .
Joseph Cahill 's New South Wales Government gave  the  go-ahead for work to begin in 1958 .
The government 's bold decision to select Utzon 's design is often overshadowed   by the scandal that followed .
It is on Bennelong Point in Sydney Harbour ,  बंद to the सिडनी  Harbour Bridge .
It sits at  the northeastern टिप of the सिडनी  central business district ( the CBD ) , surrounded on three sides by the harbour ( Sydney Cove and Farm Cove ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens .
Contrary to its name , it  घरों अनेक  performance venues .
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the world ,  होस्टिंग over 1,500 प्रदर्शन  each year attended by some 1.2 million people .
It provides a venue for many  performing-arts कंपनियाँ , सहित  the four key resident companies Opera Australia , The Australian Ballet , the Sydney Theatre Company and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra , and presents a wide range of productions on its own account .
It is also one of the most popular visitor attractions in Australia , with more than seven  लाख लोगों  visiting each year , 300,000 of whom take a guided tour .
It is administered by the Sydney Opera House Trust ,  अंतर्गत the  New South Wales Ministry of the Arts .
On 28 June 2007 , it  थी बना  a UNESCO World Heritage Site .
It is one of the 20th century 's most distinctive  इमारतें और  one of the most famous performing arts centres in the world .
A  आलेख of देह द्रव्यमान अनुक्रमणिका as  a function of body mass and body height is shown above .
The dashed  लाइनों  represent subdivisions within a major class .
For instance the `` Underweight '' classification is further  विभाजित into `` कठोर '' , `` मॉडरेट  '' , and `` mild '' subclasses .
The body mass index ( BMI ) , or Quetelet index , is a measure for  इंसान देह आकार  based on an individual 's weight and height .
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the Belgian polymath Adolphe Quetelet during the course of developing ``  सोशल भौतिकी ''  .
Body mass index is defined as the  व्यक्तिगत  's body mass divided by the square of their height .
The formulae universally used in medicine  उपज a ईकाई of  measure of kg/m2 .
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart , which displays BMI as a function of weight (  आड़ा अक्ष ) और ऊँचाई ( लंबवत अक्ष  ) using contour lines for different values of BMI or colors for different BMI categories .
† The factor for UK/US units is more  precisely 703.06957964  , but that level of precision is not meaningful for this calculation .
To work  इससे स्टोन और पाउंड पहला गुणा  the stone by 14 then add the pounds to give the whole mass in pounds ; to work from feet and inches first multiply the feet by 12 then add the inches to give the whole height in inches .
Thomas Paine ( January 29 , 1737 ( NS February 9 , 1737 ) – June 8 , 1809 ) was an English-American  राजनैतिक activist , लेखक  , political theorist and revolutionary .
As the author of two highly influential pamphlets at the start of  the अमरीकी क्रान्ति , he  inspired the Patriots in 1776 to declare independence from Britain .
उसके विचार reflected  Enlightenment era rhetoric of transnational human rights .
He has been called `` a corsetmaker by  व्यापार , a पत्रकार by  profession , and a propagandist by inclination . ''
Born in Thetford , England ,  in the  county of Norfolk , Paine emigrated to the British American colonies in 1774 with the help of Benjamin Franklin and he arrived in time to participate in the American Revolution .
His principal contributions were the powerful , widely read pamphlet Common Sense ( 1776 ) , the all-time best-selling American book that advocated colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain , and The American Crisis ( 1776–83  ) , a pro-revolutionary  pamphlet series .
Common Sense was so influential that John Adams  कहा , `` बगैर  the pen of the author of Common Sense , the sword of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
Paine lived in France for most of the 1790s , becoming deeply involved   in the French Revolution .
He wrote the Rights of Man ( 1791 ) , in part a  रक्षा  of the French Revolution against its critics .
His attacks on British writer Edmund Burke led to a trial and conviction  in  absentia in 1792 for the crime of seditious libel .
In 1792 , despite not being able to speak French , he was elected to the French  नेशनल सम्मेलन  .
The  girondists  regarded him as an ally .
Consequently ,  the montagnards , विशेषकर  Robespierre , regarded him as an enemy .
in दिसम्बर 1793  , he was arrested and imprisoned in Paris , then released in 1794 .
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ) ,  उसके किताब कि अधिवक्ताओं देववाद , promotes  reason and freethinking , and argues against institutionalized religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular .
He also wrote the pamphlet  कृषिक इंसाफ  ( 1795 ) , discussing the origins of property , and introduced the concept of a guaranteed minimum income .
In 1802 , he returned to  अमेरिका जहाँ  he died on June 8 , 1809 .
तभी छह लोगों  attended his funeral as he had been ostracized for his ridicule of Christianity .
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development that generate safety and efficacy data ( or more specifically , information about adverse drug reactions and adverse effects of other treatments ) for health  interventions ( e.g.  , drugs , diagnostics , devices , therapy protocols ) .
They are conducted only after satisfactory information has been gathered on the quality  of the  non clinical safety , and health authority/ethics committee approval is granted in the country where approval of the drug or device is sought .
Previously , many emerging countries  किया नहीं  require local trials for product approvals .
Now , though emerging countries still accept data from U.S./Europe , they also require some  लोकल ट्रायल  .
Depending on the type of product and the stage of its development , investigators initially enroll volunteers and/or patients into small pilot  अध्ययन , और subsequently conduct larger स्केल  studies in patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest .
As positive safety and  efficacy आंकड़ा हैं gathered  , the number of patients is typically increased .
Clinical trials can vary in size , and can involve a single research  एंटिटी in एक देश  or many such entities in multiple countries .
A full series of trials may  incur sizable लागत , और the बोझ of paying लिये सब the  necessary people and services is usually borne by the sponsor , which may be a governmental organization or a pharmaceutical , biotechnology or medical device company .
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of the sponsor , a clinical trial is managed by an outsourced partner , such as a contract research organization or a clinical trials unit in  the अकादमिक सेक्टर  .
The Green Bay Packers are an American football  टोली आधारित in  Green Bay , Wisconsin .
They are members of the North  प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Green  खाड़ी is the third-oldest  franchise in the NFL , having been organized and playing in 1919 .
The Packers are the only non-profit , community-owned  प्रमुख लीग पेशेवर  sports team in the United States .
the पैकर्स हैं the  last vestige of `` small town teams '' that were once common in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun , the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other  semi-professional टीमों in  Green Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a  semi-professional  football team against clubs from around Wisconsin and the Midwest .
They joined the American Professional Football  संघ ( apfa ) in 1921  , the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green  खाड़ी  is the last NFL `` small town '' team , its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ) , including nine NFL championships prior to the  सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर  Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing , bitter rivalries with their NFC North (  formerly  the NFC Central ) opponents , the Chicago Bears , Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions .
The Bears-Packers rivalry is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history , dating back to  1921 .
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol ) , the same type of alcohol found in alcoholic  पेय .
It is most often  प्रयुक्त as a मोटर ईंधन , मुख्यतः  as a biofuel additive for gasoline .
World ethanol  उत्पादन लिये हस्तांतरण  fuel tripled between 2000 and 2007 from 17 billion to more than 52 billion liters .
From 2007 to 2008 , the  share  of ethanol in global gasoline type fuel use increased from 3.7 % to 5.4 % .
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ) , with the United States as the top producer with 13.9 bg ( 52.6 billion liters )  , हिसाब  for 62.2 % of global production , followed by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ) .
Ethanol fuel has a `` gasoline  गैलन equivalency  `` ( GGE ) value of , which means 1.5 gallons of ethanol produce the energy of one gallon of gasoline .
Ethanol fuel is widely used in Brazil and in the United States , and together both countries were responsible for   87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011 .
Most cars  on the सड़क आज in the u.S.  can run on blends of up to 10 % ethanol , and ethanol represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel supply derived from domestic sources in 2011 .
Since 1976 the Brazilian government has made it mandatory to blend ethanol with gasoline , and since 2007 the legal blend is around 25 % ethanol and 75 % gasoline  (  E25 ) .
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million  flex-fuel  automobiles and light trucks and 1.5 million flex-fuel motorcycles that regularly use neat ethanol fuel ( known as E100 ) .
Bioethanol is a form of renewable  उर्जा कि  can be produced from agricultural feedstocks .
It can be made from very common  फसलों ऐसे as  sugar cane , potato , manioc and corn .
There has been considerable debate about how useful  bioethanol  will be in replacing gasoline .
Concerns about its production and use relate to increased food prices due to the large amount of arable land required for crops ,  as खूब as the उर्जा और प्रदूषण संतुलन  of the whole cycle of ethanol production , especially from corn .
Recent developments with cellulosic ethanol  उत्पादन और व्यावसायीकरण  may allay some of these concerns .
Cellulosic ethanol offers promise because  cellulose मछली , a प्रमुख और सार्वभौमिक घटक  in plant cells walls , can be used to produce ethanol .
According to the International Energy Agency , cellulosic ethanol could allow ethanol fuels to play a much bigger role in  the भविष्य than previously  thought .
साब  9-3 SportCombi BioPower .
The second E85  flexifuel मॉडल introduced  by Saab in the Swedish market .
A plaque commemorating the location of the  साराजेवो हत्या और कदम of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987 , पहले  steps were removed in 1992 and plaque changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque  commemorating the  location of the Sarajevo assassination ( image taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke  फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड of ऑस्ट्रिया , वारिस presumptive to the austro-hungarian  throne , and his wife , Sophie , Duchess of Hohenberg , were shot dead in Sarajevo , by Gavrilo Princip , one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
the राजनैतिक उद्देश्य of the हत्या थी to ब्रेक बंद austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त into a वृहद सर्बिया or a यूगोस्लाविया .
The assassins ' motives were consistent with the movement that later became known  as  Young Bosnia .
Serbian military officers stood  पीछे the आक्रमण  .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin Dimitrijević , his righthand man  प्रमुख vojislav tankosić , और masterspy rade malobabić  .
Major Tankosić armed the  हत्यारे साथ बम  and pistols and trained them .
The assassins were given access to the same clandestine tunnel of safe-houses and agents that  rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ  of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members of the clandestine tunnel , and the key Serbian military conspirators who were still alive were arrested  , आजमाया , convicted और  punished .
Those who were arrested in Bosnia  यहूद आजमाया in साराजेवो  in October 1914 .
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo court on the French-controlled Salonika Front in 1916–1917 on unrelated false charges  ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन of the शीर्ष सैन्य  conspirators .
Much of what is known  परिचय the assassinations  comes from these two trials and related records .
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly controversial because the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one  माह बाद  .
Renée Kathleen Zellweger ( born April 25  ,  1969 ) is an American actress and producer .
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry Maguire ( 1996 ) , and subsequently received two nominations for the Academy Award for Best  अभिनेत्री लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as ब्रिजेट  Jones in the comedy Bridget Jones 's Diary ( 2001 ) , and as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ) .
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting  अभिनेत्री  for her performance in the drama Cold Mountain ( 2003 ) .
She has won an Academy Award , three Golden Globe Awards , three Screen Actors Guild Awards , and a BAFTA Award ; was named Hasty Pudding 's Woman of the Year in 2009 ; and established herself as one of the highest-paid Hollywood actresses as of  2007  .
The ossicles ( also called auditory ossicles ) are the three  smallest हड्डियों  in the human body , the malleus , the incus and the stapes .
They are contained within the middle ear space and  serve to संचारण  sounds from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth ( cochlea ) .
The absence of the auditory  ossicles होता constitute  a moderate-to-severe hearing loss .
The term `` ossicles '' literally means `` tiny bones '' and commonly refers to the auditory ossicles ,  हालांकि the पद may refer to कोई छोटी अस्थि  throughout the body .
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • —  यूनानी • • diatheke kaine ) is a biblical  interpretation originally derived from a phrase in the Book of Jeremiah , in the Hebrew Scriptures .
It is often thought of as an eschatological Messianic Age or world  to  come and is related to the biblical concept of the Kingdom of God .
Generally , Christians  believe that the New  Covenant was instituted at the Last Supper as part of the Eucharist , which in the Gospel of John includes the New Commandment .
There are several Christian eschatologies that further define the New Covenant , as an example an inaugurated eschatology defines and describes the New Covenant as an ongoing relationship between Christian believers and  परमेश्वर कि होगा be in पूरा फलीभूत  after the Second Coming of Christ ; that is , it will not only be in full fruition in believing hearts , but in the future external world as well .
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the New Covenant is seen in most modern English translations of the New Testament with the saying  : `` इस कप कि is poured आउट लिये तुम is the नई वचन  in my blood '' .
Christians believe that Jesus is the mediator  of the नई  Covenant , and that the Blood of Christ shed at his crucifixion is the required blood of the covenant .
As with all covenants between God and man described in the Bible , the New Covenant is considered `` a bond in  रक्त sovereignly administered  by God . ''
It has been theorized that the New Covenant is the Law of Christ as  बोला दौरान उसके उपदेश on  the Mount .
The following List of people pardoned or granted clemency by the President of the United States documents the most  prominent  cases of each presidency .
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II , Section 2 , Clause 1 ) , Presidents  have the शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया in  one or more of the following ways : the ability to grant a full pardon , to commute a sentence , or to rescind a fine .
U.S. Presidents have no  शक्ति  to grant clemency for crimes prosecuted under state law .
As to the difference between  a  pardon and a commutation:
A pardon is an  कार्यपालिका  order vacating a conviction .
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone currently serving a sentence for a crime pursuant to a conviction , without  vacating the  conviction itself .
Approximately   20,000 pardons and clemencies were issued by U.S. presidents in the 20th century alone .
The  रिकॉर्ड  of acts of clemency were public until 1934 .
In 1981 the Office of the Pardon Attorney was created and records  इससे अध्यक्ष  H. W. Bush forward are now listed .
इस  list includes pardons and commutations .
Tampa ( ) is a city in the U.S. state  of फ्लोरिडा  .
it serves as  the county seat for Hillsborough County and is located on the west coast of Florida , on Tampa Bay near the Gulf of Mexico .
The population of  tampa  in 2011 was 346,037 .
the वर्तमान स्थान  of Tampa was once inhabited by indigenous peoples of the Safety Harbor culture , most notably the Tocobaga and the Pohoy , who lived along the shores of Tampa Bay .
It was briefly explored by Spanish explorers in the early 16th century , but there were no  स्थाई अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements भीतर  today 's city limits until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819 .
In 1824 , the United States Army established a frontier outpost called Fort Brooke at the mouth of the Hillsborough River , near the site  of आज 's tampa सम्मेलन बीच  .
The first civilian  निवासियों यहूद  pioneers who settled near the fort for protection from the nearby Seminole population .
The  कस्बा grew धीरे जबतक the 1880s  , when railroad links , the discovery of phosphate , and the arrival of the cigar industry jump-started Tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s .
Today , Tampa is a part of the metropolitan area most  commonly  referred to as the Tampa Bay Area .
For U.S. Census purposes , Tampa is part  of the tampa-st. petersburg-clearwater  , Florida Metropolitan Statistical Area .
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million residents , making it the second largest metropolitan statistical area ( MSA ) in the state , and the fourth largest in the Southeastern United States , behind Miami  , Washington  , D.C. , and Atlanta .
The Greater Tampa Bay area has just  over 4 लाख  residents and generally includes the Tampa and Sarasota metro areas .
the tampa  Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data showed an average annual growth of 2.47 percent , or a gain of approximately 97,000 residents per year .
Between 2000 and 2006 , the Greater Tampa Bay Market experienced a combined growth rate of 14.8  प्रतिशत ,  growing from 3.4 million to 3.9 million and hitting the 4 million people mark on April 1 , 2007 .
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay area population to have 4,310,524 people and a 2017  प्रक्षेप  of 4,536,854 people .
Tampa has a number of sports teams , such as the Tampa Bay  buccaneers of the  National Football League , the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League , and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League .
the tampa खाड़ी किरणें in प्रमुख  League Baseball and the Tampa Bay Rowdies of the North American Soccer League play their home games in neighboring St. Petersburg , Florida .
In 2008 , Tampa was ranked  as the  5th best outdoor city by Forbes .
A 2004 survey by  the nyu समाचारपत्र वॉशिंगटन  Square News ranked Tampa as a top city for `` twenty-somethings . ''
Tampa is now ranked as a `` Gamma '' world city  by loughborough  University .
According to Loughborough , Tampa ranks alongside other world cities such as  फीनिक्स , सेंटो  Domingo , and Osaka .
In recent years Tampa has seen a notable upsurge in  high-market माँग  from consumers , signaling more wealth concentrated in the area .
Tampa hosted the 2012 Republican  नेशनल सम्मेलन  .
The Chevrolet Cavalier was a compact  ऑटोमोबाइल उत्पादित इससे 1982  to 2005 by General Motors .
Built on the company 's J platform , the Cavalier  उत्पादित  the highest sales in 1984 .
AT & T Mobility LLC branded and referred to as AT & T ( formerly Cingular Wireless LLC ) , is a wholly owned subsidiary of AT & T  inc. कि provides बेतार सेवाएं to  107 million subscribers in the United States , including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands .
AT & T Mobility is the  दूसरी largest बेतार दूरसंचार  provider in the United States and Puerto Rico , behind Verizon Wireless , which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012 .
AT & T Mobility is  headquartered  in the Lenox Park area of DeKalb Co. Georgia , just outside Atlanta .
originally cingular बेतार llc इससे 2000 to 2007  , a joint venture between SBC Communications and BellSouth , the company acquired the old AT & T Wireless in 2004 ; SBC later acquired the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T '' .
Cingular became wholly owned by AT & T in December 2006 as a result of AT & T 's  अधिग्रहण  of BellSouth .
In January 2007 ,  cingular  confirmed it would re-brand itself under the AT & T name .
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately , for both regulatory and brand-awareness reasons both brands were used in the company  's साइनेज और विज्ञापन दौरान a परिवर्तन काल  .
The  परिवर्तन  concluded in late June , just prior to the rollout of the Apple iPhone .
On March 20 , 2011 , AT & T  गतिशीलता घोषित  its intention to acquire T-Mobile USA from Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion .
If it had received government and regulatory approval ,  at & t होता have था  more than 130 million subscribers .
However , the U.S. Department of Justice , the Federal Communications  आयोग , और at & t गतिशीलता 's प्रतिस्पर्धी  ( such as Sprint Nextel ) opposed the move on the grounds that it would reduce competition in the cellular communications market .
In December 2011 , in the face of both governmental and widespread consumer opposition , AT & T withdrew their offer to  पूरा the  merger .
Martin Luther King , Jr. ( January 15 , 1929 – April 4 , 1968 ) was an American clergyman , activist , and  नेता in the african-american  Civil Rights Movement .
He is best known for his role in the advancement of civil  rights using  nonviolent civil disobedience .
King has become a national icon in the history  of अमरीकी प्रगतिवाद  .
A Baptist minister , King became a civil rights  activist  early in his career .
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus Boycott and helped found the  Southern  Christian Leadership Conference ( SCLC ) in 1957 , serving as its first president .
With the SCLC , King led an unsuccessful struggle against segregation in Albany , Georgia , in 1962 , and organized nonviolent protests in Birmingham , Alabama , that attracted  नेशनल ध्यान following टेलीविज़न न्यूज कवरेज of the क्रूर पुलिस  response .
King also helped to organize the 1963 March on  वॉशिंगटन , जहाँ he वितरित उसके ``  I Have a Dream `` speech .
There , he  स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा  as one of the greatest orators in American history .
He also established his reputation as a radical , and became an object of the Federal Bureau of  छानबीन 's cointelpro लिये the  rest of his life .
FBI agents  investigated उसे लिये संभावित कम्युनिस्ट  ties , recorded his extramarital liaisons and reported on them to government officials , and on one occasion , mailed King a threatening anonymous letter that he interpreted as an attempt to make him commit suicide .
On October 14 , 1964 , King received the Nobel Peace Prize for combating racial inequality  through  nonviolence .
In 1965 , he and the SCLC helped to organize the Selma to Montgomery marches  और the following साल  , he took the movement north to Chicago .
In the final years of his life , King expanded his focus to  शामिल गरीबी  and the Vietnam War , alienating many of his liberal allies with a 1967 speech titled `` Beyond Vietnam '' .
King was planning a national occupation of Washington , D.C.  , पुकारा the ग़रीब  People 's Campaign .
King was assassinated on April 4 , 1968  , in मेम्फिस ,  Tennessee .
His death was followed  by दंगे in  many U.S. cities .
Allegations that James Earl Ray , the man convicted of killing King , had been  framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ सरकारी एजेंटों persisted  for decades after the shooting , and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King .
King was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom and the  congressional  Gold Medal posthumously .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day was established as a  u.S.  federal holiday in 1986 .
सैंकड़ों of गलियों in the  U.S. have been renamed in his honor .
A  मेमोरियल  statue on the National Mall was opened to the public in 2011 .
The tiger ( Panthera tigris ) is the largest cat species ,  reaching a कुल देह लंबाई of up  to and weighing up to .
It is the third largest land carnivore ( behind only the  ध्रुवीय  bear and the brown bear ) .
Its most recognizable feature  is a पैटर्न of अंधेरा  vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside .
It has exceptionally stout teeth , and the canines are the longest among living felids with a  क्राउन  height of as much as or even .
In zoos , tigers have lived for 20 to 26 years , which also seems to be their  आयु  in the wild .
They are territorial and generally solitary but social animals , often requiring large contiguous areas of habitat   that support their prey requirements .
This , coupled  साथ the फैक्ट कि वे हैं स्वदेशी  to some of the more densely populated places on Earth , has caused significant conflicts with humans .
Tigers once  ranged  widely across Asia , from Turkey in the west to the eastern coast of Russia .
Over the past 100 years , they have lost 93 % of their historic range , and have been extirpated from southwest and central  एशिया , इससे  the islands of Java and Bali , and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia .
Today , they range from the Siberian taiga to open grasslands  और तीव्र mangrove  swamps .
The  बाकी छह बाघ subspecies  have been classified as endangered by IUCN .
The global population in the wild is estimated to number between 3,062 and 3,948 individuals , down from  around 100,000 at the प्रारंभ of the 20th सदी , साथ  most remaining populations occurring in small pockets isolated from each other .
Major  कारण लिये जनसांख्यिकी  decline include habitat destruction , habitat fragmentation and poaching .
The extent of  क्षेत्रफल  occupied by tigers is estimated at less than , a 41 % decline from the area estimated in the mid-1990s .
Tigers are among the most  recognisable और लोकप्रिय of  the world 's charismatic megafauna .
They have featured  prominently in प्राचीन mythology  and folklore , and continue to be depicted in modern films and literature .
टाइगर्स  appear on many flags , coats of arms , and as mascots for sporting teams .
The Bengal tiger is the national  एनिमल of दोनो इण्डिया और  Bangladesh .
The simplified internal structure of a  हरितलवक
Overview of the  calvin साईकिल  and carbon fixation
The light-independent reactions of photosynthesis are chemical reactions that  बदलें कार्बन  dioxide and other compounds into glucose .
These reactions occur in the stroma , the fluid-filled area of a  हरितलवक बाहर of the thylakoid झिल्लियों  .
These reactions take the light-dependent reactions and  perform further  chemical processes on them .
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions , collectively called the Calvin cycle : carbon fixation ,  कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ , और  ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name , this process occurs only when  लाइट  is available .
पौधे  do not carry out the Calvin cycle by night .
They , instead , release  sucrose into  the phloem from their starch reserves .
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and Crassulacean Acid Metabolism ) ; CAM plants store malic acid in  उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि और रिलीज it by दिन in अनुक्रम  to make this process work .
A linen handkerchief with pulled thread  कढ़ाई around  the edges
Linen  cloth बरामद  from Qumran Cave 1 near the Dead Sea .
Linen ( ) is a textile made from the fibers of the  flax संयंत्र , linum  usitatissimum .
Linen is labor-intensive to manufacture , but when it is made into garments , it is valued for its  असाधारण शीतलता  and freshness in hot weather .
The word `` linen '' is of West Germanic origin and cognates with the  लैटिन  name for the flax plant linum , and the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ) .
This word history has given rise to a number of other terms in English , the most notable of which is the English word line , derived from the use of a  लिनेन ( flax ) लड़ी to determine  a straight line .
Textiles in a linen weave texture ,  भी  when made of cotton , hemp and other non-flax fibers are also loosely referred to as `` linen '' .
Such fabrics generally  have  their own specific names other than linen ; for example , fine cotton yarn in a linen-style weave is called Madapolam .
The collective term `` linens `` is still often used  generically to describe a क्लास of woven और भी  knitted bed , bath , table and kitchen textiles .
The name linens is retained because traditionally , linen  थी प्रयुक्त लिये  many of these items .
In the past , the word `` linens '' was also used to mean lightweight undergarments such as shirts , chemises , waistshirts , lingerie ( a word also cognate with linen ) , and detachable shirt collars and  cuffs , which were  historically made almost exclusively out of linen .
The inside cloth layer of fine composite clothing garments ( as for example jackets )  थी  traditionally made of linen , and this is the origin of the word lining .
लिनेन वस्त्र appear  to be some of the oldest in the world : their history goes back many thousands of years .
Fragments of straw , seeds , fibers , yarns , and various types of fabrics which date back to about 8000 BC have been found  in  Swiss lake dwellings .
Dyed flax  मछली मिला in a प्रागैतिहासिक गुफा in जॉर्जिया सुझाएँ  the use of woven linen fabrics from wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP .
Linen was  sometimes प्रयुक्त  as currency in ancient Egypt .
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in  लिनेन  because it was seen as a symbol of light and purity , and as a display of wealth .
Some of these fabrics , woven from hand spun  yarns , यहूद बहुत ठीक लिये उनके  day , but are coarse compared to modern linen .
Today , linen is usually an  महंगी वस्त्र  , and is produced in relatively small quantities .
It has a long `` staple '' ( individual fiber  लंबाई ) सापेक्ष  to cotton and other natural fibers .
Many products are made of linen : aprons , bags , towels ( swimmers , bath , beach , body and wash towels ) , napkins , bed  linens , लिनेन चौके  , runners , chair covers , and men 's & women 's wear .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested by the senior men 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football  संघ  ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been awarded every four years since the inaugural  टूर्नामेंट in 1930  , except in 1942 and 1946 when it was not held because of the Second World War .
The current  champions  are Spain , who won the 2010 tournament .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within  the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह  ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which  फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो , is प्रयुक्त  to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup  tournaments  have been won by eight different national teams .
Brazil have won five  टाइम्स , और वे हैं the  only team to have played in every tournament .
The other World Cup winners are Italy , with four titles ; Germany , with three   titles ; Argentina and inaugural winners Uruguay , with two titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1  लाख लोगों देखी the फाइनल  match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be hosted by Brazil in 2014 ,  रूस  in 2018 , and Qatar in 2022 .
The is an expansion device for the Wii Remote video game controller for  the वी  that allows it to more accurately capture complex motion .
According to Nintendo , the sensor in the  यंत्र पूरक the accelerometer  and Sensor Bar capabilities of the Wii Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the screen in real time .
The Wii 's successor console , the Wii U , supports the Wii MotionPlus and its peripherals in games  जहाँ उपयोग of इसके touchscreen-built-in  primary controller is not necessary .
Majulah Singapura ( Onward  सिंगापुर  ) is the national anthem of Singapore .
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song for official functions of the City Council of  सिंगापुर , the सोंग थी चयनित  in 1959 as the island 's anthem when it attained self-government .
Upon full  स्वतंत्रता in 1965  , Majulah Singapura was formally adopted as Singapore 's national anthem .
By law the  गान may तभी  be sung with its original Malay lyrics , although there exist authorized translations of the lyrics of the anthem in Singapore 's three other official languages : English , Mandarin and Tamil .
Originally composed in the key of G major , in 2001 the national anthem was officially relaunched in the lower key of F  प्रमुख as इस थी कहा to allow लिये a `` grander  and more inspiring arrangement '' .
the नेशनल गान is regularly performed or सुंग in  schools and armed forces camps at ceremonies held at the beginning and/or the end of each day , during which the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken .
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on occasions of national celebration or national significance such as at the National Day Parade , at National Day observance ceremonies conducted by educational institutions and government departments , and at sporting events  at जिससे  Singapore teams are participating .
An  expedition 's  shipwrights building a brigantine , 1541 .
Shipbuilding is the construction of  जहाजों और फ्लोटिंग  vessels .
It normally takes place in a specialized  सुविधा ज्ञात as a  shipyard .
Shipbuilders , also called  shipwrights , follow a specialized occupation  that traces its roots to before recorded history .
Shipbuilding and ship repairs ,  दोनो  commercial and military , are referred to as `` naval engineering '' .
The construction of boats is  a समान  activity called boat building .
The dismantling of  जहाजों  is called ship breaking .
Wakonda is a town in Clay County , South  डकोटा , संयुक्त  States .
The population was 321 at  the  2010 census .
The following is a list of  the  most populous incorporated places of the United States of America .
As defined by the United States Census Bureau  , an `` incorporated प्लेस ``  includes a variety of designations , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few exceptional  जनसांख्यिकी  Designated Places ( CDPs ) are also included in the Census Bureau 's listing of incorporated places .
Consolidated city-counties represent a distinct type of  सरकारी कि शामिल  the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित  city-counties , however , include multiple incorporated places .
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such consolidated  city-counties कि हैं नहीं a भाग  of another incorporated place .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual  municipalities  within their defined limits , which does not include other municipalities or unincorporated suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A different ranking is evident when considering U.S.  महानगर  area populations .

Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's work-in-progress images , homebrew video games and downloaded commercial games ( since  the निन्टेंडो  DS is not sold with a rewritable storage medium ) .
Licensed developers ,  however , can उपयोग a ब्लू  Intelligent Systems Nitro Emulator box to flash cards .
These devices are also known  as `` flashcarts  '' or `` flashcards '' .
There are two main classes of flashcarts : older devices which fit in Slot-2 ( the Game Boy Advance Game Pak slot ) and newer devices that fit in  slot-1 ( the ds खेल कार्ड  slot ) .
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due to economies of scale ( inherited from their use with Game Boy Advance ) , but require a booting tool  in Slot-1 in  order to use the touch screen and other DS features .
Second-generation devices ( those which only use Slot-1 ) do not work with GBA  homebrew , लकिन became कम महंगी और  easier to use , rivaling many Slot-2 devices in price .
First-generation  डिवाइस शामिल gba फ्लैश कारतूस  , GBAMP CF , SuperCard , and M3 .
Second-generation devices include R4  क्रान्ति  , CycloDS , G6 Real and DS-X .
The storage device either contains flash memory or a slot for a  मेमोरी  card to store homebrew .
Storage devices with a  memory-card स्लॉट  usually have more storage capacity than flash-memory devices .
Although flash-memory capacity is usually measured in megabits ( Mb ) ,  memory-card क्षमता  is usually measured in megabytes ( MB ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ) .
Storage-device brands differ in their support for homebrew ; DS and Game Boy Advance ROMs ; special  सुविधाएँ ( ऐसे as क्षमता to खेल मीडिया फाइलें  ) ; physical size and cost .
Strictly speaking , a storage device is not necessary for DS  साथ flashme संस्थापित क्युकी  homebrew can be sent to the DS using WMB .
However , this is not an  easily-portable विधि क्युकी the ds  needs to be within range of a suitable Wi-Fi card .
are American people of Japanese  विरासत  .
Japanese Americans have historically been among the three largest Asian American communities , but in recent  दशकों , it रै  become the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286 , including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity .
In the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी , the  largest Japanese American communities were found in California with 272,528 , Hawaii with 185,502 , New York with 37,780 , Washington with 35,008 , and Illinois with 17,542 .
Southern California  रै the largest  Japanese-American population in North America .

This is a comprehensive listing which  हाइलाइट significant उपलब्धियाँ  and milestones based upon Billboard magazine 's singles charts , most notably the Billboard Hot 100 .
इस सूची spans इससे the  issue dated January 1 , 1955 to present .
The  बिलबोर्ड hot 100 began साथ the समस्या दिनाँक अगस्त 4 , 1958 , और is फिलहाल the मानक लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक चार्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य .
Prior to the creation of the Hot 100 , Billboard published four singles charts : `` Best Sellers in Stores '' , `` Most Played  by jockeys '' , `` सबसे निभाई in jukeboxes  '' and `` The Top 100 '' .
These charts , which ranged from 20 to 100 slots , were phased out at different times  between 1957 और 1958  .
Though technically not part of the Hot 100 chart history , their data is included for computational purposes , and to  avoid unenlightening  or misleading characterizations .
सब वस्तुएं सूचीबद्ध  below are from the Hot 100 era , unless otherwise noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ) .
V is an American   science fiction television series that ran for two seasons on ABC , from November 3 , 2009 to March 15 , 2011 .
A remake of the 1983 miniseries created by Kenneth Johnson , the new series chronicles the arrival on Earth of a  technologically उन्नत एलियन प्रजाति  which ostensibly comes in peace , but actually has sinister motives .
V stars Morena Baccarin , Lourdes Benedicto , Morris Chestnut , Joel Gretsch ,  लोगन huffman , चार्ल्स mesure , एलिज़ाबेथ मिशेल  , Laura Vandervoort and Scott Wolf , and was executive produced by Scott Rosenbaum , Yves Simoneau , Scott Peters , and Jace Hall .
The series was produced by The Scott Peters Company , HDFilms  और warner भाईs.  Television .
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational activity , in which the  भागीदार उपयोग a वैश्विक positioning प्रणाली ( gps ) receiver  or mobile device and other navigational techniques to hide and seek containers , called `` geocaches '' or `` caches '' , anywhere in the world .
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook where the  geocacher enters  the date they found it and signs it with their established code name .
After signing into the log , the  संचय जरूर be  placed back exactly where the person found it .
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers ( Tupperware or similar ) or ammunition boxes can also contain items for  व्यापार , प्रायः खिलौने or trinkets of छोटी  value .
Geocaching  साझा अनेक पहलुओं साथ benchmarking , trigpointing  , orienteering , treasure-hunting , letterboxing , and waymarking .
Boogie Down Productions was a hip hop group that was originally  रचित of krs-one , d-nice , और  DJ Scott La Rock .
DJ Scott La Rock was murdered on August 27  , 1987 ,  months after the release of BDP 's debut album , Criminal Minded .
The name of the group , Boogie Down , derives from a nickname for the South Bronx section of The Bronx , one   of the five boroughs of New York City .
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae and hip hop music and their debut LP Criminal Minded contained frank descriptions of life in the South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting the  स्टेज लिये कया होता आखिरकार become gangsta  rap .
A municipal bond is a bond issued by a local government  , or उनके  agencies .
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states , cities , counties , redevelopment agencies , special-purpose districts , school districts , public utility districts , publicly owned  एयरपोर्ट और seaports , और कोई अन्य सरकारी एंटिटी ( or समूह of सरकारें  ) at or below the state level .
Municipal bonds may be general obligations of  the जारीकर्ता or secured  by specified revenues .
In the United States , interest income received by  धारकों of नगरपालिका bonds is प्रायः  exempt from the federal income tax and from the income tax of the state in which they are issued , although municipal bonds issued for certain purposes may not be tax exempt .
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the deal is sold , municipal bonds are free to trade at any time  एकबार वे हैं खरीदा by the  investor .
Professional traders regularly trade  and  retrade the same bonds several times a week .
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' is a song written by Steve Winwood , Spencer Davis and Muff Winwood , and originally  performed by the स्पेंसर डेविस समूह  .
The basic riff of the song was borrowed from the Homer Banks song `` ( Ai n't  कि ) a लॉट of प्रेम '' ,  written by Banks and Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker .
`` Gim me Some Lovin ' '' was a UK # 2 in the Autumn of  1966 और a us  # 7 .
The song is  क्रमित # 247 on the रोलिंग  Stone magazine 's list of The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time .
The version issued in the UK ( and probably most of Europe ) is different from  कि जारी  in the US on the United Artists label , being slower , and lacking the backing vocals and `` live sounding '' performance found on the US single .
( The US version has more often been used on reissue   CDs , even those coming from Europe . )
The single features the sound of the Hammond  b-3 अंग  .
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of information  सम्बन्धित to films ,  television programs , and video games .
This includes actors , production crew  कर्मियों , और fictional  characters featured in these three visual entertainment media .
It is one of the most popular online entertainment destinations , with over 100 million unique  उपयोक्ता प्रत्येक माह और a ठोस और  rapidly growing mobile presence .
IMDb was launched on October 17 , 1990 , and in 1998  थी acquired  by Amazon.com .
As of April 27 , 2013 , IMDb had 2,503,783 titles (  शामिल एपीसोड ) और 5,192,493  personalities in its database , as well as 43 million registered users .
The  जालस्थल  has an Alexa rank of 48 .
Fibre Channel Host Bus  एडाप्टर ( 64-bit pci-x  card )
scsi  Host Bus Adapter ( 16-bit ISA card )
In computer hardware , a host controller , host adapter , or host bus adapter ( HBA ) connects a host system ( the computer ) to other network  और भंडार डिवाइस  .
The terms are primarily used to  refer to डिवाइस  for connecting SCSI , Fibre Channel and eSATA devices .
However , devices for connecting to IDE , Ethernet , FireWire , USB and other systems may also be   called host adapters .
Recently , the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel  over ईथरनेट  has brought about Ethernet HBAs , which are different from Ethernet NICs in that they include TCP Offload Engines .
There are also converged HBAs that support both Ethernet and  fibre  Channel called Converged Network Adapters ( CNAs ) .
Cashmere  स्कार्फ
Modern  मेन  's cashmere sweaters for sale .
cashmere ऊन , प्रायः  simply known as cashmere , is a fiber obtained from Cashmere goats and other types of goat .
The word cashmere derives from an old  स्पेलिंग of काश्मीर  .
Cashmere is fine in texture , strong , light , and  नरम  .
Garments made from it provide  बेहतरीन इन्सुलेशन  .
In the United States , under the U.S . Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 , as amended , ( 15 Uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ) , states that a wool or textile product may not be labeled as  containing cashmere  unless:
such wool product is the fine ( dehaired ) undercoat  मछली उत्पादित by a  cashmere goat ( Capra hircus laniger ) ;
the average  व्यास  of the fiber of such wool product does not exceed 19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain more than 3 percent ( by weight ) of cashmere  fibers  with average diameters that exceed 30 microns .
The average fiber diameter may be subject to a coefficient of variation around  the औसत कि  shall not exceed 24 percent .
Jennifer  convertibles inc.  is the owner and licensor of sofabed and leather specialty retail stores in the United States , with stores located throughout the Eastern seaboard , in the Midwest , on the West Coast and in the Southwest .
The company  थी संस्थापित  in 1975 and is based in Woodbury , New York .
On July 19 , 2010 , the company announced that it had filed for bankruptcy  as a consequence  of `` substantial losses '' .
According to Furniture Today the company was number 48 among  फर्नीचर रिटेलर साथ  US $ 114 million in sales for the year ending August 29 , 2009 .
It subsequently emerged from Chapter 11  अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल  of its major supplier , the Haining Mengnu Group .
Egg roll is a  पद प्रयुक्त लिये  many different foods around the world .
2__Egg_roll __ Varieties of egg rolls are found in mainland China , many  chinese-speaking  regions of Asia , and Chinese immigrant communities around the world .
Egg rolls as referred  to in चीन  .
In Guangdong and Hong Kong , egg roll usually refers to biscuit   roll .
This is a  प्रकार of  biscuit .
The ingredient included egg  , आटा और शुगर  .
Egg roll also  is a डिश  in Canton and Hong Kong , this is usually made with vegetable .
Within China egg rolls are eaten predominantly in the southeast and are not as  commonly  consumed in the north and western parts of China .
In American Chinese cuisine , an egg  फेंकें is a savory  dish typically served as an appetizer .
It is usually stuffed with chicken , pork or shrimp , cabbage  , गाजर , टमाटर  , bean sprouts and other vegetables , and then deep fried .
This variety of the egg roll is very common  और लोकप्रिय , आरपार भी क्षेत्रीय किस्में of  American Chinese food , and is often included as part of a `` combination platter '' .
in मॉन्ट्रियल , कनाडा  , open-ended eggrolls are a Jewish-Chinese fusion dish .
They can  be either  kosher certified or merely kosher style .
पीड़ा और कष्ट  is the legal term for the physical and emotional stress caused from an injury ( see also pain and suffering ) .
Some damages that might be under this category would be : aches , temporary and permanent  सीमाएं on कार्यकलाप ,  potential shortening of life , depression or scarring .
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury , it is common for  किसी to तलाश धन दोनो in मुआवजे  for actual money that is lost and for the pain and stress associated with virtually any injury .
In a suit , pain and suffering is part of the `` general damages '' section of the claimant 's claim , or ,  alternatively , it is an तत्व of  `` compensatory '' non-economic damages that allows recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress .
Apart from money damages awarded in trial  , धन क्षतिपूर्ति हैं भी दिए informally  outside the judicial system in mediations , arbitration ( both of which may be court annexed or non litigated claims ) as well as in routine insurance settlements .
Individual claimants or those  represented  by lawyers often present demands to insurers to settle for money .
These demand for bodily  चोट मुआवजे monies  often set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings .
Demands are usually written summaries  of a claimant 's चिकित्सा  care and the facts which resulted in the injury .
Sample of a Medallion   signature guarantee stampIn
the United States and Canada , a  medallion  signature guarantee is a special signature guarantee for the transfer of securities .
It is a guarantee by the transferring  वित्तीय संस्था कि the हस्ताक्षर  is genuine and the financial institution accepts liability for any forgery .
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing unauthorized  हस्तांतरण  and possible investor losses .
They also limit the liability of the transfer agent who  स्वीकृत the प्रमाणपत्र  .
Different institutions have different policies as to what type of  पहचान वे आवश्यकता to provide the  guarantee and whether they charge a fee for such service ( usually nominal if any ) .
Most institutions will  नहीं गारंटी a हस्ताक्षर of किसी  who has not already been their customer .
A medallion signature guarantee is not the same as an  acknowledgment by a नोटरी पब्लिक  , in the sense that a `` signature guarantee '' is a certification by the institution that the signature is authentic , and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting that the signer signed a document voluntarily .
Some banks may no longer provide this service , however , many still do as well as other financial institutions such as a Savings  और  Loans and Credit Unions .
At their sole discretion  , ये  institutions may still decline to provide the Medallion Signature Guarantees .
When US citizens are abroad , some financial institutions may accept United States Embassy  seals  , in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp .
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars stacked  at a junkyard on टर्मिनल  Island , Los Angeles County , California , March 1956
The General Motors streetcar conspiracy ( also known as the Great American streetcar scandal ) refers to allegations and convictions in relation to a program by General Motors ( GM ) and other companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in  अनेक अमरीकी  cities .
Between 1936 and 1950 , National City Lines and Pacific City Lines —with investment from GM , Firestone Tire , Standard Oil of California , Phillips Petroleum ,  mack ट्रक ,  and the Federal Engineering Corporation—bought over 100 electric surface-traction systems in 45 cities including Baltimore , Newark , Los Angeles , New York City , Oakland and San Diego and converted them into bus operation .
अनेक of the कंपनियाँ शामिल यहूद convicted in 1949 of षड्यंत्र to monopolize अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स लकिन यहूद acquitted of conspiring to monopolize the स्वामित्व of ये कंपनियाँ .
Some suggest that this  program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities  across the United States ; notably Edwin J. Quinby , who first drew attention to the program in 1946 , and then Bradford C. Snell , an anti-trust attorney for the United States Senate whose controversial 1974 testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national awareness .
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate destruction of streetcars was part of a larger strategy to push  the संयुक्त राज्य into ऑटोमोबाइल  dependency .
Others say that independent economic factors brought about changes in the transit system , including the Great Depression , the Public Utility Holding Company Act of 1935 , labor unrest , market forces , rapidly increasing traffic congestion ,  शहरी sprawl , कराधान नीतियों कि favored निजी गाडी स्वामित्व  , and general enthusiasm for the automobile .
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and others fell into  simplistic षड्यंत्र  theory thinking , bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` Clearly , GM waged a war on electric traction .
It was indeed an all out assault , but by no means the  सिंगल  reason for the failure of rapid transit .
Also , it is just as clear that actions and inactions by government contributed significantly to the elimination  of  electric traction . ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving effective rail-based urban transport systems based   on streetcars or trams , including Newark , Philadelphia , San Francisco , Pittsburgh , and Boston ; others are re-introducing them .
The story has been explored several times in print , film and other media , notably in Who  framed रोजर  Rabbit , Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia .
Corwin House , Salem ,  मैसाचुसेट्स  , built ca . 1660 , First Period English
American colonial architecture includes several building design styles  संबद्ध साथ the औपनिवेशिक काल of the संयुक्त राज्य  , including First Period English ( late-medieval ) , French Colonial , Spanish Colonial , Dutch Colonial and Georgian .
These styles are associated with the   houses , churches and government buildings of the period from about 1600 through the 19th century .
`` In  the मनोदशा '' is a बिग बैंड era #  1 hit recorded by American bandleader Glenn Miller .
It topped the  चार्ट in  1940 in the U.S. and one year later was featured in the movie Sun Valley Serenade .
In 1999 , National Public Radio ( NPR ) included the  1939 ग्लेन  Miller recording on RCA Bluebird on the NPR 100 , the list of `` The 100 most important American musical works of the 20th century '' .
NEPTUNE  लोगो
The NEPTUNE Canada  प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s पहला  regional-scale underwater ocean observatory that plugs directly into the Internet .
Since December 2009 , it has allowed people to `` surf ''  the seafloor जबकि  ocean scientists run deep-water experiments from labs and universities around the world .
Along with its sister project ,  शुक्र , वरुण  offers a unique approach to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or  space-based satellites to carry  out their research , while the NEPTUNE project uses a remotely operated crawler .
A gramophone record , commonly known as a phonograph record ( in American English ) , vinyl record ( in reference to vinyl , the  सामग्री सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त बाद परिचय 1950 ) , or colloquially , ``  a record '' , is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed , modulated spiral groove .
The groove usually starts near the  periphery और  ends near the center of the disc .
Phonograph records are generally described by their diameter in inches ( 12-inch , 10-inch , 7-inch , etc . ) , the rotational speed at which they are played ( `` 33 rpm `` , `` 78 '' , `` 45 '' , etc . ) , their time capacity ( `` long playing '' ) , their reproductive accuracy , or `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '' ,  `` orthophonic '' , ``  full-range '' , etc . ) , and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono `` , `` stereo `` , `` quadraphonic `` , etc . ) .
Phonograph records were the primary medium used for music reproduction for most of the 20th century , replacing the phonograph cylinder  , साथ जिससे it था co-existed  , by the 1920s .
By the late 1980s , digital media  had  gained a larger market share , and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991 .
They continue to be  manufactured और  sold in the 21st century .
In 2008 , nearly 2.9 million units shipped , the most in any year  चूंकि 1998 और the स्वरूप रै जारी  to slowly regain popularity .
They are  विशेषकर प्रयुक्त by  DJs and audiophiles for many types of music .
As of 2013 , vinyl records continue to be used for  वितरण  .
