The population was 1,952 at  the 2010  census .
Charles John Huffam  डिकेंस (  ; 7 February 1812 – 9 June 1870 ) was an English writer and social critic .
He created some of the world 's  सबसे यादगार fictional  characters and is generally regarded as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period .
During his life  , उसके works enjoyed  unprecedented fame , and by the twentieth century his literary genius was broadly acknowledged by critics and scholars .
उसके novels और छोटी  stories continue to be widely popular .
Born in Portsmouth , England ,  डिकेंस बाएँ स्कूल  to work in a factory after his father was thrown into debtors ' prison .
Although he had   little formal education , his early impoverishment drove him to succeed .
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years , wrote 15 novels , 5 novellas and hundreds of short stories and non-fiction articles ,  lectured और performed extensively , थी  an indefatigable letter writer , and campaigned vigorously for children 's rights , education , and other social reforms .
Dickens sprang to fame with the  1836 सीरियल  publication of The Pickwick Papers .
Within a few years he had become an international  साहित्यिक  celebrity , famous for his humour , satire , and keen observation of character and society .
His novels , most published in monthly or weekly instalments , pioneered the serial publication of narrative fiction , which became the dominant  विक्टोरियन विधि लिये अनोखा प्रकाशन  .
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's reaction , and he often modified his plot and character development based on such  प्रतिक्रिया  .
लिये उदाहरण , जब उसके बीवी 's chiropodist expressed तकलीफ at the रास्ता मिस mowcher in दाउद कॉपरफील्ड लगा to प्रतिबिंबित उसके disabilities , डिकेंस गई on to improve the अक्षर साथ धनात्मक lineaments  .
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence Ikey Solomon ; His caricature of  leigh हंट in the फिगर of mr skimpole in bleak हाउस थी likewise  toned down on advice from some of his friends , as they read episodes .
In the same novel , both Lawrence Boythorne and Mooney the beadle are drawn from real life –  boythorne इससे वाल्टर जंगली landor  and Mooney from 'Looney ' , a beadle at Salisbury Square .
His plots were carefully constructed , and  डिकेंस प्रायः wove in तत्व इससे topical कार्यक्रम  into his narratives .
Masses of the illiterate  ग़रीब chipped in ha'pennies  to have each new monthly episode read to them , opening up and inspiring a new class of readers .
Dickens was regarded as the  साहित्यिक colossus of  his age .
उसके 1843 novella , a क्रिसमस कैरोल , is एक of the सबसे influential works कभी लिखा , और it remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations in प्रत्येक कलाकारी  genre .
His creative genius has  महरूम praised by fellow writers—from  Leo Tolstoy to G. K. Chesterton and George Orwell —for its realism , comedy , prose style , unique characterisations , and social criticism .
On the other hand Oscar Wilde , Henry James and Virginia Woolf  complained  of a lack of psychological depth , loose writing , and a vein of saccharine sentimentalism .
Martin Luther King and other civil rights  नेताओ in सामने  of the statue of Abraham Lincoln , August 28 , 1963
The civil rights movement was a series of worldwide political movements for equality before the  विधि कि peaked  in the 1960s .
In many situations it took the form of campaigns of civil  प्रतिरोध aimed  at achieving change by nonviolent forms of resistance .
In some situations it was accompanied , or followed , by civil  अशांति और हथियारबंद विद्रोह  .
The process was long and tenuous in many countries , and many of  ये आंदोलनों किया नहीं fully achieve उनके  goals although , the efforts of these movements did lead to improvements in the legal rights of previously oppressed groups of people .
The main aim of the civil rights movement included , and include , ensuring that the rights of all people are equally protected by the law , including the rights  of  minorities .
Civil  अधिकारों आंदोलनों ranging इससे the  global LGBT rights movement to the global Women 's rights movement to various racial minority rights movements around the world continue .
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was the 19th FIFA World Cup , the world  चैंपियनशिप लिये मेन  's national association football teams .
It took  प्लेस in दक्षिण  Africa from 11 June to 11 July 2010 .
The bidding process for hosting the tournament finals was open only to African nations ; in 2004 , the international football federation , FIFA  , चयनित दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी over मिश्र और मोरक्को to become  the first African nation to host the finals .
The matches were played  in ten  stadiums in nine host cities around the country , with the final played at the Soccer City stadium in South Africa 's largest city , Johannesburg .
Thirty-two teams were selected for participation via a worldwide  योग्यता टूर्नामेंट  that began in August 2007 .
In the first round of the tournament finals , the teams competed in round-robin groups of four teams for points , with the top two teams in each group  proceeding  .
These sixteen  टीमों उन्नत to the नॉकआउट  stage , where three rounds of play decided which teams would participate in the final .
In the final , Spain , the European champions , defeated third-time finalists the Netherlands 1–0 after extra time , with Andrés Iniesta 's goal in the 116th minute  giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार शीर्षक , बनने the आठवीं स्वदेश to जीत the टूर्नामेंट , और the पहला यूरोपीय स्वदेश to जीत the टूर्नामेंट बाहर  its home continent .
Host nation  दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , 2006  world champions Italy and 2006 runners-up France were all eliminated in the first round of the tournament .
It was the first time that the hosts were eliminated in the first  गोलाकार  .
New Zealand with their three draws were the only undefeated team in the tournament , but were also eliminated in the  first  round .
The McMuffin is a family of breakfast sandwiches in various sizes and configurations , sold by the  fast-food  restaurant chain McDonald 's .
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast sandwich ; it was invented by the late McDonald 's franchisee Herb Peterson in the late 1960s  और थी introduced देशभर  in 1972 .
जॉन लेनन थी an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार  who gained worldwide fame as one of the founders of The Beatles , for his subsequent solo career , and for his political activism and pacifism .
he थी  shot by Mark David Chapman at the entrance of the building where he lived , The Dakota , in New York City on 8 December 1980 .
Lennon had just returned from Record Plant  स्टुडियो साथ उसके  wife , Yoko Ono .
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center , where it was stated that nobody could have lived for more than a few minutes after  sustaining  such injuries .
Shortly after local news stations reported Lennon 's death , crowds gathered at Roosevelt Hospital  और in सामने  of the Dakota .
Lennon was cremated on 10 December 1980 at the Ferncliff Cemetery in Hartsdale , New York ; the ashes were given to Ono , who chose not  to  hold a funeral for him .
The first report of Lennon 's death to a U.S. national  दर्शक थी घोषित by हावर्ड cosell ,  on ABC 's Monday Night Football .
New Orleans (  or , locally or  ; ) is a major United States port and the largest city and metropolitan area in the state of Louisiana .
The population of the  नगर थी 343,829  as of the 2010 U.S. Census .
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a  जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और थी the 46th largest  in the United States .
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa Combined Statistical Area , a larger trading area  , था a 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans ,  a city located on the Loire River in  Centre , France , and is well known for its distinct French Creole architecture , as well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage .
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine , music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz ) , and its annual  जश्न और त्यौहार , सबसे  notably Mardi Gras .
The city is often  referred to as the `` सबसे अद्वितीय  '' in America .
New Orleans is located in   southeastern Louisiana , straddling the Mississippi River .
The  नगर  and Orleans Parish ( ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to the north ,  st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट , plaquemines  to the south and Jefferson to the south and west .
Lake  pontchartrain  , part of which is included in the city limits , lies to the north and Lake Borgne lies to the east .
The United States presidential election of 1968 was the 46th quadrennial presidential election  , आयोजित on मंगलवार  , November 5 , 1968 .
The Republican nominee , former Vice-President  रिचर्ड निक्सन , जीती  the election over the Democratic nominee , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a campaign that  promised to restore विधि  and order to the nation 's cities , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning  चुनाव  as it permanently disrupted the New Deal Coalition that had dominated presidential politics for 36 years .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson won in a historic landslide , the election saw  the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a  Republican elected for the first time in twelve years .
It was a wrenching national experience , conducted during a year of violence that included the assassination of civil rights leader Martin Luther King , Jr. , and subsequent race riots across the nation , the assasination of Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy , widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses , and violent confrontations between police and  anti-war प्रदर्शनकारियों at the 1968 लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल सम्मेलन as the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी  split again and again .
The election featured the strongest third party effort since  1912 by  former Alabama Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal  हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त स्कूल  segregation , he carried the Deep South and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This was the last election in which New York had the most votes in the  चुनावी  college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census  , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  gained the most electoral votes and has remained the most populous state since then .
This is the latest election where a presidential ticket won without carrying the vice  अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी  's home state .
Karak ( ; also  ज्ञात as garak , garrak  , and Gorg ) is a village in Gamasiyab Rural District , in the Central District of Nahavand County , Hamadan Province , Iran .
At the 2006  जनसांख्यिकी ,  its population was 294 , in 65 families .
Kurt 's  हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 – April 5 , 1994 ) was an American musician and artist , best  ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर , guitarist और  primary songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with Krist Novoselic in Aberdeen , Washington in 1985 and established it as part of the Seattle music scene , having its debut album Bleach released on the independent  रिकार्ड लेबल sub  Pop in 1989 .
After  हस्ताक्षर  with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with `` Smells Like Teen Spirit `` from its second album Nevermind ( 1991 ) .
Following the success of Nevermind , Nirvana was  labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी x  , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and frustrated , believing his message and artistic  दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted  by the public , with his personal issues often subject to media attention .
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its final studio  एल्बम  In Utero ( 1993 ) .
During the  पिछला सालो of उसके जीवन ,  Cobain struggled with heroin addiction , illness and depression .
he भी था परेशानी coping साथ उसके कीर्ति और पब्लिक चित्र , और the पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी , संगीतकार कोर्टनी प्रेम .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was found  मुर्दे at उसके घर in सिएटल  , the victim of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The circumstances of his death at age 27 have  become  a topic of public fascination and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana , with Cobain  as a songwriter , रै बेची  over 25 million albums in the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .
A  millwright is  a craftsman or tradesman engaged with the construction and maintenance of machinery .
More generally in the English speaking  संसार , जल्दी  millwrights were specialist carpenters who erected machines used in agriculture , food processing and processing lumber and paper .
In the early part of the Industrial Revolution , their skills were pressed  into  service building the earliest powered textile mills .
Modern millwrights work  साथ स्टील  and other materials in addition to wood and must often combine the skills of several skilled trades in order to successfully fabricate industrial machinery or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated parts .
The modern millwright must also be able to read  blueprints और अन्य schematics to सहायता  him in the construction of complex systems .
Millwrights are frequently unionized , with around 45 % unionized in the US , although experienced millwrights often set themselves up as independent  ठेकेदारों  .
The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011 American romantic action thriller film loosely based on the  फिलिप K.  Dick short story , `` Adjustment Team `` .
The film was written and directed by George Nolfi and stars Matt  डैमन और एमिली  Blunt .
The   cast also includes Anthony Mackie , John Slattery , Michael Kelly , and Terence Stamp .
The score was composed by Thomas Newman , with two songs by Richard Ashcroft ( `` Future 's Bright '' for the opening sequence ; `` Are You  तैयार ? ''  for the closing credits ) .
सोडियम  azide is the inorganic compound with the formula NaN3 .
This  colorless  salt is the gas-forming component in many car airbag systems .
It is used for the preparation of other  azide यौगिकों  .
It is an ionic  पदार्थ , is अत्यधिक  soluble in water , and is very acutely toxic .
Double rainbow  और supernumerary  rainbows on the inside of the primary arc .
The shadow of the photographer 's head on  the bottom  marks the centre of the rainbow circle ( antisolar point ) .
A rainbow is an  ऑप्टिकल और meteorological घटना  that is caused by reflection of light in water droplets in the Earth 's atmosphere , resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky .
It takes the form of a  multicoloured  arc .
Rainbows caused by sunlight always appear in the section of sky  सीधे विपरीत the  sun .
In a `` primary rainbow '' , the arc  shows रेड on the  outer part and violet on the inner side .
This rainbow  is caused by  light being refracted while entering a droplet of water , then reflected inside on the back of the droplet and refracted again when leaving it .
In a double rainbow , a second arc is seen outside the primary arc , and has the order of its colours reversed , red facing  toward the अन्य एक , in  both rainbows .
This second rainbow is caused by light  reflecting twice अंदर  water droplets .
The Conservative Party , officially the Conservative and  यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी और  colloquially referred to as the Tory Party or the Tories , is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and British unionism .
it is the largest political party in the United Kingdom , being the largest single party in the House of Commons with 303 MPs , the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors , and  the largest अंग्रेजों पार्टी in the  European Parliament with 25 MEPs .
It governs in coalition with the  Liberal  Democrats , with party leader David Cameron as Prime Minister .
the रूढ़िवादी पार्टी थी संस्थापित in 1834 , और थी एक of दो प्रबल पार्टियों in the 19th सदी , साथ साथ the उदार पार्टी .
It changed its name to the  रूढ़िवादी और यूनियनिस्ट  Party in 1912 after merging with the Liberal Unionist Party , although that name is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party .
In the 1920s ,  the उदार vote greatly diminished  and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals .
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57  सालो of the 20th सदी , सहित विंस्टन चर्चिल (  1940–45 , 1951–55 ) and Margaret Thatcher ( 1979–90 ) .
थैचर 's कार्यकाल led to wide-ranging  economic liberalisation and saw the Conservatives become the most eurosceptic of the three major parties .
The party  थी लौटे to सरकारी in गठबन्धन  , having failed to win a majority , in 2010 under the more `` liberal '' leadership of David Cameron .
In the European Parliament , the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs , who sit with the soft eurosceptic European Conservatives  and Reformists ( ECR )  parliamentary group , while the party itself is a member of the Alliance of European Conservatives and Reformists ( AECR ) Europarty .
They are the third-largest party in the Scottish Parliament and  second-largest in  the Welsh Assembly .
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as part of the Ulster Conservatives and Unionists arrangement , with the UUP currently participating  in the  five-party Northern Ireland Executive .
नियति 's चाइल्ड थी an अमरीकी  R & B girl group whose final , and perhaps most recognizable , line-up comprised Beyoncé Knowles , Kelly Rowland and Michelle Williams .
Formed in 1990 in Houston , Texas , Destiny 's Child members began their musical endeavors as Girl 's Tyme comprising , among  अन्य , नॉलेस , rowland , latavia roberson  and LeToya Luckett .
After years of  सीमित कामयाबी ,  they were signed to Columbia Records as Destiny 's Child .
Destiny 's Child was launched into  mainstream recognition following the release of their  best-selling second album , The Writing 's on the Wall , which contained the number-one singles `` Bills , Bills , Bills `` and `` Say My Name `` .
Despite critical and commercial success , the group was plagued  by  internal conflict and legal turmoil , as Roberson and Luckett attempted to split from the group 's manager Mathew Knowles , citing favoritism of Knowles and Rowland , his daughter and niece , respectively .
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with Williams and Farrah Franklin ; however , in 2000  , फ्रैंकलिन थी बर्खास्त  , leaving them as a trio .
Their third album , Survivor , which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience , contains the  विश्वव्यापी हिट्स `` स्वतंत्र महिलाओं `` ,  `` Survivor `` and `` Bootylicious `` .
In  2002 , वे घोषित  a hiatus and re-united two years later for the release of their fourth studio album , Destiny Fulfilled ( 2004 ) .
Destiny 's  चाइल्ड रै  sold more than 50 million records worldwide to date .
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the greatest musical trios of all time , the ninth most successful artist/band of the 2000s , and placed  the समूह 68th in इसके all-time hot 100 कलाकारों सूची in 2008  .
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United  राज्य संघीय एजेंसी अंतर्गत  the Department of Health and Human Services headquartered in Druid Hills , unincorporated DeKalb County , Georgia , in Greater Atlanta .
It works to protect public health and safety by providing  सूचना  to enhance health decisions , and it promotes health through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations .
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially infectious  diseases and foodborne pathogens and other  microbial infections ) , environmental health , occupational safety and health , health promotion , injury prevention and education activities designed to improve the health of the people of the United States .
The CDC is the United States '  नेशनल पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य संस्थान  and is a founding member of the International Association of National Public Health Institutes .
Earthquake prediction `` is usually defined as the specification of the time , location , and  परिमाण of a भविष्य भूकंप  within stated limits '' , and particularly of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region . ''
This can be distinguished from earthquake forecasting , which is the probabilistic assessment of general earthquake hazard , including the frequency and magnitude of damaging earthquakes , in a given  क्षेत्रफल over अवधि of सालो or दशकों  .
This can be further distinguished from real-time earthquake warning  प्रणालियों , जिससे , upon डिटेक्शन of a कठोर भूकंप , can provide  neighboring regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking .
To be useful , an earthquake prediction must be precise enough to warrant the cost of increased precautions , including disruption of ordinary activities  और कॉमर्स , और सामयिक पर्याप्त कि तैयारी  can be made .
Predictions must also be reliable , as false alarms and cancelled alarms are not only economically costly , but seriously undermine confidence in , and thereby  the प्रभावकारिता of , कोई दयालु of चेतावनी .
With  over 7,000 भूकंप around the संसार प्रत्येक साल साथ a परिमाण of 4.0 or वृहद , नगण्य कामयाबी  in earthquake prediction is easily obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of time , location , or magnitude .
However , such trivial `` successful  पूर्वानुमान '' हैं नहीं उपयोगी  .
प्रमुख भूकंप हैं प्रायः followed  by reports that they were predicted , or at least anticipated , but no claim of a successful prediction of a major earthquake has survived close inquiry .
In  the  1970s there was intense optimism amongst scientists that some method of predicting earthquakes might be found , but by the 1990s continuing failure led many scientists to question whether it was even possible .
जबकि अनेक वैज्ञानिकों  still hold that , given enough resources , prediction might be possible , many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible .
Deborah Ann `` Debby '' Ryan ( born May 13 , 1993 ) is an American actress ,  सिंगर  , musician , songwriter and record producer .
Ryan is  बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as बेली  Pickett in the Disney Channel Original Series The Suite Life on Deck .
In 2008 , The Suite Life on Deck ranked as TV 's top series among kids 6-11 and the  no . 2 scripted श्रेणी among  tweens 9-14 .
Ryan  प्रारंभ एक्टिंग in पेशेवर थिएटर at  the age of seven ; in 2007 she appeared in the Barney & Friends straight-to-DVD film Barney : Let 's Go to the Firehouse and then was discovered in a nationwide search by Disney .
She is also known for appearing in the 2008 feature film  the longshots  as Edith .
In 2009 , she guest starred in an episode of Wizards of Waverly Place in Wizards on Deck with Hannah  मोंटाना as बेली पिकेट साथ साथ उसके  other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck .
Then , in 2010 ,  वो स्ट्रक्चर in the फिल्मी 16 बधाइयां  , which was the most watched cable program on the day of its premiere on the Disney Channel .
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ; the movie received high viewership in the adults demographic (   18-34 ) .
Soon after that , Ryan starred in the  स्वतंत्र नाट्य फिल्मी  , What If ... , which premiered on August 20 , 2010 .
Ryan also  स्ट्रक्चर  in the new Disney Channel Original movie , Radio Rebel , where she portrays the role of Tara Adams , a shy 17-year-old girl who adopts the radio personality , Radio Rebel .
Released  फ़रवरी  17 , 2012 .
Ryan stars  in the titular  role in the Disney Channel Original Series , Jessie .
Stührling Tourbillon  गति ( ) .
In horology , a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an addition  to the यांत्रिकी  of a watch escapement .
Developed around 1795 by the French-Swiss watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet from an earlier idea by the English chronometer maker John Arnold , a tourbillon aims to counter the effects of gravity by mounting the  escapement और संतुलन व्हील in a घूर्णन पिंजरा , to negate  the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position .
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy , tourbillons are still included in some expensive modern watches as a novelty and demonstration  of watchmaking  virtuosity .
The mechanism is  प्रायः  exposed on the watch 's face to show it off .
The Windows Installer ( previously known as Microsoft Installer ) is a software component used for the  संस्थापना  , maintenance , and removal of software on modern Microsoft Windows systems .
The installation information , and often the files themselves , are packaged in installation packages , loosely  रिलेशनल databases  structured as COM Structured Storages and commonly known as `` MSI files '' , from their default file extension .
Windows Installer contains  significant परिवर्तन  from its predecessor , Setup API .
New  सुविधाएँ शामिल  a GUI framework and automatic generation of the uninstallation sequence .
Windows Installer is  positioned as an वैकल्पिक to  stand-alone executable installer frameworks such as older versions of InstallShield and NSIS .
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows Installer as the basis for installation  frameworks , so कि वे synchronize correctly  with other installers and keep the internal database of installed products consistent .
Important features such as rollback and versioning depend on a consistent  आतंरिक डेटाबेस  for reliable operation .
Furthermore , Windows Installer facilitates the principle of  तनिक विशेषाधिकार by performing तन्त्र  installations by proxy for unprivileged users .
Four Loko is a line of  alcoholic  beverages , originally marketed as energy drinks , sold by Phusion Projects of Chicago , Illinois .
Phusion operates  as पेय चार  Brewing Company .
Four Loko  , the कम्पनी  's most popular beverage , debuted in the United States market in 2005 .
It is now sold in 48 states , and in Canada  , the बहामा  , Bolivia , Honduras , and Europe .
the नाम `` चार '' is निकला  from the original energy drink 's four main ingredients : alcohol , caffeine , taurine , and guarana .
Four branded  products have been the  object of legal , ethical , and health concerns related to the company allegedly marketing them to the underaged and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine .
After the beverage was banned in several states , a product reintroduction in December 2010 removed caffeine , taurine , and guarana as ingredients , and the malt  पेय is  no longer marketed as an energy drink .
the गर्दन of a गिटार प्रर्दशित the नट  ( in the background , coloured white ) and first four metal frets .
A fret is a raised element on the  गर्दन  of a stringed instrument .
Frets usually extend  आरपार the  full width of the neck .
On most modern western fretted instruments , frets are metal strips inserted into the  fingerboard  .
On some historical instruments and non-European instruments ,  frets हैं बना of टुकड़े  of string tied around the neck .
Frets divide the neck into fixed  खण्ड at intervals  related to a musical framework .
On instruments such as guitars , each fret represents  एक semitone  in the standard western system where one octave is divided into twelve semitones .
Fret is often used as a verb ,  अर्थ  simply `` to press down the string behind a fret . ''
Fretting often refers to the   frets and/or their system of placement .
There was consumption of alcohol both  दौरान और बाद  prohibition .
The 18th Amendment prohibited the production , distribution and sale of alcoholic beverages in  the संयुक्त राज्य और थी  widely supported by the American public when it went into effect in 1920 .
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that alcohol was the major cause of most personal and social problems and prohibition was  देखी as the  solution to the nation 's poverty , crime , violence , and other ills .
Upon  अनुसमर्थन  of the amendment , the famous evangelist Billy Sunday said that `` The slums will soon be only a memory .
We will turn our prisons into factories and our jails into  storehouses और corncribs  . ''
(  compare  Christianity and alcohol . )
Since alcohol was to be banned and since it was seen as the cause  of सबसे , if नहीं  all , crime , some communities sold their jails .
The nation was highly optimistic and the leading prohibitionist in the United States Congress  confidently asserted कि `` वहीँ is  as much chance of repealing the Eighteenth Amendment as there is for a hummingbird to fly to the planet Mars with the Washington Monument tied to its tail.”
The metre ( meter in American English ) , ( SI unit symbol : m ; SI dimension symbol : L ) , is the fundamental unit  of लंबाई in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  System of Units ( SI ) .
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator to the North Pole  ( at समुद्र स्तर ) , इसके परिभाषा  has been periodically refined to reflect growing knowledge of metrology .
Since 1983 , it has been defined as `` the length of  the पाथ travelled by लाइट  in vacuum during a time interval of 1/299,792,458 of a second . ''
Geologists exploring Jurassic sedimentary rocks in  makhtesh  Gadol , Negev Desert , Israel
Geologists explaining the  महत्व of volcanic  ash layers to students on field in Iceland
A geologist is a scientist who studies the solid and liquid matter that constitutes  the धरती as  well as the processes and history that has shaped it .
Geologists usually engage in  अध्ययन  geology .
Geologists , studying more of  an लागू  science than a theoretical one , must approach Geology using physics , chemistry and biology as well as other sciences .
Geologists , compared to scientists engaged in other fields , are generally more exposed  to the बाहरी than रहकर in laboratories ; हालांकि कुछ geologists  prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab .
Geologists are engaged in exploration for mining companies in search of metals , oils ,  और अन्य धरती संसाधन .
They are also in the forefront of natural hazards and disasters warning and mitigation , studying earthquakes , volcanic activity , tsunamis , weather storms , and the like ; their studies are used to warn the general  पब्लिक  of the occurrence of these events .
Currently , geologists are also engaged in  the  discussion of climate change , as they study the history and evidence for this Earth process .

Modern  वैक्यूम  tubes , mostly miniature style
In electronics , a vacuum tube , electron tube ( in North America ) , thermionic valve , tube , or  वाल्व is a यंत्र controlling इलेक्ट्रिक वर्तमान through  a vacuum in a sealed container .
the संग्राहक is प्रायः  thin transparent glass in a roughly cylindrical shape .
The simplest vacuum tube , the diode , is  essentially  an incandescent light bulb with an added electrode inside .
When the bulb 's filament is heated white-hot ,  electrons  are `` boiled '' off its surface and into the vacuum inside the bulb .
If the electrode -- called a ``  थाली '' or `` धनाग्र '' -- is बना अधिक धनात्मक  than the hot filament , a direct current flows through the vacuum to the electrode ( a demonstration of the Edison effect ) .
As the current only flows in one direction , it makes it possible to convert an alternating current applied to the  फिलामेंट  to direct current .
The introduction of a third electrode ,  a  grid between the filament and the plate , yields another function .
A voltage applied to the grid controls  the वर्तमान  flowing from the filament to the plate .
Thus , it allows the  यंत्र to be प्रयुक्त  as an electronic amplifier .
Vacuum tubes are thus used for rectification , amplification , switching , or similar processing or creation of  विद्युत  signals .
The vast  बहुमत of आधुनिक दिन tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक  with a vacuum inside , and essentially rely on thermionic emission of electrons from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament .
Some exceptions to this are  dealt साथ in the खण्ड  about gas-filled tubes below .
वैक्यूम  tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology , which drove the expansion and commercialization of radio broadcasting , television , radar , sound reinforcement , sound recording and reproduction , large telephone networks , analog and digital computers , and industrial process control .
Although some applications had counterparts using earlier technologies such as the spark gap transmitter or mechanical computers , it was the invention of the vacuum tube with three electrodes (  पुकारा a ट्रायोड ) और इसके काबिलियत  of electronic amplification that made these technologies widespread and practical .
In most applications , solid-state  डिवाइस ऐसे as transistors  and other semiconductor devices have replaced tubes .
Solid-state devices last longer and are smaller , more efficient , more  विश्वसनीय , और सस्ता  than tubes .
Tubes can be fragile , sometimes generate significant unwanted heat , and can take many  seconds—many मिनट्स in नाजुक applications—after powering on  to warm to a temperature where they perform within operational tolerance .
However , tubes still find uses where solid-state devices have not been developed , are impractical , or  जहाँ a  tube has superior performance , as with some devices in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters .
Tubes are still produced for such  अनुप्रयोग  .
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed  by the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  pulse produced by nuclear explosions and geomagnetic storms produced by giant solar flares .
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured sweets , currently produced and marketed by the Wm . Wrigley Jr. Company ,   a division of Mars , Inc .
They have  मुश्किल  sugar shells which carry the letter S .
The inside is mainly sugar , corn syrup , and hydrogenated  ताड़ कर्नेल आयल साथ  with fruit juice , citric acid , and natural and artificial flavours .
The confectionery has been sold  in a किस्में of फ्लेवर  collections , such as Tropical and Wild Berry .
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill ,  ( 30 नवम्बर 1874 – 24  January 1965 ) was a British politician who was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945 and again from 1951 to 1955 .
Widely regarded as one of the  महानतम wartime नेताओ  of the 20th century , Churchill was also an officer in the British Army , a historian , a writer , and an artist .
He is the  तभी अंग्रेजों प्रधान  Minister in history to have received the Nobel Prize in Literature , and was also the first person to be made an Honorary Citizen of the United States .
Churchill was born into an aristocratic family as the grandson of the  7th ड्यूक of marlborough  .
His father , Lord Randolph Churchill , was a charismatic politician who served as Chancellor of the  exchequer  ; his mother , Jennie Jerome , was an American socialite .
As a young  फौज  officer , he saw action in British India , The Sudan , and the Second Boer War .
He gained fame as a  युद्ध correspondent  and wrote books about his campaigns .
At the forefront of politics for fifty  सालो , he आयोजित अनेक राजनैतिक और कैबिनेट  positions .
Before  the पहला संसार युद्ध , he परोसा as अध्यक्ष of the फलक of व्यापार , घर सचिव , और पहला रब of the admiralty as भाग of the asquith उदार सरकारी .
During the war , he  जारी as पहला रब of  the Admiralty until the disastrous Gallipoli Campaign caused his departure from government .
He then briefly resumed active army service on the Western Front as  कमांडर of the 6th बटालियन  of the Royal Scots Fusiliers .
He returned to government as  मंत्री of munitions  , Secretary of State for War , and Secretary of State for Air .
After the War , Churchill served as Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative ( Baldwin ) government of 1924–29 , controversially  returning the पाउंड स्टर्लिंग in 1925 to the  gold standard at its pre-war parity , a move widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy .
Also controversial was  his  opposition to increased home rule for India and his resistance to the 1936 abdication of Edward VIII .
Out of office and  नीतियां `` in the wilderness '' दौरान the  1930s , Churchill took the lead in warning about Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament .
On the outbreak of the Second World War , he was again appointed  पहला रब  of the Admiralty .
Following the resignation of Neville Chamberlain on 10 May 1940 ,  चर्चिल  became Prime Minister .
His steadfast refusal to consider defeat , surrender , or a compromise peace helped inspire British resistance , especially during the difficult early  दिनों of the युद्ध जब ब्रिटेन stood  alone among European countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler .
Churchill was particularly noted for his  भाषणों और रेडियो प्रसारण , जिससे  helped inspire the British people .
He led Britain as  Prime  Minister until victory over Nazi Germany had been secured .
After the Conservative Party lost the  1945 चुनाव , he became नेता  of the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government .
After winning the 1951  चुनाव , he again became  Prime Minister , before retiring in 1955 .
Upon his  मौत , एलिज़ाबेथ ii granted  him the honour of a state funeral , which saw one of the largest assemblies of world statesmen in history .
Named the Greatest Briton of all time in a 2002 poll , Churchill is widely regarded as being among the  सबसे influential लोगों  in British history .

The show is produced  by  Nelvana and began airing on October 13 , 2006 in Canada on the network YTV .
It stars the voices of Sarah Gadon , Emily Hampshire , and  पीटर keleghan  .
The  घाट फ़ोकस  is a compact car ( C-segment in Europe ) manufactured by the Ford Motor Company since 1998 .
Ford began sales of the Focus to Europe in July 1998 and in North America during 1999  लिये the 2000 मॉडल  year .
In Europe , South America , North  अमेरिका  and South Africa , the Focus replaced the various versions of the Ford Escort sold in those markets .
In Asia  और  Australasia , it replaced the Ford Laser .
As of the first half of 2012 , the Focus surpassed  the टोयोटा कोरोला  to become the world 's best selling automobile nameplate .
The Focus has been considered one of the 50 greatest cars of the past fifty years by  अंग्रेजों पत्रिका  CAR .
An agar plate --  an उदाहरण  of a bacterial growth medium .
Specifically , it is a streak plate ; the orange lines and dots  are  formed by bacterial colonies .
A growth medium or culture medium is a liquid or gel designed to support the growth of microorganisms or  कोशिकाएं , or छोटी  plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens .
There are  अलग प्रकार  of media for growing different types of cells .
There are two major types of growth media : those used for cell culture , which use specific cell types derived from plants or animals , and  microbiological संस्कृति ,  which are used for growing microorganisms , such as bacteria or yeast .
The most  common  growth media for microorganisms are nutrient broths and agar plates ; specialized media are sometimes required for microorganism and cell culture growth .
Some organisms , termed fastidious organisms , require  specialized environments  due to complex nutritional requirements .
Viruses , for example , are  obligate intracellular परजीवी  and require a growth medium containing living cells .
A talent agent , or booking agent , is a person who finds jobs for actors , authors , film directors , musicians , models , producers , professional athletes , writers and other people in  विभिन्न entertainment  businesses .
An  एजेंट भी defends  , supports and promotes the interest of his/her clients .
Agents can not produce their own shows due  to विरोध of ब्याज  .
A talent agent must  be परिचित  with their clients .
An agent has to know what kind of work the client can and can not do in order to match  उन्हें साथ विभिन्न  jobs .
Having an agent is not required , but does help the artist in  getting कार्य  .
In  अनेक मामले ढलाई निर्देशकों , or अन्य  businesses , go to talent agencies to find artists they are looking for .
The  एजेंट is सशुल्क a प्रतिशत  of the star 's earnings ( typically 10 % ) .
Agents  sometimes होगा  be referred to as `` 10 percenters . ''
There are different regulations that govern different types of agents that  हैं  established by artist 's unions and the legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates .
There are also professional organizations  कि अनुज्ञा  talent agencies .
Since the decline in viewership in theaters , from the 1950s to 1960s , this  caused a स्मारकीय शिफ़्ट in  how studios would produce films and thus reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors .
अभिनेताओं  and actresses were working for the studios but were not owned by one major studio entity and so were able to work on within their time and with other studios .
Because of this , agents were now seen as a necessity  बजाय of  an option .
Agents now became third parties that negotiated between studios and  क्लाइंट , इस बनाना उनके  services imperative between each party .
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts , all talent agencies must be licensed under special sections of the California Labor Code ,  जिससे  calls an agent a `` person or corporation who engages in the occupation of procuring , offering , promising , or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists . ''
Mars has two known  moons , phobos और deimos , जिससे  are thought to be captured asteroids .
Both satellites were  खोजा in 1877  by Asaph Hall and are named after the characters Phobos ( panic/fear ) and Deimos ( terror/dread ) who , in Greek mythology , accompanied their father Ares , god of war , into battle .
Ares was known as   Mars to the Romans .
It is possible that Mars may have moons smaller than 50 - 100 meters and a  धूल रिंग between phobos  and Deimos may be present but none have been discovered .
In law enforcement parlance , the term murder book refers  to  the case file of a murder investigation .
Typically , murder books include crime scene photographs and sketches , autopsy and forensic reports ,  transcripts of जांचकर्ताओं  ' notes and witness interviews .
The murder book encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder investigation , from the time the murder is first  reported through  the arrest of a suspect .
Law enforcement agencies typically guard murder books carefully , and it is unusual for civilians to be given unfettered access to these kinds of records , especially  लिये अनसुलझा  cases .
A melon  baller
melon गेंदें हैं गेंदें of melon बना using a melon baller कि varies इससे around 1 centimeter to 3 सेंटीमीटर ( परिचय 3/8 इंच to 1 इंच ) .
They are generally  प्रयुक्त in  fruit salad .
A KSA , or  ज्ञान , कौशल , और abilities  , is a series of narrative statements that are required when applying to United States Federal government job openings .
KSAs are  used to  determine , along with resumes , who the best applicants are when several candidates qualify for a job .
The knowledge , skills and  abilities ( ksas  ) necessary for the successful performance of a position are contained on each job vacancy announcement .
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked federal agencies to stop requiring job applicants to fill out the  questionnaires , to be phased आउट  within a year .
KSAs are  ब्रैड और केन्द्रित essays परिचय एक 's  career and educational background that presumably qualify one to perform the duties of the position being applied for .
A knowledge , skills , and abilities ( KSA ) is a concise essay about one 's talent and  विशेषज्ञता और सम्बन्धित अनुभवों  ( work , education , volunteer ) and accomplishments .
A series of KSA statements are usually required  जब applying  for most federal government and some state and city government jobs .
KSAs are used  as a गज to assess the सामर्थ्य  of a prospective applicant in terms of likely ability to perform the duties of the job .
Most  सरकारी भर्ती  officials look for a short , crisp and clear KSA that emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous work .
KSA statements are  भी ज्ञात  as Evaluation Factors .
Other agencies sometimes call them `` Rating Factors '' , `` Quality Ranking  कारकों '' ,  `` Knowledge , Abilities , skills and Other Characteristics '' , or `` Job Elements '' .
The  नाम can be बस a नाम लकिन प्रायः  it influences content and length of the essay .
Every agency has its own regulations but most of  the समय the  each KSA factor should be 1/2 to 11⁄2 pages long .
The below definitions are defined by the U.S. Office of Personnel  प्रबन्धन :
Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities (  ksas ) - the गुण जरूरी  to perform a job and are generally demonstrated through qualifying service , education , or training .
Knowledge - Is a body of information applied directly to  the प्रदर्शन of a  function .
Skill - Is an observable competence to perform a learned  psychomotor  act .
Ability - Is competence to  perform an  observable behavior or a behavior that results in an observable product .
The scoring of KSA essays  is आधारित  on a scale of from one to 100 .
Job  आवेदकों  must score above 70 to be considered for the position .
High scores are derived through answering the KSA  सवाल as  specifically as possible , providing examples from previous employment or training that clearly demonstrate you meet the qualifications .
When applying to federal government positions , a Federal Resume is usually required in addition to KSA  कथन  .

Love Always is the debut album of American R & B duo K-Ci & JoJo , released on June 17 , 1997 , by MCA  रिकॉर्ड  .
It was recorded at various  studios in नई यॉर्क  and the Los Angeles area in 1996 and 1997 .
It was produced by JoJo and several others , including DeVante Swing , James Mtume , and Jeff  redd  .
The duo  यहूद originally  a part of Jodeci before this album .
The album peaked at sixth  on the us बिलबोर्ड  200 and also appeared on international charts .
The single `` All My Life `` charted number one in multiple countries , and all four of the album 's singles peaked  ऊपर the  top 25 in the US Hot R & B/Hip-Hop Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles .
Love Always was received favorably by critics ,  जो praised the  brothers ' singing ability and the production .
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA )  और सुनहरा by म्यूज़िक कनाडा और ifpi स्वीडन  .
As of June 1999 it had sold 2.9 million copies  in the संयुक्त  States .
A variable-rate mortgage , adjustable-rate  बंधक  ( ARM ) , or tracker mortgage is a mortgage loan with the interest rate on the note periodically adjusted based on an index which reflects the cost to the lender of borrowing on the credit markets .
The loan   may be offered at the lender 's standard variable rate/ base rate .
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the underlying index , but where the lender offers no specific link to  the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका the  rate can be changed at the lender 's discretion .
The term `` variable-rate  बंधक '' is सबसे आम बाहर the संयुक्त राज्य  , whilst in the United States , `` adjustable-rate mortgage '' is most common , and implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government , with caps on charges .
In many  देशों ,  adjustable rate mortgages are the norm , and in such places , may simply be referred to as mortgages .
Among the most common indices are the rates on 1-year constant-maturity Treasury ( CMT ) securities , the Cost of Funds Index ( COFI ) , and the London  interbank offered  Rate ( LIBOR ) .
A few lenders use their own cost of  निधि as  an index , rather than using other indices .
This is done  to ensure a स्थिर हाशिया लिये the lender  , whose own cost of funding will usually be related to the index .
Consequently , payments made by the  borrower may बदलें over समय साथ the बदलना  interest rate ( alternatively , the term of the loan may change ) .
This is  पृथक इससे the ग्रैजुएट  payment mortgage , which offers changing payment amounts but a fixed interest rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest only mortgage , the fixed rate mortgage , the negative amortization  बंधक , और the गुब्बारा  payment mortgage .
Adjustable rates transfer part of the   interest rate risk from the lender to the borrower .
They can be used where unpredictable interest rates make fixed rate loans difficult to  obtain .
The borrower   benefits if the interest rate falls but loses if the interest rate increases .
The borrower benefits from reduced margins to the underlying cost of  उधार compared to फिक्स्ड or  capped rate mortgages .
The assassination of Robert Francis `` Bobby '' Kennedy , a United States Senator and brother of assassinated President John Fitzgerald ``  जोकर '' कैनेडी , took प्लेस  shortly after midnight on June 5 , 1968 , in Los Angeles , California , during the campaign season for the United States Presidential election , 1968 .
After winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for  the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये  President of the United States , Kennedy was shot as he walked through the kitchen of the Ambassador Hotel and died in the Good Samaritan Hospital twenty-six hours later .
Sirhan Sirhan , a 24-year-old  फिलीस्तीनी / जार्डन  immigrant , was convicted of Kennedy 's murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime .
Sirhan 's lawyers have released  कथन claiming प्रमाण  that he was framed .
The shooting was recorded on audio tape by a freelance  समाचारपत्र  reporter , and the aftermath was captured on film .
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at  st. पैट्रिक 's  Cathedral in New York for two days before a funeral mass was held on June 8 .
His body was interred near his   brother John at Arlington National Cemetery .
His death prompted the protection of presidential candidates by  the संयुक्त राज्य  Secret Service .
Hubert Humphrey went on to win the  लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी  , but ultimately narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon .
As with his brother Jack 's death , Bobby 's assassination and the circumstances surrounding it have  शाखित a किस्में of षड्यंत्र theories  .
As  of 2013 कैनेडी remains  one of only two sitting United States Senators to be assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ) .
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the period in the history of mainstream American  कॉमिक किताबे generally माना to पिछला  from the mid-1980s until present day .
In this period , comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically complex , creators became better-known and active in  बदलना the उद्योग , स्वतंत्र कॉमिक्स  flourished , and larger publishing houses became more commercialized .
An alternate name for this period is the Dark Age of Comic Books , due to the popularity and artistic influence of grim titles , such as  और वॉचमेन  .
When Harry Met Sally ... is a 1989 American  रोमांटिक कॉमेडी  film written by Nora Ephron and directed by Rob Reiner .
It stars Billy  क्रिस्टल  as Harry and Meg Ryan as Sally .
The story follows the title characters from the time they meet just before sharing a cross-country drive  , through  twelve years or so of chance encounters in New York City .
The film  उठाता the सवाल `` can मेन और महिलाओं  ever just be friends ? '' and advances many ideas about relationships that became household concepts , such as those of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person '' .
The origins of the film came  इससे  Reiner 's return to single life after a divorce .
An interview Ephron conducted  साथ reiner  provided the basis for Harry .
Sally was based on Ephron and some  of उसके  friends .
Crystal came on board and made his own contributions to  the पटकथा , बनाना  Harry funnier .
Ephron supplied the structure of the film with much of the dialogue  आधारित  on the real-life friendship between Reiner and Crystal .
The soundtrack consists of standards  performed by हैरी  Connick , Jr. , with a big band and orchestra arranged by Marc Shaiman .
Connick  जीती उसके पहला ग्रैमी  Award for Best Jazz Male Vocal Performance .
Columbia Pictures released the film using the `` platform '' technique , which involved opening it in a few select cities , letting positive word of  मुँह generate  interest , and then gradually expanding distribution over subsequent weeks .
When Harry Met Sally ... grossed a total of US $ 92 .8 million in   North America .
Ephron  प्राप्त a अंग्रेजों  Academy Film Award , an Oscar nomination , and a Writers Guild of America Award nomination for her screenplay .
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years ... 100 Laughs list of the top comedy films in American  सिनेमा और क्रमांक 60 on ब्रावो 's `` 100 funniest फिल्मों  '' .
In early 2004 , the film was adapted  लिये the स्टेज in a उत्पादन अभिनीत  Luke Perry and Alyson Hannigan .

Hamburger Helper is a line of packaged food  उत्पाद primarily consisting  of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings .
The  सामग्री of प्रत्येक बक्सा हैं संयुक्त  with browned ground beef , water and milk to create a complete dish .
The product line also  सुविधाएँ उत्पाद साथ  other starches such as rice or potatoes instead of pasta .
It is made by  सामान्य  Mills .
हालांकि  the classic boxed Hamburger Helper products only supply the starch item and the sauce packets , some varieties of the product include ground beef .
These include a frozen food line , which features some of the brand 's classic varieties in a complete meal kit form , with frozen ground  बीफ और frozen सॉस packaged separately  from the noodles in the same bag .
There  is भी an `` तत्काल '' संस्करण of हैमबर्गर  Helper containing dehydrated meat , noodles and seasonings in a small pouch , requiring only water to be added .
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping Hand '' , an anthropomorphic animated , four fingered left-hand glove , which  appears in the  product 's television commercials and on the packages .

A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass object that is  neither a ग्रह  nor a satellite .
More explicitly , the International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) defines a dwarf planet as a celestial body in direct orbit of the Sun that is massive enough for its shape to be controlled by  gravitation , लकिन कि नापसंद  a planet has not cleared its orbital region of other objects .
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the Sun , brought about by an increase in discoveries of  trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ कि rivaled प्लूटो in आकार , और आखिरकार precipitated by the डिस्कवरी of  an even more massive object , Eris .
This classification states that bodies large enough to have cleared the neighbourhood of their orbit are defined as planets , while those that are not massive enough to be rounded by  उनके अपना गम्भीरता हैं  defined as small Solar System bodies .
बौना ग्रह  come in between .
The exclusion of dwarf  ग्रह  from the roster of planets by the IAU has been both praised and criticized ; it was said to be the `` right decision '' by Mike Brown , who discovered and other new dwarf planets , but has been rejected by Alan Stern , who had coined the term dwarf planet in 1990 .
The IAU currently recognizes five dwarf planets in  the सौर प्रणाली  : , Pluto , , , and .
However , only two of these bodies  , ceres  and Pluto , have been observed in enough detail to demonstrate that they fit the definition .
Eris has been accepted as a dwarf  ग्रह क्युकी it is  more massive than Pluto .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with an absolute magnitude brighter than +1  ( और hence a व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a ज्यामितीय  albedo of ≤1 ) are to be named under the assumption that they are dwarf planets .
The only two such objects known at the time , Makemake and Haumea , went through  इस नामकरण कार्यविधि  and were declared to be dwarf planets .
It is suspected that another hundred or so known objects in the Solar System  हैं बौना ग्रह  .
Estimates are that up to 200  बौना  planets may be found when the entire region known as the Kuiper belt is explored , and that the number may exceed 10,000 when objects scattered outside the Kuiper belt are considered .
Individual astronomers recognize several of these , and in August 2011 Mike Brown published a list of 390 candidate objects  , ranging from `` nearly  certain '' to `` possible '' dwarf planets . '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the five accepted by the  iau  plus , , , and – as `` virtually certain '' , with another two dozen highly likely , and there are probably a hundred or so such objects in total .
The classification of bodies in other planetary  प्रणालियों साथ the विशेषताएँ  of dwarf planets has not been addressed .
A debit card ( also known as a bank card or check card ) is a plastic  भुगतान कार्ड कि provides the cardholder इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम  to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution .
Some cards have a stored value with which a payment is made , while most relay a message to the cardholder 's bank to  withdraw निधि इससे a payee 's designated  bank account .
The card , where accepted , can  be  used instead of cash when making purchases .
In some cases , the primary account number is assigned  exclusively लिये उपयोग on  the Internet and there is no physical card .
In many countries , the use of debit cards has become so widespread that their volume has overtaken or entirely replaced cheques and , in some instances ,  नकदी ट्रांजेक्शन  .
The development of debit cards ,  नापसंद क्रेडिट  cards and charge cards , has generally been country specific resulting in a number of different systems around the world , which were often incompatible .
Since the mid-2000s , a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one country to be used in other countries and allowed their use for  अंतरजाल और फोन  purchases .
Unlike credit and charge cards , payments using a debit card are  तत्काल  transferred from the cardholder 's designated bank account , instead of them paying the money back at a later date .
Debit cards usually also allow for instant withdrawal of cash , acting  as the  ATM card for withdrawing cash .
Merchants may also offer cashback facilities to customers , where a  ग्राहक can withdraw  cash along with their purchase .
Francois Henri `` Jack '' LaLanne ( September 26 , 1914 - January 23 , 2011 ) was an American  फ़िटनेस , कसरत , और nutritional  expert and motivational speaker who is sometimes called `` the godfather of fitness '' and the `` first fitness superhero . ''
He described  खुद as होने a `` sugarholic  '' and a `` junk food junkie '' until he was 15 .
He also had behavioral problems ,  but  `` turned his life around '' after listening to a public lecture by Paul Bragg , a well-known nutrition speaker .
During his career , he came to  मानना कि the देश 's overall  health depended on the health of its population , writing that `` physical culture and nutrition — is the salvation of America . ''
Decades  पहले स्वास्थ्य और फ़िटनेस  began being promoted by celebrities like Jane Fonda and Richard Simmons , LaLanne was already widely recognized for publicly preaching the health benefits of regular exercise and a good diet .
He published  numerous  books on fitness and hosted a fitness television show between 1953 and 1985 .
As early as 1936 , at age 21 , he opened one of the nation 's first fitness gyms in Oakland , California , which became a  प्रोटोटाइप लिये दर्जनों of समान  gyms using his name .
One of his 1950s television exercise programs was aimed toward women , whom he also  प्रोत्साहित to जुड़ें उसके स्वास्थ्य क्लब  .
He invented a number of  कसरत  machines , including leg-extension and pulley devices .
besides producing उसके अपना  series of videos , he coached the elderly and disabled not to forgo exercise , believing it would enable them to enhance their strength .
LaLanne also gained recognition for his success as a  bodybuilder , as खूब as  for his prodigious feats of strength .
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated , `` That Jack LaLanne 's an animal ! , '' after LaLanne , at 54 , beat a  21-year-old  Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest .
On the occasion of LaLanne 's death , Schwarzenegger credited LaLanne for being `` an apostle for fitness '' by inspiring `` billions all over the world to live healthier lives , '' and , as governor of California , had   earlier placed him on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness .
Steve Reeves credited LaLanne as his  प्रेरणा  to build his muscular physique while keeping a slim waist .
He was inducted to the California Hall of Fame  और रै  a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Air forces of most of the countries use  प्रणाली समान  to Armies .
However , the RAF and the air forces of many Commonwealth countries , or those formerly under a British influence , use a different set of  बाँधने loosely आधारित on नवल समतुल्यता ; लेफ्टिनेंट , कमांडर , कप्तान और commodore हैं prefixed लिये एयर फ़ोर्स  use with Flight , Wing , Group and Air , respectively ( the first three being the units that they used to command ) .
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ; born April 28 , 1974 ) is a Spanish  अभिनेत्री  .
Signed by an agent at age 15 , she made her acting debut at 16 on television and her feature film debut the following year in Jamón , jamón ( 1992  ) , to नाजुक acclaim  .
Her  subsequent भूमिकाएँ in the 1990s  and 2000s included Open Your Eyes ( 1997 ) , The Hi-Lo Country ( 1999 ) , The Girl of Your Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ) .
Cruz achieved  मान्यता लिये  her lead roles in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky and Blow .
She has since built a successful career , appearing in films from a wide range of genres ,  सहित  the comedy Waking Up in Reno ( 2002 ) , the thriller Gothika ( 2003 ) , the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ) , and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ) .
She has  प्राप्त नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके  roles in Volver ( 2006 ) and Nine ( 2009 ) receiving Golden Globe and Academy Award nominations for each .
She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress in 2008 for Vicky Cristina  बार्सिलोना  .
She was the first Spanish actress in history to receive an Academy Award and the first Spanish actress to  प्राप्त  a star at the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Cruz has  modeled लिये कंपनियाँ ऐसे  as Mango , Ralph Lauren and L'Oréal .
Penélope and  उसके  younger sister Mónica Cruz have designed items for Mango .
वो  has donated both her time and money to charities .
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India , where  वो खर्च एक सप्ताह working लिये माँ टेरेसा  ; she donated her salary from ' to help fund the late nun 's mission .
A wax  मूर्तिकला  of Cruz will be placed in a premier spot in the Grevin Wax Museum in Paris .
File Explorer , previously known as Windows Explorer , is a file manager application  and also a  navigation tool that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from Windows 95 onwards .
It  provides a आलेखीय  user interface for accessing the file systems .
It is also the component of the operating system that presents many user interface items on the  मॉनिटर ऐसे as  the taskbar and desktop .
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer running ( for example , the File | Run command in Task Manager  on nt-derived  versions of Windows will function without it , as will commands typed in a command prompt window ) .
Located in the C : \Windows directory , it is sometimes referred  to as the Windows  shell , explorer.exe , or simply “Explorer” .
The Care Bears are characters created by American  बधाई in 1981 लिये उपयोग on ग्रीटिंग  cards .
The  असली कलाकृति लिये the  cards was painted by artist Elena Kucharik .
In 1983 , Kenner  turned  the Care Bears into plush teddy bears .
The Care Bears appeared in their own TV specials called The Care Bears in the Land Without  जज्बात  ( 1983 ) and The Care Bears Battle the Freeze Machine ( 1984 ) .
They  भी था उनके अपना  television series from 1985 to 1988 , in addition to three feature films : The Care Bears Movie ( 1985 ) , Care Bears Movie II : A New Generation ( 1986 ) , and The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland ( 1987 ) .
Each Care Bear comes in a different  रंग और रै a specialized  insignia on its belly that represents its duty and personality .
This insignia was known as their ``  tummy प्रतीक .  ''
However , the movie Care Bears : Oopsy Does  it ! renamed  them `` belly badges '' .
Adding to the Care Bear family are the `` Care Bear Cousins '' , which feature a lion , rabbit , penguin , raccoon ,  और अन्य ऐसे पशु निर्मित in the  same style as the teddy bears .
In 2002 , the bears  यहूद reintroduced  with new toys .
Made by Play-Along Toys , the new toys offered features such as illuminated bellies upon touch , aerobic  bears , और glow-in-the-dark  bears .
As part of this comeback , the Bears have appeared in  दो computer-animated  movies : Care Bears : Journey to Joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) and The Care Bears ' Big Wish Movie ( 2005 ) .
In 2007 , the franchise  मनाये इसके 25th वर्षगांठ  ; another relaunch took place , as well as the release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It ! .
In mid-2011 , AG announced a revival TV animated  श्रेणी titled `` परवाह  Bears : Welcome to Care-a-Lot `` .
The  प्रीमियर of the श्रेणी  utilizes `` 30 years of caring '' .
It premiered on The  हब on जून  2 , 2012 .
As of 2013 , Care Bears merchandise  is स्टिल  being marketed .
During 2008 and 2009 , Canada 's Cookie Jar Group and  फ़्रांस 's moonscoop समूह attempted to acquire the मताधिकार  from AGC , with no apparent success .
Interstate 70 ( I-70 ) is an Interstate Highway in the United States that runs from  अंतरराज्यीय  15 near Cove Fort , Utah , to a Park and Ride near Baltimore , Maryland .
It was the first Interstate Highway project in  the संयुक्त  States .
I-70 approximately traces the  पाथ of u.S. रूट  40 ( and also the old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains .
West of the  rockies , the  route of I-70 was derived from multiple sources .
I-70 is the fifth longest Interstate Highway , after  i-90 , i-80 , i-40 , और  I-10 .
The construction of  i-70 in कोलोराडो और यूटा is माना an अभियान्त्रिकी  marvel as the route passes through the Eisenhower Tunnel , Glenwood Canyon , and the San Rafael Swell .
The Eisenhower Tunnel  is the उच्चतम  point along the Interstate Highway system with an elevation of .
The sections  of the अंतरराज्यीय in मिसौरी  and Kansas have laid claim to be the first interstate in the United States .
हालांकि विवादित , the संघीय राजमार्ग प्रशासन रै claimed the खण्ड of i-70 through glenwood canyon , समाप्त in 1992 , थी the पिछला टुकड़ा of the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली , as originally नियोजित , to खोलें to ट्रैफ़िक .
Photo of 1999  कुल ग्रहण
As seen from the Earth , a solar eclipse occurs when the  चंद्रमा  passes between the Sun and Earth , and the Moon fully or partially blocks ( `` occults `` ) the Sun .
This  can happen तभी at  new moon , when the Sun and the Moon are in conjunction as seen from Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy .
In a total eclipse , the disk of the  सूर्य is fully  obscured by the Moon .
In partial and annular eclipses only  भाग  of the Sun is obscured .
If the Moon were in a  perfectly गोलाकार कक्षा , a छोटी  closer to the Earth , and in the same orbital plane , there would be total solar eclipses every single month .
However , the Moon 's orbit is  inclined ( tilted ) at अधिक than 5 डिग्री to धरती 's कक्षा  around the Sun ( see ecliptic ) so its shadow at new moon usually misses Earth .
Earth 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the Moon 's orbit must cross this plane in order for an eclipse ( both solar as  खूब as  lunar ) to occur .
In addition , the Moon 's actual orbit is elliptical , often taking it far enough away from Earth that its apparent size is not large enough   to block the Sun totally .
The orbital planes cross each year at a line  of नोड resulting in at तनिक दो  , and up to five , solar eclipses occurring each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses .
However , total solar eclipses are rare at any particular location because totality exists only along a  सीमित पाथ on धरती  's surface traced by the Moon 's shadow or umbra .
An  ग्रहण is a  natural phenomenon .
Nevertheless , in some ancient and  आधुनिक संस्कृतियों , सौर  eclipses have been attributed to supernatural causes or regarded as bad omens .
A total solar eclipse can be frightening to  लोगों जो हैं बेखबर of इसके खगोलीय  explanation , as the Sun seems to disappear during the day and the sky darkens in a matter of minutes .
Because it is dangerous to look directly at the Sun , observers should use special eye protection or indirect  देखने तकनीकों जब देखने a आंशिक ग्रहण  , or the partial phases of a total eclipse .
It is safe to view the total phase of a total solar eclipse with the unaided eye and without  सुरक्षा , however .
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles will travel to  रिमोट स्थितियाँ to observe  or witness predicted central solar eclipses .
A political party ( from , Genitive partis , ``  भाग '' ,  `` portion '' ) is a political organization that typically seeks to influence , or entirely control , government policy , usually by nominating candidates with aligned political views and trying to seat them in political office .
Parties participate in electoral campaigns and educational   outreach or protest actions .
Parties often espouse an ideology  or दृष्टि , expressed  in a party program , bolstered by a written platform with specific goals , forming a coalition among disparate interests .
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to the genus Mangifera  , consisting of numerous तीव्र  fruiting trees in the flowering plant family Anacardiaceae .
The mango is native to South Asia , from where it has been distributed worldwide to become one of the most  cultivated फल in the  tropics .
While other Mangifera species ( e.g . horse mango , M. foetida ) are also grown on a more localized basis , Mangifera indica – the 'common mango ' or 'Indian mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly  cultivated in अनेक तीव्र और उपोष्ण  regions .
It is the  नेशनल फल of इण्डिया  , Pakistan and Philippines .
In several  संस्कृतियों , इसके फल और पत्ते हैं ritually  used as floral decorations at weddings , public celebrations and religious ceremonies .
Gill Arnette Byrd , < ref name > http : //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/B/ByrdGi00.htm ( born  फ़रवरी 20  , 1961 in San Francisco , California ) is a former professional American football player .
He was a two time Pro Bowl cornerback in 1991 and 1992 for the San Diego Chargers after graduating from San  जोस राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों .
Byrd  थी inducted into  the Chargers Hall of Fame in 1998 .
He was an All-City running back and defensive back at Lowell High School ( San Francisco ) , helping to lead   the Cardinals to the city championship in his senior season of 1978 .
World  मैप प्रर्दशित  the Tropic of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer , also referred to as the Northern tropic , is the circle of latitude on  the धरती कि marks  the most northerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at its zenith .
This event occurs once per year , at the time of the June solstice , when the  उत्तरी गोलार्ध is tilted toward the सूर्य to इसके  maximum extent .
It currently ( Year 2013 ) lies at 23°  26′ 15.143′′  north of the Equator .
Its Southern Hemisphere counterpart , marking the most southerly position at which the Sun may  appear सीधे ओवरहेड  , is the Tropic of Capricorn .
These tropics are two of the five major degree measures or major  वृत्त of अक्षांश  that mark maps of the Earth , besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator .
the स्थितियाँ of ये वृत्त of अक्षांश ( अन्य than the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष of रोटेशन सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of इसके कक्षा .
DVD-Video is a consumer video format used to store digital video on DVD discs , and  is फिलहाल the  dominant consumer video format in Asia , North America , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a  तन्त्र dvd खिलाड़ी  ) .
Commercial DVD movies are  एनकोडेड using a संयोजन of h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel स्वरुप as वर्णित नीचे ) .
Typically , the data rate for DVD movies ranges from 3 Mbit/s to 9.5 Mbit/s , and the  बिट रेट is प्रायः  adaptive .
It was first available for  खुदरा around  1997 .
The  dvd-video specification  was created by DVD Forum and can be obtained from DVD Format/Logo Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The  specification is नहीं सरेआम  available , because every subscriber must sign a non-disclosure agreement .
निश्चित सूचना  in the DVD Book is proprietary and confidential .
In  कम्प्यूटिंग और specifically  Internet , a leech is one who benefits , usually deliberately , from others ' information or effort but does not offer anything in return , or makes only token offerings in an attempt to avoid being called a leech .
In economics , this type of behavior is called `` free riding '' and is  संबद्ध  with the free rider problem .
Depending on context , leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer resources , but often instead to greedy use according to etiquette : to  wit , using too much of कया is freely दिए  without contributing a reasonable amount back to the community that provides it .
The name derives from the leech , an animal that sucks blood and  तब कोशिशें to छोड़ unnoticed  .
Other terms are used , such as ``  freeloader '' , लकिन  leech is the most common .
