The United States Postal Service ( USPS ) , also known as the Post Office and U.S. Mail , is an independent  एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी जिम्मेदार लिये  providing postal service in the United States .
It is one of the   few government agencies explicitly authorized by the United States Constitution .
The USPS traces its roots to 1775 during the Second Continental Congress , where Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन थी नियुक्त the पहला postmaster  general .
The cabinet-level Post Office Department was  निर्मित in 1792 इससे फ्रैंकलिन 's  operation and transformed into its current form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act .
The USPS  employs over 574,000  workers and operates over 260,000 vehicles .
The USPS is the operator of the largest  गाडी बेड़े  in the world .
The USPS is legally obligated  to serve सब अमेरिकी , regardless of भूगोल  , at uniform price and quality .
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal  letterboxes in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन स्टिल competes  against private package delivery services , such as UPS and FedEx .
The  usps रै नहीं सीधे प्राप्त  taxpayer-dollars since the early 1980s with the minor exception of subsidies for costs associated with the disabled and overseas voters .
Since the 2006 all-time peak  मेल आवाज़ , बाद जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed the डाक  Accountability and Enhancement Act `` , ( which mandated $ 5.5 billion per year to be paid into an account to pre-fund retiree health-care , 75 years into the future , a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ) , revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume , prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit .
वॉशिंगटन , d.C. रै महरूम the  capital of the United States since 1800 .
Eight other cities have served as the meeting  प्लेस लिये कॉंग्रेस और हैं  therefore considered to have once been the capital of the United States .
In  जोड , प्रत्येक of the 50 u.S.  states and the five principal territories of the United States maintains its own capital .
Princess cut diamond set in a  रिंग
The Princess cut is the second most popular cut  आकार लिये ईंट  , next to a round brilliant .
The face-up shape of the princess cut is square or rectangular and the profile or side-on shape is similar to that of an  उलट पिरामिड साथ चार beveled पहलू  .
The princess cut is a relatively new diamond cut , having been  निर्मित in the 1960s  .
It has gained in popularity in recent years as a more distinctive  वैकल्पिक to the अधिक लोकप्रिय गोलाकार शानदार काटें  , in which the top of diamond , called the crown , is cut with a round face-up shape and the bottom , called the pavilion , is shaped similar to a cone .
A  राजकुमारी काटें साथ the  same width as the diameter of a round brilliant will weigh more as it has four corners which would otherwise have been cut off and rounded to form a round brilliant .
The princess cut is sometimes referred   to as a square modified brilliant .
However , while displaying the same high degree of brilliance , its faceting style is unique and completely   different from that of a round brilliant .
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut , having a step-modified `` Double-French '' or `` Cross '' cut crown and a series of unique ,  chevron-shaped facets  in the pavilion which combine to give a distinct cross-shaped reflection when the stone is viewed directly through the table .
Effectively , the Princess cut combines the high degree of light return of a  गोलाकार शानदार  cut with a distinctive square or rectangular shape .
The square princess cut diamond is usually slightly cheaper than round brilliant cut diamonds of the same carat weight because it retains about 80 % of the rough diamond , as opposed to  the  round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough .
The ability to retain more crystal weight makes  इस  shape popular amongst diamond cutters .
Accredited Gem Appraisers ( AGA ) and American Gem Society Laboratory ( AGSL ) and European Gem Laboratories-USA (  EGL-USA ) are  currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut .
There is no universal definition of what measurements make an ideal princess cut  डायमंड और अनेक डायमंड निर्माताओं  market ideal diamonds with differing facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut '' .
In contrast to the AGSL , AGA , and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has stated that there is not enough industry consensus or empirical data to specify cut grading standards for Princess  काटें ईंट और to do so is at the रिस्क of उपभोक्ता जो may be  deceived by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades .
The name  `` राजकुमारी काटें '' थी  originally used in connection with another diamond cut , otherwise known as the `` Profile '' cut , designed by Arpad Nagy , a London cutter , in 1961 .
The same name was later used and made popular by  ygal पर्लमैन  , Betzalel Ambar , and Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979 .
A similar cut with only 49 facets , as opposed to the original 58 facets of the princess cut , was  बाद ब्रांडेड the `` quadrillion  '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three years of optical research yielded a square stone with faceting  समान to  that of a round brilliant cut diamond .
A  तुलना
The number of chevrons can affect the overall outlook  of  a princess cut diamond .
This can usually  be संकल्पित by the तार आरेख  that is plotted in diamond grading reports .
By adding more  chevrons on the मण्डप पक्ष of the डायमंड  , the individual facets of the diamond will now be broken down into smaller facets .
As a result , it can give a  राजकुमारी  cut diamond a `` crushed ice '' look .
Vice  versa , जब a राजकुमारी  cut diamond has lesser chevrons , it tends to give the diamond a chunky outlook due to broader facets .
The domestic dog (  canis lupus familiaris  ) is a subspecies of the gray wolf ( Canis lupus ) , a member of the Canidae family of the mammalian order Carnivora .
The term `` domestic dog '' is generally used for both  domesticated  and feral varieties .
The dog has been the first animal to be domesticated and has been the most widely kept working , hunting ,  and  pet animal in human history .
The word `` dog '' may also mean the male of a canine species , as opposed to  the शब्द `` कुतिया '' लिये the मादा  of the species .
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern wolf 's lineage around 100,000  सालो पहले लकिन , , the oldest चट्टान नमूनों genetically linked to the आधुनिक श्वान 's lineage  date to approximately 33,000-36,000 years ago .
Dogs ' value to early human hunter-gatherers led to them  जल्दी बनने सर्वव्यापी  across world cultures .
Dogs perform many roles for people , such as hunting , herding ,  pulling loads , सुरक्षा , assisting पुलिस  and military , companionship , and , more recently , aiding handicapped individuals .
This impact on human society has given them the nickname ``  man 's बेहतरीन dost ''  in the Western world .
In some cultures , dogs are  भी a सोर्स  of meat .
In 2001 , there were estimated to be 400 million   dogs in the world .
Most breeds of dogs are at most a few hundred years old , having been  artificially चयनित लिये particular morphologies और व्यवहार  by people for specific functional roles .
Through this selective breeding , the dog has developed into hundreds of varied breeds , and shows more behavioral and  morphological विभिन्नता than कोई  other land mammal .
For example , height measured to the withers ranges from in the Chihuahua to about in the Irish Wolfhound ; color varies from white  through grays ( प्रायः पुकारा `` ब्लू '' ) to ब्लैक , और भूरा इससे लाइट ( तन ) to अंधेरा ( `` रेड '' or `` चॉकलेट '' ) in  a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long , coarse-haired to wool-like , straight , curly , or smooth .
It is common for most  breeds to शेड  this coat .
Diagram of a  हस्तांतरण  electron microscope
A 1973  siemens  electron microscope , Musée des Arts et Métiers , Paris
An electron microscope ( EM ) is a type of microscope that uses an electron beam to illuminate a specimen and  उपज  a magnified image .
An EM has greater resolving power than a light microscope and can reveal the structure of smaller objects because electrons  have wavelengths परिचय  100,000 times shorter than visible light photons .
They can achieve better than 50 pm resolution and magnifications of up to about 10,000,000x whereas ordinary , non-confocal light microscopes are  सीमित by विवर्तन to परिचय 200 nm रेज़ोल्यूशन और  useful magnifications below 2000x .
The electron microscope uses electrostatic and  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक lenses to कंट्रोल the इलेक्ट्रॉन  beam and focus it to form an image .
These electron optical lenses are analogous to the glass lenses of a light  ऑप्टिकल सूक्ष्मदर्शी .
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide range of   biological and inorganic specimens including microorganisms , cells , large molecules , biopsy samples , metals , and crystals .
industrially , the इलेक्ट्रॉन  microscope is often used for quality control and failure analysis .
Modern electron microscopes produce electron micrographs ,  using specialized डिजिटल  cameras or frame grabbers to capture the image .
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried chicken fast food restaurants  संस्थापित in 1972 in नई ऑरलियन्स , louisiana  .
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits or Popeyes Chicken & Seafood , It was acquired by Sandy Springs , Georgia -based AFC  उद्यमों  , originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company , in 1993 .
According to a company press release dated June 29 , 2007 , Popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service chicken restaurant group , measured by number of units '' ,  साथ अधिक than 1,800 रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और over 22 देशों विश्वव्यापी सहित तुर्कों , उत्तरी साइप्रस , बहरीन  , China , Hong Kong , Iraq , Indonesia , Jordan , Kuwait , United Arab Emirates , Japan , Malaysia , Saudi Arabia , South Korea , Singapore , Canada , Jamaica , Guyana , Suriname , Mexico , Trinidad , Puerto Rico , Honduras , Vietnam , Panama , Peru , and Costa Rica .
About thirty locations are  company-owned , the बाकी  franchised .
the लेग दबायें is  a weight training exercise in which the individual pushes a weight or resistance away from them using their legs .
The term leg press also refers to the apparatus used to  perform  this exercise .
The leg press can be used  to evaluate an खिलाड़ी 's  overall lower body strength ( from knee joint to hip ) .
Using the  तिर्यक  sled-type leg press machine .
There are  दो  main types of leg press:
The diagonal  or लंबवत  'sled ' type leg press .
Weight disks ( plates ) are attached directly to the  sled , जिससे is  mounted on rails .
The user  sits नीचे  the sled and pushes it upward with their feet .
These machines  सामान्यतः शामिल समायोज्य  safety brackets that prevent the user from being trapped under the weight .
The 'cable ' type leg press  ,  or 'seated leg press ' , commonly found on multigyms .
The user sits upright and pushes  आगे साथ  their feet onto a plate that is attached to the weight stack by means of a long steel cable .
Wendy Williams Hunter (  born वेन्डी जोन  Williams ; July 18 , 1964 ) is an American media personality , actress and author .
She hosts a syndicated television talk show , The Wendy Williams   Show .
Prior to television , Williams was a `` shock  jockette `` on अनेक  radio shows .
Williams has gained  सुर्खी लिये उसके on-air  spats with celebrities .
She was the subject of the  2006 vh1 वास्तविकता tv  series called The Wendy Williams Experience which broadcast events surrounding her radio show .
She has written an autobiography  और अनेक अन्य किताबे , और  has created a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams .
पैट्रिक हेनरी `` देशद्रोह '' वाक पहले the हाउस of burgesses in an 1851 पेंटिंग by पीटर F. rothermel
`` Give me  स्वतंत्रता , or दे me मौत ! '' is  a quotation attributed to Patrick Henry from a speech he made to the Virginia Convention .
On that day , at St. John 's Church in Richmond , Virginia , and is credited with having swung the balance in convincing  the वर्जिनिया हाउस of burgesses to pass a  resolution delivering the Virginia troops to the Revolutionary War .
Among the delegates to the convention were future US  राष्ट्रपतियों  Thomas Jefferson and George Washington .
न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador ( , locally ) is the easternmost province of Canada .
Situated in the country 's Atlantic region , it  incorporates the द्वीप  of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to the northwest , with a combined area of .
In 2011 , the province 's population was   514,536 .
Approximately 92 percent of the province 's population lives on the Island of Newfoundland ( including  इसके संबद्ध छोटी आइलैंड्स ) , of जिससे अधिक  than half live on the Avalon Peninsula .
The province is Canada 's most linguistically homogenous , with 97.6 % of  निवासियों रिपोर्टिंग अंग्रेज़ी ( न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ; .
Historically , Newfoundland was also  घर to अद्वितीय किस्में of फ्रेंच  , and Irish , as well as the now-extinct Beothuk language .
In Labrador , local  dialects of innu-aimun  and Inuktitut are also spoken .
Newfoundland and Labrador 's capital and largest city , St. John 's , is Canada 's 20th-largest Census  महानगर क्षेत्रफल , और is घर to लगभग 40 प्रतिशत  of the province 's population .
St. John 's is the seat of government , home to  the हाउस of  Assembly of Newfoundland and Labrador and the highest court in the jurisdiction , the Newfoundland and Labrador Court of Appeal .
A former  उपनिवेश और डोमिनियन of the संयुक्त  Kingdom , Newfoundland and Labrador became the tenth province to enter the Canadian Confederation on March 31 , 1949 , as Newfoundland .
On December 6 , 2001 , an amendment was made to the Constitution of Canada to change the province 's official name to  न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और  Labrador .
In day-to-day conversation ,  however , canadians generally स्टिल refer  to the province itself as Newfoundland and to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador .
Theodore ``  t.r  . ''
Roosevelt , Jr. ( ; October 27 , 1858—January 6 , 1919 ) was the 26th President of the United States (  1901–1909 )  .
He is noted for his exuberant personality , range of  रूचि  and achievements , and his leadership of the Progressive Movement , as well as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity .
He was a  नेता of the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी  and founder of the first incarnation of the short-lived Progressive ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912 .
Before becoming President , he held offices at the city , state , and  संघीय स्तर .
Roosevelt 's achievements as a naturalist , explorer , hunter , author , and soldier are as much a part  of उसके कीर्ति as कोई  office he held as a politician .
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of  the संयुक्त राज्य  in 1901 , making him the youngest president ever ; he beat out the youngest elected president , John F. Kennedy , by only one year .
Roosevelt  थी भी the  first of only three sitting presidents to have won the Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy  भालू is नामित बाद  him , despite his contempt for being called `` Teddy '' .
Born into a wealthy family in New York City , Roosevelt was a sickly child who suffered from  दमा और ठहरे at घर अध्ययन  natural history .
To overcome his physical weakness , he embraced  a ज़ोरदार  life .
home-schooled  , he became an eager student of nature .
He attended Harvard University , where he studied biology , boxed  और विकसित  an interest in naval affairs .
In 1881 , one year out of Harvard , he was elected to the New  यॉर्क  State Assembly , where he became a leader of the reform faction of his Republican Party ( the `` GOP '' ) .
उसके the नवल युद्ध of 1812 ( 1882 ) स्थापित उसके पेशेवर प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर इतिहासकार ; he लिखा numerous किताबे on शिकार , the बाहरी , और वर्तमान राजनैतिक मुद्दे , as खूब as frontier  history .
In 1884 , his first wife and his mother  died on  the same day .
He temporarily left politics and went  to  the frontier , becoming a rancher in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas .
Returning to New York City , he ran for mayor   in 1886 , finishing third with 60,000 votes .
He later gained fame by taking vigorous charge of the  नगर पुलिस .
At the  नेशनल  level , he was a leader in civil service reform .
The Spanish–American War broke out in 1898 while Roosevelt was , effectively , running the Department  of the नेवी .
He promptly resigned and formed  the अशिष्ट राइडर्स  – a volunteer cavalry regiment that fought in Cuba .
The war hero was elected governor in 1898 and in  1900 थी  nominated for vice president .
He successfully energized the GOP  आधार as a अत्यधिक दृश्य प्रचारक  to reelect President William McKinley on a platform of high tariffs , the gold standard , imperialism , prosperity at home and victory abroad .
In 1901 , President   William McKinley was assassinated and Roosevelt became President .
He  attempted to मूव  the Republican Party ( GOP ) toward Progressivism , including trust busting and increased regulation of businesses .
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended to the  प्रेसिडेंसी ( इससे  the Vice-Presidency ) upon the death of his predecessor , winning the largest percentage of the popular vote since the uncontested election of 1820 .
Roosevelt coined the phrase `` Square  सौदे ``  to describe his domestic agenda , emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies .
As an outdoorsman and naturalist ,  he प्रचारित the  conservation movement .
On the world stage , Roosevelt 's policies were characterized by his slogan , `` Speak softly and carry a big stick  ``  .
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common  पूर्वज ( s ) ( अन्य than a जनक , child/descendant  , sibling , child/descendant of a sibling , or sibling of a parent/ancestor ) .
However in common  parlance , `` cousin '' सामान्यतः  specifically means `` first cousin '' .
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' are used in the English-speaking world to describe the exact relationship between two cousins ( in the broad  भाव ) और  the ancestor they have in common .
Various governmental entities have established  प्रणालियों लिये विधिक उपयोग कि  can more precisely specify kinships with common ancestors existing any number of generations in the past , though common usage often eliminates the degrees and removals and refers to people with common ancestry as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives '' .
Webster is an American situation comedy that aired on ABC from September 16 , 1983 until May 8 , 1987 , and in first-run  अनुप्रयोग इससे सितंबर 21 , 1987 जबतक  March 10 , 1989 .
The  श्रेणी  was created by Stu Silver .
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who , after losing his parents , is adopted by his NFL -pro godfather ,  portrayed by एलेक्स  Karras , and his new socialite wife , played by Susan Clark .
The focus was largely on how this impulsively  शादीशुदा युगल था to समायोजन  to their new lives and sudden parenthood , but it was the congenial Webster himself who drove much of the plot .
The series was produced by  जॉर्जियाई खाड़ी ltd. ,  Emmanuel Lewis Entertainment Enterprises , Inc. ( 1986-1989 ) and Paramount Television .
Like NBC 's earlier hit Diff'rent Strokes , Webster featured  a  young African-American boy adopted by a white family .
Three types  of कोशिका  division
Cell division is the process by which a parent cell  divides into दो or  more daughter cells .
Cell  प्रभाग प्रायः  occurs as part of a larger cell cycle .
In eukaryotes , there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division , whereby each daughter cell is genetically identical to the parent cell ( mitosis ) , and a reductive cell  प्रभाग , whereby the क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों in the बेटी कोशिकाएं is घटाया  by half , to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ) .
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some point in their life cycle ,  और दोनो  are believed to be present in the last eukaryotic common ancestor Prokaryotes also undergo a vegetative cell division known as binary fission , where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells .
All cell divisions , regardless of  सजीव  , are preceded by a single round of DNA replication .
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba , one cell division is equivalent to reproduction – an  संपूर्ण नई सजीव  is created .
On a larger scale , mitotic cell division can create progeny  इससे बहुकोशिकीय  organisms , such as plants that grow from cuttings .
Cell  प्रभाग भी  enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop from the one-celled zygote , which itself was produced by cell division from gametes .
And after growth , cell  प्रभाग allows लिये continual निर्माण  and repair of the organism .
A human being 's body experiences about 10,000 trillion cell divisions in  a  lifetime .
Cell division has been modeled   by finite subdivision rules .
The primary concern of cell division is the  मेंटेनेंस of the  original cell 's genome .
पहले प्रभाग can  occur , the genomic information that is stored in chromosomes must be replicated , and the duplicated genome must be separated cleanly between cells .
A great  सौदे of सेल्यूलर  infrastructure is involved in keeping genomic information consistent between `` generations '' .

Howard Jones  ( born जॉन हावर्ड जोन्स , 23  February 1955 , Southampton , Hampshire , England ) is a British musician , singer and songwriter .
According to the Guinness Book of British Hit Singles & Albums , `` Jones is  an  accomplished singer-songwriter who was a regular chart visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop .
Jones , who was equally popular in the U.S. ,  appeared at सजीव  Aid `` .
Allmusic journalist , Stephen Thomas Erlewine adds ,  `` Jones  was one of the defining figures of mid-1980s synthpop .
His music merged the technology intensive sound of New Wave with the cheery optimism of hippies and late  1960s  pop .
Jones racked up a string of hits in the mid and late 1980s , before he retreated  into होने a cult  figure in the 1990s '' .
the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Isle of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a motorcycle racing event held on the Isle of Man and was for many years the most prestigious motorcycle race in the world .
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix  संसार चैंपियनशिप दौरान the काल 1949–1976  before being transferred to the United Kingdom after safety concerns and run by the FIM as the British Grand Prix for the 1977 season .
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of the TT Formula 1 Championship from 1977 to 1990 to  बचाना the इवेंट 's  racing status .
From 1989 the racing has been developed by the Isle of Man Department of Tourism  as the आइल of man tt  Festival .
The race is run in a time-trial format on public roads closed for racing  by the प्रावधानों of an अधिनियम of  Tynwald ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ) .
The first race was held on Tuesday 28 May 1907 and was called the International Auto-Cycle Tourist  ट्रॉफी  .
The event was organised by the Auto-Cycle Club over 10 laps of the St John 's  छोटी  Course of 15 miles 1,470 yards for road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers , saddles , pedals and mud-guards .
The winner of the single-cylinder class , and overall winner of the first event in 1907 , was Charlie Collier riding  a Matchless  motorcycle in a time of 4 hours , 8 minutes and 8 seconds at an average race speed of 38.21 mph .
The winner of the twin-cylinder class was Rem Fowler riding a Peugeot engined Norton in a time of 4  घंटों 21 मिनट्स और 52 सेकेंड  at an average race speed of 36.21 mph .
The trophy presented  to चार्ली collier  as the winner of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race , was donated by the Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars .
It featured a stylised version of  ओलम्पिक परमेश्वर hermes  by Giovanni Da Bologna as a silver figurine astride a winged wheel .
the ट्रॉफी थी समान in डिज़ाइन  to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy presented to John Napier ( Arrol-Johnston ) as the inaugural winner of the Isle of Man Tourist Trophy car race in 1905 now known as the RAC Tourist Trophy .
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is now presented annually to the winner of the  आइल of man वरिष्ठ tt motor-cycle  Race .
The 2007 Isle of Man TT was the Centenary event which ran between  26 may और 8 जून 2007 और प्रदर्शित a खास  Re-enactment of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007 .
The vintage parade of 100 classic motorcycles for the Centenary Re-enactment on the original St John 's Short Course  थी flagged दूर by पूर्व संसार  Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff Duke .
The first of the participants to be flagged away was the recently restored twin-cylinder Peugeot-Norton ridden by Rem Fowler during the first  आइल of man tt रेस in 1907  .
Also participating in the 2007 Re-enactment was TT race competitor Guy Martin riding a 1938 Triumph Tiger 100 500 cc and other former TT competitors including Alan Cathcart , Sammy Miller , Nick Jefferies and  मिक ग्रान्ट  also completed the Re-enactment lap .

Unemployment ( or  joblessness ) occurs  when people are without work and actively seeking work .
The unemployment rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as a percentage by  dividing the क्रमांक of बेरोजगार  individuals by all individuals currently in the labor force .
During periods of recession , an economy usually  अनुभवों a अपेक्षाकृत  high unemployment rate .
According to International Labour Organization report , more than 197 million people globally are out of work  or 6 %  of the world 's workforce were without a job in 2012 .
There remains considerable theoretical debate regarding  the कल्याणकारी , consequences  and solutions for unemployment .
Classical economics , New classical economics , and the Austrian School of economics argue that market mechanisms are reliable  अर्थात् of resolving बेरोजगारी  .
These theories argue against interventions imposed on the labor market from the outside , such as unionization , minimum wage laws , taxes , and  अन्य regulations  that they claim discourage the hiring of workers .
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical nature of unemployment and recommends government interventions  in the economy that it  claims will reduce unemployment during recessions .
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks  कि एकाएक reduce कुल माँग  for goods and services and thus reduce demand for workers .
Keynesian models recommend government  interventions designed to बढ़ाएँ  demand for workers ; these can include financial stimuli , publicly funded job creation , and expansionist monetary policies .
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment , there are a few categorizations of unemployment that are used to more precisely model the  प्रभाव of बेरोजगारी भीतर  the economic system .
The main types of unemployment include structural unemployment which focuses on structural problems in the economy and inefficiencies inherent in labour markets , including a mismatch between the supply and demand  of laborers साथ जरुरी  skill sets .
संरचनात्मक वितर्क  emphasize causes and solutions related to disruptive technologies and globalization .
Discussions of frictional  बेरोजगारी फ़ोकस on voluntary  decisions to work based on each individuals ' valuation of their own work and how that compares to current wage rates plus the time and effort required to find a job .
Causes and solutions for frictional  बेरोजगारी प्रायः पता  job entry threshold and wage rates .
Behavioral economists highlight individual biases  in  decision making , and often involve problems and solutions concerning sticky wages and efficiency wages .
Collectivism is any philosophic , political , religious , economic , or social outlook that emphasizes the interdependence of every human being in a society or  सभ्यता  .
Collectivism is a basic cultural element that exists as the reverse of  व्यक्तिगत  in human nature ( in the same way high context culture exists as the reverse of low context culture ) .
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within  सोशल समूह ( ऐसे as an `` in-group '' ,  in what specific context it is defined ) and in some cases , the priority of group goals over individual goals .
Collectivists often  फ़ोकस on जातियाँ  , society , nation or country .
It has been used as an element in many different and diverse types of government and political , economic and educational philosophies throughout history and most human societies in practice contain  तत्व of दोनो व्यक्तिगत  and collectivism .
Some examples of collectivist  संस्कृतियों शामिल इण्डिया  and Japan .
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal collectivism and  लंबवत collectivism  .
Horizontal collectivism  तनावों सामूहिक  decision-making among equal individuals , and is thus usually based on decentralization and egalitarianism .
Vertical  collectivism is आधारित  on hierarchical structures of power and on moral and cultural conformity , and is therefore based on centralization and hierarchy .
A cooperative enterprise would be an  उदाहरण of आड़ा collectivism  , whereas a military hierarchy would be an example of vertical collectivism .
Acute disseminated  encephalomyelitis  ( ADEM ) is an immune mediated disease of the brain .
It usually occurs following  a वाइरल संक्रमण लकिन may  appear following vaccination , bacterial or parasitic infection , or even appear spontaneously .
as it involves असंक्राम्य  demyelination , it is similar to multiple sclerosis , and is considered part of the Multiple sclerosis borderline diseases .
The incidence rate is about  8 प्रति 1,000,000  people per year .
Although it occurs in all ages , most  reported मामले हैं  in children and adolescents , with the average age around 5 to 8 years old .
The mortality   rate may be as high as 5 % , full recovery is seen in 50 to 75 % of cases , while up to 70 to 90 % recover with some minor residual disability .
The average time to recover is  एक to छह  months .
ADEM produces multiple inflammatory lesions in the brain and spinal cord , particularly in the white  पदार्थ  .
Usually these are found in the subcortical and central white matter and cortical gray-white junction of both cerebral hemispheres , cerebellum ,  brainstem , और स्पाइनल cord , लकिन periventricular श्वेत पदार्थ और धूसर पदार्थ of the  cortex , thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved .
When  the रोगी पीड़ित अधिक than एक  demyelinating episode , it is called recurrent disseminated encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ) .
The stomach is a muscular , hollow , dilated part of the digestion system which  कृत्यों as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग  of the digestive tract in some animals , including vertebrates , echinoderms , insects ( mid-gut ) , and molluscs .
It is involved in the second phase of  पाचन , following  mastication ( chewing ) .
The stomach is located  between the ग्रासनाल  and the small intestine .
It secretes protein-digesting  एंजाइमों पुकारा protease और दमदार acids to सहायता in खाना पाचन  , ( sent to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through smooth muscular contortions ( called segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines .
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is derived from the Greek word stomachos ( στόμαχος ) ,  ultimately इससे stoma ( ) , ``  mouth '' .
The words gastro- and gastric (   meaning related to the stomach ) are both derived from the Greek word gaster ( ) .
1940 Pontiac Special  श्रेणी  25 Woodie
A woodie is a car body style , especially a station wagon , where the rear bodywork is constructed of wood framework  साथ infill panels of लकडी  or painted metal .
After the demise of actual wood construction , manufacturers used simulated woodgrain sheet vinyl—sometimes  augmented साथ three-dimensional , अनुकरण framework—to  recall wood construction .
In 2008 , wood construction was evoked abstractly on the Ford Flex with a series of  पक्ष  and rear horizontal grooves .
A pearl is a hard object produced  भीतर the  soft tissue ( specifically the mantle ) of a living shelled mollusc .
बस जैसे the शेल  of a clam , a pearl is made up of calcium carbonate in minute crystalline form , which has been deposited in concentric layers .
The ideal pearl is perfectly  गोलाकार और चिकना , लकिन  many other shapes of pearls ( baroque pearls ) occur .
The finest quality natural pearls have been highly valued as gemstones and objects of beauty for many centuries ,  and  because of this , the word pearl has become a metaphor for something very rare , fine , admirable , and valuable .
The most  मूल्यवान मोती occur  spontaneously in the wild , but they are extremely rare .
These wild pearls are  referred  to as natural pearls .
Cultured or farmed pearls from pearl oysters and freshwater mussels make up the majority of those that are  फिलहाल बेची .
Imitation pearls are also widely sold in inexpensive jewelry , but the quality of  उनके iridescence is प्रायः  very poor , and often , artificial pearls are easily distinguished from genuine pearls .
Pearls have been harvested and cultivated primarily for use in jewelry , but in the past they were  भी सिले onto lavish  clothing .
Pearls have also been crushed and used in cosmetics , medicines , and  in पेंट formulations  .
Whether wild or cultured , gem quality pearls are  लगभग सदा  nacreous and , as is the interior of the shell that produces them .
however , लगभग सब प्रजाति of shelled molluscs  are capable of producing pearls ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by some sources ) of lesser shine or less spherical shape .
Although these may also be legitimately referred to as `` pearls '' by gemological labs and also under U.S. Federal Trade Commission  नियम , और हैं formed in the वही  way , most of them have no value , except as curiosities .
Bing (  ज्ञात previously  as Live Search , Windows Live Search , and MSN Search ) is a web search engine ( advertised as a `` decision engine `` ) from Microsoft .
Bing was  अनावरण by microsoft सीईओ स्टीव बाल्मर  on May 28 , 2009 at the All Things Digital conference in San Diego for release on June 1 .
Notable changes include the listing of search suggestions while  प्रश्नों हैं डाला और a सूची of सम्बन्धित खोज  ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008 .
On July 29 , 2009 , Microsoft and Yahoo ! announced a deal in which Bing would power  याहू ! ढूंढें  .
All Yahoo ! Search global customers and partners are  अपेक्षित to have बना  the transition by early 2012 .
In October 2011 , Bing announced it was working on new back-end search infrastructure , with the goal of delivering faster and slightly more  प्रासंगिक ढूंढें परिणाम  for users .
Known as `` Tiger '' , the new index-serving technology has  महरूम incorporated into bing  globally , since August 2011 .
In May 2012 , Bing announced another redesign of its search  इंजन कि  includes `` Sidebar '' , a social feature that searches users ' social networks for information relevant to the search query .
A diagram showing  an i गठन  on offense and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In  अमरीकी  football , each team has eleven players on the field at one time .
the विशिष्ट  role that a player takes on the field is called their position .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are allowed unlimited subsititutions , that is teams may change any  क्रमांक of खिलाड़ी  after any play .
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players , the offense ( the team with the ball ,  who is trying to  score ) , the defense ( the team trying to prevent the other team from scoring , and to take the ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons  , विभिन्न विशिष्ट  positions exist depending on what the player 's main job is .
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots : Airish fowk ) are  an  ethnic group who originate in Ireland , an island in northwestern Europe .
Ireland has been populated for around 9,000 years ( according to archaeological studies , see  प्रागैतिहासिक आयरलैंड  ) .
The Irish people 's earliest  पूर्वजो हैं अंकित in महापुरूष – वे  are claimed to be descended from groups such as the Nemedians , Fomorians , Fir Bolg , Tuatha Dé Danann and the Milesians .
Lebor Gabála Érenn , a book of Irish mythology  tells  that Milesians were Scythian descendants .
The main groups that interacted  साथ the  Irish in the Middle Ages include the Picts , Scots , and the Vikings .
Due to this contact , Icelanders are noted for having some  आयरिश  descent .
The Anglo-Norman invasion of the High Middle Ages , the English plantations and the subsequent English rule  of the देश  introduced the Normans and Flemish into Ireland .
Welsh , Picts , Bretons , and small parties of Gauls and even  anglo-saxons हैं  known in Ireland from much earlier times .
There have been many notable  आयरिश  people throughout history .
The 6th century  आयरिश भिक्षु और मिशनरी columbanus is regarded  as one of the `` fathers of Europe '' , followed by Kilian of Würzburg and Vergilius of Salzburg .
the वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट  Boyle is considered the `` father of chemistry `` .
Famous Irish  explorers  include Brendan the Navigator , Robert McClure , Ernest Shackleton and Tom Crean .
By some accounts , the first European child born in North America had Irish descent on both sides ; and an  irishman  was the first European to set foot on American soil in Columbus ' expedition of 1492 .
There  हैं वंशजों of आयरिश  people living in many western countries , particularly in English-speaking countries .
Historically , emigration has been caused by  राजनीती  , famine and economic issues .
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are descendants of Irish people , primarily in the United Kingdom , the United States , Australia , Canada and Iceland ; there are also smaller numbers in Argentina , Chile , Mexico , Jamaica , Barbados , South Africa  , New Zealand , France ,  Germany and Brazil .
The largest number of descendants  of  Irish people live in the United States .
The number of people living in Australia who are of Irish descent is higher , as a  प्रतिशत of  total population , than that of any other country .
Approximately forty percent  of the उपनिवेश  population of Iceland came from Ireland or Scotland .
The very first inhabitants of Iceland  यहूद  Irish .
The Hubble Space Telescope ( HST ) is a space telescope that was carried into orbit by a Space  शटल in 1990 और remains in आपरेशन  .
A aperture telescope in low  धरती कक्षा  , Hubble 's four main instruments observe in the near ultraviolet , visible , and near infrared .
The telescope is named  बाद  the astronomer Edwin Hubble .
Hubble 's orbit outside the distortion of Earth 's  माहौल allows it  to take extremely sharp images with almost no background light .
Hubble 's Deep Field have been  कुछ of the  most detailed visible-light images ever , allowing a deep view into space and time .
Many Hubble observations have led to  सफलताएँ in astrophysics , ऐसे as accurately  determining the rate of expansion of the universe .
Although not the first  स्पेस दूरदर्शी , हबल  is one of the largest and most versatile , and is well known as both a vital research tool and a public relations boon for astronomy .
The HST was built by the United States space agency NASA , with  योगदान  from the European Space Agency , and is operated by the Space Telescope Science Institute .
The HST is one of NASA 's Great Observatories , along with the Compton Gamma Ray  वेधशाला , the  Chandra X-ray Observatory , and the Spitzer Space Telescope .
Space  telescopes  were proposed as early as 1923 .
हबल थी  funded in the 1970s , with a proposed launch in 1983 , but the project was beset by technical delays , budget problems , and the Challenger disaster .
When finally launched in 1990 , scientists  मिला कि the प्रमुख दर्पण  had been ground incorrectly , compromising the telescope 's capabilities .
The telescope was restored   to its intended quality by a servicing mission in 1993 .
Hubble   is the only telescope designed to be serviced in space by astronauts .
Between 1993 and 2002 , four missions repaired , upgraded , and replaced systems on  the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी रद्द on  safety grounds following the Columbia disaster .
However , after spirited public discussion , NASA administrator Mike Griffin approved one final servicing mission ,  समाप्त in 2009  by Space Shuttle Atlantis .
The  दूरदर्शी is अभी  expected to function until at least 2013 .
Its  वैज्ञानिक  successor , the James Webb Space Telescope ( JWST ) , is to be launched in 2018 or possibly later .
Anti-inflammatory refers to the property of a  पदार्थ or  treatment that reduces inflammation .
Anti-inflammatory drugs make up about half of analgesics , remedying pain by reducing inflammation as opposed  to  opioids , which affect the central nervous system .
The Tonight  दिखाएँ  is a US late-night talk show that has aired on NBC since 1954 .
It is the longest currently running regularly scheduled entertainment program in the US and the third longest-running show on  एनबीसी बाद मिलें the  Press and Today .
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ) , Jack Paar (  1957–1962 ) , जॉनी कार्सन ( 1962–1992  ) , Jay Leno ( 1992–2009 , 2010–present ) , and Conan O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ) .
अनेक  guest hosts also appeared , particularly during the Paar and Carson eras .
The longest-serving host to date was  जॉनी कार्सन , जो hosted the tonight  Show Starring Johnny Carson for 30 seasons from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992 .
The  वर्तमान मेजबान of the दिखाएँ is jay लीनो , जो था previously hosted the दिखाएँ इससे 1992 to 2009 और began उसके दूसरी कार्यकाल on कूच 1 , 2010 .
On April 3 , 2013 , NBC announced Jimmy   Fallon would become the new host of The Tonight Show .
The Tonight  दिखाएँ साथ jimmy  Fallon will premiere February 24 , 2014 , the day after the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics .
ss  Andrea Doria .
Pronounced was an ocean liner for the Italian Line ( Società di navigazione Italia ) home ported in Genoa , Italy , most famous for its sinking in 1956  , जब 52 लोगों  died ( 51 from immediate impact ) .
Named  बाद the  16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria , the ship had a gross register tonnage of 29,100 and a capacity of about 1,200 passengers and 500 crew .
लिये a देश attempting to rebuild इसके  economy and reputation after World War II , Andrea Doria was an icon of Italian national pride .
Of all Italy 's  जहाजों at the समय , एंड्रिया  Doria was the largest , fastest and supposedly safest .
शुभारम्भ  on 16 June 1951 , the ship undertook its maiden voyage on 14 January 1953 .
On 25 July 1956 , while the Andrea Doria was approaching the coast of Nantucket , Massachusetts , bound for New York City , the eastbound of the Swedish American Line collided with it in what became one  of इतिहास 's सबसे infamous  maritime disasters .
Struck in the side , the top-heavy Andrea Doria immediately started  to सूची  severely to starboard , which left half of its lifeboats unusable .
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted in significant  loss of  life , but the efficiency of the ship 's technical design allowed it to stay afloat for over 11 hours after the ramming .
The good behavior  of the क्रू , सुधार  in communications and the rapid response of other ships averted a disaster similar in scale to that of the in 1912 .
1,660 passengers and crew were rescued and survived , while 46 people died as a consequence  of the  collision .
The evacuated luxury liner capsized and sank the following  morning .
This accident remains the worst  मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to occur  in United States waters since the sinking of the in 1915 .
The  घटना और  its aftermath were heavily covered by the news media .
While the rescue  प्रयत्न यहूद दोनो कामयाब  and commendable , the cause of the collision with the Stockholm and the loss of Andrea Doria generated much interest in the media and many lawsuits .
Largely because of an out-of-court settlement agreement between  the दो  shipping companies during hearings immediately after the disaster , no determination of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published .
Although greater  दोष appeared initially  to fall on the Italian liner , more recent discoveries have indicated that a misreading of radar on the Swedish ship may have initiated the collision course , leading to errors on both ships .
Andrea Doria was the last major  transatlantic यात्री पोत  to sink before aircraft became the preferred method of travel .
डायलिसिस  tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable membrane  tubing बना इससे regenerated  cellulose or cellophane .
It can be used for diffusion with solutes or osmosis if used with  जल तभी .
Osmosis is when water  गुजरता through a semi-permeable  layer to reach equilibrium .
Diffusion , on the other hand , allows the  गति of  molecules from high concentration to low concentration .
It will only allow molecules to pass through a  semi-permeable झिल्ली or परत if the अणु  is small enough to fit through the membrane or a membrane 's pore .
This usually results with the effects of diffusion through a membrane only really  affects छोटी अणुओं ,  and almost never larger molecules .
डायलिसिस tubing is प्रयुक्त in  clinical circumstances to ensure a filtered flow of molecules , preventing the flow of larger solute molecules .
छोटी  molecules can be `` washed '' out of a solution which is pumped through the tubing into a solvent , usually water , which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away .
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes , a solution containing several types of  अणुओं , प्रायः ग्लूकोज और मंड , is लगाई into a semi-permeable डायलिसिस  bag , such as a cellulose membrane with pores , and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band .
The sealed dialysis bag is placed in  a  container of a different solution , or water .
Molecules small enough to pass through the tubing ( water , salts , monosaccharides , and other small molecules ) tend to move into or out of the dialysis bag in the direction of decreasing  विशेषज्ञता , इसलिए displaying diffusion  .
Larger molecules ( such as proteins ,  or  polysaccharides ) that have dimensions significantly greater than the pore diameter are retained inside the dialysis bag .
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a  lesser solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) होगा क्रॉस a semi-permeable झिल्ली , जैसे डायलिसिस tubing , into a hypertonic  solution ( a solution that has a higher solute concentration than the solution it is referenced to ) in an attempt to reach equilibrium , where the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium .
Mercury  प्रयोगशाला थर्मामीटर
A thermometer ( from the Greek , thermos , meaning `` hot '' and μἐτρον , metron , `` measure '' ) is a device that measures temperature  or तापमान अनुपात using a किस्में of अलग  principles .
A thermometer has two important elements : the temperature sensor (  e.g . the बल्ब on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें  occurs with temperature , plus some means of converting this physical change into a numerical value ( e.g . the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) .
There are many types and many uses for  thermometers , as विस्तृत  below in sections of this article .
Snow White and  the सात dwarfs is a 1937 अमरीकी  animated musical fantasy film produced by Walt Disney and released by RKO Radio Pictures .
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm , it is the first full-length cel animated feature film and the earliest in the  वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक  series .
The story was adapted by  स्टोरीबोर्ड कलाकारों  Dorothy Ann Blank , Richard Creedon , Merrill De Maris , Otto Englander , Earl Hurd , Dick Rickard , Ted Sears and Webb Smith .
David Hand was the supervising director , while William Cottrell , Wilfred Jackson , Larry Morey , Perce  pearce , और बेन sharpsteen  directed the film 's individual sequences .
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre  on December 21  , 1937 , followed by a nationwide release on February 4 , 1938 , and with international earnings of $ 8 million during its initial release briefly assumed the record of highest grossing sound film at the time .
The popularity  of the फिल्मी रै led to  it being re-released theatrically many times , until its home video release in the 1990s .
Adjusted for inflation , it is one of the top ten  performers at the उत्तर  American box office .
At the 11th Academy Awards , Walt Disney was awarded an  मानद ऑस्कर ,  and the film was nominated for Best Musical Score .
It was added to the United States National Film Registry  in 1989 और is क्रमित in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's  list of the 100 greatest American films , who also named the film as the greatest American animated film of all time in 2008 .
Disney 's take on the fairy  टेल रै था a बिग सांस्कृतिक प्रभाव , resulting  in a popular theme park attraction , a video game , and a Broadway musical .
Childbirth , labour , delivery , birth , partus , or parturition is the culmination of a pregnancy period with the  expulsion of  one or more newborn infants from a woman 's uterus .
The process of normal childbirth is categorized in three stages of labour : the shortening and dilation of the  ग्रीवा , descent  and birth of the infant , and birth of the placenta .
In many cases and  साथ increasing आवृत्ति , प्रसव  is achieved through induction of labor or caesarean section , which is the removal of the neonate through a surgical incision in the abdomen , rather than through vaginal birth .
Childbirth by C-Sections increased 50 % in  the u.S. इससे 1996  to 2006 , and comprise nearly 32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada .
With respect to induced labor , more than 22 % of women undergo induction  of  labour in the United States .
Medical professional policy makers find that induced births and elective cesarean can be harmful to the fetus and neonate as well as harmful or without benefit to the mother , and have established strict guidelines for non-medically  indicated induced births और elective cesarean  before 39 weeks .
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show which followed Bam Margera and his crew as they undertook challenges , performed stunts and traveled the  संसार  .
The show ran for 5 seasons  between 2003  and 2005 .
Flushed Away is a 2006 British/American computer animated action / adventure comedy film directed  by दाउद bowers  and Sam Fell .
It was made in the partnership between  aardman एनिमेशन और  DreamWorks Animation , and is Aardman 's first completely computer-animated feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion .
The film stars the voice talents of Hugh Jackman , Kate Winslet , Andy Serkis , Bill  nighy , इयान mckellen , शेन  Richie and Jean Reno .
The story was by Sam Fell , Peter Lord , Dick Clement , and Ian La Frenais  , और the पटकथा थी लिखा  by Dick Clement , Ian La Frenais , Christopher Lloyd , Joe Keenan , and William Davies .
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006 , and in UK on December 1 2006 , and was distributed by Paramount  तस्वीरें , मगर लिये स्विट्ज़रलैंड , स्पेन , और the नीदरलैंड्स ,  which were handled by Universal Pictures .
The Atlanta Braves  हैं a पेशेवर बेसबॉल  team based in Atlanta .
The Braves are a member of the  पूर्वी प्रभाग  of Major League Baseball 's National League .
The  braves have  played in Turner Field since 1997 .
The `` Braves '' name , which was first  प्रयुक्त in  1912 , originates from a term for a Native American warrior .
They are nicknamed `` the  bravos '' , और प्रायः referred to as ``  America 's Team `` in reference to the team 's games being broadcast on the nationally available TBS from the 1970s until 2007 , gaining a wide fanbase .
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in baseball , winning division  शीर्षक an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स  in that period ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 season in which there were no official division champions ) .
The Braves won the NL West  1991–93 और the nl ईस्ट 1995–2005  , and returned to the playoffs as the National League Wild Card in 2010 .
The Braves advanced to the World Series  पाँच टाइम्स in  the 1990s , winning the title in 1995 .
Since their debut in the National League  in 1876 , the मताधिकार रै  won 16 divisional titles , 17 National League pennants , as well as three World Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves , in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves , and in 1995 in Atlanta .
The Braves are the  तभी एमएलबी मताधिकार to have जीती  the World Series in three different home cities .
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining  चार्टर  franchises ( the other being the Chicago Cubs ) and was founded in Boston , Massachusetts , in 1871 as the Boston Red Stockings ( not to be confused with the American League 's Boston Red Sox ) .
They are considered  ``  the oldest continuously playing team in major North American sports . ''
There is an argument as to who is actually older because  हालांकि the शावक हैं a पूरा ऋतु  `` older '' ( formed as the Chicago White Stockings in 1870 ) Chicago lost two seasons to the Great Chicago Fire , thus the Braves have played more consecutive seasons .
After various name changes ( such as the Boston Beaneaters ) , the team operated as the Boston Braves for most of the  पहला हाफ of the 20th सदी  .
In 1953 , the team moved to Milwaukee , Wisconsin and became the Milwaukee Braves , followed by the move to  अटलांटा  in 1966 .
The team 's tenure in Atlanta  is प्रसिद्ध  for Hank Aaron breaking Babe Ruth 's career home run record in 1974 , though the majority of Aaron 's home runs were hit while the team was in Milwaukee .
His record stood until 2007 , when  सैन फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ  fielder Barry Bonds broke the record .
The leaves of a  beech पेड़
3D rendering of a μCT scan of a leaf piece , resolution circa 40 μm/  voxel  .
A leaf is an organ of a vascular plant , as defined in botanical terms , and in  particular in संयंत्र morphology  .
Foliage is a mass noun that refers to  पत्ते as a विशेषता  of plants .
Typically a leaf is a thin , flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis , but many types of leaves are adapted in  तरीके लगभग unrecognisable in those शर्तें : कुछ हैं नहीं  flat ( for example many succulent leaves and conifers ) , some are not above ground ( such as bulb scales ) , and some are without major photosynthetic function ( consider for example cataphylls , spines , and cotyledons ) .
Conversely , many structures of non-vascular plants , or even of some lichens ,  जिससे हैं नहीं पौधे at सब  ( in the sense of being members of the kingdom Plantae ) , do look and function much like leaves .
Furthermore , several structures found in vascular plants look like leaves but are not actually leaves  ; they differ  from leaves in their structures and origins .
Examples include phyllodes ,  cladodes , और  phylloclades .
Title card for the 1937 Our Gang comedy Rushin '  बैले  .
Our Gang ( also  ज्ञात as  The Little Rascals or Hal Roach 's Rascals ) are a series of American comedy short films about a group of poor neighborhood children and their adventures .
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach , the series is  विख्यात लिये प्रर्दशित children behaving in a अपेक्षाकृत प्राकृतिक रास्ता , as रोच और असली  director Robert F. McGowan worked to film the unaffected , raw nuances apparent in regular children rather than have them imitate adult acting styles .
in जोड , हमारी गिरोह notably put लड़कों , लड़कियों , whites और अश्वेतों साथ in a समूह as बराबरी , कुछ कि `` broke नई मैदान , '' according to फिल्मी इतिहासकार लियोनार्ड maltin .
Such a thing had never been done before in  सिनेमा लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम दोहराया  after the success of Our Gang .
The first production at the Roach studio in 1922 was  a श्रेणी of  silent short subjects .
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer ( MGM ) in 1927 , and converted the series to sound in 1929 , the series took off even  further  .
उत्पादन जारी at the रोच स्टुडियो जबतक 1938 , जब the श्रेणी थी बेची to mgm , जो तब जारी producing the comedies जबतक 1944 .
The Our Gang series includes a total of 220 shorts  and  one feature film , General Spanky , featuring over forty-one child actors .
As MGM retained  the अधिकारों to the हमारी गिरोह ट्रेडमार्क following उनके  purchase of the production rights , the 80 Roach-produced `` talkies '' were syndicated for television under the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and MGM 's Our Gang  पैकेज ( अभी स्वामित्व by warner भाईs. entertainment  ) have since remained in syndication , with periodic new productions based on the shorts surfacing over the years , including a 1994 Little Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures .
Zacharias Janssen ( also Zacharias  जानसन or sacharias जानसन ) ( b.1580-88  , d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) was a Dutch spectacle-maker from Middelburg associated with the invention of the first optical telescope .
Janssen is  sometimes भी credited  for inventing the first truly compound microscope .
However , the origin of the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी , बस जैसे  the origin of the telescope , is a matter of debate .
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a large freshwater lake in the  सिएरा नेवाडा of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
At a surface elevation of , it  is स्तिथ  along the border between California and Nevada , west of Carson City .
Lake Tahoe is the largest  अल्पाइन झील  in North America .
Its depth is , making it the United  राज्य  's second-deepest ( the deepest is Crater Lake in Oregon , being deeper , at ) .
Additionally , Lake Tahoe is listed as the 26th  largest  lake by volume in the world at .
The lake was formed about 2  लाख सालो पहले और is a  part of the Lake Tahoe Basin with the modern lake being shaped during the ice ages .
It is known for the clarity of its water and the panorama of surrounding  kyu on सब पहलू  .
The area surrounding the lake is also referred to as Lake Tahoe , or  बस tahoe  .
झील  Tahoe is a major tourist attraction in both Nevada and California .
It is home to a number of ski resorts , summer outdoor  मनोरंजन , और पर्यटक आकर्षण  .
Snow and skiing are  a significant भाग  of the area 's economy and reputation .
पहाड़ और झील नजारा हैं आकर्षण throughout the साल .
The Nevada side  भी शामिल  large casinos .
राजमार्गों provide  year-round access from Reno , Carson City , and Sacramento .

The Twenty-seventh Amendment  (  Amendment XXVII ) prohibits any law that increases or decreases the salary of members of the Congress from taking effect until the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives .
It is the most recent  amendment to the संयुक्त  States Constitution .
It was submitted  to the  states for ratification in 1789 and was adopted in 1992 .
“First they came ... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to pastor Martin Niemöller (  1892–1984 ) परिचय the सुस्ती  of German intellectuals following the Nazis ' rise to power and the subsequent purging of their chosen targets , group after group .
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of the quotation and when it was created ; the content  of the quotation may have महरूम  presented differently by Niemöller on different occasions .
