Simplified instructional computer , a  काल्पनिक  computer used in systems programming
SIC ( Sons Idées Couleurs ) , an early twentieth-century art magazine produced by  फ्रेंच लेखक  Pierre Albert-Birot
Southeastern Illinois College , a two year Junior College in Harrisburg ,  इलिनोइस , संयुक्त  States
Specific  आगमनात्मक क्षमता , abbreviated  to SIC , which is more commonly known as the relative permittivity or the dielectric constant
St Ignatius ' College , Riverview , a Jesuit school  in सिडनी  , Australia
Imperial   Standard of Napoleon I
Napoleon Bonaparte ( , ; 15 August 1769 – 5 May 1821 ) was a French military and political leader who rose to prominence  दौरान the latter चरण of the फ्रेंच  Revolution and its associated wars in Europe .
As  नेपोलियन  I , he was Emperor of the French from 1804 to 1815 .
His legal reform , the Napoleonic Code , has been a major influence on many civil law jurisdictions  विश्वव्यापी  , but he is best remembered for his role in the wars led against France by a series of coalitions , the so-called Napoleonic Wars .
He established  आधिपत्य over सबसे of महाद्वीपीय  Europe and sought to spread the ideals of the French Revolution , while consolidating an imperial monarchy which restored aspects of the deposed Ancien Régime .
Due to his success in these wars , often against numerically superior  दुश्मनों , he is generally  regarded as one of the greatest military commanders of all time , and his campaigns are studied at military academies worldwide .
नेपोलियन थी born at ajaccio in corsica in a परिवार of प्रतिष्ठित इतालवी ancestry जिससे था settled corsica in the 16th सदी .
He trained  as an तोपखाने  officer in mainland France .
He rose to prominence under the French First Republic and led successful campaigns against the First and  दूसरी coalitions  arrayed against France .
He led a  कामयाब  invasion of the Italian peninsula .
In 1799 , he staged a coup d'état and installed himself as First  कौंसुल ; पाँच सालो बाद  the French Senate proclaimed him emperor , following a plebiscite in his favour .
In the first decade of the 19th century , the French Empire under Napoleon engaged in a series of conflicts—the  napoleonic युद्धों —that शामिल  every major European power .
After a streak of victories , France secured a dominant position in continental Europe , and Napoleon maintained the French sphere  of influence through the गठन  of extensive alliances and the appointment of friends and family members to rule other European countries as French client states .
The Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of Russia  चिह्नित  turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes .
His Grande Armée was badly damaged in the campaign and never  fully बरामद  .
In 1813 , the Sixth Coalition defeated his forces at Leipzig ; the following year the Coalition invaded France , forced Napoleon to abdicate and exiled  उसे to the  island of Elba .
Less than a year later , he  फरार एल्बा और लौटे to शक्ति  , but was defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815 .
Napoleon  खर्च the पिछला छह सालो of  his life in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena .
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer , but there has been some debate about the cause of his death , as some  विद्वानों have speculated कि  he was a victim of arsenic poisoning .
This is a chronological  लिस्टिंग of the संयुक्त राज्य  Senators from Pennsylvania .
United States Senators  हैं  popularly elected , for a six-year term , beginning January 3 .
Elections are held the first Tuesday  बाद नवम्बर 1  .
Before 1914 , they were chosen by the Pennsylvania General Assembly , and before 1935 , their terms  began  March 4 .
The South Africa national rugby union team ( known as the  springboks ) represents  South Africa in rugby union .
They  compete  in the annual Rugby Championship , along with southern-hemisphere counterparts Argentina , Australia and New Zealand .
They have won this  चैंपियनशिप on तीन अवसरों  in sixteen years .
They are currently ranked second in the world by the International  रग्बी फलक , और यहूद नामित  2008 World Team of the Year at the Laureus World Sports Awards .
Although South Africa was instrumental in the creation of the Rugby World Cup competition , the  springboks किया नहीं  compete in the first two World Cups in 1987 and 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa .
The team made  इसके संसार कप डेब्यू  in 1995 , when the newly democratic South Africa hosted the tournament .
The Springboks then defeated the All Blacks 15–12 in the final , which is now  remembered as एक of the महानतम पल  in South Africa 's sporting history , and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process .
South Africa regained  उनके शीर्षक as champions  12 years later , when they defeated England 15–6 in the 2007 final .
As a result of the  2007 संसार कप टूर्नामेंट the springboks  were promoted to first place in the IRB World Rankings , a position they held until July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot .
The Springboks play in green and gold  jerseys , और उनके  emblems are the Springbok and the Protea .
The side has been playing international rugby since  1891 , जब  a British Isles side toured the nation , playing South Africa in their first Test on 30 July .
South  अफ़्रीकी थी coached  by Jake White , who led the Boks to the 2007 World Cup title , announcing his resignation effectively from the end of 2007 .
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011 , following a 11–9  शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in  the Rugby World Cup quarter-final , who then stated he would not be signing a new deal .
The previous captain was John Smit , who before he retired  in 2011 निभाई वेश्या लिये  most of his career , although he has also been a prop , mainly in 2008 and 2009 .
Due to Smit  होने अनुपलब्ध लिये the नवम्बर  2010 Tests after surgery , lock Victor Matfield took Smit 's place as captain for that tour .
The current captain  is जां  de Villiers .
The Battle of Gettysburg ( , with an sound ) , was fought July 1–3 , 1863 , in and around  the कस्बा of  Gettysburg , Pennsylvania .
It was the battle with the largest  क्रमांक of  casualties in the American Civil War and is often described as the war 's turning point .
Union Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade  's फौज of the potomac  defeated attacks by Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee 's Army of Northern Virginia , ending Lee 's invasion of the North .
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in   May 1863 , Lee led his army through the Shenandoah Valley to begin his second invasion of the North—the Gettysburg Campaign .
With his army in high spirits , Lee intended to shift the focus of the summer campaign from war-ravaged northern Virginia and hoped to influence Northern politicians to give up their  अभियोजन of the युद्ध by penetrating as दूर  as Harrisburg , Pennsylvania , or even Philadelphia .
Prodded by President Abraham Lincoln , Maj. Gen. Joseph Hooker moved his army in pursuit , but was relieved   just three days before the battle and replaced by Meade .
Elements of the two armies initially  collided  at Gettysburg on July 1 , 1863 , as Lee urgently concentrated his forces there , his objective being to engage the Union army and destroy it .
Low ridges to the northwest of town were defended initially by a Union cavalry division under  ब्रिगेडियर . gen.  John Buford , and soon reinforced with two corps of Union infantry .
However , two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the northwest and north , collapsing the hastily developed Union lines , sending the defenders retreating  through the गलियों of कस्बा to the  hills just to the south .
On the second day of battle , most of  दोनो  armies had assembled .
the संघ  line was laid out in a defensive formation resembling a fishhook .
In the late afternoon of July 2 , Lee launched a heavy assault on the Union left  पार्श्व , और fierce लड़ raged at  Little Round Top , the Wheatfield , Devil 's Den , and the Peach Orchard .
On the Union right , demonstrations escalated into full-scale assaults on Culp 's  हिल और कब्रिस्तान  Hill .
All  आरपार the रणभूमि  , despite significant losses , the Union defenders held their lines .
On the third day of battle , July 3 , fighting resumed on Culp 's Hill , and cavalry battles raged to the east and south , but the main event was a dramatic infantry assault by 12,500 Confederates  विरूद्ध the बीच of the संघ  line on Cemetery Ridge , known as Pickett 's Charge .
the चार्ज  was repulsed by Union rifle and artillery fire , at great losses to the Confederate army .
Lee  led उसके फौज  on a torturous retreat back to Virginia .
Between 46,000 and 51,000 soldiers from both armies were casualties in the three-day  बैटल .
That November , President Lincoln used the dedication ceremony for the Gettysburg National Cemetery to honor the fallen Union  सैनिको और redefine  the purpose of the war in his historic Gettysburg Address .
An academic discipline ,  or फ़ील्ड of पढ़ाई , is  a branch of knowledge that is taught and researched at the college or university level .
Disciplines are defined ( in part ) , and recognized by  the अकादमिक  journals in which research is published , and the learned societies and academic departments or faculties to which their practitioners belong .
However , there exists no formal criteria for when educational programs and scholarly journals form an  अकादमिक अनुशासन  .
A huge difference exists between , on the one hand , well established disciplines that exist in almost all universities all over the world , have  a long  history , and have a well established set of journals and conferences , and , on the other hand , suggestions for new fields supported only by few universities and publications .
फ़ील्ड of पढ़ाई प्रायः have अनेक sub-disciplines or शाखाओं , और the distinguishing लाइनों between ये हैं प्रायः दोनो मनमानी  and ambiguous .
PHP is a server-side scripting language designed  लिये वेब विकास  but also used as a general-purpose programming language .
PHP is now  संस्थापित on अधिक than  244 million websites and 2.1 million web servers .
Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1995  , the सन्दर्भ  implementation of PHP is now produced by The PHP Group .
While PHP originally stood for Personal Home Page , it now stands for PHP :  हाइपरटेक्स्ट  Preprocessor , a recursive acronym .
PHP code is interpreted by a web server with a PHP processor module which generates the resulting web page : PHP commands can be embedded directly into an HTML source document rather than calling an  बाह्य संचिका to  process data .
It has also evolved to  शामिल a command-line  interface capability and can be used in standalone graphical applications .
PHP is free software  released अंतर्गत the पीएचपी  License , which is incompatible with the GNU General Public License ( GPL ) due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP .
PHP can be deployed on  most web  servers and also as a standalone shell on almost every operating system and platform , free of charge .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy (  may 29 , 1917 – नवम्बर 22 , 1963 ) , प्रायः  referred to by his initials JFK , was the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
बाद सैन्य सेवा as कमांडर  of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 during World War II in the South Pacific , Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter , he served in the  u.S. सीनेट  from 1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican  प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड निक्सन  in the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to have been elected to the office , the second-youngest President ( after Theodore  रूज़वेल्ट ) , और the  first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only non- Protestant president , and is the only president to have  जीती  a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion , the Cuban Missile Crisis , the building of the Berlin Wall , the Space Race , the African-American Civil Rights  गति , और जल्दी चरण of the वियतनाम युद्ध  .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number  of सैन्य advisers , खास आपरेशन शक्तियां , और helicopters  in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration  अपनाया the नीति of  the Strategic Hamlet Program which was implemented by the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment , and  पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण  Vietnamese from the northern and southern communist insurgents .
कैनेडी  was assassinated on November 22 , 1963 in Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with the crime , but he was shot and  मारे by जोकर  Ruby two days later , before a trial could take place .
The FBI and the Warren  आयोग  officially concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However , the United States House Select Committee on  assassinations ( hsca ) concluded कि  those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However , ABC News in  उनके छानबीन , the  Kennedy Assassination : Beyond Conspiracy , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber  कार्यक्रम led  to a Congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
चूंकि  the 1960s information concerning Kennedy 's private life has come to light .
Details of  कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य  problems in which he struggled have become better known , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially kept secret from the general public , reports of Kennedy 's philandering have  garnered much  press .
Kennedy ranks highly in public opinion ratings of U.S.  राष्ट्रपतियों  .
`` Stand by Me '' is a song originally performed by Ben E. King and written by King , Jerry Leiber , and Mike Stoller ,  प्रेरित by the आध्यात्मिक  `` Lord Stand by Me , '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3 .
There have been over 400 recorded versions  of the सोंग .
A political cartoon from an 1894 Puck magazine by illustrator S.D . Ehrhart ,  shows a फार्म स्त्री labeled  `` Democratic Party '' sheltering from a tornado of political change .
A metaphor is a figure of speech  कि  describes a subject by asserting that it is , on some point of comparison , the same as another otherwise unrelated object .
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely related to other rhetorical figures of speech that achieve their effects via  संघ , तुलना or प्रतिरूप  including allegory , hyperbole , and simile .
In simpler terms , a metaphor compares  दो वस्तुएँ  or things without using the words `` like '' or `` as '' .
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in English literature is the All the  संसार 's a स्टेज monologue इससे as तुम  Like It :
All the world 's a  स्टैगe,
And all the men and women  merely खिलाड़ी  ;
वे have उनके exits  and their entrances ; — William Shakespeare , As You Like It , 2/7
This quote is a metaphor because the world is not  वस्तुतः a स्टेज  .
By figuratively asserting that the world is a stage ,  शेक्सपियर उपयोग the अंक of तुलना between the संसार और  a stage to convey an understanding about the mechanics of the world and the lives of the people within it .

Rembrandt van Rijn ,  self-portrait  , etching , c.1630
Francisco Goya , There is No One To Help Them ,  आपदाओं of युद्ध श्रेणी  , aquatint c.1810
Felix Vallotton , La raison probante ( The Cogent Reason ) , woodcut from the  श्रेणी intimités  , 1898
Printmaking is the process of  बनाना artworks  by printing , normally on paper .
Printmaking normally covers only the process of creating prints with an element of originality  , बल्कि than बस होने a फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक  reproduction of a painting .
मगर in the मामला of monotyping  , the process is capable of producing multiples of the same piece , which is called a print .
Each  छपाई उत्पादित  is not considered a `` copy '' but rather is considered an `` original '' .
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process , and also because  the imagery of a छपाई is typically नहीं बस a जनन of another कार्य  but rather is often a unique image designed from the start to be expressed in a particular printmaking technique .
A print may be known  as an छाप  .
Printmaking ( other than monotyping ) is not chosen  तभी लिये इसके क्षमता to उपज अनेक  impressions , but rather for the unique qualities that each of the printmaking processes lends itself to .
Prints are created by transferring ink from a  मेट्रिक्स  or through a prepared screen to a sheet of paper or other material .
Common types of matrices include : metal plates , usually copper or zinc , or polymer plates for engraving or etching ; stone , aluminum , or polymer for lithography ; blocks of wood for woodcuts and wood  engravings ; और linoleum लिये  linocuts .
Screens made of silk or synthetic fabrics   are used for the screenprinting process .
Other types of matrix substrates and related   processes are discussed below .
Multiple impressions  मुद्रित  from the same matrix form an edition .
Since the late 19th century , artists have generally signed individual  impressions इससे an संस्करण और प्रायः  number the impressions to form a limited edition .
Prints may also be printed in book form , such as illustrated books  or कलाकार  's books .
Il Divo is an  English  multinational operatic pop vocal group created by music manager , executive , and reality TV star Simon Cowell .
Formed in the United Kingdom , they are also  हस्ताक्षरित to cowell 's रिकार्ड  label , Syco Music .
Il Divo is a group of four male singers : French pop singer Sébastien Izambard , Spanish baritone Carlos Marín , American  टेनर दाउद मिलर , और  Swiss tenor Urs Bühler .
To date ,  वे have  sold more than 26 million albums worldwide .
Su-15 , one of the principal Soviet Air   Defence interceptors in the 1970s and 1980s
An  interceptor वायुयान ( or बस interceptor ) is a प्रकार of सेनानी वायुयान designed specifically to prevent मिशन of दुश्मन वायुयान , विशेषकर बमवर्षक और reconnaissance वायुयान , और नष्ट उन्हें , relying प्रायः on ग्रेट गति और शक्तिशाली armament .
Being used since the First World War , after the late 1960s , interceptors became less important due to shifting from bombers to intercontinental ballistic  मिसाइलें ( icbms ) लिये नाभिकीय warfare  .
A Vietnamese  अमरीकी ( ) is  an American of Vietnamese descent .
They  मेक up परिचय हाफ of सब  overseas Vietnamese ( Người Việt Hải Ngoại ) and are the fourth-largest Asian American group .
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the United States  प्रारंभ  after 1975 , after the end of the Vietnam War .
Early immigrants were   refugee boat people fleeing persecution or poverty .
Forced to flee from their homeland and often thrust into poor urban neighborhoods , these  newcomers have nevertheless प्रबंधित to स्थापित दमदार समुदायों  in a short amount of time .
More than sixty percent of Vietnamese Americans reside in the states of California , Texas , Washington , Florida ,  और वर्जिनिया  .
Front page of the U.S. Armed Forces newspaper ,  सितारों और  Stripes , 2 May 1945
Adolf Hitler committed suicide by gunshot on 30 April 1945  in उसके führerbunker in  Berlin .
His  बीवी एवा ( née  Braun ) committed suicide with him by ingesting cyanide .
That  दोपहर , in accordance साथ हिटलर 's prior निर्देश  , their remains were carried up the stairs through the bunker 's emergency exit , doused in petrol and set alight in the Reich Chancellery garden outside the bunker .
The Soviet archives record that their burnt remains were recovered and interred in successive locations until 1970 when they were again  exhumed , cremated और the राख बिखरे .
Accounts differ as to the cause of death ; one that he died by poison only and another that he died by a  self-inflicted gunshot , जबकि biting  down on a cyanide capsule .
Contemporary historians have rejected these accounts as being either Soviet  प्रचार or an attempted सुलह in अनुक्रम  to reconcile the different conclusions .
One  eye-witness  recorded that the body showed signs of having been shot through the mouth , but this has been proven unlikely .
There is also controversy regarding the authenticity of skull  और जबड़ों fragments जिससे यहूद  recovered .
In 2009 , DNA tests were performed  on a कपाल सोवियत officials  had long believed to be Hitler 's .
the  tests revealed that the skull was actually that of a woman less than 40 years old .
स्थान  of Missouri
The alcohol laws of Missouri are among  the  least restrictive and most lax and permissive in the United States .
Missouri is known throughout the Midwest for its largely laissez-faire approach to alcohol regulation , in  शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the बहुत सख्त दारू  laws of some of its neighbors , like Kansas and Oklahoma .
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF , commonly known as flesh-eating disease or flesh-eating bacteria syndrome , is a rare infection of the deeper layers of skin and subcutaneous  ऊतकों , easily spreading  across the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue .
necrotizing fasciitis is जल्दी progressing , having वृहद रिस्क of विकासशील in the immunocompromised due to शर्तें जैसे मधुमेह , कर्कट , इत्यादि  .
It is a severe disease of sudden onset and is usually treated immediately with high doses of intravenous  एंटीबायोटिक  .
Type I describes a polymicrobial infection , whereas Type II describes a  monomicrobial  infection .
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g. , Group A streptococcus ( Streptococcus pyogenes ) , Staphylococcus aureus , Clostridium perfringens , Bacteroides fragilis ,  aeromonas  hydrophila ) .
Such infections are more  संभावित to occur  in people with compromised immune systems .
Historically , Group A streptococcus made up most cases of Type II  infections  .
However , since as  early  as 2001 , another serious form of monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis has been observed with increasing frequency , caused by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ( MRSA ) .
Some published case reports have implied a possible link between use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and NF , though the evidence  of the कड़ी थी कहा to be कमजोर क्युकी  of a small number of case patients and it was unclear whether the drugs just masked the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se .
World War II ( WWII or WW2 ) , also known as the Second World War ,  थी a वैश्विक युद्ध  that lasted from 1939 to 1945 .
it शामिल the विशाल बहुमत of the संसार 's राष्ट्र —including सब of the ग्रेट शक्तियां —eventually forming दो opposing सैन्य alliances : the allies और the अक्ष  .
It was the most widespread war in history , with more than 100  लाख लोगों सेवारत in सैन्य  units from over 30 different countries .
In a state of `` total war `` , the major participants   placed their entire economic , industrial , and scientific capabilities at the service of the war effort , erasing the distinction between civilian and military resources .
Marked by mass deaths of civilians , including the  holocaust और the तभी उपयोग of नाभिकीय  weapons in warfare , it resulted in 50 million to over 75 million fatalities .
These deaths make World War  ii by दूर  the deadliest conflict in human history .
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with the Republic of China in 1937 , but the world war  is generally कहा to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 साथ the आक्रमण  of Poland by Germany and subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain .
From late 1939 to  जल्दी 1941  , in a series of campaigns and treaties , Germany formed the Axis alliance with Italy , conquering or subduing much of continental Europe .
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact , Germany and the Soviet Union partitioned and  annexed territories  between themselves of their European neighbours , including Poland .
The United Kingdom and the other  सदस्यों of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल  were the only major Allied forces continuing the fight against the Axis , with battles taking place in North Africa as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic .
In June 1941 , the European Axis launched  an आक्रमण of the सोवियत  Union , giving a start to the largest land theatre of war in history , which tied down the major part of the Axis ' military forces for the rest of the war .
In December 1941 , Japan joined the Axis , attacked the United  राज्य और यूरोपीय territories  in the Pacific Ocean , and quickly conquered much of the Western Pacific .
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942 , after Japan lost a series of naval battles and  यूरोपीय अक्ष  troops were defeated in North Africa and , decisively , at Stalingrad .
In 1943 , with  a श्रेणी of जर्मनी defeats in पूर्वी यूरोपीय  , the Allied invasion of Italy , and American victories in the Pacific , the Axis lost the initiative and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts .
In 1944 , the Western Allies invaded France , while  the सोवियत संघ regained सब of  its territorial losses and invaded Germany and its allies .
During 1944 and  1945 the संयुक्त  States defeated the Japanese Navy and captured key Western Pacific islands .
The war in Europe ended with the capture of Berlin by  सोवियत  and Polish troops and the subsequent German unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945 .
Following the Potsdam Declaration by the Allies on 26 July 1945 , the United States dropped atomic bombs on the Japanese cities  of हिरोशिमा on 6 अगस्त , और  Nagasaki on 9 August .
With an invasion of the Japanese archipelago imminent , and the Soviet Union having declared war on Japan by invading Manchuria , Japan surrendered on 15 August  1945 , समाप्ति the युद्ध in एशिया और cementing the कुल  victory of the Allies over the Axis .
संसार युद्ध ii  altered the political alignment and social structure of the world .
the  United Nations ( UN ) was established to foster international cooperation and prevent future conflicts .
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States , the Soviet Union , China , the United Kingdom  , and  France—became the permanent members of the United Nations Security Council .
The Soviet Union and the United States emerged as rival superpowers , setting the stage  लिये the  Cold War , which lasted for the next 46 years .
meanwhile , the  influence of European great powers started to decline , while the decolonisation of Asia and Africa began .
Most countries  जिनकी  industries had been damaged moved towards economic recovery .
Political integration , especially in Europe , emerged as an effort to stabilise postwar relations and fight more  effectively in  the Cold War .
A  सीमित  liability company ( LLC ) is a flexible form of enterprise that blends elements of partnership and corporate structures .
Note than an LLC is not a  निगम , और कॉलिंग an  LLC a corporation is technically incorrect .
An LLC is a legal form of company that provides limited liability to its owners in the  विशाल बहुमत of संयुक्त  States jurisdictions .
llcs do  not need to be organized for profit .
Five  k-cups
The inside of a used K-Cup , with the top foil and the  प्रयुक्त कॉफी grounds removed  .
इस shows  the filter inside the K-Cup .
K-Cup portion packs are used with Keurig or other single cup  brewing प्रणालियों to काढ़ा a कप  of coffee , tea , or hot chocolate .
Each K-Cup is a plastic container with a  कॉफी फिल्टर  inside .
Ground  कॉफी सेम  are packed in the K-Cup and sealed air-tight with a combination plastic and foil lid .
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer , the brewer punctures the foil lid and the bottom of  the K-Cup and  forces hot water under pressure through the K-Cup and into a mug .
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain Coffee Roasters , Diedrich/ Gloria  जीन्स , टिमोथी 's संसार कॉफी  , Van Houtte , Caribou Coffee , Celestial Seasonings , Bigelow Tea Company , Twinings , Tully 's , Coffee People and Newman 's Own .
Keurig 's patents on  the असली k-cup डिज़ाइन  expired in September 2012 .
Keurig holds at least one additional , still-active US patent and another patent application , detailing  सुधार  that have subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design .
Electa Pocket Chronograph ( ca .  1890s ) manufactured by the gallet  Watch Company in La Chaux-de-Fonds , Switzerland .
Gallet  multichron astronomic ( ca . 1959 ) —complex  mechanical chronograph with 12 hour recoding capabilities , automatic day , date , month , and moon phase display
A modern Seiko quartz  wristwatch using the chronograph  function ( movement 7T92 ) .
Citizen Atessa  eco-drive  ATV53-3023 analog-digital chronograph with 4 area Radio Controlled reception ( North America , Europe , China , Japan ) .
A chronograph is a specific type of  देखें  that is used as a stopwatch combined with a display watch .
A basic chronograph has an independent sweep second hand ; it can be started , stopped  , और लौटे to शून्य by successive  pressure on the stem .
Louis Moinet invented the  chronograph  in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral  घटक  Interconnect , part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a processor bus , but in a standardized format that is independent of any particular processor   .
Devices connected to the bus appear to the processor to be connected directly  to the  processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space .
Attached  डिवाइस can लो either the रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट  fitted onto the motherboard itself , called a planar device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles , where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus  विन्यास  .
It has subsequently been  अपनाया लिये अन्य  computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express , but , most  motherboards हैं स्टिल बना  with one or more PCI slots , which are sufficient for many uses .
The PCI  specification कवर the शारीरिक आकार of  the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit board edge electrical contacts ) , electrical characteristics , bus timing , and protocols .
The  specification can be खरीदा  from the PCI Special Interest Group ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards used in  pcs शामिल : संजाल ताश , ध्वनि  cards , modems , extra ports such as USB or serial , TV tuner cards and disk controllers .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until  growing bandwidth  requirements outgrew the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards remain  उपलब्धियाँ  for use with old PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now  commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ  in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions .
Michael Whitaker Smith ( born October 7 , 1957 )  is an अमरीकी समकालीन ईसाई संगीतकार  , who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts .
His biggest success in mainstream music was in 1991 when `` Place in this World '' hit No . 6 on  the बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 .
Smith is a three-time Grammy Award winner , and has earned 40  dove पुरस्कार  .
Over the course of his career , he sold more than 13 million albums and recorded 29 No . 1   Hit songs , fourteen gold albums , and five platinum albums .
Smith is an American Music Award recipient ; he was also named one of People magazine 's `` Most  Beautiful People  '' .
An American poster from the World War II -era that  थी प्रयुक्त to inform  people about what they should do if they suspect sabotage .
Sabotage is a deliberate  कार्रवाई aimed at weakening  another entity through subversion , obstruction , disruption , or destruction .
In a workplace  सेटिंग  , sabotage is the conscious withdrawal of efficiency generally directed at causing some change in workplace conditions .
One who engages in sabotage is a  saboteur  .
As  a नियम , saboteurs  try to conceal their identities because of the consequences of their actions .
For example , whereas an environmental pressure group might be happy to be identified with an act of sabotage , it would not want the individual identities of the perpetrators known   .
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a private , independent college  साथ an धर्मान्तरण ईसाई  basis that focuses on teaching classical liberal arts and government , located in Purcellville , Virginia , United States .
Patrick Henry is known for  इसके रूढ़िवादी  evangelical Christian focus .
As of April 17 , 2007 , the college was accredited by the Transnational  संघ of ईसाई कॉलेजों  and Schools , a national faith-related accrediting organization recognized by the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation .
The school was founded with the help of the Home School Legal  रक्षा संघ , और अभी serves as  the headquarters for the organization , with which it is still closely connected .
The history of television comprises the work of numerous engineers and inventors in several  देशों over अनेक दशकों .
The earliest proposal was  in 1908  , in a paper by A . A. Campbell-Swinton and postulated the use of cathode rays .
The first practical  demonstrations  of television , however , were developed using electromechanical methods to scan , transmit , and reproduce an image .
As electronic camera and display tubes were perfected ,  electromechanical टेलीविज़न  gave way to all-electronic systems in nearly all applications .
L'Idéal Cinéma - Jacques Tati at Aniche opened November 23rd 1905 ; the oldest  still-active फिल्म  theater in the world
A  सिनेमा in  Australia
A typical multiplex ( AMC  सैर  16 in Woodland Hills , Los Angeles , U.S. )
A movie theater ( also called a cinema , movie  हाउस , फिल्मी हाउस , फिल्मी थिएटर or चित्र  house ) is a venue , usually a building , for viewing films .
Most but not all movie theaters are commercial operations  केटरिंग  to the general public , who attend by purchasing a ticket .
The movie is projected with a movie projector onto a large projection  स्क्रीन at the सामने  of the auditorium .
Most movie theaters are now equipped for digital cinema projection  , निकालना the need to बनाएँ और हस्तांतरण  a physical film print .

A motorcycle club is a group of individuals whose  प्राथमिक ब्याज और क्रियाएँ  involve motorcycles .
Lyme disease , Lyme borreliosis is an infectious disease caused by  at तनिक तीन प्रजाति of  bacteria belonging to the genus Borrelia .
Borrelia burgdorferi  sensu stricto  is the main cause of Lyme disease in North America , whereas Borrelia afzelii and Borrelia garinii cause most European cases .
The disease is named after the towns of  lyme और  Old Lyme , Connecticut , USA , where a number of cases were identified in 1975 .
Although Allen Steere realized that Lyme disease was a tick-borne disease in 1978 , the cause of the disease remained a mystery until 1981  ,  when B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy Burgdorfer .
Lyme disease is the  सबसे  common tick-borne disease in the Northern Hemisphere .
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the   bite of infected ticks belonging to a few species of the genus Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ) .
Early   symptoms may include fever , headache , fatigue , depression , and a characteristic circular skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ) .
Left  अनुपचारित , बाद लक्षण may  involve the joints , heart , and central nervous system .
in सबसे मामले , the संक्रमण और इसके लक्षण हैं eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक , विशेषकर if the बीमारी is treated जल्दी  .
Delayed or inadequate treatment can  सीसे to  more serious symptoms , which can be disabling and difficult to treat .
Penises of minke whales  on प्रदर्शक  at the Icelandic Phallological Museum
Penis (  बहुवचन penises or penes ) is  a general term for the organs with which male and hermaphrodite animals introduce sperm into receptive females during copulation .
Such organs occur in many animals , both vertebrate and invertebrate , but males do not bear a penis in every animal  प्रजाति , और in those  species in which the male does bear a so-called penis , the penes in the various species are not necessarily homologous .
For example , the penis of a mammal is at most analogous to  the शिश्न  of a male insect or barnacle .
The term penis applies to many reproductive intromittent organs , but not to all ; for example the intromittent organ of most cephalopoda is  the hectocotylus , a specialised भुजा , और पुरूष मकड़ियों उपयोग उनके pedipalps  .
In most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis , it has no major function other than intromission , or at least conveying the sperm to the female , but in the placental mammals the penis bears the  distal भाग of the urethra , जिससे discharges दोनो  urine during urination and semen during copulation as the occasion requires .
Artists and repertoire ( A & R ) is the division of a record label or music  प्रकाशन कम्पनी कि is जिम्मेदार लिये  talent scouting and overseeing the artistic development of recording artists and/or songwriters .
It also acts as a liaison between artists and the record label or publishing company  ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट  of album release is generally considered under the purview of , and responsibility of , A & R .
A furlong is a measure of distance in imperial units and U.S. customary units equal to one-eighth of a  मील , समतुल्य to 220  yards , 660 feet , 40 rods , or 10 chains .
The exact   value of the furlong varies slightly among English-speaking countries .
Five furlongs  हैं लगभग  1 kilometre ( 1.0058 km is a closer approximation ) .
Since the original definition of the metre was one-quarter of one ten-millionth of the circumference of the Earth ( along the great circle coincident with the meridian of  देशांतर गुजर through पेरिस ) , the  circumference of the Earth is about 40,000 km or about 200,000 furlongs .
CR2032 lithium  बटन  cell battery
Lithium 9 volt  ,  AA , & AAA sizes
Lithium  बैटरी हैं डिस्पोजेबल  ( primary ) batteries that have lithium metal or lithium compounds as an anode .
They stand apart from  अन्य बैटरी  in their high charge density ( long life ) and high cost per unit .
Depending on the design and chemical compounds used , lithium cells can produce voltages from 1.5 V ( comparable to a  zinc–carbon or क्षारीय बैटरी ) to परिचय 3.7 V.  Lithium batteries are widely used in products such as portable consumer electronic devices .
Raymond `` Ray ''  चार्ल्स  Jack LaMontagne ( ; born June 18 , 1973 ) is an American singer-songwriter .
LaMontagne has  released  four studio albums , Trouble , Till the Sun Turns Black , Gossip in the Grain and God Willin ' & the Creek Do n't Rise .
He was born in New Hampshire and was  प्रेरित to बनाएँ म्यूज़िक  after hearing an album by Stephen Stills .
Critics  have compared  LaMontagne 's music to that of The Band , Van Morrison , Nick Drake , and Tim Buckley .
He lives in Massachusetts  साथ  his wife and two children .

It is the  precursor  to The Lake House and inspired the Maximum Ride series .
The novel is currently set to be adapted into a  फिल्म  .
The  पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स  were founded in 1933 .

Facebook on  the ad-tech  2010
Facebook is an online  सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा , जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial  name for the book given to students at the start of the academic year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other .
It was founded in February 2004  by Mark  Zuckerberg with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership  was  initially limited by the founders to Harvard students , but was expanded to other colleges in the Boston area , the Ivy League , and Stanford University .
It gradually added support for students at  विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने  to high school students , and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who declare themselves to be at least 13 years old to  become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता of the  site .
Users must register before using the site , after which they may create a personal profile , add other users as friends , and exchange messages ,  सहित स्वचालित  notifications when they update their profile .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups ,  व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल , स्कूल or कॉलेज , or अन्य  characteristics , and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As of September 2012 , Facebook has over one billion  क्रियाशील  users .
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports  सर्वेक्षण , वहीँ हैं 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत  13 with accounts and 5 million under 10 , violating the site 's terms of service .
In May 2005 , Accel partners invested $ 12.7 million in  फेसबुक , और  Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot .
a जनवरी 2009  Compete.com study ranked Facebook as the most used social networking service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list , saying , `` How on earth  किया we stalk हमारी  exes , remember our co-workers ' birthdays , bug our friends , and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics , such  as फेसबुक detox , राज्य कि फेसबुक रै  turned into a national obsession in the United States , resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast estimates Facebook has 138.9  लाख मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर  in May 2011 .
according to सोशल  Media Today , in April 2010 an estimated 41.6 % ( 129.5 million ) of the U.S. population had a Facebook account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's  मार्केट  growth started to stall in some regions , with the site losing 7 million active users in the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook  आखिरकार दायर लिये an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering  on February 1 , 2012 , and was headquartered in Menlo Park , California .
Facebook Inc. began selling stock to the  पब्लिक और व्यापार  on the NASDAQ on May 18 , 2012 .
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel ( 15 November 1891 – 14 October  1944 ) , popularly ज्ञात as the  Desert Fox ( Wüstenfuchs , ) , was a German Field Marshal of World War II .
He earned the respect of both his own troops   and the enemies he fought .
ख़बरों  was a highly decorated officer in World War I and was awarded the Pour le Mérite for his exploits on the Italian front .
In World  युद्ध  II , he further distinguished himself as the commander of the 7th Panzer Division during the 1940 invasion of France .
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North African campaign established him as one of the most able commanders of the war , and   earned him the appellation of the Desert Fox .
He is regarded as one of the most skilled  कमांडरों of मरुस्थल  warfare in the conflict .
He later commanded the   German forces opposing the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy .
His assignments never  took उसे to the  Eastern Front .
Rommel  is regarded  as having been a humane and professional officer .
His Afrika Korps was never accused of war crimes , and soldiers captured  दौरान उसके अफ़्रीकी अभियान  were reported to have been treated humanely .
Orders to  मार यहूदी  soldiers , civilians and captured commandos were ignored .
Late in   the war , Rommel was linked to the conspiracy to assassinate Adolf Hitler .
Since Rommel was a national hero , Hitler desired  to eliminate  him quietly .
He forced Rommel to commit suicide with a cyanide pill , in return for assurances that Rommel 's family  होता नहीं be persecuted following उसके मौत  .
Stained glass representation of the Holy Spirit as a dove  , c. 1660  .
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit is an enumeration of seven spiritual gifts originating with patristic authors , later elaborated by five intellectual virtues  और चार अन्य समूह of नैतिक  characteristics .
They are : wisdom ,  समझना  , wonder and awe ( fear of the Lord ) , counsel , knowledge , fortitude , and piety ( reverence ) .
The Earth Day  ध्वज , the नवीनतम प्रस्ताव  of John McConnell for a flag of Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event , celebrated on April 22 , on which events are  आयोजित विश्वव्यापी to  demonstrate support for environmental protection .
It was first celebrated in 1970 , and is now coordinated globally by the Earth Day Network , and  मनाये in अधिक  than 192 countries each year .
In 1969 at a UNESCO Conference in San  फ्रांसिस्को , the तिथि प्रस्तावित थी  March 21 , 1970 , the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere .
This day of nature 's equipoise was later sanctioned  in a उदघोषणा  signed by Secretary General U Thant at the United Nations .
a माह बाद a पृथक  Earth Day was founded by United States Senator Gaylord Nelson as an environmental teach-in first held on April 22 , 1970 .
Nelson was later awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom Award in  मान्यता  of his work .
While this April 22 Earth Day was focused on the United States , an organization launched by Denis Hayes , who was  the असली  national coordinator in 1970 , took it international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations .
Numerous communities celebrate Earth Week , an entire week of activities focused on  पर्यावरणीय  issues .
Iodine is a chemical element with symbol I and  परमाणु  number 53 .
The name is from Greek ioeidēs , meaning violet or  जामुनी ,  due to the color of elemental iodine vapor .
Iodine and its compounds are primarily used in nutrition , and industrially in the production of acetic  एसिड और  certain polymers .
Iodine 's relatively high  परमाणु  number , low toxicity , and ease of attachment to organic compounds have made it a part of many X-ray contrast materials in modern medicine .
आयोडीन  has only one stable isotope .
A  क्रमांक of आयोडीन radioisotopes  are also used in medical applications .
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the  अत्यधिक water-soluble  iodide ion , I− , which concentrates it in oceans and brine pools .
जैसे the अन्य हैलोजन्स , फ़्री आयोडीन occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic अणु i2 , और तब तभी momentarily बाद होने oxidized इससे आयोडाइड by an oxidant जैसे फ़्री ऑक्सीजन  .
In the universe and on Earth  , आयोडीन 's  high atomic number makes it a relatively rare element .
however , इसके उपस्थिति in समंदर जल रै दिए it a भूमिका in जीवविज्ञान  .
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by  जीवन in biological कृत्यों ( तभी टंगस्टन  , employed in enzymes by a few species of bacteria , is heavier ) .
Iodine 's rarity in many  soils , due to  initial low abundance as a crust-element , and also leaching of soluble iodide by rainwater , has led to many deficiency problems in land animals and inland human populations .
Iodine deficiency affects about two billion people and is the  अग्रणी preventable कारण  of intellectual disabilities .
Iodine is required by higher animals , which use it to synthesize thyroid  हार्मोन  , which contain the element .
Because of this function , radioisotopes of iodine are concentrated in  the थायराइड  gland along with nonradioactive iodine .
If inhaled , the radioisotope iodine-131 , which has a high fission product yield , concentrates in the thyroid , but is easily remedied with potassium iodide   treatment .
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is the act of attempting to influence decisions made by officials in the government , most often legislators or members of  नियामक  agencies .
lobbying is किया by अनेक अलग प्रकार of लोगों  and organized groups , including individuals in the private sector , corporations , fellow legislators or government officials , or advocacy groups ( interest groups ) .
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies , meaning a voter or  bloc  of voters within his or her electoral district , or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a business , or not .
Professional lobbyists are people whose business is trying to influence legislation on  निमित्त of a समूह  or individual who hires them .
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of volunteering or as a small part of their normal job ( for instance , a CEO meeting with a representative about a project important to his/her company , or an activist meeting with his/her legislator  in an  unpaid capacity ) .
सरकारें प्रायः  define and regulate organized group lobbying that has become influential .
The ethics and  नैतिकता  of lobbying are .
Lobbying is often spoken of with contempt , when the implication is that people with inordinate socioeconomic power are corrupting  the विधि ( टेढ़ी it दूर इससे निष्पक्षता )  in order to serve their own conflict of interest .
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly defended against others ' corruption , or even simply  बनाना यकीनन कि  minority interests are fairly defended against mere tyranny of the majority .
For example , a medical association , or a trade association of health insurance companies , may lobby a legislature in order to counteract the influence of tobacco  कंपनियाँ , in जिससे मामला the lobbying होता be  viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ) .
the परेशानी in आरेखण उद्देश्य लाइनों between जिससे lobbyists हैं `` शुभ lobbyists '' और जिससे ones हैं `` ख़राब ones '' is compounded by the cleverness साथ जिससे lobbyists or उनके क्लाइंट can argue कि उनके अपना lobbying is of the ``  good '' kind .
At heart , the effort   to influence legislation is a power struggle .
As in other forms of power struggle , such as war or  विधि प्रवर्तन , motives दायरा इससे to  self-defense to fighting for justice , and the dividing line between predation and justice is subject to rationalization .
Sunshine of  अपना प्रेम  guitar riff
Cream  यहूद a 1960s अंग्रेजों  rock supergroup consisting of bassist/vocalist Jack Bruce , guitarist/vocalist Eric Clapton , and drummer Ginger Baker .
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues rock , hard rock and  साइकेडेलिक  rock , combining the psychedelia-themed lyrics , Eric Clapton 's blues guitar playing and vocals , Jack Bruce 's voice and prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming .
The group 's third album  , पहियों of आग , थी the  world 's first platinum-selling double album .
Cream are widely regarded as being the world 's first  कामयाब  supergroup .
In their career , they sold over 15 million  एल्बम विश्वव्यापी  .
Cream 's music included songs based on traditional blues such as `` Crossroads `` and `` Spoonful `` , and modern blues such as `` Born Under  a ख़राब चिह्न `` , as खूब as अधिक  eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew `` , `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad `` .
Cream 's biggest hits were `` I Feel Free `` ( UK , number 11 ) , ``  सनशाइन of अपना प्रेम `` ( us ,  number 5 ) , `` White Room `` ( US , number 6 ) , `` Crossroads '' ( US , number 28 ) , and `` Badge `` ( UK , number 18 ) .
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of the time , and ,  साथ साथ जिमि हेंड्रिक्स  , and Terry Kath of Chicago , popularised the use of the wah-wah pedal .
They provided a heavy yet technically proficient musical  theme  that foreshadowed and influenced the emergence of British bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s .
The  बैंड 's सजीव प्रदर्शन  influenced progressive rock acts such as Rush .
Cream were  inducted into the  Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1993 .
They were   included in both Rolling Stone and VH1 's lists of the `` 100 Greatest Artists of All Time '' .
They were also ranked number 16 on VH1 's ``  100 महानतम  Artists of Hard Rock '' .
Hairspray is a 1988  कॉमेडी फिल्मी  written and directed by John Waters , and starring Ricki Lake , Sonny Bono , Debbie Harry , Michael St. Gerard , Shawn Thompson , Colleen Fitzpatrick , Jerry Stiller , and in his last film role , Divine .
Hairspray was a dramatic  प्रस्थान इससे waters ' पहले  works , with a much broader intended audience .
In fact , Hairsprays PG is the mildest rating a Waters film has received  ; सबसे of उसके पिछला  films were rated X by the MPAA .
Set in 1962 Baltimore , Maryland , the film revolves around self-proclaimed ``  pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था ट्रेसी turnblad as वो pursues स्टारडम  as a dancer on a local TV show and rallies against racial segregation .
Hairspray was only a  मॉडरेट कामयाबी upon इसके  initial theatrical release , earning a modest gross of $ 8 million .
However , it managed to attract a larger audience on home video  in the जल्दी 1990s और became  a cult classic .
Most  आलोचकों praised the फिल्मी  , although some were displeased with the overall campiness .
In 2002 , the film was adapted  into a ब्रॉडवे musical  of the same name , which won eight Tony Awards , including Best Musical in 2003 .
A second film version of Hairspray , an adaptation of the stage musical , was also released by New Line Cinema in 2007 , which included many  परिवर्तन of scripted वस्तुएं इससे  the original .
The film also ranks #  444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's  2008 list of the 500 greatest movies of all time .
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a common name , structure , and doctrine within  christianity  .
Some groups included do not consider themselves a denomination ( e.g. , the Catholic Church considers itself the  एक सच्चा गिरिजाघर और the अपोस्टोलिक  See , and as pre-denominational ) .
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do not have any  औपचारिक denominational ढांचा , प्राधिकार  , or record-keeping beyond the local congregation ; several groups within Restoration Movement fall into this category .
Some groups are large ( e.g . Catholics , Lutherans , Anglicans or Baptists ) , while others are just a few small churches , and in most cases the  सापेक्ष आकार  is not evident in this list .
Modern movements such as  Fundamentalist  Christianity , Pietism , Evangelicalism , Pentecostalism and the Holiness movement sometimes cross denominational lines , or in some cases create new denominations out of two or more continuing groups , ( as is the case for many United and uniting churches , for example ) .
Such  subtleties  and complexities are not clearly depicted here .
Major divisions  भीतर  Christianity .
Note : This is not a  पूरा सूची , लकिन aims to provide  a comprehensible overview of the diversity among denominations of Christianity .
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations , many of which can not be verified to be significant , only those denominations with Wikipedia articles will be  सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to ensure कि सब  entries on this list are notable and verifiable .
Between denominations , theologians , and comparative religionists there are  considerable मतभिन्नता परिचय  which groups can be properly called Christian , disagreements arising primarily from doctrinal differences between groups .
For the purpose of simplicity , this  सूची  is intended to reflect the self-understanding of each denomination .
Explanations of different opinions concerning their status as Christian denominations  can be  found at their respective articles .
There is no official recognition in most parts of the world for religious bodies , and there is no official clearinghouse which could  determine the औकात or respectability of धार्मिक  bodies .
Often there is considerable disagreement between various churches about whether other churches  चाहिए be labeled साथ pejorative शर्तें  such as `` cult '' , or about whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability .
Such considerations often vary from place to place , where one  धार्मिक समूह may आनंद बहुमत औकात  in one region , but be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world .
Inclusion  on इस सूची  does not indicate any judgment about the size , importance , or character of a group or its members .
1804 map of `` Louisiana `` , edged on the west by the Rocky  kyu  .
The Louisiana Purchase ( `` Sale of Louisiana '' ) was the acquisition by the United States  of  America in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana .
The U.S.  सशुल्क 50 लाख francs ( $ 11 ,250,000  ) plus cancellation of debts worth 18 million francs ( $ 3,750,000 ) , for a total sum of 15 million dollars ( less than 3 cents per acre ) for the Louisiana territory ( $ million in dollars , less than 42 cents per acre ) .
The Louisiana territory encompassed all or part  of 15  present U.S. states and two Canadian provinces .
The land purchased contained all of present-day Arkansas , Missouri , Iowa , Oklahoma , Kansas , and Nebraska ; parts of Minnesota that were west of the Mississippi River ; most of North Dakota ; most of South Dakota ; northeastern New Mexico ; northern Texas ; the portions of Montana , Wyoming , and  कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the  Mississippi River , including the city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan .
France controlled this vast area from 1699 until 1762 ,  the साल it दिया  the territory to its ally Spain .
Under Napoleon Bonaparte , France took back the territory in 1800 in the hope of building an empire in  उत्तर  America .
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending war with Britain , however , led France to abandon these plans and sell the entire territory to the United States , who had originally  intended तभी  to seek the purchase of New Orleans and its adjacent lands .
The purchase of the territory of Louisiana took  प्लेस दौरान the  presidency of Thomas Jefferson .
At the time , the  खरीदें faced घरेलू विपक्ष  because it was thought to be unconstitutional .
Although he  सहमत कि the u.S.  Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory , Jefferson decided to go ahead with the purchase anyway in order to remove France 's presence in the region and to protect both U.S. trade access to the port of New Orleans and free passage on the Mississippi River .
Ceremony at Place d'Armes , New Orleans  अंकन ट्रांसफ़र of louisiana  to the United States , 10 March 1804 , as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup .
`` Cool Jerk '' is a popular song written by Donald Storball and  originally  performed by The Capitols .
Released in 1966 ,  it पहुँचे  No . 2 on the American R & B chart and No . 7 on the pop chart .
The backing track for this song was actually  अंकित (  secretly ) by the Motown house band The Funk Brothers .
Per one of the Funk Brothers , the song was  originally  to be called `` Pimp Jerk . ''
This was taken from  watching  neighborhood pimps , who would dance in the clubs , but were too `` cool '' to do the jerk like regular folks .
Their  संस्करण  was subsequently named `` the Pimp Jerk . ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word  pimp in the शीर्षक  would be banned or not receive much positive attention , and had the title changed to its current form .
The Go-Go 's , Todd Rundgren , Big Trouble , Human Sexual Response , The La De Da 's , The Creation ,  और  The Coasters have covered the song .
Todd Rundgren did his version in an odd time signature ( 7/4 ) , giving an  obviously  jerky feel to the song .
The Go-Go 's covered the song for their 1982 album Vacation and  बाद re-recorded it लिये उनके 1990 एल्बम  Greatest .
In the feature film Home Alone 2 : Lost in New York , Uncle Frank (  gerry bamman ) गाती `` कूल झटका  '' in the shower .
A version of the song with different lyrics ( `` Do the Cool Whip '' ) is used in Cool  चाबुक commercials  .
a रिकॉर्डिंग of `` कूल  Jerk '' by Ricardo Ray is featured in the feature film Donnie Brasco ( 1997 ) .
The song features in the film Standing in the Shadows of Motown , performed by the Funk  भाइयो साथ सीसे vocals  by Bootsy Collins .
The song is  सुना briefly  in the animated feature , Madagascar 3 : Europe 's Most Wanted .
Despite this reason , it is listed in some  विसंगतियाँ  of the film 's soundtrack .
A league is a unit  of लंबाई ( or  , rarely , area ) .
It was long common in Europe and Latin America , but it is  no longer an  official unit in any nation .
The league originally referred to the distance a person  could  walk in an hour .
Since the  मध्य आयु , अनेक  values have been specified in several countries .
In the context of nautical distances , the 3 mile ( 4.8 km ) distance corresponds to how far an observer  of औसत  height ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can see when standing at sea level .
यूँ , a जलयान traveling एक  `` league '' has reached what was previously the farthest visible distance on the horizon .
The lack of  a ऐतिहासिक और वैश्विक  standard for the exact measure of a `` league '' can be accounted for by the variable elevation of the observer ( i.e. , sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ) .
The Irish state came into being in 1922 as the Irish Free  राज्य ,  a dominion of the British Commonwealth , having seceded from the United Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty .
it comprises  26 of Ireland 's 32 counties .
चूंकि 1949 it रै  existed as the Republic of Ireland .
From its foundation , the Irish Free State was embroiled in a civil war between nationalists  supporting the सन्धि और प्रतिद्वंद्वियों जो  supported a republic .
The pro-Treaty  side  , organised as Cumann na nGaedheal emerged victorious from the conflict and won subsequent elections .
They formed the government of the  राज्य जबतक 1932 , जब वे  peacefully handed over power to the anti-Treaty faction in Fianna Fáil , who defeated them in an election .
The Irish state , despite its violent  beginnings  , has remained a liberal democracy throughout its existence .
A new  संविधान in 1937 removed  many of the links with Britain established under the Treaty and Ireland 's neutrality in the Second World War demonstrated its independence in foreign policy matters from Britain .
In 1948 Ireland formally  बाएँ the अंग्रेजों  Commonwealth and adopted the title of `` Republic '' .
In the economic sphere , the  आयरिश  state has had a mixed performance .
On independence , it was one of the wealthier countries in Europe  प्रति  head of population .
However it also inherited from British rule the problems of  बेरोजगारी , करणों , uneven भौगोलिक  development and lack of a native industrial base .
For  much  of its history , the state struggled to rectify these problems .
particular चोटियों of करणों यहूद  recorded during the late 1930s , 1950s and 1980s , when the Irish economy recorded little growth .
In the 1930s , Fianna Fáil governments attempted to  बनाएँ आयरिश घरेलू उद्योग using  subsidies and protective tarifs .
In the late 1950s , these policies were dropped in favour of free trade with selected  देशों और प्रोत्साहित of  foreign investment with low taxes .
This was expanded when  आयरलैंड  entered the European Economic Community in 1972 .
In the 1990s and 2000s , Ireland experienced an economic boom known as the Celtic Tiger , in which the  देश  's GDP surpassed many of its European neighbours .
Immigration also surpassed emigration , bringing the state 's  जनसांख्यिकी  up to over 4 million .
However , since 2008 , Ireland has experienced a severe crisis in the banking sector and  साथ sovereign  debt .
The resultant economic slump has deepened the effect of the  संसार मंदी on आयरलैंड  .
From 1937 to 1998 , the Irish constitution included a claim  on उत्तरी आयरलैंड as a भाग of the नेशनल  territory .
However , the state also opposed and used its security forces against those armed groups -  प्रधानतया the अस्थायी आयरिश रिपब्लिकन  Army , who tried to unite Ireland by force .
This occurred in the 1950s , throughout the 1970s  और 1980s और  has continued on a reduced scale .
Irish governments meanwhile tried to  दलाली an अनुबंध  to the conflict known as The Troubles within Northern Ireland from 1968 to the late 1990s .
The British government officially  recognised the सही  of the Irish government to be a party to the Northern negotiations in the Anglo-Irish Agreement of 1985 .
In 1998 , as part of the Good Friday Agreement , the Irish constitution was altered by referendum to remove the territorial claim to Northern Ireland and instead extend the right of Irish citizenship to  सब the लोगों of the द्वीप चाहिए  they wish to have it .
John  क्विंसी  Adams ( July 11 , 1767February 23 , 1848 ) was the sixth President of the United States ( 1825–1829 ) .
He served as American diplomat , Senator , and Congressional   representative .
He was a member of the  federalist  , Democratic-Republican , National Republican , and later Anti-Masonic and Whig parties .
Adams was the son of former President John  एडम्स और अबीगैल एडम्स  .
As a diplomat , Adams played an important role in negotiating many international treaties  , सबसे notably  the Treaty of Ghent , which ended the War of 1812 .
As Secretary of State , he negotiated with the United Kingdom over America 's northern border with  कनाडा , negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of फ्लोरिडा  , and authored the Monroe Doctrine .
Historians agree he was one of the greatest diplomats  और secretaries of राज्य  in American history .
As  अध्यक्ष ,  he sought to modernize the American economy and promoted education .
Adams enacted a  भाग of  his agenda and paid off much of the national debt .
He was stymied  by  a Congress controlled by his enemies , and his lack of patronage networks helped politicians eager to undercut him .
He lost his 1828 bid for re-election to  एंड्रयू जैक्सन  .
In doing so , he became the  पहला  president since his father to serve a single term .
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's foreign policy in line with his ardently nationalist commitment to America 's  republican  values .
More recently Howe ( 2007 )  portrayed  Adams as the exemplar and moral leader in an era of modernization .
During Adams '  आजीवन , technological नवप्रवर्तनों  and new means of communication spread messages of religious revival , social reform , and party politics .
Goods , money , and people  traveled अधिक  rapidly and efficiently than ever before .
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts after leaving office , serving for the  पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन साथ  far greater acclamation than he had achieved as president .
He is , so far , the only president  बाद निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  ( though John Tyler was elected to the House of Representatives of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ) .
Animated by his growing revulsion against slavery , Adams became a leading opponent of the Slave  शक्ति  .
He predicted that if a civil war were to break out , the president could abolish slavery by  using उसके युद्ध शक्तियां  .
Adams also predicted the Union 's  विच्छेद over the गुलामी  issue , but said that if the South became independent there would be a series of bloody slave revolts .
Windows Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) is a version of the Internet  एक्सप्लोरर वेब ब्राउजर  from Microsoft .
It was  released  to the public on March 14 , 2011 .
Microsoft has  released अंतरजाल  Explorer 9 as a major out-of-band version that is not tied to the release schedule of any particular version of Windows , unlike previous versions .
It is the first version since Internet Explorer 2 to not be bundled with a Windows operating system , although some  oems have संस्थापित it साथ  Windows 7 on their PCs , as well as new Windows 7 laptops .
the प्रणाली आवश्यकताएँ लिये अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 हैं खिड़कियाँ 7 , खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 r2 , खिड़कियाँ विस्टा सेवा पैक 2 or खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 sp2 साथ the मंच  Update .
Windows XP  और  earlier are not supported .
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version of  Internet  Explorer to be supported on Windows Vista .
Both IA-32 and  x64 builds हैं उपलब्धियाँ  .
Internet  एक्सप्लोरर  9 supports several CSS 3 properties , embedded ICC v2 or v4 color profiles support via Windows Color System , and has improved JavaScript performance .
It is the  पिछला of the पाँच प्रमुख  web browsers to implement support for Scalable Vector Graphics ( SVG ) .
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D , hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite , hardware-accelerated video rendering using Media Foundation , imaging support provided by Windows Imaging Component , and high fidelity printing powered by the XML Paper  specification ( xps  ) print pipeline .
Internet Explorer 9 also supports the  html5 वीडियो  and audio tags and the Web Open Font Format .
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid and  पीड़ा reliever पहला marketed  by the Dr . Miles Medicine Company .
It was developed by  मौरिस treener  , head chemist at Miles , in Elkhart , Indiana .
Alka-Seltzer is marketed for relief of minor aches , pains , inflammation , fever , headache , heartburn , sour  पेट , अपच , और  hangovers , while neutralizing excess stomach acid .
It was launched  in 1931  .
A spin-off of Alka-Seltzer made to relieve colds and flu , Alka-Seltzer  प्लस , थी बाद  introduced .
A short-lived antacid non-aspirin variant ,  alka-mints , थी introduced in  1994 and discontinued in 1997 .
Alka-Seltzer is currently owned by Bayer  schering  Pharma AG , Germany .
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate an entire line of medications  बेची over  the counter and taken by means of rapidly dissolving tablets that form a carbonated solution in water .

A stalactite ( , ; from the Greek stalasso , ( σταλάσσω ) , `` to drip '' , and meaning `` that which drips '' ) is a  प्रकार of speleothem (  secondary mineral ) that hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves .
It is a type  of  dripstone .
The  सम्बन्धित  formation on the floor of the cave is known as a stalagmite .
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an academic degree instead of spelling out the title in full , such as in reference books like Who 's  जो और on कारोबार ताश  .
Many  डिग्री have  more than one abbreviation .
In the UK , it is not generally the custom to punctuate abbreviations for degrees with full stops (  e.g . `` बीएससी  '' rather than `` B.Sc . `` .
रेस is a वर्गीकरण प्रणाली प्रयुक्त to categorize इंसानो  into large and distinct populations or groups by anatomical , cultural , ethnic , genetic , geographical , historical , linguistic , religious , or social affiliation .
First used to denote national affiliations , the term began to be used to relate to physical traits in the  17th सदी  .
In the early 20th century the term was often used  ,  in a taxonomic sense , to denote genetically differentiated human populations defined by phenotype .
While biologists sometimes use the concept of race to make distinctions among fuzzy sets of traits , others in the scientific community suggest that the idea of race often is used in a naive or simplistic way , i.e . that among humans , race has no taxonomic  significance : सब जीना इंसानो belong to the वही प्रजाति , होमो sapiens और subspecies ,  Homo sapiens sapiens .
Social conceptions and groupings of races vary over  समय , involving  folk taxonomies
कि define of  individuals based on perceived traits .
Scientists consider biological essentialism obsolete , and generally discourage racial explanations for collective differentiation  in दोनो शारीरिक  and behavioral traits .
Since the second half of the 20th century the associations of  रेस साथ the विचारधाराओं और theories कि grew आउट of  the work of 19th-century anthropologists and physiologists has led to the use of the word race itself becoming problematic .
Although still used in general contexts , it is now often replaced by other words which are less ambiguous  और emotionally चार्ज  , such as populations , people ( s ) , ethnic groups or communities depending on context .
Lucy Stone  ( अगस्त 13  , 1818 – October 19 , 1893 ) was a prominent American abolitionist and suffragist , and a vocal advocate and organizer promoting rights for women .
In 1847 ,  स्टोन became  the first woman from Massachusetts to earn a college degree .
She spoke out for women   's rights and against slavery at a time when women were discouraged and prevented from public speaking .
Stone  थी the पहला अंकित  American woman to retain her own last name after marriage .
Stone 's organizational  क्रियाएँ लिये the कारण of महिलाओं  's rights yielded tangible gains in the difficult political environment of the 19th century .
Stone helped initiate the first National Women 's Rights Convention and she supported and sustained it annually along with a number of other local , state and  क्षेत्रीय  activist conventions .
Stone spoke in front of a number of legislative bodies  to प्रचार कानून  giving more rights to women .
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery , after which she helped form the largest group of like-minded women 's rights reformers , the politically moderate American Woman Suffrage Association ,  जिससे worked लिये दशकों at the राज्य स्तर in एहसान of महिलाओं  's right to vote .
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's rights ,  प्रकाशन और distributing भाषणों by  herself and others , and convention proceedings .
In the long-running and influential Woman 's Journal , a weekly periodical that she established and  प्रचारित , स्टोन aired दोनो  her own and differing views about women 's rights .
Called `` the orator '' and `` the  morning स्टार of the स्त्री 's अधिकारों गति ''  , Stone delivered a speech which sparked Susan B. Anthony to take up the cause of women 's suffrage .
Elizabeth Cady Stanton wrote that `` Lucy Stone was the first  व्यक्ति by जिसको the  heart of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman question . ''
Together , Anthony , Stanton , and Stone have been called the 19th century ``  triumvirate  `` of women 's suffrage and feminism .
In finance , a bond is an instrument  of indebtedness  of the bond issuer to the holders .
It is a debt security , under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and , depending on the terms of the bond ,  is obliged to अदा उन्हें ब्याज  ( the coupon ) or to repay the principal at a later date , termed the maturity .
Interest is usually payable at fixed intervals (  semiannual  , annual , sometimes monthly ) .
Very often the bond is negotiable , i.e . the ownership of the instrument can be transferred in  the  secondary market .
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder of the bond is  the lender ( creditor ) , the जारीकर्ता of the बंध is the borrower  ( debtor ) , and the coupon is the interest .
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to finance long-term  निवेश , or , in the मामला of  government bonds , to finance current expenditure .
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term commercial paper are considered to be money market instruments and not bonds : the  प्रमुख अंतर  is in the length of the term of the instrument .
Bonds and stocks are both securities , but the major difference between the two is that ( capital ) stockholders have an equity stake in the company ( i.e . they are owners ) , whereas bondholders  have a creditor stake in  the company ( i.e . they are lenders ) .
Another difference is that bonds usually have a defined term , or maturity , after which the bond is redeemed , whereas stocks may be  बकाया  indefinitely .
An exception is an irredeemable bond , such as Consols , which is a perpetuity , i.e  . a बंध साथ no परिपक्वता  .

This model can be found inside  the मीनार  .
