A scale model is a physical   model , a representation or copy of an object that is larger or smaller than the actual size of the object , which seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object .
Very often  the स्केल मॉडल  is used as a guide to making the object in full size .
Scale  मॉडल हैं  built or collected for many reasons .
The Zune HD was a portable media player in the Zune product  परिवार released  on September 15 , 2009 by Microsoft .
It was a direct competitor with the Apple  ipod और iphone श्रेणी  of mobile devices .
It was initially released in 16  और 32 gb capacities  .
A 64 GB  संस्करण  was released on April 9 , 2010 .
It utilized a touchscreen interface for navigation and included Wi-Fi for synchronization , access to  the zune मार्केटप्लेस  and Web browsing .
The   Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 chip , allowing it to play 720p video through the optional HDMI Zune dock on a high-definition television .
Otherwise , content would be scaled down to 480x272 pixels  on the  player 's OLED touchscreen .
Old Sparky , the electric chair used at  गाओ गाओ थाना
Execution by electrocution , usually performed using an electric chair , is an execution method originating in the United States in which the condemned person is  strapped to a विशेषकर निर्मित लकड़ी कुर्सी  and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body .
This execution method was created by employees of Thomas Edison during the War of Currents , and has been used only in the United States and , for a period of several decades , in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under  अमरीकी occupation , पिछला  in 1976 ) .
Historically , once the condemned person was attached to the chair , various cycles ( differing  in वोल्टेज और अवधि ) of प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान  would be passed through the individual 's body , in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ) .
The first jolt of electric current  थी designed to कारण तात्कालिक unconsciousness  and brain death ; the second one was designed to cause fatal damage to the vital organs .
Death was frequently caused by  विद्युत  overstimulation of the heart .
Although in the United States the electric chair has become a symbol of the death penalty , its use is in decline  due to the वृद्धि of lethal इंजेक्शन , जिससे is widely believed to be a  more humane method of execution .
Although some states still  maintain electrocution as a विधि of निष्पादन , आज it is तभी कायम as a द्वितीयक विधि कि may be चुनी over lethal इंजेक्शन at the निवेदन of the कैदी .
As of 2010 , electrocution  is  an optional form of execution in Alabama , Florida , South Carolina and Virginia .
They  allow the  prisoner to choose lethal injection as an alternative method .
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee  , the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै महरूम रिटायर्ड  except for those whose capital crimes were committed prior to legislated dates in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31 , 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31 , 1998 ) and who chose electrocution .
In both states ,  inmates जो  do not choose electrocution or inmates who committed their crimes after the designated date are killed by lethal injection .
The electric chair is an alternate form of execution approved for potential use in Arkansas  और  Oklahoma if other forms of execution are found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution .
It is the sole method of execution in Vermont , where treason is the   only capital crime .
On February 8 , 2008 , the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that execution by  इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी थी a  `` cruel and unusual punishment '' under the state 's constitution .
This brought executions of this type to an end in Nebraska , the only remaining state to retain electrocution as its sole  विधि of निष्पादन  for murder .
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the General Assembly , the state  विधानमंडल of the अमरीकी राज्य of मेरीलैंड  , and is composed of 141 Delegates elected from 47 districts .
The House of Delegates Chamber is located in the Maryland  राज्य  House ( state capitol ) on State Circle in Annapolis , which is the state capital .
The State House also houses  the मेरीलैंड  State Senate Chamber and the offices of the Governor and Lieutenant Governor of the State of Maryland .
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis , in the nearby Casper R. Taylor , Jr.  हाउस दफ्तर भवन  .
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle for Paris ) took place during World War II from 19 August  1944 जबतक the आत्मसमर्पण of the  occupying German garrison on 25 August .
The Liberation of Paris  प्रारंभ साथ  an uprising by the French Resistance against the German garrison .
on 24 अगस्त , the फ्रेंच शक्तियां  of the Interior ( Forces françaises de l'intérieur , FFI ) received reinforcements from the Free French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton .
The  पूंजी प्रदेश of फ़्रांस था महरूम governed by नाजी जर्मनी  since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice in June 1940 , when the German Army occupied northern and westernmost France , and when the puppet regime of Vichy France was established in the town of Vichy in central France .
This battle marked the liberation   of Paris and the exile of the Vichy government to Sigmaringen in Germany .
However , there was still  much भारी लड़ to be किया  before France was liberated , including the campaign in southern France during August-September ( in Provence and extending into the southwestern region of the Vosges Mountains ) , along the German-held seaports of western France ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ) , in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France , and in northeastern France , such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers .
The German Army and SS fought doggedly in  ये क्षेत्रों लिये  the remainder of 1944 and into 1945 .
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as  `` अहसास alright '' is a सोंग लिखा  by Dave Mason of the English rock band Traffic from their eponymous 1968 album , Traffic .
The song was also a hit single for several performers : Joe Cocker ( 1969 , # 69 , recharted in 1972 , US # 33 ) , Mongo Santamaría  ( 1969 , # 95  ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971 , US # 54 ) .
It has also been recorded by Three Dog Night ( 1969 ) , The 5th Dimension ( 1970 ) , Lou Rawls , Freddie King , Paul Weller , Lulu , Chairmen of the Board ( 1970 ) , Rare Earth , The Electric  Concept Orchestra , Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ) ,  The Ohio Players ( 1971 ) , Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ) , Maceo Parker , Gladys Knight & the Pips , Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes .
A Steel  ढोल संस्करण by त्रिनिदाद आयल  Company was reissued on the dancefloor jazz compilation Blue Juice 2 .
It was also featured in the 2000 film Duets ,  सुंग by  Huey Lewis .
Both the original and the Joe Cocker cover were featured in the movie Flight , starring  डेंज़ल वॉशिंगटन  .
Devon Werkheiser ( born March 8,1991 ) is an American actor , voice actor , singer ,  songwriter और  musician , best known for his starring role as Ned Bigby on the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned 's Declassified School Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules , as the lead character Nolan Byrd .

Sample view of an electronic  स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड  based on images
Sample view of an electronic health  रिकार्ड
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an  evolving  concept defined as a systematic collection of electronic health information about individual patients or populations .
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically  सक्षम of होने  shared across different health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can  occur by रास्ता  of network-connected enterprise-wide information systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may include a range of data , including demographics , medical history , medication and allergies , immunization status , laboratory test results , radiology images , vital signs  , निजी आंकड़े जैसे आयु  and weight , and billing information .
Loan origination is the process by which a borrower applies for a new loan , and a  lender प्रक्रियाओं कि अनुप्रयोग  .
Origination generally  शामिल सब the कदम इससे लेने  a loan application up to disbursal of funds ( or declining the application ) .
Loan servicing covers everything after disbursing the funds  जबतक the ऋण is  fully paid off .
Loan origination is a specialized version of new account opening  लिये वित्तीय  services organizations .
Certain people and organizations  specialize  in loan origination .
Mortgage  brokers  and other mortgage originator companies serve as a prominent example .
There are  अनेक  different types of loans .
For more  सूचना  on loan types , see the loan and consumer lending articles .
Steps involved in originating a loan vary by loan type , various kinds of  ऋण रिस्क , नियामक  , lender policy , and other factors .
Top left : The Tennessee Valley Authority , part  of the नई  Deal , being signed into law in 1933 .
Top right : Franklin Delano Roosevelt , who was responsible for initiatives and programs collectively  ज्ञात as the  New Deal .
Bottom  : a पब्लिक भित्ति  from one of the artists employed by the New Deal .
The  नई सौदे थी  a series of economic programs enacted in the United States between 1933 and 1936 .
They involved presidential executive orders or laws passed by Congress during the first term of President  फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt .
The programs were in response to the Great Depression ,  और केन्द्रित on कया इतिहासकारों  call the `` 3 Rs '' : Relief , Recovery , and Reform .
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and Reform of the financial  प्रणाली to prevent  a repeat depression .
The New Deal produced a political realignment , making the Democratic  Party the majority ( as well as the  party that held the White House for seven out of nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ) , with its base in liberal ideas , the white South , traditional Democrats , big city machines , and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities .
The Republicans were  विभाजित , साथ  conservatives opposing the entire New Deal as an enemy of business and growth , and liberals accepting some of it and promising to make it more efficient .
The realignment crystallized into the New Deal Coalition that dominated most presidential elections  into the 1960s , जबकि  the opposition Conservative Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
By 1936 the  पद `` उदार  '' typically was used for supporters of the New Deal , and `` conservative `` for its opponents .
From 1934 to  1938 , रूज़वेल्ट थी assisted in उसके endeavours  by a “pro-spender” majority in Congress ( drawn from two-party , competitive , non-machine , Progressive , and Left party districts ) .
As noted by Alexander Hicks , “Roosevelt , backed by rare , non-Southern Democrat majorities — 270 non-Southern Democrat representatives and 71  non-southern डेमोक्रेट  senators — spelled Second New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a  `` पहला नई सौदे ''  ( 1933–34 ) and a `` Second New Deal '' ( 1935–38 ) , with the second one more liberal and more controversial .
The `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt with diverse groups , from  बैंकिंग और railroads to उद्योग और  farming , all of which demanded help for economic survival .
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration , for instance ,  provided $ 500 लाख  for relief operations by states and cities , while the short-lived CWA ( Civil Works Administration ) gave localities money to operate make-work projects in 1933-34 .
The `` Second New Deal ``  in 1935–38 शामिल the वेगनर अधिनियम to प्रचार मजदूर  unions , the Works Progress Administration ( WPA ) relief program ( which made the federal government by far the largest single employer in the nation ) , the Social Security Act , and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers .
The final major items of New Deal legislation were the creation of the United States Housing Authority and Farm Security  प्रशासन , दोनो in 1937 , और the मेला  Labor Standards Act of 1938 , which set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of workers .
The economic downturn of  1937–38 , और the कड़वा  split between the AFL and CIO labor unions led to major Republican gains in Congress in 1938 .
Conservative Republicans and Democrats in Congress joined in the informal  रूढ़िवादी गठबन्धन  .
By 1942–43 they shut down relief programs  ऐसे  as the WPA and CCC and blocked major liberal proposals .
Roosevelt himself turned his attention to the war   effort , and won reelection in 1940 and 1944 .
The Supreme Court declared the National Recovery Administration ( NRA ) and the first version of the Agricultural Adjustment Act (  aaa ) असंवैधानिक , however the aaa  was rewritten and then upheld .
As the first Republican president elected after FDR , Dwight D. Eisenhower ( 1953–61 ) left the New  सौदे largely  intact , even expanding it in some areas .
In the 1960s , Lyndon B. Johnson 's Great Society used the New Deal as inspiration for a dramatic  विस्तार of उदार कार्यक्रम , जिससे  Republican Richard M. Nixon generally retained .
After 1974 , however , the call for deregulation   of the economy gained bipartisan support .
The New   Deal regulation of banking ( Glass–Steagall Act ) was suspended in the 1990s .
Many New Deal programs remain active , with some still operating under the original names , including the Federal Deposit Insurance  निगम  ( FDIC ) , the Federal Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ) , the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ) , and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ) .
The largest  कार्यक्रम स्टिल in अस्तित्व  today are the Social Security System and the Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) .
A woman ( ) , pl : women ( ) is  a मादा  human .
The term woman is usually reserved for an   adult , with the term girl being the usual term for a female child or adolescent .
However , the term woman is also sometimes used to identify a female human , regardless of age , as in  वाक्यांश ऐसे as `` महिलाओं  's rights `` .
Women are  typically  capable of giving birth , though older women who have gone through menopause and some intersex women can not .
`` I Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a song performed by American rock band Aerosmith  लिये the 1998 फिल्मी  Armageddon .
Written by Diane Warren , the song debuted  at क्रमांक एक  on the Billboard Hot 100 ( the first # 1 for the band after 28 years together ) .
The song stayed at number one for four weeks from September 5  to  September 26 , 1998 .
The song also  ठहरे at क्रमांक 1  for several weeks in several other countries .
In the UK , the song peaked at number four , becoming Aerosmith 's highest charting song in the UK , where it was the 17th best-selling single of  1998 , और  has sold over a million copies .
Although not  प्रयुक्त by the  majority of the world 's countries , daylight saving time is common in the Western world .
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British English — is the practice of advancing clocks during the lighter months  so कि evenings  have more daylight and mornings have less .
Typically clocks are  समायोजित आगे  one hour near the start of spring and are adjusted backward in autumn .
The modern  विचार of daylight छायांकन थी पहला प्रस्तावित in 1895 by जार्ज vernon  Hudson and it was first implemented during the First World War .
Many countries  have प्रयुक्त it at विभिन्न  times since then .
Much of the  संयुक्त राज्य प्रयुक्त  DST in the 1950s and 1960s , and DST use expanded following the 1970s energy crisis and has been widely used in North America and Europe since then .
The practice has been both praised and  criticized  .
Adding daylight to evenings benefits retailing , sports , and other activities that exploit sunlight after working  घंटों , लकिन can कारण समस्याएं  for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun .
Although an early goal of DST was to reduce evening usage of incandescent lighting ( formerly a primary use of electricity ) , modern heating and cooling usage patterns differ greatly , and research  परिचय कैसा  DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory .
DST clock shifts present  अन्य चुनौतियां  .
They complicate timekeeping , and can disrupt meetings , travel , billing , record keeping , medical  डिवाइस , भारी उपकरण ,  and sleep patterns .
Software can often adjust computer clocks  automatically , लकिन इस can  be limited and error-prone , particularly when DST dates are changed .

Montargis is a commune in the Loiret  विभाग  in north-central France on the Loing river .
The town is  स्तिथ परिचय  south of Paris and east of Orléans in the Gâtinais .
Montargis is the second  largest नगर  in the Loiret , after Orléans .
It is near a large forest , and  contains  light industry and farming , including saffron .
Due to  इसके numerous नहरों  and bridges , Montargis sometimes bills itself as the `` Venice of the Gâtinais . ''
Though  काफी  modern , it retains a medieval charm in its downtown area .
In computer storage , a logical unit number , or LUN , is a number used to identify a logical unit , which is a device addressed by the SCSI protocol or  प्रोटोकॉल जिससे  encapsulate SCSI , such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI .
A LUN may be used with any device  जिससे supports read/write  operations , such as a tape drive , but is most often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN .
Though not technically  सही , the पद  `` LUN '' is often also used to refer to the logical disk itself .
The Gospel According to Mark ( ,  , to  euangelion kata Markon ) , commonly shortened to the Gospel of Mark or simply Mark , is the second book of the New Testament .
This canonical  खाता of  the life of Jesus of Nazareth is one of the three synoptic gospels .
It was thought to be an   epitome , which accounts for its place as the second gospel in the Bible .
However , most contemporary scholars now regard it as the earliest of the canonical  gospels  ( c 70 ) .
That Mark was used as a source for the other synoptic gospels Gospel of Matthew and  इन्जील  of Luke is widely held by many , although not all , New Testament scholars .
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus from his baptism  by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to  his death and resurrection .
It focuses particularly on the last week of his life (  अध्याय 11–16 )  in Jerusalem .
Its swift narrative portrays Jesus as a heroic man of action , an exorcist ,  healer  and miracle worker .
An important theme of Mark is the  मुक्तिदाता रहस्य  .
Jesus silences the demoniacs he heals , tries  unsuccessfully to रखना उसके मुक्तिदाता पहचान  secret , and conceals his message with parables .
Meanwhile , the disciples fail  to  understand both the implication of the miracles of Jesus and the meaning of the things he predicts about his arrest , death and resurrection .
Most scholars believe that the original text of the gospel ends at Mark  16:8  with the discovery of Jesus ' empty tomb and that the following account of his resurrection appearances is a later addition .
According to tradition and some early church writers , the author is Mark  the इंजीलवादी , the साथी  of the apostle Peter .
The gospel , however , appears to rely on several underlying sources , varying in form and in theology , which tells against  the परंपरा  that the gospel was based on Peter 's preaching .
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as well as known apostolic preachings , and pre-existing written records that do not exist today but can be confirmed  इससे 2nd-century  commentators .
Some of the stories in the  इन्जील may have महरूम transmitted  orally before being written down .
Various  तत्व भीतर  the gospel suggest that the author wrote in Syria or Palestine for a non-Jewish Christian community .
The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel written by English philologist and University of Oxford  प्राध्यापक J. R. R. tolkien  .
The story began  as a sequel to  Tolkien 's 1937 children 's fantasy novel The Hobbit , but eventually developed into a much larger work .
It was written in  चरण between  1937 and 1949 , much of it during World War II .
It is the second best-selling novel ever written , with over 150  लाख नक़ल  sold .
The title of the novel refers to the  स्टोरी 's प्रमुख  antagonist , the Dark Lord Sauron , who had in an earlier age created the One Ring to rule the other Rings of Power as the ultimate weapon in his campaign to conquer and rule all of Middle-earth .
From quiet  beginnings in the शायर , a होब्बिट जमीन नहीं नापसंद the अंग्रेज़ी countryside  , the story ranges across north-west Middle-earth , following the course of the War of the Ring through the eyes of its characters , notably the hobbits Frodo Baggins , Samwise `` Sam '' Gamgee , Meriadoc `` Merry '' Brandybuck and Peregrin `` Pippin '' Took , but also the hobbits ' chief allies and travelling companions : Aragorn , a Human Ranger ; Boromir , a man from Gondor ; Gimli , a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas , an Elven prince ; and Gandalf , a Wizard .
The work  थी initially intended  by Tolkien to be one volume of a two-volume set , with the other being The Silmarillion , but this idea was dismissed by his publisher .
It was decided for economic reasons to publish The Lord of the Rings as three  आयतन over the कोर्स of a साल इससे 29 जुलाई 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर  1955 , thus creating the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy .
The  तीन आयतन यहूद हकदार  The Fellowship of the Ring , The Two Towers , and The Return of the King .
Structurally , the  अनोखा is विभाजित internally into  six books , two per volume , with several appendices of background material included at the end of the third volume .
The Lord of the Rings has since been  reprinted numerous  times and translated into many languages .
tolkien 's कार्य रै महरूम  the subject of extensive analysis of its themes and origins .
Although a major work in itself , the story was only the last movement of a larger epic Tolkien had worked on since 1917 , in a process  he वर्णित as  mythopoeia .
Influences on this earlier work , and on the story of The Lord  of the बजती , शामिल philology , mythology , धर्म  and the author 's distaste for the effects of industrialization , as well as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I .
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on modern fantasy ; the impact of Tolkien 's  works is ऐसे कि the उपयोग of  the words `` Tolkienian '' and `` Tolkienesque '' have been recorded in the Oxford English Dictionary .
The enduring popularity of The  रब of the बजती रै led to numerous  references in popular culture , the founding of many societies by fans of Tolkien 's works , and the publication of many books about Tolkien and his works .
The Lord of the Rings has inspired , and continues to inspire , artwork , music  , films और टेलीविज़न ,  video games , and subsequent literature .
Award-winning adaptations of The Lord of the Rings have been made for radio  ,  theatre , and film .

The series  debuted on जनवरी  11 , 2004 .
A TV film Merry Christmas  , ड्रेक & जोश थी बना  apart from the regular series on December 5 , 2008 .
There are a  कुल  of 60 episodes were produced spanning four seasons .

The San Francisco 49ers  conduct  training camp at the team 's headquarters and practice facility in Santa Clara , California in August 2010 .
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the exception of quarterback Alex Smith , who is in a black jersey ; the  रक्षा in श्वेत  .
In the National Football League , training camp refers to the time before the season  commences  .
During this time , teams will sometimes congregate at an  बाहर स्थान , प्रायः a विश्वविद्यालयों  , to conduct training camp for at least the first few weeks .
This is similar to  बेसबॉल 's वसन्त  training .
Training camp is used in  अनेक अलग  ways .
New  खिलाड़ी और कोच  use it to acclimate themselves to new teammates and systems .
For younger players , it serves as a period of evaluation ; for veterans , it is time to  गोलाकार वापस into  form .
Training camp is divided  into अनेक  different components .
the  first is scrimmages .
These are pseudo-games where teams run  nearly पूरा खेल  ' worth of plays .
Sometimes  , दो अभ्यास सत्र  are held on the same day .
This concept is  referred to as  two-a-days .
Other parts of training camp include drills , meetings with coaches and other players at one  's स्थिति , वज़न प्रशिक्षण , और pre-season  games .
The latter half of  प्रशिक्षण शिविर लीड  directly into the exhibition season .
With NFL training  शिविरों starting  in late-July , the biggest concern has been dehydration .
In 2001 , Minnesota Vikings player Korey Stringer died of a medical   condition based from dehydration and heatstroke .
The  मौत of stringer  prompted the NFL to change their training policies .
At each practice , every team must have the team doctor and trainers on the field ; additionally , an   ambulance must be present during practices .
With NFL training camps beginning in late July , severe  मौसम can affect  practice and exhibition games .
in 2002 , a क्लीवलैंड भूरा प्रदर्शनी खेल ended due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड भूरा स्टेडियम , और कठोर तूफ़ान have महरूम ज्ञात to disrupt प्रशिक्षण शिविरों  .
Fans are often able to  विज़िट उनके पसंदीदा टोली 's प्रशिक्षण शिविर to कैच an जल्दी dekh at  the players ; admission to practices is often free or substantially less expensive than a game ticket , making training camp trips a popular option for fans who can not attend many games due to financial or other reasons .
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions  at  camp sites along with offering activities and events to make training camp a more fan-friendly experience .
In computing , a file system ( or filesystem ) is a type of data store which can be used to  स्टोर  , retrieve and update a set of files .
The term could refer to the abstract data structures used to define files , or to the actual software or firmware components  कि implement  the abstract ideas .
Some file systems are used on local data storage  डिवाइस ; अन्य provide  file access via a network protocol ( e.g . NFS , SMB , or 9P clients ) .
Some file systems are ``  आभासी  '' , in that the `` files '' supplied are computed on request ( e.g . procfs ) or are merely a mapping into a different file system used as a backing store .
The file system manages access to both the content of files and the  मेटाडेटा  about those files .
It is responsible for arranging storage space ; reliability , efficiency , and tuning with regard to the  शारीरिक भंडार  medium are important design considerations .
William Howard Taft ( September 15 , 1857 – March 8 , 1930 ) was the 27th President of the United States  ( 1909–1913 ) और बाद the दसवाँ  Chief Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ) .
He is the  तभी व्यक्ति to have  served in both of these offices .
Before becoming President , Taft , a Republican , was selected to serve on the Superior Court  of सिनसिनाटी  in 1887 .
In 1890 , Taft  थी नियुक्त solicitor सामान्य  of the United States and in 1891 a judge on the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit .
In  1900 ,  President William McKinley appointed Taft Governor-General of the Philippines .
In 1904 , President Theodore Roosevelt appointed Taft Secretary of War in an effort to groom Taft , then his close political ally , into his handpicked presidential successor   .
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving , assuming on some occasions the role of acting Secretary of State , while declining  दोहराया offers इससे रूज़वेल्ट to serve on the परम्  Court .
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow Republican Roosevelt , Taft won an easy victory in  his  1908 bid for the presidency .
In his only term , Taft 's domestic agenda emphasized trust-busting , civil service reform , strengthening the Interstate Commerce Commission , improving the performance of the postal service , and  ड्योढ़ी of the  Sixteenth Amendment .
Abroad , Taft sought to further the economic development of nations in Latin America and Asia through `` Dollar Diplomacy `` , and showed decisiveness and restraint in response to  क्रान्ति  in Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political ramifications of his decisions , often alienated his own key constituencies , and was  overwhelmingly पराजित in उसके बोली  for a second term in the presidential election of 1912 .
In surveys of presidential scholars , Taft is usually ranked near the  मध्य of सूचियाँ  of all American Presidents .
After leaving  दफ्तर , taft खर्च  his time in academia , arbitration , and the search for world peace through his self-founded League to Enforce Peace .
In 1921 , after the  पहला संसार युद्ध  , President Warren G. Harding appointed Taft Chief Justice of the United States .
Taft served in this capacity until shortly before  उसके मौत in 1930  .
The Ten Commandments is a 1956 epic film produced and directed by Cecil B. DeMille that dramatized the biblical story of the Exodus , in  जिससे the hebrew-born  Moses , an adopted Egyptian prince , becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves .
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role , Yul Brynner as his adoptive brother , Pharaoh Rameses II , Anne Baxter as Nefretiri , Edward G.  रॉबिन्सन as dathan , yvonne de  Carlo as Sephora , Debra Paget as Lilia , and John Derek as Joshua .
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke as Pharaoh Seti I , Nina Foch as Bithiah , Martha Scott as Yoshebel , Judith Anderson as Memnet , Vincent  दाम as baka ,  and John Carradine as Aaron .
The film was released by  सर्वोपरि  Pictures in VistaVision on October 5 , 1956 .
The Ten Commandments , which DeMille narrated , was the last  फिल्मी कि he  directed .
He was set to  सीधा  the 1958 remake of his 1938 film The Buccaneer , but his final illness forced him to relinquish the directing chores to his son-in-law , actor Anthony Quinn .
DeMille had also planned to film the life of Lord Baden Powell , the founder of the Scout movement , with  दाउद niven  ; this project was never realized .
The Ten  आयतें is a  partial remake of DeMille 's 1923 silent film .
Some of the cast and crew of the 1956 version worked on  the असली .
It  रै चूंकि  been remade as a television miniseries broadcast in April 2006 .
The  टेन आयतें is एक of the  most financially successful films ever made , grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office .
Adjusting for inflation , this makes it the sixth highest-grossing film domestically ,  साथ an समायोजित  total of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012 .
The box office website ``  the संख्याएँ '' सूचियाँ  the domestic gross at $ 80 million .
In 1999 , The Ten  आयतें थी चयनित लिये संरक्षण in  the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant '' .
In June 2008  , the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नाज़िल इसके `` टेन शीर्ष टेन `` —the बेहतरीन टेन films in टेन अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 लोगों इससे the रचनात्मक जातियाँ .
The Ten  आयतें थी  listed as the tenth best film in the epic genre .
The film received seven Academy Award nominations including Best  चित्र , और जीती the अकादमी  Award for Best Visual Effects .
Charlton Heston was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for Best Motion  चित्र कर्ता in the  drama category .
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Actor for his role as Rameses , along with his other roles in The King and I and Anastasia .
Louisville ( ,  or ) is  a major city and the largest city in the U.S. state of Kentucky and the county seat of Jefferson County .
Since 2003 , the city 's borders have been with those of the county  क्युकी of a city-county  merger .
The city 's total consolidated  जनसांख्यिकी  at the 2010 census was 741,096 ( Louisville 's balance total , 602,011 , excludes semi-autonomous towns and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ) .
As of 2010 , the  louisville महानगर  area ( MSA ) had a population of 1,307,647 ranking 42nd nationally .
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding counties , eight in Kentucky and  चार  in Southern Indiana ( see Geography below ) .
The Louisville Combined Statistical Area  , having a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,451,564 , शामिल  the MSA , Hardin County and Larue County in Kentucky , and Scott County , Indiana .
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century , Louisville today is best  ज्ञात as the  location of the Kentucky Derby , the first of three annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown .
A typical experimental setup for an aldol  प्रतिक्रिया  .
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the temperature of which is being monitored by a  तापयुग्म  ( the wire on the left ) .
A cooling bath , in laboratory chemistry ( often but not always organic  रसायन ) अभ्यास  , is a liquid mixture which is used to maintain low temperatures , typically between 13 °C and −196 °C .
These low temperatures  हैं प्रयुक्त to  collect liquids after distillation , to remove solvents using a rotary evaporator , or to perform a chemical reaction below room temperature ( see : kinetic control ) .
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen , water , or even air ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3 components : ( 1 ) a  कूलिंग एजेंट ( ऐसे as शुष्क बर्फ or जल बर्फ ) ; ( b ) a द्रव  'carrier ' ( such as liquid water , ethylene glycol , acetone , etc . ) , which transfers heat between the bath and the vessel ; ; and ( c ) an additive to depress the melting-point of the solid/liquid system .
( A familiar example of this is the use of an  ice/rock-salt मिश्रण to फ्रीज  ice cream .
The phase-change of  बर्फ into द्रव  water requires energy , 'pulling ' heat from the system .
Adding salt lowers the temp at which this happens ,  अर्थ  more energy has to be absorbed from the environment in order to melt the ice .
This effectively makes the ice 'colder ' —  it जरूर 'pull ' अधिक ऊष्मा इससे इसके पर्यावरण  to become liquid . )
Eating disorders are conditions defined by abnormal  खाने आदतें कि may  involve either insufficient or excessive food intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health .
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa  हैं the सबसे आम  specific forms in the United Kingdom .
Other types of eating disorders include binge eating  विकार और  eating disorder not otherwise specified .
Bulimia nervosa is a disorder characterized by binge eating and  purging  .
Purging  can  include self-induce vomiting , over-exercising , and the usage of diuretics , enemas , and laxatives .
Anorexia nervosa is characterized by extreme food restriction to the  पाइंट of self-starvation  and excessive weight loss .
हालांकि primarily  thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10 million being affected in the U.K. ) , eating disorders affect males as well .
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people  साथ खाने विकार  are males ( Gorgan , 1999 ) .
( an  अनुमानित 1 लाख  U.K. males being affected ) .
Although eating disorders are increasing all over the world among both men and women , there is evidence to suggest that it is women in the Western world who are at the highest risk  of  developing them and the degree of westernization increases the risk .
Nearly  हाफ of सब  Americans personally know someone with an eating disorder .
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased tremendously since leptin was discovered , and the skill to observe  the कृत्यों of the दिमाग  as well .
Interactions between motivational , homeostatic and  self-regulatory कंट्रोल प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल  in eating behaviour , which is a key component in eating disorders .
The precise cause of eating disorders is not  entirely समझा  , but there is evidence that it may be linked to other medical conditions and situations .
Cultural idealization of thinness and youthfulness have contributed to eating disorders   affecting diverse populations .
One study showed that girls  साथ adhd have a वृहद मौका  of getting an eating disorder than those not affected by ADHD .
Another study suggested that women with PTSD , especially due to sexually related trauma  ,  are more likely to develop anorexia nervosa .
One study showed that foster girls are more  संभावित  to develop bulimia nervosa .
Some think that peer pressure and idealized body-types seen in the media are also a  significant फ़ैक्टर  .
Some research show that for certain people there are  जेनेटिक  reasons why they may be prone to developing an eating disorder .
Recent studies  have मिला प्रमाण  a correlation between patients with bulimia nervosa and substance use disorders .
In addition , anxiety disorders and personality disorders are  आम  occurrences with clients of eating disorders .
While proper treatment can be highly effective for many suffering from specific types of eating disorders , the consequences of eating disorders can be severe , including death ( whether from direct medical effects  of अशांत खाने आदतें or इससे comorbid  conditions such as suicidal thinking ) .
Slavery in  the संयुक्त राज्य existed इससे the जल्दी  years of the colonial period ; it was firmly established by the time the United States sought independence from Great Britain in 1776 .
However , by  1804  , all states north of the Mason and Dixon Line had either abolished slavery outright or passed laws for the gradual abolition of slavery .
In 1787 Congress prohibited slavery in the Northwest  territory  .
But slavery gained new life in the South with the cotton industry after 1800 , and  विस्तारित into the दक्षिणपश्चिम  .
The nation was polarized  into  slave and free states along the Mason-Dixon Line , which separated Pennsylvania and Maryland .
The United States and  ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  both prohibited the international slave trade in 1808 , but the domestic trade , with sales to the Deep South , expanded dramatically , and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade .
Before the 1840s , the  दक्षिण थी  vigorously defending slavery and its expansion into the territories .
In the North some abolitionists  denounced it as गुनाहगार  , and numerous anti-slavery forces rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free men .
After failed compromises and Abraham Lincoln 's  चुनाव , in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव  states broke away to form the Confederate States of America , leading to the American Civil War .
the संघीय सरकारी  in 1862 made abolition of slavery a war goal .
In January 1863 President Lincoln freed slaves in  the  Confederacy through the Emancipation Proclamation .
After the war , the Thirteenth Amendment , effective December 1865 , abolished slavery throughout the entire United States , including the Border states and the  भारतीय territories  .
From the 16th to  the 19th सदियां , an अनुमानित  12 million Africans were shipped as slaves to the Americas .
See Slavery in  the americas  .
The great majority  went to the  sugar plantations of the West Indies or Brazil , where mortality was high .
About  645,000 यहूद brought  to what is now the United States .
By the 1860 United States Census , the slave population in the American South had  grown to  four million .
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave states , nearly 400,000  आयोजित स्लेव ( roughly एक in चार ) , amounting  to 8 % of all American families .
While some slaves worked as house servants and urban artisans , the great majority worked on  बागानों or विशाल खेतो , cultivating  lucrative cash crops , such as rice , tobacco , sugar and , after 1800 , chiefly cotton .
By 1860 most  स्लेव यहूद  held in the Deep South , where they served in work-gangs ; two-thirds worked in cotton .
in छोटी परिचालन  , they worked with their owners .
In large plantations they were directed  by श्वेत सशुल्क overseers  .
Under the system that became chattel slavery ( ownership of a human being , and of  his/her वंशजों ) , a जातिगत तत्व थी आधारभूत : स्लेव यहूद  blacks of African descent and owned , almost universally , by whites of European descent .
In the 17th century , Virginia , followed by other southern colonies , enacted law that children of   slave mothers were born into slavery .
स्लेव could लाभ स्वतंत्रता तभी by कार्यशील दूर ( जिससे थी मुश्किल और illegal to do ) , or by manumission by स्वामी , जिससे थी regulated by राज्य , और became increasingly मुश्किल or निषिद्ध .
In the earliest era of chattel  गुलामी , the colonies  also organized work by a system of bonded labor known as indentured servitude .
This  typically lasted लिये अनेक सालो लिये दोनो  poor Europeans and Africans alike , to pay off the costs of transport to the colonies .
They contracted for such arrangements  क्युकी of ग़रीब  economies in their home countries .
Between 1680 and 1700 , as fewer  europeans migrated to the colonies  , planters began to import more Africans as slaves .
Recognizing the importance of slavery , the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code in 1705 ; it combined a variety of legislation and added new  प्रावधानों enforcing श्वेत सर्वोच्चता  in the law .
Schematic cross  खण्ड of भाग  of leaf , xylem shown as red circles at figure 8 .
Xylem is one of the two types of transport tissue in  vascular पौधे ( फ्लोएम is  the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ) , meaning `` wood '' ; the best-known xylem  ऊतक is लकडी , हालांकि it is  found throughout the plant .
Its basic function is to transport water , but it also transports some nutrients through   the plant .
This clock  प्रतिनिधित्व shows कुछ of  the major units of geological time and definitive events of Earth history .
The Hadean eon represents the time before  चट्टान रिकार्ड  of life on Earth ; its upper boundary is now regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ) .
Other  subdivisions प्रतिबिंबित the एवोल्यूशन  of life ; the Archean and Proterozoic are both eons , the Palaeozoic , Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon .
The two million year Quaternary period , the time of recognizable humans , is too small to be  दृश्य  at this scale .
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time , and is used by geologists ,  paleontologists , और अन्य धरती वैज्ञानिकों  to describe the timing and relationships between events that have occurred throughout Earth 's history .
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with the dates and  नामकरण नियत forth by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Commission on Stratigraphy standard color codes of the International Commission on Stratigraphy .
Evidence from radiometric dating  indicates कि the  Earth is about 4.54 billion years old .
The geology or deep time of Earth 's past has been organized  into विभिन्न इकाई  according to events which took place in each period .
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes in the composition of   strata which correspond to them , indicating major geological or paleontological events , such as mass extinctions .
For example , the boundary between the Cretaceous period and the Paleogene period is  पारिभाषित by the cretaceous–paleogene extinction इवेंट  , which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life .
Older time spans which predate the reliable fossil record ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are  पारिभाषित by निरपेक्ष  age .
The TI-82 is a graphing  परिपथ  made by Texas Instruments .
The TI-82 was designed in 1993 as a stripped down , more user friendly version of  the ti-85  , and as a replacement for the TI-81 .
It was the direct predecessor of the  ti-83  .
It shares  साथ the ti-85  a 6 MHz Zilog Z80 microprocessor .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features a 96x64 pixel display , and the core feature set of the TI-81 with many new  सुविधाएँ  .
The cast of characters of  the किंग of  Fighters XI .
The King of Fighters fighting game series , produced by SNK Playmore , includes a wide cast of characters , some of which are taken from other  snk खेल  .
The story takes place in a fictional universe  in  which an annual series of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 fighting tournaments are held .
The first game in the series introduces the initial main character of the series , Kyo Kusanagi , a young Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial  कलाकारों  having pyrokinetic abilities .
Kyo fights against   the Kusanagi clan 's enemies , his rival Iori Yagami , and the god Orochi and its human followers , among others .
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights , while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a new story arc , revolving around K ' , a young man who seeks to destroy the mysterious NESTS organization because they kidnapped him at an early age and stripped him  of उसके पास्ट यादें , so कि वे could फ़ोर्स  him to be a fighter under their control .
In The King of Fighters 2003 , a new character named Ash Crimson enters the tournament , to steal the powers of the clans who sealed the Orochi in  the पास्ट लिये an अनजान  reason .
A new group of antagonists , known as Those From the Past , also appears in the series ; they want to obtain Orochi 's power for the purpose of giving it to  उनके  unknown master .
The plot and the characters came from  the yamata  no Orochi legend .
There are also several characters in the games that are parodies or  homages to अनेक लोकप्रिय  anime , manga , and films .
Merchandise based on  the वर्ण  has also been released , including action figures and keychains .
The characters have garnered praise from several video game publications for the  विशेषता  of their designs and movesets .
Comments focused on the lack of improvements in some of the characters , but  added कि  the roster is greatly diverse .
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series  कि premiered on नवम्बर 7 , 2008  on the Animal Planet cable channel .
The program follows Paul Watson , founder of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society , as he and the crew  सवार उनके  various vessels harass Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica .
On January 5 , 2013 , Animal  ग्रह नवीनीकृत the श्रेणी  for a sixth season .
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia harpyja ) is a  neotropical प्रजाति  of eagle .
It is sometimes known as the American Harpy Eagle to distinguish it from the Papuan Eagle which is sometimes known as  the नई गिनी  Harpy Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle .
It is the largest and most powerful raptor found in the Americas , and among the largest extant species of  ईगल्स in the संसार  .
It usually inhabits tropical lowland rainforests in the upper ( emergent )  canopy  layer .
Destruction of its natural habitat has seen it vanish from many parts of its former range , and it is nearly extirpated in Central  अमेरिका  .
Biological classification , or scientific classification in biology , is a method of scientific  taxonomy used to group and  categorize organisms into groups such as genus or species .
These groups are known as taxa ( singular :  टैक्सोन  ) .
Modern biological  वर्गीकरण रै इसके रूट in  the work of Carolus Linnaeus , who grouped species according to shared physical characteristics .
These groupings have since been revised to improve consistency with the Darwinian  principle of आम  descent .
With the introduction of the cladistic method in the late 20th century , phylogenetic taxonomy in which organisms are grouped based purely on inferred evolutionary  relatedness ,  ignoring morphological similarity , has become common in some areas of biology .
Molecular phylogenetics , which uses DNA sequences as data , has also driven many  हाल revisions और is संभावित  to continue doing so .
biological वर्गीकरण belongs  to the science of biological systematics .
Lennon 's  हस्ताक्षर
John Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John Winston Lennon ; 9 October 1940 – 8 December 1980 ) was an English musician , singer and songwriter who rose to worldwide fame as a founder member of  the बीटल्स  , one of the most commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music .
साथ पॉल mccartney  , he formed one of the most celebrated songwriting partnerships of the 20th century .
Born and raised in Liverpool , as a teenager Lennon became involved in the skiffle craze ; his first band , the Quarrymen , evolved  into the बीटल्स  in 1960 .
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade , Lennon embarked on a solo career  कि उत्पादित the critically acclaimed  albums John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band and Imagine , and iconic songs such as `` Give Peace a Chance `` and `` Imagine `` .
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969 , he changed his  नाम to जॉन  Ono Lennon .
Lennon disengaged himself from the music business in 1975 to devote time to  उठाने उसके शिशु  son Sean , but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy .
He was murdered three  सप्ताह बाद  its release .
Lennon revealed a rebellious  प्रकृति और acerbic wit in उसके  music , writing , drawings , on film and in interviews .
Controversial through his political and peace activism , he moved to New York City in 1971 , where his criticism of the Vietnam War  resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड निक्सन 's  administration to deport him , while some of his songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement .
As of 2012 , Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 million units , and as writer , co-writer or performer ,  he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the us hot 100  chart .
In 2002 , a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest Britons voted him eighth , and in 2008 , Rolling Stone ranked  उसे the fifth-greatest सिंगर  of all time .
He was  मरणोपरांत inducted into the songwriters हॉल  of Fame in 1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994 .
Statue of Rip van Winkle in Irvington  , नई  York , not far from `` Sunnyside `` , the home of Washington Irving
``  rip वैन winkle '' is a छोटी  story by American author Washington Irving published in 1819 , as well as the name of the story 's fictional protagonist .
Written while Irving was living in Birmingham , England , it was part of a collection   entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon .
हालांकि the स्टोरी is नियत in नई यॉर्क  's Catskill Mountains , Irving later admitted , `` When I wrote the story , I had never been on the Catskills . ''

This page only includes  the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार  won by various artists .

Pee-wee Herman is a comic fictional  अक्षर निर्मित  and portrayed by American comedian Paul Reubens .
He is  बेहतरीन  known for his two television series and film series during the 1980s .
The childlike Pee-wee Herman character developed as a stage act that quickly  led  to an HBO special in 1981 .
As the stage performance gained further  लोकप्रियता , reubens took the  character to motion picture with Pee-wee 's Big Adventure in 1985 , toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children .
This paved the way for Pee-wee 's Playhouse , an Emmy Award winning  children 's श्रेणी  that ran on CBS from 1986-1991 .
another फिल्मी , बिग  Top Pee-wee , was released in 1988 .
Due to negative media attention following a scandal in 1991 , Reubens decided to  shelve उसके  alter ego during the 1990s , and then gradually resurrected it during the following decade .
It was at that time that Reubens addressed plans to write a new Pee-wee film ,  pee-wee 's playhouse  : The Movie .
In June  2007 , reubens  appeared as Pee-wee Herman for the first time since 1991 at Spike TV 's Guys ' Choice Awards .
That '70s Show is an American television period sitcom that centers on the lives of a group of teenage friends living in the fictional suburban town of Point  प्लेस , विस्कॉन्सिन , इससे may 17 , 1976 , to दिसम्बर 31 , 1979  .
It debuted on the Fox  टेलीविज़न संजाल , पहला airing  on August 23 , 1998 , running for eight consecutive seasons , and concluding with the 200th episode on May 18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast members were  topher  Grace , Mila Kunis , Ashton Kutcher , Danny Masterson , Laura Prepon , and Wilmer Valderrama .
The main adult cast members were Debra Jo Rupp , Kurtwood Smith , Don Stark and , during the  पहला तीन  seasons , Tanya Roberts .
Kansas ( ) is a U.S. state  स्तिथ in the  Midwestern United States .
It is named after the Kansas River  which  flows through it , which in turn was named after the Kansa Native American tribe , which inhabited the area .
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to mean `` people of the wind '' or `` people  of the  south wind , '' although this was probably not the term 's original meaning .
Residents of Kansas  हैं  called `` Kansans . ''
For  हज़ारों  of years what is now Kansas was home to numerous and diverse Native American tribes .
Tribes in the Eastern part of   the state generally lived in villages along the river valleys .
Tribes in the Western part of the state were semi-  nomadic और hunted  large herds of bison .
Kansas was first settled by European Americans in the 1830s  , लकिन the pace of उपनिवेश  accelerated in the 1850s , in the midst of political wars over the slavery issue .
When officially opened to settlement by the U.S. government in 1854 , abolitionist Free-Staters from New England and pro-slavery settlers from neighboring Missouri rushed to the territory to determine if Kansas  would become a free  state or a slave state .
Thus , the area was a hotbed of violence  और अराजकता  in its early days as these forces collided , and was known as Bleeding Kansas .
The abolitionists eventually prevailed and on January 29 ,  1861 , कान्सास डाला  the Union as a free state .
After the Civil War , the population of Kansas grew rapidly , when waves of  आप्रवासियों turned  the prairie into farmland .
Today , Kansas is one of the most productive agricultural states ,  producing ऊँची yields  of wheat , sorghum and sunflowers .
Kansas is the 15th most extensive and the 33rd most populous of the 50  संयुक्त राज्य  .
Psychology is an academic and applied discipline that involves the scientific study of mental functions  और व्यवहार .
Psychology has the immediate goal of understanding individuals and groups by both establishing general principles and researching specific cases , and by many accounts it  ultimately aims to  benefit society .
In this field , a professional or researcher is called a psychologist and can be classified as a social ,  behavioral , or संज्ञानात्मक  scientist .
Psychologists attempt to understand  the भूमिका of दिमागी कृत्यों  in individual and social behavior , while also exploring the physiological and neurobiological processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors .
Psychologists explore concepts such as perception , cognition , attention , emotion , phenomenology , motivation , brain functioning , personality , behavior  , और interpersonal संबंध  .
Psychologists of diverse  धारियाँ भी  consider the unconscious mind .
Psychologists employ empirical methods to infer causal and  correlational संबंध between psychosocial  variables .
In addition , or in opposition , to employing empirical and deductive methods , some—especially clinical and counseling  psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक निर्वचन  and other inductive techniques .
Psychology has been described as a `` hub science '' , with psychological findings linking to research and perspectives from the social sciences , natural sciences ,  आयुर्विज्ञान , और  the humanities , such as philosophy .
While psychological knowledge is often applied to the assessment and treatment of mental health problems , it is also directed towards understanding and solving problems in many  अलग  spheres of human activity .
The majority of psychologists are involved in some kind of therapeutic role ,  practicing in  clinical , counseling , or school settings .
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes and behavior , and typically work in university psychology departments or teach in other academic settings ( e.g. , medical  schools ,  hospitals ) .
Some are employed in  औद्योगिक और organizational जमावट , or in अन्य  areas such as human development and aging , sports , health , and the media , as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law .
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13 , 1743 ( April 2 , 1743 O.S. ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was an American Founding Father , the  प्रिंसिपल  author of the Declaration of Independence ( 1776 ) and the third President of the United States ( 1801–1809 ) .
At the beginning of the American Revolution , he served in the Continental Congress , representing Virginia and then served as a wartime Governor of Virginia (  1779–1781  ) .
Just after the war ended  , इससे mid-1784  Jefferson served as a diplomat , stationed in Paris .
In May 1785 , he became the United  राज्य मंत्री to  France .
Jefferson was the first United States  सचिव of राज्य  ( 1790–1793 ) serving under President George Washington .
साथ उसके बंद dost जेम्स मैडिसन he व्यवस्थित the democratic-republican पार्टी , और subsequently resigned इससे वॉशिंगटन 's कैबिनेट  .
Elected Vice President in 1796 , when he came in second to John Adams of the Federalists , Jefferson opposed Adams and with Madison secretly wrote the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions , which  attempted to nullify  the Alien and Sedition Acts .
Elected president in what Jefferson called the Revolution of 1800 , he oversaw the purchase of the vast Louisiana Territory from France ( 1803  ) , और भेजा the लुईस और क्लार्क expedition ( 1804–1806  ) to explore the new west .
His second term was beset with troubles at home , such as the failed treason trial  of उसके पूर्व वाइस अध्यक्ष आरोन  Burr .
With  escalating ट्रबल साथ ब्रिटेन जो थी चुनौतीपूर्ण  American neutrality and threatening shipping at sea , he tried economic warfare with his embargo laws which only damaged American trade .
In 1803 , President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal removal and relocation to the  louisiana territory वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी  River , in order to open lands for eventual American settlers .
A leader in the Enlightenment , Jefferson was a polymath who spoke five languages  धड़ल्ले और थी deeply दिलचस्पी in विज्ञान , आविष्कार , वास्तुकला , धर्म और  philosophy , interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency .
He designed his own large mansion on a 5,000 acre plantation near Charlottesville , Virginia , which he named   Monticello .
While not a notable orator , Jefferson was a skilled writer and corresponded with many influential  लोगों  in America and Europe throughout his adult life .
Though Jefferson owned many slaves , he opposed the institution all his life and consequently treated and  took परवाह of उन्हें बहुत खूब  and expected them to work no more than free farmers .
Since 1802 historians and others have been divided over the controversy of whether Jefferson  थी  the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings , a slave at Monticello . ''
Historians are also in disagreement with how much Jefferson  थी  committed to the anti-slavery cause .
In 1807 , President Jefferson  हस्ताक्षरित into विधि a विधेयक  that banned the importation of slaves into the United States .
After Martha Jefferson , his wife of eleven years , died in 1782 , Jefferson  remained a विधुर लिये the  rest of his life ; their marriage produced six children , of whom two survived to adulthood .
Though Jefferson has been criticized by many modern day scholars over the issue of  गुलामी , he remains रेटेड as एक of the महानतम  U.S. presidents .
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by Steven Van Zandt , produced by Van Zandt and Arthur Baker and recorded by Artists United Against Apartheid  to convey विपक्ष to  the South African policy of apartheid .
The primary means of that opposition is to declare that all the artists involved would refuse any and all offers to perform at Sun City , a resort which was located in Bantustan of Bophuthatswana , one of a number of internationally unrecognized  supposed ``  independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population .

Bill Russell won 11 championships  with the  Boston Celtics .
This is a list of NBA players with most  championships जीती as  a player .
The National  बास्केट संघ  ( NBA ) is a major professional basketball league in North America .
It was founded in 1946 as the Basketball  संघ of  America ( BAA ) .
The league adopted its current name at the start of the when it merged with  the नेशनल बास्केट लीग  ( NBL ) .
The NBA Finals is the championship series for  the एनबीए  and the conclusion of the sport 's postseason .
The winning team of the series  receives  the Larry O'Brien Championship Trophy .
Players from the winning team usually receive championship rings from the team  honoring उनके योगदान  .
However  , in कुछ विरल अवसर , the टीमों  opted to gave other commemorative items , such as wrist watches , instead of rings .
The number  of championships  won by NBA superstars is often used as a measurement of their greatness .
Boston Celtics center Bill Russell holds  the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे एनबीए championships  won with 11 titles during his 13-year playing career .
He won his first championship with the Boston Celtics  in उसके रुकी  year .
Afterwards , he went on to win 10 championships in  the  next 12 years , including eight consecutive championships from 1959 to 1966 .
He won the last two championships in 1968  और 1969 as  player-coach .
Russell 's teammate , Sam Jones , won 10 championships from 1959 to 1969 , the  दूसरी सबसे in  NBA history .
Four  सेल्टिक्स खिलाड़ी , tom  Heinsohn , K. C. Jones , Satch Sanders and John Havlicek , won eight championships each .
Two other  सेल्टिक्स , जिम loscutoff और फ़्रैंक  Ramsey , won seven championships each .
Four players , Bob Cousy , Kareem Abdul-Jabbar , Michael Jordan and  scottie pippen , जीती  six championships each .
Jordan and Pippen are members of the Chicago Bulls  टोली जो  won three consecutive championships twice in the 1990s .
Robert Horry and John Salley are the only players to have won the championships  साथ तीन  different teams .
Horry won seven championships with the Houston Rockets , the Los Angeles  लेकर्स और  the San Antonio Spurs , while Salley won four championships with the Detroit Pistons , the Bulls and the Lakers .
फ़्रैंक शाऊल और स्टीव  Kerr are the only players to win two championships with two different teams in consecutive seasons .
Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the  मिनियापोलिस लेकर्स in  the 1950s , while Kerr won consecutive championships with the Bulls and the Spurs in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement results to the true value , precision to the repeatability ,  or reproducibility of the  measurement
In the fields of science , engineering , industry , and statistics , the accuracy of a measurement system is the degree of closeness   of measurements of a quantity to that quantity 's actual ( true ) value .
The precision of a measurement system , also called reproducibility or repeatability , is the degree  to जिससे दोहराया माप  under unchanged conditions show the same results .
Although the two words  reproducibility और repeatability can be  synonymous in colloquial use , they are deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific method .
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise , precise but not accurate ,  neither  , or both .
For example , if an experiment contains a systematic error , then increasing the sample  आकार generally increases परिशुद्धता लकिन करता नहीं  improve accuracy .
the परिणाम होता  be a consistent yet inaccurate string of results from the flawed experiment .
Eliminating the systematic error improves accuracy but does  नहीं बदलें  precision .
A  मापन प्रणाली  is designated valid if it is both accurate and precise .
Related terms include bias ( non- random or directed effects caused by a factor or factors unrelated to the independent variable )  और गलती ( यादृच्छिक  variability ) .
The  शब्दावली is भी लागू to अप्रत्यक्ष  measurements—that is , values obtained by a computational procedure from observed data .
in जोड  to accuracy and precision , measurements may also have a measurement resolution , which is the smallest change in the underlying physical quantity that produces a response in the measurement .
In the case of full reproducibility , such as when rounding a number to a representable floating point number  , the शब्द परिशुद्धता  has a meaning not related to reproducibility .
For example , in the IEEE 754-2008  मानक it अर्थात् the क्रमांक  of bits in the significand , so it is used as a measure for the relative accuracy with which an arbitrary number can be represented .
Fuck in its literal meaning refers to the act of sexual  मैथुन  .
It is an English word that is often used as a profanity , either to denote  तिरस्कार or as an intensifier  .
the  origin of the word is obscure .
It is usually considered to be first  attested to around  1475 , but it may be considerably older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can be used in the position of a noun , a  क्रिया , an क्रियाशील  or an adverb .
There are many common phrases which make use of the word , as well as a number  of यौगिकों  incorporating it , such as motherfucker .
Animated , color-coded map  प्रर्दशित the विभिन्न  continents and regions .
Depending on the convention and model , some continents may be consolidated or subdivided : for example , Eurasia is most often subdivided into Europe and Asia ( red shades ) , while North and South America are sometimes recognized as one  अमरीकी महाद्वीप ( ग्रीन  shades ) .
A continent is one of  अनेक बहुत विशाल  landmasses on Earth .
They are generally identified by convention rather than any strict criteria , with up to seven regions commonly regarded as continents—they are ( from largest  in आकार to smallest ) : एशिया , अफ़्रीकी , उत्तर अमेरिका , दक्षिण  America , Antarctica , Europe , and Australia .
In geology , continents  हैं वर्णित  by means of tectonic plates .
Plate tectonics is the process and study of the  गति , टक्कर  and division of continents , earlier known as continental drift .

Community property is a marital property regime that originated in civil law jurisdictions and is now  भी मिला in कुछ आम  law jurisdictions .
the राज्य of the संयुक्त  States that recognize community property are primarily in the West ; it was inherited from Mexico 's ganancial community system , which itself was inherited from Spanish law ( a Roman -derived civil law system ) and ultimately from the Visigoths .
While under  स्पेनी नियम louisiana अपनाया the ganancial  community system of acquests and gains , which replaced the traditional French community of movables and acquests in its civil law system .
Map  of the  United States with community property states highlighted in red .
In addition to the highlighted states , Alaska is a separate property state that permits couples  to ऑप्ट into a जातियाँ  property arrangement .
In a community property jurisdiction , most property acquired during the marriage ( except for gifts or inheritances ) —the  जातियाँ , or  communio bonorum—is owned jointly by both spouses and is divided upon divorce , annulment or death .
Joint ownership is automatically presumed by law in the absence of specific evidence that would point to a contrary  निष्कर्ष लिये a particular टुकड़ा of प्रॉपर्टी  .
Division of community property may take place by item , by splitting all  वस्तुएं or by मान  .
In some jurisdictions , such as California , a 50/50 division of community property is strictly mandated by statute , meaning that the focus then  शिफ्ट to whether particular वस्तुएं हैं to be  classified as community or separate property .
In other jurisdictions , such as  टेक्सास , a तलाक अदालत may डिक्री  an `` equitable distribution `` of community property , which may result in an unequal division of such .
In non-community property states  प्रॉपर्टी  may be divided by equitable distribution .
Generally speaking , the property  कि प्रत्येक संगी  brings into the marriage or receives by gift , bequest or devise during marriage is called separate property ( i.e. , not community property ) .
See  प्रभाग of  property .
Division of community debts may not be the  वही  as division of community property .
For example , in California , community property is required to be divided `` equally  '' जबकि जातियाँ  debt is required to be divided `` equitably '' .
Property that is owned by one spouse before the marriage  is the पृथक प्रॉपर्टी  of that spouse , unless the property is `` transmuted '' into community property .
The rules for this vary from  क्षेत्राधिकार to  jurisdiction .
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge waving to the crowd at The Mall shortly after the  विवाह  .
The wedding of Prince William , Duke of Cambridge , and  कैथरीन  Middleton took place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London .
The groom , Prince William , Duke of Cambridge , is the eldest son of Charles , Prince of Wales , and is second in  the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन  and the thrones of fifteen other Commonwealth realms .
The bride , Catherine `` Kate '' Middleton is the eldest of three children of  माइकल और carole  Middleton of Bucklebury , Berkshire .
The Dean of Westminster , John Hall , presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury , Rowan Williams , conducted the marriage ; Richard Chartres , the Bishop of London  , preached the उपदेश ; और a पढना  was given by the bride 's brother , James .
William 's best man was his brother , Prince Harry , while the bride 's sister , Pippa , was maid  of इज्ज़त  .
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's and groom 's families , as well as many foreign royals , diplomats , and the couple 's  चुनी निजी  guests .
After the ceremony , the  युगल बना  the traditional appearance on the balcony of Buckingham Palace .
As Prince William was not the heir apparent to  the सिंहासन , the विवाह  was not a full state occasion and many details were left to the couple to decide , such as much of the guest list of about 1,900 .
Prince William and Kate  मिडलटन मिले in  2001 .
Their  सगाई  on 20 October 2010 was announced on 16 November 2010 .
The build-up to the wedding and the occasion itself attracted much media  ध्यान , होने  compared in many ways with the 1981 marriage of William 's parents .
The occasion was a public holiday in the United Kingdom and featured many ceremonial aspects , including use of the state carriages and roles for the Foot Guards and  household प्यादे  .
Events were held around the Commonwealth to mark the wedding ; organisations and hotels held events across  कनाडा , over 5,000 गली  parties were held throughout the United Kingdom , and one million people lined the route between Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace .
The ceremony was viewed live by tens of millions more around the world , including 72 million  on the youtube royal चैनल  .
In the United Kingdom , television  ऑडियंस  peaked at 26.3 million viewers , with a total of 36.7 million watching part of the coverage .
