Ruins from the 1906 San Francisco earthquake , remembered as one of the worst natural  आपदाओं in  United States history
A disaster is a  प्राकृतिक or man-made ( or technological ) जोखिम resulting in  an event of substantial extent causing significant physical damage or destruction , loss of life , or drastic change to the environment .
A disaster can be  ostensively पारिभाषित as कोई tragic इवेंट  stemming from events such as earthquakes , floods , catastrophic accidents , fires , or explosions .
It is a phenomenon   that can cause damage to life and property and destroy the economic , social and cultural life of people .
In contemporary academia , disasters are seen as the  consequence of inappropriately प्रबंधित  risk .
These risks are the  उत्पाद of a संयोजन  of both hazard/s and vulnerability .
Hazards that strike in areas with  कम vulnerability  will never become disasters , as is the case in uninhabited regions .
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all deaths caused by disasters occur in developing   countries , and losses due to natural disasters are 20 times greater ( as a percentage of GDP ) in developing countries than in industrialized countries .
In computing , booting ( also known as booting up ) is the initial set of  परिचालन कि a कंप्यूटर प्रणाली performs  when electrical power to the CPU is switched on .
The process begins when a computer is turned on for the first time or is re-energized after being turned off , and ends when the computer is  तैयार to perform  its normal operations .
On modern general purpose computers , this can take tens of seconds and typically  involves performing  a power-on self-test , locating and initializing peripheral devices , and then finding , loading and starting an operating system .
Many computer systems also allow these operations to be initiated by a software command without cycling power , in what is known as a soft reboot ,  हालांकि  some of the initial operations might be skipped on a soft reboot .
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the main operating system or runtime  पर्यावरण लिये the  computer after completion of the self-tests .
The computer term boot is short for  बूटस्ट्रैप or बूटस्ट्रैप लोड  and derives from the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps .
The usage calls attention to the requirement that , if most software is loaded onto a computer by other software already running on the computer ,  कुछ यांत्रिकी जरूर मौजूद  to load initial software onto the computer .
Early computers used  a किस्में of ad-hoc  methods to get a small program into memory to solve this problem .
The invention of integrated   circuit read-only memory ( ROM ) of various types solved this paradox by allowing computers to be shipped with a start up program that could not be erased .
Growth in the capacity of ROM has allowed ever more elaborate start up  प्रक्रियाओं  to be implemented .
On general purpose computers , the boot process begins with the  निष्पादन of an आरंभिक कार्यक्रम भंडारित  in boot ROMs or read in another fashion .
In some older computers , the initial program might have been the application to run , if no  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली  was used , or the operating system .
In  अन्य कंप्यूटर , the आरंभिक कार्यक्रम is a बूट लोडर कि may तब लोड into random-access मेमोरी ( राम ) , इससे nonvolatile  secondary storage ( such as a hard disk drive ) or , in some older computers , from a medium such as punched cards , punched tape , or magnetic tape in older computers , the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it .
If the boot  loader is  limited in its size and capabilities , it may , instead , load a larger and more capable secondary boot loader , which would then load the operating system or runtime environment .
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot sequence to begin functioning and when turned on may simply run  operational कार्यक्रम कि  are stored in ROM .
Firebird is an open source SQL relational database management system that runs on Linux ,  खिड़कियाँ , और  a variety of Unix .
The database forked from Borland 's open source edition of InterBase in 2000 ,  लकिन चूंकि firebird 1.5  the code has been largely rewritten .
Outsourcing is the contracting out  of an आतंरिक कारोबार प्रक्रम  to a third-party organization .
The practice of contracting a business process out to a third party rather than staffing it internally is  आम in the आधुनिक अर्थव्यवस्था  .
The term `` outsourcing  '' became लोकप्रिय in  the United States near the turn of the 21st century .
Outsourcing sometimes involves  transferring कर्मचारी  and assets from one firm to another , but not always .
The definition of outsourcing includes both foreign and domestic contracting , and sometimes includes offshoring , which means  relocating a कारोबार  function to another country .
Financial savings from  निम्नतर अंतरराष्ट्रीय  labor rates is a big motivation for outsourcing/offshoring .
The opposite of outsourcing is called insourcing , which entails bringing processes handled by third-party firms in-house , and is sometimes  संपन्नता via लंबवत संयोजन  .
However , a business can provide a contract service to another  कारोबार बगैर necessarily  insourcing that business process .
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus (  slowly  replicating retrovirus ) that causes acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ( AIDS ) , a condition in humans in which progressive failure of the immune system allows life-threatening opportunistic infections and cancers to thrive .
Infection with HIV occurs by the transfer of blood , semen ,  vaginal द्रव  , pre-ejaculate , or breast milk .
Within these bodily fluids , HIV is present as both free virus particles and  वायरस भीतर संक्रमित प्रतिरक्षा कोशिकाएं  .
HIV infects vital cells in the human immune system such as helper T cells (  specifically cd4 + t कोशिकाएं  ) , macrophages , and dendritic cells .
HIV infection leads to low levels of CD4+ T cells through a number of mechanisms including : apoptosis of uninfected bystander cells , direct viral killing of infected cells , and  हत्या of संक्रमित cd4+ t कोशिकाएं by cd8 cytotoxic  lymphocytes that recognize infected cells .
When CD4+ T cell numbers decline below a critical level , cell-mediated immunity is lost , and  the देह becomes progressively  more susceptible to opportunistic infections .
The  firepole  in a fire station in Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal tube or pipe installed between floors in fire stations , allowing firefighters  responding to an सचेतक to  quickly descend to the ground floor faster than by using a standard staircase .
The device was invented in the 1870s by David Kenyon , in Chicago , Illinois ,  हालांकि it is प्रायः incorrectly  credited to the Boston Fire Department .
Mary Poppins is the title  अक्षर of a श्रेणी of children  's books written by P. L. Travers .
Throughout the Mary Poppins series , which lasted  इससे 1934 to 1988 , मरियम shepard  was the illustrator and acted as a second author .
The books centre on a  जादुई अंग्रेज़ी  nanny , Mary Poppins .
She is blown by the East wind to Number  सत्रह  Cherry Tree Lane , London , and into the Banks ' household to care for their children .
Encounters with chimney sweeps , shopkeepers  और विभिन्न adventures follow जबतक मरियम poppins  abruptly leaves , i.e. , `` pops-out '' .
The adventures take  प्लेस  over a total of eight books .
However , only the  पहला तीन किताबे  feature Mary Poppins arriving and leaving .
The later five books recount previously unrecorded adventures from her  असली तीन विज़िट  .
As P. L. Travers explains in her introduction   to Mary Poppins in the Park , `` She can not forever arrive and depart . ''
The books were adapted in 1964  into a musical  Disney film starring Julie Andrews and Dick Van Dyke .
In 2004 , Disney Theatrical produced a  स्टेज musical  adaptation in the West End theatre .
The stage   musical was transferred to Broadway in 2006 where it ran until its closing on March 3 , 2013 .
it रै महरूम अत्यधिक  successful , as was the 1964 film .
The Last Song is a 2010 American coming of age teen romantic drama film developed  alongside  Nicholas Sparks ' novel by the same name .
The film was directed by Julie Anne Robinson in her feature film directorial debut and  co-written by  Sparks and Jeff Van Wie .
The  पिछला सोंग सितारों miley सायरस  , Liam Hemsworth , and Greg Kinnear and follows a troubled teenager as she reconnects with her estranged father and falls in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town .
The film is  वितरित  by Touchstone Pictures .
Sparks was approached to  लिखें दोनो the  film 's screenplay and the novel .
Sparks completed the screenplay in January 2009 , prior to  the  completion of the novel , making The Last Song his first script to be optioned for film .
The setting , originally in North Carolina like  the अनोखा ,  moved to Georgia after the states had campaigned for months to host production .
Upon beginning production in Tybee Island , Georgia and nearby Savannah , The Last Song became the first movie to be  both  shot and set in Tybee Island .
Filming lasted  इससे जून 15 to अगस्त  18 , 2009 with much of it occurring on the island 's beach and pier .
The Last Song was  originally  scheduled for wide release on January 8 , 2010 , but was postponed to March 31 , 2010 .
Written  simlish
Simlish is a fictional language  प्रदर्शित in  EA Games ' Sim series of games .
it  debuted in SimCopter , and has been especially prominent in The Sims , The Sims 2 and The Sims 3 .
The  सीम  development team created the unique Simlish language by experimenting with fractured Ukrainian , French , Latin , Finnish , English , Fijian , Cebuano , and Tagalog .
Simlish can also be heard in SimCity 4 , SimCity Societies and SimCity 2013 , but  दूर कम  frequently .
Civilized Creatures in Spore can also be taught to speak  simlish  .
It is also  प्रदर्शित  to an extent in Firaxis Games ' Sid Meier 's SimGolf .
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need for dialogue  in the खेल  , but thought that using a real language would make it sound too repetitive and would also be too costly to hire translators for world languages .
Initially , inspired by the Native American code talkers of World War II , Sims creator Will Wright and language expert Marc Gimbel suggested experimenting with the Navajo language to create  simlish  .
However , they ultimately decided that Simlish worked best as a `` language '' made up of gibberish words that could n't  be अनूदित  , so that its meaning would be left open to the imagination of the player .
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense language '' turned out to be the right development choice , as people were capable of imagining it  अधिक realistically than a कंप्यूटर could सिमुलेट  a real one .
The actual sound of Simlish was created  improvisationally  by voice actors Stephen Kearin and Gerri Lawlor .
An example of Ultrasonic Testing ( UT ) on blade  जड़ें of a v2500  IAE aircraft engine .
Step 1 : The UT probe is placed on  the रूट of the  blades to be inspected with the help of a special borescope tool ( video probe ) .
Step 2 : Instrument  जमावट हैं  input .
Step 3 :  the  probe is scanned over the blade root .
In this case , an indication ( peak in the data ) through the red line ( or gate ) indicates a good blade ; an indication to the left of that range  indicates a  crack .
principle  of ultrasonic testing .
LEFT : A probe sends a sound wave into a  परीक्षण सामग्री  .
There are two indications , one from the initial pulse of the probe , and  the  second due to the back wall echo .
RIGHT : A defect creates a third indication and  simultaneously reduces  the amplitude of the back wall indication .
the गहराई  of the defect is determined by the ratio D/E
In ultrasonic testing ( UT ) , very short ultrasonic pulse-waves with center frequencies ranging from 0.1-15 MHz and occasionally up to 50 MHz  हैं शुभारम्भ into सामग्री to detect आतंरिक खामियां or to  characterize materials .
A common example is ultrasonic thickness measurement , which  परीक्षण the मोटाई of the  test object , for example , to monitor pipework corrosion .
अल्ट्रासोनिक  testing is often performed on steel and other metals and alloys , though it can also be used on concrete , wood and composites , albeit with less resolution .
It is a form of non-destructive testing used in many industries including aerospace , automotive  और अन्य परिवहन सेक्टर  .
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ) , also called ductus  deferens ( लैटिन : `` carrying-away पोत  '' ; plural : ductus deferentes ) , is part of the male anatomy of many vertebrates ; they transport sperm from the epididymis in anticipation of ejaculation .
Vascular ischemia of the toes with  characteristic  cyanosis .
In medicine , ischemia , also spelled as ischaemia or ischæmia , ( ; from Greek language ισχαιμία , ischaimía ; isch- root denoting a restriction or thinning or to  मेक or grow thin/lean , haema रक्त ) is a प्रतिबंध in रक्त सप्लाई to ऊतकों , causing a shortage  of oxygen and glucose needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ) .
Ischemia is generally caused by problems with blood vessels , with  resultant क्षति  to or dysfunction of tissue .
it भी अर्थात् लोकल रक्ताल्पता  in a given part of a body sometimes resulting from congestion ( such as vasoconstriction , thrombosis or embolism ) .
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome , also known as trisomy 21 , is a genetic disorder caused by the presence of all or part of a third copy  of chromosome  21 .
Down syndrome is the most common  chromosome तबदीली  in humans .
It is typically associated with a delay in  संज्ञानात्मक क्षमता ( दिमागी retardation  , or MR ) and physical growth , and a particular set of facial characteristics .
The average IQ of young adults with Down syndrome is around 50 ,  whereas यंग  adults without the condition typically have an IQ of 100 .
( MR has historically  महरूम  defined as an IQ below 70 . )
A large proportion of individuals  साथ bas  syndrome have a severe degree of intellectual disability .
Down syndrome is named after John Langdon  bas , the अंग्रेजों  physician who described the syndrome in 1866 .
The condition was clinically described earlier by Jean Etienne Dominique Esquirol in 1838 and Edouard  seguin in  1844 .
Down syndrome was identified as a chromosome 21 trisomy by Dr. Jérôme  lejeune in 1959  .
Down syndrome can be identified in a baby at birth or  पहले जनम  by prenatal screening .
Pregnancies with this diagnosis are  प्रायः  terminated .
The CDC estimates that about one of every 691  शिशु born in the  United States each year is born with Down syndrome .
Many children with Down syndrome are educated in regular school classes while others  आवश्यकता specialised शैक्षणिक  facilities .
Some children  ग्रैजुएट इससे  high school , and , in the US , there are increasing opportunities for participating in post-secondary education .
शिक्षा और उचित  care has been shown to improve quality of life significantly .
Many  वयस्कों साथ bas सिंड्रोम हैं समर्थ to कार्य at  paid employment in the community , while others require a more sheltered work environment .
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes , or night sweats if  वे  happen at night ) are a symptom which may have several other causes , but which is often caused by the changing hormone levels that are characteristic of menopause .
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L . 78-346 , 58 Stat  .  284m ) , known informally as the G.I . Bill , was a law that provided a range of benefits for returning World War II veterans ( commonly referred to as G.I.s ) .
Benefits included low-cost mortgages , low-interest loans to start a business or farm , cash payments of tuition and living expenses to attend college , high school or  वोकेशनल शिक्षा , as खूब as  one year of unemployment compensation .
It was available to every veteran who had been on active duty during the war years for at least ninety days and had not  महरूम dishonorably  discharged ; combat was not required .
By the end of the program in 1956 , roughly 2.2 million veterans had used the G.I . Bill education benefits in order to attend colleges or universities , and an  अतिरिक्त 6.6 लाख प्रयुक्त ये लाभ लिये  some kind of training program .
Since the  असली 1944 विधि , the पद रै आइये to शामिल अन्य दिग्गज  benefit programs created to assist veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service .
Historians and economists consider the  g.i  . Bill a major political success—especially in contrast to the treatments of World War I veterans—and a major contribution to America 's stock of human capital that sped long-term economic growth .
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred in the United States in the 1970s as a result of the June 17 , 1972 break-in at the Democratic National Committee  headquarters at the  Watergate office complex in Washington , D.C. , and the Nixon administration 's attempted cover-up of its involvement .
The scandal  आखिरकार led to the इस्तीफा of रिचर्ड  Nixon , the President of the United States , on August 9 , 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President .
The scandal  also  resulted in the indictment , trial , conviction , and incarceration of forty-three persons , dozens of whom were Nixon 's top administration officials .
The affair began with the arrest of five men for breaking and entering into the Democratic National Committee ( DNC )  मुख्यालय at the वाटरगेट जटिल on जून 17 , 1972  .
The Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) connected cash found on the  burglars to a slush निधि प्रयुक्त by  the Committee for the Re-Election of the President , the official organization of Nixon 's campaign .
In July 1973 , as evidence mounted against the president 's staff , including testimony provided by former staff members in an investigation conducted by the Senate Watergate Committee  , it थी नाज़िल कि अध्यक्ष निक्सन था a tape-recording  system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations .
Recordings from these tapes implicated the president , revealing he  था  attempted to cover up the questionable ( and illegal ) goings-on that had taken place during his administration , both before and after the break-in .
After a protracted series of bitter court battles , the U.S. Supreme Court  unanimously शासित कि the अध्यक्ष  had to hand over the tapes to government investigators ; he ultimately complied .
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of Representatives and a strong  सम्भावना of a conviction  in the Senate , Nixon resigned the presidency on August 9 , 1974 .
His  successor , जेराल्ड  Ford , then issued a pardon to him .
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly Lansing and Spencer ) is a fictional character on the ABC  दिन साबुन ओपेरा  General Hospital .
Elizabeth is the granddaughter of Dr.  स्टीव हार्डी ( जॉन  Beradino ) , one of the originating core characters of the series .
Rebecca Herbst originated the character on August 1 , 1997 and has   been the only contract actress to play the role .
Elizabeth is part of two supercouple pairings , Lucky Spencer and Elizabeth Webber and Jason Morgan and  एलिज़ाबेथ  Webber .
The United States presidency of Ronald Reagan , also known as the Reagan administration , was a Republican administration headed by Ronald Reagan from  जनवरी 20 , 1981  , to January 20 , 1989 .
Domestically , the administration favored reducing government programs and introduced the  largest across-the-board  tax cuts in American history .
The economic policies enacted in 1981 , known as ``  reaganomics  `` , were an example of supply-side economics .
Reagan  aimed to प्रोत्साहित उद्यमिता और  limit the growth of social spending , as well as the reduction of regulation and inflation .
Economic growth saw a strong recovery in the 1980s  , helping reagan  to win a landslide re-election .
The national debt increased significantly  ,  however .
Regarding  विदेशी नीति , the प्रशासन थी steadfastly  anti-communist , calling the Soviet Union an `` evil empire `` and ending 1970s détente .
Reagan accelerated  the विशाल buildup of the सैन्य प्रारंभ by  his predecessor , including an invasion of Grenada , the first major overseas action by U.S. troops since the end of the Vietnam War .
The `` Reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid to paramilitary forces seeking to overthrow communist  सरकारें  , particularly in war-torn Central America and Afghanistan .
Reagan also  प्रचारित नई technologies ऐसे as मिसाइल रक्षा  systems in order to confront the Soviets and their allies .
In diplomacy , Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher , and he met with Soviet  सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल  Gorbachev four times , aiming to shrink the superpowers ' nuclear arsenals .
Reagan 's presidency has been termed the `` Reagan Revolution '' , or the Age of Reagan in recognition of the  राजनैतिक  realignment both within and beyond the U.S. in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets .
The Reagan administration worked toward the collapse of Soviet  साम्यवादी , और it किया पतन  just as he left office .
Victory in the Cold War led to  a unipolar संसार साथ  the U.S. as the world 's sole superpower .
While the damaging Iran-Contra affair engulfed several Reagan aides during his second term , Reagan  खुद बाएँ दफ्तर साथ a 63 प्रतिशत  approval rating , one of the higher approval ratings of departing presidents .
After years of unstinting praise from the right , and unrelenting criticism from the left , historian David Henry finds that by 2009 a consensus had emerged  among  scholars that Reagan revived conservatism and turned the nation to the right by demonstrating a `` pragmatic conservatism '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system .
Furthermore , says Henry , the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the  प्रेसिडेंसी और अमरीकी  self-confidence , and contributed critically to ending the Cold War .
Crude death rate by country (  2006 )  .
Mortality rate is a measure of the number of deaths ( in general , or due  to a विशिष्ट  cause ) in a population .
Scaled to the size of that population , per unit of  समय  .
Mortality rate is typically expressed in units of deaths per 1000 individuals per year ; thus ,  a मृत्यु रेट of 9.5 ( आउट of 1000 ) in a जनसांख्यिकी  of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population , or 0.95 % out of the total .
It is distinct from morbidity rate , which refers  to the क्रमांक of individuals  in poor health during a given time period ( the prevalence rate ) or the number of newly appearing cases of the disease per unit of time ( incidence rate ) .
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to refer to the number of deaths among a set of diagnosed hospital cases for a disease or injury ,  बल्कि than लिये the सामान्य जनसांख्यिकी of a देश or जातीय  group .
इस बीमारी मृत्यु  statistic is more precisely referred to as `` case fatality rate `` ( CFR ) .
One  distinguishes:
the crude मौत रेट  , the total number of deaths per year per 1000 people .
the crude death rate for the whole world is about 8.37  प्रति 1000 प्रति साल according  to the current CIA World Factbook .
The  perinatal मृत्यु रेट , the  sum of neonatal deaths and fetal deaths ( stillbirths ) per 1000 births .
The maternal mortality ratio , the number  of मातृ  deaths per 100,000 live births in same time period .
the मातृ मृत्यु रेट , the क्रमांक of मातृ मौतों प्रति 1,000 महिलाओं of reproductive आयु in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally पारिभाषित as 15–44 सालो of आयु ) .
The infant  मृत्यु रेट , the क्रमांक of मौतों  of children less than 1 year old per 1000 live births .
The child mortality rate , the  क्रमांक of  deaths of children less than 5 years old per 1000 live births .
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) - This represents a proportional comparison to the numbers of deaths that would have been expected if the population had been of a  मानक संयोजन in शर्तें of आयु  , gender , etc .
The age-specific mortality rate ( ASMR ) - This refers to the total number of deaths per year per 1000 people of  a दिए आयु ( e.g . आयु 62  last birthday ) .
In regard to the or failure of  चिकित्सा उपचार or प्रक्रियाओं , एक होता  also distinguish:
The early mortality rate , the  कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the जल्दी चरण  of an ongoing treatment , or in the period immediately following an treatment .
The late mortality rate , the total number of deaths in the late stages of an ongoing  उपचार ,  or a significant length of time after an acute treatment .
Note that the crude death rate as defined above and applied to a whole population  can दे a भ्रामक छाप  .
The crude death rate depends on the age ( and gender ) specific mortality rates and the age (  और लिंग ) वितरण of  the population .
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for developed nations than in less-developed countries , despite life expectancy being higher in developed countries due to standards of  health  being better .
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely different population age distribution , with a much higher proportion of  पुरानी लोगों , due to दोनो  lower recent birth rates and lower mortality rates .
A more complete picture of mortality is given by a life table which shows the mortality rate separately for each  आयु  .
A life table is necessary to  दे a शुभ अनुमान  of life expectancy .
An otoacoustic emission (  oae ) is a  sound which is generated from within the inner ear .
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948 , its existence was first  demonstrated experimentally by दाउद kemp  in 1978 and otoacoustic emissions have since been shown to arise by a number of different cellular mechanisms within the inner ear .
Studies have shown that OAEs disappear  बाद the भीतरी कान रै महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त  , so OAEs are often used in the laboratory and the clinic as a measure of inner ear health .
Broadly speaking , there are two types of otoacoustic emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic  emissions  ( SOAEs ) , which can occur without external stimulation , and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ) , which require an evoking stimulus .
hurricane टॉमस थी the उन्नीसवीं  named storm and twelfth hurricane of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season .
Tomas  विकसित इससे a तीव्र वेव  east of the Windward Islands on October 29 .
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane , it  स्थानांतरित through the windward  Islands and passed very near Saint Lucia .
बाद reaching श्रेणी  2 status on the Saffir-Simpson scale , Tomas quickly weakened to a tropical storm in the central Caribbean Sea , due to strong wind shear and dry air .
Tomas later regained hurricane status as it reorganized  निकट the  Windward passage .
throughout the hurricane  's path , 71 people are known to have been killed , 14 of whom were in Saint Lucia .
Monetary  नुकसान throughout the  Windward Islands were estimated at US $ 588 million , mainly in Saint Lucia .
In the   wake of the storm in Haiti , flooding intensified an ongoing cholera outbreak indirectly causing more fatalities .
According to a report released in December 2010 , 55  लोगों यहूद मारे in क्यूबा और hispanola  , though the distribution of these fatalities are unknown .
overall क्षति  from the storm was at least $ 741 million .
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2 , 1959 ) is an American comedian , actress , satirist , singer and internet blogger best known as a cast member  of the  NBC television sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992 .
She has received attention as a vocal critic of President Barack Obama , and is  an क्रियाशील भागीदार in the चाय पार्टी  movement .
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by heavy reliance on techniques like fragmentation , paradox , and questionable  narrators , और is प्रायः ( हालांकि नहीं exclusively  ) defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era .
Postmodern works are seen  as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध  Enlightenment thinking and Modernist approaches to literature .
Postmodern literature , like  postmodernism as  a whole , tends to resist definition or classification as a `` movement '' .
Indeed , the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory , particularly reader-response and deconstructionist approaches , and the subversions of the implicit contract between author , text and reader by which its works are often characterised , have led to pre-modern fictions such as Cervantes ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively  inducted  into the fold .
While there is little consensus on the precise characteristics , scope , and importance of  postmodern साहित्य  , as is often the case with artistic movements , postmodern literature is commonly defined in relation to a precursor .
For example , a  postmodern  literary work tends not to conclude with the neatly tied-up ending as is often found in modernist literature , but often parodies it .
Postmodern authors tend to celebrate   chance over craft , and further employ metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority .
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of distinctions  between ऊँची और  low culture through the use of pastiche , the combination of subjects and genres not previously deemed fit for literature .
Enigma  is an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक musical प्रोजेक्ट संस्थापित in जर्मनी by माइकल cretu , दाउद fairstein और फ़्रैंक पीटरसन in 1990 .
The Romanian-born  cretu  conceived the Enigma project while working in Germany , but based his recording studio A.R.T . Studios in Ibiza , Spain , from the early 1990s until May 2009 , where he has recorded all of Enigma 's studio releases to date .
Cretu is both  the  composer and the producer of the project .
उसके पूर्व बीवी  , pop singer Sandra , often provided vocals on Enigma tracks .
Jens Gad co-arranged and played guitar on three of the  पहेली एल्बम  .
Peter Cornelius  भी contributed  to Enigma during the 1990s .
Seven studio albums have been produced under the  नाम of the  project .
Scooby-Doo is an American animated cartoon franchise , comprising several animated television series produced from 1969 to the  उपस्थित दिन .
The original  श्रेणी , scooby-doo  , Where Are You !
, was created for  hanna-barbera प्रोडक्शन्स by लेखक  Joe Ruby and Ken Spears in 1969 .
This Saturday morning cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones , Daphne Blake , Velma  dinkley , और norville  `` Shaggy '' Rogers — and their talking brown Great Dane dog named Scooby-Doo , who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps .
following the कामयाबी of the असली श्रेणी  , Hanna-Barbera and its successor Warner Bros . Animation have produced numerous follow-up and spin-off animated series and several related works , including television specials and telefilms , a line of direct-to-video films , and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films .
Some versions of Scooby-Doo feature  अलग विसंगतियाँ on the दिखाएँ 's अलौकिक थीम , और शामिल  characters such as Scooby 's cousin Scooby-Dum and nephew Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters .
Scooby-Doo was originally  ब्रॉडकास्ट on सीबीएस इससे 1969 to 1976  , when it moved to ABC .
ABC aired the show until canceling it in 1986 , and  प्रस्तुत a spin-off  featuring the characters as children , A Pup Named Scooby-Doo , from 1988 until 1991 .
Two new Scooby-Doo series , What 's  नई  , Scooby-Doo ?
and Shaggy and Scooby-Doo Get a a Clue ! ] ] , aired as part of Kids WB on The WB network and  इसके successor ,  The CW network , from 2002 until 2008 .
The most  हाल scooby-doo  series , Scooby-Doo !
Mystery Incorporated , aired  on कार्टून संजाल  from 2010 to 2013 .
दोहराव of the विभिन्न  Scooby-Doo series are broadcast frequently on Cartoon Network and Boomerang in the United States and other countries .
Call of Duty is a first-person and third-person shooter  computer/ वीडियो  game franchise .
The series began on the PC , and  बाद विस्तारित  to consoles and handhelds .
Several  spin-off खेल  have also been released .
The earlier games in the series are set primarily in World War II , this  शामिल : कॉल of ड्यूटी , कॉल  of Duty 2 , and Call of Duty 3 .
Beginning with  आधुनिक warfare  , which is set in modern times , the series has shifted focus away from World War II .
Call of Duty 4 : Modern  warfare ( released नवम्बर 2007 ) थी  followed by Call of Duty : World at War and Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 2 .
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the Cold War , while Modern Warfare 3 ( released November 2011 ) takes  प्लेस in the near-future सेटिंग  .
Black Ops 2 ( Released November 13 ,  2012  ) takes place in the year 2025 .
The Call of Duty games are published and owned  by एक्टिविजन साथ aspyr  Media publishing it for Apple OS X .
While the studio Infinity Ward primarily still develops them , Treyarch has also developed  अनेक of the  titles with the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other .
Some games  have महरूम विकसित by धूसर पदार्थ इंटरैक्टिव  , Spark Unlimited , Amaze Entertainment , n-Space , Rebellion Developments , Ideaworks Game Studio , Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games .
The games use a variety of engines  , सहित the id तकनीक  3 , the Treyarch NGL , and the IW 5.0 .
Other products in the franchise include a  लकीर of कार्रवाई आंकड़े designed by  Plan-B Toys , a card game created by Upper Deck , and a comic book mini-series published by WildStorm .
As of November 11 , 2011 ,  the कॉल  Of Duty series have sold over 100 million copies .
As of March   31 , 2012 there are 40 million monthly active players across all of the Call of Duty titles , with 10 million Call of Duty : Elite users and 2 million paying annual members .
Over 1.6 billion hours of online gameplay have been logged Modern Warfare  3 चूंकि  its 2011 release .
The  एस्टेट कर in the संयुक्त राज्य is a कर imposed on the ट्रांसफ़र of the `` taxable एस्टेट `` of a मृतक व्यक्ति , whether ऐसे प्रॉपर्टी is transferred via a होगा , according to the राज्य कानून of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of the मौत of the मालिक , ऐसे as a ट्रांसफ़र of प्रॉपर्टी इससे an intestate एस्टेट or विश्वास , or the भुगतान of निश्चित जीवन बीमे लाभ or वित्तीय खाता रकम to beneficiaries .
The estate tax is one part of  the एकीकृत तोहफा  and Estate Tax system in the United States .
The other part of the system , the gift tax , imposes a tax on transfers of  प्रॉपर्टी दौरान a व्यक्ति 's जीवन  ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate .
In addition to the federal government , many states also impose an estate tax , with the state version called either an estate tax  or an उत्तराधिकार  tax .
Opponents of the estate tax call  it the `` मौत कर  '' .
If an asset is left to a spouse or a Federally recognized charity , the tax  प्रायः करता नहीं लागू  .
In  जोड , up to $ 5,250,000 can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत , पहले and/or upon उनके मौत , बगैर रूष्ट संघीय तोहफा or एस्टेट कर .
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October 1967 ) is an English actor and musician , known as the lead singer  और लय guitarist of the चट्टान  band Bush .
Following Bush 's  विरह in 2002 , जिससे lasted लिये  eight years , he was the lead singer and guitarist for Institute , and later began a solo career .
When performing solo , Gavin plays songs from his extensive musical  पुस्तकालयों  .
Rossdale has been  क्रमित in the शीर्ष  100 Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader ( # 75 ) .
Raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or  कूच 28 , 1483  – April 6 , 1520 ) , better known simply as Raphael , was an Italian painter and architect of the High Renaissance .
His work is admired for its clarity of form and ease of composition and for its visual  उपलब्धि of the neoplatonic  ideal of human grandeur .
Together with Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci , he forms the  परंपरागत  trinity of great masters of that period .
Raphael was enormously productive , running an unusually  विशाल कार्यशाला , और  despite his death at 37 , a large body of his work remains .
Many  of उसके works हैं मिला in  the Vatican Palace , where the frescoed Raphael Rooms were the central , and the largest , work of his career .
The best known work is The School of Athens in  the  Vatican Stanza della Segnatura .
After his early years in Rome much of his work was self-designed , but for the most part executed by the workshop from his drawings , with considerable loss  of विशेषता  .
He was extremely influential in his  आजीवन , हालांकि  outside Rome his work was mostly known from his collaborative printmaking .
After his death , the influence of his great rival Michelangelo was more widespread until the 18th and 19th centuries ,  जब राफेल 's अधिक निर्मल  and harmonious qualities were again regarded as the highest models .
His career falls naturally into three phases and three styles , first described by Giorgio Vasari : his early years in Umbria , then a period of about four years ( from 1504–1508  ) absorbing the कलाकारी परंपराओं  of Florence , followed by his last hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome , working for two Popes and their close associates .
Julia Fiona  रॉबर्ट्स ( born  October 28 , 1967 ) is an American actress .
She became a Hollywood star after headlining the romantic comedy Pretty Woman  ( 1990  ) , which grossed $ 464 million worldwide .
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations for Steel Magnolias ( 1989 ) and Pretty Woman , she won the  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Actress for her performance in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ) .
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ) , My Best Friend 's Wedding ( 1997 ) , Mystic Pizza ( 1988 ) , Notting Hill ( 1999 ) , Runaway Bride ( 1999 ) , Ocean 's Eleven ( 2001 ) , Ocean 's Twelve ( 2004 ) , Charlie Wilson 's War ( 2007 ) , Valentine 's Day ( 2010 ) , Eat Pray Love ( 2010 ) , and Mirror Mirror ( 2012 ) have  collectively brought बक्सा दफ्तर रसीदें of over $ 2.6 अरब , बनाना  her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts .
Roberts had become one of the highest-paid actresses in the world , topping The Hollywood Reporters annual `` power list  '' of top-earning  female stars from 2005 to 2006 .
Her fee for 1990 's Pretty Woman was $ 300,000 ; in 2003 , she was paid an unprecedented $ 25  लाख लिये उसके भूमिका  in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ) .
As of 2010 ,  रॉबर्ट्स 's जाल  worth was estimated to be $ 140 million .
Roberts has been named one of People magazine 's ``  50 सबसे खूबसूरत  People in the World '' eleven times , tied with Halle Berry .
In 2011 , she was named one of the `` 100 Hottest Women of  all-time  '' by Men 's Health .
In 2001 , Ladies Home Journal ranked her as the 11th most  शक्तिशाली स्त्री  in the United States .
Mark Elliot  zuckerberg ( born  May 14 , 1984 ) is an American computer programmer and Internet entrepreneur .
He is  बेहतरीन  known as one of five co-founders of the social networking website Facebook .
As of April 2013 , Zuckerberg is the chairman and chief  कार्यपालिका of फेसबुक , inc. और in  2013 his personal wealth was estimated to be US $ 13 .3 billion .
Together with his college roommates and fellow Harvard University students Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin  moskovitz और क्रिस ह्यूजेस , zuckerberg  launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms .
The group then introduced Facebook onto other campuses nationwide and moved to Palo Alto , California , United States ( U.S. ) shortly  afterwards .
In 2007 , at the age of  twenty-three सालो , zuckerberg became a अरबपति  as a result of Facebook and the number of Facebook users worldwide reached a total of one billion in 2012 .
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by others in the group , who claimed a share of the company based upon their involvement during the  विकास phase of  Facebook .
Since 2010 , Zuckerberg has been named among the 100  wealthiest और सबसे influential  people in the world by Time magazine as a part of its Person of the Year accolade .
Zuckerberg was played by actor Jesse Eisenberg in the 2010  हॉलीवुड फिल्मी the सोशल संजाल  in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed .
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620 transported 102 English Pilgrims ,  सहित a कोर समूह of separatists  , to New England .
Their  स्टोरी is एक  of travail and survival in a harsh New World environment .

Committee of Ways  और अर्थात् is the मुख्य  tax -writing committee of the United States House of Representatives .
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed to serve on any other House Committees unless they apply for a waiver from  उनके पार्टी 's congressional  leadership .
The Committee has jurisdiction over all taxation , tariffs and  अन्य revenue-raising  measures , as well as a number of other programs including:
सोशल  Security
बेरोजगारी  benefits
medicare
Enforcement of child  support  laws
Temporary Assistance  लिये मोहताज  Families , a federal welfare program
Foster  परवाह  and adoption programs
The U.S. Constitution requires that all bills regarding taxation  जरूर originate in the हाउस  of Representatives .
Since House procedure is that all bills regarding taxation must go through this committee , the committee is very influential , as is its Senate   counterpart , the U.S. Senate Committee on Finance .
The Ways and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by Charlie Rangel , who had taken a  छोड़ of  absence as chairman until House ethics violations were resolved .
However , his leave of absence as chairman was ruled to be  a  resignation .
Pete Stark resigned as acting chairman , so  sander levin  held that position until the start of the 112th Congress .
Dave Camp became the committee chair for the 112th Congress  , after the  Republicans won control of the House in the 2010 election .
The blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) is a marine  स्तनधारी belonging to the suborder  of baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ) .
At in length and or more in weight , it is the largest known animal to have  कभी  existed .
Long and slender , the blue whale 's body can be various shades of bluish-grey dorsally  और somewhat हल्का underneath  .
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and North Pacific , B. m. intermedia of the Southern Ocean and B. m.  brevicauda ( भी  known as the pygmy blue whale ) found in the Indian Ocean and South Pacific Ocean .
B.  m. इंडिका , मिला in the  Indian Ocean , may be another subspecies .
As with other baleen whales , its diet consists almost exclusively of small  crustaceans ज्ञात as  krill .
ब्लू whales यहूद abundant  in nearly all the oceans on Earth until the beginning of the twentieth century .
For over a  सदी , वे यहूद hunted  almost to extinction by whalers until protected by the international community in 1966 .
A 2002 report estimated there were 5,000 to 12,000 blue whales worldwide , located in at least five  समूह  .
More recent research into  the सानो  subspecies suggests this may be an underestimate .
Before whaling , the largest population was in the Antarctic ,  क्रमांकन लगभग  239,000 ( range 202,000 to 311,000 ) .
There remain only much  smaller  ( around 2,000 ) concentrations in each of the eastern North Pacific , Antarctic , and Indian Ocean groups .
There are two more groups in the North Atlantic ,  और at तनिक दो  in the Southern Hemisphere .
the ग्लोब  artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var . scolymus ) is a variety of a species of thistle cultivated as a food .
The edible  पदार्थ is कलियों कि रूप भीतर  the flower heads before the flowers come into bloom .
The buds go away or change to a coarse , barely edible form when  the पुष्प blooms  .
The uncultivated or wild variety  of the प्रजाति  is called a cardoon .
It is a perennial plant  देशी to the भूमध्यसागरीय  region .
The United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $ 100 ) is a  denomination  of United States currency .
u.S. statesman , आविष्कारक , और  diplomat Benjamin Franklin is currently featured on the obverse of the bill .
On the reverse of the banknote is an image of  स्वतंत्रता हॉल  .
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has been printed since July 13 , 1969 , when the denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000  , $ 5,000 ,  and $ 10,000 were retired .
The Bureau of Engraving  and Printing  says the average life of a $ 100 bill in circulation is 90 months ( 7.5 years ) before it is replaced due to wear and tear .
The bills are also commonly referred to as ``  benjamins '' , in  reference to the use of Benjamin Franklin 's portrait on the denomination , or `` C-Notes '' , based on the Roman numeral for 100 .
The bill is one of two denominations printed today that does not feature a President of the United  राज्य ; the अन्य is the $ 10 विधेयक , featuring  Alexander Hamilton .
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the reverse ,  according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी  and Printing , shows approximately 4:10 .
One hundred hundred-dollar bills are delivered by Federal Reserve Banks in mustard-colored straps ( $ 10,000   ) .
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill  redesign थी अनावरण on अप्रैल 21 , 2010 , और थी  to be issued to the public on February 11 , 2011 , but production was shut down in December 2010 because as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw .
A vertical crease in the paper reveals a blank  स्पेस on the विधेयक  when pulled out .
In their replacement , and  continuing the ऊँची  demand of this denomination , the Series 2006A was launched retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ) .
On April 24 , 2013 , the Federal Reserve announced the new $ 100 bill would  डालें परिसंचरण  on October 8 , 2013 .
King David in  robes of a बीज़ान्टिन  emperor .
Miniature  इससे the  Paris Psalter .
David ( ; ISO 259-3 Dawid ; ' ; Strong 's : Daveed ) according to the Hebrew Bible , was the second king of the  संयुक्त किंगडम of इसराईल , और according  to the New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke , an ancestor of Jesus .
His life is conventionally dated to c. 1040–970 BCE , his reign over Judah c. 1010–1002 BCE , and his reign over the United Kingdom of Israel c.  1002–970 bce .
The Books of Samuel , 1 Kings , and 1 Chronicles are the only sources of information on David , although the Tel Dan stele ( dated c. 850–835 BCE ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ) , read as `` House of David '' , which most scholars take as  पुष्टि of the अस्तित्व in the mid-9th सदी bce of a  Judean royal dynasty called the House of David .
He is depicted as a righteous king , although not without faults , as well as an acclaimed warrior , musician ,  और कवि , traditionally credited लिये composing अनेक  of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms .
David  is सेंट्रल to यहूदी  , Christian , and Islamic doctrine and culture .
Biblical tradition  maintains  that a direct descendant of David will be the Messiah .
In Islam he is  माना to be  a prophet and the king of a nation .
Kathmandu  (  ; ) is the capital and largest urban agglomerate of Nepal .
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu  महानगर  City at its core , and its sister cities Patan , Kirtipur , Thimi , and Bhaktapur .
It also  शामिल the recently पहचाना  urban areas of Shankhapur , Karyabinayak , and Champapur .
Banepa , Dhulikhel , and Panauti are satellite urban areas of  काठमांडू स्तिथ बस  outside the Kathmandu valley .
Kathmandu  is भी  known informally as `` KTM '' or the `` tri-city '' .
According to a census conducted in 2011 , Kathmandu metropolis alone has 975,453 inhabitants ; and the agglomerate has  a जनसांख्यिकी  of more than 2.5 million inhabitants .
The metropolitan city area is and has a population density  of 19,250  per km2 .
The city stands at an elevation of approximately in the  bowl-shaped काठमांडू घाटी  of central Nepal .
It is surrounded by four major  kyu : shivapuri  , Phulchoki , Nagarjun , and Chandragiri .
काठमांडू घाटी is भाग of तीन  districts ( Kathmandu , Lalitpur , and Bhaktapur ) , has the highest population density in the country , and is home to about a twelfth of Nepal 's population .
During Rana and Shah eras , the name `` Nepal '' referred only to the Kathmandu  घाटी ; it थी कया  people who lived outside the valley called it .
During this period ,  अंग्रेजों इतिहासकारों पुकारा the  valley itself `` Nepal Proper '' .
Today , Kathmandu is not only the capital of the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal , but also the headquarters of the Central Development Region  of  Nepal .
The Central Region comprises three zones :  bagmati , narayani  , and Janakpur .
Kathmandu is located in the Bagmati Zone  .
Kathmandu is the gateway  to पर्यटन  in Nepal .
It is also the nerve center   of the country 's economy .
It has the most advanced infrastructure of any urban area in Nepal , and its  अर्थव्यवस्था is केन्द्रित on पर्यटन  , which accounted for 3.8 % of Nepal 's GDP in 1995–96 .
( Tourism in Kathmandu declined thereafter during a period of political  अशांति  , but since then has improved . )
The  नगर रै a समृद्ध इतिहास  , spanning nearly 2000 years , as inferred from inscriptions found in the valley .
Religious and cultural festivities form a  प्रमुख भाग of the जीवनदान of  people residing in Kathmandu .
सबसे of काठमांडू  's people follow Hinduism and many others follow Buddhism .
There are  लोगों of अन्य धार्मिक  beliefs as well , giving Kathmandu a cosmopolitan culture .
Nepali is the most commonly spoken  भाषा in the  city .
Nepal Bhasa is the indigenous language  बोला  by the Newar people .
Hindi is widely understood and English is understood by  काठमांडू 's शिक्षित निवासियों  .
The city 's literacy rate is 98 %  .
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur Patan ) and Bhaktapur are integral to Kathmandu 's cultural heritage , tourism industry , and economy ; therefore UNESCO 's World Heritage Site lists all three cities ' monuments and attractions together under one heading , `` Kathmandu Valley-  युनेस्को संसार विरासत साईट  `` .
Field hockey , usually referred to simply as hockey , is a team sport of the hockey family which is played between two teams of eleven players with  हॉकी sticks और  a hard , solid plastic ball .
At the turn of the 21st century , the game is played globally , with particular popularity  throughout यूरोपीय , एशिया  , Oceania , and South America – in addition to being the national sport of Pakistan and India .
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada , the United States , and other regions of the  संसार जहाँ the खेल of बर्फ हॉकी  is more popular .
During play , goal keepers are the only players who are allowed to touch the ball with any  part  of their body ( with the exception of a player 's hand considered 'part of the stick ' ) , with this only applying within the shooting circle ( also known as the D , or shooting arc , or just the circle ) , while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick .
The team that scores the most goals by the end of  the मैच विन्स  .
If the score is tied at  the समाप्त of the खेल , either a  draw is declared or the game goes into extra time and/or a penalty shootout , depending on the competition 's format .
The governing body of hockey is the International Hockey Federation ( FIH ) , with men and women being represented internationally  in प्रतियोगिताओं सहित the ओलम्पिक खेल  , Commonwealth games , Hockey World Cup , Champions Trophy and Junior Hockey World Cup , with many countries running extensive junior , senior , and masters ' club competitions .
The FIH  is भी  responsible for organising the Hockey Rules Board and developing the rules for the sport .
A popular variant of field hockey is indoor hockey ,  जिससे differs in  a number of respects while embodying the primary principles of hockey .
Indoor  हॉकी is a 6-a-side  variant , with a field which is reduced to approximately 40m × 20m .
With many of the rules remaining the same , including obstruction and feet , there are several key variations - Players may not raise the ball unless shooting on goal , players may not hit the ball ( instead  utilising pushes to ट्रांसफ़र the बॉल ) , और  the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off .
Ethan `` Cane '' Ashby ( né Atkinson ) is a fictional character from  the अमरीकी सीबीएस साबुन  opera The Young and the Restless .
He is portrayed by Australian  कर्ता डेनियल गोडार्ड  , who originally auditioned for Brad Snyder on As the World Turns but was recommended for a role on The Young and the Restless instead .
The role was to be portrayed as an American , but  गोडार्ड 's  Australian descent influenced the character 's background .
Former head writer Lynn Marie  लैथम introduced उसे दौरान the  episode airing on January 12 , 2007 as an Australian bartender in search of his family , a debut that received a mixed response .
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip Chancellor II ( Donnelly Rhodes ) and Jill Foster Abbott ( Jess Walton ) but the character 's background was rewritten by  मरिया एरिना घंटी in  2009 , reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ) .
Though characterized as `` mysterious '' , Cane is `` loyal and dedicated '' , while Goddard described the character  as a `` ठेठ ऑस्ट्रेलियाई , working-class दयालु  of guy '' .
He was the first member of the  एटकिन्सन परिवार to  appear on the series , followed by his parents and identical twin brother .
Soon after his debut , he became a leading character , a  निर्णय praised by दर्शक  and critics .
The character has been involved with Amber Moore ( Adrienne Frantz ) , Chloe  मिशेल  ( Elizabeth Hendrickson ) and most notably Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ) , a romance that garnered significant fan attention .
In 2009 , Cane and Lily were married ; Global BC would later call  लिली the प्रेम  of Cane 's life .
The pair  था दो children  , Charlie and Mattie Ashby .
In 2011 , the actor was  fired , और cane  was shot to death onscreen .
However , Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned for his return ,  revealing कि cane 's  identical twin brother was in fact the man who died .
This sacrificed his marriage to  लिली , लकिन  the couple were remarried on Valentine 's Day in 2012 .
Goddard has been widely acclaimed for his portrayal ; Canyon News said that he portrays the character honestly , and is `` always dependable , on fire and exciting  ''  .
John Christopher `` Johnny '' Depp II ( born June 9 , 1963 ) is an American actor ,  फिल्मी निर्माता , और  musician .
He  has  won the Golden Globe Award and Screen Actors Guild award for Best Actor .
डेप रोज़  to prominence on the 1980s television series 21 Jump Street , becoming a teen idol .
Dissatisfied with that status , Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the title character of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office success in films such as Sleepy Hollow ( 1999 ) ,  Charlie  and the Chocolate Factory ( 2005 ) , Alice in Wonderland ( 2010 ) , Rango ( 2011 ) and the Pirates of the Caribbean film series ( 2003–present ) .
He has collaborated with  निदेशक और dost टिम  Burton in eight films ; the most recent being Dark Shadows ( 2012 ) .
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood , Joseph D. Pistone in  donnie brasco  , Hunter S. Thompson in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas , George Jung in Blow , and the bank robber John Dillinger in Michael Mann 's Public Enemies .
Films featuring Depp have  grossed over $ 3.1  billion at the United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide .
He has been nominated for top awards many times , winning the Best Actor Awards from the Golden –_Motion_Picture_Musical_or_Comedy Globes  –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy लिये स्वीनी टॉड :  The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl .
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in American cinema , being twice named as the `` Sexiest Man Alive `` by  लोगों पत्रिका in 2003 और  2009 .
He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness Book of World Records as the  उच्चतम सशुल्क कर्ता  , with $ 75 million .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly  ज्ञात as the वेब ) ,  is a system of interlinked hypertext documents accessed via the Internet .
With a web browser , one can view web pages that may contain text , images , videos , and other multimedia , and navigate  between उन्हें via  hyperlinks .
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE , British engineer , computer scientist and at that  time employee of the CERN ,  Sir Tim Berners-Lee , now Director of the World Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau proposed in 1990 to use hypertext `` to link and access information of  विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the  user can browse at will '' , and they publicly introduced the project in December of the same year .
Mark Travis  जॉन  Sanchez ( born November 11 , 1986 ) is an American football quarterback for the New York Jets of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was drafted in the first round of the 2009 NFL Draft as the fifth overall selection by the Jets and the second quarterback  लिया overall  .
He played college football at  the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी  California ( USC ) .
Sanchez grew up in a  well-disciplined और  athletic family .
In the eighth grade , he began to play  फ़ुटबॉल और  learn the intricacies of the quarterback position , training with his father , Nick .
A well-regarded prospect , Sanchez committed to Southern California following his successful high school career in which he led his team to  a  championship title during his final season .
At USC , Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first three years though he rose to  prominence due to उसके ब्रैड दिखावे  on the field in 2007 due to injuries suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty .
Sanchez also became popular within the community due to   his Mexican-American heritage .
Named the starter in 2008 ,  सांचेज़ led यूएससी to a  12–1 record and won the Rose Bowl against Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense .
Although many considered him too inexperienced , Sanchez announced his intention to  डालें the 2009 एनएफएल  Draft .
He was selected by the Jets after they traded up with the Cleveland  भूरा , और थी नामित the starting क्वार्टरबैक  prior to the start of the season .
Despite a subpar performance , Sanchez led the Jets to the  afc चैंपियनशिप  Game , a losing effort to the Indianapolis Colts , becoming the fourth rookie quarterback in NFL history to win his first playoff game and the second to win two playoff games .
In his second season , Sanchez continued to develop and led the Jets to the playoffs and the team 's second consecutive AFC Championship Game where they narrowly  खोया to the पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स  , 24–19 .
With the win over the New England Patriots the week prior , Sanchez tied four other  quarterbacks लिये the दूसरी सबसे post-season सड़क victories  by a quarterback in NFL history .
In leading the Jets to  दो लगातार सम्मेलन  championships , Sanchez joined quarterback Ben Roethlisberger as the only two quarterbacks in NFL history to reach the conference championship in their first two seasons in the league .
The next two   seasons would be a regression for both the team and Sanchez as they failed to reach the playoffs .
Fans and  मीडिया आलोचकों  called for a struggling Sanchez to be benched .
He eventually was replaced towards the end of the 2012  ऋतु  with Greg McElroy .
Paul Avery ( April 2 , 1934December 10 , 2000 ) was an American police reporter , best known for his stories on the infamous serial killer known as the Zodiac , and   later for his work on the Patricia Hearst kidnapping .
A small submersible AC sump pump with a garden hose   connector
A sump pump is a pump used to remove water  कि रै संचित  in a water collecting sump basin , commonly found in the basement of homes .
The water may enter via the perimeter drains of a basement waterproofing system , funneling  into the जलाशय or क्युकी of बरसात or प्राकृतिक मैदान  water , if the basement is below the water table level .
Sump pumps are used where basement flooding happens regularly and to  उपाय dampness जहाँ the जल तालिका  is above the foundation of a home .
Sump pumps send water away from a house to any place where it is no longer problematic , such as a municipal  तूफ़ान नाली or a शुष्क खूब  .
Pumps may discharge to the sanitary sewer in older  संस्थापना  .
Once considered acceptable , this practice  may अभी violate the plumbing कोड or  municipal bylaws , because it can overwhelm the municipal sewage treatment system .
Municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect and  reroute sump पंप  discharge away from sanitary sewers .
Fines may  be  imposed for noncompliance .
Many homeowners have inherited their sump pump configurations and do not realize that the  पंप discharges to  the sewer .
If the  निर्वहन  is fed to a laundry sink in the basement , it 's likely going to the sewer .
प्रायः hardwired  into a home 's electrical system , sump pumps may have a battery backup .
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some  पंपों , eliminating the need लिये  electricity at the expense of using potable water , potentially making them more expensive to operate than electrical pumps and creating an additional water disposal problem .
Since a  sump जलाशय may अतिप्रवाह if नहीं  constantly pumped , a backup system is important for cases when the main power is out for prolonged periods of time , as during a severe storm .
There are generally two types  of  sump pumps — pedestal and submersible .
The pedestal pump 's motor is  आरोहित  above the sump , where it is more easily serviced , but is also more conspicuous .
The pump impeller  is  driven by a long , vertical extension shaft and the impeller is in a scroll housing in the base of the pump .
The submersible pump is entirely mounted inside the sump , and is specially sealed to  prevent  electrical short circuits .
Sump pump systems are also utilized in industrial and commercial applications  to  control water table -related problems in surface soil .
An artesian  aquifer  or periodic high water table situation can cause the ground to become unstable due to water saturation .
As long as the  पंप  functions , the surface soil will remain stable .
These sumps are typically ten feet in depth or more ; lined with corrugated  मेटल पाइप कि contains  perforations or drain holes throughout .
They may include electronic control systems with visual  और audible  alarms and are usually covered to prevent debris and animals from falling in .
Bleeding Kansas , Bloody Kansas or the Border War , was a series of violent political confrontations involving anti-slavery Free-Staters and pro-slavery `` Border Ruffian `` elements , that took place in the Kansas Territory and the neighboring towns  of  Missouri between 1854 and 1861 .
at the दिल of the  conflict was the question of whether Kansas would enter the Union as a free state or slave state .
As such , Bleeding Kansas was a proxy war between Northerners and Southerners  over the समस्या  of slavery in the United States .
The  term ``  Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace Greeley of the New York Tribune ; the events it encompasses directly presaged the American Civil War .
Congress had long struggled to balance the interests of pro-slavery forces and anti-slavery  शक्तियां  .
The events later known as Bleeding Kansas were set into motion by the Kansas–Nebraska Act of 1854  , which nullified the  Missouri Compromise and instead implemented the concept of popular sovereignty .
An ostensibly democratic idea , popular sovereignty stated that the inhabitants of each territory or state should decide whether it  होता be a फ़्री  or slave state ; however , this resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides .
At one point , Kansas had two separate governments ,  प्रत्येक साथ इसके अपना संविधान , हालांकि  only one was federally recognized .
On January 29 , 1861 , Kansas was admitted to the Union as a free state , less than  तीन महीने पहले the बैटल of फोर्ट sumter जिससे began  the Civil War .
बेंजीन is  an organic chemical compound with the molecular formula C6 H|Hydrogen|H6 .
Its molecule  is रचित of 6  carbon atoms joined in a ring , with 1 hydrogen atom attached to each carbon atom .
Because its molecules contain only carbon and hydrogen atoms ,  बेंजीन is classed  as a hydrocarbon .
Benzene is a natural constituent of crude oil , and is one  of  the most basic petrochemicals .
Benzene is an aromatic hydrocarbon and  the दूसरी [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6  ] -annulene ) , a cyclic hydrocarbon with a continuous pi bond .
It is sometimes abbreviated Ph –H . Benzene is a colorless  और अत्यधिक ज्वलनशील  liquid with a sweet smell .
It is mainly used as a precursor to heavy chemicals , such  as ethylbenzene और cumene  , which are produced on a billion kilogram scale .
Because it has  a ऊँची ऑक्टेन क्रमांक  , it is an important component of gasoline , composing a few percent of its mass .
Most non-industrial applications have been limited by  बेंजीन  's carcinogenicity .
Giovanni  virginio स्क्यापारेल्ली  ( ; 14 March 1835 – 4 July 1910 ) was an Italian astronomer and science historian .
Wii homebrew refers to the reuse of Nintendo 's  वी खेल कंसोल to चलाएं तन्त्र  that has not been authorized by Nintendo .
It achieves this by defeating the Wii 's copy  सुरक्षा और कोड हस्ताक्षर  measures .
In more general terms , Wii Homebrew refers to the use of the Wii 's hardware , accessories and software for purposes  बाहर those intended by the निर्माता .
Original efforts focused on using the Wii Remote as a pointing  यंत्र on अन्य ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों , or कार्यशील web-based  games in the built-in web browser .
Subsequent developments in games exploits , such as the `` Twilight hack `` , `` Bannerbomb '' and its later incarnation `` LetterBomb '' , `` Smash Stack '' , `` Indiana Pwns '' ,  `` yu-gi-owned '' , `` bathaxx '' , और `` वापसी of the jodi  '' , made installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible .
Hadley (  सही  ) discussing the 2006 Israel-Lebanon crisis with Bush and Rice .
Stephen John Hadley ( born February  13 , 1947 ) थी the 21st u.S.  Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs ( commonly referred as National Security Advisor ) , serving under President George W. Bush .
Take identical growing plants and  दे उर्वरक  to half of them .
If there are differences between   the fertilized plant group and the unfertilized `` control '' group , these differences may be due to the fertilizer .
A scientific control is  an प्रयोग or  observation designed to minimize the effects of variables other than the single independent variable .
This increases the reliability of the results , often through a comparison between control measurements and the  अन्य माप  .
Scientific controls  हैं  a part of the scientific method .
For example , during  ड्रग परीक्षण ,  scientists will try to control two groups to keep them as identical as possible , then allow one group to try the drug .
Another example might be testing  संयंत्र  fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a garden : the plants that receive no fertilizer are the control group , because they establish the baseline level of growth that the fertilizer-treated plants will be compared against .
Without a  कंट्रोल समूह , the प्रयोग  can not determine whether the fertilizer-treated plants grow more than they would have if untreated .
ideally , सब परिवर्तनीय in an  experiment will be controlled ( accounted for by the control measurements ) and none will be uncontrolled .
In such an experiment , if all the controls work as  अपेक्षित , it is संभावित to conclude कि the  experiment is working as intended and that the results of the experiment are due to the effect of the variable being tested .
That is , scientific controls  allow  an investigator to make a claim like `` Two situations were identical until factor X occurred .
Since  फ़ैक्टर x is the तभी अंतर between  the two situations , the new outcome was caused by factor X . ''

John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S . October 19 , 1735 ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was the second president of the United States ( 1797–1801 ) , having earlier served as the  first vice president of the  United States .
An American Founding  पिता , he थी a statesman  , diplomat , and a leading advocate of American independence from Great Britain .
Well educated , he was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted  republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः seminal विचार , दोनो in प्रकाशित works और in  letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
Adams came to prominence in the early stages of the American  क्रान्ति .
A lawyer and public figure in  बोस्टन , as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स  to the Continental Congress , he played a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas  जेफरसन in drafting the घोषणा of  Independence in 1776 , and was its primary advocate in the Congress .
Later , as a  राजनयिक  in Europe , he helped negotiate the eventual peace treaty with Great Britain , and was responsible for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and historian , Adams largely wrote the Massachusetts Constitution in 1780 , which together with his earlier Thoughts on  सरकारी , बहकावे  American political thought .
One of  उसके महानतम भूमिकाएँ थी as a न्यायधीश of अक्षर  : in 1775 , he nominated George Washington to be commander-in-chief , and 25 years later nominated John Marshall to be Chief Justice of the United States .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials secured him two terms as George  वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस  president and his own election in 1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he encountered   ferocious attacks by the Jeffersonian Republicans , as well as the dominant faction in his own Federalist Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and built up the army and navy especially  in the फेस of an undeclared नवल युद्ध  ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France , 1798–1800 .
The major accomplishment of his  प्रेसिडेंसी  was his peaceful resolution of the conflict in the face of Hamilton 's opposition .
In 1800 , Adams was defeated for re-election by Thomas  जेफरसन  and retired to Massachusetts .
He later  resumed उसके  friendship with Jefferson .
He  और उसके बीवी , अबीगैल  Adams , founded an accomplished family line of politicians , diplomats , and historians now referred to as the Adams political family .
Adams was the  पिता of जॉन क्विंसी  Adams , the sixth President of the United States .
उसके उपलब्धियाँ  have received greater recognition in modern times , though his contributions were not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders .
Adams was the first U.S. president to reside in the building that eventually  became ज्ञात as the श्वेत  House .
A  वाट भाप  engine .
The steam engine , fuelled  primarily by कोयले  , propelled the Industrial Revolution in Great Britain and the world .
The Industrial Revolution was the transition to new  निर्माण प्रक्रियाओं कि occurred  in the period from about 1760 to some time between 1820 and 1840 .
This transition included going from hand production methods to machines , new chemical manufacturing and iron  उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं , improved दक्षता of जल शक्ति , the increasing उपयोग of भाप शक्ति  and development of machine tools .
The transition also included the change from wood and other  bio-fuels to कोयले  .
The Industrial revolution began in Britain and within a few decades   spread to Western Europe and the United States .
The Industrial Revolution marks a major turning point in history ; almost every  पहलू  of daily life was influenced in some way .
Most notably , average income and population began  to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented  sustained growth .
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert  E.  Lucas , Jr. , `` For the first time in history , the living standards of the masses of ordinary people have begun to undergo sustained growth ... Nothing remotely like this economic behavior is mentioned by the classical economists , even as a theoretical possibility . ''
विलियम  Bell Scott Iron and Coal , 1855-60
The period of time covered by the Industrial Revolution  varies साथ अलग  historians .
Eric Hobsbawm held that it 'broke  आउट ' in ब्रिटेन in the 1780s और थी  not fully felt until the 1830s or 1840s , while T. S. Ashton held that it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830 .
Some 20th-century historians such as John Clapham and Nicholas Crafts have argued that the process of economic and social change took place  धीरे और  the term revolution is a misnomer .
This is  स्टिल a विषय  of debate among historians .
GDP per capita was broadly stable before the Industrial Revolution and the emergence of the  आधुनिक पूंजीवादी  economy .
The Industrial Revolution began an era of per-capita economic growth in  पूंजीवादी economies  .
Economic historians are  in अनुबंध  that the onset of the Industrial Revolution is the most important event in the history of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants .
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and 1870 , when technological and economic progress gained momentum with the increasing adoption of  steam-powered नौकाएँ , जहाजों और रेल , the  large scale manufacture of machine tools and the increasing use of steam powered factories .
Juliet AnnMarie Huddy ( born  सितंबर  27 , 1969 ) , is an American television news reporter , currently appearing on Fox News Channel .
This list ranks U.S. cities by land area (  नहीं सहित  bodies of water ) .
Total areas ( including water ) are also given  , लकिन नोट  that , when ranked by total area , a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger '' .
San Francisco is an extreme example ; water makes up nearly 80 % of its total area  of 232 वर्गाकार  miles ( 601 km2 ) .
Note also  कि  in many cases a city may be geographically large primarily because its municipal government has merged with the government of the surrounding county .
In some cases the county no longer exists , while in others the arrangement has formed a  संचित city–county ( or city- बरो in अलास्का , or  city- parish in Louisiana ) .
These are  दिखाया in बिंदास  in the list below ( but not all examples may be indicated ) .
** These are independent cities , meaning they  हैं नहीं a भाग of कोई  county .
The large intestine ( or bowel , colon ) is the last part of the digestive   system in vertebrate animals .
Its function is to absorb water  इससे the बाकी  indigestible food matter , and then to pass useless waste material from the body .
This article is primarily about the human gut , though the information about its  प्रक्रियाओं  are directly applicable to most mammals .
The large  आंत consists of the cecum  , rectum and anal canal .
it starts in the सही iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis , बस at or नीचे the सही कमर , जहाँ it is joined to the नीचे समाप्त of the छोटी आंत .
From here it continues up the abdomen , then across the width of  the abdominal गुहा , और तब it turns bas  , continuing to its endpoint at the anus .
The large intestine  is परिचय long , जिससे is परिचय  one-fifth of the whole length of the intestinal canal .
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine includes the cecum  ,  colon , rectum , and anal canal .
However , some sources  exclude the गुदा  canal .
The Green Bay Packers are an American football  टोली आधारित in ग्रीन खाड़ी , विस्कॉन्सिन  .
They are members of the North Division of the National Football Conference ( NFC ) in the National Football  लीग ( एनएफएल ) .
Green Bay is the third-oldest  मताधिकार in the एनएफएल , having महरूम व्यवस्थित  and playing in 1919 .
The Packers are the only non-profit , community-owned major league professional sports team in the  संयुक्त राज्य  .
The Packers are the last vestige of `` small town  टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम  in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George Whitney Calhoun , the Green Bay Packers  can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in ग्रीन खाड़ी डेटिंग  back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a semi-professional football team against clubs from around Wisconsin and  the मिडवेस्ट .
They joined the American Professional Football Association ( APFA ) in 1921 , the  forerunner to कया is ज्ञात आज as the नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is the last NFL `` small town '' team , its local fan base and media extends into nearby Milwaukee ; the team also played selected home games  वहीँ between 1933 और 1994  .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL )   , including nine NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era and four Super Bowl victories —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have long-standing  ,  bitter rivalries with their NFC North ( formerly the NFC Central ) opponents , the Chicago Bears , Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions .
The  bears-packers फंसने  is one of the oldest rivalries in NFL history , dating back to 1921 .
The San Fernando Valley ( locally known as `` The Valley '' ) is an urbanized valley located in the Los Angeles metropolitan area of southern California , United States , defined by the mountains  of the अनुप्रस्थ  Ranges circling it .
Home to 1.76 million people ,  it झूठ उत्तर  of the larger and more populous Los Angeles Basin .
Nearly two thirds of  the घाटी 's जमीन  area is part of the City of Los Angeles .
The other incorporated cities in the valley are Glendale , Burbank , San Fernando , Hidden Hills and  calabasas  .
