Pretties is a 2005 science  fiction अनोखा और the दूसरी  book of the Uglies Trilogy written by Scott Westerfeld .
It is set in a future dystopian world in which everyone is turned `` Pretty '' by  चरम कॉस्मेटिक सर्जरी upon reaching  age 16 .
It tells the story of teenager Tally Youngblood who rebels  विरूद्ध समाज 's  enforced conformity .
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26 , 1971 ) is an American woman sentenced to life in prison for  murdering  her children .
born in संघ , दक्षिण कैरोलिना  , and a former student of the University of South Carolina Union , she was convicted on July 22 , 1995 for murdering her two sons , 3-year-old Michael Daniel Smith , born October 10 , 1991 , and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith , born August 5 , 1993 .
The case gained worldwide attention shortly after it developed , due to her claiming that a black man stole  उसके car और kidnapped उसके  sons .
She later claimed that she suffered from  दिमागी स्वास्थ्य मुद्दे  that impaired her judgment .
according to the दक्षिण कैरोलिना विभाग  of Corrections , Smith will be eligible for parole on November 4 , 2024 , after serving a minimum of thirty years .
She is incarcerated at South Carolina 's Leath Correctional  संस्था , निकट  Greenwood .
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali taken from the Inuit Koyukon  athabaskan भाषा अर्थ `` the ग्रेट एक '' ) is the उच्चतम  mountain peak in the United States and in North America with a summit elevation of above sea level .
At some , the base to  शिखर वृद्धि is माना  the largest of any mountain situated entirely above sea level .
Measured by topographic prominence  , it is the  third most prominent peak after Mount Everest and Aconcagua .
Located in the Alaska Range in the interior of US state of Alaska , it is  the centerpiece of  Denali National Park and Preserve .
The first European to  दस्तावेज़ sighting the पहाड़  was George Vancouver in 1794 .
In 1903 , James  wickersham अंकित the पहला attempt at चढ़ाई  McKinley which was unsuccessful .
In 1906 , Frederick Cook claimed  the पहला ascent जिससे थी बाद  proven to be false .
The first verifiable ascent to McKinley 's summit was achieved on June 7 , 1913 by climbers Hudson Stuck , Harry Karstens , Walter Harper , and  रॉबर्ट  Tatum .
In 1951 , Bradford Washburn pioneered the West Buttress route considered to be the safest and easiest route and therefore the most popular  फिलहाल  in use .
The Honda  s600  is an automobile manufactured by Honda .
It  थी शुभारम्भ  in March 1964 .
Available as a roadster – bearing strong  प्रतिरूप to the होंडा s500 – और as a fastback  coupé – introduced in March 1965 – the S600 was the first Honda available in two trim levels .
During its production run up to 1966 , the model styling would remain pretty much the same , with the most notable changes coming to the front grille ,  बम्पर  , and headlights .
Powered by a DOHC , water-cooled , four-cylinder inline engine with four carburetors , the engine capacity was increased to 606 cc from  the s500 's 531  cc .
The  इंजन उत्पादित  at 8,500 rpm and had a top speed of .
With the convertible weighing in at  mere , the अतिरिक्त चादर  metal of the coupe only added to the overall weight .
Suspension was  स्वतंत्र साथ sealed  roller chain drive to each rear wheel .
The S600 was  the पहला  mass marketed Honda car .
First offered only in  right-hand  drive , it soon became available in left-hand drive to appeal to export markets .
There  यहूद a  few pre-production S500s manufactured in left hand drive , two or three even being shown in some early sales brochures .
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a special , upgraded package called the SM600 which included , among other items , special paint colors , exclusive badging , a  मानक रेडियो  and speaker , a special antenna in the passenger side sun visor , standard reversing lights , a standard cigarette lighter , a standard heater , better cushioned seats , and a detachable seat track for quick removal of the passenger seat .
Honda built 3,912   roadsters in 1964 , with production climbing to 7,261 convertibles and 1,519 coupes in 1965 .
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the S800 ) with only 111 roadsters and 281 coupes ,  giving  tallies of 11,284 convertibles and 1,800 coupes for the 3 year span .
Everybody Hates Chris is an American television period sitcom that depicts the teenage experiences of  हास्य क्रिस चट्टान ( जो is भी the narrator  ) while growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn , New York .
The show is set between 1983 and 1987 ; however , Rock himself was a teenager between 1978 and  1983  .
Rock grew up with a boy named Kenny Montero , whom he has often referred to as the  प्रेरणा लिये a लॉट of the एपीसोड  .
In many interviews , Rock has described Kenny as the reason he got  into  comedy in the first place .
The show 's title  parodies  the CBS sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond .
Rock stated : ``  everybody  Loves Raymond but Everybody Hates Chris ! `` .
The show 's  सीसे अभिनेताओं  are Tyler James Williams , Terry Crews , Tichina Arnold , Tequan Richmond , Imani Hakim , and Vincent Martella .
In Fall 2008 , the The CW moved Everybody Hates Chris and The Game to the Friday night death  स्लॉट  .
The fourth season of the series  premiered शुक्रवार ,  October 3 , 2008 , at 8:00PM Eastern/7:00PM Central .
On May 21 , 2009 , The  CW  announced that it had cancelled Everybody Hates Chris .
Prior to this  , executive producer Chris Rock  announced that the end of season 4 matched up with his own past—dropping out of high school to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show .
Pleural effusion is excess fluid that accumulates between the two pleural  परतों , the fluid-filled  space that surrounds the lungs .
Excessive amounts of such fluid can  impair श्वास by limiting  the expansion of the lungs during ventilation .
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an Old English heroic epic poem consisting of  3182 alliterative long लाइनों , नियत in  Scandinavia , commonly cited as one of the most important works of Anglo-Saxon literature .
It survives in a single manuscript known as the  nowell codex  .
Its composition by  an बेनाम anglo-saxon  poet is dated between the 8th and the early 11th century .
In 1731 ,  the पाण्डुलिपि थी badly  damaged by a fire that swept through a building housing a collection of Medieval manuscripts assembled by Sir Robert Bruce Cotton .
The poem fell into obscurity for decades , and its existence did not become widely  ज्ञात again जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण  prepared by the Icelandic-Danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin .
In the poem , Beowulf , a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia , comes to the help of Hroðgar , the king of the Danes , whose  मीड हॉल ( in heorot ) रै महरूम अंतर्गत आक्रमण  by a monster known as Grendel .
After Beowulf slays him ,  grendel 's माँ हमले  the hall and is then also defeated .
Victorious , Beowulf goes  घर to geatland  in Sweden and later becomes king of the Geats .
After a period of fifty years has  passed , बियोवुल्फ़  defeats a dragon , but is fatally wounded in the battle .
After his death , his  सेवकों  bury him in a tumulus , a burial mound , in Geatland .
shem हैम  and Japheth by James Tissot 1904 .
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic : Sām ; Ge'ez : ሴም , Sēm  ; `` renown  ; prosperity ; name '' ) was one of the sons of Noah in the Hebrew Bible as well as in Islamic literature .
He is most popularly regarded as the   eldest son , though some traditions regard him as the second son .
Genesis 10:21 refers to relative ages of Shem and his brother Japheth  , but  with sufficient ambiguity to have yielded different translations .
The verse is translated in the KJV as `` Unto Shem also , the father of all the  children of  Eber , the brother of Japheth the elder , even to him were children born . `` .
However , the New American Standard Bible gives , `` Also to Shem , the  पिता  of all the children of Eber , and the older brother of Japheth , children were born . ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of  arphaxad , ( लकिन nearly 101 - देखिए कालक्रम नोट , ) दो  years after the flood , making him barely 99 at the time the flood began ; and that he lived for another 500 years after this , making his age at death 600 years .
the children of shem यहूद ईलम , asshur , arphaxad , lud , और aram , in जोड to बेटियां .
Abraham , the patriarch of the Hebrews and Arabs , was one of  the वंशजों of arphaxad  .
Islamic literature describes Shem as one of the believing sons   of Noah .
Some sources even identify Shem as a prophet in his  own  right and that he was the next prophet after his father .
In one Muslim legend , Shem was one  of the लोगों कि परमेश्वर बना यीशु उठाएगा  as a sign to the Children of Israel .
The 1st century historian Flavius Josephus , among many others , recounted the tradition that these five sons were the progenitors of the nations of Elam , Assyria ,  chaldea , लीडिया , और  Syria , respectively .
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages , as a subset of the  afro-asiatic  languages , denoting the common linguistic heritage of Arabic , Aramaic , Akkadian , Ethiopic , Hebrew and Phoenician languages .
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g. , B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ;  उत्पत्ति rabbah 46:7 ; उत्पत्ति rabbah  56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah 25:6 ; Numbers Rabbah 4:8 . ) , Shem is believed to have been Melchizedek , King of Salem whom Abraham is recorded to have met after the battle of the four kings .
In a few of the many extra-biblical sources that describe him , Shem is also credited with killing  nimrod  , son of Cush .
Shem is  उल्लेखित in उत्पत्ति 5:32 , 6:10  ; 7:13 ; 9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; also in 1 Chronicles 1:4 .
Geographic identifications of Flavius Josephus , c. 100 AD ; Japheth 's sons shown  in रेड  , Ham 's sons in blue , Shem 's sons in green .
Go Daddy or Go Daddy Group Inc. is a privately held company that is primarily an internet domain registrar and web hosting  कम्पनी  .
Go Daddy  समूह inc. दायर लिये  an IPO in 2006 , but later canceled it , due to `` market uncertainties '' .
In addition to domain registration and hosting Go Daddy also  बिकता e-business  related software and services .
On June 24 , 2011 , The Wall Street Journal reported  कि private-equity firms केकेआर  and Silver Lake Partners , along with a third investor , were nearing a deal to buy the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion .
On July 1 , 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that KKR , Silver Lake Partners and Technology Crossover  ventures था बंद the सौदे  .
Although the purchase price was not officially announced it was reported to be $ 2.25 billion , for  65 % of  the company .
, Bob Parsons had ceded the CEO role of Go Daddy to Warren Adelman , who had been with the  कम्पनी लिये परिचय 10  years .

Andorra ( ; , ) , officially the Principality of Andorra ( ) , also called the Principality of the Valleys  of Andorra , ( ) , is  a landlocked microstate in Southwestern Europe , located in the eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France .
It is the sixth smallest nation in Europe , having an area of and an  अनुमानित  population of 85,000 in 2012 .
Its capital , Andorra la Vella , is the highest capital  नगर in यूरोपीय  , at an elevation of above sea level .
The official language is Catalan , although Spanish , Portuguese , and  फ्रेंच हैं भी commonly  spoken .
Created under a charter in 988 , the  उपस्थित  Principality was formed in 1278 .
It is known as a principality as it is a monarchy headed by two co-princes – the  बिशप of urgell और the अध्यक्ष of  France .
Andorra is a prosperous country mainly because of its tourism industry , which services an   estimated 10.2 million visitors annually , and also because of its status as a tax haven .
It  is  not a member of the European Union , but the euro is the de facto currency .
The people of Andorra have the 4th highest human life  प्रत्याशा  in the world — 82 years at birth .
The George Washington  विश्वविद्यालयों ( gw  , GWU , or George Washington ) is a comprehensive private , coeducational research university located in Washington , D.C. .
It awards certificates , Bachelor degrees , Masters degrees , and   PhDs across several dozen disciplines .
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress on February 9 , 1821 as The Columbian  कॉलेज in  the District of Columbia .
Kimberly Noel `` Kim ''  कार्दशियन  ( born October 21 , 1980 ) is an American socialite , television personality and occasional actress .
In 2007 , she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex tape that subsequently resulted in a court  awarding  her $ 5 million ; later in that same year , she and her family rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up  साथ the kardashians , और इसके subsequent  spin-offs , including Kourtney and Kim Take New York and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
In 2010  , कार्दशियन  was the highest-earning reality star , with estimated earnings of $ 6 million .
With sisters Kourtney and Khloé , Kardashian  co-owns the फ़ैशन  boutique chain D-A-S-H .
She has been involved in the  उत्पादन of अनेक लाइनों of  clothing and fragrances .
In August 2011 , Kardashian married basketball player Kris Humphries in a widely publicized  रस्म  .
That October ,  कार्दशियन  filed for divorce following 72 days of marriage .
The move garnered significant backlash from the media , who labeled it  a `` publicity स्टंट '' .
After 536 days   , Kardashian and Humphries reached an undisclosed settlement at the Los Angeles Superior Court , finalizing the divorce in April 2013 .

Oahu ( ) or  oahu  , known as `` The Gathering Place '' , is the third largest of the Hawaiian Islands and the most populous of the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii .
The  राज्य पूंजी  , Honolulu , is on Oahu 's southeast coast .
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the islands in Kaneohe Bay and off the  eastern (  windward ) coast , it has a total land area of , making it the 20th largest island in the United States .
In the greatest  आयाम , इस volcanic  island is long and across .
The  लंबाई  of the shoreline is .
The island is the result of two separate shield volcanoes : Waianae and  koolau , साथ  a broad `` valley '' or saddle ( the central Oahu Plain ) between them .
The highest point is Mt . Ka'ala in the  waianae दायरा  , rising to above sea level .
The base currency of the  संयुक्त राज्य is the  U.S. dollar , and is printed on bills in denominations of $ 1 , $ 2 , $ 5 , $ 10 , $ 20 , $ 50 , and $ 100 .
At one time , however , U.S. currency included five  larger denominations  .
Notes in the  denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000  , and $ 10,000 were printed for general use , and a $ 100,000 note was printed for certain internal transactions .
अंग्रेजों  Honduras was a British colony in Central America .
In 1981 , the colony gained  पूरा  independence , and is now the independent nation of Belize .
First colonised by Spaniards in the 17th century , the territory on  the ईस्ट coast of सेंट्रल अमेरिका , दक्षिण of मैक्सिको , became  a British crown colony in 1862 .
In 1964 , it  became  a self-governing colony .
Belize became fully independent from the United Kingdom in  1981 .
Belize was the last continental  कब्ज़ा  of the United Kingdom in the Americas .
Spelt , also known as dinkel wheat , or hulled wheat , is an  प्राचीन प्रजाति  of wheat from the fifth millennium BC .
Spelt  थी an महत्वपूर्ण  staple in parts of Europe from the Bronze Age to medieval times ; it now survives as a relict crop in Central Europe and northern Spain and has found a new market as a health food .
Spelt is sometimes  माना a subspecies of  the closely related species common wheat ( T. aestivum ) , in which case its botanical name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp . spelta .
It is a hexaploid wheat , which means it has six sets of  गुणसूत्रों  .
Sherlock Holmes ( or ) is a  fictional जासूस निर्मित by लेखक  and physician Sir Arthur Conan Doyle .
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities border on the fantastic , Holmes is famous for his astute logical reasoning , his ability to adopt almost any disguise , and his use of forensic  विज्ञान कौशल to solve  difficult cases .
holmes , जो पहला  appeared in publication in 1887 , was featured in four novels and 56 short stories .
The first novel , A Study in Scarlet , appeared in  beeton  's Christmas Annual in 1887 and the second , The Sign of the Four , in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890 .
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of short stories in The Strand Magazine , beginning with A Scandal in Bohemia in 1891 ; further series of short stories and two novels published in serial form appeared between then   and 1927 .
The stories cover  a काल  from around 1880 up to 1914 .
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer , Dr. John H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The  blanched सिपाही `` और `` the शेर 's माने ``  ) and two others are written in the third person ( `` The Mazarin Stone `` and `` His Last Bow `` ) .
In two stories ( `` The Musgrave Ritual `` and `` The Gloria Scott `` ) , Holmes tells Watson the main story from his memories , while  वाटसन becomes the narrator  of the frame story .
The first and fourth novels  , a पढ़ाई in स्कारलेट और the घाटी of भय , प्रत्येक  include a long interval of omniscient narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson .
The United  राज्य  House of Representatives is one of the two houses of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ) .
It is frequently referred  to as the  House .
The other house  is  the Senate .
The composition and  शक्तियां  of the House are established in Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed  to by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले  becoming law ( unless both the House and Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills , to impeach officials , and to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority  in the चुनावी  College .
Each U.S. state is represented in the  हाउस in proportion  to its population but is entitled to at least one representative .
The most populous state , California , currently has 53  प्रतिनिधि  .
The total number of voting  प्रतिनिधि  is fixed by law at 435 .
प्रत्येक प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a two-year पद  .
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives , who presides over the chamber , is elected by the members of the House , and is therefore traditionally the  नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक  Caucus or the House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The  हाउस meets in the दक्षिण  wing of the United States Capitol .
Jell-O is a brand name belonging to  u.s.-based kraft भोजन लिये a क्रमांक  of gelatin desserts , including fruit gels , puddings and no-bake cream pies .
The brand  's लोकप्रियता रै  led to it being used as a generic term for gelatin dessert across the U.S. and Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park located  in वेस्ट mifflin  , Pennsylvania , a suburb of Pittsburgh .
The park first opened in 1898 as a ``  ट्राली  park '' attraction at the end of the Mellon family 's Monongahela Street Railway .
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and Andrew McSwigan and thus began  the kennywood entertainment कम्पनी  that has remained a closely held family business for over 100 years .
This traditional amusement park still has structures and rides dating back to its  खोलने और the  early 1900s .
Along with Rye  playland पार्क , it is एक of  only two amusement parks listed in the National Register of Historic Places .
Kennywood is owned by Kennywood  entertainment कम्पनी , जिससे जबतक दिसम्बर 2007 थी  a closely held family business owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families .
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace Entertainment , a subsidiary of Parques  reunidos , an अंतरराष्ट्रीय  amusement park company based in Madrid , Spain .
parque reunidos  is in turn a subsidiary of Candover Investments , an investment fund based in the UK .
A Social Security card issued by the Railroad Retirement Board in 1943 to  a अभी मृतक  person .
In the United States , a Social Security number ( SSN ) is a nine-digit number issued to  u.S. नागरिकों , स्थाई निवासियों  , and temporary ( working ) residents under section 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the Social Security Act , codified as .
The number is  जारी to an व्यक्तिगत by the सोशल  Security Administration , an independent agency of the United States government .
Its  प्राथमिक purpose is to  track individuals for Social Security purposes .
A Social Security number may be obtained by applying on  रूप ss-5 , `` अनुप्रयोग लिये  A Social Security Number Card '' .
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art and design , especially visual art and music , where the work is set out to expose the  essence or पहचान of a विषय through  eliminating all non-essential forms , features or concepts .
minimalism is  any design or style in which the simplest and fewest elements are used to create the maximum effect .
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified with  developments in  post–World War II Western Art , most strongly with American visual arts in the 1960s and early 1970s .
prominent कलाकारों  associated with this movement include Donald Judd , John McCracken , Agnes Martin , Dan Flavin , Robert Morris , Anne Truitt , and Frank Stella .
It is rooted in the  reductive पहलुओं of  Modernism , and is often interpreted as a reaction against Abstract expressionism and a bridge to Postminimal art practices .
The terms have expanded to encompass a movement in music which features repetition and iteration , as in the compositions of La Monte Young ,  टेरी रिले , स्टीव reich  , Philip Glass , and John Adams .
Minimalist compositions are  sometimes  known as systems music .
The term  `` अल्पतम '' is प्रायः लागू colloquially to designate anything कि is अतिरिक्त or stripped to इसके अनिवार्य .
It has also been used to describe the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett , the films of Robert Bresson , the stories of Raymond  carver , और भी  the automobile designs of Colin Chapman .
The word was first used in  अंग्रेज़ी in the जल्दी  20th century to describe the Mensheviks .
In chemistry and physics , Dalton 's law ( also called Dalton 's law of partial  pressures ) राज्य कि the कुल  pressure exerted by the mixture of non-reactive gases is equal to the sum of the partial pressures of individual gases .
This empirical law was  observed by जॉन डाल्टन  in 1801 and is related to the ideal gas laws .
mathematically  , the pressure of a mixture of gases can be defined as the summation
or
where  represent the आंशिक  pressure of each component .
It is  assumed  that the gases do not react with each other
where is the mole  भिन्न of the i-th घटक  in the total mixture of n components .
The relationship below provides a way to  determine the आवाज़ आधारित  concentration of any individual gaseous component
where is the concentration  of  the i-th component expressed in ppm .
Dalton 's law is not exactly  followed by रियल  gases .
Those deviations are  considerably विशाल at  high pressures .
In such conditions , the volume  occupied by the अणुओं  can become significant compared to the free space between them .
In  particular , the छोटी औसत दूरियाँ between  molecules raises the intensity of intermolecular forces between gas molecules enough to substantially change the pressure exerted by them .
Neither of those effects are considered by the  आदर्श  gas model .

Enrollment is the sum of the headcount  of  undergraduate and graduate students

Enrollment is the 12-month unduplicated headcount , indicating the number of  अद्वितीय  students who attended the university during the year .
