`` Right Round '' is a song performed by American rapper Flo Rida , released as the lead single from his second studio album , R.O.O.T.S . (  2009  ) .
The   song features guest vocals from Kesha .
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was  डिजिटली released on 10 फ़रवरी  by Poe Boy Entertainment and Atlantic Records .
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's net ball referee enthusiasm , while adapting the chorus of the 1984 Dead or Alive song `` You  स्पिन me गोलाकार ( जैसे a रिकार्ड ) ``  in its hook .
According to one of the song 's  लेखक ,  the chorus refers to oral sex .
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song , but in the United  राज्य , दौरान the  run atop the chart , Kesha was uncredited .
The song  प्राप्त ज़्यादातर  negative reviews from critics , who claimed it was kitsch and misogynistic .
However  , it थी a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी  , reaching the top ten of the charts in nineteen countries worldwide .
In the United States , it became Flo Rida 's  दूसरी number-one सिंगल और broke the रिकार्ड लिये first-week बिक्री  when it was released to digital retailers .
The single 's accompanying music video was directed by Malcolm Jones and  मनोनीत लिये  an MTV Video Music Award .
The song has been used in several movies , such as The Hangover , The Ugly Truth and  the तेलुगु  movie Pilla Zamindar .
in the फिल्म पिच पूर्ण  , the song is performed by the a cappella group the Treblemakers .
The Chief Justice of the United States is the head of the United States federal court system ( the judicial branch of the federal government  of  the United States ) and the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States .
The Chief Justice is one of nine Supreme Court justices ; the other eight are the Associate Justices of the Supreme  अदालत of the  United States .
From 1789 until 1866 , the office was  ज्ञात as  the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court .
The Chief Justice is the highest judicial officer  in the देश , और अधिनियमों  as a chief administrative officer for the federal courts and as head of the Judicial Conference of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts .
The Chief Justice also serves as a  प्रवक्ता लिये  the judicial branch .
The Chief Justice leads the business of the Supreme  अदालत  .
He  presides over  oral arguments before the court .
When the court renders an opinion  ,  the Chief Justice—when in the majority—decides who writes the court 's opinion .
The Chief Justice also has significant  agenda-setting शक्ति  over the court 's meetings .
in the  case of an impeachment of a President of the United States , which has occurred twice , the Chief Justice presides over the trial in the Senate .
In modern tradition , the Chief Justice has the ceremonial duty of administering the oath of  दफ्तर of the अध्यक्ष of  the United States .
The  पहला मुख्य इंसाफ  was John Jay .
The 17th and  वर्तमान  Chief Justice is John G. Roberts , Jr .
Caribou near Prudhoe  खाड़ी ,  1973
Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a large oil  फ़ील्ड on  Alaska 's North Slope .
It is the largest oil field in both the United  राज्य और in उत्तर अमेरिका  , covering and originally containing approximately of oil .
The amount of recoverable oil in the field is more than double that of the next largest field in the United   States , the East Texas oil field .
The field is operated by BP ; partners are ExxonMobil and  conocophillips  Alaska .
Labor unions are legally recognized as representatives of workers  in अनेक उद्योग  in the United States .
Their activity today centers on collective bargaining over wages , benefits , and working conditions  लिये उनके सदस्यता , और on representing उनके सदस्यों  in disputes with management over violations of contract provisions .
Larger unions also  typically engage in  lobbying activities and electioneering at the state and federal level .
Most unions in America are  लकीर साथ एक of दो larger छतरियाँ संगठन  : the AFL-CIO created in 1955 , and the Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
Both advocate policies  और  legislation on behalf of workers in the United States and Canada , and take an active role in politics .
The  afl-cio is  especially concerned with global trade issues .
In 2010 , the percentage of  मजदूर belonging  to a union in the United States ( or total labor union `` density '' ) was 11.4 % , compared to 18.4 % in Germany , 27.5 % in Canada , and 70 % in Finland .
Union membership in the private sector has fallen under  7 % — स्तर नहीं देखी  since 1932 .
Unions   allege that employer-incited opposition has contributed to this decline in membership .
The most prominent unions are among  पब्लिक सेक्टर  employees such as teachers and police .
Members of unions are disproportionately older ,  पुरूष और  residents of the Northeast , the Midwest , and California .
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in America after controlling for  व्यक्तिगत , जॉब , और  labor market characteristics .
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s , American unions remain a prominent  राजनैतिक फ़ैक्टर ,  both through mobilization of their own memberships and through coalitions with like-minded activist organizations around issues such as immigrant rights , trade policy , health care , and living wage campaigns .
To fight  कथित  employer anti-union programs , unions are currently advocating new `` card check `` federal legislation that would require employers to bargain with a union if more than 50 % of workers signed forms , or `` cards , '' stating they wish to be represented by that union .
The current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 days for a federally  पर्यवेक्षित secret-ballot  employee referendum on the subject .
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that , `` Strong unions have  helped to reduce असमानता , whereas weaker संघ have बना it easier लिये ceos  , sometimes working with market forces that they have helped shape , to increase it . ''
The decline in unionization since WWII in the  संयुक्त राज्य रै  been associated with a pronounced rise in income and wealth inequality .
A  ईसाई  Lacroix fashion boutique
A boutique is a small shopping outlet , especially one that specializes in elite and fashionable items such as clothing and  आभूषण  .
The word is French for `` shop '' , via  लैटिन इससे यूनानी  ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ) , `` storehouse '' .
The term  डाला into रोज  English use in the late 1960s when , for a brief period , London was the centre of the fashion trade .
Carnaby Street and the Kings Road were the focus of much media  ध्यान as घर to  the most fashionable boutiques of the era .
Now the  ईस्ट of लंदन रै महरूम  regenerated and more Boutiques pop up in fashionable areas , such as Tower Bridge Road .
It can also refer to a specialised firm such as a boutique  निवेश बैंको or  boutique law firm .
The  शब्द is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to describe  a property in the independent section of the hotel market ( such as The Rockwell in London ) in order to distinguish themselves from larger chains ( such as Hilton Hotels ) .
In such cases  the establishments  aim to convey the idea that the operation is elite and highly specialised .
In the strictest sense of the word , boutiques would be one-of-a-kind but more generally speaking , some chains can be  referred to as boutiques  if they specialize in particular styles .
Recently , the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to normally-mass-market items that are either niche or produced in intentionally small numbers at very high   prices .
This may be  referred to as  boutique manufacturing .
For example , before  the रिलीज of the वी , a समय पत्रिका आलेख  suggested that Nintendo could become a `` boutique video-game company '' , producing games for niche audiences , rather than trying to compete directly with Microsoft and Sony .
In the traditional luxury- watch industry  scalfaro  International is considered as the precursor in manufacturing and sale of bespoke watches .
The Swiss company uses a highly flexible boutique  निर्माण  site , which allows producing small series or even unique timepieces .
Although some boutiques  specialise  in hand-made items and other truly one-of-a-kind items , others simply produce t-shirts , stickers , and other fashion accessories in artificially small runs and sell them at unusually high prices .
in the जल्दी 1990s सेलिना प्रारंभ निर्माण उसके अपना लकीर of महिलाओं 's कपडे  .
Opening two boutiques labeled as `` Selena Etc . Boutique & Salon '' One located in  कॉर्पस christi  and one located in San Antonio , Texas .
एक थी due to खोलें in monterrey  , Mexico , in 1995 but due to her death it was not opened .
Around 1999 the San Antonio location closed and  the  Corpus Christi location was closed in 2009 .
In late 1990s some European retail traders developed the idea of tailoring a shop towards a lifestyle theme , in the form of `` concept stores '' , which specialised in cross-selling without using separate  विभाग  .
One of the first concept stores was 10 Corso Como in  मिलान , इटली followed  by Colette in Paris and Quartier 206 in Berlin .
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters , D-A-S-H  , और the गैप , ऑस्ट्रेलियाई  chain Billabong and , though less common , Lord & Taylor adapted to the concept store trend after 2000 .
Navy Federal Credit Union ( or Navy Federal ) is a credit union headquartered in Vienna , Virginia , chartered and regulated under the authority of the National  क्रेडिट संघ प्रशासन ( ncua  ) of the U.S. federal government .
Navy Federal  is  the largest natural member ( or retail ) credit union in the world , both in asset size and in membership .
As of September 2012 ,  नेवी संघीय था over $ 50 अरब  USD in assets , and over 4 million members .
Stevland Hardaway Morris ( born May 13 , 1950 as Stevland  hardaway judkins )  , known by his stage name Stevie Wonder , is an American singer , songwriter , and multi-instrumentalist , a child prodigy who developed into one of the most creative musical figures of the late 20th century .
Blind since shortly after birth , Wonder signed with Motown 's Tamla  लेबल at the आयु of ग्यारह  , and continues to perform and record for Motown to this day .
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` Superstition `` , `` Sir Duke `` , `` You Are  the सनशाइन of my जीवन `` और `` i बस पुकारा  to Say I Love You `` .
Well known albums also include Talking Book ,  innervisions और गीतों in the  Key of Life .
He has recorded more than thirty U.S. top ten hits  और प्राप्त twenty-two ग्रैमी  Awards , the most ever awarded to a male solo artist .
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for political causes , including his 1980 campaign to make Martin Luther  किंग , jr. 's जन्मदिवस  a holiday in the United States .
In 2009 , Wonder was named a  संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Messenger of Peace .
In 2008 , Billboard magazine released a list of the Hot 100 All-Time Top Artists to celebrate the US singles chart 's  पचासवें वर्षगांठ , साथ  Wonder at number five .
By popular vote , Stevie was inducted  into the soulmusic  Hall of Fame at SoulMusic.com in December 2012 .
Psychosis ( from the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '' , for mind/soul , and -ωσις `` -osis '' , for abnormal condition or derangement ) refers to an abnormal  कंडीशन of the दिमाग , और is a जेनेरिक मनोरोग  term for a mental state often described as involving a `` loss of contact with reality `` .
People suffering from psychosis are described as  psychotic  .
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder , during which hallucinations and delusions , gross excitement or stupor  and impaired insight  may occur .
The term `` psychosis '' is very broad and can mean anything from relatively normal aberrant experiences through to the  जटिल  and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder .
Moreover a wide variety of central nervous system diseases , from both external substances and internal physiologic illness , can produce  लक्षण of  psychosis .
This led many professionals to say that psychosis is not specific enough as a  निदान पद  .
Despite this , `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in normal behavior (  ऋणात्मक लक्षण ) और अधिक commonly to विविध प्रकार  of hallucinations or delusional beliefs ( e.g . grandiosity , delusions of persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '' ,  whereas एक exhibiting  very subtle signs could be classified in the category of an `` attenuated psychotic risk syndrome '' .
An excess in dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the positive symptoms of psychosis  , विशेषकर  those of schizophrenia .
This is thought to occur through a mechanism of  aberrant salience  of environmental stimuli .
Many  antipsychotic  drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ; meta-analyses of placebo-controlled trials of these drugs , however , show either no significant difference between drug and placebo , or a very small effect size , suggesting that the pathophysiology of psychosis is much more complex than an overactive dopamine system .
People experiencing psychosis may  प्रदर्शनी कुछ  personality changes and thought disorder .
Depending on its severity , this may be  accompanied by असामान्य or विचित्र  behavior , as well as difficulty with social interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities .
सामान्य  Grievous is a fictional character in the Star Wars universe .
A recurring antagonist , he is the Supreme Commander of the Confederacy of Independent Systems  , a राजनैतिक गुट  of planetary systems waging war on the Galactic Republic .
Trained in all seven forms of lightsaber combat by Count  Dooku , he is  a ruthless and powerful warrior devoted to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars .
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi body count would prompt the galaxy to give him the  उपनाम the knightslayer  .
Though the notorious Jedi slayer was the being in the galaxy during the  क्लोन युद्धों जो था मारे the सबसे जेडी  in single combat , he did not hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would lose .
Statistics play an important role in summarizing baseball performance and  evaluating खिलाड़ी in the  sport .
Since  the प्रवाह of a  baseball game has natural breaks to it , and normally players act individually rather than performing in clusters , the sport lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics .
Statistics have been kept for professional baseball since the creation of  the नेशनल लीग  and American League , now part of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also  उपलब्धियाँ इससे बाहर of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल  , from leagues such as the National Association of Professional Base Ball Players and the Negro Leagues .
Dorothea Lange 's  migrant माँ  depicts destitute pea pickers in California , centering on Florence Owens Thompson , age 32 , a mother of seven children , in Nipomo , California , March 1936 .
USA annual  रियल जीडीपी  from 1910–60 , with the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The unemployment rate in the US  1910–1960 , साथ  the years of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression was a severe  विश्वव्यापी  economic depression in the decade preceding World War II .
The timing of the Great Depression varied across nations , but in most countries it started in 1930 and lasted until  the लेट 1930s or मध्य  1940s .
It was the longest , most widespread ,  और deepest अवसाद  of the 20th century .
In  the 21st  century , the Great Depression is commonly used as an example of how far the world 's economy can decline .
The depression originated in the U.S. , after the  पतन in भण्डार कीमतें कि began around सितंबर  4 , 1929 , and became worldwide news with the stock market crash of October 29 , 1929 ( known as Black Tuesday ) .
The Great Depression had devastating effects  in देशों  rich and poor .
Personal income , tax revenue , profits  और  prices dropped , while international trade plunged by more than 50 % .
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25 % , and in some  देशों रोज़ as  high as 33 % .
Cities all around the world were hit  मुश्किल , विशेषकर  those dependent on heavy industry .
निर्माण  was virtually halted in many countries .
Farming and rural areas suffered  as क्रॉप कीमतें  fell by approximately 60 % .
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate  स्त्रोत of कार्य  , areas dependent on primary sector industries such as cash cropping , mining and logging suffered the most .
Some economies started to  रिकवर by the  mid-1930s .
In many countries , the negative effects of the Great Depression lasted until  the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध  II .
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ) , also known as a premature ventricular complex , ventricular premature contraction ( or complex or complexes ) ( VPC ) , ventricular premature beat ( VPB ) , or ventricular extrasystole ( VES ) , is a relatively common event where the heartbeat is initiated by Purkinje fibres in the ventricles  बल्कि than by the sinoatrial नोड , the  normal heartbeat initiator .
The electrical events of the  दिल  detected by the electrocardiogram allow a PVC to be easily distinguished from a normal heart beat .
A PVC may be perceived as a ``  छोड़ा ताल `` or  felt as palpitations in the chest .
In a normal heartbeat , the ventricles contract after the atria have helped to fill them by contracting  ; in  this way the ventricles can pump a maximized amount of blood both to the lungs and to the rest of the body .
In a PVC , the ventricles contract first and before the atria have optimally filled the ventricles with blood , which  अर्थात् कि परिसंचरण  is inefficient .
However , single beat PVC  arrhythmias do नहीं प्रायः  pose a danger and can be asymptomatic in healthy individuals .
William Gary Busey ( born June  29 , 1944 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात as  Gary Busey , is an American film and stage actor , and artist .
He has appeared in a variety of films , including  lethal हथियार , पाइंट ब्रेक , और अंतर्गत घेरा , as  well as guest appearances on Gunsmoke , Walker , Texas Ranger , Law & Order , and Entourage .
He  थी मनोनीत  for an Academy Award for Best Actor in 1978 for his role in The Buddy Holly Story .
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ) , is a multinational treaty for the purpose of establishing international standards for  बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी  rights enforcement .
The agreement aims to establish an international legal  फ्रेमवर्क लिये लक्ष्यीकरण नकली goods ,  generic medicines and copyright infringement on the Internet , and would create a new governing body outside existing forums , such as the World Trade Organization , the World Intellectual Property Organization , or the United Nations .
The agreement was signed in October 2011 by Australia , Canada , Japan  , मोरक्को , नई जीलैंड , सिंगापुर , दक्षिण  Korea , and the United States .
In 2012 , Mexico , the European  संघ और  22 countries which are member states of the European Union signed as well .
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally approved ) the agreement , which would come into force in countries that ratified it after ratification by  छह देशों  .
Supporters have described the  अनुबंध as a जवाब to `` the बढ़ाएँ  in global trade of counterfeit goods and pirated copyright protected works '' .
Trades Unions representing workers in the music , film and TV industries and large intellectual property-based organizations such as the Motion Picture Association of America and  फार्मास्युटिकल शोध और निर्माताओं  of America were active in the treaty 's development .
Opponents say the convention adversely  affects आधारभूत अधिकारों सहित स्वतंत्रता  of expression and privacy .
ACTA has also been criticised  by डॉक्टर  Without Borders for endangering access to medicines in developing countries .
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups , developing countries and the general public from the agreement 's negotiation process and it has been described as policy laundering by critics including the Electronic Frontier Foundation and  the entertainment  Consumers Association .
The signature of the EU and many of its member states resulted in the resignation in protest of the European Parliament 's appointed chief  अन्वेषक , rapporteur कादर आरिफ , as खूब as  widespread protests across Europe .
In 2012 the newly-appointed rapporteur , British MEP David Martin ,  अनुशंसित विरूद्ध the सन्धि , stating : `` the intended लाभ of इस अंतरराष्ट्रीय  agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties '' .
On 4 July 2012 , the European  पार्लियामेंट अस्वीकृत  the agreement in plenary session , with 478 voting against the treaty , 39 in favour and 165 MEPs abstaining .
FAW  semi-trailer ट्रक  in China
Tractor with side dump trailer  semi-trailer
A tractor with an  auto-transport  semi-trailer .
semi-trailer ट्रक  with sleeper behind the cab .
A semi-trailer truck is an  articulated  vehicle that consists of a towing engine , known as a tractor in the United States and truck in many other places , attached to one or more semi-trailers to carry freight .
It is also known as a transport in Canada , prime mover in Australia , semi , tractor-trailer , truck and trailer , transfer truck , 18-wheeler , mack truck , big rig in the United States ,  or artic , छोटी लिये  articulated lorry , in Britain and Ireland .
A semi-trailer does not trail completely behind the towing vehicle , but is attached at a point  कि is बस आगे of the rear-most  axle of the towing unit .
This is done so that a fraction of the weight of the  ट्रेलर  is carried by the prime mover .
This arrangement means that both tractor  और semi-trailer  will have a distinctly different design than a rigid truck and trailer .
The Pittsburgh Steelers are  a पेशेवर  football team based in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania .
the टोली फिलहाल belongs to the उत्तर प्रभाग of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) .
Founded in , the Steelers are the  oldest मताधिकार  in the AFC .
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( six ) , won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and played in (  पंद्रह ) और hosted अधिक ( ग्यारह  ) conference championship games than any other AFC or NFC team .
The Steelers share the record for most Super Bowl  दिखावे  with the Dallas Cowboys ( eight ) .
The Steelers won their  सबसे हाल चैंपियनशिप , सुपर  Bowl XLIII , on February 1 , 2009 .
The Steelers were founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates on July 8 , 1933 , by Art Rooney , taking its original name from the baseball team of the  वही  name , as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time .
The ownership  of the  Steelers has remained within the Rooney family since its founding .
The current owner is Art 's  बेटे , डान रूनी  , who has given much control of the franchise to his son Art Rooney II .
Long one of the NFL 's flagship teams , the Steelers enjoy a large ,  फैली fanbase nicknamed  Steeler Nation .
The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz  फ़ील्ड on पिट्सबर्ग 's उत्तर पक्ष in the उत्तर  Shore neighborhood , which also hosts the University of Pittsburgh Panthers .
Built in 2001 , the stadium replaced Three  नदियाँ  Stadium which hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons .
Prior to Three  नदियाँ , the स्टीलर्स था निभाई  their games in Pitt Stadium and Forbes Field .
Three different kinds  of गेहूं और  rye flour
Flour is a powder which is made by grinding cereal grains , or other  बीज or  roots ( like Cassava ) .
It is  the प्रमुख संघटक of ब्रैड ,  which is a staple food for many cultures , making the availability of adequate supplies of flour a major economic and political issue at various times throughout history .
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in  European , North  American , Middle Eastern , Indian and North African cultures , and is the defining ingredient in most of their styles of breads and pastries .
While wheat is the most common base for flour , corn flour has been important in Mesoamerican cuisine since ancient  टाइम्स , और  remains a staple throughout the Americas .
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread in much of central Europe , and rice can also be used in flour , though this is  अपेक्षाकृत  uncommon .
Heart rate is the  क्रमांक of  heartbeats per unit of time , typically expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ) .
Heart rate  can vary as  the body 's need to absorb oxygen and excrete carbon dioxide changes , such as during physical exercise , sleep , illness , or as a result of ingesting drugs :
Central  बेचैन प्रणाली  stimulants such as amphetamines increase heart rate .
Central nervous system depressants or sedatives decreases the heart   rate ( apart from some particularly strange ones with equally strange effects , such as ketamine which can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ) .
वहीँ  are many ways in which the heart rate speeds up or slows down .
Most involve stimulant-like endorphins and hormones  होने released in the दिमाग , अनेक  of which are those that are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion and processing of drugs .
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume , one of the physiological ways to  उद्धार  more oxygen to an organ is to increase heart rate to permit blood to pass by the organ more often .
Normal resting  दिल  rates range from 60-100 bpm .
मंदनाड़ी  is defined as a resting heart rate below 60 bpm .
However , heart rates from 50 to 60  bpm  are common among healthy people and do not necessarily require special attention .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm , though persistent  बाकी दरों between 80-100 bpm ,  mainly if they are present during sleep , may be signs of hyperthyroidism or anemia ( see below ) .
Catherine II 's  carved , चित्रित और gilded राजतिलक  Coach ( Hermitage Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled  गाडी लिये लोगों ,  usually horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) and sedan chairs are excluded , since they are wheelless vehicles .
The carriage is especially  designed लिये  private passenger use and for comfort or elegance , though some are also used to transport goods .
It may be light , smart and fast or heavy ,  विशाल और  comfortable .
carriages सामान्यतः have  suspension using leaf springs , elliptical springs ( in the 19th century ) or leather strapping .
A public passenger  गाडी होता नहीं  usually be called a carriage – terms for such include stagecoach , charabanc and omnibus .
Working vehicles such as the ( four-wheeled ) wagon and ( two-wheeled ) cart share important parts of the history of the carriage , as is the fast (  two-wheeled  ) chariot .
The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake was an undersea megathrust  भूकंप कि occurred at 00:58:53  UTC on Sunday , 26 December 2004 , with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra , Indonesia .
The quake itself is known by the scientific  जातियाँ as the sumatra–andaman  earthquake .
The resulting tsunami was given various names , including the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami , South Asian tsunami ,  इंडोनेशियाई सुनामी ,  and the Boxing Day tsunami .
The earthquake was caused by  subduction  and triggered a series of devastating tsunamis along the coasts of most landmasses bordering the Indian Ocean , killing over 230,000 people in fourteen countries , and inundating coastal communities with waves up to high .
It was one of the  deadliest  natural disasters in recorded history .
Indonesia was the hardest-hit  देश ,  followed by Sri Lanka , India , and Thailand .
With a  परिमाण of mw 9.1–9.3 , it  is the third largest earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph .
The earthquake had the longest  अवधि of  faulting ever observed , between 8.3 and 10 minutes .
It caused the entire planet to vibrate as much as and triggered other  भूकंप  as far away as Alaska .
Its  epicentre थी between simeulue और मेनलैंड इंडोनेशिया .
the दुर्दशा of the प्रभावित लोगों और देशों prompted a विश्वव्यापी humanitarian जवाब .
In all , the worldwide   community donated more than $ 14 billion ( 2004 US $ ) in humanitarian aid .
Steam  उठती इससे the  Nesjavellir Geothermal Power Station in Iceland .
geothermal उर्जा is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित in the  Earth .
Thermal energy is the energy that determines the  तापमान  of matter .
The  geothermal उर्जा of the  Earth 's crust originates from the original formation of the planet ( 20 % ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in temperature  between the कोर of the ग्रह  and its surface , drives a continuous conduction of thermal energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal originates from the Greek roots γη ( ge ) , meaning earth , and  θερμος ( thermos  ) , meaning hot .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy is created by radioactive decay and  temperatures may पहुँचें over 5000 °c ( 9,000  °F ) .
Heat  conducts इससे the कोर  to surrounding cooler rock .
The high temperature and  दबाव  cause some rock to melt , creating magma convection upward since it is lighter than the solid rock .
The magma heats rock and   water in the crust , sometimes up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for space  हीटिंग चूंकि प्राचीन  Roman times , but it is now better known for electricity generation .
Worldwide , about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of  geothermal शक्ति  is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct geothermal heating capacity is installed for district heating , space heating , spas ,  औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं , desalination और agricultural  applications .
Geothermal power is cost effective ,  विश्वसनीय  , sustainable , and environmentally friendly , but has historically been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent technological advances have dramatically expanded the range and size of viable resources ,  विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग  such as home heating , opening a potential for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases trapped deep within the earth , but these emissions are much lower per energy  ईकाई than those of चट्टान  fuels .
As a result , geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate  वैश्विक वार्मिंग  if widely deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's geothermal resources are theoretically more than adequate to supply humanity   's energy needs , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
Drilling  और खोजी  for deep resources is very expensive .
Forecasts for the future of geothermal power   depend on assumptions about technology , energy prices , subsidies , and interest rates .
Pilot  कार्यक्रम जैसे eweb 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in ग्रीन  Power Program show that customers would be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal .
But as a result of government assisted research and industry experience , the  लागत of generating  geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In 2001 , geothermal energy cost between  दो और  ten cents per kwh .
The term cubic foot is an Imperial and  us  customary ( non- metric ) unit of volume , used in the United States and the United Kingdom .
It is defined as the volume of a cube with sides of one foot ( 0.3048 m ) in  लंबाई  .
To calculate  घन फीट गुणा  length X width X height .
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation : ,  दक्षिणी वियतनामी उच्चारण : ) ; 19 may 1890  – 2 September 1969 ) , born Nguyễn Sinh Cung and also known as Nguyễn Tất Thành and Nguyễn Ái Quốc , was a Vietnamese communist revolutionary leader who was prime minister ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ) .
He was a key figure in the   foundation of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945 , as well as the People’s Army of Vietnam ( PAVN ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War .
He led the Việt Minh independence movement from 1941 onward , establishing the communist -ruled Democratic Republic of Vietnam in 1945 and defeating the French Union in 1954 at the  बैटल of điện biên phủ  .
He officially stepped down from power  in 1955 due to स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं  , but remained a highly visible figurehead and inspiration for those Vietnamese fighting for his cause—a united , communist Vietnam—until his death .
After the war ,  साइगॉन , पूंजी of the  Republic of Vietnam , was renamed Hồ Chí Minh City .
All Roads Lead Home is a feature film released on  सितंबर 26  , 2008 .
निर्देशित by डेनिस fallon  , it stars Peter Boyle , Patton Oswalt , Jason London , Vivien Cardone , Vanessa Branch , Peter Coyote , Stephen Milton , and Allan Kayser .
the  movie was filmed in and around Kansas City , Missouri .
The movie  बना इसके  World Premiere January 27 at the Santa Barbara International Film Festival .
The film has also recently been in several film  त्यौहार , और रै प्राप्त  bad reviews .
Peter Boyle  died पहले  the movie 's release .
It was the last movie he appeared   in .
Sales taxes in the United States are taxes placed on the sale or  पट्टे  of goods and services in the United States .
While no national general sales tax exists , the  संघीय सरकारी levies अनेक नेशनल  selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods and services .
Furthermore , forty-five states , the District of Columbia , and Guam impose general sales taxes that apply to the sale or lease of most goods and some services , and states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale   or lease of particular goods or services .
States may also  प्रतिनिधि to  local governments the authority to impose additional general or selective sales taxes .
Sales tax is calculated by multiplying the purchase price by the applicable  कर  rate .
Tax  दरों vary  widely by jurisdiction and range from less than 1 % to over 10 % .
Sales  कर is एकत्रित  by the seller at the time of sale .
Use tax is self assessed by a buyer who has  नहीं सशुल्क बिक्री कर  on a taxable purchase .
Unlike the  मान added  tax , a sales tax is imposed only once , at the retail level .
However , in cases where items are sold at  खुदरा अधिक than एकबार  , such as used cars , the sales tax can be charged on the same item indefinitely .
The definition of retail  बिक्री और कया goods  and services are taxable vary among the states .
Nearly all jurisdictions provide numerous categories of goods and services that are exempt from sales tax , or taxed  at घटाया दरों  .
The purchase of goods for further manufacture or for resale is uniformly exempt  इससे  sales tax .
Most  jurisdictions  exempt food sold in grocery stores , prescription medications , and many agricultural supplies .
Sales taxes , including those imposed by local governments ,  हैं generally administered at  the state level .
States imposing  बिक्री  tax require retail sellers to collect tax from customers , file returns , and remit the tax to the state .
Procedural rules  vary  widely .
Sellers generally must collect tax from in-state purchasers unless  the क्रेता provides  an exemption certificate .
सबसे राज्य  allow or require electronic remittance .
A central processing unit ( CPU ) , also  referred to as  a central processor unit , is the hardware within a computer that carries out the instructions of a computer program by performing the basic arithmetical , logical , and input/output operations of the system .
The term has been in use in  the कंप्यूटर उद्योग  at least since the early 1960s .
the रूप , डिज़ाइन , और क्रियान्वयन  of CPUs have changed over the course of their history , but their fundamental operation remains much the same .
A computer can have more than one CPU ; this is  पुकारा multiprocessing  .
Some integrated circuits ( ICs ) can contain multiple CPUs on a single chip  ; those ics हैं  called multi-core processors .
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic unit ( ALU ) , which  performs गणित और लॉजिकल परिचालन , और the कंट्रोल  unit ( CU ) , which extracts instructions from memory and decodes and executes them , calling on the ALU when necessary .
Not all computational systems rely on a  सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण  unit .
An array processor or vector processor has multiple  समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व , साथ no  one unit considered the `` center '' .
In the distributed computing model , problems  हैं हल by a  distributed interconnected set of processors .
RFID chip next to  a अनाज of राइस  .
This chip contains a  radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  field coil that modulates an external magnetic field to transfer a coded identification number when queried by a reader device .
This small type is  incorporated in उपभोक्ता  products , and implanted in pets , for identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency electromagnetic fields to transfer data , for the purposes  of  automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
The tags contain electronically  भंडारित सूचना  .
Some tags are powered and  पढ़ा  at short ranges ( a few meters ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else have no battery but collect energy from the  interrogating em फ़ील्ड , और  then act as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery powered tags may operate at hundreds of  मीटर  .
Unlike a bar code , the tag does not necessarily need to be within line of sight  of the रीडर  , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are used in many  उद्योग  .
An RFID tag attached to an automobile during production can be used to track  इसके प्रगति  through the assembly line .
दवाएँ  can be tracked through warehouses .
Livestock and pets may have  टैग injected  , allowing positive identification of the animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing , possessions , or even implanted within people , the possibility  of  reading personally-linked information without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Overtime is the amount of time  किसी works परे  normal working hours .
Normal  घंटों may be संकल्पित  in several ways:
by  कस्टम  ( what is considered healthy or reasonable by society ) ,
by  practices of  a given trade or profession,
by  legislation,
by   agreement between employers and workers or their representatives .
Most nations have overtime labor laws designed to dissuade or prevent employers from forcing their employees  to कार्य excessively  long hours .
These laws may take into account other  considerations than the humanitarian  , such as preserving the health of workers so that they may continue to be productive , or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy .
One common  दृष्टिकोण  to regulating overtime is to require employers to pay workers at a higher hourly rate for overtime work .
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay even if not obliged to do so by law , particularly if they believe that  वे फेस a पिछड़ा  bending supply curve of labour .
Overtime pay rates can cause workers to work longer  घंटों than वे होता  at a flat hourly rate .
Overtime laws , attitudes toward overtime and hours of work vary greatly from country to country and between  अलग आर्थिक  sectors .
Visualization of links between pages on a wiki  using a force-directed  layout .
force-directed आलेख आरेखण algorithms हैं  a class of algorithms for drawing graphs in an aesthetically pleasing way .
Their purpose is to position the nodes of a graph in two-dimensional or three-dimensional space so that all the edges are of more or less equal length and there are as few crossing edges as possible , by assigning forces among the set of edges and the set of nodes , based on their relative  positions  , and then using these forces either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy .
While graph drawing can be a difficult problem , force-directed algorithms , being physical simulations , usually require no special knowledge about  आलेख सिद्धान्त ऐसे as planarity  .
Purchasing power ( sometimes retroactively called adjusted for inflation ) is the  राशि of goods or सेवाएं कि can be खरीदा  with a unit of currency .
For example , if you had taken one dollar to a store in the 1950s , you would  have महरूम समर्थ to ख़रीदे a वृहद क्रमांक of वस्तुएं than तुम  would today , indicating that you would have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s .
Currency can be either a commodity money , like  सुनहरा or चांदी , or fiat करेंसी , or  free-floating market-valued currency like US dollars .
As Adam Smith noted , having money gives one the ability to ``  कमांड '' अन्य ' मजदूर , so खरीदना  power to some extent is power over other people , to the extent that they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency .
If one 's  मौद्रिक  income stays the same , but the price level increases , the purchasing power of that income falls .
Inflation does not always imply falling purchasing power of one 's money income  चूंकि it  may rise faster than the price level .
A higher real  आय अर्थात्  a higher purchasing power since real income refers to the income adjusted for inflation .
For a price index , its value in the base   year is usually normalized to a value of 100 .
The purchasing power of a unit  of करेंसी  , say a dollar , in a given year , expressed in dollars of the base year , is 100/P , where P is the price index in that year .
So , by definition the purchasing power of a dollar  decreases as the दाम  level rises .
The purchasing power in today 's money of  an राशि  C of money , t years into the future , can be computed with the formula for the present value :
where in this  मामला i is an  assumed future annual inflation rate .
Education in South Korea is viewed as being  निर्णायक  for success and competition is consequently very heated and fierce .
A central  प्रशासन oversees  the process for the education of children from kindergarten to the third and final year of high school .
Mathematics , science , Korean , English ,  और सोशल अध्ययन  are generally considered to be the most important subjects .
सामान्यतः शारीरिक शिक्षा is नहीं  considered important as it is not recognised , by the generally academic elitist South Korean populace , as education and therefore many schools lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics .
South  कोरियाई थी the पहला  country in the world to provide high-speed internet access to all primary , junior , and high schools .
Although South Korean students often rank highly on  अंतरराष्ट्रीय तुलनात्मक आकलन जब compared  to students of most Western education systems , the South Korean education system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation .
The South Korean education system is rather notably strict and overly structured as compared to its  counterparts in सबसे पश्चिमी  societies .
Also , the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools ( Hagwon [ 학원 ] ) , which too  emphasise on passive memorisation , as  opposed to conceptual understanding , in students are criticised as a major social problem .
The My Lai Massacre ( , ; , , or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between 347 and 504  निहत्थे नागरिकों in दक्षिण वियतनाम on कूच 16 , 1968 , by संयुक्त राज्य फौज  soldiers of `` Charlie '' Company of 1st Battalion , 20th Infantry Regiment , 11th Brigade of the Americal Division .
Victims included women , men  , children , और infants  .
Some of the women were gang-raped and their bodies were later found to be  mutilated और अनेक महिलाओं यहूद  allegedly raped prior to the killings .
While 26  u.S. सैनिको  were initially charged with criminal offenses for their actions at Mỹ Lai , only Second Lieutenant William Calley , a platoon leader in Charlie Company , was convicted .
Found guilty of killing 22 villagers , he was originally given a  जीवन वाक्य , लकिन तभी  served three and a half years under house arrest .
The massacre  took प्लेस  in the hamlets of My Lai and My Khe of Son My village .
The event is also known as the Son My Massacre ,   especially in the Vietnamese state media .
The U.S.  सैन्य  codeword for the `` Viet Cong stronghold '' was `` Pinkville '' .
The incident prompted  वैश्विक  outrage when it became public knowledge in 1969 .
The massacre also increased domestic opposition to the U.S.  भागीदारी  in the Vietnam War .
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre and  protect the wounded यहूद initially  denounced by several U.S . Congressmen as traitors .
They  प्राप्त नफ़रत मेल  and death threats and found mutilated animals on their doorsteps .
The three were later  widely  praised and decorated by the Army for their heroic actions .
The hijackers  in the सितंबर 11 हमले यहूद  19 men affiliated with al-Qaeda , and 15 of the 19 were citizens of Saudi Arabia .
Others were from Egypt , Lebanon , and  the  UAE .
The hijackers were organized into four teams , each led by a pilot-trained hijacker with four `` muscle hijackers '' who were  प्रशिक्षित to सहायता subdue the पायलटों , यात्री  , and crew .
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States were Khalid al-Mihdhar and Nawaf al-Hazmi , who settled  in the सैन  Diego area in January 2000 .
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots , Mohamed Atta , Marwan al-Shehhi , and Ziad Jarrah early in the summer of 2000 to  undertake उड़ान प्रशिक्षण  in south Florida .
The fourth hijacker-pilot , Hani Hanjour , arrived in San  डिएगो in दिसम्बर  2000 .
The rest of the `` muscle hijackers  '' arrived in the वसन्त और जल्दी  summer of 2001 , just months before the September 11 attacks .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ) , also transliterated as Muhammad ( ) , was a religious , political , and  सैन्य  leader from Mecca who unified Arabia into a single religious polity under Islam .
He is believed by Muslims and  bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर  and prophet of God .
Muhammad is almost universally considered by Muslims as the  पिछला नबी भेजा by परमेश्वर  for mankind .
Non-Muslims regard Muhammad as  the संस्थापक  of Islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered  असली monotheistic  faith of Adam , Noah , Abraham , Moses , Jesus , and other prophets .
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of Mecca , he was orphaned at an early age  और brought up अंतर्गत  the care of his uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked  ज़्यादातर as a व्यापारी  , as well as a shepherd , and was first married by age 25 .
Being in the habit of periodically  retreating to a गुफा in the surrounding  mountains for several nights of seclusion and prayer , he later reported that it was there , at age 40 , that he received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad  प्रारंभ उपदेश  these revelations publicly , proclaiming that `` God is One `` , that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable to God , and that he  खुद थी  a prophet and messenger of God , in the same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few followers  जल्दी on , और थी  met with hostility from some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly .
To escape persecution ,  मुहम्मद भेजा  some of his followers to Abyssinia before he and his followers in Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
इस इवेंट , the हिज्र , marks the शुरूआत of the इस्लामी पंचांग , जिससे is भी ज्ञात as the hijri पंचांग  .
In Medina ,  मुहम्मद  united the tribes under the Constitution of Medina .
After eight years of fighting  साथ the meccan जनजातियों , उसके अनुसरणकर्ता , जो by तब  had grown to 10,000 , took control of Mecca in the largely peaceful Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan idols in the city and then sent his followers out to destroy  सब of the बाकी pagan मंदिरों  in Eastern Arabia .
In 632 , a few months after returning to Medina from The Farewell  यात्राएं  , Muhammad fell ill and died .
By the  समय of उसके मौत , सबसे of the  Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam , and he had united Arabia into a single Muslim religious polity .
The  खुलासे  ( or Ayah , lit .
``  लक्षण [ of परमेश्वर ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद  reported receiving until his death – form the verses of the Quran , regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based .
besides the कुरान , मुहम्मद  's life ( sira ) and traditions ( sunnah ) are also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of Islam with reverence , adding the phrase  सलाम  be upon him whenever their names are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in  मध्यकालीन christendom और premodern टाइम्स  were largely negative , appraisals in modern history have been far less so .
This is a list of tables of the verified oldest people in the  संसार in ordinal रैंक  , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a  supercentenarian is माना 'verified  ' if his or her claim has been validated by an international body that specifically deals in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human lifespan is that of Jeanne Calment of  फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997 ) , जो died at आयु 122 सालो , 164  days .
She met Vincent van Gogh when she  थी 12  or 13 .
This led to news media attention in 1985 , after  calment  turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age  , परे कोई उचित  question , in the records of her native city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her case serves as an archetype in  the methodology लिये verifying the  ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest  undisputed  lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura , who currently lives in Japan and is age as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States , on 17 December 2012 , Kimura , born 19 April 1897 , is the oldest  जीना व्यक्ति in  the world whose age can be documented .
He has also  been  the oldest living man since the death of 114-year old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 ,  the  oldest living woman has been -year-old Misao Okawa , also from Japan , born on 5 March 1898 .
This is a timeline of the  african-american  Civil Rights Movement .
The Civil  अधिकारों  movement was a freedom struggle by African Americans in the 1950s and 1960s to gain equality .
The goals of the movement were freedom from discrimination , equal opportunity in employment , education and housing , the right to vote and equal  अभिगम to पब्लिक सुविधाएं  .
Heavy metal ( often referred to as metal ) is a genre of rock music  कि विकसित in the लेट 1960s  and early 1970s , largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States .
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock , the bands that created heavy metal developed a thick , massive sound , characterized by highly  प्रवर्धित  distortion , extended guitar solos , emphatic beats , and overall loudness .
Heavy metal lyrics and  प्रदर्शन  styles are generally associated with masculinity and machismo .
The first heavy metal bands such as Led Zeppelin , Deep  जामुनी और  Black Sabbath attracted large audiences , though they were often derided by critics , a status common throughout the history of the genre .
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's evolution by discarding much of its blues influence ; Motörhead  introduced a पंक  rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed .
Bands in the New Wave of British Heavy Metal such as Iron Maiden followed in a  समान रग  .
Before the end of the decade , heavy metal fans  became ज्ञात  as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers `` .
During the 1980s ,  glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक  force with groups like Mötley Crüe and Poison .
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme , aggressive  शैलियाँ : thrash मेटल broke into the मुख्यधारा साथ bands ऐसे as मेटालिका  , Megadeth , Slayer , and Anthrax , while other styles of the most extreme subgenres of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena .
Since the mid-1990s , popular styles such as nu metal , which often incorporates  तत्व of grunge और हिप हॉप ; और metalcore  , which blends extreme metal with hardcore punk , have further expanded the definition of the genre .
The far-right ( also known as the extreme right ) refers to the highest degree of  rightism in right-wing  politics .
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete social hierarchy in society , and supports supremacy of certain individuals or groups deemed to be innately superior or preferable who are to be more  valued than those deemed to be innately अवर or अवांछनीय  .
The far right 's advocacy of supremacism is based on  कया इसके adherents  perceive as innate characteristics of people that can not be changed .
This stands as a point of difference with the centre-right 's attribution of behaviours , such as laziness or decadence , as the primary sources of  सोशल inequalities  .
The centre right—unlike  the far right—claims  that people can end their behavioural inferiority through changing their habits and choices .
The original far right , which emerged in France after the French  Revolution ,  refused to accept the French Republic and supported a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy .
The far right is commonly associated with persons or  समूह जो थाम चरम  nationalist , xenophobic , racist , religious fundamentalist or reactionary views .
The most extreme-right movements have pursued  दमन और नरसंहार  against groups of people on the basis of their alleged inferiority .
Thomas Hobbes of Malmesbury ( 5 April 1588 – 4 December 1679 ) , in some older texts Thomas Hobbs of Malmsbury , was an English philosopher , best known today  लिये  his work on political philosophy .
His 1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for most of  पश्चिमी राजनैतिक  philosophy from the perspective of social contract theory .
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign , but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought : the right of the individual ; the natural equality of all men ; the artificial character of the political order ( which led to the later distinction between civil society and the state ) ; the view that all legitimate political power must be ``  प्रतिनिधि '' और आधारित on the सहमति of the लोगों ; और  a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid .
He was one of  the संस्थापकों  of modern political philosophy .
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion , obeying the same physical laws as other matter and motion , remains influential ; and his account of human nature as self-interested  सहयोग , और of राजनैतिक समुदायों  as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy .
In  जोड to राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र  , Hobbes also contributed to a diverse array of other fields , including history , geometry , the physics of gases , theology , ethics , and general philosophy .
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability to identify , assess , and control the emotions of  oneself , of अन्य , और of समूह  .
It can be divided into  क्षमता  EI and trait EI .
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger relationships  साथ परंपरागत प्रज्ञा , whereas  trait EI is usually measured using self-report questionnaires and has stronger relationships with personality .
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real intelligence and   whether it has incremental validity over IQ and the Big Five personality traits .
Heredity is the passing of traits to  औलाद इससे  its parents or ancestor .
This is the process   by which an offspring cell or organism acquires or becomes predisposed to the characteristics of its parent cell or organism .
Through heredity   , variations exhibited by individuals can accumulate and cause some species to evolve .
The study of heredity in  जीवविज्ञान is पुकारा  genetics , which includes the field of epigenetics .
For United States individual income tax , adjusted gross income ( AGI ) is total gross income  ऋण विशिष्ट  reductions .
Taxable income is  समायोजित सकल आय ऋण भत्तों  for personal exemptions and itemized deductions .
For most individual  कर  purposes , AGI is more relevant than gross income .
Gross income is sales price of goods or property , minus cost of the  प्रॉपर्टी बेची  , plus other income .
It includes wages , interest , dividends , business income , rental income , and all  अन्य  types of income .
Adjusted gross income is gross income less deductions from a business or rental  कार्यकलाप और 21 अन्य विशिष्ट  items .
Several deductions ( e.g . medical expenses and miscellaneous itemized  deductions ) हैं सीमित  based on a percentage of AGI .
Certain phase outs , including those of lower tax rates  और  itemized deductions , are based on levels of AGI .
Many states  आधार राज्य  income tax on AGI with certain deductions .
`` Lazy Eye '' is the third single from  silversun pickups  ' debut album Carnavas .
The band performed the song on the Late Show with David Letterman ,  the  Tonight Show with Jay Leno , Later With Jools Holland , and Last Call with Carson Daly .
The song is a playable track on Rock  बैंड 2 और  Guitar Hero : World Tour .

इस संस्करण थी प्रदर्शित  on their demo CD ( which featured early versions of four tracks ) .
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone number ; in the North American Numbering Plan countries (  देश कोड 1 ) , it is the पहला  three digits of a seven-digit phone number .
In other countries both the prefix and the number  may have अलग  lengths .
It shows which exchange  the बाकी  numbers refer to .
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code ( required for international calls only ) , area code ( required  लिये काल्स between टेलीफोन क्षेत्रों  ) , prefix , and subscriber number .
कुछ स्थान सीमित निश्चित  prefixes to fax numbers or cell phones only ; in other places such dedicated prefixes are not used .
As telephone technology advanced , the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in London , UK , was once the GULliver exchange , but now 44207485xxxx is  बस माना एक of अनेक क्रमांक  blocks served by the CLKEN Kentish Town exchange ; 4420770703xx is another .
Metformin  (  BP , pronounced , ; originally sold as Glucophage ) is an oral antidiabetic drug in the biguanide class .
It is the first-line drug of choice for the treatment of type 2  मधुमेह  , in particular , in overweight and obese people and those with normal kidney function .
Its use in gestational  मधुमेह रै  been limited by safety concerns .
it is भी प्रयुक्त in the उपचार  of polycystic ovary syndrome , and has been investigated for other diseases where insulin resistance may be an important factor .
Metformin works by suppressing glucose production by the  जिगर  .
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug that has  महरूम conclusively दिखाया  to prevent the cardiovascular complications of diabetes .
It helps reduce LDL cholesterol and triglyceride levels , and is not associated with  वज़न  gain .
, metformin is one of only two oral antidiabetics in the  संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन  Model List of Essential Medicines ( the other being glibenclamide ) .
When prescribed appropriately , metformin causes few adverse  प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is जठरांत्र  upset ) and is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can  be a गंभीर चिंता in overdose  and when it is prescribed to people with contraindications , but otherwise , there is no significant risk .
First synthesized and found to  reduce रक्त शुगर in the 1920s , metformin  was forgotten for the next two decades as research shifted to insulin and other antidiabetic drugs .
ब्याज in metformin  was rekindled in the late 1940s after several reports that it could reduce blood sugar levels in people , and in 1957 , French physician Jean Sterne published the first clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for diabetes .
It was introduced to the United Kingdom in 1958 , Canada  in 1972 , और the संयुक्त  States in 1995 .
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely  विहित antidiabetic ड्रग in  the world ; in the United States alone , more than 48 million prescriptions were filled in 2010 for its generic formulations .
The Mount Rushmore National Memorial is a sculpture carved into the granite face of Mount Rushmore near Keystone , South Dakota , in the United  राज्य  .
sculpted by danish-american gutzon borglum और उसके बेटे , lincoln borglum  , Mount Rushmore features sculptures of the heads of four United States presidents : George Washington , Thomas Jefferson , Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln .
The entire memorial covers and is  ऊपर समुद्र  level .
The tallest  पहाड़ in the प्रदेश  is Harney Peak ( ) .
South Dakota historian Doane Robinson is  credited साथ conceiving  the idea of carving the likenesses of famous people into the Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region .
Robinson 's initial idea was to sculpt the Needles ; however , Gutzon Borglum rejected the Needles site  क्युकी of the ग़रीब विशेषता  of the granite and strong opposition from environmentalists and Native American groups .
They settled on the Mount Rushmore location , which also has the advantage of facing southeast for  अधिकतम  sun exposure .
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and Clark , Red Cloud and Buffalo Bill Cody  लकिन borglum decided  the sculpture should have a more national focus , and chose the four presidents whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain .
After securing federal funding , construction on the memorial began in 1927 , and the  राष्ट्रपतियों ' चेहरों  were completed between 1934 and 1939 .
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's  मौत  in March 1941 , his son Lincoln Borglum took over construction .
Although the initial concept called for each president to be  चित्रित इससे सिर  to waist , lack of funding forced construction to end in late October 1941 .
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the memorial in 1933 , while it was still under construction , and has managed  the मेमोरियल  to the present day .
it attracts  nearly three million people annually .
Charvet dress shirt from the 1930s , Norsk Folkemuseum ,  ओस्लो .
A shirt , dress shirt , button-front , button-front shirt , or button-up shirt is a garment with a collar , a full-length opening at the front from the collar to  the हेम , और टाँक  with cuffs .
Shirts are predominantly used by men  , चूंकि महिलाओं  usually wear blouses .
The front opening is fastened using buttons or studs , and the cuffs  बंद साथ  buttons or cuff links .
शर्ट हैं सामान्यतः बना इससे woven cloth  , and are often accompanied by a jacket and tie , for example with a suit or formalwear , but shirts are also worn more casually .
In British English , dress shirt means specifically the more formal evening garment worn with black- or white- tie , also  discussed नीचे  .
Some of these formal shirts have stiff fronts and detachable collars attached  साथ कॉलर  studs .
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers  a type of shirt which  has a collar fastened down by buttons ) is sometimes used in error to apply to all shirts ( with or without buttoned down collars ) , being used as a synonym for `` button-up '' or `` button-front '' .
प्रशासनिक पेशेवर दिन ( भी ज्ञात  as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of secretaries , administrative assistants , receptionists , and other administrative support professionals .
In North America , it is  मनाये on the  Wednesday of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ) .
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in  अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 18  in 2013 ) .
In Australia  it is मनाये  on the first Friday in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 ) was the leading painter of the  शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच  Baroque style , although he spent most of his working life in Rome .
His work is characterized by clarity ,  लॉजिक ,  and order , and favors line over color .
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for such classically oriented artists as  jacques-louis दाउद , jean-auguste-dominique ingres और  Paul Cézanne .
He worked in Rome for a circle of leading collectors there and elsewhere , except for a short period  जब कार्डिनल  Richelieu ordered him back to France to serve as First Painter to the King .
Most of his works are history paintings of religious or mythological subjects that very often have a  विशाल लैंडस्केप  element .

Statute of Grand Duchy of Lithuania  , लिखा  in Polish
A statute is a formal written enactment of a legislative authority that  governs a राज्य  , city , or county .
Typically , statutes command  or prohibit कुछ  , or declare policy .
The word is often used to distinguish law  बना by विधान  bodies from case law , decided by courts , and regulations issued by government agencies .
Statutes are sometimes referred to as legislation  or `` ब्लैक अक्षर विधि  . ''
As a source of law ,  statutes हैं माना प्राथमिक प्राधिकार  ( as opposed to secondary authority ) .
Ideally all statutes must be in harmony   with the fundamental law of the land ( constitutional ) .
This  शब्द  is used in contradistinction to the common law .
statutes  acquire their force from the time of their passage , however unless otherwise provided .
Statutes are of  अनेक kinds  ; namely , Public or private .
declaratory  or remedial .
अस्थाई  or perpetual .
A temporary  statute is एक जिससे  is limited in its duration at the time of its enactment .
It  continues in फ़ोर्स जबतक  the time of its limitation has expired , unless sooner repealed .
A perpetual statute is one for  the फिराकर of जिससे वहीँ is  no limited time , although it may not be expressly declared to be so .
if , however , a statute जिससे  did not itself contain any limitation is to be governed by another which is temporary only , the former will also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter .
Before a statute becomes law in some countries , it must be agreed upon by the highest executive in the  सरकारी , और आखिरकार प्रकाशित  as part of a code .
In many countries , statutes are organized in topical arrangements ( or `` codified '' ) within publications called codes , such as the United States  कोड  .
In many nations statutory law is distinguished from and subordinate to  संवैधानिक  law .
The external iliac arteries are two  प्रमुख धमनियों जिससे bifurcate बंद the आम  iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis .
They proceed anterior and inferior along the  medial  border of the psoas major muscles .
They exit the pelvic girdle posterior and inferior to the inguinal ligament about one third laterally from the insertion point of the inguinal ligament on the pubic tubercle at  which point they are referred to as the femoral  arteries .
The  बाह्य iliac धमनी is  usually the artery used to attach the renal artery to the recipient of a kidney transplant .
Steam is a digital  वितरण  , digital rights management , multiplayer and communications platform developed by Valve Corporation .
It is used to distribute games and related media online , from small independent developers to larger  तन्त्र घरों ;  in October 2012 , Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software .
Steam provides the user with installation and automatic management of software across multiple computers , community features such as friends  सूचियाँ और समूह , बादल  saving , and in-game voice and chat functionality .
The software  provides a freely उपलब्धियाँ अनुप्रयोग प्रोग्रामिंग इंटरफ़ेस , steamworks , कि डेवलपर can लो लाभ of to integrate अनेक of भाप 's कृत्यों भीतर उनके तन्त्र उत्पाद , सहित नक़ल सुरक्षा , नेटवर्किंग और matchmaking , in-game उपलब्धियाँ और micro-transactions , और support लिये user-created सामग्री through भाप कार्यशाला .
Though initially developed for use on Microsoft Windows , the client has expanded to include OS X and Linux versions , and clients with  सीमित कार्यक्षमता on the प्लेस्टेशन  3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices .
In addition to being a central hub for gaming software ,  वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण  of Steam with altered functionality to be used in schools for educational software , including a modified version of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons .
, there are nearly 2000 games available through Steam , and 54 million active user  खाते  .
As of January 2013 , Steam has seen over 6.6 million  संयुक्त  players .
भाप रै an अनुमानित  50–70 % share of the digital distribution market for video games .
The Steam logo is a stylised left-side  fly-crank और लाठी इससे the  Walschaerts valve gear of a steam locomotive .
Jerry  लुईस ( born कूच 16 , 1926  ) is an American comedian , actor , singer , film producer , screenwriter and film director .
He  is ज्ञात  for his slapstick humor in film , television , stage and radio .
He was originally paired up with Dean Martin in 1946 , forming the famed  कॉमेडी टोली of मार्टिन और लुईस  .
In addition to the duo 's popular nightclub work , they starred in a  कामयाब  series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures .
Lewis is also known for his charity fund-raising telethons and position as national chairman  लिये the muscular dystrophy  Association ( MDA ) .
Lewis has won several awards for lifetime achievements from The American Comedy Awards , Los Angeles Film Critics Association , and  वेनिस फिल्मी पर्व , और he रै दो सितारों on the  Hollywood Walk of Fame .
In 2005 , he received the Governors Award of the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences Board of Governors , which is  the उच्चतम एमी पुरस्कार प्रस्तुत  .
On February 22 , 2009 ,  the अकादमी of गति चित्र  Arts and Sciences awarded Lewis the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award .
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss  कैण्टन of grisons  in the southeastern Swiss Alps through Germany and eventually flows into the North Sea coast in the Netherlands and is the twelfth longest river in Europe , at about , with an average discharge of more than .
The Rhine and the Danube formed most of the northern inland frontier of the Roman Empire and , since those days , the Rhine has been a vital and  navigable जलमार्ग carrying  trade and goods deep inland .
It has also served as a defensive feature and has been the basis for regional and international  सीमायें  .
The many castles and prehistoric fortifications along the Rhine testify to its  महत्व  as a waterway .
River traffic  could be रोका  at these locations , usually for the purpose of collecting tolls , by the state that controlled that portion of the river .
Sri (  सिंहली  )
Sri ( Devanagari : श्री , IAST ; Śrī ) , also transliterated as Sree or Shri or Shree is a word of Sanskrit origin , used in the Indian subcontinent as polite form of address equivalent to the English `` Mr. '' in written and spoken language , or as a title of veneration  लिये deities ( प्रायः  translated as `` Holy '' ) .
Design of complex structures like the International Space  स्टेशन  needs in-depth understanding of Structural Analysis .
Civil  अभियान्त्रिकी is a पेशेवर अभियान्त्रिकी  discipline that deals with the design , construction , and maintenance of the physical and naturally built environment , including works like roads , bridges , canals , dams , and buildings .
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline after military engineering , and  it थी पारिभाषित to फर्क  non-military engineering from military engineering .
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering , geotechnical engineering , geophysics , geodesy , control engineering , structural  अभियान्त्रिकी , biomechanics , nanotechnology , परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी  , earth science , atmospheric sciences , forensic engineering , municipal or urban engineering , water resources engineering , materials engineering , coastal engineering , surveying , and construction engineering .
Civil engineering takes place on all levels :  in  the public sector from municipal through to national governments , and in the private sector from individual homeowners through to international companies .
