Katherine Dunham (  जून 22 , 1909 – may 21 , 2006  ) was an American dancer , choreographer , author , educator , and social activist .
dunham था एक of the सबसे कामयाब  dance careers in American and European theater of the 20th century , and directed her own dance company for many years .
She has been called  the `` matriarch  and queen mother of black dance '' .
During her heyday in the 1940s and 1950s ,  dunham थी प्रसिद्ध throughout यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका  and was widely popular in the United States , where the Washington Post called her `` dancer Katherine the Great '' .
For almost thirty years she maintained the  कैथरीन dunham नृत्य कम्पनी , the तभी self-supported अमरीकी  black dance troupe at that time , and over her long career she choreographed more than ninety individual dances .
Dunham was an innovator in African-American modern dance as well as a leader in the field of dance anthropology , or  ethnochoreology  .
Sphagnum  is a genus of between 1510 और 3500  species of mosses , commonly called peat moss due to its prevalence in wet habitats where it contributes to the formation of peat bogs and mires .
Sphagnum  accumulations can स्टोर जल , चूंकि दोनो जीना और  dead plants can hold large quantities of water inside their cells ; plants may hold from 16-26 times as much water as their dry weight depending on the species .
the खाली  cells help retain water in drier conditions .
Hence , as sphagnum moss grows , it can slowly spread into drier conditions ,  forming larger peatlands  , both raised bogs and blanket bogs .
These peat accumulations then provide habitat for a  चौड़ी सरणी of peatland पौधे , सहित sedges और  ericaceous shrubs , as well as orchids and carnivorous plants .
Sphagnum and the peat formed from  it do नहीं क्षय readily क्युकी  of the phenolic compounds embedded in the moss 's cell walls .
In addition , bogs , like all wetlands , develop anaerobic soil conditions , which produces slower anaerobic decay rather than aerobic  सूक्ष्मजैविक  action .
Peat moss can also acidify its surroundings by taking  up cations , ऐसे as कैल्सियम  and magnesium , and releasing hydrogen ions .
Under the right  शर्तें  , peat can accumulate to a depth of many meters .
Different species of Sphagnum have different tolerance limits for flooding and pH ,  so कोई एक peatland may have a  number of different Sphagnum species .
Individual peat moss plants consist of a main stem , with tightly arranged clusters  of शाखा fascicles प्रायः  consisting of two or three spreading branches and two to four hanging branches .
The top  of the संयंत्र  , or capitulum , has compact clusters of young branches .
Along the stem are scattered leaves of various shapes , named stem  पत्ते ; the आकार varies according  to species .
The leaves consist of two kinds of cells ; small ,  ग्रीन , जीना कोशिकाएं  ( chlorophyllose cells ) , and large , clear , structural , dead cells ( hyaline cells ) .
The latter have the large  water-holding  capacity .
The earliest version of  the संजाल  Card , issued manually rather than through an APTIS machine .
The   first APTIS version of the Network Card .
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in 1986/1987 until well into the 1990s , as stocks had to be used up despite the  परिचय of the new-look orange-banded  version in 1991 .
the परिचय of the weekday न्यूनतम  fare condition in 2002 resulted in a minor change : the red `` R '' shows that this is the `` Revised '' version of the railcard .
This version is  स्टिल  in use as of 2007 .
The Network Railcard is a discount card introduced in 1986 by  अंग्रेजों  Rail , upon the creation of their Network SouthEast area around London , England .
The card is intended to  प्रोत्साहित अवकाश सफर by रेल by  offering discounts for adults and accompanying children on a wide range of off-peak fares .
The range of discounts available , and the price of the card , have varied since that time , but the card has always been valid for a year   's unlimited use .
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station   or Rail Appointed Travel Agent , by completing an application form - no photographic identification or other documentation is needed to buy or use the card .
It is one of a number of concessionary  किराया योजनाएं उपलब्धियाँ  on the British railway system .
The United Nations ( UN ;  French  : Organisation des Nations Unies , ONU ) is the world 's largest , foremost , and most prominent international organization .
The stated aims of the United Nations  include promoting  and facilitating cooperation in international law , international security , economic development , social progress , human rights , civil rights , civil liberties , political freedoms , democracy , and the achievement of lasting world peace .
The UN was  संस्थापित in 1945 बाद संसार  War II to replace the League of Nations , to stop wars between countries , and to provide a platform for dialogue .
It contains multiple subsidiary  संगठन to carry  out its missions .
At its founding , the UN had 51 member states ; as  of  2011 , there are 193 .
From its offices  around the संसार , the un  and its specialized agencies decide on substantive and administrative issues in regular meetings held throughout the year .
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in promoting international economic and social cooperation and development ) ; the Secretariat ( for providing studies , information , and facilities needed by the UN )  ;  the International Court of Justice ( the primary judicial organ ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ) .
Other prominent UN System agencies include  the संसार स्वास्थ्य  Organization ( WHO ) , the World Food Programme ( WFP ) and United Nations Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ) .
The UN 's most prominent position is that of the  दफ्तर  of Secretary-General which has been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea since 2007 .
The United Nations Headquarters resides  in  international territory in New York City , with further main offices at Geneva , Nairobi , and Vienna .
The organization is financed from assessed and voluntary contributions from its member states , and has six official languages : Arabic ,  चाइनीज  , English , French , Russian , and Spanish .
South Beach , also nicknamed SoBe , is a neighborhood in the city of Miami Beach , Florida , United States , located due east of Miami  नगर उचित between biscayne खाड़ी और the  Atlantic Ocean .
The area  encompasses सब of the अवरोध  islands of Miami Beach south of Indian Creek .
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed , starting in the 1910s , thanks to the development efforts of Carl G. Fisher , the Lummus Brothers , and John S. Collins , the latter whose construction of the Collins Bridge provided the first vital land link between  मेनलैंड मियामी  and the beaches .
The area has gone through numerous artificial and natural changes over the years , including a booming regional economy , increased  पर्यटन , और the 1926 hurricane ,  which destroyed much of the area .
As of 2010 , about 39,186 residents live in South  बीच  .
The  संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्षीय  election of 1960 was the 44th quadrennial presidential election , held on Tuesday , November 8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party  मनोनीत लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड  Nixon , while the Democratic Party nominated John F. Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President , Republican Dwight D. Eisenhower , was not eligible for  re-election बाद सेवारत the  maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes , or  0.17  % of the popular vote , giving him a victory of 303 to 219 in the Electoral College , the closest since 1916 .
This was the first election in which all fifty of the current  संयुक्त राज्य participated  .
a  number of factors explain why the election was so close .
कैनेडी gained चूंकि वहीँ  was an economic recession which hurt the incumbent Republican , and he had the advantage of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans .
Furthermore ,  the नई मत  that Kennedy gained among Catholics almost neutralized the new votes Nixon gained among Protestants .
Kennedy 's campaigning skills  decisively  outmatched Nixon 's .
In the end , Nixon 's  जोर  on his experience carried little weight , and he wasted energy by campaigning in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded campaign   organization to win the nomination , secure endorsements , and , with the aid of the last of the big-city bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He relied on running mate Lyndon B.  जॉनसन to थाम  the South and used television effectively .
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S . Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president , a phenomenon  कि रै महरूम दोहराया एकबार  , by Barack Obama and Joe Biden in 2008 ( in both cases , the president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
A poster for a c. 1884 American production of Macbeth ,  अभिनीत थामस  W. Keene .
Depicted , counter clockwise from top-left , are : Macbeth and Banquo meet the  witches ; बस बाद  the murder of Duncan ; Banquo 's ghost ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth .
Macbeth is a play  लिखा by  William Shakespeare .
It is considered one of his darkest  और सबसे शक्तिशाली  tragedies .
Set in Scotland , the play dramatizes the corroding psychological and  राजनैतिक प्रभाव उत्पादित जब  its protagonist , the Scottish lord Macbeth , chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power .
He  commits regicide  to become king and then furthers his moral descent with a reign of murderous terror to stay in power , eventually plunging the country into civil war .
In  the समाप्त , he loses सबकुछ  that gives meaning and purpose to his life before losing his life itself .
The play is believed to have been written between 1603 and 1607 , and is most commonly  दिनाँक 1606  .
The earliest account of a performance of what was   probably Shakespeare 's play is April 1611 , when Simon Forman recorded seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre .
it थी पहला प्रकाशित  in the Folio of 1623 , possibly from a prompt book .
It was most likely written during the reign of James I , who had been  जेम्स vi of स्कॉटलैंड पहले he  succeeded to the English throne in 1603 .
James was a patron  of shakespeare’s एक्टिंग कम्पनी , और of सब the  plays Shakespeare wrote during James’s reign , Macbeth most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship with the sovereign .
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy , and tells the story of a brave Scottish general named Macbeth  जो receives  a prophecy from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland .
Consumed by ambition and spurred to action by his wife ,  मैकबेथ हत्याएं  King Duncan and takes the throne for himself .
His reign is racked with guilt and paranoia , and he soon  becomes a  tyrannical ruler as he is forced to commit more and more murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion .
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth and Lady Macbeth  into realms of  arrogance , madness , and death .
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of Scotland , Macduff , and Duncan in Holinshed 's Chronicles ( 1587 ) , a history of England , Scotland and Ireland  परिचित to शेक्सपियर और उसके contemporaries , हालांकि  the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth .
In the backstage world of theatre , some believe that the play is cursed ,  और होगा नहीं जिक्र इसके शीर्षक  aloud , referring to it instead as `` the Scottish play `` .
Over the course of many centuries , the play has attracted some of the most renowned  अभिनेताओं to the भूमिकाएँ of मैकबेथ  and Lady Macbeth .
It  रै महरूम  adapted to film , television , opera , novels , comic books , and other media .
The Milton Hershey School is a private philanthropic ( pre-K  through 12 ) बोर्डिंग स्कूल in hershey  , Pennsylvania .
originally नामित the hershey औद्योगिक स्कूल , the संस्था थी संस्थापित और वित्तपोषित by चॉकलेट उद्योगपति मिल्टन snavely hershey और उसके बीवी , कैथरीन स्वीनी  Hershey .
The school was  originally  established for impoverished , healthy , Caucasian , male orphans , while today it serves students of various backgrounds .
The Milton Hershey School Trust , which funds the  स्कूल , owns controlling ब्याज in the hershey कम्पनी और owns the  Hershey Entertainment and Resorts Company ( HERCO ) which oversees many of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark .
With over  छह अरब डॉलर in एसेट , the  Milton Hershey School is one of the wealthiest schools in the world .
The school is overseen by a  फलक of प्रबंधक  .
The school currently serves 1,818 students ,  और योजनाएँ  to grow to 2,100 students by 2013 .
A member of CORE : Coalition for Residential Education , it is the largest residential education  कार्यक्रम in the us  .

Electronic article , articles in scholarly journals or magazines that can be accessed via  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक हस्तांतरण
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into  विधि  by the Congress of the United States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy  अंतर्गत जिससे the  manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution of certain substances is regulated .
The Act also served  as the नेशनल implementing विधान  for the Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ) , with  varying योग्यता  for a substance to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed by Congress  निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग , और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through  legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000 , which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
Second-language acquisition or second-language  सीखना is the प्रक्रम by जिससे  people learn a second language .
Second-language acquisition ( often abbreviated to SLA ) also refers to the scientific discipline devoted to  अध्ययन  that process .
दूसरी भाषा refers to कोई भाषा सीखे in  addition to a person 's first language ; although the concept is named second-language acquisition , it can also incorporate the learning of third , fourth , or subsequent languages .
second-language अधिग्रहण  refers to what learners do ; it does not refer to practices in language teaching .
The academic discipline of second-language acquisition is a subdiscipline of applied  भाषाविज्ञान  .
It is broad-based and  अपेक्षाकृत  new .
As well as the various branches of linguistics , second-language acquisition is also closely  सम्बन्धित to मनोविज्ञान , संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान  , and education .
To separate  the अकादमिक अनुशासन इससे the सीखना प्रक्रम  itself , the terms second-language acquisition research , second-language studies , and second-language acquisition studies are also used .
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary field , and because of this it is difficult  to पहचानो a precise starting  date .
However , it does appear to have developed a great deal since  the mid-1960s  .
The term acquisition was originally used to emphasize the subconscious nature of the learning  प्रक्रम , लकिन in हाल  years learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous .
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage language learning , but it does not usually  चरितार्थ  bilingualism .
Most SLA researchers see  bilingualism as होने the समाप्त परिणाम of सीखना a भाषा , नहीं the प्रक्रम  itself , and see the term as referring to native-like fluency .
Writers in fields such as education  और मनोविज्ञान  , however , often use bilingualism loosely to refer to all forms of multilingualism .
Second-language acquisition is also not to be  contrasted साथ the अधिग्रहण of a विदेशी  language ; rather , the learning of second languages and the learning of foreign languages involve the same fundamental processes in different situations..
There has been much debate about exactly how language is  सीखे , और  many issues are still unresolved .
वहीँ हैं  many theories of second-language acquisition , but none are accepted as a complete explanation by all SLA researchers .
Due to the interdisciplinary nature of the  फ़ील्ड of second-language  acquisition , this is not expected to happen in the foreseeable future .
फोर्ब्स सूची of अरबपतियों is an सालाना  ranking of the world 's wealthiest people , compiled and published by Forbes , an American national business magazine .
The total net worth  of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत on the  list is estimated , in United States dollars , based on their assets and accounting for debt .
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a single day , due to daily fluctuations among exchange rates and stock  valuations  .
The United States Secret Service is a U.S. federal law enforcement agency that is part of the United States Department   of Homeland Security .
The sworn members are divided among the Special Agents and the Uniformed  प्रभाग  .
जबतक  March 1 , 2003 , the Service was part of the United States Department of the Treasury .
the  U.S. Secret Service has two distinct areas of responsibility:
Financial Crimes , covering missions such as prevention and investigation of  counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी और u.S. राजकोष  securities , and investigation of major fraud .
Protection , which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders and their families , such as the President , past presidents , vice presidents , presidential candidates , visiting heads of state , and foreign embassies ( per an agreement with the U.S. State Department 's Bureau of Diplomatic Security ( DS ) Office  of विदेशी मिशन ( ofm  ) , etc . )
The Secret Service 's initial responsibility was to investigate counterfeiting of U.S. currency , which was  अनियंत्रित following the  U.S. Civil War .
The agency then evolved into  the  United States ' first domestic intelligence and counterintelligence agency .
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) , Bureau of Alcohol , Tobacco , Firearms and  विस्फोटक ( atf ) , आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन ( बर्फ ) , और आतंरिक आय सेवा  ( IRS ) .
`` Me and Bobby McGee  '' is a सोंग लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson  and Fred Foster , originally performed by Roger Miller .
Others performed the song later , including Kristofferson himself , and Janis Joplin who  topped the  U.S. singles chart with the song in 1971 after her death , making the song the second posthumous number-one single in U.S. chart history after `` ( Sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding .
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his  आद्याक्षर , fdr , थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1933–1945 ) and a central figure in world events during the mid-20th century , leading the United States during a time of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic Party and the only American president elected to  अधिक than दो शर्तें , he निर्मित a नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी  politics after 1932 , as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy  दिनों हैं यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान थीम  , FDR defeated incumbent Republican Herbert Hoover in November 1932 , at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over   polio , FDR 's unfailing optimism and activism contributed to a renewal of the national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet  सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन  in leading the Allies against Germany and Japan in World War II , and restoring prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major  विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted  the New Deal —a variety of programs designed to produce relief ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937 , लकिन तब relapsed into a गहन मंदी .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937 prevented his  पैकिंग the परम् अदालत  or passing any considerable legislation ; it abolished many of the relief programs when unemployment diminished during World War II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85 , except for the regulation of Wall Street by  the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग  , which still exists .
Along with several smaller programs , major surviving programs include the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation  ,  which was created in 1933 , and Social Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of China and  the आक्रामकता of नाजी  Germany , FDR gave strong diplomatic and financial support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His goal was to make America the `` Arsenal of Democracy ``  जिससे  would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with Congressional approval , provided Lend-Lease aid to the countries  लड़  against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after the  जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7 ,  1941 , calling it a `` date which will live in infamy `` .
He supervised the mobilization of the U.S.  अर्थव्यवस्था  to support the Allied war effort .
As an active military leader , Roosevelt  implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts कि ended  in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered the internment of 100,000 Japanese American  नागरिकों  .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % , relief  कार्यक्रम largely ended , और the औद्योगिक  economy grew rapidly to new heights as millions of people moved to new jobs in war centers , and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt dominated the American political scene not only during the twelve  सालो of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी  , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of voters  कि  created the Fifth Party System .
FDR 's New  सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त  labor unions , big city machines , white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He also influenced  the बाद सृष्टि  of the United Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is consistently rated by scholars  as  one of the top three U.S. Presidents , along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A liberal  डेमोक्रेट , रूज़वेल्ट  defined his ideological position as `` a little left of center . ''
Mara  salvatrucha ( commonly  abbreviated as MS , Mara , and MS-13 ) is a transnational criminal gang that originated in Los Angeles and has spread to other parts of the United States , Canada , Mexico , and Central America .
The majority of the gang is ethnically composed of  सेंट्रल अमेरिकी और क्रियाशील  in urban and suburban areas .
In the U.S. , the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern California ; the Washington ,  d.C. महानगर क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स  County , Virginia , Montgomery County , Maryland , and Prince George 's County , Maryland ; Long Island , New York ; the Boston , Massachusetts area ; Charlotte , North Carolina ; and Houston , Texas .
There is also a presence of  ms-13 in  Toronto , Ontario , Canada .
Members of MS  फर्क  themselves by tattoos covering the body and also often the face , as well as the use of their own sign language .
They are notorious for their use of violence and a subcultural  moral  code that predominantly consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions .
This cruelty of the  विशिष्ट सदस्यों  of the `` Maras '' or `` Mareros '' earned them a path to be recruited by the Sinaloa Cartel battling against Los Zetas in an ongoing drug war south of the United States border .
Their  wide-ranging  activities have drawn the attention of the FBI and Immigration and Customs Enforcement , who have initiated wide-scale raids against known and suspected gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the country .
Bones is an American  अपराधों comedy-drama  television series that premiered on the Fox network in the United States on September 13 , 2005 .
The show is based on  forensic मानवशास्त्र  and forensic archaeology , with each episode focusing on an FBI case file concerning the mystery behind human remains brought by FBI Special Agent Seeley Booth ( David Boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance `` Bones '' Brennan ( Emily Deschanel ) .
The rest of the main cast includes Michaela Conlin , T.  J. thyne , eric  Millegan , Tamara Taylor , Jonathan Adams , and John Francis Daley .
Created by Hart Hanson , the  श्रेणी  is very loosely based on the life and writings of novelist and forensic anthropologist Kathy Reichs , who also produces the show .
Its title character , Temperance Brennan , is named  बाद the समर्थक of  Reichs ' crime novel series .
Conversely , Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels based around a fictional ( in the Bones universe ) forensic anthropologist named  कैथी reichs  .
Bones is a joint production by Josephson  entertainment , दूर फ़ील्ड  Productions and 20th Century Fox Television .
The series has completed airing its eighth season and  रै  been renewed for a ninth season .
Super Bowl XXV was an American football game between the American Football Conference ( AFC ) champion Buffalo Bills and the National Football Conference ( NFC ) champion New York Giants to decide the National   Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 1990 season .
The Giants defeated  the  Bills by the score of 20–19 , winning their second ever Super Bowl .
It is the only Super Bowl  decided  by one point .
The game was held at Tampa Stadium in Tampa , Florida , on January 27 ,  1991 , दौरान  the height of the Gulf War .
It was thus played under  much  patriotic fervor .
The proceedings included a rousing rendition of `` The  star-spangled ध्वज  `` by Whitney Houston during the pregame ceremonies .
The Bills and their explosive no-huddle offense were making their first Super Bowl appearance after finishing the regular season with a 13-3 record ,  और अग्रणी  the league in total points scored with 428 .
In advancing to their second Super Bowl , the Giants also posted a 13-3 regular season record , but with a ball-control offense and a defense that allowed a league  कम 211 अंक  .
the  game is best remembered for Bills placekicker Scott Norwood 's last-second field goal attempt which went wide right of the uprights , leading to a Giants victory , and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills .
The  दिग्गज नियत  a Super Bowl record holding possession of the ball for 40 minutes and 33 seconds .
New York also overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit , and made a 75-yard touchdown drive  कि खपत a सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड 9:29 बंद the क्लॉक  .
Giants  कार्यशील वापस ottis एंडरसन , जो  carried the ball 21 times for 102 yards and one touchdown , was named Super Bowl MVP .
He was the first awardee to receive the newly named `` Pete Rozelle  ट्रॉफी  '' ( named for the former commissioner ) .
Anderson  भी अंकित  one reception for seven yards .
मैल्कम  X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born Malcolm Little and also known as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz ( ) , was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist .
To his  admirers , he थी a  courageous advocate for the rights of blacks , a man who indicted white America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans .
Detractors accused  उसे of  preaching racism , black supremacy , and violence .
He has been called one of the greatest and most influential African  अमेरिकी in इतिहास  .
Malcolm X 's father died—killed by white supremacists , it was rumored—when he was young , and at least one of his uncles  थी lynched  .
When he was 13 , his mother was placed in a mental hospital ,  और he थी लगाई in a श्रेणी of फोस्टर घरों  .
In 1946 ,  at आयु 20 ,  he went to prison for breaking and entering .
In prison , Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after his parole in 1952 , he quickly rose to become  एक of इसके नेताओ  .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment with Nation of Islam head Elijah Muhammad led him to  छोड़ the स्वदेश in कूच 1964  .
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East , he  लौटे to the  United States , where he founded Muslim Mosque , Inc. and the Organization of Afro-American Unity .
In February 1965 , less than a year after leaving the Nation of Islam , he was  assassinated by तीन सदस्यों of  the group .
Malcolm X 's  expressed मान्यताओं  changed substantially over time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white Americans —in contrast to the civil rights movement  's  emphasis on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association with it , `` I did many  बाते as a [  Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now .
I was a zombie then ... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni Muslim , he disavowed racism and expressed willingness to work with civil rights leaders , he continued  to emphasize  Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .

The CW officially renewed the  दिखाएँ लिये  a third season on February 16 , 2010 .
With the  खुलासा of the संजाल पतन 2010 अनुसूची , वे  announced their decision to move 90210 to Monday nights at 8:00 pm , as a lead-in to Gossip Girl .
It premiered on  सितंबर 13  , 2010 and was met with generally positive reviews from critics .
The season picks up at the end of  गर्मियाँ और focuses on the विद्यार्थी  senior year of high school .
It follows Adrianna 's rise to fame , a new relationship between Silver and Navid and a confused Teddy who decides to reveal to his  परिवार और मित्रों he  is gay .

Regular cast members for the season included Shenae  ग्रिम्स  , Tristan Wilds , AnnaLynne McCord , Ryan Eggold , Jessica Stroup , Michael Steger , Jessica Lowndes , Matt Lanter , Gillian Zinser , Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin .

Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the constitutional monarch of 16 sovereign states , known as the  राष्ट्रमंडल realms , और उनके territories और  dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of England and , in some of her realms , carries the title of Defender of the Faith  as भाग of उसके पूरा शीर्षक  .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven independent Commonwealth countries : the United Kingdom , Canada ,  ऑस्ट्रेलिया , नई  Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956   to 1992 , the number of her realms varied as territories gained independence and some realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon  आइलैंड्स , तुवालू , संत लूसिया , संत  Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her reign of years is currently the second longest for a British monarch ;  तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया रै reigned  longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth was born in London and  शिक्षित  privately at home .
Her father  acceded  to the throne as George VI in 1936 on the abdication of his brother Edward VIII , from which time she was the heir presumptive .
She began to undertake public duties during the Second World War , in  जिससे  she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
in 1947 , वो शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप , ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग , साथ जिसको वो रै चार children : चार्ल्स , ऐनी , एंड्रयू , और एडवर्ड  .
Her coronation service took place  in 1953 और  was the first to be televised .
The Queen 's many historic visits and meetings include a  राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड और  reciprocal visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen has seen major constitutional  परिवर्तन in उसके realms , ऐसे as devolution in  the United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution .
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children , the births of her grandchildren , the investiture of the Prince of Wales , and the celebration of milestones such as her Silver  , सुनहरी , और डायमंड jubilees  in 1977 , 2002 , and 2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the Troubles in Northern Ireland , the Falklands War , wars with Iraq and the  युद्ध  in Afghanistan .
There have been times of  निजी विषाद लिये  her which include the death of her father at 56 , the assassination of Prince Philip 's uncle , Lord Mountbatten , the breakdown of her children 's marriages in 1992 ( a year deemed her annus horribilis ) , the death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced   severe press criticism of the royal family and republican sentiments , but support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high .
The 2010 United States  सीनेट चुनाव in फ्लोरिडा took प्लेस on नवम्बर 2 , 2010 साथ साथ अन्य चुनावों  to the United States Senate in other states as well as all elections to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections .
Republican  मार्को rubio , पूर्व स्पीकर of the  Florida House of Representatives , defeated independent Charlie Crist and Democrat Kendrick Meek in a three-way race .
One term Senator  mel मार्टिनेज  was elected in a very close race against Democrat Betty Castor in 2004 with 49 % of the vote .
Martinez announced on December 2 , 2008 that he would not  तलाश  re-election to the Senate , and would resign prior to the end of his term .
In August 2009 ,  राज्यपाल चार्ली crist घोषित  that he would appoint his former Chief of Staff , George LeMieux , a Republican , to the Senate seat being vacated by Martinez .
Governor  crist सरेआम  announced he was running for the seat in mid-2009 .
At  the समय he प्राप्त अनेक रिपब्लिकन  endorsements , such as the National Republican Senatorial Committee , Martinez , and the 2008 Republican presidential nominee John McCain .
His  support of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment  Act of 2009 hurt his popularity among conservatives , and candidate Marco Rubio surged .
In April 2010 Crist announced he would  बूँद आउट of the रिपब्लिकन प्राथमिक  and run as an independent .
The National Republican Senatorial Committee withdrew its endorsement of Crist and  मांगे  a refund of its campaign funds that it provided for the Crist campaign .
Congressman Kendrick Meek was the first Democrat to  घोषित  his intention to run .
Alexander Snitker was the first member of the  libertarian  Party on the ballot for senator in Florida 's history .

Doha ( , ' or ' , literally : `` the big tree '' ) is the capital city  of the  state of Qatar .
Located on the coast of the Persian  गल्फ ,
it had a population of 998,651 in 2008 , and is also one of  the municipalities  of Qatar .
Doha is Qatar 's largest city , with over 60 % of the nation 's  जनसांख्यिकी residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding  suburbs , and is also the economic centre of the country .
Doha also serves as the seat of government of Qatar , which is  शासित by शेख़ हमद बिन  Khalifa Al Thani .
Doha is home to the Education City , an area  devoted  to research and education .
Doha was the site of  the पहला ministerial-level  meeting of the Doha Development Round of World Trade Organization negotiations .
The city of Doha held the  2006 एशियाई खेल  , which was the largest Asian Games ever held .
Doha also hosted the 2011 Pan Arab Games and most of the  खेल  at the 2011 AFC Asian Cup .
Doha  hosted the unfccc जलवायु  Negotiations ( COP 18 ) December 2012 and will host a large number of the venues for the 2022 FIFA World Cup .
The World  पेट्रोलियम परिषद आयोजित the  20th World Petroleum Conference in Doha in December 2011 .
Paranasal sinuses are a group of four paired air-filled spaces that surround the nasal cavity ( maxillary sinuses ) , above the eyes ( frontal  साइनस ) , between the आँखें ( ethmoid साइनस ) , और पीछे  the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ) .
The sinuses are named for the facial  हड्डियों  in which they are located .
Lean manufacturing , lean enterprise , or lean production , often simply , `` Lean , '' is a  उत्पादन अभ्यास कि  considers the expenditure of resources for any goal other than the creation of value for the end customer to be wasteful , and thus a target for elimination .
Working from the perspective of the customer   who consumes a product or service , `` value '' is defined as any action or process that a customer would be willing to pay for .
Essentially ,  झुकना is केन्द्रित on  preserving value with less work .
Lean manufacturing is a management philosophy derived mostly from the Toyota Production System ( TPS ) ( hence the term  toyotism is भी प्रचलित ) और  identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s .
TPS  is प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके फ़ोकस on कटौती  of the original Toyota seven wastes to improve overall customer value , but there are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved .
The steady  विकास of टोयोटा , इससे a छोटी कम्पनी  to the world 's largest automaker , has focused attention on how it has achieved this success .
iCarly  लोगो
iCarly is an American  sitcom  that airs on Nickelodeon , which premiered on September 8 , 2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted many episodes so far such as `` iDo '' , `` iHire an Idiot '' , `` iPity the Nevel '' , `` iDate Sam & Freddie '' , etc . as  specials , despite उनके  being regular episodes .
Every episode title begins with a lower case i  जिससे represents the अंतरजाल  , as in `` iCarly '' .
The show was nominated for an Emmy award for  बकाया  Children 's Program in 2009 .
The series starring  मिरांडा cosgrove as कार्ली शे  , a 13-year-old who becomes an Internet star .
The series ended on November 23 , 2012 with the one-hour  खास  episode `` iGoodbye '' .
A total of 7  सीज़न और 109 एपीसोड  were broadcast .
The largest audience of the series was 11.2 million viewers , with the special episode ``  isaved  Your Life '' premiered in January 2010 .
When Carly ( Miranda  Cosgrove ) and her  sassy best friend Sam ( Jennette McCurdy ) act funny at a school talent show audition , tech-savvy Freddie ( Nathan Kress ) tapes it and posts it online without telling them .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and banter , the online audience clamors for more and the iCarly  वेबकास्ट is  born .
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence , Carly , Sam , and Freddie find out that they have also become online celebrities as their show – which features talent  प्रतियोगिताओं , व्यंजनों , problem-solving  , and random dancing – garners international accolades .
Carly lives in Seattle , Washington with her 26-year-old brother and guardian Spencer ( Jerry Trainor ) and produces the show in a makeshift  third-floor स्टुडियो मचान in  their apartment .
Their mother has never been seen or mentioned , but their  पिता , स्टीवन शे ( दाउद chisum ) , is  a U.S. Air Force officer temporarily stationed on a submarine , and is often mentioned but is only seen in person during the series finale episode , `` iGoodbye '' .
Westlife were an Irish boy band which formed in 1998 and   disbanded in 2012 .
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and managed by Louis Walsh  , the समूह  's final line-up consisted of Nicky Byrne , Kian Egan , Mark Feehily and Shane Filan .
Brian  mcfadden थी a  member from 1998 until his departure in 2004 .
Westlife sold over 50 million records worldwide , a total that  शामिल स्टुडियो एल्बम  , singles , video releases , and compilation albums .
The group accumulated 14 number-one singles in the United Kingdom ( the  third-highest  in UK history ) , tying with Cliff Richard and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley .
They achieved a total of 26 top ten singles  over उनके 14-year  career .
By 2010 ,  westlife थी सूचीबद्ध  in the Guinness World Records , as the UK 's top-selling album group of the 21st century .
They also won The Record of the  साल ( the तभी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार आधारित on पब्लिक मत in the uk )  a record-breaking four times and in 2012 , the Official Charts Company listed Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history .
Despite their European and Asian success , Westlife never managed to break into the U.S. market , achieving only one hit single  in 2000 : `` कसम it again  `` .
In  अक्तूबर 2011  , Westlife announced their intention to split in 2012 , following their Greatest Hits Tour and the release of their Greatest Hits album .
The  boyband  's final concerts were held on 22 and 23 June 2012 at Croke Park Stadium in Dublin .
The first farewell concert , offering 85,000 tickets , sold out in a record-breaking 5 minutes and the latter screened live  in cinemas विश्वव्यापी  .
Vitamin A is a group of nutritionally unsaturated hydrocarbons , which include retinol , retinal , retinoic acid and several  provitamin a carotenoids among जिससे beta-carotene is the सबसे  important .
Vitamin A has multiple functions , it is important for growth and development , for the maintenance of  the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली और  good vision .
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of  the नजर in  the form of retinal , which combines with protein opsin to form rhodopsin the light-absorbing molecule , that is necessary for both low-light ( scotopic vision ) and color vision .
Vitamin A also functions in a very different role as an  irreversibly oxidized रूप of रेटिनॉल ज्ञात as  retinoic acid , which is an important hormone-like growth factor for epithelial and other cells .
In foods of animal origin , the major form of vitamin A is an ester ,  primarily retinyl  palmitate , which is converted to retinol ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine .
The retinol form functions as  a भंडार रूप of the विटामिन , और can  be converted to and from its visually active aldehyde form , retinal .
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ) , a metabolite that can be irreversibly synthesized from vitamin A , has only partial vitamin A  कार्यकलाप , और करता नहीं फलन in the retina  for the visual cycle .
Retinoic acid is used for growth and cellular  differentiation  .
All forms of vitamin  a have a beta-ionone  ring to which an isoprenoid chain is attached , called a retinyl group .
Both  संरचनात्मक  features are essential for vitamin activity .
The orange pigment of carrots –  beta-carotene – can  be represented as two connected retinyl groups , which are used in the body to contribute to vitamin A levels .
alpha-carotene  and gamma-carotene also have a single retinyl group , which give them some vitamin activity .
None of the other  carotenes  have vitamin activity .
The carotenoid beta-  cryptoxanthin possesses  an ionone group and has vitamin activity in humans .
Vitamin A can be found in two  प्रिंसिपल  forms in foods :
Retinol , the form of vitamin A absorbed when eating animal food sources , is a  पीला , fat-soluble  substance .
Since the pure alcohol form is unstable , the vitamin is found in tissues  in a रूप of  retinyl ester .
It is also commercially produced and administered as esters such as retinyl  एसीटेट or palmitate  .
The carotenes alpha-carotene , beta-carotene , gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings ) , but no other  carotenoids , फलन as provitamin a in herbivores और सर्वाहारी पशु , जिससे possess the एंजाइम  ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) which cleaves beta-carotene in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol .
In general , carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids , and pure carnivores such as cats and ferrets lack 15-15'-dioxygenase  और can  not convert any carotenoids to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for these species ) .
Selena Marie Gomez ( born July 22 , 1992 ) is an American  सिंगर और अभिनेत्री  .
She made her debut as a  चाइल्ड अभिनेत्री in  Barney & Friends .
In 2007 , Gomez came to prominence as a  अभिनीत  cast member in the television series Wizards of Waverly Place .
She signed to Hollywood Records the  following साल , और became  the founder and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene .
Their studio albums Kiss & Tell ( 2009 ) , A Year Without Rain ( 2010 ) , and When the Sun Goes Down ( 2011 ) were certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America ( RIAA ) and have spawned Platinum-certified singles ``  naturally `` , `` जो says `` , और `` प्रेम तुम  like a Love Song `` .
After the release of  टेलीविज़न  films and their accompanying soundtracks , Gomez made her theatrical film debut in Ramona and Beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011 .
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place and the hiatus of Selena Gomez & the Scene in 2012 , she focused on her film career , serving as a voice  अभिनेत्री  in Hotel Transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year .
Her debut solo album is tentatively scheduled to be released in summer 2013 , and is preceded by its lead  सिंगल `` आइये & मिलेंगी it `` .
Outside of her work in the entertainment industry , Gomez is involved in philanthropic activities through   charity work and various social and environmental causes .
Tracie Monique Spencer ( born July 12 , 1976 ) is an American  r & b और पॉप singer-songwriter  , actress , and model .
Sacramento is the capital city of the U.S. state of California and the  सीट of सरकारी  of Sacramento County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in the  उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  's expansive Central Valley .
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891 , it is the sixth-largest  नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the  35th largest city in the United States .
Sacramento is the core   cultural and economic center of the Sacramento metropolitan area which includes seven counties with an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area , San Francisco Bay Area , and the San Diego metropolitan area , as well as the  25th largest  in the United States .
Sacramento was cited  by समय पत्रिका as अमेरिका  's most ethnically and racially integrated city in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss immigrant John Sutter , Sr. , his son John Sutter , Jr. , and James W.  मार्शल  .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection of Sutter 's Fort  , जिससे  was established by Sutter in 1839 .
During the California Gold  फटाफट , sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट , a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच , और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल , stagecoaches , riverboats , the टेलीग्राफ , the टट्टू एक्स्प्रेस , और the पहला transcontinental रेलरोड .
California State University , Sacramento  , अधिक  commonly known as Sacramento State or Sac State , is the largest local university .
It is one of the twenty-three campuses of the California  राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों  system .
Drexel University  sacramento is स्तिथ in  Downtown , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific 's McGeorge  स्कूल of  Law is located in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the University of California , Davis is  स्तिथ  in nearby Davis , west of the capital .
The UC  डेविस चिकित्सा बीच , a world-renowned  research hospital , is located in the city of Sacramento .
Memorial Day is a United  राज्य संघीय  holiday which occurs every year on the final Monday of May .
Memorial Day is a day of  remembering the मेन और महिलाओं जो died जबकि  serving in the United States Armed Forces .
Formerly known as Decoration Day , it originated after the American Civil War to commemorate the  संघ और confederate सैनिको  who died in the Civil War .
By the 20th century Memorial Day had been extended to honor all Americans who have   died in all wars .
It  typically marks the  start of the summer vacation season , while Labor Day marks its end .
Many people visit  कब्रिस्तान और memorials , विशेषकर  to honor those who have died in military service .
Many volunteers place an American flag on  प्रत्येक संगीन in नेशनल  cemeteries .
By the early 20th century ,  मेमोरियल दिन थी an अवसर लिये अधिक सामान्य expressions of  memory , as people visited the graves of their deceased relatives in church cemeteries , whether they had served in the military or not .
It  भी became a long  weekend increasingly devoted to shopping , family gatherings , fireworks , trips to the beach , and national media events .
Annual Decoration Days for particular cemeteries are held on a Sunday in late spring or early summer in some rural areas of the American South , notably  in the kyu  .
In cases involving a family graveyard where remote ancestors as well as those who were deceased more recently are buried , this may take on the character of an  विस्तारित परिवार पुनर्मिलन to जिससे कुछ लोगों सफर सैंकड़ों  of miles .
People gather on the designated day and put flowers on graves and renew contacts with kinfolk and   others .
There often is a religious service and a `` dinner on the ground , '' the traditional term for a potluck meal in which people used to spread the dishes  आउट on चादरें or चौके on the ग्रास  .
It is believed that this practice began before the American Civil War and thus may reflect the real origin of  the `` मेमोरियल  day '' idea .
मेमोरियल दिन is नहीं to be उलझन साथ दिग्गजों  Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men and women who died while serving , while Veterans Day celebrates the service of all U.S. military veterans , living or dead .
Mt . Zion Church state history marker near  फिलाडेल्फिया  , Mississippi .
Freedom Summer ( also known as the Mississippi Summer Project ) was a campaign in the United States launched in June 1964 to attempt to register as many African American   voters as possible in Mississippi , which had historically excluded most blacks from voting .
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools , Freedom Houses , and community  centers in छोटी कस्बों throughout  Mississippi to aid the local black population .
The project was organized by the Council of Federated Organizations (  cofo ) , a गठबन्धन of the मिसिसिपी शाखाओं  of the four major civil rights organizations ( SNCC , CORE , NAACP and SCLC ) .
Most of the impetus ,  नेतृत्व , और financing  for the Summer Project came from the SNCC .
Robert Parris Moses , SNCC field secretary and co-director of COFO ,  निर्देशित the गर्मियाँ  project .
Blues is the name given to both a musical form and a music genre that originated in communities of primarily the `` Deep South `` of the United States around the  end of the 19th century  from spirituals , work songs , field hollers , shouts and chants , and rhymed simple narrative ballads .
The blues form , ubiquitous in jazz , rhythm and blues , and rock and roll is characterized by specific chord progressions , of  जिससे the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ कॉर्ड progression  is the most common .
The blue notes that , for expressive purposes are sung or played flattened or gradually bent ( minor 3rd to major 3rd ) in relation to the pitch of the major  स्केल , हैं भी an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the ध्वनि  .
The blues genre is based on the blues form but possesses other characteristics   such as specific lyrics , bass lines , and instruments .
Blues can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from country to urban blues that were more or less popular during  अलग अवधि  of the 20th century .
Best known are the Delta , Piedmont ,  जम्प , और  Chicago blues styles .
World War II marked the transition from acoustic to electric blues and the progressive opening  of ब्लूज़ म्यूज़िक to  a wider audience , especially white listeners .
In the 1960s and 1970s , a hybrid form  पुकारा  blues-rock evolved .
The term `` the blues '' refers to  the `` ब्लू शैतानों '' , अर्थ  melancholy and sadness ; an early use of the term in this sense is found in George Colman 's one-act farce Blue Devils ( 1798 ) .
Though the use of the phrase in African-American music may be older , it has been attested to since 1912  , जब हार्ट wand 's `` डलास ब्लूज़ `` became the पहला  copyrighted blues composition .
In lyrics the phrase is often used to describe a  उदास मनोदशा  .
A quarter dollar , commonly shortened to quarter , is a coin worth 1⁄4 of a  संयुक्त राज्य डालर  or 25 cents .
The  क्वार्टर रै महरूम  produced since 1796 .
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination , as opposed to 20¢ which  is अधिक आम in अन्य भाग of the संसार , originated  with the practice of dividing Spanish Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ) .
At one time `` two  बिट्स  `` , i.e . two wedges , each wedge an eighth , thus a quarter of the Spanish real , was a common nickname for a quarter .
Day of the Dead ( ) is a Mexican holiday celebrated throughout Mexico and around the world in other   cultures .
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family and  मित्रों  to pray for and remember friends and family members who have died .
It is particularly  मनाये  in Mexico , where it is a national holiday , and all banks are closed .
The celebration takes place on November 1 and 2 , in connection with the  कैथोलिक  holidays of All Saints ' Day and All Souls ' Day .
Traditions connected with the holiday include building private altars honoring the deceased using sugar skulls , marigolds , and the favorite foods and beverages of the  रजि और visiting क़ब्रों साथ ये as उपहार  .
They also leave possessions  of  the deceased .
विद्वानों ट्रेस  the origins of the modern Mexican holiday to indigenous observances dating back hundreds of years and to an Aztec festival dedicated to the goddess Mictecacihuatl .
The holiday has spread throughout the world : In Brazil , Dia de Finados is a public  अवकाश कि अनेक brazilians celebrate  by visiting cemeteries and churches .
In Spain , there are festivals and parades , and , at the end of the  दिन , लोगों एकत्रित  at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones .
Similar observances occur elsewhere in Europe , and similarly   themed celebrations appear in many Asian and African cultures .
ANITA  mk  VIII .
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark VIII calculators were launched simultaneously in late 1961 as the world 's first all-  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डेस्कटॉप  calculators .
Designed and built  by the  Bell Punch Co .
in Britain , and marketed through its Sumlock Comptometer division , they used  वैक्यूम tubes  and cold-cathode switching tubes in their logic circuits and nixie tubes for their numerical displays .
वे यहूद the पहला of a श्रेणी of डेस्कटॉप और hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators कि the कम्पनी थी to develop और बेचें अंतर्गत the अनीता नाम into the mid-1970s  .
George Washington ( – , 1799 ) was the first President of the United States ( 1789–1797 ) ,  the commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज दौरान the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी  War , and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States .
He presided over the convention that drafted the Constitution , which  replaced the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और स्थापित  the position of President .
Washington was elected President as the unanimous choice of the 69 electors in 1788 , and he  परोसा दो  terms in office .
He oversaw the creation of a strong ,  well-financed नेशनल  government that maintained neutrality in the wars raging in Europe , suppressed rebellion , and won acceptance among Americans of all types .
His leadership style  स्थापित अनेक फ़ॉर्म और  rituals of government that have been used since , such as using a cabinet system and delivering an inaugural address .
further , the शांतिपूर्ण परिवर्तन इससे  his presidency to the presidency of John Adams established a tradition that continues into the 21st century .
Washington was hailed as `` father  of उसके  country `` even during his lifetime .
Washington was born into the provincial gentry of Colonial Virginia ; his   wealthy planter family owned tobacco plantations and slaves .
After both his father and older brother died when he was young , Washington became personally and professionally attached to the powerful William Fairfax ,  जो प्रचारित उसके करियर  as a surveyor and soldier .
Washington quickly became a senior officer in the  औपनिवेशिक शक्तियां दौरान  the first stages of the French and Indian War .
Chosen by the Second Continental Congress in 1775 to be commander-in-chief   of the Continental Army in the American Revolution , Washington managed to force the British out of Boston in 1776 , but was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City .
After crossing the Delaware River in the dead of winter , he  पराजित the अंग्रेजों in दो लड़ाइयों  , retook New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause .
Because of his strategy ,  क्रांतिकारी  forces captured two major British armies at Saratoga in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781 .
Historians laud Washington for his  चयन  and supervision of his generals , encouragement of morale and ability to hold together the army , coordination with the state governors and state militia units , relations with Congress and attention to supplies , logistics , and training .
In battle , however , Washington was repeatedly outmaneuvered  by अंग्रेजों सेनापतियों  with larger armies .
बाद विजय था महरूम finalized in 1783 , वॉशिंगटन resigned as commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize शक्ति , proving उसके विपक्ष to तानाशाही और उसके प्रतिबद्धता to अमरीकी republicanism .
Dissatisfied with the weaknesses of the  आलेख of कनफेडरेशन , in 1787  Washington presided over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States Constitution .
Elected  unanimously  as the first President of the United States in 1789 , he attempted to bring rival factions together to unify the nation .
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's programs to pay off all state and national debt , to  implement an प्रभावी  tax system and to create a national bank ( despite opposition from Thomas Jefferson ) .
Washington proclaimed the United States  न्यूट्रल in the  wars raging in Europe after 1793 .
He avoided war with Great Britain and guaranteed a decade of peace and profitable trade by securing the Jay Treaty in 1795 , despite  तीव्र विपक्ष  from the Jeffersonians .
Although never officially  joining  the Federalist Party , he supported its programs .
Washington  's विदाई पता  was an influential primer on republican virtue and a warning against partisanship , sectionalism , and involvement in foreign wars .
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and returned to his home , Mount Vernon , and his  घरेलू जीवन जहाँ he प्रबंधित  a variety of enterprises .
he freed सब  his slaves by his final will .
Washington   had a vision of a great and powerful nation that would be built on republican lines using federal power .
He sought to use the national government to preserve liberty , improve infrastructure , open the western lands , promote commerce , found a permanent  पूंजी , reduce क्षेत्रीय तनाव  and promote a spirit of American nationalism .
At his death , Washington was eulogized as `` first in war , first  in सलाम , और पहला  in the hearts of his countrymen '' by Henry Lee .
The Federalists made him the symbol of their party but for many years , the  jeffersonians जारी to अविश्वास  his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument .
As the leader of the first successful revolution against a colonial empire in world  history ,  Washington became an international icon for liberation and nationalism , especially in France and Latin America .
Fiscal Year 2012 U.S.  संघीय बिता – नकदी  or Budget Basis .
फिस्कल  Year 2012 U.S. Federal Receipts .
The Budget of the United States Government often begins as the President 's proposal to  the u.S. कॉंग्रेस जिससे अनुशंसा  funding levels for the next fiscal year , beginning October 1 .
However , Congress is the body required by law to pass a budget annually and to submit the budget  passed by दोनो घरों to the अध्यक्ष लिये  signature .
Congressional decisions are governed by rules  और विधान regarding  the federal budget process .
Budget committees  set spending  limits for the House and Senate committees and for Appropriations subcommittees , which then approve individual appropriations bills to allocate funding to various federal programs .
If Congress fails to pass an annual budget ( as has been the case since 2009 ) , a series of Appropriations bills must be passed as `` stop  gap ''  measures .
After Congress approves an appropriations bill , it is sent to the President , who may sign it into law , or may  वीटो it ( as he होता a बजट  when passed by the Congress ) .
A vetoed bill is sent back to Congress , which  can pass it into विधि साथ  a two-thirds majority in each chamber .
Congress may also  combine सब or  some appropriations bills into an omnibus reconciliation bill .
In addition , the president may request and the Congress may pass  supplemental appropriations बिल्स  or emergency supplemental appropriations bills .
Several government agencies provide budget  आंकड़ा  and analysis .
These include the Government Accountability Office ( GAO ) , Congressional Budget Office , the Office of Management and Budget ( OMB )  और the u.S. राजकोष विभाग  .
These agencies have reported that the federal government is facing a  श्रेणी of महत्वपूर्ण financing चुनौतियां  .
In the short-run , tax  revenues  have declined significantly due to a severe recession and tax policy choices , while expenditures have expanded for wars , unemployment insurance and other safety net spending .
In the long-run , expenditures related to healthcare programs such as Medicare and Medicaid are projected to grow faster than the  अर्थव्यवस्था overall as the  population matures .
New Guinea ( also , Tok Pisin : Niugini , Dutch : Nieuw Guinea , and ; historically : Papua ) is the world 's second  largest द्वीप ,  after Greenland , covering a land area of 786,000 km2 .
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean , it lies geographically to the east of the Malay Archipelago , with which it is  sometimes शामिल as भाग of a वृहद  Indo-Australian Archipelago .
Geologically it is a part of the same tectonic plate  as ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
When world sea  स्तर यहूद कम , the दो साझा  shorelines ( which now lie 100 to 140 metres below sea level ) , combining with lands now inundated into the tectonic continent of Sahul , also known as Greater Australia .
The two landmasses became separated when the area now known as the Torres Strait flooded after the end  of the पिछला glacial काल  .
Anthropologically , New Guinea is  माना भाग  of Melanesia .
नीतियां , the पश्चिमी  half of the island comprises two Indonesian provinces : Papua and West Papua .
The eastern half forms the mainland of  the देश  of Papua New Guinea .
The island has a population of about 7.5 million ,  साथ a बहुत कम  population density of only 8 inh/km2 .
New Guinea is differentiated from its drier , flatter , and less fertile southern counterpart , Australia , by its much higher rainfall and its active volcanic  geology  , with its highest point , Puncak Jaya , reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ) .
Yet the two land masses share a similar  एनिमल fauna , साथ marsupials , सहित wallabies  and possums , and the egg-laying monotreme , the spiny anteater , or echidna .
Other than bats and some two dozen indigenous rodent genera , there are no pre-human indigenous  placental  mammals .
Pigs , several additional species  of चूहे  , and the ancestor of the New Guinea Singing Dog were introduced with human colonization .
The human presence on   the island dates back at least 40,000 years to the oldest human migrations out of Africa .
Research indicates that the highlands were an early and independent center of agriculture , with evidence  of सिंचाई  going back at least 10,000 years .
Because of the time depth of its inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape , an unusually high number of languages are spoken on the island , with some 1,000 languages ( a  फिगर उच्चतर than कि of सबसे महाद्वीपों ) having महरूम catalogued  out of an estimated world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects .
Most are classified as Papuan languages , a generally accepted geographical term which a minority of authors hold to  be a जेनेटिक एक  .
A number of Austronesian  भाषाएं हैं  spoken on the coast and on offshore islands .
In the 16th century Spanish explorers discovered the island and  पुकारा it नुएवा  Guinea .
In recent history western New Guinea was included in the Dutch  ईस्ट इंडीज उपनिवेश  .
The Germans annexed the northern coast of the eastern half of the island as German New Guinea in their pre–World War I effort to establish themselves as a colonial  शक्ति  , whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain .
Following the Treaty of Versailles , the German portion was awarded to  ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( जिससे थी already  governing the British claim , named the Territory of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate .
The eastern half of the  द्वीप थी granted स्वतंत्रता  from Australia as Papua New Guinea in 1975 .
The western half gained  स्वतंत्रता इससे the डच in 1961 , लकिन  became part of Indonesia soon afterwards in controversial circumstances .
`` The Van  buren लड़कों '' is the  148th episode of the sitcom Seinfeld , and name of a fictional New York street gang .
Their sign is crossing  the  hands , with one hand with all the fingers 'up ' and spread out .
The other hand  रै सब  but the thumb and pointer finger up , for a total of eight ( 8 ) .
The gang is named for the 8th President of the United States , Martin Van Buren ( who was the first  अध्यक्ष इससे  New York ) .
इस  was the 14th episode for the 8th season .
It  aired on  February 6 , 1997 .
bevo  sign
bevo थी a non-alcoholic  malt beverage , or near beer , brewed in the United States by the Anheuser-Busch company beginning in the early 20th century .
Bevo enjoyed its greatest success during the time of  निषेध , जब बियर , वाइन  and distilled liquors , were made illegal for thirteen years .
The Anheuser-Busch company started brewing Bevo when  alcoholic पेय  were prohibited in 1916 by the United States armed forces .
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919 , and Bevo was by far the  सबसे लोकप्रिय of the अनेक ``  cereal beverages '' or `` near beers '' of the time .
At the peak of its popularity in the early 1920s , more  than पाँच लाख मामले  of Bevo were sold annually .
renard साथ a मग of bevo , चित्रित  in terra cotta on the interior walls of the Bevo building , St. Louis
Labels on the bottles  billed it as ``  Bevo the Beverage '' .
The  नाम `` bevo '' थी coined  from the word `` beverage '' and the Slavic language word for beer `` pivo '' , and was pronounced `` Bee-vo '' .
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` Renard the Fox `` ( based on the protagonist of a medieval French  folk-tale ) , और promotional  mugs with this character were manufactured .
In 1930  anheuser-busch निर्मित a श्रेणी of boat-bodied गाड़ियाँ  in its St. Louis shops called the `` Bevo Boats '' which were used for promotion .
Seven are believed to have been built on Pierce-Arrow 8-cylinder chassis while one surviving example was based  upon 1930 कैडिलैक  353 V8 .
Billboard advertising Bevo in Trenton  , नई  Jersey , 1917
A contemporary advertisement read ``  कूलिंग  and invigorating , Bevo the Beverage .
अनुक्रम  by the case from your grocer , druggist , or dealer . ''
The paper label on the back of  the  bottle read `` The All-Year-Round Soft Drink .
Appetizing -  healthful - पौष्टिक  - Refreshing .
Milk or water may  contain जीवाणु  .
BEVO  never करता  . ''
Bevo became part of the popular  संस्कृति of the समय , और is उल्लेखित  in various popular songs and Vaudeville skits of the era .
This led to secondary slang uses of the word ; for example , in American military slang a  यंग और अनुभवहीन अधिकारी थी  called a `` Bevo '' .
The University of Texas named its mascot `` Bevo '' ,  a नाम  which has stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink ,  `` तुम ca n't रहो  Up on Bevo '' , in his 1917 army revue , Yip Yip Yaphank .
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg beer and liquor as well as  `` homebrew `` ,  cut into Bevo 's marketshare .
With sales  flattening to 100,000  cases by 1929 , Anheuser-Busch stopped production .
The Bevo Mill , St.  लुई  , in 2008
The Bevo building , with the Renard character prominently displayed at the corners  ,  still operates as a bottling facility at their main brewery in St. Louis , Missouri .
The landmark Bevo  मिल  , constructed by August Anheuser Busch , Sr. in 1917 .
It was closed in 2009 , but it reopened in October 2009  अंतर्गत नई  owners .
Bevo is also mentioned in the short story `` The  हत्यारे `` by अर्नेस्ट हेमिंगवे ;  as well as in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis .
mylanta is an over  the counter medication used for the treatment of acid reflux , heartburn , and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also known as GERD ) .
Foremilk and Hindmilk samples of human  स्तन  milk
A  कांच of  pasteurized cow milk
Milk is a white liquid  उत्पादित by the mammary  glands of mammals .
It is the primary source of nutrition for young mammals before they are  समर्थ to डाइजेस्ट अन्य प्रकार  of food .
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum , which carries the mother 's antibodies to the baby  और can reduce the रिस्क of  many diseases in the baby .
It also contains many other  nutrients  .
As an agricultural product , milk is extracted from mammals and used  as food  for humans .
Worldwide , dairy farms produced about 730  लाख टन of  milk in 2011 .
India is the world 's largest  निर्माता और  consumer of milk , yet neither exports nor imports milk .
New Zealand , the European Union 's 27 member states , Australia , and the United States are the  संसार 's largest निर्यातक  of milk and milk products .
चीन और  Russia are the world 's largest importers of milk and milk products .
Throughout the world , there are more than 6 billion consumers of milk and milk  उत्पाद  .
Over 750 million people live  भीतर  dairy farming households .
Milk is a key  योगदानकर्ता to  improving nutrition and food security particularly in developing countries .
Improvements  in पशुधन और दुग्ध  technology offer significant promise in reducing poverty and malnutrition in the world .
Motorcycle speedway , usually referred to as speedway , is a motorcycle sport involving four and sometimes up to six riders competing  over चार anti-clockwise  laps of an oval circuit .
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear and have no brakes and racing takes place on a flat oval track usually consisting of dirt or  loosely packed shale  .
Competitors use this surface to slide their  मशीने बगलों  , powersliding or broadsiding into the bends .
On the straight sections of  the track the मोटरसाइकिल  reach speeds of up .
The exact origins of the  sport are unknown but  there is evidence of a type of speedway racing being practised in the USA before the First World War and in Australia in the late 1910s and early 1920s .
There are now both domestic and international competitions in a number of countries including the Speedway World Cup whilst the highest overall  स्कोरिंग व्यक्तिगत in the स्पीडवे ग्रैंड प्रिक्स कार्यक्रम is सुनाया the संसार चैंपियन  .
Speedway is popular in central and northern Europe and to a lesser extent in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया और  North America .
A variant of track racing , speedway is administered  internationally by the fédération internationale  de Motocyclisme ( FIM ) .
घरेलू स्पीडवे कार्यक्रम हैं regulated  by FIM affiliated national motor sport federations .
Vitamin D is a  समूह of  fat-soluble secosteroids responsible for intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate .
In humans , the  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण  related compounds of vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and  ergocalciferol ( विटामिन d2 ) हैं अद्वितीय as वे  constitute what we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The  देह can भी synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब  sun exposure is adequate ( hence its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin , it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense , as it can be synthesized in adequate amounts  by सबसे स्तनधारियों उजागर to धूप  .
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize vitamin D  efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त  it in their diet . )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism ,  और जरूर be प्राप्त इससे  their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins , vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance  that was lacking in a  disease , namely , rickets , the childhood form of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like  अन्य यौगिकों  called vitamins , in the developed world vitamin D is added to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid disease due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous   synthesis from exposure to sunlight as well as intake from the diet , and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of uncertainty about the cancer risk from sunlight , no recommendations are issued by the Institute of Medicine , USA , for the  राशि of सूर्य एक्सपोज़र जरूरी to मिलें विटामिन d  requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary  सन्दर्भ intakes लिये विटामिन d assume कि no संश्लेषण  occurs and that all of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in practice .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific  vitamin D  metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to calcitriol , the biologically active form of vitamin D. Calcitriol  circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त , regulating  the concentration of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other  उद्देश्य ,  such as the proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to prevent  osteomalacia or rickets  , the evidence for other health effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is inconsistent .
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a decrease in mortality in   elderly women .
The Duramax is a General Motors diesel engine family for light- and medium duty  ट्रक ,  designed by Isuzu .
The 6.6-liter Duramax is produced by DMAX , a  संयुक्त venture  between GM and Isuzu in Moraine , Ohio .
This engine was initially installed in  2001  model year Chevy and GMC trucks and has been an option since then in pickups , vans , and medium-duty trucks .
In 2006 , production at Moraine was  reportedly  limited to approximately 200,000 engines per year .
On May 9 , 2007 , DMAX announced  the उत्पादन  of the 1,000,000th Duramax V-8 diesel at its Moraine facility .

is also a traditional written abbreviation for Baltimore ,  मेरीलैंड  .
