Balto ( 1919 – March 14 , 1933 ) was a Siberian Husky sled dog who led his team on the final leg of the 1925 serum run to Nome , in which diphtheria antitoxin was transported  इससे anchorage , अलास्का , to nenana , अलास्का , by ट्रैन और तब to nome  by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease .
The run is commemorated by the  सालाना iditarod  Trail Sled Dog Race .
Balto was named  बाद the  Sami explorer Samuel Balto .
Balto died at the age of  14  .
Professor Stephen Hawking , known for being a theoretical  physicist , रै appeared in अनेक works  of popular culture .
The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size /  entry-level लक्ज़री  car manufactured by Nissan , marketed as the `` four-door sports car '' .
The origins of the Maxima began in July 1976 as the Datsun 810 , an upscale six-cylinder version of the Bluebird , and was spun into its own  लकीर in 1981 , having  been made continuously since then .
The `` Maxima '' name was applied gradually  , शुरूआत in  1981 .
Most pre-2004 Maximas were  निर्मित  in Oppama , Japan , until the current North American Maximas started being assembled in Smyrna , Tennessee .
The `` Maxima ''  रै भी महरूम लागू  to Cefiros and Laurels in various markets .
propolis as छत्ता sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture that honey bees collect from  पेड़ कलियों , sap बहती  , or other botanical sources .
It is used as a sealant for unwanted open spaces in the  छत्ता  .
Propolis is used for small gaps (  लगभग or कम  ) , while larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax .
Its color varies  depending on इसके  botanical source , the most common being dark brown .
Propolis is sticky at  और  above room temperature , .
At lower  temperatures , it becomes  hard and very brittle .
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26 ,  1948 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter , और multi-instrumentalist  , best known as the frontman and lead singer of the Boston -based rock band Aerosmith , in which he also plays the harmonica , and occasional piano and percussion .
He is known as  the `` राक्षस of  Screamin ' '' due to his high screams and his wide vocal range .
He is also known for his on-stage  acrobatics  .
During his high-energy performances ,  he प्रायः पोशाक  in bright , colorful outfits with his trademark scarves hanging from his microphone stand .
In the 1970s , Tyler rose to prominence as the frontman of Aerosmith , which  released ऐसे पड़ाव  hard rock albums as Toys in the Attic and Rocks .
In the late 1970s and early 1980s , Tyler had a heavy drug and alcohol addiction , and the band 's  लोकप्रियता waned .
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and subsequently maintained sobriety for over 20  सालो ,  but had a relapse with prescription painkillers in the late 2000s , for which he successfully received treatment in 2009 .
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s  और जल्दी 1990s साथ the एल्बम  Permanent Vacation , Pump , and Get a Grip , Tyler became a household name and has remained a relevant rock icon .
As a result , he has since embarked on several solo endeavors including guest appearances on other artists ' music , film and TV roles ( including as a judge on American Idol ) , authoring a bestselling book , and solo work ( including a Top  40 hit सिंगल in 2011  ) .
however ,  he has continued to record music and perform with Aerosmith , after more than 43 years in the band .
The band 's latest album , Music from  another आयाम  !
,  थी released on नवम्बर  6 , 2012 .
टायलर is  included among Rolling Stones 100 Greatest Singers .
He was also ranked 3rd on Hit Parader 's Top 100  मेटल vocalists  of All Time .
In 2001 he was  inducted into the  Rock and Roll Hall of Fame with Aerosmith , and he was the presenter when AC/DC was inducted into the Hall of Fame in 2003 .
In  2013 , टायलर  and his songwriting partner Joe Perry will be recipients of the ASCAP Founders Award and will also be inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame .
The  जिगर  produces urea in the urea cycle as a waste product of the digestion of protein .
Normal human adult blood should contain between  7 to 21  mg of urea nitrogen per 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dL ) of blood .
Individual laboratories may have different reference ranges ,  और इस is क्युकी the  procedure may vary .
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2 , 1940 ) is a former American football coach and college and professional football player who was the head coach of the  एनएफएल 's डेट्रॉयट शेर इससे 1988 to  1996 .
His 67  विन्स  and 71 losses are each the most for a head coach in team history .
The   Jews ( ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ) , also known as the Jewish people , are a nation and an ethnoreligious group , originating in the Israelites or Hebrews of the Ancient Near East .
The Jewish ethnicity , nationality , and religion are strongly interrelated , as Judaism is the  परंपरागत  faith of the Jewish nation .
Converts to Judaism , whose status as Jews  भीतर the यहूदी ethnos is बराबर to  those born into it , have been absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia .
in यहूदी परंपरा  , Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical patriarchs Abraham , Isaac and Jacob in the second millennium BCE .
The modern State of Israel was  स्थापित  as a Jewish nation-state , and defines itself as such in its Basic Laws .
Its Law of Return grants the right of citizenship to any  jew  who requests it .
इसराईल is the तभी  country where Jews are a majority of the population .
Jews also enjoyed political  स्वायत्तता twice  before in ancient history .
The first of these periods lasted from 1350 to 586 BCE , and encompassed the periods  of the  Judges , the United Monarchy , and the Divided Monarchy of the Kingdoms of Israel and Judah , ending with the destruction of the First Temple .
The second was the  काल of the  Hasmonean Kingdom spanning from 140 to 37 BCE .
Since the destruction of the First Temple  , सबसे यहूदियों  have lived in diaspora .
A minority in every country  in जिससे वे सजीव ( मगर इसराईल ) , वे have  frequently experienced persecution throughout history , resulting in a population that has fluctuated both in numbers and distribution over the centuries .
the  world Jewish population reached a peak of 15 million prior to the Second World War , but six million Jews were killed in the Holocaust .
Since then the population has risen again and , was estimated at 13.4 million by the North American Jewish Data Bank , or less than 0.2 % of the  कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी  ( roughly one in every 514 people ) .
according  to this report , about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ) , and 39.3 % in the United States ( 5.3 million ) , with most of the remainder living in Europe ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ) .
These numbers include all those who consider themselves Jews , whether or not they  हैं संबद्ध साथ a यहूदी  organization .
The total world Jewish  जनसांख्यिकी , however  , is difficult to measure .
In addition to issues with census methodology , there are halakhic disputes regarding who is a Jew and secular , political , and  ancestral पहचान  factors that may affect the figure considerably .

The Feast of Corpus Christi ( Latin for Body of Christ ) , also known as Corpus Domini , is a Latin Rite liturgical  solemnity celebrating the  tradition and belief in the body and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
It emphasizes the joy of the  संस्था  of the Eucharist , which was observed on Holy Thursday in the somber atmosphere of the nearness of Good Friday .
In the present Roman Missal , the feast is designated the solemnity of The  सबसे पावन देह  and Blood of Christ .
It is also celebrated in some Anglican , Lutheran , and Old Catholic  चर्च कि थाम  similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence .
The feast is liturgically celebrated on the Thursday after Trinity  संडे or , `` जहाँ the solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और  Blood of Christ is not a Holy Day of Obligation , it is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy Trinity as its proper day '' .
At the end of Holy Mass , there is  प्रायः  a procession of the Blessed Sacrament , generally displayed in a monstrance .
The  बारात is followed  by Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament .
A notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over by the Pope each  साल in रोम , जहाँ  it begins at the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran and makes its way to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major , where it concludes with Benediction .
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found in the blood , the levels of which rise in response to  सूजन ( i.e . c-reactive प्रोटीन is an  acute-phase protein ) .
Its  physiological भूमिका is to bind  to phosphocholine expressed on the surface of dead or dying cells ( and some types of bacteria ) in order to activate the complement system via the C1Q complex .
CRP is synthesized by the liver in response to factors released by  macrophages  and fat cells ( adipocytes ) .
It is a member of the pentraxin  परिवार of प्रोटीन  .
It is not related to  c-peptide or प्रोटीन  C .
C-reactive protein was the first  पैटर्न मान्यता  receptor ( PRR ) to be identified .
The start of the systematic European colonization of the Americas is typically dated to 1492 , when a Spanish expedition headed by Christopher Columbus sailed for India to open trade  but  inadvertently discovered the Americas .
European conquest ,  large-scale  exploration and colonization soon followed .
Seeing that Europe was  preoccupied साथ अनेक आतंरिक युद्धों और  was slowly recovering from the many deaths that the bubonic plague caused , the rapid expansion at which it grew in wealth and power was unforeseeable in the early 1400s .
The first expeditions occurred along the Caribbean coasts on  the आइलैंड्स of हिस्पानिओला  , Puerto Rico and Cuba , and after 1500 extended into the interiors of both North and South America .
In 1497 , sailing from the north on behalf of England ,  जॉन cabot उतरा  on the North American coast , and a year later , Columbus 's third voyage reached the South American coast .
France founded colonies in much  of  eastern North America , on a number of Caribbean islands , and in South America .
पुर्तगाल colonized  Brazil .
Eventually , the entire Western Hemisphere came under the control  of यूरोपीय सरकारें  , leading to profound changes to its landscape , population , and plant and animal life .
In the 19th century alone over 50 million people left  यूरोपीय  for the Americas .
The post-1492 era is known as the period of the  columbian एक्सचेंज  .
Keith Richards ( born 18 December 1943 ) is an English musician  , singer-songwriter और संस्थापक  member of the English rock band the Rolling Stones .
Rolling Stone magazine said Richards had created `` rock 's greatest single body of riffs '' , ranking him  4th on इसके सूची of 100 बेहतरीन guitarists  .
Fourteen songs Richards wrote with the Rolling Stones ' lead  vocalist मिक जैगर हैं सूचीबद्ध  among Rolling Stone magazine 's `` 500 Greatest Songs of All Time `` .
Richards ' notoriety for illicit drug use stems in  भाग इससे अनेक ड्रग busts दौरान  the late 1960s and 1970s and his candour regarding his addiction to and eventual abstinence from heroin .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is a स्टेरॉयड हार्मोन इससे the androgen  group and is found in mammals , reptiles , birds , and other vertebrates .
In mammals , testosterone is primarily secreted in the  अंडकोष of males और the अंडाशय of महिलाओं , हालांकि छोटी  amounts are also secreted by the adrenal glands .
It is the principal male sex hormone and an anabolic  स्टेरॉयड  .
In men , testosterone plays a key role in the development of male reproductive tissues such as the testis and prostate as well as promoting secondary sexual characteristics such as increased muscle ,  अस्थि द्रव्यमान , और the विकास of देह बाल  .
In addition , testosterone is essential for health  और well-being as खूब as  the prevention of osteoporosis .
On average , in adult human males , the plasma concentration of testosterone is about 7–8 times as great as the concentration in adult human females ' plasma , but  as the metabolic खपत  of testosterone in males is greater , the daily production is about 20 times greater in men .
Females also are more sensitive to the   hormone .
Testosterone is observed  in सबसे vertebrates  .
Fish  मेक  a slightly different form called 11-ketotestosterone .
इसके बंटवारा  in insects is ecdysone .
These ubiquitous steroids  सुझाएँ कि  sex hormones have an ancient evolutionary history .
Cluster sampling is a sampling technique used when `` natural '' but relatively homogeneous groupings are evident in a  सांख्यिकीय  population .
It is often used in  विपणन  research .
In this technique , the total population is divided into these groups ( or clusters ) and a simple random sample of the  समूह  is selected .
Then the required information is collected from a simple random sample of the  तत्व भीतर  each selected group .
This may be done for every element in  ये समूह or a subsample  of elements may be selected within each of these groups .
A common  प्रेरणा  for cluster sampling is to reduce the total number of interviews and costs given the desired accuracy .
Assuming a fixed sample size , the technique gives more accurate  परिणाम जब सबसे of the विभिन्नता  in the population is within the groups , not between them .
Jamestown is a town in Guilford County , North Carolina , United States , and is a suburb of the nearby cities of  greensboro और ऊँची पाइंट  .
The population was 3,382 at the 2010  जनसांख्यिकी  .
नताली पोर्टमैन  ( born Natalie Hershlag ; ; June 9 , 1981 ) is an actress and model with dual American and Israeli citizenship .
Her first role was as an orphan taken in by a hitman in the 1994 action film , but mainstream success came when she was cast as Padmé Amidala in the Star Wars prequel  त्रयी ( released  in 1999 , 2002 and 2005 ) .
In 1999 , she enrolled at Harvard  विश्वविद्यालयों to  study psychology while still working as an actress .
She completed her  स्नातक 's उपाधि  in 2003 .
In 2001 , Portman opened in New  यॉर्क  City 's Public Theater production of Anton Chekhov 's The Seagull .
In 2005 , Portman  प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Supporting Actress and won the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress - Motion Picture for the drama Closer .
She won a Constellation Award for Best Female  प्रदर्शन और  a Saturn Award for Best Actress for her starring role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ) .
She played leading  भूमिकाएँ in the ऐतिहासिक  dramas Goya 's Ghosts ( 2006 ) and The Other Boleyn Girl ( 2008 ) .
In May 2008 , she served as the youngest  सदस्य  of the 61st Annual Cannes Film Festival jury .
Portman 's directorial debut , Eve , opened the  65th  Venice International Film Festival 's shorts competition in 2008 .
Portman directed a  खण्ड  of the collective film New York , I Love You .
In 2011 , Portman won the Academy Award , the Golden Globe Award , the BAFTA Award , the Screen Actors Guild Award , and the Independent Spirit Award for her lead  प्रदर्शन as नीना sayers in  Black Swan .
Copper is a chemical element with  the प्रतीक cu ( इससे ) और  atomic number 29 .
It  is a ductile मेटल  with very high thermal and electrical conductivity .
Pure copper is soft and malleable ; a freshly exposed  सतह  has a reddish-orange color .
It is used as a conductor of  ऊष्मा और विद्युत  , a building material , and a constituent of various metal alloys .
The metal and its alloys have been used for  हज़ारों of सालो  .
In the Roman era , copper was principally mined on Cyprus , hence the origin of the name of the metal as сyprium ( metal of  साइप्रस ) , बाद  shortened to сuprum .
Its compounds are commonly encountered as copper ( II ) salts , which often impart blue or green colors to minerals such as azurite and turquoise and have been widely used historically as  pigments  .
Architectural structures built  साथ  copper corrode to give green verdigris ( or patina ) .
Decorative art  prominently सुविधाएँ  copper , both by itself and as part of pigments .
Copper is essential to all living organisms as a trace dietary mineral because it is a key constituent of the respiratory enzyme complex  cytochrome  c oxidase .
In molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the blood pigment hemocyanin , which is replaced by the iron-complexed hemoglobin in fish  और अन्य  vertebrates .
The main areas where copper is found in vertebrates are liver ,  मांसपेशी और अस्थि  .
In sufficient concentration , copper compounds are poisonous to higher organisms and are used as bacteriostatic  substances , fungicides , और लकडी preservatives  .
The major professional sports leagues , or simply major leagues ,  in the संयुक्त राज्य  and Canada are the highest professional competitions of team sports in the two countries .
Although individual sports such as golf , tennis  , और स्वचालित रेसिंग  are also very popular , the term is usually limited to team sports .
The term `` major league ''  थी पहला प्रयुक्त in 1921 in सन्दर्भ  to Major League Baseball ( MLB ) , the top level of professional American baseball .
Today , the major northern North America professional team sports leagues are Major League Baseball ( MLB ) , the National Basketball   Association ( NBA ) , the National Football League ( NFL ) , and the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Other notable leagues include Major League Soccer ( MLS ) , the Canadian Football League ( CFL ) , the Arena Football League  ,  Major League Lacrosse , the National Lacrosse League and the Women 's National Basketball Association .
The NFL , MLB , NBA  ,  and NHL are commonly referred to as the Big Four .
Each of these is the richest professional club competition in its sport worldwide   .
The best players can become cultural icons in both countries and elsewhere in the world , because the  लीग आनंद a significant प्लेस in  popular culture in the US and Canada .
The NFL has 32  टीमों  , and the others have 30 each .
The vast  बहुमत  of major league teams are concentrated in the most populous metropolitan areas of the United States .
Baseball , football ,  हॉकी , और सॉकर have था पेशेवर लीग  for over 100 years ; early leagues such as the National Association , Ohio League , and National Hockey Association formed the basis of the modern MLB , NFL and NHL respectively .
Soccer was first professionalized in 1894 , but  लीग  suffered greatly from lack of sustainability and seldom lasted more than a decade .
Soccer 's  महानतम सफलताओं यहूद in the रूप of the अमरीकी सॉकर  League ( 1921-1933 ) , the original North American Soccer League ( 1968-1984 ) , the National Professional Soccer League ( 1984-2001 ) and , currently , Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ) .
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the NBA evolved from the  नेशनल बास्केट लीग और इसके splinter समूह  the Basketball Association of America , taking on its current form in 1949 .
Every major  लीग averages  15,000 fans in attendance per game or higher as of 2011 .
मध्याह्न ऊँचाई is an खगोलीय  navigation method of calculating an observer 's latitude .
Earned value management ( EVM ) , or Earned  मान project/performance प्रबन्धन ( evpm ) is a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन  technique for measuring project performance and progress in an objective manner .
Because EVM has the ability to combine  माप  of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
और  cost,
in a single integrated system , Earned Value Management   is able to provide accurate forecasts of project performance problems , which is an important contribution for project management .
Early EVM research showed that the areas of planning and control are significantly impacted by its use ; and similarly , using the methodology improves both scope  परिभाषा as खूब as the विश्लेषण of overall  project performance .
More recent research studies have shown that the principles of EVM  हैं धनात्मक predictors  of project success .
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond government contracting , in which sector its importance continues to rise (  e.g.  , recent new DFAR rules ) , in part because EVM can also surface in and help substantiate contract disputes .
रंगीन  spring garden flowers
Spring is one of the four conventional temperate seasons  , following शीत और  preceding summer .
There are various technical definitions of spring  , लकिन  local usage of the term varies according to local climate , cultures and customs .
When  it is वसन्त  in the northern hemisphere , it will be autumn in the southern hemisphere .
At the spring equinox , days are close to 12 hours long with day length  increasing as the ऋतु  progresses .
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season , and also to ideas of rebirth , rejuvenation , renewal , resurrection , and regrowth , with  त्यौहार ऐसे as कार्निवल , ईस्टर  and Holi being celebrated at this time .
Jamestown was  a उपनिवेश in the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया , the  first permanent English settlement in the Americas .
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on May 14 , 1607 ( O.S . , May 24 , 1607 N.S . ) , it followed several  पहले विफल  attempts , including the Lost Colony of Roanoke .
Jamestown served as  the पूंजी of  the colony for 83 years , from 1616 until 1699 .
The settlement was located within  the territory of a राजनैतिक एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah  , the state of the Powhatan Confederacy , with around 14,000 native inhabitants , and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe .
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing , feasting and tobacco ceremonies , and they provided crucial provisions and support for the survival of the colonists , who were not agriculturally inclined , although relations with the newcomers  भी soured fairly जल्दी on , अग्रणी to the कुल annihilation of the paspahegh in  warfare within 3 years .
Within a year of  jamestown 's founding  , the Virginia Company brought Polish and Dutch colonists to help improve the settlement .
In 1619 , the first documented Africans were brought to Jamestown , though the modern conception of slavery in the future United States did  नहीं शुरू in वर्जिनिया जबतक  1660 .
When the colony was subdivided into the original  आठ shires of वर्जिनिया  in 1634 , the town became located in the eponymous James City Shire .
The London Company 's second settlement , Bermuda , claims to be the site of the oldest town in the English  नई संसार , as st. जार्ज 's , बरमूडा थी officially स्थापित  ( as New London ) in 1612 , whereas James Fort , in Virginia , was not to be converted into James towne until 1619 , and further did not survive into the present day .
In 1699 , the capital was relocated from Jamestown to what is  आज williamsburg , बाद  which Jamestown ceased to exist as a settlement , existing today only as an archaeological site .
Today , Jamestown is one of three locations comprising  the ऐतिहासिक त्रिभुज of  Colonial Virginia , along with Williamsburg and Yorktown , with two primary heritage sites .
Historic Jamestowne , the  पुरातत्व साईट on jamestown  Island , is a cooperative effort by Jamestown National Historic Site ( part of Colonial National Historical Park ) , and Preservation Virginia .
The Jamestown Settlement , a living history interpretive  साईट , is संचालित  by the Jamestown Yorktown Foundation in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia .
James Christopher Frey ( born September 12 , 1969 ) is  an अमरीकी  writer .
His books A Million Little Pieces ( 2003 ) and My Friend Leonard ( 2005 ) , as well as Bright Shiny  morning  ( 2008 ) , were bestsellers .
He was the subject of a scandal when investigators discovered that prison time and the extent of certain injuries were exaggerated in  A  Million Little Pieces , a purportedly autobiographical account of the author 's struggle with addiction .
Deere & Company , most commonly known by its name John Deere , is an American corporation based in  moline , इलिनोइस ,  and one of the largest manufacturers of agricultural machinery in the world .
in 2012 ,  it was listed as 97th in the Fortune 500 America 's ranking and 190th in the Fortune 500 Global ranking .
Deere and  कम्पनी agricultural  products , sold under the John Deere name , include tractors , combine harvesters , cotton harvesters , balers , planters / seeders , sprayers , and UTVs .
The company is also a manufacturer of  निर्माण उपकरण और वानिकी  equipment , as well as a supplier of diesel engines and drivetrains ( axles , transmissions , gearboxes ) used in heavy equipment .
Additionally , John Deere manufactures equipment used in lawn , grounds , and turf care , such as walk-behind lawn mowers , zero-turn lawn  mowers , लॉन tractors , और snowthrowers  .
To support the core businesses , John Deere also provides financial  सेवाएं और  other related activities .
The company 's slogan is `` Nothing Runs Like  a  Deere '' and has a picture of a leaping deer as a logo , a word play pun on `` nothing runs like a deer '' .
Carl Westby coined the phrase `` Nothing Runs Like a Deere '' for a  विपणन अभियान  to sell snowmobiles .
The company 's products are also identifiable by its  distinctive  shade of green paint , usually augmented by yellow trim .
The United States ten-dollar bill (  $ 10 ) is a denomination  of United States currency .
The first U.S.  सचिव of the राजकोष ( 1789–95 ) , सिकंदर  Hamilton , is currently featured on the obverse of the bill , while the U.S. Treasury Building is featured on the reverse .
( Hamilton is one of two non-presidents featured  on फिलहाल  issued U.S. bills .
The  अन्य is बेंजामिन  Franklin , on the $ 100 bill .
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was not born in the  महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य  , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ;  जार्ज meade , स्पेन ( $  1,000 1890/91 Treasury Note ) ; and Robert Morris , England ( $ 1,000 1862/63 Legal Tender ; $ 10 1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In addition , Kamehameha I ,  appears  on the 2008 Hawaii state quarter . )
All $ 10 bills  जारी आज  are Federal Reserve Notes .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing says the average life of a $  10  bill in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
Approximately 6 % of all US banknotes printed in 2009  यहूद $ 10  bills .
Ten dollar  बिल्स हैं वितरित  by Federal Reserve Banks in yellow straps .
The source of the  फेस on the $ 10 विधेयक is  John Trumbull ’s 1805 portrait of Hamilton that belongs to the portrait collection of New York City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is the only U.S. paper currency in circulation in which the portrait  चेहरों to the बाएँ  ( the $ 100,000 bill featured a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left , but was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
Andy  सैमुएल ग्रिफ़िथ  ( June 1 , 1926 – July 3 , 2012 ) was an American actor , television producer , Grammy Award -winning Southern-gospel singer , and writer .
He was a Tony Award nominee for two roles , and gained prominence in the starring role in director Elia Kazan 's film A Face in the Crowd ( 1957 ) before he became better known for his television roles ,  playing the  lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock .
Theresa Penelope `` Terri '' Irwin , ( née  raines ; born जुलाई 20 , 1964 )  is an Australian -based , American -born naturalist , author , the widow of Australian naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah , Queensland , Australia .
She co-starred with her husband on The Crocodile Hunter , their unconventional television nature documentary series along with its spin-off series , Croc Files and The  मगरमच्छ शिकारी डायरीज़  .
She has lived in Australia since 1992 , when  वो शादीशुदा  Steve Irwin .
Andreas Cellarius 's  उदाहरण  of the Copernican system , from the Harmonia Macrocosmica ( 1660 ) .
Heliocentrism , or heliocentricism , is the astronomical model in which the Earth and planets revolve around a  अपेक्षाकृत stationary सूर्य at the  center of the Solar System .
The  शब्द आता इससे the यूनानी  ( helios `` sun '' and kentron `` center '' ) .
Historically , heliocentrism  थी opposed  to geocentrism , which placed the Earth at the center .
The notion that the Earth revolves around the Sun had been proposed as early as the 3rd century BC by Aristarchus of Samos , but Aristarchus 's heliocentrism  आकर्षित छोटी ध्यान जबतक  Copernicus revived and elaborated it .
Lucio Russo , however , argues that this  is a misleading  impression resulting from the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era .
Using indirect evidence he  argues कि a heliocentric  view was expounded in Hipparchus 's work on gravity .
It was not until  the 16th सदी कि a fully predictive गणितीय मॉडल  of a heliocentric system was presented , by the Renaissance mathematician , astronomer , and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland , leading to the Copernican Revolution .
In the following century , Johannes Kepler elaborated upon and expanded this  मॉडल to शामिल  elliptical orbits , and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei .
With the observations of William Herschel , Friedrich Bessel , and others , astronomers realized that the sun was not the  बीच of the ब्रह्मांड और by the 1920s एडविन हबल था दिखाया कि it  was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions .
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah Jones Shankar ; March 30 , 1979 ) is an American  singer-songwriter  , pianist , and actress .
She is the daughter of Indian  सितार  player Ravi Shankar and Sue Jones .
She is also Anoushka Shankar 's  half-sister  .
In 2002 , she launched her solo music career with the release of the commercially successful and critically  acclaimed एल्बम आइये दूर साथ me , a संलयन of देश म्यूज़िक  and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album , selling over 26 million copies .
The record earned Jones five  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार ,  including the Album of the Year , Record of the Year , and Best New Artist .
Her subsequent studio albums ,  feels जैसे घर , released in 2004 , नहीं too लेट  , released in 2007 , the same year she made her film debut in My Blueberry Nights , and her 2009 release The Fall all gained Platinum status , selling over a million copies and were generally well received by critics .
Jones ' fifth studio album , Little Broken Hearts , was released on  अप्रैल  27 , 2012 .
Jones has  जीती नौ ग्रैमी  Awards and was 60th on Billboard magazine 's artists of the 2000–2009 decade chart .
Throughout her career , Jones has won   numerous awards and has sold more than 50 million albums worldwide .
Billboard named her the top jazz artist of the  2000–2009 दशक  .
Not to be confused with Dimension  of a शारीरिक  quantity .
For other uses ,  देखिए  Dimension ( disambiguation ) .
From left to right , the  वर्गाकार , the  cube , and the tesseract .
The square is bounded by 1-dimensional lines , the cube by 2-dimensional areas , and the tesseract by 3-dimensional  आयतन  .
A  प्रक्षेप  of the cube is given since it is viewed on a two-dimensional screen .
The same applies to the tesseract , which additionally can only be shown as a projection even in  three-dimensional  space .
A diagram showing the first four  स्थानिक आयाम  .
In physics and mathematics , the dimension of a space or object is informally defined as the  न्यूनतम क्रमांक of निर्देशांक needed to बताएँ कोई पाइंट भीतर  it .
Thus a line has a dimension of one because only one coordinate is needed to specify a point on it ( for example , the  पाइंट at 5 on a क्रमांक लकीर  ) .
A surface such as a plane or the surface of a cylinder or sphere has a dimension of two because two  निर्देशांक हैं needed to बताएँ  a point on it ( for example , to locate a point on the surface of a sphere you need both its latitude and its longitude ) .
the अंदर of a घन , a  cylinder or a sphere is three-dimensional because three coordinates are needed to locate a point within these spaces .
In physical terms , dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and its position in time ( perceived as a scalar dimension along the t-axis ) , as well as the spatial constitution of  वस्तुएँ within—structures कि correlate साथ दोनो  particle and field conceptions , interact according to relative properties of mass —and are fundamentally mathematical in description .
These , or other  अक्ष , may be संदर्भित  to uniquely identify a point or structure in its attitude and relationship to other objects and occurrences .
Physical theories that incorporate time , such as general relativity , are said to work in  4-dimensional `` spacetime ``  , ( defined as a Minkowski space ) .
Modern theories tend to be `` higher-dimensional '' including quantum  फ़ील्ड और स्ट्रिंग  theories .
The state-space of quantum mechanics is  an infinite-dimensional  function space .
the  concept of dimension is not restricted to physical objects .
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences for many reasons  , अक्सर  as configuration spaces such as in Lagrangian or Hamiltonian mechanics ; these are abstract spaces , independent of the physical space we live in .
fontana ( ) is a नगर of  200,762 residents in San Bernardino County , California .
Founded in 1913 , it remained essentially rural until World War II , when entrepreneur Henry J.   Kaiser built a large steel mill in the area .
It is now a  क्षेत्रीय हब of the trucking उद्योग , साथ  Interstate 10 and State Route 210 transecting the city from east to west , and Interstate 15 passing diagonally through its northwestern quadrant .
It is home to the  largest of the सैन bernardino काउंटी  system libraries , a renovated historic theater , a municipal park , and the Auto Club Speedway on the site of the Kaiser Steel Mill .
Fontana  भी होस्ट  the Fontana Days Half Marathon and 5K run .
This race is the  तीव्रतम half-marathon  course in the world .
The U.S. 2012 Census reported that Fontana 's population was  200,762 in 2012 , बनाना it the  second most populous city in San Bernardino county county and 14th in the state .
Cowboys Stadium is a stadium with a retractable roof in  आर्लिंगटन , टेक्सास  .
It serves as the home  of the नेशनल  Football League 's Dallas Cowboys .
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium , which   opened in 1971 , and served as the Cowboys ' home through the 2008 season .
It was  समाप्त  on May 27 , 2009 .
The stadium seats 85,000 , making it the third largest stadium in the NFL by seating   capacity .
the अधिकतम  capacity of the stadium , including standing room , is 105,000 .
The Party Pass ( open areas )  भाग हैं पीछे सीटे in प्रत्येक  end zone and on a series of six elevated platforms connected by stairways .
It has the world 's largest column-free interior  और the चौथी  largest high definition video screen , which hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line .
The facility can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of its main purpose ( professional football ) such as concerts , basketball games , boxing matches ,  कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और ऊँची स्कूल फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिताओं  , soccer matches , and motocross races .
Canadian historians until the 1980s  tended  to focus on economic history , including labour history .
In part this is because Canada has had far fewer political or military  विरोध than अन्य  societies .
This was especially true in the first half of the twentieth century when economic  इतिहास थी  overwhelmingly dominant .
Many of the most prominent English Canadian  इतिहासकारों इससे इस काल  were economic historians , such as Harold Innis , Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian history were heirs to the  परंपराओं कि विकसित in यूरोपीय  and the United States , but frameworks that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
The heavily Marxist influenced economic history  कि dominates  Europe has little relevance to most of Canadian history .
A focus on class , urban areas  , और उद्योग fails to  address Canada 's rural and resource based economy .
Similarly , the monetarist school that is  प्रबल in the संयुक्त राज्य  also has been difficult to transfer north of the border .
The study of economic history in Canada  became  highly focused on economic geography , and for many years the dominant school of thought has been the staples thesis .
This school of thought bases the study of the Canadian economy on the  study  of natural resources .
This approach has   since also become used outside of Canada in Australia and in many developing nations .
Before the arrival of Europeans , the First Nations of what would  become कनाडा था a विशाल और  vibrant trade network .
Furs , tools ,  सजावटी वस्तुएं , और अन्य goods यहूद प्रायः transported  thousands of kilometres , mostly by canoe throughout the many rivers and lakes of the region .
The early European history of the Canadian economy is usually studied through the staples thesis which argues the Canadian economy developed through the exploitation  of a series of  staples that would be exported to Europe .
Carbon-14 , 14C , or  radiocarbon , is a रेडियोसक्रिय  isotope of carbon with a nucleus containing 6 protons and 8 neutrons .
Its presence in organic materials is  the आधार of the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered  by Willard Libby and colleagues ( 1949 ) to date archaeological , geological and hydrogeological samples .
carbon-14 थी खोजा  on 27 February 1940 , by Martin Kamen and Sam Ruben at the University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley , although its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934 .
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the carbon is carbon-12 ,  1 % is  carbon-13 , and carbon-14 occurs in trace amounts , i.e. , making up about 1 part per trillion ( 0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere .
The  half-life  of carbon-14 is 5,730±40 years .
Carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through beta  क्षय .
The primary natural source of carbon-14 on Earth is cosmic ray action upon nitrogen in the atmosphere , and it is  इसलिए  a cosmogenic nuclide .
However , open-air nuclear  परीक्षण between  1955–1980 contributed to this pool .
The different  isotopes of कार्बन  do not differ appreciably in their chemical properties .
This is used in chemical and biological research , in a technique called carbon labeling :  carbon-14 अणु can be प्रयुक्त  to replace nonradioactive carbon , in order to trace chemical and biochemical reactions involving carbon atoms from any given organic compound .
Lightning is a highly visible form of energy  ट्रांसफ़र
Lightning strikes  हैं विद्युत discharges  on a massive scale between the atmosphere and an earth-bound object .
They mostly originate in  thunderclouds और terminate  on the ground , called Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning .
However , they may also be initiated from a very tall grounded  ऑब्जेक्ट और पहुँचें into the  clouds .
Although `` a lightning strike '' is commonly used to describe all lightning , it  is बल्कि ग़लत और a misnomer ,  as only about 25 % of all lightning events worldwide are CG , the large bulk of lightning events are Intracloud ( IC ) or Cloud to Cloud ( CC ) , where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere .
The scientific name for the  पूरा प्रक्रम of a सिंगल बिजली  event is a and it is a very complex , multiple stepped interaction , which is not completely understood .
सबसे  CG flashes only `` strike '' one physical location , referred to as a termination .
The primary conducting channel , the bright coursing light you may see and call a `` strike '' , is only about 1 inch in diameter , although to  हमारी आँखें it looks  much larger .
They are  मील  long , upwards of tens of miles .
And the entire flash , lasts only a few fractions of a  दूसरी , सबसे of जिससे  is not visible to human eyes .
थंडर  is always produced by lightning .
Just like lightning , that deceives our eyes , usually looking larger or closer than it really is , the earth 's atmosphere and our brain 's perception of the  बाहर संसार  , ultimately determines whether it is `` heard '' or not .
Lightning can not happen in a vacuum devoid of ions ,  nor can थंडर occur  without molecules to vibrate .
Thunder is a physical absolute for every  सिंगल फ्लैश of बिजली  .
Contrary to popular belief ,  a बिजली स्ट्राइक itself  is usually not responsible for multiple deaths or injuries from a single event .
It would be impossible given the natural  tendencies of a फ्लैश , जबतक  people or animals were stacked on top of each other , or they were somehow arranged vertically and part of the flash channel .
When lightning ignites an  उपलब्धियाँ ईंधन सोर्स और an विस्फोट  occurs , it is the shock wave or fire causing the injuries , not the strike itself .
Ground Currents , also called step potential , of an earth termination is what truly causes most  चोटों or मौत to इंसानो  and animals .
The near instantaneous rush of surface charges , induced by the overhead thundercloud itself , race to the strike point from  सैंकड़ों to हज़ारों of फीट दूर दौरान निर्वहन .
This current , caused during each stroke , takes the path of least resistance , which may be ion  समृद्ध इंसान or एनिमल  legs , over poorly conducting earth .
This is why it is best to crouch , with feet close together , if ever caught in the  खोलें दौरान a अंधड़  .
Unfortunately , most reports do not draw a distinction between the real cause of injury or death , be it the strike itself , a  resulting विस्फोट or आग , or प्रायः जिम्मेदार  step potential .
पीटर F. kilmartin  ( born 1962 ) is the current Attorney General of Rhode Island .
Kilmartin is  भी a रिटायर्ड पुलिस कप्तान  and a former member of the Rhode Island House of Representatives .

Sealing is an ordinance (  अनुष्ठान ) performed in latter दिन संतो  temples by a person holding the sealing authority .
The purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar relationships ,  बनाना संभावित the अस्तित्व  of family relationships throughout eternity .
LDS  शिक्षाओं प्लेस  great importance on the specific authority required to perform these sealings .
Church doctrine  सिखाती  that this authority , called the Priesthood , corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in .
Sealings are  typically performed as विवाह or as  sealing of children to parents .
They were performed prior to the death of Joseph Smith , Jr. ( the main founder of the Latter Day Saint  गति ) , और हैं फिलहाल performed in the गिरिजाघर  of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints .
Although some other denominations , such as the Community of Christ , view  sealing as an centuries of स्मिथ  's practice of plural marriage , some do still perform them .
The 2000s , pronounced `` two thousands '' , was a decade that began  on जनवरी 1  , 2000 , and ended on December 31 , 2009 .
Globalization , which had accelerated after  the जल्दी 1990s पतन  of communism , continued to be a force in the 2000s .
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to globalization during the decade , making it possible for people to interact  with other  people , express ideas , introduce others to different cultures and backgrounds , use goods and services , sell and buy online , research and learn about things , along with experiencing the world without having to leave home .
the संस्थानों , linkages  and technologies that emerged or were redefined earlier would subsequently in this decade benefit many countries , in particular China and India .
However , in other parts of the world such progress failed to address ongoing struggles with  आधुनिकता , सबसे notably characterized by  the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups .
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to  the संयुक्त राज्य  , United Kingdom , Spain , Canada and other nations invading Afghanistan , as well as implementing various anti-terrorist measures at home and abroad in what was known as the War on Terror .
The European Union saw  further संयोजन और  expansion throughout much of Europe .
The economic growth of the 2000s had  considerable पर्यावरणीय  consequences , raised demand for diminishing energy resources , and was still shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s .
the gunfight at the o.k . corral थी a gunfight कि took प्लेस at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार , अक्तूबर 26 , 1881 , in tombstone , एरिज़ोना territory , और is generally regarded as the सबसे प्रसिद्ध gunfight in the इतिहास of the अमरीकी  Old West .
The gunfight , believed to have lasted only about thirty seconds , was fought between the outlaw Cowboys Billy Claiborne , Ike and Billy Clanton , and Tom and Frank McLaury , and the opposing town Marshal Virgil Earp and his brothers Assistant Town  मार्शल मॉर्गन और अस्थाई lawman व्याट , aided by दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे designated as a अस्थाई मार्शल  by Virgil .
Ike  clanton और बिली claiborne  ran from the fight unharmed , but Ike 's brother Billy Clanton was killed , along with both McLaurys .
Lawmen Virgil and Morgan Earp and Doc  हॉलिडे यहूद  wounded .
Only Wyatt Earp  आए through  the fight unharmed .
The fight has come to represent a time in American history when the frontier was open range  लिये outlaws opposed by विधि प्रवर्तन  that was spread thin over vast territories , leaving some areas unprotected .
The gunfight was not well known to the American public until 1931 when author Stuart Lake published what has since been determined to be a largely fictionalized biography , Wyatt Earp : Frontier Marshal  ,  two years after Earp 's death .
झील retold  his story in a 1946 book that director John Ford developed into the movie My Darling Clementine .
After the movie  gunfight at the o.k . corral  was released in 1957 , the shootout came to be known by that name .
Since then , the conflict has been portrayed with varying degrees of  सटीकता in numerous  Western films and books .
Despite its name , the gunfight  दरअसल occurred in  a narrow lot six doors west of the rear entrance to the O.K . Corral on Fremont Street , and also in the street .
The two opposing  पार्टियों  were initially only about apart .
About thirty shots were fired in  तीस सेकेंड .
Ike Clanton filed murder charges against the Earps and Doc Holliday  लकिन वे  were eventually exonerated by a local judge after a 30-day preliminary hearing and then again by a local grand jury .
On December 28 , 1881 , Virgil Earp was maimed in an assassination attempt by the outlaw Cowboys ,  और on कूच 18 , 1882  , they assassinated Morgan Earp .
The suspects furnished solid alibis , and newly appointed Deputy U.S . Marshal Wyatt Earp took matters into his own hands during the Earp Vendetta Ride , ironically pursued by county Sheriff  जॉनी behan साथ वारंट लिये the earp  's arrest .
HDMI ( High-Definition   Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed video data and compressed/uncompressed digital audio data from a HDMI-compliant device ( `` the source device '' ) to a compatible computer monitor , video projector , digital television , or digital audio device .
HDMI is a digital replacement for  मौजूदा एनालॉग  video standards .
There are a number of HDMI-standard cable connectors available , each of which can be used for any uncompressed TV or PC video format ,  सहित मानक , उन्नत , ऊँची परिभाषा  , and 3D video signals ; up to 8 channels of compressed or uncompressed digital audio ; a CEC ( Consumer Electronics Control ) connection ; and an Ethernet data connection .
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards , which define video formats and waveforms , transport of compressed , uncompressed , and LPCM audio ,  auxiliary आंकड़ा , और implementations  of the VESA EDID .
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each other when necessary and allows the user to  operate अनेक डिवाइस साथ एक  remote control handset .
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with  the cea-861 सिग्नल प्रयुक्त by डिजिटल  visual interface ( DVI ) , no signal conversion is necessary , nor is there a loss of video quality when a DVI-to-HDMI adapter is used .
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection , HDMI is independent of the  विभिन्न डिजिटल टेलीविज़न मानकों प्रयुक्त by व्यक्तिगत डिवाइस , ऐसे as atsc और dvb  , as these are encapsulations of compressed MPEG video streams ( which can be decoded and output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ) .
Production of consumer HDMI products  प्रारंभ in लेट  2003 .
in यूरोपीय either dvi-hdcp or hdmi is शामिल in the hd तैयार in-store labeling specification लिये tv सेट लिये hdtv , प्रतिपादित by eicta साथ ses अस्त्र in 2005  .
HDMI began to appear on consumer HDTV camcorders and digital still cameras  in 2006  .
As of January 8 , 2013 , which is ten years after  the  release of the first HDMI specification , over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard .
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ; also known in the series as Bree Hodge and Bree  वेस्टन ) is  a fictional character and one of the four protagonists on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives .
She is played by actress Marcia Cross , who has received multiple awards and nominations for her portrayal , including an Emmy Award nomination , three Golden Globe Award nominations , and  दो स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड  Awards .
Cross 's portrayal of Bree has been widely praised by  आलोचकों और प्रशंसक  .
क्रॉस  originally auditioned for the role of Mary Alice Young , but series creator Marc Cherry thought she was better suited for the role of Bree .
Dana Delany , who eventually was cast as Katherine Mayfair , was originally chosen for the role but turned it  bas , saying it थी too समान  to her role in Pasadena .
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been her attempts to maintain a perfect life despite various obstacles such as widowhood ,  तलाक , और alcoholism  hindering her .
वो रै महरूम शादीशुदा तीन टाइम्स ; to रेक्स वैन de kamp ( स्टीवन culp ) , orson होज ( काइल maclachlan ) और ट्रिप वेस्टन ( स्कॉट bakula )  .
देखिए भी the कस्बा  of Algoma in Winnebago County , Wisconsin .
देखिए भी algoma  ( Disambiguation ) .
Algoma is a city in Kewaunee County in the U.S. state  of विस्कॉन्सिन  .
The population  थी 3,167 at  the 2010 census .
Algoma is part of the Green Bay  महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The Hangover Part II is a 2011 American comedy  फिल्मी उत्पादित by legendary  Pictures and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures .
it is the  sequel to 2009 's The Hangover and the second film in The Hangover franchise .
Todd Phillips directed the film in addition to  co-authoring  the script with Craig Mazin , and Scot Armstrong .
The film stars Bradley Cooper , Ed Helms , Zach Galifianakis , Ken Jeong , Jeffrey Tambor , Justin  bartha और  Paul Giamatti .
The Hangover Part II tells the story of Phil , Stu , Alan , and Doug as they travel to Thailand for Stu 's   wedding .
After the  स्नातक पार्टी  in Las Vegas , Stu takes no chances and opts for a safe , subdued pre-wedding brunch .
However , things do not go as planned , resulting in another bad hangover with no memories of  the पिछला  night .
Development of The Hangover Part II began  in  April 2009 , two months before The Hangover was released .
The principal actors were cast in March 2010 to  reprise उनके भूमिकाएँ  from the first film .
Production began in October 2010 , in Ontario , California ,  पहले चलती on  location in Thailand .
The film was released on May 26 , 2011 and , despite  receiving ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक  reviews from critics , it became the highest-grossing R-rated comedy during its theatrical run .
A  तीसरा फिल्मी is नियत  for on May 24 , 2013 .

believed  to be the Earl of Essex

The English Renaissance was a cultural and artistic  गति  in England dating from the late 15th and early 16th centuries to the early 17th century .
It is associated with  the pan-european पुनर्जागरण  that is usually regarded as beginning in Italy in the late 14th century .
Like most of northern Europe , England saw little  of ये developments जबतक  more than a century later .
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken , as a convenience , to be 1485 , when the Battle of Bosworth Field  ended  the Wars of the Roses and inaugurated the Tudor Dynasty .
Renaissance style and ideas , however , were slow in penetrating England , and the Elizabethan era in the second half of  the  16th century is usually regarded as the height of the English Renaissance .
Elizabeth Ann Bloomer Warren `` Betty '' Ford ( April 8 , 1918  – जुलाई 8 , 2011 ) , थी पहला महिला of  the United States from 1974 to 1977 during the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford .
As First Lady , she was active in  सोशल नीति  and created precedents as a politically active presidential wife .
Throughout her husband 's term in office , she  कायम  high approval ratings despite opposition from some conservative Republicans who objected to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues .
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness following her 1974 mastectomy and was a passionate supporter  of , और activist लिये , the  Equal Rights Amendment ( ERA ) .
Pro-choice on abortion and a leader in the Women 's Movement , she gained fame  as एक of the सबसे निष्कपट पहला महिलाओं in इतिहास ,  commenting on every hot-button issue of the time , including feminism , equal pay , the ERA , sex , drugs , abortion , and gun control .
She also raised awareness of addiction when she announced her long-running  बैटल साथ  alcoholism in the 1970s .
following उसके श्वेत  House years , she continued to lobby for the ERA and remained active in the feminist movement .
She was the founder , and served as the first chair of the board of directors , of the Betty Ford Center for substance abuse and addiction and is a recipient of the  congressional सुनहरा पदक ( co-presentation साथ उसके husband , जेराल्ड R. घाट , अक्तूबर  21 , 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone , presented 1991 , by George H. W. Bush ) .
Platelet endothelial cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also known as cluster of differentiation 31 ( CD31 ) is a  प्रोटीन कि in इंसान is एनकोडेड by the pecam1  gene found on chromosome 17 .
PECAM-1 plays a key role in  निकालना aged  neutrophils from the body .

The Miss Florida USA  प्रतियोगिता is the  pageant that selects the representative for the state Florida in the Miss USA pageant .
While Florida has been successful in terms of  runners-up , finalists और semi-finalists , the राज्य  has never won the Miss USA pageant , although Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe .
Florida 's best results were during  the  mid-1960s to mid-1970s .
Their most  हाल  finalist was Lissette Garcia who placed in the top 16 in 2011 .
Two former  Miss Florida  Teen USA titleholders have won this competition , and three titleholders have also competed at Miss America .
the वर्तमान titleholder is मिशेल aguirre of hialeah .
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history of the part of Britain that became known as England , lasting from the end  of रोमन occupation और स्थापना  of Anglo-Saxon kingdoms in the 5th century until the Norman conquest of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples who came to Britain during the 5th and 6th centuries ,  सहित कोण , saxons  , Frisii , and Jutes .
The term also refers to the  भाषा बोला at the  time in England , which is now called Old English , and to the culture of the era , which has long attracted popular and scholarly attention .
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy , the kingdoms of Northumbria , Mercia , East Anglia , Essex , Kent ,  ससेक्स , और  Wessex .
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism during the early  काल , लकिन परिवर्तित to christianity दौरान  the 7th century .
Paganism had a final stronghold in a period of Mercian  आधिपत्य दौरान the 640s  , ending with the death of Penda of Mercia in 655 .
Facing the threat of  viking invasions , the हाउस of  Wessex became dominant during the 9th century , under the rule of Alfred the Great .
During the 10th century , the individual kingdoms unified under  the नियम of wessex into the किंगडम  of England , which stood opposed to the Danelaw , the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th century in the north and east of England .
The Kingdom of England fell  in the viking आक्रमण इससे डेनमार्क in  1013 and was ruled by the House of Denmark until 1042 , when the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored .
The last Anglo-Saxon king , Harold Godwinson ,  थी  killed in 1066 at the Battle of Hastings .

Smoked salmon is a   preparation of salmon , typically a fillet that has been cured and hot or cold smoked .
Due  to इसके मध्यम  high price , smoked salmon is considered a delicacy .
Although the  पद lox  is sometimes applied to smoked salmon , they are different products .
View of  defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड  position and placement .
Defibrillation is a common treatment for life-threatening cardiac dysrhythmias ,  ventricular fibrillation ,  and pulseless ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic dose of electrical  उर्जा  to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator .
This  depolarizes  a critical mass of the heart muscle , terminates the dysrhythmia , and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators   can be external , transvenous , or implanted , depending on the type of device used or needed .
Some external units , known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ) , automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms ,  अर्थ कि lay responders or bystanders हैं  able to use them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
gabrielle `` कोको '' bonheur  Chanel ( August 19 , 1883 – January 10 , 1971 ) was a French fashion designer and founder of the Chanel brand .
She was the only fashion  पंक्तियां to  appear on Time magazine 's list of the 100 most influential people of the 20th century .
Along with Paul Poiret , Chanel was credited with  liberating महिलाओं इससे the constraints  of the `` corseted silhouette '' and popularizing the acceptance of a sportive , casual chic as the feminine standard in the post- World War I era .
A prolific  फ़ैशन निर्माता  , Chanel 's influence extended beyond couture clothing .
Her design aesthetic was  एहसास  in jewelry , handbags , and fragrance .
Her  हस्ताक्षर  scent , Chanel No . 5 , has become an iconic product .
Chanel was known for her lifelong determination , ambition and energy  जिससे वो लागू to  her professional and social life .
She achieved both success as a businesswoman and social prominence thanks to the connections she made   through her work .
These included many artists and craftspeople to whom  वो became  a patron .
However , Chanel 's highly competitive , opportunistic personality led  उसके to मेक questionable जीवन चुनाव जिससे have उत्पन्न  controversy around her reputation , particularly her behaviour during the German occupation of France in World War II .
Allied Mills flour mill on the banks of the  मैनचेस्टर  Ship Canal
A gristmill ( also : grist mill , corn mill or flour mill  ) grinds अनाज into आटा  .
The term can refer to both the grinding mechanism and the  भवन कि holds  it .
Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country located at the intersection of  सेंट्रल और southeastern यूरोपीय ,  bordering on the Black Sea .
Romania shares a border with Hungary and  सर्बिया to the वेस्ट , युक्त और moldova  to the northeast and east , and Bulgaria to the south .
At , Romania is the eighth largest country of the European Union by area , and has the  सातवाँ largest जनसांख्यिकी  of the European Union with more than 19 million people .
Its capital and biggest city is Bucharest , the 11th  largest नगर  in the EU .
The United Principalities emerged when the territories of  moldavia और wallachia यहूद संयुक्त  under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859 .
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to the throne as the Ruling Prince of the Romanian Principate and in  1881 he थी आखिरकार पहनाया as किंग कैरोल i the  first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania .
Independence from the Ottoman Empire was declared on 9 May 1877  , और थी internationally  recognized the following year .
At the  समाप्त of संसार  War I , Transylvania , Bukovina and Bessarabia united with the Kingdom of Romania .
World War II gave cause to the rise of a military dictatorship in Romania under fascist General Ion Antonescu  ,  who chose to fight on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944 .
After his removal , Romania switched sides in  1944  and joined the Allies .
By the end of the war , some formerly Romanian northeastern territories were occupied by the Soviet Union , with Red Army units stationed  on  Romanian soil .
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a People 's  गणतंत्र ( 1947-1965 )  and a member of the Warsaw Pact .
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General Secretary of the Romanian Communist Party , and the harsh austerity measures , political repression , and cult of personality he implemented led to the Socialist Republic of Romania ( 1965-1989 ) becoming  the सबसे stalinist पुलिस राज्य  in the Eastern bloc .
Eventually his authoritarian government was  toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 दौरान  the Romanian Revolution of 1989 .
With the fall of the Iron Curtain , Romania began its transition  towards लोकतंत्र  and a capitalist market economy .
After a decade of  post-revolution  economic problems and living-standards decline , extensive reforms fostered economic recovery .
As of 2010 , Romania  is an upper-middle-income  country with a high human development index .
Romania joined  नाटो on  29 March 2004 , and the European Union on 1 January 2007 .
It is also a member of the : Latin Union  ,  Francophonie , OSCE , WTO , BSEC , United Nations , etc .
आज , रोमानिया is a एकात्मक semi-presidential  republic , in which the executive branch consists of the President and the Government .
`` Ancient '' redirects  यहाँ  .
For other uses , see Antiquity ( disambiguation )  .
The times before  लिखने belong  either to protohistory or to prehistory .
Khafre  's पिरामिड (  4th dynasty ) and Great Sphinx of Giza ( c. 2500 BC or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the study of the written past  from the  beginning of recorded human history to the Early Middle Ages .
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years ,  साथ cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट , the oldest खोजा  form of coherent writing , from the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC .
This is the beginning of history , as opposed to  प्रागितिहास , according to the  definition used by most historians .
The term classical antiquity is often used to refer to history in the Old World  from the  beginning of recorded Greek history in 776 BC ( First Olympiad ) .
This roughly coincides with the traditional  तिथि of the founding  of Rome in 753 BC , the beginning of the history of ancient Rome , and the beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece .
Although the ending date of ancient history is disputed , some Western scholars use the fall of  the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 ad , the closure of the  Platonic Academy in 529 AD , the death of the emperor Justinian I , the coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history .
In India , the period includes the early period of the Middle Kingdoms , and , in China , the time up  to the qin राजवंश  is included .
Methylcobalamin ( shown )  is a रूप of  vitamin B12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of   vitamin B12 , occurring as dark red crystals that freely form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 , also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble vitamin with a key role in the normal  कामकाज of the दिमाग और बेचैन प्रणाली  , and for the formation of blood .
It is  एक of  the eight B vitamins .
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body , especially affecting DNA synthesis  and regulation , but also  fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither  fungi , पौधे  , nor animals are capable of producing vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and  आर्किया have the  enzymes required for its synthesis , although many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis .
The vitamin  is the largest और  most structurally complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin  b12 consists of a क्लास of chemically  related compounds ( vitamers ) , all of which have vitamin activity .
It contains the  biochemically  rare element cobalt .
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually  उपज hydroxocobalamin ) ,  but conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin , cyanocobalamin , does not occur in nature , but is  उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल  hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements , and as a food additive , because of its stability and lower production cost .
In the body  it is परिवर्तित  to the human physiological forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin , leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in minimal concentration .
More  recently , hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin  , and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive pharmacological products and food supplements .
The  अतिरिक्त यूटिलिटी  of these is currently debated .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , which is an autoimmune disease  in जिससे parietal  cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12 , so a lack of intrinsic factor  , as देखी in घातक रक्ताल्पता  , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical  प्रभाव have चूंकि महरूम  elucidated .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization ,  characterised by an निरंकुश रूप  of government and large territorial holdings around the Mediterranean in Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old  रोमन गणतंत्र , जिससे  preceded it , had been destabilized through a series of civil wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC )  ; the बैटल of actium ( 31 bc ) ; और the granting of the honorific  Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
the पहला दो  centuries of the Empire were a period of unprecedented stability and prosperity known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest expanse during the  शासनकाल  of Trajan ( 98–117 AD ) .
In the 3rd century , the Empire underwent a crisis that threatened its existence , but was reunified and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and   Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century , during which time a system of dual rule was developed in the Latin  West  and Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century , the eastern half continued as what would later  be ज्ञात as the  Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of  रोम था a profound और स्थायी influence  on the development of language , religion , architecture , philosophy , law , and forms of government in the territory it governed , particularly Europe , and by means of European expansionism throughout the modern world .
Total body surface area ( TBSA ) is an  मूल्यांकन माप of burns  of the skin .
In  वयस्कों , the `` नियम of nines '' is प्रयुक्त  to determine the total percentage of area burned for each major section of the body .
In some cases , the  burns may कवर अधिक than एक देह भाग , or may नहीं fully कवर  such a part ; in these cases , burns are measured by using the casualty 's palm as a reference point for 1 % of the body .
For children and infants , the  lund-browder चार्ट is  used to assess the burned body surface area .
Different  percentages हैं प्रयुक्त क्युकी the अनुपात  of the combined surface area of the head and neck to the surface area of the limbs is typically larger in children than that of an adult .
Typical values for common groups of humans  follow  .
( Due to rounding ,  मान  may not add to 100 % . )
