Core 2 is a brand encompassing  a range  of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64 single- , dual- , and quad-core microprocessors based on the Core microarchitecture .
The single- and dual-core models are single- die , whereas the quad-core models comprise two dies , each containing two cores , packaged in a  multi-chip मोड्यूल  .
The introduction of Core 2 relegated the Pentium brand to the mid-range market , and reunified laptop and desktop CPU lines , which  previously था महरूम विभाजित  into the Pentium 4 , Pentium D , and Pentium M brands .
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006 , comprising the Solo (  single-core ) , duo ( dual-core  ) , Quad ( quad-core ) , and in 2007 , the Extreme ( dual- or quad-core CPUs for enthusiasts ) subbrands .
Intel  कोर 2 processors  with vPro technology ( designed for businesses ) include the dual-core and quad-core branches .
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the National Football League ( NFL  ) , the उच्चतम  level of professional American football in the United States , culminating a season that begins in the late summer of the previous calendar year .
the सुपर कटोरी उपयोग  Roman numerals to identify each game , rather than the year in which it is held .
For example , Super Bowl I was  निभाई on जनवरी  15 , 1967 , following the 1966 regular season , while Super Bowl XLVII was played on February 3 , 2013 , following the 2012 season .
The game was created as part of a merger agreement between the NFL and its  then-rival लीग  , the American Football League ( AFL ) .
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion  टीमों होता खेल  in an AFL–NFL World Championship Game until the merger was to officially begin in 1970 .
After the merger , each league was redesignated as a `` conference `` , and the  खेल थी तब निभाई between  the conference champions .
Currently , the National Football Conference ( NFC ) leads the series with 25 wins to  22 विन्स लिये the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc )  .
The day on which  the सुपर कटोरी is निभाई , अभी माना by  some a de facto American national holiday , is called `` Super Bowl Sunday `` .
It is the second-largest day for U.S. food consumption ,  बाद थैंक्सगिविंग दिन .
In addition , the Super Bowl has frequently been the most  देखी अमरीकी टेलीविज़न  broadcast of the year .
Super Bowl XLV ,  निभाई in 2011 , became the most-watched अमरीकी टेलीविज़न  program in history , drawing an average audience of 111 million viewers and taking over the spot held by the previous year 's Super Bowl , which itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H .
The Super  कटोरी is भी among the सबसे  watched sporting events in the world , almost all being North American audiences , and is second to association football ’s UEFA Champions League final as the most watched annual sporting event worldwide .
Because of its high viewership ,  वाणिज्यिक  airtime during the Super Bowl broadcast is the most expensive of the year .
Due to the high cost of  निवेश in विज्ञापन  on the Super Bowl , companies regularly develop their most expensive advertisements for this broadcast .
As a result , watching and discussing the broadcast 's commercials has become a  significant  aspect of the event .
In addition , many popular singers and musicians have performed during the event 's pre-game and halftime  ceremonies क्युकी  of the exposure .
Fiona is a   feminine given name .
The name Fiona was invented , and first used , by the Scottish poet James Macpherson ( 1736–96 ) , author of the Ossian poems , which he claimed   were translations from ancient Gaelic sources ( sources , when challenged , he never produced ) .
The name was subsequently used as a pseudonym by William Sharp (  1855–1905 ) , जो authored  several romantic works under the name `` Fiona Macleod '' .
The name has since become  लोकप्रिय in इंग्लैण्ड  , Scotland and Ireland .
The name is  माना  to be a Latinised form of the Gaelic word fionn , meaning `` white '' , `` fair '' .
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of the Irish-language name Fíona , although these names are otherwise  unrelated ( as fíona is निकला  from an element meaning `` vine '' ) .
There is also a modern tendency to  equate the प्रामाणिक स्कॉटिश गैलिक  feminine name Fionnghal with Fiona .
The name  फिओना is उठती  in popularity particularly in German -speaking countries .
Fiona was the 49th most popular name for baby girls born in 2008 in  जर्मनी  .
Fiona was tied for third  प्लेस in the रैंकिंग of सबसे लोकप्रिय  names for baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008 .
The name was the 347th most popular name for girls born in the United States in 2008 , where it has ranked among the top 1,000 most popular names for girls  चूंकि 1990 और among the शीर्ष 500  since 1999 .
The name Fiona has been particularly popular for girls of Asian or Pacific Islander descent in New York City , where Fiona ranked as the ninth most popular name for girls from  those  groups in 2007 .
Many languages are used , or historically have been used   in the United States .
The most commonly used language is  अंग्रेज़ी  .
There are also many languages indigenous to North America  or to u.S. राज्य  or holdings in the Pacific region .
Languages brought to the country by colonists or immigrants from Europe , Asia , or other parts of the world make up a large portion of the languages currently used ; several languages , including creoles and sign  भाषाएं , have भी विकसित in the संयुक्त  States .
लगभग 337  languages are spoken or signed by the population , of which 176 are indigenous to the area .
Fifty-two languages formerly spoken in the  देश 's  territory are now extinct .
The variety of English  बोला in the संयुक्त  States is known as American English .
English is the de facto national language of the United States , with 80 % of the population claiming it as a  माँ जीभ , और  some 95 % claiming to speak it `` well '' or `` very well '' .
However , no  आधिकारिक भाषा  exists at the federal level .
There have been several proposals to make English the national language in amendments to immigration reform bills , but none  of  these bills has become law with the amendment intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels , with some states mirroring the federal policy of adopting no official language in a de jure capacity , others adopting English alone , others officially adopting  अंग्रेज़ी as खूब as लोकल भाषाएं , और स्टिल अन्य adopting a नीति of de facto bilingualism  .
Spanish is the  दूसरी सबसे आम  language in the country , and is spoken by over 12 % of the population .
The United States holds  the संसार 's पांचवां largest  Spanish-speaking population , outnumbered only by Mexico , Spain , Colombia , and Argentina .
Throughout the Southwestern United States , long-established Spanish-speaking communities coexist with large numbers of  अधिक हाल hispanophone  immigrants .
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less   than fluent in English , nearly all second-generation Hispanic Americans speak English fluently , while only about half still speak Spanish .
According to the 2000 US census , people of German ancestry make up the  largest सिंगल  ethnic group in the United States , and the German language ranks fifth .
Italian , Polish , and French   are still widely spoken among populations descending from immigrants from those countries in the early 20th century , but the use of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die .
Russian is also spoken by immigrant  populations  .
Tagalog and  वियतनामी have  over one million speakers each in the United States , almost entirely within recent immigrant populations .
Both languages , along with the varieties of the Chinese language , Japanese , and Korean , are  अभी प्रयुक्त in चुनावों in  Alaska , California , Hawaii , Illinois , New York , Texas , and Washington .
Native American  भाषाएं हैं बोला in  smaller pockets of the country , but these populations are decreasing , and the languages are almost never widely used outside of reservations .
Hawaiian , although having few native  अध्यक्षों ,  is an official language along with English at the state level in Hawaii .
The  राज्य  government of Louisiana offers services and documents in French , as does New Mexico in Spanish .
Besides English , Spanish , French , German , Navajo and other Native American  भाषाएं , सब अन्य भाषाएं हैं प्रायः सीखे  from immigrant ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned through some form of education .
1990 's  pontiac ग्रैंड  Am Sedan fender and quarter panel
On an automobile , a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is known in British English ) is usually considered the body panel  जिससे goes between the पश्च द्वार और the ट्रंक और typically  wraps around the wheel well ; however , the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ) , between the door and the hood , is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel .
The quarter panel is typically made of Sheet metal , but is sometimes made of  fiberglass or fiber-reinforced प्लास्टिक  ; although , this varies with different makes and models .
a क्वार्टर फलक is typically a welded on घटक of the uni-body ढांचा or monocoque .
Replacement of a sheet metal quarter panel typically  requires  it to be cut off the vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle .
Due to this high amount of specialized labor , a quarter  फलक may  often be repaired rather than replaced by hammering out the damage , and a body filler sometimes referred to as bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface .
Shropshire ( or ; alternatively Salop ; abbreviated , in print only , Shrops ) is a county in  the वेस्ट मिडलैंड्स प्रदेश  of England .
It borders  वेल्स  to the west , Cheshire to the north , Staffordshire to the east , Worcestershire to the south-east and Herefordshire to the south .
A unitary authority ( Shropshire  परिषद ) थी निर्मित on  1 April 2009 , taking over from the previous county council and 5 district councils , and covers most of the county .
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has been a separate unitary authority since 1998 but continues to be  शामिल in the ceremonial  county .
The county 's population and economy is centred on five towns : the county town of Shrewsbury , which is culturally and historically important and is located in the centre of the county ; Telford , a new town in the east which was constructed around a number of older towns , most notably Wellington , Dawley and Madeley , which is today the most populous  ; और oswestry in the north-west , bridgnorth बस to the दक्षिण of telford  , and Ludlow in the south .
The  काउंटी रै अनेक further मार्केट  towns , including Whitchurch in the north , Newport just to the north-east of Telford , and Market Drayton in the north-east of the county .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site ,  covering ironbridge , coalbrookdale  and a part of Madeley .
There are , additionally , other notable historic industrial sites located around the county , such as at  shrewsbury  , Broseley , Snailbeach and Highley as well as the Shropshire Union Canal .
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding  प्राकृतिक  Beauty covers about a quarter of the county , mainly in the south .
Shropshire is one of England 's most rural and sparsely populated counties , with the population density of the Shropshire Council  क्षेत्रफल होने बस 91/km2 ( 337/sq  mi ) .
The Wrekin is one of the most famous natural landmarks in the county  ,  though the highest hills are the Clee Hills , Stiperstones and the Long Mynd .
Wenlock Edge is  another  significant geographical and geological landmark .
In the low-lying northwest of the county ( and overlapping the border with Wales ) is the Fenn 's , Whixall and  bettisfield mosses नेशनल  Nature Reserve , one of the most important and best preserved bogs in Britain .
The River Severn , Great Britain 's longest river  , रनों through the काउंटी , exiting  into Worcestershire via the Severn Valley .
Shropshire is landlocked , and with an area of , is England 's largest   inland county .
The county flower is  the round-leaved  sundew .
For Eurostat purposes , the county ( less the unitary  district  of Telford and Wrekin ) is a NUTS 3 region ( code UKG22 ) .
The two Shropshire unitary areas (  covering सब of the ceremonial काउंटी  ) , together with the authorities covering the ceremonial county of Staffordshire , comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region .
The Big Bang Theory cast at  कॉमिक कॉन 2009 , इससे बाएँ  : Kunal Nayyar , Simon Helberg , Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त ,  created and executive produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter , two Caltech physicists ; Penny , a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall ; and Leonard and Sheldon 's  मित्रों और co-workers  aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz , and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist colleague , and , at different times , a lover of both Leonard and Howard ; Bernadette Rostenkowski-Wolowitz ( season 3 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , a microbiologist , Howard 's fiancée and subsequent wife , and former part-time  वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि ; ऋतु 4 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित )  , who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also features numerous  supporting वर्ण , प्रत्येक of  whom plays a prominent role in a small group of episodes .
The A-Team is an American action-adventure television series , running from 1983 to 1987 , about a fictional group of ex– United States Army Special Forces personnel who work as soldiers of fortune , while on the run from the Army after being branded as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't  कमिट  `` .
A feature film based on the series was released by 20th  सदी  Fox on June 11 , 2010 .
A comic  किताब श्रेणी  , A-Team : Shotgun Wedding , began March 9 , 2010 .
डायना  Prince is a fictional character appearing regularly in stories published by DC Comics .
She debuted in  सनसनी कॉमिक्स # 1 (  January 1942 ) and serves as the civilian and secret identity of the superhero Wonder Woman .
The character was created by  चार्ल्स  Moulton and Harry G. Peter .
Wat Phra Kaew ,  बैंकॉक  , Thailand
There is no official state religion in the Thai constitution , which guarantees  धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता  for all Thai citizens , though the king is required by law to be Buddhist .
According to  the पिछला जनसांख्यिकी ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of  Thais are Buddhists of the Theravada tradition .
Muslims are the second largest  धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड  at 4.6 % .
Thailand 's southernmost provinces - Pattani , Yala , Narathiwat and part of  songkhla chumphon have प्रबल मुस्लिम populations , consisting  of both ethnic Thai and Malay .
The southern tip of Thailand is  ज़्यादातर जातीय malays  .
Christians , mainly  catholics , represent 0.7  % of the population .
A small but influential community of Sikhs in Thailand and some Hindus also live in the country 's cities , and  हैं heavily  engaged in retail commerce .
There is also a small Jewish  जातियाँ  in Thailand , dating back to the 17th century .
Since 2001 , Muslim activists , generally described by the Thai government as terrorists or separatists , have rallied against  the central government  because of alleged corruption and ethnic bias on the part of officials .
Thailand 's Department of Religion , currently under the Ministry of Culture , is formally responsible for the registration of religious  समूह in थाईलैंड url_http  which hold properties through legally established foundations .
It has oversight , along with the Immigration Police , over the  कार्य permits of  missionaries who are `` expatriate religious workers '' of all religions .
A value added tax  ( vat ) is  a form of consumption tax .
From the perspective of the buyer , it is a tax on the  खरीदें  price .
From that of the seller , it is a tax only on the value added to a product , material , or service , from an accounting  पाइंट  of view , by this stage of its manufacture or distribution .
The  निर्माता remits to the सरकारी  the difference between these two amounts , and retains the rest for themselves to offset the taxes they had previously paid on the inputs .
The value added to a  उत्पाद by or साथ a कारोबार is the बिक्री  price charged to its customer , minus the cost of materials and other taxable inputs .
A  vat is जैसे  a sales tax in that ultimately only the end consumer is taxed .
It differs from the sales tax in that , with the latter , the tax is collected and remitted to  the सरकारी तभी एकबार ,  at the point of purchase by the end consumer .
With the VAT , collections ,  remittances to the सरकारी , और  credits for taxes already paid occur each time a business in the supply chain purchases products .
A referee calling  a high-sticking  penaltyHigh
-sticking is the name of two infractions in the sport of ice hockey that may occur when a player intentionally or inadvertently  plays साथ उसके or उसके स्टिक ऊपर  the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal .
This can result in a stoppage of play  or in  a penalty .
In the rules of the National Hockey League , high-sticking is defined as a penalty in Rule 60 and as a  non-penalty  foul in Rule 80 .
A stoppage in play results if a high  स्टिक  comes in contact with the puck and the team who touched it regains control of the puck .
However ,  खेल  usually continues if a player touches the puck with a high stick and the opposing team gains control of the puck .
If  the पक  goes into the opposing net after coming into contact with a high stick , the goal is disallowed .
The level at which a stick is  माना too ऊँची लिये  a goal is the crossbar of the net .
However , if a player knocks the puck into his own net with a high stick , the goal  is  allowed .
A penalty is assessed if a player strikes another player  साथ a ऊँची  stick .
The player is given a minor  दंड जबतक  his high stick caused an injury , in which case the referee has the option to assess a double-minor , major or match penalty .
It is the referee 's discretion which penalty to assess : the rule calls for a double minor  लिये an आकस्मिक चोट , or a मैच दंड  for a deliberate attempt to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ) .
Injury is usually decided by the high stick causing bleeding , but the presence of blood does  not  automatically mean an extra penalty is awarded .
Some referees  have महरूम ज्ञात to पुरस्कार  an extra penalty without the presence of blood if the referee determines that the injury sustained was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty .
Typical modern memory card reader ,  संगत साथ  many common formats
A memory card reader is a device , typically having a USB interface , for accessing the  आंकड़ा on a मेमोरी कार्ड ऐसे as a  CompactFlash ( CF ) , Secure Digital ( SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ) .
Most card readers also offer write capability , and together with the card , this  can  function as a pen drive .
Some printers and personal  कंप्यूटर have a built-in  card reader .
A multi card reader is used for communication with   more than one type of flash memory card .
Multi card readers do not have built-in  मेमोरी क्षमता , लकिन  are able to accept multiple types and styles of memory cards .
The number of compatible memory cards varies from reader to   reader and can include more than 20 different types .
The number of different memory cards that a multi card reader can accept is expressed as x-in-1 , with x being a figure of merit indicating the number of memory cards accepted ,  ऐसे as 35-in-1  .
There are three categories of card readers  sorted by the प्रकार और मात्रा  of the card slots : single card reader ( e.g . 1x SD-only ) , multi card reader ( e.g . 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g . 4x SD only ) .
Some kinds of memory cards with their own USB functions do not need  the कार्ड  reader , such as the Intelligent Stick memory card , which can plug directly into a USB slot .
The  usb  device class used is 0x08 .
Bullying is detrimental to  विद्यार्थी ' well-being  and development .
Bullying is the  उपयोग of फ़ोर्स  or coercion to abuse or intimidate others .
The behavior can be  habitual और involve an असंतुलन  of social or physical power .
It can include verbal harassment or  threat  , physical assault or coercion and may be directed repeatedly towards particular victims , perhaps on grounds of race , religion , gender , sexuality , or ability .
If  धमकाना is किया by  a group , it is called mobbing .
The victim of  धमकाना  is sometimes referred to as a `` target '' .
धमकाना  can be defined in many different ways .
The UK  फिलहाल रै no  legal definition of bullying , while some U.S. states have laws against it .
Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional , verbal  , और  physical .
It typically involves subtle  विधि of coercion  such as intimidation .
Bullying ranges from simple  one-on-one धमकाना  to more complex bullying in which the bully may have one or more `` lieutenants '' who may seem to be willing to assist the primary bully in his or her bullying activities .
धमकाना in स्कूल  and the workplace is also referred to as peer abuse .
Robert W. Fuller has analyzed  धमकाना in  the context of rankism .
A bullying culture can develop in any context in which human beings interact with  प्रत्येक  other .
This  शामिल स्कूल , गिरिजाघर  , family , the workplace , home , and neighborhoods .
Happy slapping in the Instituto Regional  federico errázuriz  , Santa Cruz , Chile
Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing ) on April 4 ,  2007 , in ऑस्टिन , टेक्सास  , after the 8-year-old introduced Mrs. Bush during announcement of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children .
Rae Leigh was the  पहला चाइल्ड in  the U.S. to be recovered as a result of an AMBER Alert when she was 8 weeks old in November 1998 .
An AMBER Alert or a Child Abduction Emergency ( SAME  कोड : cae ) is a चाइल्ड abduction  alert system originating in 1996 , now employed in 9 countries .
AMBER is officially a backronym for  अमेरिका 's लापता : प्रसारण  Emergency Response , named for Amber Hagerman , a 9-year-old abducted and murdered in Arlington , Texas in 1996 .
Alternate regional alert names were once used ; in Georgia , `` Levi 's Call '' ( named after Levi Frady ) ; in Hawaii , `` Maile Amber Alert '' ( after Maile Gilbert ) ; and  अरकंसास , `` मॉर्गन उपनाम  Amber Alert '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts are distributed via  वाणिज्यिक  radio stations , Internet radio , satellite radio , television stations , and cable TV by the Emergency Alert System and NOAA Weather Radio ( where they are termed `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ) .
The alerts are also issued via e-mail , electronic traffic-condition signs , the LED billboards which are located outside of newer Walgreens locations , along with the LED/LCD signs of billboard companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor , CBS Outdoor and  Lamar , or  through wireless device SMS text messages .
AMBER Alert has also teamed up  साथ  Google and Facebook to relay information regarding an AMBER Alert to an ever growing demographic .
Those  दिलचस्पी in  subscribing to receive AMBER Alerts in their area via SMS messages can visit Wireless Amber Alerts , which are offered by law as free messages .
In some states , the display  scrollboards in सामने of लॉटरी  terminals are also used .
The decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each police organization ( in many cases , the state police or highway patrol ) which investigates each of   the abductions .
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of the name and description of the abductee , a description of the suspected abductor , and a description and license plate number of the  abductor 's  vehicle , if available .
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 )  is an अमरीकी स्त्री  with whom United States President Bill Clinton admitted to having had an `` improper relationship '' while she worked at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The affair and its repercussions ( which  शामिल क्लिंटन 's  impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
House of Night is a series of vampire  -थीमd काल्पनिक novels  by American author P. C. Cast and her daughter Kristin Cast .
It  फ़ॉलो the adventures of zoey redbird , a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस become a `` fledgling vampyre '' और is जरूरी to attend the हाउस of रात्रि बोर्डिंग स्कूल in तुलसा , ओक्लाहोमा .
The series has been on the New York Times  Best Seller  list for 63 weeks and there are over seven million copies in print in North America alone .
The sixth  अनोखा , इम्तिहान  , which went on sale on October 27 , 2009 with a first printing of a million copies , entered the USA Today bestseller list that week at # 1 .
In January , 2010 , Gezeichnet , a German translation of Marked  , पहुँचे the  # 1 spot on the Der Spiegel bestseller list .
The  श्रेणी रै so दूर  sold more than ten million books in 39 countries .
Burned was released on April 27 , 2010 , and like Tempted , it  डाला the यूएसए आज  bestseller list that week at # 1 .
Awakened , released in January , 2011 , also entered the  सूची at  # 1 .
The series , which is  प्रकाशित by st  Martin 's Press is planned to include twelve books .
In 2008 , plans for a film adaptation were also announced   .
The tenth book in   the series , Hidden , was released on October 16 , 2012 .
The second book in the novellas ( which give backgrounds on   supporting characters ) , Lenobia 's Vow , was released January 31 , 2012 .
Book eleven is currently called Revealed , and the Casts have announced that two more novellas , Neferet’s Curse , planned to be released February 19 , 2013 , and a prequel novel about Kalona , are to  be released to coincide साथ  the eleventh and twelfth books .
In Greek  mythology , the trojan युद्ध थी  waged against the city of Troy by the Achaeans ( Greeks ) after Paris of Troy took Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta .
The war is one of the most important events in Greek mythology and has been narrated through many works of Greek literature , most  notably through  Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey .
The Iliad relates a part of the last year of  the  siege of Troy ; the Odyssey describes Odysseus 's journey home .
Other parts of the  युद्ध हैं contained  in a cycle of epic poems , which have survived through fragments .
Episodes from the war provided material for Greek  त्रासदी और अन्य works  of Greek literature , and for Roman poets including Virgil and Ovid .
The war originated from a quarrel between the goddesses Athena , Hera , and Aphrodite , after Eris , the  देवी of संघर्ष  and discord , gave them a golden apple , sometimes known as the Apple of Discord , marked `` for the fairest '' .
Zeus sent the goddesses to Paris , who judged that Aphrodite , as the ``  fairest  '' , should receive the apple .
In exchange , Aphrodite made Helen , the most beautiful  of सब  women and wife of Menelaus , fall in love with Paris , who took her to Troy .
Agamemnon , king of Mycenae and the brother of Helen 's husband Menelaus , led an expedition of Achaean troops to Troy and besieged the city for ten years because  of  Paris ' insult .
After the deaths of many heroes , including the Achaeans Achilles and Ajax , and the Trojans Hector and Paris  , the नगर गिरी  to the ruse of the Trojan Horse .
The Achaeans  slaughtered the  Trojans ( except for some of the women and children whom they kept or sold as slaves ) and desecrated the temples , thus earning the gods ' wrath .
Few of the Achaeans returned safely  to  their homes and many founded colonies in distant shores .
The Romans later traced  उनके उत्पत्ति to aeneas  , one of the Trojans , who was said to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy .
The ancient Greeks thought that the Trojan War was a historical  इवेंट कि था लिया प्लेस  in the 13th or 12th century BC , and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles .
By modern times , both the war  and the  city were widely believed to be non-historical .
In 1868 , however , the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann met Frank Calvert , who  कायल  Schliemann that Troy was at Hissarlik and Schliemann took over Calvert 's excavations on property belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars .
Whether  वहीँ is कोई ऐतिहासिक  reality behind the Trojan War is an open question .
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to the tale , though this may simply mean that the Homeric stories are a fusion of  विभिन्न किस्से of sieges और रिझाने by  Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age .
Those who believe that the stories of the Trojan War are derived from a specific historical conflict usually date it to the 12th or 11th centuries BC , often preferring the dates given by Eratosthenes , 1194–1184 BC , which roughly corresponds with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic   burning of Troy VIIa .
Anarchists have employed certain symbols for their cause , including most prominently the circle-A and the  ब्लैक ध्वज , हालांकि anarchists have  historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement .
Since  the पुनरुद्धार of अराजकतावाद  around the start of the 21st-century concurrent with the rise of the anti-globalization movement , anarchist cultural symbols are widely present .
The  वृहद palatine कनाल (  or pterygopalatine canal ) is a passage in the skull that transmits the greater palatine artery , vein , and nerve between the pterygopalatine fossa and the oral cavity .
Surface temperature of Antarctica in winter and summer from the European Centre  लिये medium-range  Weather Forecasts
The climate of Antarctica is the  coldest  on the whole of Earth .
Antarctica has the lowest  naturally occurring  temperature ever recorded on the ground on Earth : −89.2 °C ( −128.6 °F ) at Vostok Station .
It is also extremely dry ( technically a desert ) , averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of  वर्षण  per year .
Even so , on most parts of the continent the snow rarely melts and is eventually compressed to become  the glacial बर्फ कि  makes up the ice sheet .
Weather fronts rarely  घुस दूर  into the continent .
Most of Antarctica has an ice cap climate ( Köppen EF ) with very cold , generally extremely dry weather throughout the year and  no माह averaging ऊपर  0 °C ( 32 °F ) .
Some fringe coastal areas have a tundra  जलवायु ( köppen  ET ) with a short summer averaging above freezing , and much higher precipitation .
Current  सिर  coach Mike Tomlin , during the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh Steelers franchise has had 16 head coaches throughout  इसके इतिहास  .
Founded as the Pittsburgh Pirates in , the name was changed to the Steelers prior to the season to celebrate the city 's heritage of  producing  steel .
Joe Bach served  दो पृथक शर्तें as सिर  coach and Walt Kiesling served three separate terms .
During the and seasons , due to the amount of players who fought in World War II , the Steelers combined their team with  फिलाडेल्फिया और शिकागो , क्रमशः  .
During these seasons , Steelers ' coach Walt Kiesling shared coaching duties with Greasy  Neale and  Phil Handler , who have not been included within this list .
Struggling for much of the franchise 's early years , the  टोली 's पहला ऋतु साथ  more wins than losses was coached by Jock Sutherland in .
In , under  sutherland  , the Steelers played their first playoff game against the Philadelphia Eagles .
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their entire professional coaching careers with the franchise , including John McNally , Walt Kiesling and Chuck Noll , who have also been voted  into the प्रो  Football Hall of Fame .
One  of तभी  four men to coach the same team for 23 years , Chuck Noll retired in .
Noll is also the only coach in National Football League  इतिहास to जीत चार सुपर  Bowls .
Bill Cowher , Noll 's   replacement , coached the Steelers to their fifth Super Bowl victory , in 2005 .
The Steelers sixth  Super  Bowl win came in Super Bowl XLIII , while head coached by Mike Tomlin , the team 's current head coach .
In criminal law , fraud is intentional deception made  लिये  personal gain or to damage another individual ; the related adjective is fraudulent , and verb is defraud .
Fraud is a crime and a civil law violation , though the specific  दण्ड  law definition varies by legal jurisdiction .
defrauding  people or entities of money or valuables is a common purpose of fraud .
A hoax also involves deception , but without  the  intention of gain or of damaging or depriving the victim .
धोखाधड़ी is a रक्षा  in a civil action for breach of contract or specific performance of a contract .
Fraud is a  आधार लिये निष्पक्ष  jurisdiction .
Passover , or Pesach ( from : in Hebrew , Yiddish ) , Tiberian : , Modern Hebrew : /ˈpesaχ/ Pesah , Pesakh , Yiddish : Peysekh , Paysakh , Paysokh ) is an important  biblically -derived  Jewish festival .
historically , साथ साथ shavuot ( `` पेंटेकोस्ट '' ) और sukkot  ( `` Tabernacles '' ) , Passover is one of the three pilgrimage festivals ( Shalosh Regalim ) during which the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem .
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to Mount  gerizim , लकिन तभी मेन participate in पब्लिक इबादत  .
Passover commences on the 15th of the  यहूदी माह of nisan और lasts लिये either सात  days ( in Israel ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ) .
In Judaism , a day commences at dusk and lasts until the following dusk , thus the first day of Passover only begins after dusk of the 14th of Nisan and ends at dusk of the 15th day of the month of  nisan  .
The rituals unique to the Passover  जश्न  commence with the Passover Seder when the 15th of Nisan has begun .
In the Northern  गोलार्ध passover takes प्लेस  in spring as the Torah prescribes it : `` in the month of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ) .
It is one of the most widely observed  यहूदी छुट्टियाँ  .
The Jewish  लोगों celebrate  Passover as a commemoration of their liberation over 3,300 years ago by God from slavery in ancient Egypt that was ruled by the Pharaohs , and their birth as a nation under the leadership of Moses .
It commemorates the story of the Exodus as described in the Hebrew Bible  विशेषकर in the किताब  of Exodus , in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus , the Bible tells that God helped the Children of Israel escape from their slavery  in मिश्र by inflicting टेन plagues upon the  ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born .
The Israelites  यहूद instructed to चिह्नित the doorposts of उनके घरों साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered वसन्त मेमने और , upon देखकर इस , the स्पिरिट of the रब knew to pass over the first-born in ये घरों , hence the नाम of the अवकाश .
There is  कुछ बहस over  where the term is actually derived from .
When the Pharaoh  freed the israelites  , it is said that they left in such a hurry that they could not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ) .
In commemoration , for the duration of Passover no leavened  ब्रैड is खाया ,  for which reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread '' .
Thus Matzo ( flat unleavened bread ) is eaten during Passover and  it is  a symbol of the holiday .
Halley 's Comet or Comet Halley ( or ) , officially designated 1P/Halley , is  the best-known of the short-period  comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is clearly visible to the naked eye  इससे धरती , और यूँ  the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
Other naked-eye comets may be brighter and  अधिक spectacular  , but will appear only once in thousands of years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System  have महरूम observed  and recorded by astronomers since at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made by Chinese , Babylonian , and medieval European chroniclers ,  लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances of  the same object at the time .
The comet 's periodicity was first  संकल्पित in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी  astronomer Edmond Halley , after whom it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last appeared  in the  inner Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986  apparition , हैली became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in  detail by spacecraft , providing the first observational data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number  of longstanding hypotheses परिचय  comet construction , particularly Fred Whipple 's `` dirty snowball '' model , which correctly predicted that Halley would be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for  उदाहरण it  is now understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
Anti-communism  is  opposition to communism .
Organized anti-communism developed in reaction to the  वृद्धि of साम्यवादी  , especially after the 1917 October Revolution in Russia and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War .
Most  anti-communists  reject the concept of historical materialism , which is a central idea in Marxism .
Anti-communists reject the Marxist belief that capitalism will be followed by socialism and communism , just as feudalism was  followed by  capitalism .
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim that the socialist state will ``  wither दूर '' जब it  becomes unnecessary in a true communist society .
Anti-communists argue that the repression in the early years of Bolshevik rule , while not as  चरम as कि दौरान जोसेफ स्टालिन 's  rule , was still severe by reasonable standards , citing examples such as Felix Dzerzhinsky 's secret police , which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions , and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion .
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as totalitarianism , seeing similarity between  the  actions of communist and fascist governments .
Historian Robert Conquest has argued that Communism was responsible for tens of  लाखो of मौतों दौरान  the 20th century .
Opponents argue that Communist  पार्टियों कि have  come to power have tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition .
These opponents claim that most Communist countries have shown no signs of advancing from Marx 's socialist stage of  अर्थव्यवस्था to an आदर्श कम्युनिस्ट स्टेज  .
Rather , Communist governments have been accused of creating a new ruling class ( a Nomenklatura ) , with powers and privileges greater than those previously enjoyed by the upper classes in the  non- कम्युनिस्ट  regimes .
Gil  बगुला ( 9  April 1922 – 27 November 2008 ) was a Jamaican professional footballer .
He was the first black player to play for Scottish club Celtic , and was the father of poet and musician   Gil Scott-Heron .
He died in Detroit of  a दिल आक्रमण  on 27 November 2008 .
The soybean ( US  ) or soya सेम  ( UK ) ( Glycine max ) is a species of legume native to East Asia , widely grown for its edible bean which has numerous uses .
The plant is classed as an  oilseed  rather than a pulse by the UN Food and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ) .
Fat-free ( defatted )  सोयाबीन भोजन is a significant और सस्ती सोर्स of प्रोटीन  for animal feeds and many prepackaged meals ; soy vegetable oil is another product of processing the soybean crop .
लिये उदाहरण , सोयाबीन उत्पाद ऐसे as textured सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन ( tvp ) हैं संघटक in अनेक मांस और दुग्ध analogues .
Soybeans produce significantly more protein per acre than most other uses  of जमीन  .
Traditional  nonfermented  food uses of soybeans include soy milk , and from the latter tofu and tofu skin .
Fermented foods include soy sauce , fermented bean paste ,  natto , और tempeh  , among others .
The oil is used in many industrial  अनुप्रयोग  .
The main  निर्माता of  soy are the United States ( 35 % ) , Brazil ( 27 % ) , Argentina ( 19 % ) , China ( 6 % ) and India ( 4 % ) .
The beans contain significant amounts  of phytic एसिड  , alpha-linolenic acid , and isoflavones .
Harrison Ford ( born July 13 ,  1942  ) is an American film actor and producer .
He is famous for his performances as Han Solo in the   original Star Wars trilogy and the title character of the Indiana Jones film series .
Ford is also known  लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as  Rick Deckard in Blade Runner , John Book in Witness and Jack Ryan in Patriot Games and Clear and Present Danger .
His  career has  spanned six decades and includes roles in several Hollywood blockbusters , including Presumed Innocent , The Fugitive , Air Force One , and What Lies Beneath .
At one  पाइंट , चार of the  top six box-office hits of all time included one of his roles .
Five of his films have been inducted  into  the National Film Registry .
In 1997 , Ford was ranked No . 1 in Empire `` The Top 100  Movie  Stars of All Time '' list .
, the United  राज्य घरेलू बक्सा दफ्तर grosses  of Ford 's films total over US $ 3.5 billion , with worldwide grosses surpassing $ 6 billion , making Ford the third highest grossing U.S. domestic box-office star .
Ford is the husband of  अभिनेत्री calista flockhart  .
A  ट्यूब of  ChapStick
ChapStick is a brand name for lip balm manufactured by Pfizer Consumer Healthcare and used in many  देशों विश्वव्यापी .
it is  intended to help treat and prevent chapped lips ; hence the name .
Many varieties also include sunscreen in order to  prevent  sunburn .
Due to its popularity , the term has become a genericized  ट्रेडमार्क  .
It popularly refers to any lip balm contained in a lipstick-style tube and  लागू in the  same manner as lipstick .
However , the term is still a  पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क , साथ अधिकारों exclusively  owned by Pfizer .
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom , the product 's main competitor is Lypsyl , made by  novartis उपभोक्ता  Health , which is distributed in similar packaging to ChapStick .
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514  जनवरी 1753  ) , also known as Bishop Berkeley ( Bishop of Cloyne ) , was an Anglo-Irish philosopher whose primary achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ) .
This theory denies the existence of material substance and instead contends that familiar objects like tables  और कुर्सियां हैं तभी विचार in the minds of perceivers  , and as a result can not exist without being perceived .
Thus , as Berkeley famously put it , for physical objects `` esse est percipi ''  ( `` to be is to be आभास  `` ) .
बर्कली is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके critique of abstraction , an महत्वपूर्ण आधार in उसके तर्क लिये immaterialism .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his first major work , , in which he discussed the limitations of human vision and advanced the theory that the proper objects of  sight हैं नहीं सामग्री वस्तुएँ , लकिन लाइट और  colour .
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise  concerning  the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 which , after its poor reception , he rewrote in dialogue form and published under the title Three Dialogues between Hylas and Philonous in 1713 .
In this book , Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous ( Greek : 'lover of mind  ' ) , जबकि hylas ( यूनानी : 'मैटr ' )  embodies the Irish thinker’s opponents , in particular John Locke .
Berkeley argued against Sir Isaac Newton  's doctrine of निरपेक्ष स्पेस  , time and motion in De Motu ( on Motion ) , published 1721 .
उसके  arguments were a precursor to the views of Mach and Einstein .
In 1732 , he published Alciphron , a Christian apologetic against the free-thinkers , and in 1734 , he  प्रकाशित the विश्लेषक , an empiricist  critique of the foundations of infinitesimal calculus , which was influential in the development of mathematics .
His last major philosophical work , Siris ( 1744 ) , begins by advocating the  औषधीय उपयोग of तारकोल जल , और  then continues to discuss a wide range of topics including science , philosophy , and theology .
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II , because he tackled many of the issues of paramount interest to philosophy in the 20th century such as the problems of perception , the  अंतर between प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक qualities , और the  importance of language .
Qingdao ( ) , historically known  as tsingtao , is a प्रमुख  city in eastern Shandong province , Eastern China , with a population of over 8.715 million ( 2010 census ) .
Its built up area , made of 6 urban districts and 4 county-level cities , is home to about  4,896,000 निवासियों  in 2010 .
It borders Yantai to the northeast , Weifang to the west and  rizhao to the दक्षिणपश्चिम  .
Qīng ( ) in  चाइनीज अर्थात् ``  green '' or `` lush '' , while dǎo ( ) means `` island '' .
Qingdao is administered at the  sub-provincial  level .
Lying across the Shandong Peninsula while looking out to the Yellow Sea , Qingdao is  a  major seaport , naval base , and industrial centre .
It is  भी  the site of the Tsingtao Brewery .
The world 's longest sea bridge , the Qingdao Haiwan Bridge , links  the प्रमुख शहरी क्षेत्रफल of  Qingdao with Huangdao district , straddling the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas .
Qingdao is named  चीन  's most livable city .
Mimivirus is a  वाइरल genus containing  a single identified species named Acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( APMV ) , or is a group of phylogenetically related large viruses ( designated usually MimiN ) .
In colloquial speech , APMV is  अधिक commonly  referred to as just `` mimivirus '' .
Until October 2011 , when a larger virus  megavirus  chilensis was described , it had the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses .
Mimivirus has a large and complex genome compared  साथ सबसे अन्य वाइरस  .
Mimivirus , short for `` mimicking microbe '' , is so called to reflect its  विशाल आकार  and apparent Gram-staining properties .
the मैक्सिकन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता ( 1810–1821 ) थी an हथियारबंद विरोध between the लोगों of मैक्सिको और the स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक अधिकारियों जिससे प्रारंभ on सितंबर 16 , 1810 .
The movement , which became known as the Mexican War of Independence , was led by Mexican-born Spaniards ,  mestizos और amerindians  who sought independence from Spain .
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their colonial masters , but ended as an unlikely   alliance between Mexican ex-royalists and Mexican guerrilla insurgents .
Crohn 's disease , also known as Crohn syndrome and regional enteritis , is a  प्रकार of जलन  bowel disease that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus , causing a wide variety of symptoms .
It primarily causes abdominal pain , diarrhea (  जिससे may be खूनी if सूजन  is at its worst ) , vomiting ( can be continuous ) , or weight loss , but may also cause complications outside the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes , arthritis , inflammation of the eye , tiredness , and lack of concentration .
Crohn 's disease is caused by interactions between environmental ,  immunological  and bacterial factors in genetically susceptible individuals .
This results in a chronic inflammatory disorder , in which the body 's immune  प्रणाली हमले the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट संभवतः  directed at microbial antigens .
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an autoimmune disease in the  पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं  have described it as an immune deficiency state .
There is a genetic association with Crohn 's disease ,   primarily with variations of the NOD2 gene and its protein , which senses bacterial cell walls .
Siblings of affected  individuals  are at higher risk .
Males and females  हैं बराबर  affected .
smokers  are two times more likely to develop Crohn 's disease than nonsmokers .
Crohn 's disease affects between 400,000 and 600,000  लोगों in उत्तर अमेरिका  .
व्यापकता  estimates for Northern Europe have ranged from 27–48 per 100,000 .
Crohn 's disease tends to present initially in the teens and twenties , with  another शिखर incidence  in the fifties to seventies , although the disease can occur at any age .
वहीँ  is no known pharmaceutical or surgical cure for Crohn 's disease .
Treatment options are restricted to  controlling लक्षण , maintaining  remission , and preventing relapse .
The disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn , who , in 1932 , together with two other colleagues at  माउंट sinai हॉस्पिटल in नई यॉर्क , वर्णित a  series of patients with inflammation of the terminal ileum , the area most commonly affected by the illness .

The list directly includes the tallest  इमारतें और structures  for each country , and where appropriate , it also points to more detailed country-specific lists .

It is located west of Grass Valley , California ,  लगभग  62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento .
the जनसांख्यिकी  was 963 at the 2010 census .
YouTube is a  video-sharing जालस्थल , निर्मित by तीन पूर्व  PayPal employees in February 2005 , on which users can upload , view and share videos .
The  कम्पनी is आधारित  in San Bruno , California , and uses Adobe Flash Video and HTML5 technology to display a wide variety of user-generated video content , including movie clips , TV clips , and music videos , as well as amateur content such as video blogging , short original videos , and educational videos .
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals , although media corporations including CBS , the BBC , Vevo , Hulu , and other organizations offer some of their material via the site , as part of the  youtube साझेदारी  program .
Unregistered users can watch videos , while   registered users can upload an unlimited number of videos .
Videos considered to contain potentially offensive content are  उपलब्धियाँ तभी  to registered users at least 18 years old .
In November 2006 , YouTube , LLC was bought by Google for US $ 1.65 billion , and operates  as a subsidiary of  Google .
Sister Act is a musical written by Cheri  steinkellner  and Bill Steinkellner with additional book material by Douglas Carter Beane , with lyrics by Glenn Slater and music by Alan Menken .
It is based on the hit 1992  फिल्मी  comedy of the same name .
The 2009 West End production was produced by Stage Entertainment , Whoopi   Goldberg , and Michael Reno for Sis Acts LLC .
Goldberg is also a producer of the 2011  ब्रॉडवे अनुकूलन  .
Microsoft DirectX is a collection of application programming interfaces (  api  ) for handling tasks related to multimedia , especially game programming and video , on Microsoft platforms .
Originally , the names of these  APIs all  began with Direct , such as Direct3D , DirectDraw , DirectMusic , DirectPlay , DirectSound , and so forth .
The name DirectX was  coined as आशुलिपि पद लिये सब of ये api ( the x खड़ा in लिये the particular api names ) और जल्द became the नाम of the संग्रहण .
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console , the X was used as the basis of the name Xbox to indicate that the console was based  on  DirectX technology .
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed for the Xbox such as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ) , while  the डाइरेक्टएक्स पैटर्न रै महरूम जारी लिये खिड़कियाँ api ऐसे as  Direct2D and DirectWrite .
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely used in the development of video games for Microsoft Windows , Microsoft Xbox ,  microsoft एक्सबॉक्स 360 और कुछ  Sega Dreamcast games .
direct3d is भी प्रयुक्त by अन्य तन्त्र अनुप्रयोग लिये कल्पना और ग्राफिक्स कार्य ऐसे as cad/cam अभियान्त्रिकी .
As Direct3D is the most widely publicized component of DirectX , it is common to see the names ``  डाइरेक्टएक्स ''  and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably .
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in redistributable binary form , along with accompanying documentation  और headers लिये उपयोग in कोडिंग  .
Originally ,  the runtimes  were only installed by games or explicitly by the user .
Windows 95 did not launch with DirectX , but DirectX was included with Windows 95 OEM  सेवा  Release 2 .
Windows 98 and Windows NT 4.0 both shipped with DirectX , as has every version of Windows  released चूंकि .
The SDK is  उपलब्धियाँ as  a free download .
While the runtimes are proprietary  ,  closed-source software , source code is provided for most of the SDK samples .
Starting with the release of Windows 8 Developer Preview , DirectX SDK has been  एकीकृत into खिड़कियाँ  SDK .
Direct3D 9Ex , Direct3D 10 , and Direct3D 11 are only available for  Windows Vista  and newer because each of these new versions was built to depend upon the new Windows Display Driver Model that was introduced for Windows Vista .
The new Vista/WDDM graphics architecture includes a new video memory manager supporting virtualization of graphics hardware for  विभिन्न अनुप्रयोग और सेवाएं जैसे the डेस्कटॉप  Window Manager .
quetzaltenango , भी commonly ज्ञात by इसके  indigenous name , Xelajú , or more commonly , Xela , is the second largest city of Guatemala .
It is both the capital of Quetzaltenango  विभाग  and the municipal seat of Quetzaltenango municipality .
It has an estimated  जनसांख्यिकी  of 224,703 .
The population is about 61  %  indigenous or Amerindian , 34 % Mestizo or ladino and 5 % European .
Quetzaltenango is located in a mountain valley at an elevation of 2,330 meters ( 7,655  ft ) ऊपर समुद्र स्तर at इसके न्यूनतम  part .
It may reach above 2,400  मीटर भीतर the नगर  .
The Municipality of  quetzaltenango  consists of an area of .
municipalities  abutting the municipality of Quetzaltenango include : Salcajá , Cantel , Almolonga , Zunil , El Palmar , Concepción Chiquirichapa , San Mateo , La Esperanza , Olintepeque , and San Andrés Xecul .
All  ये municipalities  are part of the Department of Quetzaltenango , except San Andrés Xecul which is a part of the Department of Totonicapán .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from Mesopotamia , is  amongst the earliest  surviving works of literature .
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five independent Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for  gilgamesh ) , किंग of uruk  .
Four of these were  प्रयुक्त as सोर्स  material for a combined epic in Akkadian .
इस  first combined epic , known as the `` Old Babylonian '' version , dates to the 18th century BC and is titled after its incipit , Shūtur eli sharrī ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only  a few  fragments of it have survived .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to the 10th centuries BC and bears the incipit  Sha  naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of approximately  दो तिहाई  of this longer , twelve-tablet version have been recovered .
Some of the best copies were discovered in the library  तबाह of  the 7th-century BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a friendship between Gilgamesh   and Enkidu .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods  as gilgamesh 's  equal to distract him from oppressing the people of Uruk .
Together , they journey to the  देवदार  Mountain to defeat Humbaba , its monstrous guardian .
Later they kill the Bull of Heaven  , जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा  Gilgamesh for spurning her advances .
As a punishment for  ये  actions , the gods sentence Enkidu to death .
The second half of the epic  focuses  on Gilgamesh 's distress at Enkidu 's death , and his quest for immortality .
In order to learn the secret of eternal life ,  gilgamesh undertakes  a long and perilous journey .
He learns that `` The  जीवन कि तुम  are seeking you will never find .
When the gods created man they allotted to him death ,  लकिन जीवन  they retained in their own keeping . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old Babylonian version of the epic , and then attributed to the immortal  बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim in the  Akkadian version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death , because of his great  भवन प्रोजेक्ट , और उसके  account of what Utnapishtim told him happened during the flood .
The story has been translated into many different languages , and Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works  of  popular fiction .
There are numerous debates over who created the first video game , with  the जवाब depending largely  on how video games are defined .
The evolution of video games represents a tangled web  of अनेक अलग उद्योग  , including scientific , computer , arcade , and consumer electronics .
The `` video '' in ``  वीडियो खेल `` traditionally  refers to a raster display device .
With the popular catch phrase  उपयोग of the पद  `` video game '' , the term now implies all display types , formats , and platforms .
Historians have also sought to bypass the issue by instead using the more  विशिष्ट `` डिजिटल खेल  '' descriptive .
This term leaves out the earlier  analog-based कंप्यूटर  games .
This is a list of best-selling video game  franchises कि have बेची  or shipped at least 5 million copies .
Unless otherwise stated , numbers indicate worldwide units  बेची , ordered alphabetically  whenever two or more list the same amount .
The exception are the   ones specifying shipments , which have lower precedence than others listing sales .
Franchise sales include expansion packs even  हालांकि वे हैं नहीं  considered full video games .
For best-selling individual video games , see List of best-selling  वीडियो खेल  .
The sales  आंकड़े दिए नीचे  do not include arcade game sales , which can be found at List of highest-grossing arcade video games .

This does not necessarily apply for  श्रेणी कि हैं नहीं  video game-based .
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards ( September  1 , 1933 – सितंबर 13 , 2006 ) थी  an American politician and the 45th Governor of Texas .
She first came to national attention as the state treasurer of Texas , when she delivered the  keynote पता  at the 1988 Democratic National Convention .
Richards served as the 45th Governor of Texas from  1991 to 1995 और थी पराजित  for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush .
Ann Richards   was the second female governor of Texas .
Data Execution Prevention ( DEP ) is a security feature included in modern operating   systems .
It is known to be available in Linux  , मैक os  X , iOS , Microsoft Windows and Android operating systems and is intended to prevent an application or service from executing code from a non-executable memory region .
This helps prevent certain exploits  कि स्टोर कोड via a बफ़र  overflow , for example .
DEP runs in two modes : hardware-enforced DEP for CPUs that can mark memory pages as nonexecutable , and software-enforced DEP with limited protection for CPUs that do  नहीं have हार्डवेयर  support .
Software-enforced DEP  करता नहीं protect  against execution of code in data pages , but instead counters SEH overwrite , another type of attack .
DEP was  introduced on लिनक्स in 2004 (  kernel 2.6.8 ) , on Windows in 2004 with Windows XP Service Pack 2 , while Apple introduced DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006 .
Example  उदाहरण  of two common futanari variants
, is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism ,  जिससे is भी प्रयुक्त in  a broader sense for androgyny .
Beyond Japan the term is used to describe a commonly pornographic genre of  कंप्यूटर खेल , कॉमिक्स और एनिमेशन , जिससे शामिल वर्ण  that show both primary sexual characteristics .
But  in आज 's भाषा it refers  almost exclusively for characters who have an overall feminine appearance .
In that case the term is also often abbreviated as futa ( s ) , which is occasionally also used as  पद लिये  the works itself .
Early CAPTCHAs such as these ,  उत्पन्न by the  EZ-Gimpy program , were used on Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA , rather than attempting to create a distorted background and high levels of warping on  the टेक्स्ट , might फ़ोकस on बनाना segmentation मुश्किल  by adding an angled line .
Another way to make  segmentation मुश्किल is to भीड प्रतीकों  together , as in Yahoo ! 's current CAPTCHA format .
Some CAPTCHAs try to utilize the ability of people to see  three-dimensional  objects .
On this  चित्र ,  symbols are drawn with lines of different thickness to make an effect of extrusion .
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in computing as an attempt to   ensure that the response is generated by a human being .
The process usually involves a computer asking a user to complete a  सरल परीक्षण जिससे the कंप्यूटर  is able to grade .
These tests are designed to be easy for a computer to generate but difficult for a computer to solve , but again easy for  a इंसान  .
If  a सही  solution is received , it can be presumed to have been entered by a human .
A common type of CAPTCHA requires the user to type letters and/or digits from a distorted image that appears on the   screen .
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites , since a normal human can easily read a CAPTCHA ,  जबकि  the bot can not process the image letters and therefore , can not answer properly , or at all .
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated , many of them have become difficult even for a human to read , so picture CAPTCHAs were created in which a human is shown a simple test to show a picture of a certain animal ( given few animal pictures ) , which is simple for a  इंसान होने to प्रक्रम , और इसलिए आसान to चुनें , जबकि a bot can नहीं प्रक्रम और  solve the question because although it can analyze the picture , it can not easily guess the animal .
The term `` CAPTCHA ''   was coined in 2000 by Luis von Ahn , Manuel Blum , Nicholas J. Hopper , and John Langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ) .
It is an acronym based on the word `` capture '' and standing for `` Completely  स्वचालित  Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart '' .
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the term on 15 October 2004 , but the trademark application was  abandoned on  21 April 2008 .
A CAPTCHA is sometimes described as a reverse Turing  परीक्षण , क्युकी it is administered by a  machine and targeted at a human , in contrast to the standard Turing test that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine .
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer , explorer , conservationist , filmmaker , innovator , scientist  ,  photographer , author and researcher who studied the sea and all forms of life in water .
He co-developed   the Aqua-Lung , pioneered marine conservation and was a member of the Académie française .
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville , Kentucky ,  संयुक्त राज्य , जिससे specializes in fried  chicken .
An `` American icon '' , it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain overall ( as measured by sales  ) बाद मैकडोनाल्ड 's , साथ over  18,000 outlets in 120 countries and territories .
The company is a subsidiary  of यम  !
ब्रांड्स , a  restaurant company which also owns Pizza Hut and Taco Bell .
KFC was founded by  harland सैंडर्स , जो began selling fried मुर्गा  from his roadside restaurant in Corbin , Kentucky during the Great Depression .
Sanders was one of the first people to see the potential of the restaurant franchising concept , with the first `` Kentucky Fried Chicken ''  मताधिकार खोलने  in Utah in 1952 .
The franchise popularized chicken in the fast food industry , thereby diversifying the  मार्केट और चुनौतीपूर्ण the दबदबा  of the hamburger .
Marketing himself as `` Colonel Sanders '' , he became a  legendary फिगर of अमरीकी  cultural history , and his image is still prominently used in KFC branding .
The company 's rapid expansion saw it grow too large for Sanders  to मैनेज , और in 1964 he बेची the कम्पनी  to a group of investors led by John Y . Brown , Jr. and Jack Massey .
KFC was one of the first fast food chains to expand internationally , opening outlets  in इंग्लैण्ड , मैक्सिको  and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s .
Throughout the 1970s and 1980s , KFC experienced mixed fortunes domestically , as it  गई through a श्रेणी  of corporate owners who had little or no experience in the restaurant business .
In the early 1970s , KFC was sold to the spirits firm Heublein , who were taken over by the R.J. Reynolds food and  तम्बाकू संगुटिका , जो  sold the chain to PepsiCo .
The chain continued to expand overseas however , and in 1987 KFC became the   first Western restaurant chain to open in China .
the कड़ी रै चूंकि विस्तारित rapidly in चीन , और the देश is अभी the कम्पनी 's सबसे लाभप्रद  market .
PepsiCo spun off its restaurants division as Tricon Global Restaurants , which  बाद बदला इसके नाम  to Yum !
ब्रांड्स  .
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces and variations such as chicken sandwiches and  wraps , सलाद और पक्ष बर्तन ऐसे  as French fries and coleslaw , desserts and soft drinks , often supplied by PepsiCo .
Its most famous  उत्पाद is दबाव  fried chicken pieces , seasoned with Sanders ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices .
The exact nature of these ingredients is unknown , and represents a notable trade  रहस्य  .
Larger portions of fried chicken are served in a distinctive cardboard `` bucket '' , which has become a signature  of  the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman .
KFC is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin ' good '' , which has since been replaced by ``  nobody करता मुर्गा जैसे केएफसी ''  and `` So good '' .
Cnidaria ( with a silent c ) or Coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 species  of  animals found exclusively in aquatic and mostly marine environments .
Their distinguishing feature is cnidocytes , specialized cells that they use mainly  लिये capturing  prey .
Their bodies consist of mesoglea , a non-living jelly-like substance , sandwiched between two  परतों of epithelium कि  are mostly one cell thick .
वे have दो  basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps , both of which are radially symmetrical with mouths surrounded by tentacles that bear cnidocytes .
दोनो फ़ॉर्म have a सिंगल orifice और देह गुहा कि हैं प्रयुक्त लिये पाचन और श्वसन .
Many cnidarian  प्रजाति  produce colonies that are single organisms composed of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids , or both .
Cnidarians ' activities are coordinated by a decentralized nerve net and  सरल receptors  .
Several  free-swimming cubozoa और scyphozoa  possess balance-sensing statocysts , and some have simple eyes .
Not  सब cnidarians  reproduce sexually .
Many have complex lifecycles with asexual polyp stages and sexual medusae  , लकिन कुछ omit either the polyp or the  medusa stage .
cnidarians यहूद लिये a long  time grouped with Ctenophores in the phylum Coelenterata , but increasing awareness of their differences caused them to be placed in separate phyla .
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones , corals , sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( box jellies ) ; and  hydrozoa , a विविध समूह कि शामिल सब the freshwater  cnidarians as well as many marine forms , and has both sessile members such as Hydra and colonial swimmers such as the Portuguese Man o ' War .
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right rather than a sub-group of  scyphozoa , और वहीँ is बहस परिचय whether myxozoa और polypodiozoa  are cnidarians or closer to bilaterians ( more complex animals ) .
सबसे cnidarians शिकार on जीवों ranging in आकार इससे प्लवक to पशु अनेक टाइम्स larger than themselves , लकिन अनेक obtain much of उनके पोषण इससे endosymbiotic शैवाल , और a few हैं  parasites .
अनेक हैं preyed upon by अन्य पशु सहित starfish , समुद्र slugs , मछली और टर्टल्स .
Coral reefs , whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic algae , support some of the world 's most productive ecosystems  , और protect वनस्पति in tidal  zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides .
While corals are almost entirely restricted to warm , shallow marine waters , other cnidarians live in the depths  , in ध्रुवीय समंदर और in freshwater  .
Fossil  cnidarians have  been found in rocks formed about , and other fossils show that corals may have been present shortly before and diversified a few million years later .
Fossils of  cnidarians कि do  not build mineralized structures are very rare .
Scientists currently think that cnidarians , ctenophores and bilaterians are more closely related to calcareous  sponges  than these are to other sponges , and that anthozoans are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians , and the most closely related to bilaterians .
Recent analyses have concluded that cnidarians ,  हालांकि माना  more `` primitive '' than bilaterians , have a wider range of genes .
The Aztec  पिरामिड  at St. Cecilia Acatitlan , Mexico State .
Aztec jade mask depicting the god  xipe totec  .
Large ceramic statue  of an  Aztec Eagle Warrior
Aztec cosmogram in the pre-Hispanic Codex Fejérváry-Mayer - the fire god Xiuhtecuhtli is in the  बीच  .
The Aztec people were certain ethnic groups of central Mexico , particularly those groups who spoke the Nahuatl language and who dominated large parts of  मेसोअमेरिका  from the 14th to 16th centuries .
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and aztecah ( plural ) mean `` people from Aztlan `` , a mythological place for the Nahuatl-speaking culture of the time , and later adopted as the word to define the  mexica  people .
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers   exclusively to the Mexica people of Tenochtitlan ( now the location of Mexico City ) , situated on an island in Lake Texcoco , who referred to themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica .
Sometimes the term also includes the inhabitants of  tenochtitlan 's दो प्रिंसिपल अलाइड city-states ,  the Acolhuas of Texcoco and the Tepanecs of Tlacopan , who together with the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is often known as `` the Aztec Empire '' .
In other contexts , Aztec may refer to all the various city  राज्य और उनके peoples , जो साझा विशाल भाग of उनके जातीय  history and cultural traits with the Mexica , Acolhua and Tepanecs , and who often also used the Nahuatl language as a lingua franca .
In this meaning it is possible to talk about an Aztec civilization including all the particular cultural patterns common for most of the  peoples inhabiting सेंट्रल  Mexico in the late postclassic period .
From the 13th century , the Valley of Mexico was the heart of Aztec civilization : here the capital of the Aztec Triple  गठबंधन  , the city of Tenochtitlan , was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco .
The Triple Alliance formed a tributary empire expanding its political hegemony  दूर  beyond the Valley of Mexico , conquering other city states throughout Mesoamerica .
At its pinnacle , Aztec culture had rich and  जटिल  mythological and religious traditions , as well as reaching remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments .
In 1521 Hernán Cortés , along with a large number of Nahuatl speaking indigenous allies ,  conquered tenochtitlan और पराजित the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन  under the leadership of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II .
Subsequently the Spanish founded the new settlement of Mexico City on the site of the ruined Aztec capital , from where they proceeded  साथ the प्रक्रम of colonizing सेंट्रल  America .
Aztec culture and history is primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo Mayor in Mexico City ; from indigenous bark paper codices ; from eyewitness accounts by Spanish  conquistadors ऐसे as hernán cortés और बर्नल  Díaz del Castillo ; and especially from 16th and 17th century descriptions of Aztec culture and history written by Spanish clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language , such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants .
Anderson Hays Cooper ( born June 3 , 1967 )  is an अमरीकी  journalist , author , and television personality .
He is the primary anchor of  the सीएनएन न्यूज  show Anderson Cooper 360° .
The  कार्यक्रम  is normally broadcast live from a New York City studio ; however , Cooper often broadcasts live on location for breaking news stories .
As of September 2011 , he also serves as host of his own eponymous syndicated daytime  बात दिखाएँ , एंडरसन सजीव , जिससे होगा  be cancelled at the end of the second season .
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped curve ) where each band has a width of 1 standard  विचलन – देखिए भी : 68-95-99.7  rule
Cumulative probability of a normal distribution with expected  मान 0 और मानक विचलन  1 .
In  आंकडे और संभाव्यता  theory , standard deviation ( represented by the symbol sigma , σ ) shows how much variation or dispersion exists from the average ( mean ) , or expected value .
A low standard deviation indicates that the data  अंक tend to be  very close to the mean ; high standard deviation indicates that the data points are spread out over a large range of values .
The standard deviation of a random variable , statistical population  , आंकड़ा  set , or probability distribution is the square root of its variance .
It is algebraically simpler though practically less robust than  the औसत निरपेक्ष विचलन  .
A useful property of standard deviation is that , unlike  variance , it is expressed in the  same units as the data .
Note , however , that for  माप  with percentage as unit , the standard deviation will have percentage points as unit .
In addition to expressing the variability of a population , standard deviation is commonly used to measure  विश्वास in सांख्यिकीय  conclusions .
For example , the margin of error in polling data is determined by  calculating the अपेक्षित  standard deviation in the results if the same poll were to be conducted multiple times .
The reported margin of error is typically about twice the standard deviation ­– the radius of a   95 percent confidence interval .
In science , researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data , and only effects  कि पतन दूर बाहर the दायरा of मानक विचलन हैं माना statistically  significant – normal random error or variation in the measurements is in this way distinguished from causal variation .
Standard deviation is also important in finance , where the standard deviation on the rate of  वापसी on an निवेश  is a measure of the volatility of the investment .
When only a  नमूना of आंकड़ा इससे a जनसांख्यिकी  is available , the standard deviation of the population can be estimated by a modified quantity called the `` sample standard deviation '' .
जब the  sample is the entire population , its unmodified standard deviation is called the `` population standard deviation '' .
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) (  ullucus tuberosus )  is a plant grown primarily as a root vegetable , secondarily as a leaf vegetable .
The ulluco is one of the most widely grown and economically important root crops in the Andean  प्रदेश of दक्षिण अमेरिका  , second only to the potato .
It is  ज्ञात वहीँ साथ the आम नाम of पापा  lisa , but also by the regional names melloco ( Ecuador ) , olluco ( Peru ) , chugua ( Colombia ) or ruba ( Venezuela ) , among others .
The leaf and the tuber are edible , similar to spinach and the  आलू  , respectively .
They are known to contain high levels of protein , calcium , and  केरोटीन  .
Papalisa were used by the Incas  prior  to arrival of Europeans in South America .
ulluco tubers हैं marketed as `` धरती रत्नों '' in नई जीलैंड , by halfords exotic उपज .
Ulluco tubers in New  जीलैंड
An April 24 ,  1851 पोस्टर चेतावनी the  `` colored people of Boston '' about policemen acting as slave catchers .
The Fugitive Slave Law or Fugitive Slave Act was passed by the United States  कॉंग्रेस on सितंबर 18 , 1850 , as  part of the Compromise of 1850 between Southern slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers .
This was one of the most controversial acts of the 1850 compromise and  heightened उत्तरी  fears of a `` slave power conspiracy '' .
It declared  कि सब runaway स्लेव यहूद  , upon capture , to be returned to their masters .
Abolitionists nicknamed it the   `` Bloodhound Law '' for the dogs that were used to track down runaway slaves .

He is a  सदस्य of  the Democratic Party .
