Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity of the North American continent , with the international boundary with Canada to the east , the Arctic  समंदर to the उत्तर , और the प्रशांत  Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest state in the United States by area , the 4th least populous and the  तनिक densely आबादी of the 50 संयुक्त  States .
Approximately half of Alaska 's 731,449 residents  सजीव  within the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil , natural gas , and fishing  उद्योग ; it रै  these resources in abundance .
Alaska was  खरीदा इससे रूस on कूच 30 , 1867  , for $ 7.2 million ( $ adjusted for inflation ) at approximately two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through  अनेक प्रशासनिक  changes before becoming an organized ( or incorporated ) territory on May 11 , 1912 , and the 49th state of the U.S. on January 3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the  रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल , जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और  is derived from the Aleut alaxsxaq , meaning `` the mainland '' or , more literally , `` the object towards which the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the `` great  जमीन '' ,  an Aleut word derived from the same root .
Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ( NMMU )  is a दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी  tertiary education institution with its main administration in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth .
A merging of three institutions founded NMMU in January 2005  लकिन इसके  history dates back to 1882 with the foundation of Port Elizabeth Art School .
the  University draws international students from all over the world .
There are over 3000 international students and include students from the United States , France , China , Germany , Belgium , Denmark ,  फिनलैंड , नीदरलैंड्स , नार्वे , स्वीडन ,  United Kingdom and many other countries .
NMMU is a comprehensive university offering professional  और वोकेशनल  training .
The University has six campuses - five in Port Elizabeth  और एक  in George .
the प्रमुख कैम्पस  is the South Campus .
Students at NMMU can study towards diplomas and degrees  up to और  including doctoral level qualifications .
A number of courses include workplace   experience as part of the curriculum .
CoverGirl is an American cosmetics brand founded in Maryland , by the Noxzema Chemical Company ( later called Noxell ) and  acquired  by Procter & Gamble in 1989 .
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line by allowing `` cover girls  '' , फ़ैशन मॉडल जो  appear on the front cover of women 's magazines , to wear its products .
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct individual customer  सेवा by providing a चौड़ी किस्में  of cosmetics available at reasonable prices .
On the Origin of Species , published on 24 November 1859 , is a work of  वैज्ञानिक साहित्य by चार्ल्स  Darwin which is considered to be the foundation of evolutionary biology .
Its full title was On the Origin of Species  by अर्थात् of प्राकृतिक चयन  , or the Preservation of Favoured Races in the Struggle for Life .
लिये the छठे संस्करण of 1872 , the छोटी शीर्षक थी बदला to the उत्पत्ति of प्रजाति  .
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory that  populations evolve over the कोर्स of पीढियां  through a process of natural selection .
It presented a body of evidence that the diversity of life  arose by  common descent through a branching pattern of evolution .
Darwin included evidence that he had gathered on the Beagle expedition in the 1830s  और उसके subsequent निष्कर्षों  from research , correspondence , and experimentation .
विभिन्न विकासवादी  ideas had already been proposed to explain new findings in biology .
There was growing support for such ideas among dissident anatomists  and the general  public , but during the first half of the 19th century the English scientific establishment was closely tied to the Church of England , while science was part of natural theology .
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted with the beliefs that  प्रजाति यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed  hierarchy and that humans were unique , unrelated to other animals .
The  राजनैतिक और theological  implications were intensely debated , but transmutation was not accepted by the scientific mainstream .
The book was written for non-specialist readers and  आकर्षित फैली ब्याज  upon its publication .
As Darwin was an eminent scientist , his findings were taken seriously and the evidence he   presented generated scientific , philosophical , and religious discussion .
The debate over the book contributed to the campaign by T.H . Huxley and his fellow  members of the X  Club to secularise science by promoting scientific naturalism .
Within two decades there was widespread scientific  अनुबंध कि एवोल्यूशन , साथ a branching पैटर्न of  common descent , had occurred , but scientists were slow to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate .
During the `` eclipse of Darwinism `` from  the 1880s  to the 1930s , various other mechanisms of evolution were given more credit .
With the development of the modern evolutionary synthesis in the 1930s and 1940s , Darwin 's concept of evolutionary adaptation through natural selection became central to modern evolutionary   theory , now the unifying concept of the life sciences .
Charles Dillon `` Casey '' Stengel ( ; July 30 , 1890 – September 29 , 1975 ) , nicknamed ``  the बूढ़ा perfessor  '' , was an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager .
He was elected to the  बेसबॉल  Hall of Fame in .
Stengel was born in Kansas City , Missouri , and originally nicknamed `` Dutch '' , a common nickname at that time  लिये अमेरिकी of जर्मनी ancestry  .
After his major league career began , he acquired  the उपनाम `` केसी '' , जिससे originally  came from the initials of his hometown ( `` K. C. '' ) , which evolved into `` Casey '' , influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat .
In the 1950s , sportswriters dubbed him with yet another nickname , `` The Old Professor '' ( or `` Perfessor '' ) , for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on  anything बेसबॉल  -related .
Although his baseball career spanned a number of teams and cities , he is  primarily संबद्ध  with clubs in New York City .
Between playing and managing , he is the only man  to have  worn four of New York 's major league clubs ' uniforms .
He was the  पहला of चार मेन ( through  the season ) to manage both the New York Yankees and New York Mets ; Yogi Berra , Dallas Green , and Joe Torre are the others .
Like Torre , he also managed the Braves and  the  Dodgers .
He ended his baseball career as the beloved  मैनेजर लिये the  then expansion New York Mets , which won over the hearts of New York partly due to the unique character of their veteran leader .
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the Julian and Gregorian calendars and one of the four months  साथ a लंबाई of 30 दिनों  .
Ovid provides two etymologies for June 's name in his poem concerning the months entitled  the fasti  .
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno , wife of Jupiter and equivalent to the Greek goddess Hera ; the second is that the name comes from the Latin word iuniores , meaning `` younger ones , '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding  माह may may be नामित ( fasti vi.1–88 )  .
See : Months in various calendars also called the season of the June is the month with the  longest daylight घंटों of  the year in the Northern Hemisphere and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere .
June in the Northern  गोलार्ध is the मौसमी  equivalent to December in the Southern Hemisphere and vice versa .
In the Northern hemisphere , the beginning of the meteorological summer is  1 जून  .
In the Southern hemisphere , the  शुरूआत of  the meteorological winter is 1 June .
At the start of June , the sun rises in the constellation of Taurus ; at the end of June , the sun rises  in the नक्षत्र of मिथुन  .
However , due to the precession of  the equinoxes  , June begins with the sun in the astrological sign of Gemini , and ends with the sun in the astrological sign of Cancer .
June is known for the large number of marriages   that occur over the course of the month .
According to one etymology , June is  नामित बाद juno (  Hera ) .
Juno was the goddess of marriage and a married couple 's household , so some  consider it शुभ लक  to be married in this month .
According to another etymology provided by the Roman poet Ovid , June is named for the iuniores , latin for `` young people '' ( Fasti   VI.88 ) and that the month of May is named for the maiores , Latin for `` elders '' .
In Iceland  , लोकगीत says कि if तुम bathe  naked in the morning dew on the morning of June 24 , you are supposed to keep aging at bay for longer .
A constitution is a set  of आधारभूत  principles or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is governed .
These rules together make up  , i.e . constitute  , what the entity is .
जब ये सिद्धान्त हैं लिखा bas into a सिंगल दस्तावेज़ or नियत of विधिक दस्तावेज़ , those दस्तावेज़ may be कहा to embody a लिखा संविधान ; if वे हैं लिखा bas in a सिंगल व्यापक दस्तावेज़ , it is कहा to embody a संहिताबद्ध संविधान .
Constitutions concern different levels of  संगठन  , from sovereign states to companies and unincorporated associations .
A treaty which establishes an international organization is  भी इसके संविधान , in कि it  would define how that organization is constituted .
Within states , whether sovereign or federated , a constitution defines the principles upon which the state is based , the  कार्यविधि in  which laws are made and by whom .
Some constitutions , especially codified constitutions , also act as limiters of state power , by establishing lines which a state  's शासकों can नहीं क्रॉस , ऐसे  as fundamental rights .
George Washington  at संवैधानिक  Convention of 1787 , signing of U.S. Constitution .
The Constitution of India is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world , containing 448 articles , 12 schedules and 100 amendments , with 117,369 words in its English language version , while  the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is the shortest लिखा संविधान ,  at 7 articles and 27 amendments .
Ron Diftler ( left ) , NASA Robonaut manager assisting in a Robonaut familiarization training session in the Space  पर्यावरण सिमुलेशन  Laboratory at NASA 's Johnson Space Center .
Engineering management is a  specialized रूप of प्रबन्धन कि  is concerned with the application of engineering principles to business practice .
Engineering  प्रबन्धन is a करियर कि brings साथ the technological  problem-solving savvy of engineering and the organizational , administrative , and planning abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion .
उदाहरण क्षेत्रों of अभियान्त्रिकी हैं उत्पाद विकास , निर्माण , निर्माण , डिज़ाइन अभियान्त्रिकी , औद्योगिक अभियान्त्रिकी , प्रौद्योगिकी , उत्पादन , or कोई अन्य फ़ील्ड कि employs कर्मियों जो perform an अभियान्त्रिकी फलन  .
कामयाब अभियान्त्रिकी  managers typically require training and experience in business and engineering .
Technically inept managers tend to be deprived of support by their  तकनीकी टोली , और non-commercial प्रबंधक tend  to lack commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy .
Largely , engineering  प्रबंधक मैनेज इंजीनियर्स जो हैं चलित  by non-entrepreneurial thinking , thus require the necessary people skills to coach , mentor and motivate technical professionals .
Engineering professionals joining  निर्माण कंपनियाँ  sometimes become engineering managers by default after a period of time .
They are required to learn how to manage once they are on the job , though this is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial  abilities  .
In an insurance policy , the deductible is the amount of expenses that must be paid out of  जेब पहले  an insurer will pay any expenses .
In general usage , the term deductible may be used to describe one of several types of clauses ( see below ) that are used by insurance   companies as a threshold for policy payments .
Deductibles are typically used to  deter  the large number of trivial claims that a consumer can be reasonably expected to bear the cost of .
By restricting its coverage to events that are significant enough to incur large costs , the insurance firm expects to pay out slightly smaller amounts much less  अक्सर , रूष्ट  much higher savings .
As a result , insurance premiums are typically cheaper  जब वे  involve higher deductibles .
Deductibles are normally provided  as clauses in an बीमे नीति  that dictate how much of an insurance-covered expense is borne by the policyholder .
They are normally quoted as a fixed quantity and is a  भाग  of most policies covering losses to the policy holder .
The insurer then becomes liable for  claimable खर्च कि  exceed this amount ( subject to the maximum sum claimable indicated in the contract ) .
Depending on the policy , the deductible may apply per  covered घटना  , or per year .
For policies where incidences are not easy to  delimit ( लिये उदाहरण  health insurance ) , the deductible is typically applied per year .
Several deductibles can be set by the insurer based  on the कारण  of the claim .
For example , a single housing insurance  नीति may contain अनेक deductible  amounts for loss or damage arising from theft , fire , natural calamities , evacuation etc .
वहीँ हैं भी deductible reimbursement  programs that reimburse a deductible in the event of an auto , home , boat/yacht or health insurance claim .
An invoice or bill is a commercial document issued by  a विक्रेता to a खरीदार , indicating  the products , quantities , and agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer .
An invoice indicates the sale  लेनदेन  only .
Payment terms  हैं  independent of the invoice and are negotiated by the buyer and the seller .
Payment  शर्तें  are usually included on the invoice .
The buyer  could have  already paid for the products or services listed on the invoice .
खरीदार can भी have a  maximum number of days in which to pay for these goods and is sometimes offered a discount if paid before the due date .
In the rental industry , an invoice must include a specific reference to the duration of the time being billed , so in addition to  मात्रा , दाम और छूट the  invoicing amount is also based on duration .
Generally each line of a rental  चालान होगा refer to the वास्तविक  hours , days , weeks , months , etc. , being billed .
From the point of view  of a विक्रेता  , an invoice is a sales invoice .
From the point of view of a buyer ,  an चालान  is a purchase invoice .
The document indicates  the खरीदार और विक्रेता  , but the term invoice indicates money is owed or owing .
In  अंग्रेज़ी ,  the context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify its meaning , such as `` We sent them an invoice '' ( they owe us money ) or `` We received an invoice from them '' ( we owe them money ) .
The right main bronchus ( or right primary bronchus , or right principal bronchus ) is a  bronchus  of the respiratory system .
It is wider , shorter , and more  लंबवत  in direction than the left .
It is  परिचय 2.5 cm long , और  enters the right lung nearly opposite the fifth thoracic vertebra .
The azygos vein  arches over it इससे पीछे ; और  the right pulmonary artery lies at first below and then in front of it .
About 2 cm from its commencement it gives off a branch to  the अपर पालि of  the right lung .
This is termed the  eparterial शाखा of the bronchus  , because it arises above the right pulmonary artery .
The bronchus now passes below the artery , and is known as the hyparterial branch ; it divides into two branches for  the मध्य और निम्नतर निर्मोक  .
if a विदेशी देह in the airway गुजरता  through the trachea , it will most likely enter the right main bronchus instead of the left , due to the straighter alignment of the right bronchus to the trachea .
Squash is a racquet sport played by two ( singles ) or four players ( doubles ) in a four-walled  अदालत साथ a छोटी , खोखला  rubber ball .
The players must alternate in striking the ball with their racquet and hit the ball onto the  playable सतहों of  the four walls of the court .
The game was formerly called squash racquets , a reference to the `` squashable '' soft ball used in the   game ( compared with the fatter ball used in its parent game racquets or rackets ) .
स्क्वैश is पहचाना  by the IOC and supporters are lobbying for its incorporation in a future Olympic program .
In  2003  , Forbes rated squash as the number one healthiest sport to play .
Residual oil is oil found in low concentrations naturally or   in exhausted oil fields .
Often mixed  साथ जल ,  it can not be recovered by conventional techniques .
However , it can be recovered using carbon dioxide-enhanced oil recovery ( CO2 EOR ) which involves injecting  कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड  into the well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil .
The technique is not new but has not been used extensively on residual oil zones , low-grade deposits of petroleum such as the 38 square miles in the Permian  जलाशय of टेक्सास leased by elliott रूज़वेल्ट  Jr .
The technique is limited by availability of  कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड  .
It does not result in sequestration  of the कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड  but the gas is recycled as much as possible .
United States reserves of residual oil are estimated to be   100 billion barrels .
Artist 's rendering of the fire , by John R. Chapin , originally printed in Harper 's Weekly ; the view faces northeast   across the Randolph Street Bridge .
The Great Chicago Fire  थी a conflagration कि burned इससे संडे , अक्तूबर 8 , to  early Tuesday , October 10 , 1871 , killing hundreds and destroying about in Chicago , Illinois .
Though the fire was one of the largest U.S. disasters of the 19th century , the rebuilding that began helped develop Chicago as one of the most populous and economically  महत्वपूर्ण अमरीकी  cities .
Henry VIII ( 28 June 1491 – 28  जनवरी 1547 )  was king of England from 21 April 1509 until his death .
He was lord , and later king  , of आयरलैंड , as खूब as continuing  the nominal claim by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France .
Henry was the second monarch of  the ट्यूडर राजवंश , succeeding  his father , Henry VII .
Besides his six marriages , Henry VIII is known for his role in the separation of the Church  of इंग्लैण्ड इससे the रोमन कैथोलिक  Church .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of  the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे  papal authority , the Dissolution of the Monasteries , and his own establishment as the Supreme Head of the Church of England .
Yet he remained a believer in core Catholic theological teachings , even after his  excommunication इससे the रोमन  Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the legal union of  इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ the  Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542 .
In 1513 , the new king allied with   the Holy Roman Emperor , Maximillian I , and invaded France in 1513 with a large , well-equipped army , but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
Maximillian , for his part , used the English invasion to  उसके अपना ends  , and this prejudiced England 's ability to defeat the French .
This foray would prove the start of an obsession for Henry , who  invaded again in 1544  .
This time , Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne , but again the Holy  रोमन सम्राट , चार्ल्स  V , supported Henry only as long as he needed to and England , strained by the enormous cost of the war , ransomed the city back for peace .
His  contemporaries माना  Henry in his prime to be an attractive , educated and accomplished king , and he has been described as `` one of the most charismatic rulers to sit on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling  साथ निरपेक्ष  power , he also engaged himself as an author and composer .
His desire to provide England with a male heir – which stemmed partly from personal vanity and partly because he believed a daughter would be unable to consolidate the Tudor dynasty and the fragile peace that existed following the Wars of the Roses  – led to the दो बाते लिये जिससे हेनरी is सबसे remembered : उसके छह विवाह और the  English Reformation .
Henry became  रुग्ण मोटे  and his health suffered , contributing to his death in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised in his later life as a lustful , egotistical , harsh  , और असुरक्षित  king .
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela produced by the United  राज्य टेलीविज़न संजाल telemundo  , in conjunction with the Antena 3 network and RTI Producciones .
Based on a novel of the same name by Spanish author Arturo Pérez-Reverte , the drama depicts the rise of Teresa Mendoza ( Kate del Castillo ) , a young woman from  मैक्सिको जो becomes the  most powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain .
Patricio Wills , the president of Telemundo Television Studios , was  the कार्यपालिका  producer .
Though La Reina del Sur was  मनोनीत लिये novela  of the Year , Favorite Lead Actress , and Best Bad Luck Video , it won no awards .
साथ a $ 10 लाख बजट  , La Reina del Sur was the most expensive telenovela ever produced by Telemundo .
The program 's  प्रीमियर on फ़रवरी 28  , 2011 , was the network 's highest rated premiere for a telenovela to date .
The  कार्यक्रम अक्सर वर्चस्व  its time slot , even over English language programming on other major U.S. networks .
La Reina del Sur completed its 63 episode run on Telemundo and its 13 episode run on Antena 3  simultaneously on may 30 ,  2011 .
The final episode was the highest rated broadcast in Telemundo 's 19-year history ( 4.2 million  दर्शक ) , और ताल सब of the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा u.S. टेलीविज़न  networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic .
The program 's   success spurred Telemundo to launch its first campaign to gain the series an Emmy Award nomination .
A one-night special featuring  अनेक डाल सदस्यों aired  on May 31 , 2011 , and marked the Telemundo debut of noted Latina television personality Cristina Saralegui .
La Reina del Sur is broadcast in several  अन्य बाज़ार , सहित सर्बिया , कोलंबिया , चिली , साइप्रस  , Nicaragua , Costa Rica , Mexico , Albania , Hungary , Slovenia , Croatia , Romania , ( among others ) .
An  उदाहरण  of rack mounted servers
A web  होस्टिंग सेवा  is a type of Internet hosting service that allows individuals and organizations to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or leased for use by clients ,  as खूब as providing  Internet connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet for other servers   located in their data center , called colocation , also known as Housing in Latin America or France .
The scope   of web hosting services varies greatly .
The most basic is web  पेज और small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग , जहाँ फाइलें  can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The files are usually  वितरित to  the Web `` as is '' or with minimal processing .
Many Internet service providers (  isps ) प्रस्ताव इस सेवा  free to subscribers .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web  पेज होस्टिंग इससे वैकल्पिक  service providers .
Personal web site hosting is  typically  free , advertisement-sponsored , or inexpensive .
Business web site hosting often has a higher expense depending upon the size  और प्रकार of the  website .
Single page hosting is generally sufficient  लिये निजी  web pages .
A complex site calls for a more  व्यापक पैकेज  that provides database support and application development platforms ( e.g . PHP , Java , Ruby on Rails , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow customers to write or install scripts for applications like  forums और  content management .
Also , Secure Sockets Layer ( SSL ) is typically  प्रयुक्त लिये  e-commerce .
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the Web server and installing scripts , as  खूब  as other modules and service applications like e-mail .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g . e-commerce ) , which  हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger कंपनियाँ कि outsource  network infrastructure .
Madden NFL ( known as John Madden  फ़ुटबॉल  before 1993 ) is an American football video game series developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports .
The game series is named after Pro Football Hall of Famer John Madden , a well-known  पूर्व सुपर कटोरी  –winning coach of the Oakland Raiders and color commentator .
the श्रेणी  is the best selling EA Sports series .
The games have consistently been a best  विक्रेता , और  has even spawned TV shows where players compete .
Among the game 's realistic features include  sophisticated playbooks और खिलाड़ी आंकडे , और  voice commentary that allows players to hear the game as if it were a real TV broadcast .
The Madden NFL series has been nicknamed the NFL 's 33rd  मताधिकार  .
The series was originally conceived by Electronic Arts founder Trip Hawkins , who then approached Madden  in 1984 लिये उसके समर्थन और विशेषज्ञता  .
Due to Madden 's insistence that the game be as realistic as possible , the first  संस्करण of जॉन मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल  was not released until 1988 .
The second version of the game was released in  1990 , साथ सालाना  versions since then .
The series ' name was changed to Madden NFL in  1993 बाद  EA acquired the rights to use NFL teams and players .
Despite Madden 's retirement as a broadcaster in 2009 , he continues to lend his name and  provide विशेषज्ञता लिये the  game .
सिंडी ली मिलर  Sheehan ( born July 10 , 1957 ) is an American antiwar activist whose son , U.S. Army Specialist Casey Sheehan , was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War .
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended antiwar protest at a makeshift camp outside President George W. Bush 's Texas ranch  —a स्टैंड कि खींचा  both passionate support and angry criticism .
Sheehan ran unsuccessfully  लिये कॉंग्रेस  in 2008 .
She is a vocal critic of President  बराक ओबामा  's foreign policy .
Her memoir , Peace Mom : A Mother 's Journey Through  heartache to सक्रियता  , was published in 2006 .
Sheehan was the 2012 vice-presidential nominee of  the सलाम और स्वतंत्रता  Party .
Wyclef  jeanelle जां ( ; ; born  October 17 , 1969 ) Wyclef Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME , Aug 21 , 2010 .
``  पहले he घोषित  on August 5 that he was running for President of Haiti , Wyclef Jean was still listing his age as only 37 years old .
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate , the Haitian-American-Irish hip-hop star also decided to come clean and confirm that he was really  40 .  '' is a three-time Grammy Award -winning Haitian-American rapper , singer-songwriter , musician , record producer , and politician .
At  आयु नौ , जां स्थानांतरित to the  United States with his family and has spent much of his life in the country .
He first received fame as a member of the  acclaimed  New Jersey hip hop group the Fugees .
On August 5 , 2010 , Jean filed for candidacy in the 2010 Haitian presidential election , although the Electoral Commission subsequently  ruled him  ineligible to stand as he had not met the requirement to have been resident in Haiti for five years .
Wyclef Jean to appeal against Haiti  चुनाव सत्ताधारी – बीबीसी  News , Aug 22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr Jean was ineligible to stand as  the haitian संविधान requires  candidates to have lived in the country for five years prior to an election .
The  40-year-old  singer lives in the US .
Jean 's efforts at earthquake relief , highly publicized in 2010 throughout Haiti and the United States  , यहूद channeled through उसके charitable  organization , Yéle Haiti .
The charity , which performed a variety of charitable works in Haiti between 2005 and 2010 ,  effectively  closed in 2012 .
In law , a set-off is a statutory defense to the  पूरे or  to a portion of a plaintiff 's claim .
It had no  अस्तित्व अंतर्गत the अंग्रेज़ी आम विधि  , being created by 2 Geo . II c. 22 for the relief of insolvent debtors , although set-off was recognized in equity .
Such a defense could be pleaded only in respect of mutual debts of a definite character  , और  did not apply to cases in which damages were claimed , nor to equitable claims or demands .
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX . r. 3 ) a defendant in an action may set off or set up any  right  or claim by way of counterclaim against the claims of a plaintiff , and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action .
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally introduced to prevent the unfair situation whereby a person ( `` Party A '' ) who owed money to another ( ``  पार्टी b '' ) could be  sent to debtors prison , despite the fact that Party B also owed money to Party A .
The  विधि यूँ  allows both parties to defer payment until their respective claims have been heard in court .
Upon judgment , both claims are extinguished  and replaced by a  single net sum owing ( e.g . If Party A owes Party B 100 and Party B owes Party A 105 , the two sums are set off and replaced with a single obligation of 5 from Party B to Party A ) .
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual agreement so  कि , जहाँ a पार्टी मूलभूत , the  mutual amounts owing are automatically set off and extinguished .
In certain  jurisdictions ( सहित the uk  ) , set-off takes place automatically upon the insolvency of a company .
इस अर्थात् कि , लिये प्रत्येक पार्टी जिससे is दोनो a  creditor and debtor of the insolvent company , mutual debts are set-off against each other , and then either the bankrupt 's creditor can claim the balance in the bankruptcy or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid , depending on which side owed the most .
This has been criticized as an undeclared security interest that  violates  the principle of pari passu .
The alternative , where a creditor has to pay all its debts , but receive only a limited  portion  of the leftover moneys that other unsecured creditors get , poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies .
The right to set off is particularly important when reporting a bank  's विकिरणों to नियामक  authorities .
The situation where a bank has to report that it has lent a large sum to a borrower ( and is therefore exposed , because there is a risk that the borrower might default thereby leading to the loss of the bank 's or its depositors ' money ) is thus replaced (  जहाँ the बैंको रै लिया सुरक्षा  over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value of the security taken .
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11 , 1969 ) is  an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , फिल्मी निदेशक , और निर्माता  .
Aniston  gained विश्वव्यापी  recognition in the 1990s for portraying Rachel Green on the television sitcom Friends , a role which earned her an Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award .
Aniston has also enjoyed a successful  हॉलीवुड फिल्मी करियर  .
She gained critical acclaim for her performances in the independent films She 's the  एक ( 1996 )  , Office Space ( 1999 ) , The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ) .
She has had her greatest commercial successes  साथ the films ब्रूस सर्वशक्तिमान  ( 2003 ) , The Break-Up ( 2006 ) , Marley & Me ( 2008 ) , Just Go with It ( 2011 ) and Horrible Bosses ( 2011 ) .
Aniston  प्राप्त a स्टार on the  Hollywood Walk of Fame on February 22 , 2012 .
A white Bengal  बाघ  at the Houston Aquarium
(  वीडियो )
A White tiger at Tobu  चिड़ियाघर , in  Saitama , Japan .
The white tiger  is a recessive म्यूटेंट of the बंगाल बाघ , जिससे थी reported  in the wild from time to time in Assam , Bengal , Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa .
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an initialism formed from Peripheral Component Interconnect , part of the PCI Local Bus standard and often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for  attaching  hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports  the  functions found on a processor bus , but in a standardized format that is independent of any particular processor .
Devices connected to the bus  appear  to the processor to be connected directly to the processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space .
Attached devices can take either the form of an integrated circuit fitted onto the motherboard itself , called a   planar device in the PCI specification , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI Local Bus was first implemented in IBM PC compatibles , where it displaced the combination of ISA plus one VESA  Local Bus as the  bus configuration .
It has subsequently been  अपनाया लिये  other computer types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express , but , most motherboards are still made  साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट ,  which are sufficient for many uses .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus ( including the size and spacing of the circuit  फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ) , विद्युत  characteristics , bus timing , and protocols .
The specification can be purchased from the PCI Special Interest Group (  pci-sig )  .
Typical  पीसीआई ताश प्रयुक्त in pcs शामिल : संजाल ताश , ध्वनि ताश , modems , अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल , tv ट्यूनर ताश और डिस्क परिरक्षक .
PCI video cards replaced ISA and VESA cards , until growing bandwidth  आवश्यकताएँ outgrew  the capabilities of PCI ; the preferred interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards remain available for use  साथ  old PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now commonly integrated onto motherboards or available in  सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और पीसीआई  Express versions .
Caffeine is a bitter , white crystalline xanthine alkaloid that acts as  a उत्तेजक ड्रग .
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds , leaves , and fruit of some plants , where it acts as a  natural pesticide that  paralyzes and kills certain insects feeding on the plants , as well as enhancing the reward memory of pollinators .
It is most  commonly  consumed by humans in infusions extracted from the seed of the coffee plant and the leaves of the tea bush , as well as from various foods and drinks containing products derived from the kola nut .
Other sources include yerba maté  , guarana  berries , guayusa , and the yaupon holly .
In  इंसानो , कैफीन  acts as a central nervous system stimulant , temporarily warding off drowsiness and restoring alertness .
It is the world 's  सबसे widely  consumed psychoactive drug , but unlike many other psychoactive substances , it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the world .
Beverages containing  कैफीन  , such as coffee , tea , soft drinks , and energy drinks , enjoy great popularity .
In North America , 90 % of adults consume  कैफीन रोज़  .
Part of the reason caffeine is classified by the Food and Drug Administration as GRAS ( generally recognized as safe ) is that toxic doses ( over 10 grams ) are much higher than typically used  doses ( कम than 500  milligrams ) .
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks ,  भी जब carried on लिये सालो  – there may be a modest protective effect against some diseases , including Parkinsons Disease , and certain types of cancer .
Caffeine can have both positive and negative effects on  चिंता विकार  .
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine , especially during the evening hours , but others show little  disturbance और the प्रभाव of कैफीन on नींद is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय  .
Evidence of a risk to pregnancy is equivocal , but some  अधिकारियों have concluded कि  prudent advice is for pregnant women to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less .
The  अमरीकी कॉंग्रेस of obstetricians और स्त्रीरोग  ( ACOG ) concluded in 2010 that caffeine consumption is safe up to 200 mg per day in pregnant women .
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic effects when  administered to लोगों जो हैं नहीं प्रयुक्त to it ,  but regular users develop a tolerance to this effect , and studies have generally failed to support the common notion that ordinary consumption contributes significantly to dehydration .
With heavy use , tolerance   develops rapidly to autonomic effects such as elevated heart rate and muscle twitching , but not to the cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine .
The  उपाधि to जिससे कैफीन can उपज clinically significant शारीरिक और दिमागी dependence remains a विषय of विवाद in the चिकित्सा साहित्य .

A longboard is a longer  रूपांतर of a स्केटबोर्ड  .
It is commonly used for cruising , downhill racing  , slalom  racing , sliding , and/or transport .

The Coast Ranges of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया स्पैन इससे हम्बोल्ट  County , California south to Santa Barbara County .
The other three  तटीय कैलिफ़ोर्निया  mountain ranges are the Transverse Ranges , Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains .
Physiographically , they are a  खण्ड of the larger प्रशांत किनारा प्रांत , जिससे in फेरे हैं  part of the larger Pacific Mountain System physiographic division .
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast Ranges Biosphere   Reserve `` in its Man and the Biosphere Programme of World Network of Biosphere Reserves since 1983 .

An automobile , autocar , motor car or car is a wheeled motor vehicle  प्रयुक्त लिये transporting  passengers , which also carries its own engine or motor .
Most definitions of the term specify that automobiles are designed to run primarily on roads , to have seating for one to eight people , to typically have  चार पहियों , और to be constructed प्रधानतया लिये  the transport of people rather than goods .
The term motorcar has also been used in the context of electrified rail systems to denote  a car जिससे कृत्यों as a छोटी लोकोमोटिव  but also provides space for passengers and baggage .
These locomotive cars were often used on suburban routes by both interurban and  intercity रेलरोड  systems .
It was estimated in 2010 that the number of  ऑटोमोबाइल  had risen to over 1 billion vehicles , up from the 500 million of 1986 .
The numbers  हैं  increasing rapidly , especially in China and India .
John Fitzgerald `` Jack '' Kennedy ( May 29 , 1917 – November 22 , 1963 ) , often referred to by his initials JFK , was the 35th President of the United States , serving   from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 during World War II in the South Pacific , Kennedy represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of  प्रतिनिधि  from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter , he  परोसा  in the U.S. Senate from 1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon  in the  1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to have been elected to the office , the second-youngest President ( after  थियोडोर  Roosevelt ) , and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is the only  non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष  , and is the only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency included the Bay of Pigs Invasion , the Cuban Missile Crisis , the building of the Berlin Wall , the Space  रेस , the african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति , और जल्दी चरण  of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy increased the number of military advisers , special operation  शक्तियां , और helicopters in an प्रयत्न to कोर  the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the  रणनीतिक हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented  by the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain forced relocation , village internment , and segregation of  ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी इससे the उत्तरी  and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was assassinated on  नवम्बर 22  , 1963 in Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey Oswald was charged with  the अपराधों , लकिन he थी शॉट  and killed by Jack Ruby two days later , before a trial could take place .
The FBI  और the वारेन आयोग officially  concluded that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However  , the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस चुनें  Committee on Assassinations ( HSCA ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However , ABC News in their investigation , The Kennedy  हत्या : परे षड्यंत्र  , confirmed the findings of the Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy  's  controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber program led to a Congressional investigation that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the 1960s information  concerning कैनेडी 's  private life has come to light .
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which  he struggled have become बेहतर  known , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially kept secret from the general public , reports of Kennedy 's philandering  have garnered much दबायें  .
Kennedy  बाँधने अत्यधिक in  public opinion ratings of U.S. presidents .

A Fire Alarm Control Panel ( FACP  ) ,  or Fire Alarm Control Unit ( FACU ) , is the controlling component of a Fire Alarm System .
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect changes associated with fire , monitors their operational integrity and provides  for  automatic control of equipment , and transmission of information necessary to prepare the facility for fire based on a predetermined sequence .
The panel may also supply electrical energy to operate any associated sensor , control , transmitter  , or रिले  .
There are four basic types of panels : coded panels , conventional panels , addressable panels ,  और मल्टीप्लेक्स प्रणालियों  .

MTV 's first day on the air was rebroadcast on VH1 Classic in 2006 and uploaded onto YouTube in 2010 ( although only the first  four  hours were authentic ; the rest were edited VH1 rebroadcasts ) .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as  katunayake अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र  and Colombo International Airport ) is one of the two international airports serving the city of Colombo , the other is Ratmalana International Airport .
Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport located in southern city of  hambantota is the अन्य अंतरराष्ट्रीय  airport in Sri Lanka .
Bandaranaike International Airport is located in  katunayake ,  22 miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo .
It is  administered by विमानक्षेत्र और विमानन  Services ( Sri Lanka ) Ltd .
It is the hub of SriLankan Airlines , the national carrier of Sri  लंका ,  and Mihin Lanka , the budget airline of Sri Lanka .
Black Swan is a 2010 American psychological thriller and horror film directed by Darren Aronofsky and starring  नताली पोर्टमैन , विंसेंट cassel , और  Mila Kunis .
The plot revolves around a production of Tchaikovsky 's Swan Lake ballet  by a prestigious  New York City company .
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile White Swan , for which the committed dancer Nina ( Portman ) is a perfect fit , as well as the dark and sensual Black Swan , which  हैं qualities  embodied by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ) .
Nina is overwhelmed by a feeling of  immense दबाव जब वो पाता  herself competing for the part , causing her to lose her tenuous grip on reality and descend into a living nightmare .
Aronofsky conceived the premise by connecting his viewings of a production of Swan Lake with an unrealized screenplay about understudies and the notion of being haunted by a double , similar to the   folklore surrounding doppelgängers .
Aronofsky cites Fyodor  दोस्तोयेव्स्की 's `` the दोगुना  `` as another inspiration for the film .
The director also  माना ब्लैक swan  a companion piece to his 2008 film The Wrestler , with both films involving demanding performances for different kinds of art .
He and Portman first discussed the project in 2000 , and after a brief attachment to Universal Studios , Black Swan was  उत्पादित  in New York City in 2009 by Fox Searchlight Pictures .
Portman and Kunis trained in ballet for several months  prior to फिल्मांकन , और notable आंकड़े  from the ballet world helped with film production to shape the ballet presentation .
The film premiered as the  खोलने फिल्मी लिये the 67th वेनिस  International Film Festival on September 1 , 2010 .
It had a limited release  in the संयुक्त राज्य starting  December 3 , 2010 and opened nationwide on December 17 .
ब्लैक swan प्राप्त नाजुक तारीफ़ upon इसके रिलीज , विशेषकर लिये पोर्टमैन 's प्रदर्शन और aronofsky 's दिशा , और थी a significant बक्सा दफ्तर कामयाबी , grossing $ 329 लाख विश्वव्यापी  .
The film received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best Actress award for the film , as well as many other Best Actress awards in several guilds and  त्यौहार  , while Aronofsky was nominated for Best Director .
In addition , the film  itself प्राप्त a नामांकन  for Best Picture .
The world’s first ice-calorimeter , used in the  शीत of 1782-83 , by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये और pierre-simon  Laplace , to determine the heat involved in various chemical changes ; calculations which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat .
ये प्रयोग  mark the foundation of thermochemistry .
A calorimeter ( from Latin calor , meaning heat ) is an object used for calorimetry , or the process of measuring the heat of  रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ or शारीरिक  changes as well as heat capacity .
अवकल स्कैनिंग calorimeters , समतापी microcalorimeters  , titration calorimeters and accelerated rate calorimeters are among the most common types .
A simple calorimeter just consists of a thermometer  संलग्न to a मेटल संग्राहक पूरा of जल निलंबित  above a combustion chamber .
To find the enthalpy change per mole of a substance A in a reaction between two  substances a और b , the substances हैं  added to a calorimeter and the initial and final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after it has finished ) are noted .
Multiplying the  तापमान बदलें  by the mass and specific heat capacities of the substances gives a value for the energy given off or absorbed during the reaction .
Dividing the energy change by how many moles of A were present  देता इसके enthalpy  change of reaction .
This method is used  primarily  in academic teaching as it describes the theory of calorimetry .
it करता नहीं खाता लिये the ऊष्मा घाटा through the संग्राहक or the ऊष्मा क्षमता of the थर्मामीटर और संग्राहक itself  .
In addition , the object placed inside the  ऊष्मामापी  shows that the objects transferred their heat to the calorimeter and into the liquid , and the heat absorbed by the calorimeter and the liquid is equal to the heat given off by the metals .
A  जोड़ी  of green flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri , thongs , jandals , or  a किस्में of अन्य names throughout  the world ) are a type of open-toed sandal typically worn in casual situations , such as outside or at the beach .
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by a Y-shaped strap that passes  between the पहला और दूसरी  toes and around either side of the foot .
They may also be held to the foot with a single strap over the front of  the पैर  rather than a thong .
The name `` flip-flop '' originated because of the sound  कि is बना by  slapping between the sole of the foot and the floor when walking .
This style of footwear has been worn by the people of many  संस्कृतियों  throughout the world , originating as early as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 B.C .
the आधुनिक  flip-flop descends from the Japanese zōri , which became popular after World War II when soldiers returning to the United States brought them back .
They became popular in casual settings during the 1960s , 1990s  , and  2000s , and some varieties have even found their way into more formal attire , despite criticism .
the उपयोग  of flip-flops can result in many pains and injuries , including ankle sprains and broken bones .
Some individuals who walk for long periods report pain in  the  feet , ankles , and lower legs .
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results in over-pronation injuries , caused by the foot  घुसते inwards further  than normal .
This can lead to flat feet and  tendonitis  .
Other  चोटों कि may परिणाम  are due to the footwear 's open-toed nature , such as stubbed toes , cuts , and bruises .
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with thick-cushioned soles , as well as those that have a strap that  is नहीं  canvas and that comes back almost to the ankle .
the स्वामी of hanjin  Osaka , seen here transiting the Panama Canal in 2008 , declared general average following an explosion in the ship 's engine room on .
The law of general average is a legal principle of maritime law according to  जिससे  all parties in a sea venture proportionally share any losses resulting from a voluntary sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency .
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea , crew members often have precious little time in which to determine precisely whose  कार्गो वे हैं  jettisoning .
Thus , to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time , there arose the  निष्पक्ष अभ्यास whereby सब the व्यापारियों  whose cargo landed safely would be called on to contribute a portion , based upon a share or percentage , to the merchant or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril .
While general average traces its origins in  प्राचीन मेरीटाइम  law , still it remains part of the admiralty law of most countries .
The first codification of  सामान्य औसत  was the York Antwerp Rules of 1890 .
अमरीकी कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it in 1949  .
General average requires three elements which are clearly stated by Mr. Justice Grier in  बर्नार्ड  v. Adams:
``  1st  .
A common danger : a danger in which vessel , cargo and crew all participate ; a danger imminent and apparently  'inevitable , ' मगर by voluntarily रूष्ट the घाटा of  a portion of the whole to save the remainder . ''
`` 2nd . There must  be a voluntary jettison , jactus , or ढलाई दूर , of कुछ  portion of the joint concern for the purpose of avoiding this imminent peril , periculi imminentis evitandi causa , or , in other words , a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole . ''
``  3rd  .
इस attempt to avoid  the imminent common peril must be successful '' .
Example Polish call for  टीकाकरण विरूद्ध डिप्थीरिया  and Tetanus .
a टीकाकरण अनुसूची is a श्रेणी of vaccinations , सहित the समय of सब doses , जिससे may be either अनुशंसित or अनिवार्य , depending on the देश of  residence .
A vaccine is an antigenic preparation used to produce  क्रियाशील प्रतिरक्षण to a बीमारी  , in order to prevent or reduce the effects of infection by any natural or `` wild '' pathogen .
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum effectiveness , either to produce sufficient initial immune response or to boost response  कि fades over  time .
For example , tetanus vaccine boosters are often  अनुशंसित प्रत्येक  10 years .
Vaccine schedules are developed by governmental agencies or physicians groups to achieve maximum effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for a locality while minimizing  the क्रमांक of स्वास्थ्य परवाह  system interactions .
over the पास्ट दो दशकों , the अनुशंसित टीकाकरण अनुसूची रै grown rapidly और become अधिक जटिल as अनेक नई टीके have महरूम विकसित .
Some vaccines are recommended only in certain areas ( countries , subnational areas , or at-risk  populations  ) where a disease is common .
For instance , yellow fever vaccination is on the routine vaccine schedule of  फ्रेंच guiana , is अनुशंसित  in certain regions of Brazil but in the United States is only given to travelers heading to countries with a history of the disease .
In developing countries , vaccine recommendations also take into account the  स्तर of स्वास्थ्य परवाह  access , the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the World Health Organization show a developed country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's life and uses vaccines which cost over $ 700 including  प्रशासन लागत जबकि a विकासशील देश उपयोग a अनुसूची providing  vaccines in the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25 .
This difference is due to the lower cost of health care , the lower cost of many vaccines provided to developing nations , and that more expensive vaccines  , प्रायः लिये कम आम रोगों , हैं नहीं utilized  .
In 1900 , the smallpox vaccine was the only one administered to  children  .
By the early 1950s , children routinely received four vaccines , for protection against  ( डिप्थीरिया , pertussis  , tetanus , polio , and smallpox ) , and as many as five shots by two years of age .
Since the mid-1980s , many vaccines have  महरूम  added to the schedule .
, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) now recommends  टीकाकरण  against at least fourteen diseases .
By  two  years of age , U.S. children receive as many as 24 vaccine injections , and might receive up to five shots during one visit to the doctor .
The use of combination vaccine products means that , , the United Kingdom 's immunization program consists of 10 injections by the age of two , rather than 25 if vaccination for each disease was   given as a separate injection .

The form of dancing is called `` wining ''  ( घुमावदार ) सुनाया  wine-ing

The Trinidad and Tobago Carnival is an annual  इवेंट आयोजित on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले  Ash Wednesday , and is well known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations .
Carnival in Trinidad and Tobago is the most significant event on the islands '  सांस्कृतिक और पर्यटन पंचांग  , with numerous cultural events running in the lead up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday .
It is said that  if the आइलैंडर्स  are not celebrating it , then they are preparing for it , while reminiscing about the past year 's festival .
The  दिल of the musical  celebration has been calypso ; recently soca has replaced calypso as the most celebrated type of music .
Costumes , stickfighting and limbo competitions are  भी महत्वपूर्ण  components of the festival .
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad  और टोबैगो is भी मनाये  in cities worldwide .
These including Toronto 's Caribana , Miami 's Miami Carnival , Houston  carifest , लंदन  's Notting Hill Carnival as well as New York City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few .
Carnival was created  जब वेस्ट अफ़्रीकी स्लेव mimicked  their French owners who where known for their lavish costumes balls .
Forbidden to partake in these festivities and confined to their quarters , slaves combined elements from their own  संस्कृतियों  to their master 's fete .
Hence the creation   of characters such as Jab Jab or Jab Molassie ( Devils ) , Midnight Robbers , Imps , Lagahroo , Soucouyant , La Diablesse and Demons .
With the abolition of slavery in 1838 , freed Africans took their version  of कार्निवल to  the streets through expression of drums , riddim sections like tamboo bamboo and as each new immigrant population entered Trinidad , Carnival evolved into what we know today .
The city of Chicago  , इलिनोइस आयोजित a  nonpartisan mayoral election on Tuesday , February 22 , 2011 .
लाज़िम महापौर रिचर्ड M.  Daley , a member of the Democratic Party who had been in office since 1989 , did not seek a seventh term as mayor .
उम्मीदवार  needed to collect 12,500 petition signatures by November 22 , 2010 to qualify for a place on the ballot .
April 5 , 2011 was scheduled to be a runoff election date if no  प्रत्याशी  received an absolute majority .
Rahm Emanuel won  the रेस लिये  mayor with more than 55 % of the vote .
He was  उदघाटन  on May 16 , 2011 .
``  उत्तेजित  Up Kicks '' is a song by American indie pop band Foster the People .
It was released as the group 's debut single in  सितंबर  2010 , and the following year was included on their EP Foster the People and their debut album Torches .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' became the group 's breakthrough hit  and  was one of the most popular songs of 2011 .
The song was written and recorded by  frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर  while he was working as a commercial jingle writer .
Contrasting with the upbeat musical  संयोजन  , the lyrics describe the homicidal thoughts of a troubled youth .
The track received considerable attention after it was posted online in 2010 as a free download , and it helped the group garner a multi-album record deal with  कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड imprint  Startime International .
`` Pumped Up Kicks  '' proved to be a स्लीपर hit ; in 2011 , बाद  receiving significant airplay on modern rock stations , the song crossed-over onto contemporary hit radio stations .
The song spent eight consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in  the संयुक्त राज्य  , making it the first Billboard Alternative Songs number-one single to crack the U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009 .
The song was widely praised by critics , and it has been licensed  लिये उपयोग in  a wide range of popular media since its release .
``  उत्तेजित up kicks  '' received a Grammy Award nomination for Best Pop Duo/Group Performance .
The State Fair of West Virginia is an annual state  मेला लिये वेस्ट वर्जिनिया  .
It is held annually in  mid-august on the राज्य  Fairgrounds in Fairlea , near Lewisburg , West Virginia in the southeastern part of the state .
The State Fairgrounds consists of a large open field for carnivals and  प्रदर्शनियों , a घोड़ा track , grandstands , और अनेक  exhibition buildings .
Free parking is provided adjacent to the fairgrounds and , until 2006 , free camping was also available in a large field with  running-water toilets और बौछार  , but no hookups .
Campers are now charged a  छोटी  fee .
The White House , the president 's official residence and center of  the प्रशासन
Under the  संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution , the President of the United States is the head of state and head of government of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and  सिर of the संघीय सरकारी as a पूरे  , the presidency is the highest political office in the United States by influence and recognition .
The president is also the  commander-in-chief  of the United States Armed Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of Representatives should the Electoral College fail to award  an निरपेक्ष बहुमत of मत  to any person ) .
Since the ratification of the  twenty-second amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान in  1951 , no person may be elected President more than twice , and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the death , resignation , or removal from office of an incumbent President , the Vice  अध्यक्ष  assumes the office .
The President must be at least 35  सालो of आयु  and a `` natural born '' citizen of the United States .
This  सूची शामिल तभी those  persons who were sworn into office as president following the ratification of the United States Constitution , which took effect on March 4 , 1789 .
For American leaders before this  अनुसमर्थन , देखिए  President of the Continental Congress .
The  सूची करता नहीं  include any Acting Presidents under the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as  ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा  two non-consecutive terms and is counted chronologically as both the 22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary  टेलर , वारेन G. हार्डिंग , और  Franklin D. Roosevelt ) , four were assassinated ( Abraham Lincoln , James A. Garfield , William McKinley , and John F. Kennedy ) and one resigned ( Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first president , was inaugurated in 1789 after a unanimous vote of  the चुनावी  College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time  in दफ्तर साथ 32 दिनों in 1841 , और फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt spent the longest with over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more  than दो शर्तें  , and a constitutional amendment , affecting presidents after Harry Truman , was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president .
Andrew  जैक्सन , the  seventh president , was the first to be elected by men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren Harding was the first elected after women  gained मतदान अधिकारों in 1920  .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams , Rutherford B. Hayes , Benjamin Harrison and George W. Bush –  जो खोया the लोकप्रिय vote  but assumed office .
John F. Kennedy has been the only president of Roman  कैथोलिक आस्था  , and the current president , Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent .
`` Lombardi  ट्रॉफी '' redirects  here .
For the award  awarded annually to the बेहतरीन  college football lineman or linebacker , see Lombardi Award .
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded each year to the winning team  of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League 's championship game , the Super Bowl .
The trophy is named in  सम्मान of legendary  NFL coach Vince Lombardi .
This  is a सूची of  tables of the verified oldest people in the world in ordinal rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified ' if his or  उसके अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि  specifically deals in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest unambiguously documented human  जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस (  1875–1997 ) , who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She met Vincent  वैन gogh  when she was 12 or 13 .
This led to news media  ध्यान in  1985 , after Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for Calment 's age , beyond  कोई उचित  question , in the records of her native city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any other supercentenarian ; her  मामला serves as an archetype  in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest  undisputed  lifespan for male supercentenarians is that of Jiroemon Kimura , who currently lives in Japan and is age as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of the United States , on 17 December 2012 , Kimura , born 19 April 1897 , is the oldest living person in the world  जिनकी आयु can be प्रलेखित  .
He has also been the oldest living man since the  मौत of 114-year  old Walter Breuning on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12 January 2013 , the oldest living woman has been -year-old Misao  okawa , भी इससे जापानी , born  on 5 March 1898 .
the लोगों 's अदालत is an अमरीकी arbitration-based वास्तविकता अदालत दिखाएँ , फिलहाल presided over by रिटायर्ड फ्लोरिडा राज्य सर्किट अदालत न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian , in जिससे छोटी दावा विवादों हैं संभाला .
The People 's Court is  the पहला  court show to use binding arbitration , introducing the format into the genre in 1981 .
The system  रै महरूम duplicated  by most of the show 's successors in the judicial genre .
Moreover , The People 's Court is the first popular  ,  long-running reality in the judicial genre .
It was preceded only by a few short-lived realities in the genre ; these short-lived predecessors were only loosely related to judicial proceedings , except for one : Parole ( 1959 )  took फुटेज इससे real-life courtrooms पकड़कर  legal proceedings .
Prior  to the लोगों 's अदालत , the विशाल बहुमत of tv courtroom shows प्रयुक्त अभिनेताओं , और बनाई or fictional मामले ( as किया रेडियो पहले कि ) .
Among examples of these types of court shows  शामिल  Famous Jury Trials and Your Witness .
The People 's Court has  था दो चिहृ जीवनदान  .
The show 's first life was presided over solely by former Los Angeles  काउंटी श्रेष्ठ अदालत  Judge Joseph Wapner .
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on September 14 , 1981 , until May 21 , 1993 , when  the दिखाएँ थी रद्द due  to low ratings .
This left the show with a total  of 2,484  1⁄2-hour episodes and 12 seasons .
The show was taped in  लॉस  Angeles during its first life .
After being cancelled , reruns  aired  until September 9 , 1994 .
On September 8 , 1997 , after being out of production for four years , The People 's  अदालत थी revived लिये a दूसरी  life in first-run syndication as a 60-minute program .
Former lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed Koch was chosen as arbiter , which he  कायम लिये 2 सीज़न इससे the 1997–98 ऋतु through the  1998–99 season ( the present life 's 2nd season and overall show 's 14th ) .
By the 1999–00 season , husband of Judith Sheindlin ( who presides over Judge Judy ) and former  New York State Supreme  Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch .
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he was replaced towards the end  of the 2000–01  season ( present life 's 4th season and overall show 's 17th ) .
शुरूआत in वसन्त 2001 , फ्लोरिडा न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian took over the लोगों 's अदालत और रै presided over the दिखाएँ कभी चूंकि .
Once Milian completes the 2012–13 season , she will have served as longest arbiter over the series  साथ 12 और  a half seasons .
As of the present , however , her  सालो on the कार्यक्रम टाई  Wapner at 12 seasons .
In the 2009-10 television season , The People 's Courts 2nd/present life  outlasted इसके पहला जब  it reached 13 seasons .
While  the दिखाएँ taped in नई  York City for the first 15 seasons of its second life , it now tapes in Stamford , Connecticut as of the 2012-13 season .
On September 3 , 2012 , The People 's Court 's 2nd/present life entered its  16th ऋतु ( 28th  overall season ) .
With 28 total seasons ,  the लोगों 's अदालत बाँधने as the  2nd longest-running courtroom program behind the ongoing Divorce Court at 33 seasons ( from its 3 combined lives ) .
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho :  wo'tééneihí '  ) is a state in the Western United States .
It became the 45th  राज्य  admitted to the Union on January 4 , 1896 .
Utah is the 13th-largest , the 34th-most populous , and the  10th-least-densely  populated of the 50 United States .
Approximately 80 % of Utah 's 2,817,222 people live along the Wasatch Front , centering on Salt Lake City , leaving vast expanses of the state nearly uninhabited and making  the जनसांख्यिकी the छठे सबसे urbanized in  the U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east , Wyoming on the northeast , Idaho on the north , Arizona on the south , and Nevada on the west .
It  भी छू a कोने  of New Mexico on the southeast .
Utah is the most religiously homogeneous   state in the Union .
Approximately 63 % of Utahns are reported to be members of The Church of Jesus Christ of  latter-day संतो or lds ( mormons ) , जिससे greatly प्रभाव  Utah culture and daily life .
The world headquarters of The Church of  यीशु मसीह of latter-day  Saints ( LDS Church ) is located in Utah 's state capital .
The state is a center of transportation , education , information  प्रौद्योगिकी और शोध  , government services , mining , and a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation .
According to the  u.S. जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau 's population estimates , Utah is the fifth fastest-growing state in the United States as of 2012 .
St. George , was the fastest–growing metropolitan area in the United States  इससे  2000 to 2005 .
A 2012 Gallup national survey found Utah  overall to be the ``  best state to live in '' based on 13 forward-looking measurements including various economic , lifestyle , and health-related outlook metrics .
