It is in the  मेम्फिस महानगर  Area .
The population was  1,674 at  the 2000 census .
The hard palate is a thin horizontal bony plate  of the कपाल , स्तिथ  in the roof of the mouth .
It spans the arch formed by the  अपर दांत  .
It is formed  by the  palatine process of the maxilla and horizontal plate of palatine bone .
It forms a  विभाजन  between the nasal passages and the mouth .
Also on the anterior portion of the roof of the hard palate is the Rugae which are the irregular  ridges in  the mucous membrane that help facilitate the movement of food backwards towards the pharynx .
This partition is continued deeper into the mouth  by a मांसल एक्सटेंशन  called the soft palate .
पूरा नियत  of scrolls , constituting the entire Tanakh .
The Tanakh ( , or ; also Tenakh , Tenak , Tanach ) is a name used in Judaism for the  canon of the यहूदी बाइबल  .
The Tanakh is also known as the  masoretic  Text or the Miqra .
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew letters of the Masoretic Text 's three traditional subdivisions : The Torah ( `` Teaching '' , also known as the Five Books of Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim (  ``  Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) , meaning `` that  जिससे is  read '' , is an alternative Hebrew term for the Tanakh .
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an accompanying oral tradition passed on by each generation ,  पुकारा the मौखिक  Torah .
Sobriety  नाका  in Germany
Driving under the influence ( DUI ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) , drunken driving , drunk driving , drink driving , operating under  the influence , पीने और ड्राइविंग , or impaired ड्राइविंग is the  crime of driving a motor vehicle with blood levels of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '' , or `` BAC '' ) .
Similar regulations cover driving or  ऑपरेटिंग निश्चित  types of machinery while affected by drinking alcohol or taking other drugs , including , but not limited to prescription drugs .
This is a  दण्ड  offense in most nations .
Convictions do not  necessarily  involve actual driving of the vehicle .
In most jurisdictions a measurement such as a blood alcohol content  ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज  level , such as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the offense , with no need to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol .
In some jurisdictions , there is  an क्रोधित  category of the offense at a higher level e.g . 0.12 % .
In most countries , anyone who is  convicted of injuring  or killing someone while under the influence of alcohol or drugs can be heavily fined , as in France , in addition to being given a lengthy prison sentence .
Some jobs have their own rules and BAC limits , for example commercial pilot , and the Federal Railroad Administration in the United States has a 0.04 % limit for  ट्रैन क्रू .
Some jurisdictions have  अनेक स्तर of bac ; लिये उदाहरण  , the state of California has a 0.08 % BAC limit , which is lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a commercial driver 's license .
The  कैलिफ़ोर्निया bac सीमा is 0.01  % for those younger than 21 years of age and those on probation for a previous DUI conviction .
Some large corporations have their own rules ; Union Pacific Railroad has their own BAC limit of 0.02 % that , if violated during a  यादृच्छिक परीक्षण or a for-cause  test — for example , after a traffic accident — can result in termination of employment with no chance of future re-hire .
Many states in the U.S. and  प्रांतों in कनाडा  have adopted truth in sentencing laws that enforce strict guidelines on sentencing , differing from previous practice where prison time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued .
Some jurisdictions have judicial guidelines  requiring a अनिवार्य  minimum sentence .
Penalties for DUI charges range from expensive fees to forfetiruree of your license  प्लेटों और in कुछ गंभीर  circumstances , your vehicle .
A drunk  ड्राइविंग सिम्युलेटर  in Montréal , Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called , depending on the jurisdiction , driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ) , driving under intense influence ( DUII ) , driving while   intoxicated ( DWI ) , operating under the influence ( OUI ) operating while intoxicated ( OWI ) , operating a motor vehicle while intoxicated ( OMVI ) , driving under the combined influence of alcohol and/or other drugs , driving under the influence per se or drunk in charge [ of a vehicle ] .
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling , boating , piloting  वायुयान , उपयोग of motile फार्म उपकरण ऐसे  as tractors and combines , riding horses or driving a horse-drawn vehicle , or bicycling , possibly with different BAC level than driving .
In some jurisdictions there are separate charges depending on the vehicle used , such as BWI ( bicycling while  intoxicated ) , जिससे may carry a हल्का वाक्य  .
In the United States , local law enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for driving   under the influence of alcohol in 1996 , compared to 1.9 million such arrests during the peak year in 1983 .
In 1997 an estimated  513,200 dwi अपराधियों यहूद in  prison or jail , down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986 .
Officers  इससे us कस्टम और  Border Protection boarding a ship
Law enforcement in the United States is one of three major components of the criminal justice system of  the  United States , along with courts and corrections .
Although there exists an  अंतर्निहित interrelatedness between  the different groups that make up the criminal justice system based on their crime deterrence purpose , each component operates independently from one another .
However , the judiciary is vested with the power to make legal determinations regarding the conduct  of the अन्य  two components .
Apart from maintaining order and service functions , the purpose of policing is the investigation  of suspected दण्ड कार्यकलाप और the referral of the परिणाम  of investigations and of suspected criminals to the courts .
Law enforcement , to varying degrees at different levels of government and in different agencies , is also commonly charged with the responsibilities of deterring criminal activity and of preventing the  कामयाब आयोग of अपराधों in प्रगति ; the सेवा  and enforcement of warrants , writs and other orders of the courts .
Law enforcement agencies are also involved in providing first response to emergencies and other threats to public safety ; the  सुरक्षा of निश्चित पब्लिक सुविधाएं  and infrastructure ; the maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ) .
Elmer Figueroa Arce ( born June 28 , 1968 ) , best known under the stage name  chayanne , is a प्यूर्टो rican  Latin pop singer and actor .
As a solo artist , Chayanne has released 21 solo albums and sold over 15  लाख  albums worldwide .
`` World War Hulk '' is a comic book crossover storyline that ran through a self  titled सीमित श्रेणी और विभिन्न अन्य शीर्षक प्रकाशित  by Marvel Comics in 2007 , featuring the Hulk .
The series consists of five main issues titled World War Hulk , with Greg Pak as writer and John Romita , Jr. as penciller , and three  अन्य सीमित श्रेणी : संसार  War Hulk : Front Line , World War Hulk : Gamma Corps , and World War Hulk : X-Men .
It also ran through several other Marvel  कॉमिक्स  series .
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into space by the Illuminati and a life model  decoy of  Nick Fury , the Hulk 's subsequent exile seen in Planet Hulk and his imminent return to Earth to seek revenge on the Illuminati .
Marion Mitchell Morrison ( born Marion  रॉबर्ट मॉरिसन ; may 26 , 1907 – जून 11 , 1979 ) ,  better known by his stage name John Wayne , was an American film actor , director and producer .
An Academy Award -winner , Wayne was among the top box office  draws लिये तीन दशकों  , and was named the all-time top money-making star .
An  enduring अमरीकी प्रतीक , he epitomized  rugged masculinity and is famous for his demeanor , including his distinctive calm voice , walk , and height .
Wayne was born in Winterset , Iowa but his family relocated to the greater Los  एंजिल्स  area when he was four years old .
He found work at local film studios when he lost his  फ़ुटबॉल स्कॉलरशिप  to USC as a result of a bodysurfing accident .
Initially working for the Fox Film Corporation , he  ज़्यादातर appeared in छोटी  bit parts .
His first  अग्रणी भूमिका आए in the वाइडस्क्रीन एपिक the  Big Trail ( 1930 ) , which led to leading roles in numerous films throughout the 1930s , many of them in the western genre .
उसके करियर रोज़ to further हाइट्स  in 1939 , with John Ford 's Stagecoach making him an instant superstar .
Wayne  होता go on to स्टार in  142 pictures , primarily typecast in Western films .
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ) , which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen O'Hara ; The Searchers ( 1956 ) , in which he plays a Civil War veteran who seeks out his abducted niece ; Rio Bravo ( 1959 ) , playing a Sheriff with Dean Martin ; True Grit ( 1969 ) , playing a humorous U.S . Marshal who sets out to avenge a man 's death in the role that won Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ) , his final screen performance  in which he plays an aging  gunslinger battling cancer .
Wayne moved to Orange County , California in the 1960s  , और थी a prominent रिपब्लिकन  in Hollywood , supporting anti-communist positions .
He died of  पेट  cancer in 1979 .
In  जून 1999 , the अमरीकी  Film Institute named Wayne 13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time .
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February   1564 – 8 January 1642 ) , was an Italian physicist , mathematician , astronomer , and philosopher who played a major role in the Scientific Revolution .
His  उपलब्धियाँ शामिल  improvements to the telescope and consequent astronomical observations and support for Copernicanism .
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational astronomy `` , the `` father of modern physics  `` , the `` पिता of विज्ञान  '' , and `` the Father of Modern Science '' .
His contributions to observational astronomy include the telescopic confirmation of the phases of Venus , the discovery of the four  largest satellites of बृहस्पति ( नामित the galilean moons in उसके इज्ज़त  ) , and the observation and analysis of sunspots .
Galileo also worked in applied science and technology , inventing an  improved सैन्य  compass and other instruments .
Galileo 's championing of heliocentrism was controversial within his lifetime , when most subscribed to either geocentrism or the  tychonic प्रणाली  .
He met with opposition from astronomers ,  जो doubted  heliocentrism due to the absence of an observed stellar parallax .
The matter was investigated  by the Roman  Inquisition in 1615 , and they concluded that it could be supported as only a possibility , not an established fact .
गैलीलियो बाद  defended his views in Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems , which appeared to attack Pope Urban VIII and thus alienated him and the Jesuits , who had both supported Galileo up until this point .
He was tried by the  inquisition , मिला `` ओजस्वी  suspect of heresy '' , forced to recant , and spent the rest of his life under house arrest .
It was while Galileo was under house arrest that he wrote one of his finest works , Two New Sciences , in which he summarised the work he had done some forty years earlier , on the two sciences now called  kinematics और शक्ति of सामग्री  .
55 '' LG  oled tv showcased  at CES 2012
प्रोटोटाइप  OLED lighting panel developed by Lumiotec
Demonstration of a flexible OLED  यंत्र
An OLED ( organic light-emitting diode ) is a light-emitting diode ( LED ) in which the emissive  electroluminescent परत is a फिल्मी of सशुल्क  compound which emits light in response to an electric current .
This layer of organic  सेमीकंडक्टर is situated  between two electrodes .
generally , at तनिक  one of these electrodes is transparent .
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as television  screens , कंप्यूटर  monitors , portable systems such as mobile phones , handheld games consoles and PDAs .
A major area of research is the development of white OLED  डिवाइस लिये उपयोग in  solid-state lighting applications .
There are two main families of  oleds : those  based on small molecules and those employing polymers .
Adding mobile ions to an OLED creates a light-emitting electrochemical cell or LEC , which has a slightly  अलग  mode of operation .
OLED displays can use either  passive-matrix  ( PMOLED ) or active-matrix addressing schemes .
Active-matrix  oleds ( amoled ) आवश्यकता a thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर  backplane to switch each individual pixel on or off , but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes .
An  oled प्रदर्शक works  without a backlight .
Thus , it can display deep black  स्तर और can be thinner  and lighter than a liquid crystal display ( LCD ) .
in कम परिवेश लाइट शर्तें ऐसे  as a dark room an OLED screen can achieve a higher contrast ratio than an LCD , whether the LCD uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps or LED backlight .
A carton and a glass of eggnog from Montreal , Canada , showing its French facade ( English reverse ) and the French term  लेत de poule ( वस्तुतः  , `` hen 's milk '' )
Eggnog , or egg nog , is a sweetened dairy -based beverage traditionally  बना  with milk and/or cream , sugar , and whipped eggs ( which gives it a frothy texture ) .
Brandy , rum , whisky  , bourbon  , vodka , or a combination of liquors are often added .
The finished serving is  प्रायः garnished साथ  a sprinkling of ground cinnamon or nutmeg .
It was also known as  the अंडा मिल्क  punch .
Eggnog is a popular drink throughout  the संयुक्त राज्य  and Canada , and is usually associated with Christmas .
Eggnog may be added as  a  flavoring to food or drinks such as coffee and tea .
Eggnog as a  कस्टर्ड can  also be used as an ice cream base .
A pasty ( , ) , ( sometimes known in Britain as a Cornish pasty , and in the  संयुक्त राज्य as a pastie or अंग्रेजों pasty ) is  a baked pastry , a traditional variety of which is particularly associated with Cornwall , the westernmost county in England .
It  is बना by रखकर uncooked भरना typically of मांस और  vegetables , without meat in vegetarian versions , on a flat pastry circle and folding it to wrap the filling , crimping the edge to form a seal .
After baking , the result is a raised  semicircular comestible  .
The traditional Cornish pasty , which has Protected Geographical Indication ( PGI ) status in Europe , is filled with beef , sliced or diced potato , swede ( also known as a yellow turnip or rutabaga – referred to in Cornwall as turnip )  और  onion , seasoned with salt and pepper , and is baked .
Today , the pasty is the food most associated with Cornwall , it is regarded as the national dish , and it accounts for  6 % of the  Cornish food economy .
Pasties with many different fillings are made ;  कुछ दुकानें specialise in selling  all sorts of pasties .
The  origins of the pasty हैं unclear  , though there are many references to them throughout historical documents and fiction .
The pasty is now popular world-wide due to the spread of Cornish miners , and variations can be found in Australia , the United  राज्य , मैक्सिको  and elsewhere .
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is one of three major parts of the autonomic nervous system : the others being the enteric and  parasympathetic  systems .
Its general action is  to mobilize the देह  's nervous system fight-or-flight response .
It is , however , constantly active at a basic level to  maintain समस्थापन  .
Secure Digital or ( SD )  is a non-volatile  memory card format for use in portable devices , such as mobile phones , digital cameras , GPS navigation devices , and tablet computers .
The Secure Digital  मानक  is maintained by the SD Card Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400 brands across  दर्जनों of उत्पाद  categories and more than 8,000 models .
The Secure Digital format includes four card families available  in  three different form factors .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ) , the High-Capacity ( SDHC ) , the   eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ) , and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The three form factors are  the असली आकार , the ``  mini '' size , and the `` micro '' size ( see illustration ) .
There are many  combinations of रूप कारकों  and device families .
electrically passive  adapters allow the use of a smaller card in a host device built to hold a larger card .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification provide backward compatibility and accept older SD cards , but this article explains several factors that can prevent the use of a  नए  SD card:
A newer card may offer  वृहद क्षमता  than the host device can handle .
A newer card may use a file system the  मेजबान यंत्र can नहीं  navigate .
Use of an SDIO card requires  the मेजबान यंत्र be designed लिये  the input/output functions the card provides .
The  संगठन of the कार्ड  was changed starting with the SDHC family .
Some vendors produced SDSC cards  ऊपर 1 gb पहले  the SDA had standardized a method of doing so .
The SDA uses  अनेक trademarked  logos to enforce compliance with its specifications and assure users of compatibility .

Daniel Lawrence Whitney ( born February 17 , 1963 ) best  ज्ञात by उसके  stage name and character Larry the Cable Guy , is an American stand-up comedian , actor , country music artist , voice actor , and former radio personality .
He was one of the members of  the ब्लू कॉलर कॉमेडी दौरे , a कॉमेडी troupe  which included Bill Engvall , Ron White , and Jeff Foxworthy ( with whom he has starred on Blue Collar TV ) .
Whitney has released seven comedy  एल्बम , of जिससे  three have been certified gold by the RIAA for shipments of 500,000 copies .
In addition , he has starred in three  ब्लू कॉलर कॉमेडी  Tour-related movies , as well as in the films Larry the Cable Guy : Health Inspector , Delta Farce , and Witless Protection , as well as voicing Mater in the Cars franchise .
Whitney 's catchphrase : `` Git-R-Done !  '' is भी the शीर्षक  of his book .
On January 26 , 2010 , the TV channel History announced that it was ordering a series starring Whitney  पुकारा तभी in अमेरिका साथ लैरी the केबल guy  , in which he would explore the country and immerse himself in different lifestyles , jobs , and hobbies .
The first episode of the series  aired on  February 8 , 2011 .
Vitamin D is a group of  fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार  for intestinal absorption of calcium and phosphate .
In humans ,  the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित  compounds of vitamin D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and  ergocalciferol ( विटामिन d2 ) हैं अद्वितीय  as they constitute what we know as vitamin D and can be ingested from the diet and/or supplements .
The body can also synthesize vitamin D ( from  कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य  exposure is adequate ( hence its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin , it is not actually an essential dietary vitamin in the strict sense , as it can be synthesized  in पर्याप्त amounts  by most mammals exposed to sunlight .
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize  विटामिन  D efficiently and must receive it in their diet . )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of compounds ) is only scientifically called a vitamin   when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly called vitamins , vitamin D was discovered in an effort to find the dietary substance that was  lacking in a बीमारी , namely , rickets , the  childhood form of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like other compounds called vitamins , in the  विकसित  world vitamin D is added to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid disease due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from exposure to sunlight as well as   intake from the diet , and it is believed that synthesis may contribute generally to the maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun exposure works in a feedback loop that prevents toxicity but , because of uncertainty about the  कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप , no सुझाव हैं जारी by the  Institute of Medicine , USA , for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the  dietary सन्दर्भ  Intakes for vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs and that all of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in practice .
In the  जिगर विटामिन d is परिवर्तित to calcidiol , जिससे is भी ज्ञात  as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin D—abbreviated 25 ( OH ) D ; and which is the specific vitamin D metabolite that is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
भाग of the calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the गुर्दे to calcitriol , the biologically क्रियाशील रूप of विटामिन D. calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त , regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream और promoting the स्वस्थ विकास और remodeling  of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys for other purposes , such as the proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular  फलन और सूजन  .
Beyond its use to prevent osteomalacia or rickets , the evidence for other health effects of vitamin D supplementation in the general population is  असंगत  .
The best evidence of benefit is for bone health and a decrease in mortality in elderly women   .
Standard form  of the आवधिक  table .
The colors represent different categories of elements  समझाया  below .
The  आवधिक तालिका is a table प्रदर्शक  of the chemical elements , organized on the basis of their atomic numbers , electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties .
Elements are presented in order of increasing atomic number (  क्रमांक of protons  ) .
The standard form of table comprises an 18 × 7 grid or main body of elements , positioned above a  छोटी दोगुना पंक्ति  of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed into four  आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block  to the left , the p-block to the right , the d-block in the middle , and the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are  पुकारा अवधि ; the  columns of the s- , d- , and p-blocks are called groups , with some of these having names such as the halogens or the noble gases .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be used to derive relationships between the properties of the elements and predict the  गुण of नई , yet  to be discovered or synthesized , elements .
As a result , a periodic table—whether in the standard form or some other variant—provides a useful framework for  analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव , और ऐसे टेबल  are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
Although precursors exist ,  dmitri mendeleev is generally credited  with the publication , in 1869 , of the first widely recognized periodic table .
He developed his table to  illustrate आवधिक रुझान  in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown elements that  होता be अपेक्षित to भरण  gaps in this table .
Most of his predictions were proved correct when the elements in  सवाल यहूद subsequently  discovered .
mendeleev 's आवधिक तालिका रै चूंकि  been expanded and refined with the discovery or synthesis of further new elements and the development of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior .
All   elements from atomic numbers 1 ( hydrogen ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally , although  कुछ हैं मिला तभी in  trace amounts and were initially discovered by synthesis in laboratories .
The  तत्व बाद  98 have only been synthesized in laboratories .
Production of elements beyond ununoctium is being pursued , with the question of how the periodic table may need to be modified to accommodate any such  परिवर्धन होने a पदार्थ  of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic radionuclides of naturally occurring elements have also been produced  in laboratories  .
Minimum wage by U.S. state and U.S. territory ( American Samoa , Guam , Puerto Rico  , वर्जिन  Islands ) , as of Jan. 1 , 2013 .
In the United States , workers are generally entitled to  be paid  no less than the statutory minimum wage .
The federal government mandates  a nationwide minimum  wage level of $ 7.25 per hour , while some states and municipalities have set minimum wage levels higher than the federal level , with the highest state minimum wage being $ 9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013 .
Among those paid by the hour in 2012 , 1.6 million were reported as earning exactly the prevailing federal minimum  मजदूरी  .
About 2.0 million were reported  as कमाई  wages below the minimum .
साथ , ये 3.6 लाख  workers with wages at or below the minimum made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers .
A selection of Bourbons and  टेनेसी  whiskeys offered at a liquor store in Decatur , Georgia
Evan Williams  bourbon  whiskey
Bourbon whiskey is a type of American whiskey – a barrel-aged  आसुत स्पिरिट बना primarily  from corn .
The name of the spirit derives from its historical association with an area known as Old Bourbon , around what is now Bourbon County , Kentucky ( which , in turn , was named after the French  हाउस of  Bourbon royal family ) .
It has been produced since the 18th  सदी  .
While it may be made anywhere in the United States , it is strongly associated with the American South in general , and Kentucky   in particular .
The Mona Lisa ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length portrait of a woman by the Italian artist Leonardo da Vinci ,  जिससे रै महरूम acclaimed as `` the बेहतरीन ज्ञात , the सबसे visited , the सबसे लिखा परिचय  , the most sung about , the most parodied work of art in the world . ''
The painting ,  विचार to be  a portrait of Lisa Gherardini , the wife of Francesco del Giocondo , is in oil on a poplar panel , and is believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506 .
It was acquired by  किंग फ्रांसिस i  of France and is now the property of the French Republic , on permanent display at the Musée du Louvre in Paris since 1797 .
the ambiguity of the विषय  's expression , which is frequently described as enigmatic , the monumentality of the composition , the subtle modeling of forms and the atmospheric illusionism were novel qualities that have contributed to the continuing fascination and study of the work .
रॉबर्ट एलन पामर ( 19 जनवरी  1949 – 26 September 2003 ) , was an English singer-songwriter and musician .
He was known for his distinctive voice and the eclectic mix of musical styles on his albums  , combining आत्मा  , jazz , rock , pop , reggae and blues .
He found success both in his solo career and in the musical act The Power Station , and  था शीर्ष 10 गीतों in  both the UK and the US .
His iconic music videos by Terence Donovan for the hits `` Addicted to Love `` and `` Simply Irresistible `` featured identically dressed dancing women with pale faces , dark eye makeup and bright red lipstick , which resembled the women in the art  of पैट्रिक nagel , an कलाकार लोकप्रिय in the  1980s .
Sharp-suited , his involvement in the music industry  commenced in the 1960s , covered पाँच दशकों  and included a spell with Vinegar Joe .
Palmer received a number of awards throughout his career , including two Grammy Awards for Best Male Rock Vocal Performance , an MTV Video Music Award , and was  twice मनोनीत लिये the ब्रिट पुरस्कार  for Best British Male .
Computed tomography  एंजियोग्राफी ( cta ) is a computed  tomography technique used to visualize arterial and venous vessels throughout the body .
This ranges from arteries serving the brain to those bringing blood to the lungs ,  गुर्दे  , arms and legs .
The  champs-élysées सजा  with flags for Bastille Day
Horseman of the  फ्रेंच रिपब्लिकन  Guard during the 2007 military parade on the Champs-Élysées .
Prise de la Bastille by  jean-pierre-louis-laurent  Houel
Bastille Day is the name given in English-speaking  देशों to the  French National Day , which is celebrated on the 14th of July each year .
In  फ़्रांस , it is formally  called La Fête Nationale ( ; The National Celebration ) and commonly Le quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ) .
It commemorates the 1790 Fête de la Fédération , held on the first anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14 July 1789 ;  the वर्षगांठ of the storming of the bastille fortress-prison थी देखी as a प्रतीक of the uprising  of the modern nation , and of the reconciliation of all the French inside the constitutional monarchy which preceded the First Republic , during the French Revolution .
Festivities and official  ceremonies  are held all over France .
The oldest and largest regular military  परेड in यूरोपीय is आयोजित on the morning of 14 जुलाई , on the champs-élysées  avenue in Paris in front of the President of the Republic , French officials and foreign guests .
The United States of America ( USA or U.S.A. ) , commonly called  the  United States ( US or U.S. ) or America , is a federal republic consisting of fifty states and a federal district .
The lower forty-eight contiguous states and the federal district of  वॉशिंगटन , d.C.  are in central North America between Canada and Mexico .
The state of Alaska is west of Canada and east of Russia across the Bering  जलसन्धि , और the राज्य of हवाई is  in the mid-North Pacific .
The country  भी रै पाँच आबादी  and nine unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean .
At 3.79 million square miles ( 9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315 million people , the  संयुक्त राज्य is the third- or fourth-largest देश by  total area and the third-largest by both land area and population .
It is one of the world 's most ethnically  विविध और multicultural  nations , the product of large-scale immigration from many countries .
The geography  और जलवायु of the u.S. is भी  extremely diverse , with deserts , plains , forests , and mountains that are home to a wide variety of species .
Paleoindians  migrated इससे एशिया  to what is now the United States mainland around 15,000 years ago .
After 1500 , Old World diseases introduced by Europeans greatly  घटाया उनके  populations .
European  colonization began around 1600  and came mostly from England .
The United States  उभरा  from thirteen British colonies located along the Atlantic seaboard .
Disputes between Great Britain and the American colonies led to the  अमरीकी क्रान्ति  .
On July 4 , 1776 , delegates from the 13 colonies unanimously issued the Declaration of Independence ,  जिससे स्थापित  the United States of America .
The  अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी युद्ध , जिससे  ended with the recognition of independence of the United States from the Kingdom of Great Britain , was the first successful war of independence against a European colonial empire .
The current Constitution was adopted on September 17 , 1787  ; twenty-seven amendments have चूंकि  been added to the Constitution .
The first ten amendments , collectively named the  विधेयक of अधिकारों , यहूद ratified in 1791 और  guarantee many fundamental civil rights and freedoms .
Driven by the doctrine of manifest  नियति , the  United States embarked on a vigorous expansion across North America throughout the 19th century .
This involved  displacing  native tribes , acquiring new territories , and gradually admitting new states .
The American Civil War ended  legalized गुलामी in the  United States .
By the end of the nineteenth  सदी , the संयुक्त  States extended into the Pacific Ocean , and its economy was the world 's largest .
the spanish–american युद्ध और पुष्टि the देश 's औकात as a वैश्विक सैन्य  power .
The United States emerged from as a global superpower , the first country with nuclear weapons , and a  स्थाई सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा  Council .
The end of the Cold War and the dissolution of the Soviet Union left the  संयुक्त  States as the sole superpower .
The United States is a developed country and has the world 's largest national economy , with an estimated 2012 GDP of $ 15.6 trillion 19 % of global GDP at purchasing-power parity ,   as of 2011 .
The per capita GDP of the U.S. was the world 's sixth-highest as of 2010  , हालांकि अमेरिका  's wealth inequality was also ranked highest among OECD countries by the World Bank .
The economy is fueled by an abundance  of प्राकृतिक संसाधन , a well-developed अवसंरचना , और ऊँची  productivity ; and while its economy is considered post-industrial it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers .
The country accounts for 39 % of global military spending , and is a leading economic , political , and  सांस्कृतिक फ़ोर्स in the संसार , as खूब as a नेता  in scientific research and technological innovation .
The NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Championship is a single-elimination tournament played each spring in the United States , currently featuring 68 college basketball teams , to determine the national   championship of the major college basketball teams .
The tournament , organized by the National Collegiate Athletic  संघ ( ncaa  ) , was created during 1939 by the National Association of Basketball Coaches , and was the idea of Ohio State University coach Harold Olsen .
Played mostly during March , it is known informally as March Madness or the Big Dance , and has become one of the most famous annual sporting  कार्यक्रम in the संयुक्त  States .
The NCAA has credited Bob Walsh of the Seattle Organizing Committee for starting  the कूच दीवानगी जश्न  during 1984 .
The tournament teams include champions from 31 Division I conferences ( which receive automatic bids ) , and 37 teams which are awarded at-large berths   .
These `` at-large  '' टीमों हैं चुनी  by an NCAA selection committee , as detailed below .
The 64 teams are divided into four regions and organized into a single elimination `` bracket '' , which predetermines , when a team wins a game ,  जिससे टोली it होगा फेस  next .
Each team is ``  seeded '' , or  ranked , within its region .
After an initial four games between eight lower-ranked  टीमों , the टूर्नामेंट occurs  during the course of three weekends , at pre-selected neutral sites around the United States .
Lower-ranked teams are placed   in the bracket against higher ranked teams .
Each weekend  eliminates three-fourths of the टीमों , इससे a गोलाकार of 64 , to  a `` Sweet Sixteen '' , and for the last weekend of the Tournament a Final Four ; the Final Four is usually played during the first weekend of April .
These four teams , one from  प्रत्येक प्रदेश , तब compete  in one location for the national championship .
The tournament  रै महरूम at  least partially televised since 1969 .
Presently , the games are reported by CBS , TBS , TNT , and  trutv by the  trade-name NCAA March Madness .
Since 2011 , all games are available for viewing  देशभर  .
As television coverage has grown , so too has the  टूर्नामेंट 's लोकप्रियता  .
Presently , millions of Americans `` fill out a bracket '' ,  predicting  winners of all 67 games .
With 11 national titles , UCLA has the record for the most NCAA Men  's प्रभाग  I Basketball Championships ; John Wooden coached UCLA to 10 of its 11 titles .
The University of Kentucky is  दूसरी , साथ 8  national titles , while Indiana University and the University of North Carolina are tied for third with 5 national titles .
Duke University ranks  पांचवां साथ 4  national titles .
A  नमूना of  synthetic motor oil
Synthetic oil is a lubricant consisting  of रासायनिक यौगिकों  that are artificially made ( synthesized ) .
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using chemically modified petroleum components rather than whole crude oil , but can also be synthesized from other  raw  materials .
सिंथेटिक आयल is प्रयुक्त as a स्थानापन्न लिये स्नेहक परिष्कृत इससे पेट्रोलियम जब ऑपरेटिंग in extremes of तापमान , क्युकी , in सामान्य , it provides श्रेष्ठ mechanical और रासायनिक गुण than those मिला in परंपरागत खनिज oils .
Aircraft jet engines , for example , require the use of  सिंथेटिक  oils , whereas aircraft piston engines do not .
Jackass is an  अमरीकी वास्तविकता  series , originally shown on MTV from 2000 to 2002 , featuring people performing various dangerous , crude self-injuring stunts and pranks .
The show served as a launchpad for the television and acting careers of Bam Margera , Steve-O , and also Johnny Knoxville , who  previously था तभी  a few minor acting roles .
Since 2002 , three Jackass films have been produced and  released by एमटीवी कॉरपोरेट  sibling Paramount Pictures , continuing the franchise after its run on television .
The show sparked several spin-offs including Viva La Bam , Wildboyz , Homewrecker  , dr. steve-o और blastazoid  .
The show placed # 68 on  entertainment  Weekly `` New TV Classics '' list .
Roseanne Cherrie  barr ( born नवम्बर 3 , 1952 ) is an  American actress , comedienne , writer , television producer , director , and 2012 presidential nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party .
Barr  began उसके करियर  in stand-up comedy at clubs before gaining fame for her role in the sitcom Roseanne .
The show was a hit and lasted nine  सीज़न , इससे  1988 to 1997 .
She won both an Emmy and a Golden Globe Award for  बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके  work on the show .
Barr had crafted a `` fierce working-class domestic goddess '' persona in the eight years preceding her sitcom and wanted to do a  यथार्थवादी  show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism .
The granddaughter  of  immigrants from Europe and Russia , Barr was the oldest of four children in a working-class Jewish Salt Lake City family ; she was also active in the LDS Church .
In 1974 , she married Bill Pentland ,  साथ जिसको वो था तीन children  , before divorcing in 1990 and marrying comedian Tom Arnold for four years .
विवाद arose जब वो संग `` the  Star-Spangled Banner `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired baseball game , followed by grabbing her crotch and spitting .
After her sitcom ended , she launched her own  बात दिखाएँ , the roseanne  Show , which aired from 1998 to 2000 .
In 2005 , she returned to stand-up comedy with a world  दौरे .
In 2011 , she starred in an unscripted TV  दिखाएँ , roseanne 's nuts , कि lasted  from July to September of that year , about her life on a Hawaiian farm .
In early 2012 , Barr announced her candidacy for the  अध्यक्षीय  nomination of the Green Party .
Barr lost the  नामांकन to  Jill Stein .
She then sought the presidential nomination of the Peace and   Freedom Party , which she won on August 4 , 2012 .
Barr  प्राप्त 61,971 मत  in the general election , placing sixth overall .
Francesco Albani 's 17th  सदी  Baptism of Christ is a typical depiction with the sky opening and the Holy Spirit descending as a dove .
the बपतिस्मा of यीशु marks the शुरूआत of उसके पब्लिक मंत्रालय  .
This event is recorded in the  canonical gospels  of Matthew , Mark and Luke .
John 's gospel does not describe Jesus ' baptism , but John the  बैपटिस्ट  does testify of the other things in .
In the New Testament , John the Baptist preached the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ( ) , and declared himself a forerunner  of  he that would baptize `` with the Holy Ghost and with fire '' ( ) .
In so doing he was preparing the way  लिये यीशु  .
Jesus came to  the जॉर्डन नदी  where he was baptized by John .
The baptismal scene includes the heavens opening , a dove-like descent of the  पावन स्पिरिट , और a आवाज़ इससे  heaven saying , `` This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . ''
Most modern scholars view the fact that Jesus was   baptized by John as an historical event to which a high degree of certainty can be assigned .
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars view it as one of the two historically certain facts about him , and often use  it as  the starting points for the study of the historical Jesus .
The baptism is one of the five major milestones in the gospel narrative of the life of Jesus , the others  होने the बासीलीक , crucifixion  , Resurrection , and Ascension .
Most Christian denominations view the baptism of Jesus as an  महत्वपूर्ण  event and a basis for the Christian rite of baptism ( see also ) .
In Eastern Christianity , Jesus ' baptism is commemorated on 6  जनवरी  , the feast of Epiphany .
In the Roman  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर , the  Anglican Communion , the Lutheran Churches and some other Western denominations , it is recalled on a day within the following week , the feast of the baptism of the Lord .
In Roman Catholicism , the baptism of  यीशु is एक of the चमकदार रहस्यों  sometimes added to the Rosary .
It is a Trinitarian feast in the  पूर्वी  Orthodox Churches .
methylcobalamin ( दिखाया  ) is a form of vitamin B12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as dark red crystals that freely form  cherry-colored पारदर्शी  solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or vitamin B-12 , also called cobalamin , is a water-soluble vitamin with a key role in  the सामान्य  functioning of the brain and nervous system , and for the formation of blood .
It is one of  the आठ  B vitamins .
It is  सामान्यतः शामिल  in the metabolism of every cell of the human body , especially affecting DNA synthesis and regulation , but also fatty acid synthesis and energy production .
Neither  fungi , पौधे  , nor animals are capable of producing vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes  जरूरी लिये इसके संश्लेषण  , although many foods are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis .
The vitamin is  the largest और सबसे structurally  complicated vitamin and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically related compounds ( vitamers ) , all of  जिससे have  vitamin activity .
It contains  the  biochemically rare element cobalt .
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by bacteria ( which usually produce  hydroxocobalamin ) , लकिन परिवर्तन  between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin ,  cyanocobalamin , करता  not occur in nature , but is produced from bacterial hydroxocobalamin and then used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements , and as a food additive , because of its stability and lower production cost .
In the body it is converted to the human  physiological फ़ॉर्म  methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin , leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in minimal concentration .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin , and adenosylcobalamin can be found in more expensive  pharmacological उत्पाद और  food supplements .
The  अतिरिक्त  utility of these is currently debated .
Vitamin B12 was  खोजा इससे  its relationship to the disease pernicious anemia , which is an autoimmune disease in which parietal cells of the stomach responsible for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal absorption of B12 , so a lack of intrinsic factor , as seen in  घातक रक्ताल्पता , कल्याणकारी  a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency and their biochemical   effects have since been elucidated .
Full Metal Jacket  is a  1987 war film produced , directed and co-written by Stanley Kubrick .
It is an adaptation of Gustav Hasford 's 1979 novel The Short-Timers and stars Matthew Modine , Vincent D'Onofrio  , R. ली ermey , arliss हावर्ड  , and Adam Baldwin .
The film follows a platoon of U.S. Marines through their  प्रशिक्षण और the अनुभवों of  two of the platoon 's Marines in the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War .
The film 's title refers to the full metal jacket bullet used by  infantry  riflemen .
The  फिल्मी प्राप्त  critical acclaim .
It received an Academy Award nomination for Best Adapted Screenplay for  kubrick , माइकल हेर और  Gustav Hasford .
In 2001 , the American Film Institute placed Full Metal Jacket at # 95 in their `` AFI 's  100 सालो ... 100  Thrills `` poll .
TMZ is a celebrity news  जालस्थल कि  debuted on November 8 , 2005 .
It was a collaboration between AOL and  telepictures प्रोडक्शन्स , a  division of Warner Bros. , until Time Warner divested AOL in 2009 .
However , it remained  संबद्ध साथ एओएल न्यूज और  has the AOL News logo affixed in the upper right corner .
The name TMZ stands for the  ऐतिहासिक `` स्टुडियो मण्डल `` or 30-mile  zone radius from the intersection of West Beverly Boulevard and North La Cienega Boulevard in Los Angeles .
TMZ 's  मैनेजिंग एडिटर  is Harvey Levin , a lawyer-turned-journalist who was previously a legal expert for the Los Angeles television station KCBS-TV .
The site  दावा कि it करता नहीं अदा लिये कहानियां or  interviews ; however , Levin has admitted that TMZ does `` sometimes pay sources for leads on stories '' .
Levin has stated that `` everything is researched  और vetted लिये सटीकता  . ''
A companion  tv श्रेणी , tmz on  TV , debuted on September 10 , 2007 .
Scream 3 is a 2000 American slasher film created by Kevin Williamson ,  निर्देशित by वेस craven और लिखा by ehren क्रूगर  , starring Neve Campbell , Courteney Cox Arquette and David Arquette .
It was released on February 4 , 2000 as the third installment in the  चीख फिल्मी  series .
The events of the story are set three years after those of Scream 2 and follows Sidney Prescott ( Campbell ) who has gone  into self-imposed अलगाव following  the events of the previous two films but is drawn to Hollywood after a new Ghostface begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 '' .
Scream 3  combines the हिंसा of  the slasher genre with comedy and `` whodunit `` mystery while satirizing the cliché of film trilogies .
Unlike the previous Scream  films , वहीँ थी an increased जोर  on comedic elements and the violence and horror was reduced in response to increased public scrutiny about violence in media following the Columbine High School massacre .
The  फिल्मी थी the concluding  chapter of the Scream series until it was revived with a sequel , Scream 4 , in 2011 .
Williamson provided a five-page outline  लिये दो सिक्वेल to  Scream when auctioning his original script , hoping to entice bidders with the potential of buying a franchise .
Williamson 's commitments to other projects meant he was unable to develop a complete script for Scream 3 and writing duties were undertaken by Ehren Kruger who discarded  much of विलियमसन 's टीप  .
Craven and Marco Beltrami returned to direct and score  the  film respectively as they had with the previous two series entries .
Production was troubled with script   rewrites , with pages sometimes only ready on the day of filming , and scheduling difficulties with the main cast .
Scream 3 performed both financially and critically worse than its preceding films , earning over $ 161 million and with many critics claiming that the film had become what Scream originally  `` spoofed ``  .
Despite negative criticism the film did receive praise with reviewers calling it the perfect end to the  चीख त्रयी  .
as of 2012 , the फिल्मी is फिलहाल the क्रमांक 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर अमेरिका , following चीख at क्रमांक 1 और चीख 2 at क्रमांक 2 .
The  फिल्मी 's साउंडट्रैक  was well-received , spending fourteen weeks on the Billboard 200 and reaching a high of # 32 .
Shoulder impingement syndrome , also called painful arc syndrome , supraspinatus syndrome  , तैराक 's कंधे , और thrower 's कंधे , is a नैदानिक सिंड्रोम जिससे occurs जब the tendons  of the rotator cuff muscles become irritated and inflamed as they pass through the subacromial space , the passage beneath the acromion .
This can result in pain , weakness and loss of movement at the  कंधे .
JLA was a  मासिक कॉमिक किताब  published by DC Comics from January 1997 to April 2006 featuring the Justice League .
The colonial  इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कवर  the history of European settlements from the start of colonization of America until their incorporation into the United States .
In the  लेट 16th सदी  , England , France , Spain and the Netherlands launched major colonization programs in eastern North America .
Small early attempts—such as the English Lost Colony of Roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the death rate of the  पहला  arrivals was very high .
Nevertheless successful   colonies were established .
European settlers came from a variety of  सोशल और धार्मिक  groups .
No  aristocrats settled  permanently , but a number of adventurers , soldiers , farmers , and tradesmen arrived .
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of  नई netherland , the swedes और finns of  New Sweden , the English Quakers of Pennsylvania , the English Puritans of New England , the English settlers of Jamestown , and the `` worthy poor '' of Georgia , came to the new continent and built colonies with distinctive social , religious , political and economic styles .
Occasionally one colony took  कंट्रोल of another ( दौरान  wars between their European parents ) .
Only in Nova Scotia ( now part  of  Canada ) did the conquerors expel the previous colonists .
Instead they all lived side by side in  सलाम  .
There were no major civil wars among the 13 colonies , and the two chief armed rebellions ( in Virginia in 1676 and in New York in 1689–91 )  were  short-lived failures .
Wars between the French and the British—the French and Indian Wars and Father Rale 's War —were recurrent , and involved French-support for Wabanaki  confederacy हमले  on the frontiers .
By 1760 France was  पराजित और the अंग्रेजों जब्त  its colonies .
The four distinct regions were : New England , the Middle Colonies , the Chesapeake Bay Colonies ( Upper South )  और the निम्नतर दक्षिण  .
कुछ इतिहासकारों add a पांचवां प्रदेश , the frontier , जिससे थी never separately व्यवस्थित .
By the time European settlers arrived around 1600–1650 , the majority of the Native Americans living in the eastern United States had been decimated  by नई रोगों , introduced to उन्हें  decades before by explorers and sailors .
See timeline of  औपनिवेशिक  America for list of historical events .
Gloria Laura Vanderbilt ( born February 20 , 1924 ) is an American artist ,  लेखक , अभिनेत्री , heiress , और  socialite most noted as an early developer of designer blue jeans .
She is a member of the prominent  वेंडरबिल्ट परिवार of नई यॉर्क और  the mother of CNN 's Anderson Cooper .
Greece ( Romanization of Greek| ) , officially the  हैलेनिक गणतंत्र  ( ' ) , is a country in Southeast Europe .
According to the 2011 census  , यूनानियों  's population is around 11 million .
Athens is the nation 's capital and largest city , its urban area also  सहित  Piraeus .
Greece is strategically located at the crossroads of Europe , Asia , the Middle East , and Africa , and has land borders with Albania , the Republic of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north  , और तुर्कों to the पूर्वोत्तर  .
The Aegean Sea lies   to the east of mainland Greece , the Ionian Sea to the west , and the Mediterranean Sea to the south .
Greece has the 11th longest coastline in the world at in length , featuring  a विशाल क्रमांक of आइलैंड्स ( लगभग  1,400 , of which 227 are inhabited ) , including Crete , the Dodecanese , the Cyclades , and the Ionian Islands among others .
Eighty percent of Greece consists of mountains , of which Mount  ओलम्पस  is the highest at .
Modern Greece traces its roots to the civilization of Ancient Greece , generally  माना the पालना of पश्चिमी सभ्यता  .
As such , it is the birthplace of democracy , Western philosophy , the Olympic Games , Western literature and  historiography , राजनैतिक विज्ञान , प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक  and mathematical principles , and Western drama , including both tragedy and comedy .
This legacy is partly reflected in the seventeen UNESCO World Heritage  साइट स्तिथ in यूनानियों , रैंकिंग it 7th  in Europe and 13th in the world .
The modern Greek state  थी  established in 1830 , following the Greek War of Independence .
Greece is a founding member of the United Nations , has been a member of what is now the European  संघ चूंकि 1981 ( और the eurozone चूंकि 2001 )  , and has been a member of NATO since 1952 .
Greece is a developed country with an advanced , high-income economy and  बहुत ऊँची मानकों of जीना  , including the world 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010 .
Greece 's  अर्थव्यवस्था is भी the largest  in the Balkans , where Greece is an important regional investor .
A prime meridian is a  मध्याह्न , i.e . a  line of longitude , at which longitude is defined to be 0° .
A  प्रधान मध्याह्न  and its opposite in a 360°-system , the 180th meridian ( at 180° longitude ) , form a great circle .
This great circle   divides the sphere , e.g . the Earth , into two hemispheres .
If one uses directions of East and West from a defined prime meridian , then they  can be पुकारा पूर्वी गोलार्ध और पश्चिमी  Hemisphere .
Gerardus Mercator in his Atlas Cosmographicae ( 1595 ) uses a prime meridian somewhere close to 25°W , passing just to the west of Santa Maria  द्वीप in  the Atlantic .
His 180th meridian runs along the  जलसन्धि  of Anián ( Bering Strait )
A prime meridian is ultimately arbitrary , unlike an equator , which is determined by the axis of rotation—and various conventions have been used or advocated in different regions and  throughout  history .
Minka  dumont केली  ( born Minka Dumont Dufay ; June 24 , 1980 ) is an American actress .
She is perhaps best known for her roles in Charlie  's  Angels , Friday Night Lights , and The Roommate .
R.O.B . ( Robotic Operating Buddy ) , released in Japan as the ,  is an accessory  for the Nintendo Entertainment System ( NES ) .
It was  released in  July 1985 in Japan and later that year in North America .
It had a short product lifespan , with support for only two games which comprised the ``  रोबोट श्रेणी '' ; gyromite और stack-up  .
R.O.B . was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo Entertainment System as something novel in order to alleviate retail fears  following the video game  crash of 1983 .
R.O.B . was available in the Deluxe Set , a configuration for the console that included ,  among अन्य  things , R.O.B . and Gyromite .
stack-up थी खरीदा  separately and included its own physical game pieces .
The Walking Liberty half dollar was a silver 50-cent piece or half dollar coin issued by the United States Mint from 1916   to 1947 ; it was designed by Adolph A. Weinman .
In 1915 , the new Mint Director , Robert W. Woolley , came to believe  कि he थी नहीं तभी अनुमत  but required by law to replace coin designs that had been in use for 25 years .
He therefore began the process of  replacing the नाई coinage : dimes , quarters  and half dollars , all bearing similar designs by long-time Mint Engraver Charles E. Barber , and first struck in 1892 .
Woolley had the Commission of Fine Arts conduct a competition , as a result of which Weinman was  चयनित to डिज़ाइन the dime  and half dollar .
Weinman 's design of Liberty striding towards the Sun for the half dollar proved difficult to perfect , and Treasury Secretary William G. McAdoo , whose department included the Mint , considered  having  Barber create his own design .
Mint officials were successful in getting Weinman 's design into production , although it never struck  बहुत खूब , जिससे may have महरूम a फ़ैक्टर in इसके बदलना  by the Franklin half dollar beginning in 1948 .
Nevertheless , art historian Cornelius Vermeule considered the piece to be among the most  खूबसूरत us सिक्के  .
चूंकि 1986 , a परिवर्धन  of Weinman 's obverse design has been used for the American Silver Eagle .
The Toyota 4Runner is a mid-size sport utility vehicle ( SUV )  उत्पादित by the जापानी निर्माता  Toyota and sold throughout the world from 1984 to present .
In Japan it was known as the Toyota Hilux  लहरे  .
The original 4Runner was a compact SUV and little more than a Toyota pickup truck with a fiberglass shell over the bed , but the model has since  undergone  significant independent development into a cross between a compact and a mid-size SUV .
All 4Runners have been  निर्मित at टोयोटा 's tahara संयंत्र  in Tahara , Aichi , Japan , or at Hino Motors ' Hamura , Japan plant , and in Brazil .
Its mid-size crossover SUV  बंटवारा  is the Toyota Highlander .
This  आलेख सौदे साथ आयुर्विज्ञान  as practiced by trained professionals from ancient times to the present .
The ancient Egyptians had a system of medicine that was very advanced for its time and  बहकावे  later medical traditions .
The Egyptians and  babylonians दोनो introduced  the concepts of diagnosis , prognosis , and medical examination .
The Greeks went even further , and advanced as well  चिकित्सा आचार  .
The Hippocratic Oath , still taken by doctors today , was written in  यूनानियों in the  5th century BCE .
In the medieval era , surgical practices inherited from the ancient masters were improved and then systematized in Rogerius 's The  अभ्यास of सर्जरी .
Universities  began व्यवस्थित प्रशिक्षण  of physicians around the years 1220 in Italy .
During the  पुनर्जागरण , समझना  of anatomy improved , and the microscope was invented .
The  रोगाणु सिद्धान्त of बीमारी  in the 19th century led to cures for many infectious diseases .
Military doctors advanced the methods of trauma treatment  और सर्जरी  .
Public health measures were developed especially in the 19th  सदी  as the rapid growth of cities required systematic sanitary measures .
Advanced research centers opened in the early 20th century , often connected with  प्रमुख अस्पताल  .
The mid-20th century was characterized by new biological treatments , such  as एंटीबायोटिक  .
These advancements , along with developments in chemistry  , आनुवंशिकी , और lab प्रौद्योगिकी ( ऐसे as the  x-ray ) led to modern medicine .
Medicine was heavily professionalized in the 20th century , and new careers opened to women as nurses ( from  the 1870s ) और as physicians ( विशेषकर बाद 1970  ) .
The 21st century is characterized by very  उन्नत शोध  involving numerous fields of science .
The Hippocratic  कॉर्पस , is a संग्रहण of  early medical works from ancient Greece strongly associated with the ancient Greek physician Hippocrates and his teachings .
Potassium is a chemical element with symbol K ( from Neo-Latin kalium ) and  परमाणु क्रमांक  19 .
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white  क्षारीय मेटल कि  oxidizes rapidly in air and is very reactive with water , generating sufficient heat to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame .
Because potassium and sodium are  chemically  very similar , their salts were not at first differentiated .
The existence of multiple elements in their salts was suspected from 1702 , and this was proven in 1807 when potassium and sodium were individually isolated from  अलग लवण  by electrolysis .
Potassium in nature occurs only in  ionic लवण  .
As such , it is found dissolved in seawater  ( जिससे is 0.04 % पोटैशियम by वज़न  ) , and is part of many minerals .
Most industrial  रासायनिक अनुप्रयोग of पोटैशियम employ the अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची घुलनशीलता in जल of पोटैशियम यौगिकों , ऐसे as पोटैशियम soaps .
Potassium metal has only a few special applications , being replaced in most  रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ सोडियम मेटल  .
Potassium ions are necessary for the  फलन of  all living cells .
Potassium ion diffusion is a key mechanism in nerve transmission , and potassium  depletion in पशु , सहित इंसानो , परिणाम  in various cardiac dysfunctions .
Potassium accumulates in plant cells , and thus fresh fruits and vegetables  are a  good dietary source of it .
Conversely , most plants except specialist halophytes are intolerant of salt , and sodium is  उपस्थित  in them only in low concentration .
This resulted in  पोटैशियम  first being isolated from potash , the ashes of plants , giving the element its name .
For the same reason , heavy crop production rapidly depletes soils of potassium , and  agricultural fertilizers  consume 95 % of global potassium chemical production .
The Singapore dollar or dollar ( sign : $ ; code : SGD ) is the official  करेंसी of सिंगापुर  .
It is  सामान्यतः  abbreviated with the dollar sign $ , or alternatively S $ to distinguish it from other dollar -denominated currencies .
It is divided  into  100 cents .
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei Currency and Monetary  फलक स्टिल maintain  the historic exchangeability of their two currencies , the Singaporean dollar and the Brunei dollar , respectively .
The dollar is accepted as `` customary tender '' in Brunei according to the  करेंसी interchangeability अनुबंध  .
Likewise , the Brunei dollar is  customarily  accepted in Singapore
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12 , 1926 – March 25 , 1995 ) was an American  समाजशास्त्री , theorist  and empirical researcher , based chiefly at the University of Chicago .
He was elected president of the  अमरीकी  Sociological Association .
Coleman studied the sociology of education , public policy , and was one of  the earliest उपयोक्ता  of the term `` social capital `` .
His Foundations of Social Theory influenced  समाजशास्त्रीय  theory .
His The Adolescent Society (  1961  ) and `` Coleman Report '' ( Equality of Educational Opportunity , 1966 ) were two of the most heavily cited books in educational sociology .
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform educational theory , reshape national education policies , and influenced public and  scholarly राय regarding the भूमिका of schooling in determining समता  and productivity in the United States .
Superman ( from DC comics ) was the  पहला सुपरहीरो  created , art by Jim Lee .
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or  सुपर नायिका  ) is a type of stock character possessing `` extraordinary or superhuman powers '' and dedicated to protecting the public .
Since the debut of the prototypical superhero Superman in 1938 , stories of superheroes—ranging from  ब्रैड episodic adventures to continuing years-long  sagas—have dominated American comic books and crossed over into other media .
The word itself  तिथियाँ to at  least 1917 .
A  मादा सुपरहीरो is  sometimes called a superheroine ( also rendered super-heroine or super heroine ) .
`` SUPER HEROES '' is a trademark co-owned by DC  कॉमिक्स और आश्चर्य  Comics .
By most definitions , characters do not strictly require actual superhuman powers to be deemed   superheroes , although terms such as costumed crime fighters or masked vigilantes are sometimes used to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow without such powers who share other common superhero traits .
Such characters were generally referred to as `` mystery men '' in the so-called Golden  आयु of कॉमिक किताबे to फर्क उन्हें इससे  characters with super-powers .
Normally , superheroes use their powers to counter  day-to-day अपराधों जबकि  also combating threats against humanity by supervillains , their criminal counterparts .
Often , one of these  supervillains होगा  be the superhero 's archenemy .
As well , some longrunning  superheroes , ऐसे as सुपरमैन ,  Batman , Spider-Man and Iron Man each has a rogues gallery of enemies .
As well , superheroes sometimes will combat such irregular threats as aliens , magical/ fantasy entities , American war enemies such as  नात्सीवाद or साम्यवादी  , and godlike or demonic creatures .

The Shawshank Redemption is  a 1994  American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont and starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman .
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption  , the फिल्मी tells the स्टोरी  of Andy Dufresne , a banker who spends nearly two decades in Shawshank State Prison for the murder of his wife and her lover despite his claims of innocence .
During his time at the prison , he befriends a fellow inmate , Ellis Boyd `` Red '' Redding , and finds himself protected by the guards after the  वार्डन begins using उसे  in his money laundering operation .
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget , the film  प्राप्त अनुकूल समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , अनेक पुरस्कार nominations  , and has since enjoyed a remarkable life on cable television , VHS , DVD , and Blu-ray .
It was included in the American Film Institute 's 100 Years ... 100 Movies  10th  Anniversary Edition .
IT management is the discipline whereby all of the technology resources of a firm are managed  in accordance  with its needs and priorities .
These resources may include tangible investments like computer hardware , software , data , networks and data centre  सुविधाएं , as खूब as the staffs जो हैं नियुक्त to maintain  them .
Managing this responsibility within a company entails many of the basic management functions , like budgeting , staffing , and organizing  और controlling , साथ  with other aspects that are unique to technology , like change management , software design , network planning , tech support etc .
the penitentiary of नई मैक्सिको  Prison Riot , which took place on February 2 and 3 , 1980 , in the state 's maximum security prison south of Santa Fe , was one of the most violent prison riots in the history of the American correctional system : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates were treated for injuries .
None of the 12 officers taken hostage were killed , but seven were treated for  चोटों caused  by beatings and rapes .
This was  the तीसरा प्रमुख riot  at the NM State Penitentiary , the first occurring on 19 July 1922 and the second on 15 June 1953 .
Author Roger Morris suggests the death toll may have been higher , as a number of bodies were incinerated or  dismembered दौरान the कोर्स of the  mayhem .

The Northern Cardinal (  cardinalis cardinalis ) is a उत्तर  American bird in the genus Cardinalis ; it is also known colloquially as the redbird or common cardinal .
It can be  मिला in दक्षिणी कनाडा  , through the eastern United States from Maine to Texas and south through Mexico .
It is  मिला in वुडलैंड्स  , gardens , shrublands , and swamps .
The Northern  कार्डिनल  is a mid-sized songbird with a body length of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ) .
It has a distinctive crest on the  सिर और a मुखौटा on the फेस  which is black in the male and gray in the female .
The male is a vibrant red , while the female is a dull  red-brown  shade .
The Northern Cardinal is mainly granivorous ,  लकिन भी फ़ीड्स on कीट और फल  .
The male  behaves territorially  , marking out his territory with song .
During courtship , the  पुरूष  feeds seed to the female beak-to-beak .
A clutch of three to four eggs is laid , and two to  चार चंगुल हैं उत्पादित प्रत्येक  year .
It was once prized as a pet , but its sale  as cage  birds is now banned in the United States by the Migratory Bird Treaty Act of 1918 .
Surface runoff , also  पुकारा nonpoint  source pollution , from a farm field in Iowa during a rain storm .
Topsoil as well as farm fertilizers and other potential pollutants run off   unprotected farm fields when heavy rains occur .
Topsoil is the  अपर , outermost  layer of soil , usually the top to .
It has the highest concentration of organic matter and  microorganisms और is  where most of the Earth 's biological soil activity occurs .
musical  cryptogram : `` Aschbeg '' set in Schoenberg 's Sechs kleine Klavierstücke , Op . 19 , no . 1 , m. 5 .
Note that the notes do not come in spelling order but are all adjacent ( not separated by other notes  )  .
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke , Op . 19 ( or Six Little Piano  टुकड़े ) is a नियत of टुकड़े लिये  solo piano written by the Austrian composer Arnold Schoenberg , published in 1913 .
McAfee , Inc. ( ) is an American global computer security software company headquartered in Santa Clara , California , and the world 's largest dedicated  सुरक्षा प्रौद्योगिकी कम्पनी  .
As of February 28 ,  2011 , मैक्एफ़ी is a wholly स्वामित्व  subsidiary of Intel .
McAfee 's competitors in the antivirus industry are Avira , BitDefender , BullGuard ,  f-secure , frisk , kaspersky ,  Symantec , and Trend Micro to name a few .
संत रीता of cascia ( born margherita lotti 1381 - may 22 , 1457 ) थी an इतालवी augustinian नन , विधवा और संत venerated in the रोमन कैथोलिक  Church .
Rita was  शादीशुदा  at an early age .
The marriage lasted for 18 years , during which she is remembered for her Christian values as a model wife and mother who made  प्रयत्न to बदलें उसके husband इससे उसके गाली बर्ताव  .
Upon the murder of her husband by another feuding family , she  sought to dissuade उसके बेटे  from revenge .
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of religious sisters , where she was known for practicing mortification of the flesh , along with the apparent efficacy of her  प्रार्थनाएं  .
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession , and is often portrayed with a bleeding wound on her  माथे , जिससे the रोमन कैथोलिक  Church claims to have been a partial stigmata .
The Roman Catholic Church , under the pontificate of Pope Leo XIII officially canonized Rita on May 24 , 1900 ,  जबकि उसके feast दिन  is celebrated every May 22 .
In many pious Catholic countries , Rita is known to be a patroness for  abused पत्नियां  and mourning women .
North America is a continent wholly within  the  Northern Hemisphere and almost wholly within the Western Hemisphere .
It is also considered a northern  उपमहाद्वीप  of the Americas .
It is bordered to the north by the Arctic Ocean , to the east by the Atlantic Ocean , to the west and  दक्षिण  by the Pacific Ocean , and to the southeast by South America and the Caribbean Sea .
North America  कवर an क्षेत्रफल of परिचय 24,709,000 वर्गाकार  kilometers ( 9,540,000 square miles ) , about 4.8 % of the planet 's surface or about 16.5 % of its land area .
As of  जुलाई 2008 , इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी अनुमानित at nearly 529  million people across 23 independent states , representing about 7.5 % of the human population .
North America is the third-largest continent in area , following Asia and Africa , and the fourth  in जनसांख्यिकी बाद एशिया  , Africa , and Europe .
The first people to live in North America were Paleoindians who began to arrive  दौरान the पिछला glacial  period by crossing the Bering land bridge .
They differentiated into a number of diverse  संस्कृतियों और समुदायों  across the continent .
the largest और  most advanced Pre-Columbian civilizations in North America were the Aztecs in what is now Mexico and the Mayans in Central America .
European colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th and 17th centuries  ,  wiping out large numbers of the native populations and beginning an era of European dominance .
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28 , 1985 ) , better known by his stage name J. Cole , is an American hip-hop recording artist and record producer from   Fayetteville , North Carolina .
In 2009 , he  became the पहला  artist to sign to Jay-Z 's Roc Nation label .
His long-awaited debut album , entitled Cole World : The Sideline Story ,  थी released  on September 27 , 2011 .
The album debuted at number one on the US Billboard 200 , Top R & B Albums and Top Rap Albums chart , selling more than 218,000 in its  पहला  week .
He received a nomination for Best New Artist at the 54th Grammy  पुरस्कार  .
The two main characters of the series , Ratchet ( right ) and  clank  ( left ) .
Ratchet &  clank is  a series of platform video games .
The franchise was created and developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles , such as PlayStation 2 and PlayStation 3 with the exclusion of Size Matters and Secret Agent Clank , which were  विकसित  by High Impact Games for the PlayStation Portable .
Every game in  the श्रेणी  has been released for every console , as the IP is owned by Sony Computer Entertainment .
An animated feature film adaptation produced by Rainmaker Entertainment and Blockade Entertainment is scheduled for a theatrical   release sometime in 2015 .
The games take place in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures  of ratchet ( an animalistic human-like अक्षर  known as a Lombax , who is a mechanic ) and Clank ( a diminutive , sentient robot ) as they travel through the universe , saving it from evil forces on a regular basis .
The series is noted for the inclusion of many exotic and unique , over  the शीर्ष हथियार  and devices , a concept that Insomniac Games also expanded into their other games .
A will or testament is a  विधिक घोषणा by जिससे a व्यक्ति  , the testator , names one or more persons to manage his/her estate and provides for the transfer of his property at death .
For the devolution of property not disposed of by will , see inheritance  और  intestacy .
In the strictest sense , a `` will '' has historically been limited to real property while `` testament '' applies only to dispositions of personal  प्रॉपर्टी ( यूँ giving वृद्धि to the लोकप्रिय शीर्षक of the दस्तावेज़ as `` पिछला होगा  and Testament '' ) , though this distinction is seldom observed today .
A will may also  बनाएँ a testamentary विश्वास  that is effective only after the death of the testator .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain  सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार और can  supply power 24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light  और ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य , रै  been harnessed by humans since ancient times using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity , solar architecture and artificial photosynthesis ,  जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान  to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly  characterized as either  passive solar or active solar depending on the way they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques  शामिल the  use of photovoltaic panels and solar thermal collectors to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials with  अनुकूल  thermal mass or light dispersing properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable , inexhaustible and clean solar energy technologies  होगा have विशाल longer-term लाभ  .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly import-independent  संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce प्रदूषण , निम्नतर the लागत  of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These  लाभ  are global .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for early deployment should be considered learning  निवेश ;  they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
Sir Thomas More ( ; 7 February 14786 July 1535 ) , known to Roman  catholics as संत थामस अधिक चूंकि 1935 , थी an अंग्रेज़ी वकील ,  social philosopher , author , statesman , and noted Renaissance humanist .
He was an important councillor to Henry VIII of England and was Lord Chancellor from  अक्तूबर 1529  to 16 May 1532 .
He was canonized by Pope Pius XI in 1935 as one of the early martyrs of the schism that separated the  गिरिजाघर  of England from Rome in the 16th century .
In 2000 , Pope John Paul  ii घोषित उसे  patron of Catholic statesmen and politicians .
More was an opponent of the Protestant Reformation , in  particular of मार्टिन लूथर और विलियम  Tyndale .
However , since 1980 , he is also commemorated by the  गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड as a reformation  martyr .
More coined the word ``  यूटोपिया `` – a नाम he दिया to  the ideal and imaginary island nation , the political system of which he described in Utopia , published in 1516 .
He opposed the  किंग 's विरह इससे  the Roman Catholic Church and refused to accept him as Supreme Head of the Church of England , a title which had been given by parliament through the Act of Supremacy of 1534 .
He was imprisoned in 1534 for his refusal to take the oath required by the First  उत्तराधिकार अधिनियम , क्युकी  the act disparaged Papal Authority and Henry’s marriage to Catherine of Aragon .
In 1535 , he was tried for treason , convicted on perjured testimony , and  beheaded  .
More also helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at straws '' to  औसत `` शिद्दत  trying even useless things '' , in his Dialogue of Comfort Against Tribulation .
intellectuals और  statesmen across Europe were stunned by More 's execution .
erasmus saluted उसे as एक `` जिनकी आत्मा थी अधिक  pure than any snow , whose genius was such that England never had and never again will have its like '' .
There was a more controversial side to More 's life , because he advocated the persecution and execution of Protestants who refused to  recant उनके आस्था  .
However , the judgement of history has been largely willing to forgive this in light of the  टाइम्स he जिया in  and his martyrdom in the Roman Catholic cause .
Two centuries later Jonathan Swift said More was `` the person of the greatest virtue this kingdom ever produced '' , a sentiment  साथ जिससे  Samuel Johnson agreed .
Historian Hugh Trevor-Roper said in 1977 that More was `` the first great Englishman whom we feel that we know , the most saintly of humanists , the most human of saints , the  सार्वभौमिक man of हमारी कूल उत्तरी पुनर्जागरण  . ''
Captain  nemo  , also known as Prince Dakkar , is a fictional character invented by the French science fiction author Jules Verne .
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels , Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea ( 1870 ) and The Mysterious Island  ( 1874 ) , और  makes a cameo appearance in Verne 's play Journey Through the Impossible ( 1882 ) .
Nemo , one of the most famous antiheroes in  fiction , is a रहस्यमय  figure .
The son of  an भारतीय राजा , he  is a scientific genius who roams the depths of the sea in his submarine , the Nautilus , which was built on a deserted island .
Nemo tries to project a stern , controlled confidence , but he is driven by a thirst for vengeance and a hatred of imperialism ( particularly the  अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य  ) .
He is also wracked by remorse over the deaths of  उसके क्रू सदस्यों और भी by the  deaths of enemy sailors .
Nemo has appeared in various adaptations of  वर्न 's novels , सहित  films , where he has been portrayed by a number of different actors .
He has furthermore been adopted by other authors for inclusion in their novels , most notably in Alan Moore 's The League of  असाधारण सज्जनों  and Philip José Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas Fogg .
