Acoustic  coupler  modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a device that modulates an analog carrier signal to encode digital information ,  और भी demodulates ऐसे a वाहक सिग्नल to डिकोड the  transmitted information .
The goal is to produce a signal that can be transmitted easily and   decoded to reproduce the original digital data .
Modems can be used over any means of transmitting analog signals , from light emitting  diodes to  radio .
The most familiar example is a voice band modem  कि turns the  digital data of a personal computer into modulated electrical signals in the voice frequency range of a telephone channel .
ये सिग्नल  can be transmitted over telephone lines and demodulated by another modem at the receiver side to recover the digital data .
Modems are generally classified by the amount of data they can send in a given unit of time , usually expressed in bits per second ( bit/s , or  bps ) , or बाइट्स प्रति दूसरी (  B/s ) .
Modems can alternatively be classified by their   symbol rate , measured in baud .
The baud unit denotes symbols per second , or the number  of टाइम्स प्रति दूसरी the  modem sends a new signal .
लिये उदाहरण , the itu v.21 मानक प्रयुक्त ऑडियो आवृत्ति शिफ़्ट keying  with two possible frequencies corresponding to two distinct symbols ( or one bit per symbol ) , to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud .
By contrast , the original ITU V.22 standard , which was able to transmit and receive four distinct symbols ( two bits   per symbol ) , handled 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 symbols per second ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying .
The Declaration of Independence is a statement adopted by the Continental Congress on July 4 , 1776 , which announced that the thirteen American colonies , then at war with Great  ब्रिटेन , regarded themselves  as independent states , and no longer a part of the British Empire .
Instead they  अभी formed  a new nation—the United States of America .
John Adams was a  नेता in pushing लिये  independence , which was unanimously approved on July 2 .
A committee had already drafted the formal declaration , to be ready when  कॉंग्रेस voted  on independence .
Adams  persuaded  the committee to select Thomas Jefferson to compose the original draft of the document , which congress would edit to produce the final version .
The Declaration was ultimately a formal explanation of why Congress had voted on July 2 to declare independence from Great Britain , more than a  साल बाद the outbreak of the  American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the Independence Day is  मनाये on जुलाई 4  , although Adams wanted July 2 .
After ratifying the text on July 4 ,  कॉंग्रेस  issued the Declaration of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published as the printed  डनलप broadside  that was widely distributed and read to the public .
the सबसे प्रसिद्ध संस्करण of the घोषणा  , a signed copy that is popularly regarded as the Declaration of Independence , is displayed at the National Archives in Washington , D.C .
हालांकि the wording  of the Declaration was approved on July 4 , the date of its signing was August 2 .
The original July 4  संयुक्त  States Declaration of Independence manuscript was lost while all other copies have been derived from this original document .
the स्त्रोत और  interpretation of the Declaration have been the subject of much scholarly inquiry .
The Declaration justified the independence of the United States by listing colonial  grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज  III , and by asserting certain natural and legal rights , including a right of revolution .
Having served its original purpose in announcing independence , the  टेक्स्ट of the घोषणा  was initially ignored after the American Revolution .
Since then , it has come to be considered a major  बयान on इंसान अधिकारों ,  particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident , that all men are created equal , that they are endowed by  उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable  Rights , that among these are Life , Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness .
This has  महरूम पुकारा `` एक of the  best-known sentences in the English language '' , containing `` the most potent and consequential words in American history . ''
The passage came to represent a moral standard to  जिससे  the United States should strive .
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln , who considered the Declaration to be the foundation of his political philosophy , and argued that the Declaration is a  बयान of सिद्धान्त through  which the United States Constitution should be interpreted .
It has inspired  कार्य लिये the  rights of marginalized people throughout the world .
The Economy of Greenland  can be characterized  as small , mixed and vulnerable .
The present economy consists of a big public sector and comprehensive foreign trade , which has resulted in an economy with periods of strong growth , considerable inflation , unemployment problems and extreme dependence on capital inflow from Denmark  और उपयोग of बाहर  , mainly Danish , skilled labor .
GDP per capita is similar to the average  यूरोपीय economies लकिन the अर्थव्यवस्था is critically निर्भर upon  substantial support from the Danish government , which supplies about half the revenues of the home rule government who in turn employ about 8,000 Greenlanders out of a labor force of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ) .
Unemployment nonetheless remains high , with the rest of the economy dependent upon  माँग लिये निर्यात  of shrimp and fish .
Hydrogen is a chemical element with  प्रतीक  H and atomic number 1 .
With an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ) , hydrogen  is the lightest तत्व और  its monatomic form ( H1 ) is the most abundant chemical substance , constituting roughly 75 % of the Universe 's baryonic mass .
Non- remnant stars are  मुख्यतः रचित  of hydrogen in its plasma state .
At standard temperature and pressure ,  हाइड्रोजन is  a colorless , odorless , tasteless , non-toxic , nonmetallic , highly combustible diatomic gas with the molecular formula H2 .
Most of the hydrogen  on धरती is in अणुओं ऐसे as जल  and organic compounds because hydrogen readily forms covalent compounds with most non-metallic elements .
Hydrogen plays a particularly important role in acid-base chemistry with many reactions exchanging  protons between घुलनशील  molecules .
In ionic compounds , it can take a negative charge ( an anion  ज्ञात as a हाइड्राइड और  written as H− ) , or as a positively charged species H+ .
The latter cation is written as though composed of a bare proton , but in reality , hydrogen  cations in ionic यौगिकों  always occur as more complex species .
The most common isotope of hydrogen is protium ( name rarely used , symbol 1H ) with a single proton and  no  neutrons .
As the simplest atom known , the hydrogen atom has  महरूम of सैद्धांतिक  use .
For example , as the only neutral atom with an analytic solution to the Schrödinger equation , the study of the energetics and  संबंध of the हाइड्रोजन  atom played a key role in the development of quantum mechanics .
Hydrogen gas was first artificially  उत्पादित  in the early 16th century , via the mixing of metals with acids .
In 1766–81 , Henry Cavendish was the first to recognize that hydrogen gas was a discrete substance , and that it produces water when burned , a property which later gave it its name : in Greek , hydrogen means  `` water-former ''  .
Industrial   production is mainly from the steam reforming of natural gas , and less often from more energy-intensive hydrogen production methods like the electrolysis of water .
Most hydrogen is employed near its production site , with the two largest uses being fossil fuel processing ( e.g. , hydrocracking ) and ammonia production , mostly  लिये the उर्वरक  market .
Hydrogen is a concern in metallurgy as it can embrittle many metals ,  complicating the डिज़ाइन of  pipelines and storage tanks .
Unstoppable is a 2010 American action thriller film directed by Tony Scott ,  लिखा by चिह्नित bomback ,  and starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine .
The film , loosely based on the real-life CSX 8888 incident , tells  the स्टोरी of a runaway भाड़ा  train , and the two men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to stop it .
It was  स्कॉट  's final feature film before his death in 2012 .
The film was released in the United  राज्य और  Canada on November 12 , 2010 , and in the United Kingdom on November 24 , 2010 .
It received mostly favorable reviews from film critics ; it garnered a `` Certified Fresh '' rating on Rotten Tomatoes based upon aggregated reviews and a  दरजा of `` generally  favorable reviews '' at Metacritic .
The film was nominated for an Academy Award for Best  ध्वनि संपादन  at the 83rd Academy Awards , but lost to Inception .
In photography , bracketing is the  सामान्य  technique of taking several shots of the same subject using different camera settings .
Bracketing is useful and often recommended in situations that make it difficult to obtain a satisfactory image with  a सिंगल शॉट , विशेषकर जब a छोटी विभिन्नता  in exposure parameters has a comparatively large effect on the resulting image .
Autobracketing is  स्वचालित bracketing by using  a setting on the camera to take several bracketed shots ( in contrast to the photographer altering the settings by hand between each shot ) .
Given the time it takes to accomplish  अनेक  shots , it is typically , but not always , used for static subjects .
Insulated glazing ( IG ) , more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane , and increasingly triple glazing/pane ) are double or triple glass window panes separated by an air or other  गैस भर स्पेस to reduce ऊष्मा ट्रांसफ़र  across a part of the building envelope .
Insulated Glass Units are  manufactured साथ कांच  in range of thickness from 3 mm to 10 mm or more in special applications .
Laminated or tempered glass may also be used as part of  the निर्माण  .
सबसे इकाई  are manufactured with the same thickness of glass used on both panes but special applications such as acoustic attenuation or security may require wide ranges of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit .
A sectioned diagram of a fixed Insulated Glazed Unit ( IGU ) , indicating the numbering  सम्मेलन प्रयुक्त in  this article .
Surface # 1 is facing outside , Surface # 2 is the inside surface of the exterior  फलक , सतह # 3 is the बाहर सतह of the  interior pane , and Surface # 4 is the inside surface of interior pane .
The window frame is labelled # 5 , a spacer is indicated as # 6 , seals are shown in red ( # 7 ) , the internal reveal is on the  सही हाथ पक्ष ( # 8 ) और  the exterior windowsill on the left ( # 9 )
To reduce shear effects on the sealed unit ( a major cause of premature failure ) , manufacturers use a rule of thumb that permits a difference of 1 mm between the thickness of the panes of glass used in the  ईकाई और स्टिल maintain  the warranty for the unit .
For example , a unit may be ordered with a 4 mm pane on  the exterior और a 3  mm pane on the interior .
These variations are allowed for  architectural  and cost reasons .
Other  combinations can be निर्दिष्ट और उत्पादित  but the manufacturer may reserve the right to limit the term of the warranty or refuse to warranty the unit altogether .
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned unit are named according to the  following सम्मेलन : सतह # 1 ( facing बाहर ) , सतह  # 2 ( inside of outside pane ) , Surface # 3 ( outside of inside pane ) and Surface # 4 ( inside surface of inside pane ) .
Applying  the सम्बन्धित नामकरण  for triple paned units results in surfaces # 1 through # 6 .
The performance of insulating glazing can be modified through the   use of the following:
A typical installation  of insulated  glazing windows with uPVC window frames .
Selenium is a chemical element with symbol Se and  परमाणु क्रमांक  34 .
It is a nonmetal with properties that are intermediate between those of its periodic table  column-adjacent chalcogen  elements sulfur and tellurium .
It rarely occurs in its  elemental  state in nature , or as pure ore compounds .
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene meaning `` Moon  '' ) was discovered  in 1817 by Jöns Jacob Berzelius , who noted the similarity of the new element to the previously-known tellurium ( named for the Earth ) .
Selenium is found impurely in metal sulfide ores , where it partially  replaces the  sulfur .
Commercially , selenium is  उत्पादित as a byproduct  in the refining of these ores , most often during copper production .
Minerals that are pure selenide or selenate compounds are  ज्ञात , लकिन  are rare .
The chief commercial uses for selenium  आज हैं in glassmaking  and in pigments .
Selenium is a semiconductor and is used in  photocells  .
Uses in electronics , once important , have been mostly  supplanted by सिलिकॉन सेमीकंडक्टर  devices .
Selenium  continues  to be used in a few types of DC power surge protectors and one type of fluorescent quantum dot .
Selenium  लवण हैं विषाक्त in विशाल amounts  , but trace amounts are necessary for cellular function in many organisms , including all animals .
Selenium is a component of the antioxidant enzymes glutathione peroxidase and thioredoxin reductase ( which  indirectly reduce निश्चित oxidized  molecules in animals and some plants ) .
It is also found in three deiodinase  एंजाइमों , जिससे बदलें  one thyroid hormone to another .
Selenium requirements in plants differ by species , with some plants requiring relatively  विशाल amounts ,  and others apparently requiring none .
The United States presidential election  of  2008 was the 56th quadrennial presidential election .
It was held on Tuesday ,  नवम्बर 4 ,  2008 .
Democrat Barack Obama , then the junior Senator from Illinois , defeated Republican  जॉन मैक्केन , the  senior Senator from Arizona .
As the campaign progressed , the War in Iraq and outgoing Republican  अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश था become  increasingly unpopular , and the major-party candidates ran on a platform of change and reform .
Domestic policy and the economy eventually emerged as the main themes in the last few months of the election campaign  बाद the onset of the worst  recession since the 1930s .
Obama  होता go  on to win a decisive victory over McCain in both the electoral and popular vote .
Obama received the most votes for a presidential candidate in American history , and won the popular and electoral vote by the largest  हाशिया in 12 सालो , as खूब as the largest प्रतिशत  of the popular vote for a Democrat in nearly a half-century .
This was the first U.S. presidential election in which an African American was elected , having also been the first  in जिससे an अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी जीती the नामांकन of either प्रमुख  party .
This election was also notable for being  the पहला समय in u.S. इतिहास कि दोनो प्रमुख पार्टी उम्मीदवार यहूद बैठे u.s . सीनेटरों  , only the third time ( after 1920 and 1960 ) that any sitting U.S . Senator was elected president , and only the second time that the winning President and Vice President ( Obama and Biden ) were both sitting U.S . Senators .
This was  भी the पहला चुनाव चूंकि 1952  in which neither of the major parties ' nominees was the incumbent President or Vice President .
The  sovereign प्रिंस or राजकुमारी of मोनाको is the reigning monarch और सिर of राज्य of the principality of मोनाको .
All princes or princesses have officially  लिया the नाम of the हाउस of grimaldi , लकिन have belonged  to various other houses ( Goyon de Matignon , Polignac ) in male line .
The reigning  प्रिंस is  Albert II .
Visualization of fragmentation  और तब  of defragmentation
In  the मेंटेनेंस  of file systems , defragmentation is a process that reduces the amount of fragmentation .
It does this by physically organizing the contents of the mass storage device  प्रयुक्त to स्टोर फाइलें into  the smallest number of contiguous regions ( fragments ) .
It also attempts to create larger regions of free space  using compaction  to impede the return of fragmentation .
कुछ defragmentation उपयोगिताएँ कोशिश to रखना छोटी फाइलें भीतर a सिंगल निर्देशिका साथ , as वे हैं प्रायः पहुँचा in  sequence .
Defragmentation is  लाभदायक और प्रासंगिक  to file systems on electromechanical disk drives .
The  गति  of the hard drive 's read/write heads over different areas of the disk when accessing fragmented files is slower , compared to accessing the entire contents of a non-fragmented file sequentially without moving the read/write heads to seek other fragments .
A service-level agreement ( SLA ) is a part of a service contract where a  सेवा is formally पारिभाषित  .
In practice , the term SLA is sometimes used  to refer to the contracted  delivery time ( of the service or performance ) .
As an example , internet service providers will commonly include service level agreements within the terms of  उनके अनुबंध साथ ग्राहक to define the स्तर (  s ) of service being sold in plain language terms .
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical  परिभाषा in शर्तें of औसत समय between  failures ( MTBF ) , mean time to repair or mean time to recovery ( MTTR ) ; various data rates ; throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details .
Union Station is a former shopping mall in Union City , Georgia , in southwest metro Atlanta  सटा to  Interstate 85 .
After new ownership  और renovations in 2006 , the नाम थी  changed from Shannon Southpark Mall in 2007 to Union Station Mall .
A previous renovation was done in the  लेट 1990s  .

The contiguous United States are the 48 adjoining U.S. states on the continent of North America that are south of  कनाडा और उत्तर of मैक्सिको , प्लस the ज़िला of  Columbia .
The term  excludes  the states of Alaska and Hawaii , and all off-shore U.S. territories and possessions , such as Puerto Rico .
Together , the 48 contiguous states and D.C. occupy a combined area of , which is  1.58 % of the कुल सतह  area of the Earth .
Of this , is  land  , composing 83.65 % of U.S. land area .
Officially , is water area  , composing  62.66 % of the nation 's water area .
The 2010 census population was 306,675,006 , composing 99.33 % of the nation 's population , and a density of 103.639  inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2  ) , compared to 87.264/sq mi ( 33.692/km2 ) for the nation as a whole .
`` Why '' is the title of a song recorded by American country  बैंड rascal  Flatts .
It is the third single from their sixth studio  एल्बम  , Unstoppable .

It was written by Rob Mathes and  एलन shamblin  .
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness , medical need and efficiency of health  परवाह सेवाएं प्रक्रियाओं  and facilities according to established criteria or guidelines and under the provisions of an applicable health benefits plan .
Typically it includes new  क्रियाएँ or निर्णय आधारित  upon the analysis of a case .
utilization प्रबन्धन describes proactive  procedures , including discharge planning , concurrent planning , pre-certification and clinical case appeals .
It also covers proactive processes , such as concurrent clinical reviews and peer reviews , as well as  appeals introduced by  the provider , payer or patient .
As pre-certification   and concurrent review of cases grew , utilization management spun out of utilization review .
While not synonymous , health  परवाह  professionals tend to use the terms as interchangeable .
The difference is utilization management is and intends to manage health care cases efficiently and cost  effectively पहले और  during health care administration .
Utilization review is more  considering whether स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी appropriately  applied after it was administered .
There are four  मौलिक तकनीकों  in utilization management:
माँग प्रबन्धन
utilization पुनर्विलोकन
Case  प्रबन्धन
बीमारी  Management
The Outsiders is a coming-of-age novel by S. E. Hinton , first published  in 1967 by viking दबायें .
Hinton was 15 when she started writing the novel , but  किया सबसे of the  work when she was sixteen and a junior in high school .
Hinton was 18 when  the किताब  was published .
The book follows two rival groups , the Greasers and the  socs ( सुनाया by the लेखक as , छोटी  for Socials ) , who are divided by their socioeconomic status .
The book takes place in Tulsa , Oklahoma , in  1965  , but it is never stated in the book .
A film adaptation was produced in 1983 , and a little-known short-lived  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी appeared  in 1990 , picking up where the movie left off .
The United States House of Representatives is one of  the दो घरों  of the United States Congress ( a bicameral legislature ) .
It is frequently  referred to  as the House .
The other house is the  सीनेट  .
The composition and powers of the  हाउस  are established in Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its bills must also be passed by the Senate and further agreed to by the U.S. President before becoming law  ( जबतक दोनो the हाउस और  Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power  to initiate आय बिल्स  , to impeach officials , and to elect the U.S. President in case there is no majority in the Electoral College .
प्रत्येक u.S. राज्य is represented in the हाउस in proportion to इसके जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is हकदार to at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि .
The most  populous  state , California , currently has 53 representatives .
The total number of voting representatives is fixed  by विधि  at 435 .
Each  प्रतिनिधि  serves for a two-year term .
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives , who presides over the chamber , is elected by the members of the House , and is therefore traditionally the leader of the  हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन सम्मेलन  , whichever party has more voting members .
The House meets in the  दक्षिण  wing of the United States Capitol .
A supply chain is actually a complex and  डायनेमिक सप्लाई और माँग  network .
( cf .  wieland/wallenburg  , 2011 )
A supply chain is a system of organizations , people , activities , information , and resources involved in moving a product or service from supplier  to ग्राहक  .
Supply chain activities transform  प्राकृतिक संसाधन , कच्चा  materials , and components into a finished product that is delivered to the end customer .
In sophisticated supply chain systems , used products may  re-enter the सप्लाई कड़ी  at any point where residual value is recyclable .
Supply chains  कड़ी  value chains .
`` Purple Haze '' is a  सोंग लिखा और अंकित  by Jimi Hendrix in 1967 , released as the second single by The Jimi Hendrix Experience in both the United Kingdom and the United States .
It later appeared on  the अमरीकी  version of the band 's 1967 album Are You Experienced .
`` Purple  haze '' रै  become one of the `` archetypical psychedelic drug songs of the sixties '' .
`` Purple Haze 's '' guitar virtuosic techniques would be emulated by many metal  guitarists  .
A  बंद  up picture of a rhinoceros skin .
Skin is the  नरम  outer covering of vertebrates .
अन्य एनिमल  coverings such as the arthropod exoskeleton have different developmental origin , structure and chemical composition .
The adjective  cutaneous अर्थात् `` of the स्किन ''  ( from Latin cutis , skin ) .
In mammals , the skin is the largest organ of the integumentary system made up of multiple layers of ectodermal tissue , and  गार्ड the underlying  muscles , bones , ligaments and internal organs .
Skin of a different nature exists in amphibians ,  सरीसृपों , और पक्षियों  .
सब स्तनधारियों have कुछ बाल on उनके स्किन , भी समुद्री स्तनधारियों जिससे appear to be hairless  .
The skin interfaces with the environment and is the first line of  रक्षा  from external factors .
For  उदाहरण  , the skin plays a key role in protecting the body against pathogens and excessive water loss .
Its other functions are insulation , temperature  विनियमन , सनसनी  , and the production of vitamin D folates .
Severely damaged skin may  चंगा by forming scar  tissue .
This is  sometimes discoloured  and depigmented .
The thickness  of  skin also varies from location to location on an organism .
In humans for example , the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids is the thinnest skin in the body at 0.5 mm thick , and is one of the first areas to show signs  of वृद्धावस्था ऐसे as ``  crows feet '' and wrinkles .
The skin on  the हथेलियां और the  soles of the feet is 4 mm thick and the thickest skin in the body .
Fur is dense  बाल  .
Primarily , fur augments the insulation the  स्किन provides लकिन can भी serve as  a secondary sexual characteristic or as camouflage .
On some animals , the skin is very hard and thick , and can be  processed to बनाएँ  leather .
सरीसृपों और मछली have  hard protective scales on their skin for protection , and birds have hard feathers , all made of tough β- keratins .
Amphibian skin is not a strong barrier  to ड्योढ़ी  of chemicals and is often subject to osmosis and diffusive forces .
For example , a frog sitting in an anesthetic solution would be sedated quickly , as the chemical diffuses  through इसके स्किन  .
थामस  Scott
The Rev . Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author  जो is प्रधानतया ज्ञात लिये उसके best-selling  work A Commentary On The Whole Bible and The Force of Truth , and as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society .
Daniel Radcliffe , who portrays Harry Potter , has been the icon of the film series since the  रिलीज of the  first film in 2001 .
Some of the most renowned actors of the United Kingdom and Ireland have voiced or  portrayed वर्ण  appearing in the Harry Potter film series based on the book series by J. K. Rowling .
Daniel Radcliffe , Rupert Grint and Emma Watson have played Harry Potter , Ron  वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर  in all the films .
When they were cast only Radcliffe  था previously acted  in a film .
Complementing them on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham Carter , Jim Broadbent , John Cleese , Robbie Coltrane , Warwick Davis , Ralph  fiennes , माइकल gambon ,  Brendan Gleeson , Richard Griffiths , Richard Harris , John Hurt , Jason Isaacs , Miriam Margolyes , Helen McCrory , Gary Oldman , Alan Rickman , Fiona Shaw , Maggie Smith , Timothy Spall , Imelda Staunton , David Thewlis , Emma Thompson , and Julie Walters , among others .
तेरह अभिनेताओं  have appeared as the same character in all eight films of the franchise .
Some well-known British actors who have not appeared in the series  ,  are asked in jest why they have not been cast .
When David Yates was directing the fifth film , Bill Nighy , who had previously collaborated with Yates on three  of उसके  television projects , said that he joked with Yates that maybe now he would n't be the only actor in England who had n't been in Harry Potter .
`` But nobody called '' ,   Nighy added .
But in 2009 , Yates cast Nighy as Minister of Magic Rufus Scrimgeour in  deathly  Hallows .
Nighy said , `` I am no longer the only English actor not to  be in हैरी कुम्हार और  I am very pleased . ''
Jude Law has quipped , ``  nobody 's पूछा  me .
I was a bit too old  लिये  Harry '' .
When a reporter compared potions professor Horace Slughorn 's obsession with famous names to the series ' connection to `` every  notable अंग्रेजों कर्ता ,  '' Jim Broadbent , who plays Slughorn said , `` Well , not every actor gets invited .
I know some  जो हैं स्टिल  waiting . ''
With the exception of Chris Columbus , each director has had a cameo appearance in his respective film : Alfonso  cuarón appears as a जादूगर पकड़कर a मोमबत्ती दौरान a झाँकी at the तीन broomsticks in कैदी  of Azkaban ; Mike Newell is heard briefly as the radio presenter in Frank Bryce 's house in Goblet of Fire ; and David Yates features as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in Order of the Phoenix .
Producer David Heyman  भी  makes a cameo appearance as a wizard featured within a magical moving portrait in the third film , Prisoner of Azkaban .
J. K. Rowling gave a speech during the world premiere of the final film  in the series— हैरी कुम्हार और the deathly  Hallows Part 2 —on 7 July 2011 in London , England .
She announced that she could never have dreamt of the talented actors and actresses who have appeared  in all  the Harry Potter movies .
Rowling also announced that there are seven Harry  कुम्हार फिल्मी श्रेणी डाल सदस्यों , जो वो refers to as  `` The Big Seven '' , they are Daniel Radcliffe , Rupert Grint , Emma Watson , Tom Felton , Matthew Lewis , Evanna Lynch and Bonnie Wright .

A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by members as 'spiritual principles , ' based  on  the approved literature ) outlining a course of action for recovery from , compulsion , or other behavioral problems .
Originally  प्रस्तावित by alcoholics बेनाम ( aa ) as a विधि of रिकवरी इससे alcoholism  , the Twelve Steps were first published in the book Alcoholics Anonymous : The Story of How More Than One Hundred Men Have Recovered from Alcoholism in 1939 .
The method was then adapted and became  the न्यास  of other twelve-step programs .
As summarized by the American Psychological Association , the process  involves the  following:
admitting that one can not control one 's  व्यसन  or compulsion ;
recognizing a higher power that can  दे शक्ति  ;
examining पास्ट  errors with the help of a sponsor ( experienced member ) ;
making amends for these  त्रुटियाँ  ;
learning to live a new life with a new   code of behavior ;
helping  others who suffer from the same addictions or compulsions .
Witness  महाभियोग , in the विधि of प्रमाण of the संयुक्त राज्य  , is the process of calling into question the credibility of an individual who is testifying in a trial .
The Federal Rules of Evidence  contain the नियम शासी  impeachment in federal courts .
पार्टी नेताओ और whips of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि हैं निर्वाचित by उनके संबंधित पार्टियों in a closed-door caucus by रहस्य बैलट और हैं भी ज्ञात as मंजिल नेताओ .
The U.S. House of Representatives does not officially use the term ``  अल्पसंख्यक नेता  '' although the media frequently do .
The House instead uses the terms ``  रिपब्लिकन नेता '' or  `` Democratic Leader '' depending on which party holds a minority of seats .
The current House Majority  नेता is  Republican Eric Cantor , while the current House Minority Leader is Democrat Nancy Pelosi .
The current House Majority Whip is Republican  केविन  McCarthy , while the current House Minority Whip is Democrat Steny Hoyer .
Following the outbreak of World War I in 1914 , the German Army opened the Western Front by first invading  ध्वज और बेल्जियम , तब gaining  military control of important industrial regions in France .
The tide of the advance was dramatically turned with the  बैटल of the marne  .
Following the race to the sea ,  दोनो  sides dug in along a meandering line of fortified trenches , stretching from the North Sea to the Swiss frontier with France .
This line remained  essentially अपरिवर्तित  for most of the war .
between  1915 and 1917 there were several major offensives along this front .
The attacks employed massive artillery  bombardments और massed  infantry advances .
However , a combination of entrenchments , machine gun nests , barbed wire , and artillery  repeatedly  inflicted severe casualties on the attackers and counterattacking defenders .
As a result ,  no significant  advances were made .
Among the most costly of these offensives were the Battle of Verdun with a combined  [ अनुमानित ]  700,000 dead , the Battle of the Somme with more than [ an estimated ] million casualties , and the Battle of Passchendaele with roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties .
In an effort to break the  deadlock , इस सामने देखी the  introduction of new military technology , including poison gas , aircraft and tanks .
But it was only after the adoption of  improved tactics कि  some degree of mobility was restored .
The German Spring  अप्रिय of 1918 थी बना  possible by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk that marked the end of the conflict on the Eastern Front .
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics , the German armies advanced nearly to the west , which marked the deepest advance by either side since 1914  और  very nearly succeeded in forcing a breakthrough .
In spite of the generally stagnant  प्रकृति of इस  front , this theater would prove decisive .
The inexorable advance of the Allied armies during the second half of 1918 persuaded the  जर्मनी कमांडरों कि शिकस्त थी  inevitable , and the government was forced to sue for conditions of an armistice .
The terms of  सलाम यहूद सहमत  upon with the signing of the Treaty of Versailles in 1919 .

in the मामला of शेफ़  Paolo , who had no known first name , they have been listed by title .
The First Lady of the  संयुक्त राज्य ( flotus )  is the hostess of the White House .
Because this position is traditionally filled by the  बीवी of the अध्यक्ष  of the United States , the title is most often applied to the wife of a sitting president .
The current First  महिला is  Michelle Obama .
After her husband Barack  ओबामा थी re-elected  on November 6 , 2012 , she is scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Septic shock is a medical condition as a result of severe infection and sepsis , though  the microbe may be प्रणालीगत or स्थानीयकृत  to a particular site .
It can cause multiple organ dysfunction syndrome ( formerly known as multiple organ failure ) and  मौत  .
Its most common victims  हैं children  , immunocompromised individuals , and the elderly , as their immune systems can not deal with the infection as effectively as those of healthy adults .
Frequently , patients suffering from septic shock  हैं cared लिये in intensive परवाह  units .
The mortality rate from septic shock   is approximately 25–50 % .
Kevin Brereton ( born February 20 , 1972 ) , better known by his stage name k-os ( ; `` chaos '' ) , is a Canadian rapper ,  सिंगर , songwriter और रिकार्ड निर्माता  .
His  दिए नाम may भी be cited  as Kheaven , a spelling he later adopted .
The alias `` k-os '' ,  spelled साथ a निम्नतर मामला `` k '' , थी intended to be कम आक्रामक  than the pseudonyms of other rappers whose names were all upper case , such as KRS-One .
It is an acronym for `` Knowledge of Self , '' although in a later interview he  कहा कि it originally stood लिये `` केविन 's असली ध्वनि . '' k-os  ' music incorporates a wide variety of music genres , including rap , funk , rock , and reggae .
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at times  expressing आलोचना of मुख्यधारा हिप हॉप  culture 's obsession with money , fame and glorification of violence .
A musician as well as a producer , k-os has written and produced   nearly every part of all four of his albums .
k-os प्रायः performs  with a live band , something that is uncommon in the hip hop genre .
He sometimes plays guitar and  कुंजीपटल दोनो दौरान  live performances and in the studio .
k-os received his first musical exposure with  the सिंगल  `` Musical Essence '' , released in 1993 .
After the release of his second single `` Rise Like the Sun '' in 1996 , he  withdrew इससे  the industry because he was dissatisfied with his musical style .
He reappeared briefly in 1999 and released his  डेब्यू  album Exit in 2002 .
The album received positive reviews but sold relatively  few  copies .
He released his second  एल्बम आनन्द विद्रोह  in 2004 , which received platinum status in Canada .
A third album , , was released in 2006 and also  गई  platinum .
His fourth album ,  यस  !
, was released in  2009  .
His fifth album BLack on BLonde was released in  2013  .
The official 2007  संस्करण  of the UCC .
Even the confidential rough drafts of the UCC were saved and  प्रकाशित as  a 10-volume set .
The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ) , first published in 1952 , is one of a number of uniform acts  कि have महरूम promulgated in संयोजन साथ प्रयत्न  to harmonize the law of sales and other commercial transactions in all 50 states within the United States of America .
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent of climbing routes with  एक or अधिक stops at  a belay station .
Each section  of  actual climbing between stops at the belay stations is called a pitch .
The leader ascends the pitch , placing gear and stopping to anchor  themselves to the  belay station .
The reason for the stops can be determined by choice  , सम्मेलन  or necessity .
For  example:
The rope is too short to do  the संपूर्ण रूट  in one pitch ( necessity ) .
The leader has run out of protective  गियर ( necessity  ) .
There is a  सुविधाजनक protectable  ledge , or fixed bolts placed by previous climbers , at the location for a belay station ( convention ) .
The leader chooses to rest or exchange leads  पहले the अगला खण्ड  of the climb ( choice ) .
the सामान्य purpose of ये stops is to allow the दूसरी to ascend to the पाइंट of the सीसे climber जबकि collecting the सुरक्षात्मक गियर इससे the रूट in the कोर्स of the सीसे climber 's ascent .
At the belay station , the protective gear is collected , possibly exchanged to a new leader , and the leader of the  अगला पिच  ascends the route .
A diagram showing  an i गठन  on offense and a 4-3 Formation on defense
In American football , each team has eleven  खिलाड़ी on the फ़ील्ड at  one time .
The specific role that a  खिलाड़ी takes  on the field is called their position .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are allowed unlimited  subsititutions , कि is टीमों may  change any number of players after any play .
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players , the offense ( the team with the ball , who is trying to score  ) , the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे  scoring , and to take the ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those  platoons ,  various specific positions exist depending on what the player 's main job is .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was  enacted  into law by the Congress of the United States as Title II of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which the manufacture , importation , possession , use and distribution of certain  substances  is regulated .
The Act also served as the national implementing legislation for the Single  सम्मेलन  on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created five Schedules ( classifications ) , with varying qualifications for  a पदार्थ  to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed  by  Congress created the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes scheduled other substances through legislation such as the Hillory J. Farias and Samantha Reid Date-Rape Prevention Act of 2000 , which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New Jersey Transit park-and-ride station in Wayne , New Jersey along the Montclair-Boonton Line that provides bus service to New York City and various other points in the area as well as  montclair-boonton लकीर ट्रैन सेवा to नई यॉर्क , hoboken , और इंटरमीडिएट अंक साथ the लकीर between  Hackettstown and Montclair State University .
It is located off of the southbound lanes of  नई जर्सी  Route 23 on West Belt Road , near the interchange where Route 23 , Interstate 80 , and U.S. Route 46 meet , across from the Willowbrook Mall .
The station  खोली in जनवरी  2008 and has 1,000 parking spaces .
New Jersey Transit intends for this combined rail and bus station to become an ``  interceptor स्टेशन , '' कि  will help relieve the habitual congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange , where the three major highways meet .
In addition , the construction of the station was meant to also ease the congestion at what was then Route 23 Park & Ride , a bus depot on Route 23 North that has since been renamed Mother 's Park & Ride , and the Willowbrook Mall Park & Ride ; the  now-mother 's साईट था सीमित पार्किंग जबकि njt थी having ट्रबल  with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook .
The Wayne Township bus garage is located on the  विपरीत पक्ष of  Route 23 .
There has been a proposal to build a parking deck with another thousand   spots and develop the land at the station .
In addition to Montclair-Boonton trains , the Transit Center is  परोसा by the following  New Jersey Transit bus lines:
75 to Newark Penn  स्टेशन  and Butler
194 to Port  प्राधिकार बस टर्मिनल  and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to Port Authority Bus Terminal and William  paterson विश्वविद्यालयों
324 to Port Authority   and Wayne Route 23
748 to Willowbrook Mall and  paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol , ampersat , apetail or commercial at in English—and less  commonly  a wide range of other terms .
The fact that there is no single word in English for the symbol has prompted some writers to use the French arobase or Spanish and Portuguese arroba—or to coin new words such as asperand ,  ampersat—but none of ये रै  achieved wide currency .
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g . 7  विजेट  @ $ 2 = $ 14 ) , it was not included on the keyboard of the earliest commercially successful typewriters , but was on at least one 1889 model and the very successful Underwood models from the `` Underwood No . 5 '' in 1900 onward .
It is  अभी  universally included on computer keyboards .
In recent years , its meaning has grown to include the sense of being ``  स्तिथ at , '' `` और , '' or  `` directed at '' , especially in email addresses and social media , particularly Twitter .
the चिह्नित  is encoded at .
The Catcher in the   Rye is a 1951 novel by J. D. Salinger .
originally प्रकाशित  for adults , it has since become popular with adolescent readers for its themes of teenage angst and alienation .
It has been  अनूदित into लगभग  all of the world 's major languages .
Around 250,000 copies are  बेची प्रत्येक साल साथ  total sales of more than 65 million books .
The novel 's protagonist and antihero , Holden  caulfield , रै  become an icon for teenage rebellion .
The novel was included on Times 2005 list of the 100 best  english-language novels लिखा चूंकि 1923 , और it थी नामित by आधुनिक पुस्तकालयों  and its readers as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century .
It has been frequently challenged in  the संयुक्त राज्य और अन्य  countries for its liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality .
It also deals with complex issues of identity , belonging   , connection , and alienation .
skeletal  muscles homo sapiens
This is a table of muscles  of the इंसान  anatomy .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles within the typical human , and almost every muscle  constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of  identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
nevertheless , the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल  to define because different sources group muscles differently , e.g . regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
उदाहरण  range from 640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body can be categorized into  a क्रमांक of  groups which include muscles relating to the head and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action refers to the action of each muscle from  the मानक  anatomical position .
In other positions , other   actions may be performed .
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American reality  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित by जोनाथन  Murray for the Oxygen television station .
The show centers on seven feisty and mischievous women with different  पृष्ठभूमि और personalities  , who have a number of psychological and behavioral problems .
They are introduced to the show off their pernicious behavior and accomplish specific goals   .
the डाल , deemed `` ख़राब लड़कियों '' , आनंद  a luxurious lifestyle in a fine mansion for three months , during which they must obey specified rules .
Their lives inside – and outside – of the house are chronicled and recorded by  the उत्पादन  team .
The Bad Girls Club is broadcast in  पाँच देशों ( संयुक्त  States , Netherlands , Australia , Hungary , and Sweden ) .
It has received negative reviews from critics , who believe  the दिखाएँ promotes हिंसा  by adolescent viewers .
Furthermore , several cast members made controversial remarks which outraged many  दर्शक  .
The format of the show has changed  इससे जल्दी सीज़न  .
If a `` bad girl '' breaks a rule , she is evicted from the show  और , if it is  early in the season , replaced by a new `` bad girl '' .
There have been nine complete seasons of The Bad Girls  क्लबों , साथ the  tenth season currently airing .
The fourth season had the highest  दरजा  in the show 's history , becoming its `` breakthrough season '' .
There have been three spin-offs  of the ख़राब  Girls Club .
One of them , Love Games : Bad Girls Need Love Too ,  जहाँ पास्ट डाल  members seek true love , has gained high ratings .
Oxygen has  भी released  a mobile game , comic strip and merchandise to promote the show .
Of the 92 contestants , Kerry Harvick ( of season one ) was a successful country singer before  the दिखाएँ  .
Tanisha Thomas (  of ऋतु  two ) later hosted Oxygen 's OxygenLive !
and the subsequent seasons of Love Games  : ख़राब लड़कियों need प्रेम too  .
Thomas , who has been dubbed the ``  गॉडमदर '' to सब प्रतियोगी ,  has her own television documentary entitled Tanisha Gets Married .
As of Season 8 she 's been the host of the reunion  specials  .
the आयोवा सीनेट is the  upper house of the Iowa General Assembly .
There are 50 seats in the Iowa Senate , representing 50 single-member districts across the state with populations  of  approximately 60,927 per constituency , .
Each Senate district  is रचित  of two House districts .
The Senate  meets at  the Iowa State Capitol in Des Moines .
Unlike the lower house ,  the आयोवा हाउस of  Representatives , Senators serve four-year terms , with half of the Senate staggered for re-election every two years .
There are no  पद  limits for the Senate .
Mechanical  मरम्मत
Maintenance , repair , and operations ( MRO ) or maintenance ,  मरम्मत , और overhaul involves  fixing any sort of mechanical , plumbing or electrical device should it become out of order or broken ( known as repair , unscheduled or casualty maintenance ) .
It also includes performing routine actions which keep the device in  working  order ( known as scheduled maintenance ) or prevent trouble from arising ( preventive maintenance ) .
MRO may be defined as , `` All actions which have the objective of retaining or restoring an item in or to a state in which it can perform its required  फलन  .
The actions include the combination of all technical and corresponding administrative ,  managerial , और पर्यवेक्षण क्रियाएँ  . ''
mro परिचालन can be categorised by whether  the product remains the property of the customer , i.e . a service is being offered , or whether the product is bought by the reprocessing organisation and sold to any customer wishing to make the purchase ( Guadette , 2002 ) .
In the former case it may be a backshop operation within a larger  संगठन or छोटी  operation .
The  former  of these represents a closed loop supply chain and usually has the scope of maintenance , repair or of the product .
The latter of the categorisations is an open loop  सप्लाई कड़ी और  is typified by refurbishment and remanufacture .
The main  characteristic of the बंद  loop system is that the demand for a product is matched with the supply of a used product .
Neglecting asset write-offs and exceptional activities the total population of the  product  between the customer and the service provider remains constant .
Prince William , Duke of  कैम्ब्रिज ( विलियम आर्थर फिलिप  Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) , is the elder son of Charles , Prince of Wales , and Diana , Princess of Wales , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second  in the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार ,  behind his father , to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , Jamaica , Barbados , The Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon Islands , Tuvalu , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was educated at  four  schools in the United Kingdom and obtained a degree from the University of St Andrews .
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile  , बेलीज़ , तंजानिया  , and Kenya where he has lived and holidayed several times .
Prince William has also taken Kiswahili studies at universities in  कीनिया और  Tanzania .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and Royals Regiment of the Household Cavalry —serving with his brother Prince Harry —and , two years later , earned his wings by  completing पायलट प्रशिक्षण at royal एयर  Force College Cranwell .
In 2009 , he transferred to the Royal Air Force , was promoted to Flight Lieutenant and underwent helicopter flying training in  अनुक्रम to become a full-time पायलट  with the Search and Rescue Force .
In 2010 , he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter  प्रशिक्षण और गई on to  RAF Valley on No . 22 Squadron performing co-pilot duties on board a Sea King search and rescue helicopter .
प्रिंस विलियम शादीशुदा उसके longtime गर्लफ्रेंड , कैथरीन मिडलटन , on 29 अप्रैल 2011 at वेस्टमिंस्टर ऐबी .
Hours prior to his wedding , Prince William was created Duke of Cambridge , Earl of Strathearn ,  और  Baron Carrickfergus .
DeAndre Cortez Way ( born July 28 , 1990 ) , better known by his stage name Soulja Boy Tell 'Em , or simply  soulja लड़के , is an अमरीकी rapper , रिकार्ड  producer , actor , and entrepreneur .
In September 2007 , his single `` Crank That ( Soulja Boy ) `` reached number one on the  बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 .
The single was initially self-published on the internet , and it later became a number-one hit in the United States for seven  non-consecutive सप्ताह starting in सितंबर  2007 .
on अगस्त 17 रास्ता थी सूचीबद्ध  at # 18 on the Forbes list of Hip-Hop Cash Kings of 2010 earning $ 7 million for that year .
Way has currently released three studio albums and one independent album : his debut studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the  riaa .
However , his next two albums , iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did not match the commercial success of his debut , the latter only selling 100,000 copies , despite the success of  अनेक singles आरपार दोनो एल्बम , ऐसे as `` चुंबन me thru the फोन `` और `` फेरे my swag on `` ( isouljaboytellem  ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ) .
This was mainly due to negotiation problems with Interscope  रिकॉर्ड जिससे meant a सीमित राशि  of records were made available to the public .
As of 2011 , Way has confirmed he is working on  उसके चौथी स्टुडियो  album , entitled USA DRE , which will be released in 2013 .
The electron transport chain in the  सूत्रकणिका is the साईट  of oxidative phosphorylation in eukaryotes .
The NADH and succinate generated in the citric acid cycle are  oxidized , providing  energy to power ATP synthase .
Photosynthetic  इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण  chain of the thylakoid membrane .
An  इलेक्ट्रॉन हस्तांतरण  chain ( ETC ) couples electron transfer between an electron donor ( such as NADH ) and an electron acceptor ( such as O2 ) with the transfer of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane .
The resulting electrochemical proton  अनुपात is प्रयुक्त to generate  chemical energy in the form of adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) .
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms used for extracting energy from sunlight in photosynthesis and  भी इससे रेडॉक्स  reactions , such as the oxidation of sugars ( respiration ) .
In chloroplasts , light drives the conversion of water to oxygen and NADP+ to NADPH with transfer of H+ ions  आरपार हरितलवक  membranes .
In mitochondria , it is the  परिवर्तन of  oxygen to water , NADH to NAD+ and succinate to fumarate that are required to generate the proton gradient .
Electron transport chains are major sites of premature electron leakage to oxygen , generating superoxide and potentially resulting in  increased oxidative  stress .
Tramadol hydrochloride (  trademarked as conzip , ryzolt , ultracet  , Ultram in the USA , Ralivia , Zytram XL Durella { CR-100/200 mg } in Canada or Adolonta in Spain ) is a centrally acting synthetic analgesic used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain .
The drug has a wide range of applications , including treatment of rheumatoid arthritis  , बेचैन टाँगे सिंड्रोम  , motor neurone disease and fibromyalgia .
It was launched and marketed as Tramal by the German pharmaceutical company Grünenthal  gmbh in 1977  .
Tramadol is a weak μ-opioid receptor agonist that  भी induces serotonin रिलीज और  inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine .
Tramadol is metabolized to O-desmethyltramadol , a significantly more potent μ-opioid   agonist .
Tramadol and its major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished from other more potent opioid agonists by relative selectivity for  μ-opioid receptors  .
बर्नार्ड लॉरेंस `` बर्नी '' madoff ( ;  born April 29 , 1938 ) is an American former stockbroker , investment advisor , financier , and white collar criminal .
He is the former non-executive Chairman of the  नैस्डैक भण्डार मार्केट , और the admitted ऑपरेटर  of a Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in U.S. history .
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm Bernard  L. madoff निवेश प्रतिभूति  LLC in 1960 , and was its chairman until his arrest on December 11 , 2008 .
the  firm was one of the top market maker businesses on Wall Street , which bypassed `` specialist '' firms by directly executing orders over the counter from retail brokers .
He employed at the firm his brother Peter as Senior Managing Director and Chief Compliance  अधिकारी ; पीटर रै चूंकि  been sentenced to 10 years in prison .
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's rules and compliance officer and attorney , and his sons  एंड्रयू और चिह्नित ( चिह्नित वचनबद्ध  suicide by hanging exactly two years after his father 's arrest ) .
On December 10 , 2008 , Madoff 's sons told authorities that their father had confessed to them that the asset management unit of  उसके कड़ थी a  massive Ponzi scheme , and quoted him as describing it as `` one big lie . ''
the  following day , FBI agents arrested Madoff and charged him with one count of securities fraud .
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (  सेक ) था previously conducted investigations  into Madoff 's business practices , but did not uncover the massive fraud .
In March 2009 , Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies and admitted to turning his wealth management  कारोबार into a विशाल पेन्शन योजना  that defrauded thousands of investors of billions of dollars .
Madoff said he began the Ponzi scheme in the  जल्दी 1990s  .
However , federal investigators believe the fraud began as early as the 1970s , and those  चार्ज साथ recovering the लापता धन मानना  the investment operation may never have been legitimate .
The amount missing from client accounts ,  सहित fabricated  gains , was almost $ 65 billion .
The court-appointed  ट्रस्टी अनुमानित वास्तविक  losses to investors of $ 18 billion .
On June 29 , 2009 , he was  sentenced to 150 सालो in थाना  , the maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in several countries to recognize the work of  secretaries , प्रशासनिक assistants , receptionists  , and other administrative support professionals .
In North America , it is celebrated on the Wednesday of the last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013   ) .
In France it is celebrated on the third Thursday in April  (  April 18 in 2013 ) .
In Australia it   is celebrated on the first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator or tribunal board , generally of a public administrative  एजेंसी , जिससे रै शक्तियां और प्रक्रियाओं  resembling those of a court of law or judge , and which is obligated to objectively determine facts and draw conclusions from them so as to provide the basis of an official action .
Such actions are able to remedy a  हालात or थोपने विधिक दंड  , and may affect the legal rights , duties or privileges of specific parties .
स्मारक of tycho  Brahe and Johannes Kepler in Prague
Tycho Brahe ( 14 December 154624 October 1601 ) , born Tyge Ottesen Brahe , was a Danish nobleman known for his  सटीक और व्यापक  astronomical and planetary observations .
He was born in Scania ,  तब भाग of डेनमार्क , अभी  part of modern-day Sweden .
Tycho was well known in his  आजीवन as an astronomer  and alchemist .
In his De nova stella ( On the new star ) of 1573 , he  refuted the aristotelian  belief in an unchanging celestial realm .
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars , '' ( stellae novae , now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572 , lacked the parallax expected in sub-lunar phenomena , and were therefore not `` atmospheric '' tailless comets as previously believed ,  लकिन यहूद ऊपर the माहौल और  moon .
Using similar  माप he दिखाया कि धूमकेतुओं यहूद भी नहीं  atmospheric phenomena , as previously thought , and must pass through the supposedly `` immutable '' celestial spheres .
As an astronomer , Tycho worked to combine what he saw as the geometrical benefits of the Copernican system with the philosophical benefits of the  ptolemaic प्रणाली into उसके अपना मॉडल of the ब्रह्मांड  , the Tychonic system .
Furthermore , he was the last of the major naked eye astronomers ,  working बगैर telescopes  for his observations .
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of Hven and the funding to build the Uraniborg , an early research institute , where he built large astronomical instruments and took many careful measurements , and later Stjerneborg , underground , when he discovered  कि उसके यंत्र in  the former were not sufficiently steady .
On the island ( on which he demonstrated autocratic character and behavior toward the residents ) he founded manufactories such  as  paper-making to provide material for printing his results .
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in 1597 , he was invited by the Bohemian king and Holy  रोमन सम्राट rudolph  II to Prague , where he became the official imperial astronomer .
He built the new  वेधशाला at benátky  nad Jizerou .
Here , from 1600 until his death in 1601 , he was assisted by Johannes Kepler who later used  tycho 's  astronomical data to develop Kepler 's laws of planetary motion .
Guro District ( Guro-gu ) is a district of Seoul , South Korea , which was separated  इससे yeongdeungpo ज़िला  on April 1 , 1980 .
Located in the southwestern part of the city , where besides Yangcheon District and Geumcheon District Guro District has an important position as a transport link which  contains railroads  , land routes from the rest of Seoul to the south of the country .
The  gyeongbu  and Gyeongin railway lines connect Seoul to Busan and Incheon .
In addition ,  सियोल महानगर  Subway lines 1 , 2 , and 7 , and major highways intersect in Guro District .
The name Guro originates  इससे the लेजेंड कि नौ  ( ) old men ( Korean : ro ) enjoyed longevity in the district .
A digital  औद्योगिक  complex is located in Guro District .
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex , which played a leading industrial role mainly with textile manufacturing , dressmaking and other labour-intensive industries in 1967  , रै महरूम rapidly बदला into  an IT industrial complex .
This complex played a pivotal role in the economic growth of the South Korea 's development era , referred to as the `` Miracle on the Han  नदी `` , और भी contributed 10 प्रतिशत  of national export in the 1970s .
Twenty-one percent of the total area of Guro District is a restricted zone to be used as a  greenbelt साथ the तभी  arboretum in Seoul .
The zone is changing into  a जीवंत ज़िला as  large labour-intensive factories are moving from the area and the council is developing what it terms its four zones .
An `` e-government `` system based on this hosted the international e-participation forum on February  7–9 , 2007 , साथ  the participation of more than thirty-seven countries .
The forum was launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux , France ) , Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill , US )  , apirak kosayothin ( बैंकॉक , थाईलैंड ) , uvais मोहम्मद emthiyas ( कोलोन  , Sri Lanka ) , and world experts such as Dr William H. Dutton ( Director of Oxford Internet Institute at the University of Oxford , UK ) and Dr Ari-Veiko Anttiroiko ( professor at the University of Tampere , Finland ) participated in the forum .
The Guro Declaration , adopted during the forum , aims to set up a portal site for  e-government विकास  and to establish a concrete project in order to bridge the digital divide among the world 's cities .
This practice has been recognised for providing a new important step in the  विकास of e-democracy  .
The e-participation forum was a key factor for Guro to play the leading role in bridging the digital  divide among शहरों , to provide i.t . उद्यमों  located in Guro Digital Industrial Complex the opportunity to launch into the international market , to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy .
The international  e-participation फ़ोरम  on February 7–9 , 2007
A wonton ( also spelled wantan , wanton , or wuntun in transcription from Cantonese ;  मंदारिन : húndùn  ) is a type of dumpling commonly found in a number of Chinese cuisines .
Many people were involved in the invention of  रेडियो as we  now know it .
Several possible methods of wireless communication were considered , including inductive and capacitive induction and transmission through the ground , however the method used for radio today  exclusively involves the हस्तांतरण और रिसेप्शन of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves .
After early speculation on the subject , experimental work on the connection  between विद्युत और चुंबकत्व began around 1820 साथ  the work of Hans Christian Ørsted and continued with the work of André-Marie Ampère , Joseph Henry , and Michael Faraday .
These investigations culminated in the  पूरा सिद्धान्त  of electromagnetism developed by James Clerk Maxwell .
This theory described the theoretical basis of the propagation of  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves .
After Maxwell 's theory was published many people experimented with wireless communication , some intentionally using  मैक्सवेल 's सिद्धान्त कुछ  not .
It is considered likely that the first intentional transmission of a signal by means of electromagnetic waves was performed  by दाउद एडवर्ड ह्यूजेस  around 1880 , although this was considered to be induction at the time .
The first systematic and unequivocal transmission of EM waves was performed by Heinrich Rudolf Hertz and described in papers published  in 1887 और 1890  .
हर्ट्ज़  famously considered these results as being of little practical value .
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the  विकास of components और सिद्धान्त  involved with the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves .
Others , notably Guglielmo Marconi , were concerned with practical improvements and the commercial   application of radio to wireless telegraphy .
Later on Reginald A. Fessenden  became the  first to send an audio signal by means of electromagnetic waves .
Scurvy is a disease resulting from a  कमियां  of vitamin C , which is required for the synthesis of collagen in humans .
The chemical name for vitamin C , ascorbic acid , is derived from the Latin name of scurvy ,  scorbutus , जिससे भी provides the क्रियाशील scorbutic  ( `` of , characterized by or having to do with scurvy '' ) .
Scurvy often presents itself initially as symptoms of malaise and lethargy ,  followed by गठन  of spots on the skin , spongy gums , and bleeding from the mucous membranes .
Spots are most  abundant on the जांघों और  legs , and a person with the ailment looks pale , feels depressed , and is partially immobilized .
As scurvy advances , there can be open , suppurating   wounds , loss of teeth , jaundice , fever , neuropathy and death .
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors , pirates and others aboard ships at sea longer than perishable fruits and vegetables could be stored ( subsisting instead only on cured and salted meats  और सूखी दाने ) और by सैनिको similarly वंचित of ये भोजन  for extended periods .
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c . 380 BC ) , and herbal  cures लिये स्कर्वी have महरूम  known in many native cultures since prehistory .
Scurvy was one of the limiting  कारकों of समुद्री सफर  , often killing large numbers of the passengers and crew on long-distance voyages .
This became a significant issue in Europe from the beginning of the modern era in the Age of Discovery in the 15th century , continuing  to खेल a significant  role through World War I in the 20th century .
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a nutritional deficiency , until the isolation of vitamin C and direct evidence of its  कड़ी to स्कर्वी  in 1932 , numerous theories and treatments were proposed , often on little or no experimental data .
This inconsistency is attributed to the lack of vitamin C  as a पृथक अवधारणा , an अक्षमता to reliably  link different foods ( notably present in fresh citrus , watercress , and organ meat ) to scurvy .
an अतिरिक्त अवधारणा जरूरी to समझे स्कर्वी थी the degradation of विटामिन c by एक्सपोज़र to एयर और तांबे और अन्य परिवर्तन मेटल लवण ऐसे as those of आयरन , यूँ बदलना the कड़ी of भोजन to स्कर्वी over समय  .
उपचार  by fresh food , particularly citrus fruit , was periodically implemented , as it had been since antiquity .
However until the 1930s ,  उपचार थी असंगत  , with many ineffective treatments used into the 20th century .
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy , James Lind who first proved it could be treated with citrus fruit in experiments he described in his 1753 book , A Treatise of the Scurvy , though  उसके सलाह थी नहीं implemented by the royal नेवी लिये  several decades .
In  infants , स्कर्वी is sometimes referred to as barlow  's disease , named after Sir Thomas Barlow , a British physician who described it .
However , Barlow 's disease may also  refer  to mitral valve prolapse .
Other  eponyms  for scurvy include Moeller 's disease and Cheadle 's disease .
Scurvy does not occur in most animals because they can synthesize  उनके अपना  vitamin C .
However , humans and other higher primates ( the simians - monkeys and apes - and tarsiers  ) , गिनी सूअर , सबसे  or all bats , and some species of birds and fish lack an enzyme ( L-gulonolactone oxidase ) necessary for such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet .
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues , with particularly high concentrations occurring in  citrus फल  ( oranges , lemons , limes , grapefruits ) , tomatoes , potatoes , cabbages , and green peppers .
Iron is   a chemical element with the symbol Fe ( from ) and atomic number 26 .
It is  a मेटल in the  first transition series .
it is the सबसे आम  element ( by mass ) forming the planet Earth as a whole , forming much of Earth 's outer and inner core .
It  is the चौथी  most common element in the Earth 's crust .
Iron 's very common presence in rocky  ग्रह जैसे धरती is due to इसके abundant उत्पादन as a परिणाम of संलयन in high-mass  stars , where the production of nickel-56 ( which decays to the most common isotope of iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic .
This  causes radioactive  nickel to become the last element to be produced before collapse of a supernova leads to the explosive events that scatter this precursor radionuclide of iron abundantly into space .
Like other group 8 elements , iron  exists in a चौड़ी दायरा of ऑक्सीकरण  states , −2 to +6 , although +2 and +3 are the most common .
Elemental iron occurs in meteoroids and other low oxygen environments , but is reactive to  ऑक्सीजन  and water .
Fresh iron surfaces appear lustrous silvery-gray , but oxidize in normal air to give hydrated iron oxides , commonly  ज्ञात as चढ़  .
Unlike many other metals which form passivating oxide layers , iron oxides occupy more volume than  आयरन मेटल , और यूँ आयरन आक्साइड  flake off and expose fresh surfaces for corrosion .
Iron metal has been used since ancient times , though copper  alloys , जिससे have निम्नतर  melting temperatures , were used first in history .
Pure iron is soft (  softer than एल्युमिनियम  ) , but is unobtainable by smelting .
The material is significantly hardened and strengthened  by impurities  from the smelting process , such as carbon .
A certain proportion of carbon ( between  0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces  steel , which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron .
Crude iron metal is produced in blast furnaces , where  अयस्क is घटाया  by coke to pig iron , which has a high carbon content .
Further refinement with oxygen reduces the carbon content  to the सही proportion  to make steel .
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels ) are by far the most common metals in industrial use , due to their great range of desirable  properties and the  abundance of iron .
Iron chemical  यौगिकों , जिससे  include ferrous and ferric compounds , have many uses .
Iron oxide mixed with aluminium powder can be ignited to create a thermite reaction , used  in वेल्डिंग  and purifying ores .
It forms  शब्दकोष यौगिकों  with the halogens and the chalcogens .
Among its  कार्बधातुक यौगिकों is ferrocene  , the first sandwich compound discovered .
Iron plays an important role in biology , forming complexes with molecular oxygen in hemoglobin and myoglobin ; these two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins  in  vertebrates .
Iron is also the metal used at the active site of many important redox enzymes dealing with cellular respiration and oxidation and  कटौती in पौधे और पशु  .
The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association (  bcbsa ) is a संघ of  38 separate health insurance organizations and companies in the United States .
Combined , they directly or indirectly provide health  बीमे to over 99 लाख  Americans .
The history  of ब्लू क्रॉस तिथियाँ वापस to  1929 , while the history of Blue Shield dates to 1939 .
The Blue  क्रॉस  Association dates back to 1960 , while its Blue Shield counterpart was created in 1948 .
The two organizations merged in 1982 , forming the  वर्तमान संघ  .
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American , Australian , New  जीलैंड , कनाडाई , singaporean , हांग काँग , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी और jamaican  English ; as a crisp in British English and Hiberno-English , and as either a chip or wafer in Indian English ) is a thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy .
Potato chips  हैं commonly  served as an appetizer , side dish , or snack .
The basic chips are cooked and salted ; additional varieties are manufactured using various flavorings and ingredients including seasonings , herbs , spices , cheeses , and artificial  additives  .
`` Crisps '' , however , may also refer to many different types of savory snack products sold in the United Kingdom  और आयरलैंड  , some made from potato , but may also be made from maize , tapioca or other cereals .
An  उदाहरण of ये  kinds of savory snacks is Monster Munch .
Potato chips are a predominant part of the snack food market in English-speaking  देशों  and numerous other Western nations .
The  वैश्विक आलू चिप  market generated total revenues of US $ 16.4 billion in 2005 .
This accounted for 35.5 % of the total savory  स्नैक्स मार्केट  in that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ) .
Henry Clay , Sr. ( April 12 , 1777 – June 29 , 1852 ) was a  वकील , राजनेता और skilled orator जो represented केंटकी in दोनो  the Senate and in the House of Representatives .
He served three different terms as Speaker of the United States House of  प्रतिनिधि  and was also Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829 .
He lost his campaigns for  अध्यक्ष  in 1824 , 1832 and 1844 .
Clay was a dominant figure in both   the First and Second Party systems .
As a leading war hawk in 1812 , he favored war with Britain and  निभाई a significant  role in leading the nation to war in the War of 1812 .
In 1824 he ran for president and lost , but threw his  चुनावी मत to जॉन क्विंसी  Adams , who made him secretary of state as the Jacksonians denounced what they considered a `` corrupt bargain . ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the candidate of the Whig Party , which he  संस्थापित और प्रायः  dominated .
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System , fighting for an increase in tariffs to foster industry in the United States , the  उपयोग of संघीय funding to निर्माण और maintain अवसंरचना  , and a strong national bank .
he  opposed the annexation of Texas , fearing it would inject the slavery issue into politics .
Clay also opposed the Mexican-American War and the `` Manifest Destiny `` policy of Democrats ,  जिससे लागत उसे मत in the बंद  1844 election .
Dubbed the `` Great Pacificator , '' Clay brokered important compromises during the  nullification  Crisis and on the slavery issue .
As part of the `` Great  triumvirate `` or `` अमर तिकड़ी , '' साथ  with his colleagues Daniel Webster and John C. Calhoun , he was instrumental in formulating the Missouri Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850 .
He was viewed as the primary representative of  पश्चिमी रूचि in इस समूह , और थी  given the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star . ''
A plantation owner , Clay held slaves during his lifetime but freed them   in his Will .
Abraham Lincoln , the  whig नेता in इलिनोइस  , was a great admirer of Clay , saying he was `` my ideal of a great man . ''
Lincoln  wholeheartedly समर्थित  Clay 's economic programs .
In 1957 , a Senate Committee selected Clay as one  of the पाँच महानतम u.s . सीनेटरों , साथ साथ डेनियल वेबस्टर  , John C. Calhoun , Robert La Follette , and Robert Taft .
BJ 's Wholesale Club , Inc. , commonly referred to simply as BJ 's , is a membership-only warehouse club chain  ऑपरेटिंग on the  United States East Coast , as well as in the state of Ohio .
The company is ranked # 232 on Fortune magazine 's 2010 listing of America 's  500 largest पब्लिक  corporations .
the जादूगर of oz , ज्ञात दौरान उसके शासनकाल as  The Great and Powerful Oz , is the epithet of Oscar Zoroaster Phadrig Isaac Norman Henkel Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs , a fictional character in the Land of Oz , created by American author L. Frank Baum .
The character  थी further popularized  by the classic 1939 movie , wherein his full name is not mentioned .
Kristinia Jamie DeBarge ( ; born March  8 , 1990  ) is an American singer , songwriter , dancer and actress .
She first appeared on national television in 2003 as a contestant on the  अमरीकी आइडल spin-off , अमरीकी  Juniors .
In 2009 , DeBarge signed a contract with the Island  रिकॉर्ड विभाग  Sodapop , releasing her debut album Exposed in July of the same year .
The first single , `` Goodbye `` , reached the top 20 in the US  और कनाडा  .
the सीसे सिंगल ( ``  Cry Wolf '' ) from her untitled sophomore album was released on September 27 , 2012 .
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa in NCAA Division  i fbs कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल  .
The team is coached  by norm  Chow .
It was part of the Western  एथलेटिक सम्मेलन  until July 2012 , when the team joined the Mountain West Conference .
The Hawaii Warriors were the third non-AQ team to play in a BCS bowl game ; losing to Georgia 41–10 in the Sugar Bowl on January 1 , 2008 in New   Orleans , Louisiana .
Marvin Gaye ( April 2 , 1939April 1 ,  1984 ) , born मारविन pentz gay , jr.  , was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of  motown रिकॉर्ड in the 1960s साथ a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स  including `` How Sweet It Is ( To Be Loved By You ) `` and `` I Heard It Through the Grapevine `` and duet recordings with Mary Wells and Tammi Terrell , later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept albums What 's Going On and Let 's Get It On and became among the  पहला कलाकारों in motown to ब्रेक दूर इससे the  reins of its production company .
Gaye 's later  रिकार्डिंग  influenced several R & B subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in  the early  1980s , Gaye released the 1982 Grammy Award-winning hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye has been posthumously honored by many institutions ,  सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार  and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .
